name: She's My Type
description: After tomboy Haedam is thoroughly friend zoned by her first love, she's determined to glow up before college. But when she makes the wrong impression on her first day of school, she realizes she needs the help of her reluctant neighbor. In exchange, she promises to put up with their living circumstances and keep his secret. What could possibly go wrong?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Hooky
description: Dani and Dorian have missed the bus of the school of magic. Now, they must find someone who teach them how to be a great and good witches… Or maybe not.​
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Juujika no Rokunin
description:
”Is it okay to kill people?"  
A treacherous revenge suspense by Shiryu Nakatake, a newcomer to Bessatsu Shonen Magazine.  

"Shun, if someone is converted, let him go and do nothing. He should be given a chance to be reborn."  

"Grandpa, I hope he doesn't reincarnate himself."  
In order to defeat several non-human monsters, the boy also became something non-human.  

Shun Uruma, a sixth-grade student, was named "Experimental body: A" by five of his classmates and was severely bullied and lived in hell. His only peace was with his brother, who loved him, and his parents, who protected him…. . until the five monsters killed his family.  

When he finally loses everything and faces true hell, a dark "wish" is born inside Shun. He was reborn under the training of his grandfather, who served in a secret unit during WWII. Now, four years later, he appears in front of his fated enemy.  

"I won't let ANYONE get in the way of my revenge."
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Harem, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: YuruYuri
description: Four mischievous girls illegally occupy the former Traditional Tea Ceremony clubroom, in order to create the "Amusement Club." These scamps…who ignore repeated warnings—in direct rebellion with the righteous directives of the Student Council—decide to remain in the room until they finally get off their bums and do something! In this slightly sluggish manga, full of fits and starts, the four girls set off from their homes for a walk together with days full of a little this and that!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: You Shou Yan
description:
"In this realm mythological creatures roam, descendant of the nine heavens they call home." 

Sibuxiang, a mythical deer-man couch potato, is kicked out of heaven and assigned to support the mythological creatures wandering the human world. He meets and goes on adventures with his friends: the energetic, food loving Pixiu named Pipi, the fanatic moon bunny Tuye, the banished-from-heaven mouse brothers Jinjiao and Yinjiao, and many others. What kind of adventures will they take on?
tags: Historical, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Ichigo Mashimaro
description: "Cute girls doing cute things in cute ways." Everyday things make up the fabric of life, whether it's making friends, going to school, trying to make money, or celebrating a holiday. Ichigo Mashimaro follows the antics and daily lives of Chika Itoh, her sister Nobue, and her friends Miu, Matsuri, and Ana.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Hanninmae no Koibito
description: One day, when I was making school supplies in the art room, a very scary-looking girl was staring at me…!? Crafts girl vs. art boy romantic comedy!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kokuyou no Hanayome
description: In the Yamatoba Empire, where two races, humans and night demons, have existed since time immemorial. Iku, whose hair and eyes are as pale as white snow, is mistreated by her family because of her strange, demon-like appearance. She is treated as little more than a servant until the day she is sold to a man for money, a fate she thought impossible to escape from... One day, however, the next head of a prominent family, Subaru, learns of Iku's secret and offers her a marriage proposal. Though it is a political marriage, the two, both burdened with a damaged past, gradually become attracted to each other...? A love story of destiny unfolds as the hearts of a couple who have never known love melt together!
tags: Historical, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Mato Seihei no Slave
description:
The demon-filled dimension known as "Mato" has opened to threaten humanity, and a type of "peach" tree that grows there yields fruit that confers special powers to those who eat it, giving humanity a fighting chance, but this only works for women. As such, as protectors of humanity, women rise in social status while men are relegated to second-class citizens scraping for basic occupation and acknowledgment.   
  
Cue Yuuki Wakura, a domestically crafty and laborious high school senior whose older sister was taken during a Mato event 5 years before; while lamenting the hardships of the life ahead of him, an event opens before him, and while being rescued from demons by Captain Kyouka of the Anti-Demon Corps, she confers him powers as her "slave" and turns him into a mighty beast mount that mows down the demons.   
  
However, there is a surprising price to pay for being her "slave"… and it's not him who has to pay it.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Chigau Miyahara Omae janai!
description:
The manga centers on Arima, a boy who has a crush on a girl named Yukihira. But every time he tries to make a move to get closer to Yukihira, his other friend Miyahara just happens to be in the scene and will always mistakenly think that Arima is making a move on her. ([ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2022-11-11/midori-obiya-launches-new-manga-mini-series/.191780))
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [Young Jump!](https://ynjn.jp/title/7831)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Legendary Hero is an Academy Honors Student
description:
Back in the Age of Despair, Kyle defeated Erebos, the genesis of evil.  Then 5000 years later, he reincarnated as Leo with the memories of his past life intact.

His comrades — the Brave Arron, the Divine Blacksmitsh Dweno, the Poet of the Stars Luna, and the Wise King Lysinas — were all heralded as great heroes.

But the 'Hero Record', a gift from the heavens that records the achievements of heroes through the ages, had no record of Kyle whatsoever, and the people of the present treat him like a fictional character.

Angry about the reality he's found himself in, Leo enrolls at Lumene Academy, the hero academy which houses the Hero Record.

"Fine. I guess I'll become an honors student to figure out why I was written out of history."
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon Official Guidebook
description:
A complete compendium! This official guidebook tells you everything about "Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon" (as of now).
Character profiles for humans and dragons / Recap of the story by volume / Dragon matching test / Guardian knowledge test / Collection of gorgeous illustrations by the best guest artists / Q&A with Coolkyoushinja / Drafts for Chapter 1 / Illustration gallery (in full color)... and more!
It also includes a special chapter newly drawn!
A super-supreme must-have for all Dragon Maid fans!!
tags: Loli, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, Drama, Monster Girls, Shota, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Kimi ni Furu Kotonoha wa
description:
One day, Komatsu Hinata, a book-loving high school student, meets a blond all-back-haired delinquent on the train on his way to school.
Hinata is so happy that someone is interested in his favorite novels and gets unintentionally excited, but the delinquent gives him a surprising response, and Hinata spits out terrible words at him.
Thinking that they would never meet again, he finds out that the delinquent is Igarashi Yukito, a student in the same class who has never been to school since the school started–?
A hurtful youth and love story about two people who have never known love.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Delinquents

name: Mushoku Tensei ~Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu~ Shitsui no Majutsushi-hen
description:
After separating from Eris, Rudeus falls into the depths of depression. He travels to Rozenberg, the second city of the Principality of Basherant, to search for his missing mother, Zenith. Desperate, Rudeus tries to accept a high-ranking quest alone in order to make a name for himself. However, by chance, he ends up working with a party of B-rank adventurers called the Counter Arrow. One of the party members is a girl named Sara, who reminds him of Eris...!

A complete manga adaptation of the seventh volume of the light novel series, depicting the aftermath of Rudeus' separation from Eris!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: My Love for My Roommate Is One-Sided
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Grey is...
description:
Two childhood friends—Black, an emotional fashion designer with selective amnesia, and White, a rational writer who’s been absent for two years—reunite to confront their traumatic pasts and navigate the fragile space between heart and mind as they struggle to preserve their friendship on the brink of adulthood.
Grey is... is a deeply emotional coming-of-age series about the messy journey of self-discovery, about friendship, and about the delicate balance between emotion and reason.
tags: Psychological, Self-Published, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Rosen Garten Saga
description:
Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert... I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat... ahem, heroes!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/rosen-garten-saga-manga/525/), [MangaPlaza](https://mangaplaza.com/title/0303005019/)
tags: Genderswap, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Nietzsche-sensei - Konbini ni, Satori Sedai no Shinjin ga Maiorita
description: The comedy manga follows a male part-time late-night convenience store worker named Matsukoma, and the new part-time worker he trains named Tomoharu Nii, nicknamed Nietzsche-sensei. Tomoharu is a university student in the school's Buddhism department. When an angry customer screams at Tomoharu, "Customers are gods!," he replies, "God is dead." The manga follows the part-time worker life of Matsukoma and Tomoharu, the latter of whom continuously baffles his customers and co-workers at the convenience store with his odd ways.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: I became the stepmother who caused my favorite character to fall into darkness
description: Akari, who possessed the body of her favorite character's stepmother. While she was delighted to see her beloved character in their adorable childhood up close, she realized that she herself is the stepmother 'Elena,' the person responsible for causing the character to fall into darkness. Determined to avoid the character's descent into darkness and make them happy, Akari faces numerous challenges as the misdeeds of Elena before the possession come back to haunt her. Will she be able to make her favorite character happy
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Shizoku Kaigi-hen
description:
At the Yotsuba New Year's gathering, Miyuki was names as the successor whilst Tatsuya was named her fiancé. Tatsuya and Miyuki's non-sibling relationship and engagement are now public knowledge. Among the shocked students the most shocked are those that knew the siblings.  
Meanwhile, the Ten Master Clans selection meeting, followed by magicians all over the world, is due to take place at a hotel in Hokone.  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 17-19.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Childcare Diary With the Villain
description: Mary didn’t know what to expect of the afterlife, but it certainly wasn’t becoming the evil, murderous nanny of the novel she was reading. Her circumstances become secondary concerns when she realizes that no matter what, Briel must remain safe. It’s the only way to keep his uncle, Count Kentryle Chalant, from the path of revenge. Can she keep her new charge safe and change the entire plot, or will the true villain get the best of them all? And is she going to find love on the way?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Mori de Seijo wo Hirotta Saikyou no Kyuuketsu-hime ~Musume no Tamenara Kuni de Moassari Horoboshimasu!~
description:
The True Ancestor Angelica, feared by the world under the alias of "the Vampire Princess Who Burns Kingdoms," has once again burned an entire country with her magic today. The reason for this is... "M-Mama!" Was it for the sake of her unbearably cute daughter?! 
 
After picking up a human baby in the forest and raising her, Angelica was knocked out by her soft, pudgy skin and innocent purity, untouched by corruption. Gone was the cold-hearted killer who easily took lives, replaced by a doting mother enjoying a life of extreme affection. 
 
One day, the foolish king, aiming to kidnap her daughter, Pearl, who was actually a special "Saint," hatched a scheme. Naturally, this incited Angelica's wrath! The word "mercy" was forgotten by "Mama," who would destroy any enemy, using even the most cruel means! 
 
A cheat-level, overpowered vampire princess rampages in a dark fantasy driven by love and parental affection!
 
___
**Character Designer:** [Yoshimoto](https://mangadex.org/author/212b80e5-09a9-47ea-8da0-9064f16815fb)
tags: Action, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Vampires, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kyou no Kira-kun
description:
In 360 days, there was bright days and disappointment while I was staring at you. Though they were neighbor, Nino and Kira never talk to each other…  
  
But when Nino knows about Kira's secret, all of her life changes and her everyday becomes more interesting!  
Their link will lead them to love close to paradise.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Gal Yome no Himitsu
description: Fuyuki is a beautiful and cool gal! But there's a secret side of her that she only shows in front of her husband...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: I Don't Want to Be a Lady
description:
Before being sold as the Crown Prince’s concubine, I proposed a contract marriage to the Duke.

“Will your father allow you to marry me?”
“Of course not. So there is only one way.”

“We have to make an accident.”

It will taste better when I break that mol*ster’s head.
I could shoot a gun at the alley gangster. Even the prince of the neighboring empire was also knocked out by me.

The man snorted.

“You’re so arrogant as the captive subject. I never knew that Count Bornes would be a jerk to his dog.”

I said with a smile, “Our mansion didn’t have a dog. Because the owner of the mansion is already a dog.”

This is the story of Arianne Bornes, who seemed to be a villainess but not a villainess.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: I Need Someone to Stop My Older Brothers
description:
I only went to calm the disturbance in front of my house, but the one I encountered was the Demon King that I punished, and unfortunately, I was falsely accused of being the demon king and died in the hand of the subjugation team.

‘I’ll kick your ass, Pamel Asinov! I’ll make you shed tears from both of your eyes!’

Among them, the worst one was the hero, Pamel Asinov, who drove me to death as a Demon King!

But when I pleaded to take revenge, I opened my eyes, 500 years later! Pamel’s been dead for a long time, and the ‘brothers’ who came one day…

“Purple eyes. It’s not a color that anyone can have.”
“But I was like this from the beginning.”
“Yes, you were. Because you are the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov.”
“…the granddaughter of Archduke Asinov?”

Of all people, I’m the daughter of ‘that’ Asinov? It’s nice to live a peaceful life, but I was born an enemy’s blood!

‘All the brothers in this house have a habit of hugging people.’

This shitty family. I have to hate them, but why do I keep getting attached to them?
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Moushin Listener: Yamiochi Haishinsha ni Koishite
description: A friend stabbed a popular streamer to death. University student Asagiri Hina returns to six months ago to save her friend who went crazy and fell in love with the handsome streamer Ravi. However, Ravi was a scumbag who exploited his fans' affection and sold them to the sex industry. To prevent the tragedy from repeating, Hina decides to break her friend's brainwashing. Can she avoid the tragic end!? A story of desires born from the internet society
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: A Father Who Forgives Everything
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Crossdressing, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Negai no Astro
description:
The new series from Ken Wakui, the creator of Shinjuku Swan and Tokyo Revengers!

As the battle to decide the next leader of the Yotsurugi gang that runs Asakusa is heating up, a meteorite strike suddenly awakens superpowers in the people of Japan. How will Hibaru Yotsurugi, the son of the previous gang leader, come out of this?!
tags: Action, Crime, Mafia, Supernatural

name: Shin Lupin III
description:
Lupin the Third and his motley crew return in Shin Lupin III! This time, several of the stories are either brand new or adapted from or to the Lupin anime, and the beginning story was even animated by itself several years later!  
  
Lupin the Third is the grandson of the famous literary thief Arsène Lupin, and his partners in crime include the sharpshooter Jigen Daisuke, the stoic samurai Goemon Ishikawa the Thirteenth, and the on-again-off-again lover/enemy Fujiko Mine. Their goal is to outwit enemies bigger than themselves while nabbing the world's rarest and most important items, while also outwitting the dogged Inspector Zenigata, who's made it his life's work to capture and secure Lupin. In the manga however, his relationship with the titular thief isn't as "respecting to the enemy" as you would expect, as he's attempted multiple times to kill him without shedding a tear!   
  
What kind of sexy exploits will Lupin and his crew get up to next in…Shin Lupin III!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Samurai, Mafia, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Drama, Police, Mystery

name: Being Targeted by Hyena-chan
description: I found out that my long-distance girlfriend had gotten a new older boyfriend from the city and while I was in the grip of despair, a girl named Haibara Enako, more affectionately called "Hyena-chan" suddenly appeared before me and confessed, "I don't have a boyfriend and I'm free right now."
tags: Romance, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The 53 Year Old Online Gamer's First IRL Meet-Up
description:
Let's go to the offline meet-up with online gaming friends!

"MAKOTO" is a middle-aged man and newbie gamer who's excited for his offline meeting with "Ao", a veteran adventurer who has always been helping him out. However, the one who appeared for the meeting was... an elementary school boy!?
tags: Video Games, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: The Hunter Wants to Live Quietly
description: Hunter Cha Euijae, sent to seal a rift over the West Sea, was flung out after closing it. When he regain consciousness, he found himself in a garbage dump—eight years in the future. Starving, he stumbled into a hangover soup restaurant and realized the world had changed. Now, disaster alerts warn of rift openings, slime ASMR videos are trending, and hunters livestream A-rank sword unboxings. Instead of the looming apocalypse, the future is oddly peaceful, leaving Cha Euijae feeling empty. Deciding to leave his hunter days behind, he chooses to work part-time at the restaurant. But his quiet new life takes a turn when he meets a mysterious figure in a gas mask…
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Survival, Superhero, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Genesis of the Battle God
description:
In an era where mythology and reality have fused together, the powers of gods and heroes from ancient myths like those of Greece, Rome, Judea, and Egypt have descended upon the modern world of the 21st century. 

Ken Yanagimoto, an Awakened One with physical abilities and senses far superior to those of ordinary people, has returned after five years of working as a mercenary overseas. Upon his return, he discovers that his parents have been killed and his sister has gone missing at the hands of the powerful organization Seven Star Society, which controls the political, financial, and media worlds. 

Enraged by the death of his parents and the disappearance of his sister, Ken vows revenge against the Seven Star Society and confronts various secret forces and injustices around the globe. 

Amid the grim reality of the dawn of a new era of human evolution, the story of one man who engages in mythical battles against the world begins.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Ramparts of Ice
description:
Inept at dealing with people, Higawa Koyuki maintains a wall between herself and others. She spends her time in highschool away from others, all alone. At least until she encounters Amamiya Minato who keeps closing the distance between them for some reason?!

The aloof Koyuki, the popular Miki, the boundary-less Minato, and the easygoing and kind basketball team member, Youta. This is the story of these somewhat complicated four, and their tantalizing, bumbling youth!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: High School Gangsters
description:
A high school turf war entangled with betrayal, revenge, and remnants of friendship!  

The fierce clash between Shin Woo-jae and Yang Seon-tae, former friends turned enemies, becomes an intense battle over revenge and truth.  

Amidst the hierarchy of high school dominance, friendship and vengeance emerge.  

Who will claim the throne in the end?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Captain Tsubasa - Rising Sun - FINALS
description:
A web-comic continuation of Captain Tsubasa 9th arc: Rising Sun - The Final.

Rising Sun - FINALS is covering the 2nd half of the Madrid Olympics match of Japan VS. Spain and beyond.

The web-comic came to be when on April 2024 mangaka Yoichi Takahashi announced his retirement, ending Rising Sun - The Final official published serialization half-way through the match opting to continue the story at his own pace with storyboard pencil sketches, publishing them on the official Captain Tsubasa World website.
tags: Action, Sports, Drama, Web Comic

name: The Genius Wants to be Ordinary!
description:
The protagonist of a successful life recognized by the public, 'Son Jinhyuk.'
However, Jinhyuk just wanted to live a normal life with his beloved family, and he couldn't hide his lonely heart because he couldn't.
One day, I woke up in an accident and was back to the time I was 9 years old before I lost my parents, whom I wanted so much!
Will Jinhyuk be able to save his parents and live a normal life?
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Captain Tsubasa - Road to 2002
description:
After the World Youth, Japanese players are looking for pro careers in Japan and around the world.  
  
In order to fulfill their dream of World Cup 2002 in Korea and Japan, they must get stronger playing in various club competitions, home and abroad.
tags: Thriller, Survival, Sports, Drama, Slice of Life

name: The Lady's Servant
description: The story centers around a main character who was raised as a butler from his family's trade, and who one day meets a rich young lady who cannot even change her own clothes, let alone know what to do in the outside world.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Gal-loving JK wants to be a gal
description:
"Living as a gal is seriously the best!!"
Mimuru was an introvert in middle school, but when she entered high school, she made her long-awaited debut as a gal, thinking "Maybe I can become a gal too!?" She made friends with three girls: Yuuhi, a cool beauty with a calm and pretty look; Fuuka, a cute gal with a soft and fluffy look; and Kurumi, a cheerful and energetic gal who is good at sports. Now she has joined the gal group she has always admired! While she lives the sparkling life she has always dreamed of, she also pushes herself too hard to keep up with her friends. And she also notices new feelings growing within her...
tags: Award Winning, Official Colored, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Kiss Me In The Dark Of Night
description: Clark, an 800-year-old vampire, was dug up by young Taoist, Jiang Lai, who successfully formed a contract with her. In order to eventually kill the vampire, Jiang Lai lived with her and tried various methods, but gradually became Clark's prey. A chance encounter turns into reinventing their past and present lives. Love and hate are like the dark and light sides of the moon. "Clark, come to my side."
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Horror, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Class no Inkya Ojousama no Shitsuji ni Narimashita
description:
My family abandoned me in the night leaving me behind, so I became the butler of the gloomy young lady in my class...

---
Support the author by buying the manga in [Booth.pm](https://booth.pm/ja/items/4380401).
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic

name: Fan ni Gachikoi Suru Idol to, Idol ni Shiotaiou na Fan.
description: Ririka is an unpopular idol who is in love with a fan named Suzuki. She tries various ways to get his attention, but Suzuki's reactions are always cold. However, Ririka's love is so strong that she is determined to do whatever it takes to make him look her way.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Music

name: Mad for Love
description: After traveling into a historical BL novel, the actor Lin Yan gains a special ability: fast-traveling through a skill called [Escape Death]. His first mission? To secretly orchestrate an attack on Prince Qi Zhen, which leads to the prince becoming the villain. Lin Yan’s first identity in this world is none other than Lin Shou Yan, the prince’s foolish fiancé. But as he plays his role, he accidentally captures the prince’s heart, and his fake death turns out to be the key reason Qi Zhen becomes a ruthless tyrant! A cold, overthinking tsundere prince and his scheming, perverted fiancé—chaos ensues!
tags: Time Travel, Official Colored, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Legendary Me!
description:
Ozma, a former court magician, is executed for saving a girl, Felia. However, he is reincarnated in a world 300 years later. There, his previous life, in which he was supposed to have been executed, has left his mark on history with a series of feats of which he has no memory, and he has been praised as a god. Like a legendary hero!

Adapted to Novel.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Sakamoto Days
description: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Mafia, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Tensei Kizoku no Isekai Boukenroku: Jichou o Shiranai Kamigami no Shito
description:
Shiina Kazuya, the protagonist of the story was killed by a stranger in front of a convenience store when he tried to protect two young girls escaping from the stranger who is trying to stab them. The girls fall and are too overcome with fear to get up and continue running away. When Shiina Kazuya awakens he realizes that he was reincarnated as the young noble Cain von Silford, the third son of an aristocrat (Margrave Garm Von Silford) and his second wife (Sarah) in a world filled with sword and sorcery.

Prior to the age of ten Cain grew up in the Gracia Territory surrounded by gods that don't know self-restraint, in the upper echelon of nobility, and a loving family (father Garm Von Silford, mother Sarah, and older sister Raine). At the age of ten Cain is given peerage (Title of Duke, own estate, and an engagement), which leads to him living in Esfort the Royal Capitol.

This is a classic isekai fantasy about an overpowered young man who just wants to be an average adventurer. He has received the maximum level of divine blessings from all seven gods, overcomes any obstacle that comes his way while hiding his unbelievable status and tends to build a harem of highly influential nobles.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Dai Kyochuu Rettou
description: New enemies, new bugs and an even bigger island.
tags: Monsters, Action, Animals, Survival, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy

name: KISEKAE NINGYOU DE CHU♡
description: The spin-off of "My Dress-Up Darling", [Kisekae Ningyou de Chu ♡], has started serialization with a chaotic yet cute vibe
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic

name: Monarch of Death
description:
"What can I do with a body that only has bones?"

Karnak had become the king of death using the forbidden secrets of "necromancy," but he began to reminisce the pleasures of the flesh, in sorrow of his bony body...

"I'll turn back time itself!"

After a long period of research, he succeeded in using the time regression spell and regressed to the past with his right hand, Baros.

"Uh... young master, I think the past has been changed."

This is the death king's project to straighten out his twisted(?) life!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: My Husband is Out of Control Again
description:
Lu Can looked down at Chu Jin and joked: "Recently, you've been following me everywhere. In the Special Police building, hospitals, restaurants, bathrooms and toilets..."

Chu Jin covered Lu Can's mouth shyly, wanting to forget the scenes: "Stop it! I just want some spiritual power! Don't make me seem so perverted!"

Lu Can raised his eyebrows and smiled: "Do you really just want spiritual strength? That'd be a little pity~"

Chu Bangmao: "We're just partners! You'll regret this!"

Everyone: "Haha, we believe you!"
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Gore, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Maxed Talent Player
description: In 2018, monsters swarmed Seoul, and heroic “players” saved the city. Fast forward a decade, Hyukjin Kim, stuck in a seven-year rut after failing to become a player himself, gets a do-over. Zapped back to 2018, Hyukjin seizes his chance to rewrite history. With knowledge from the future and his re-awakened player talents, Hyukjin battles beasts and conquers dungeons in a pulse-pounding quest for redemption and survival!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Maxed-Out Player
description:
After 20 grueling years of hellish training, Juhyuk's stats are maxed-out, and he is ready to venture out into Olympus, a virtual reality game. 

His master's last dying wish is for Juhyuk to be the Ultimate Evil, the most powerful in Olympus. But when he steps out of the tutorial area, every player tries to kill him, and the game forces him to start over from Level 1! 

With these setbacks, Juhyuk will need all the help he can get to complete his SSS-rank quest and become the next Ultimate Evil.
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Chun and Alice
description: In order to make a living, the vagrant Eastern girl Bai Chun became the "living mannequin" of queen Alice. Planning to make a quick buck and then escape, Chun inadvertently became embroiled in a conspiracy of those vying for power while trying to leave. Can the temporary union of East and West avert disaster? Find out in Chun and Alice~
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Fushigi no Kuni no Bird
description:
Scottish adventuress Isabella Bird journeys to Japan in 1878, becoming the first Westerner traveling to many remote locations 
and heading northward to Hokkaido to study the aboriginal Ainu people.  
  
A true story based on her book "Unbeaten Tracks in Japan".
tags: Historical, Adventure, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kanchigai no Atelier Meister: Eiyuu Party no Moto Zatsuyougakari ga, Jitsu wa Sentou Igai ga SSS Rank Datta to Iu Yoku Aru Hanashi
description:
Kuruto gets kicked out of the hero's party for being too useless in combat. However unknown to him, he's SSS Rank in skills like cooking, building, magic tool crafting, etc. 
  
WN Raw: <https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/292207951/264201950>
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kiichi!!
description: Left to himself at an early age in the slummiest parts of today’s Japan, Kiichi learns how to survive on his own. As a teenager, how can he adapt to a society whose rules he rejects? Unless he creates his own rules… Kiichi, a raw icon of strength and integrity, stands alone against the world’s injustice and becomes an unforgettable character.
tags: Psychological, Drama

name: Ao Ashi
description:
Aoi Ashito is a third year middle school student from Ehime. Behind his raw game hides his immense talent 
but Ashito suffers a huge setback because of his overly straightforward personality. 
One day the youth team manager of J1 club Tokyo City Esperion, Fukuda Tetsuya, appears in front of him. 
Fukuda sees his limitless potential and invites him to take part in his team's tryouts in Tokyo. 
The story of the boy who will revolutionize football in Japan rapidly begins to unfold.  
  
---
- **Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2019**
tags: Award Winning, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Tensei Kizoku, Kantei Skill de Nariagaru ~Jakushou Ryouchi o Uketsuida node, Yuushuu na Jinzai o Fuyashiteitara, Saikyou Ryouchi ni Natteta~
description: After being reincarnated, Ars Louvent is supposed to live in a different world as a weak aristocrat. Both his physical strength and intelligence were mediocre in both worlds, but here he naturally possessed a skill called "Appraisal" that allowed him to see the potential of any person. By gathering talented people by his side, Ars uses this "Appraisal" skill to transform his weak territory into the strongest one! But the road ahead of him won't be so simple.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Destiny Unchain Online ~Kyuuketsu-ki Shoujo to natte, Yagate『Aka no Maou』to Yobareru You ni Narimashita~
description: Mitsuki Kou is such a feared PVP gamer that he's earned the nickname "Crim the Headhunter" in some circles. His next game to take over? "Destiny Unchain Online", a brand new VRMMO game developed by none other than Kou's father. But, no new game on release day is without its bugs - namely, Kou glitches to the middle of nowhere, and his vampire avatar is turned into a girl!  A story for all of the people who through games have met new friends and aimed for the top... start!
tags: Genderswap, Action, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation

name: Dead Account
description: Souji Enishiro, 15 years old (high school dropout), is a controversial streamer, "Aoringo," who makes a ton of money through his violent and outrageous video content. Although he is seen as a troublemaker, in reality, he is a kind older brother who loves his younger sister and sweets. Even his controversial videos are just a means to cover the huge medical expenses for his sickly younger sister. No matter if everyone in the world hates him, he is happy as long as his sister is doing well. That is until something happens to his beloved sister...
tags: Action, Ghosts, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Daredemo Dakeru Kimi ga Suki
description:
Gotou, a virgin high school boy, has a crush on his affectionate gal classmate, Agawa. But one day after school, he catches Agawa having sex with Takayama in an empty classroom. Gotou is devastated, but he soon learns that not only did she have sex with Takayama, Agawa is a slut who'll have sex with anyone who asks. Even…‽
___
**Note:** After the release of Chapter 35, author Takeda Super decided to take the story in a new, different direction, so Chapters 31–35 were retconned and new chapters were drawn. However, for fans that enjoyed the original timeline, the old chapters were later compiled into [their own volume](https://mangadex.org/title/b782186f-60d9-4f6c-b050-7b21013040ff) that even included an additional chapter in that timeline.

**Alternative Official Raws:**
- [Comic DAYS](https://comic-days.com/episode/4856001361135826437)
- [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/4856001361243117705)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Gyaru

name: Iinchou to M-ko no Yuri
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic

name: Metaphor: ReFantazio
description:
The United Kingdom of Euchronia is thrown into chaos following the assassination of its king…
Our Hero, the Traveler Will, and his Fairy Companion Gallica, race to Grand Trad to undertake a Special Mission.
Discover the bonds that form between eight races across three countries. (MangaPlus)

Based off [the award-winning game!](https://store.steampowered.com/app/2679460/Metaphor_ReFantazio/)
tags: Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: My Marriage to Saneka
description: Tatsuhiko inherits his grandfather's home after his passing. It's been ages, so he heads to the old homestead for a visit. In a storage room there, he encounters a tanuki who claims to be a god. Tatsuhiko and the tanuki god repair the home together while sharing stories about his grandfather. Following this strange turn of events, the two decide to get married?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Supernatural

name: Sami Plays the Game
description: After her parents died, Sami gave up her life of fortune to live independently, doing odd jobs to make ends meet. When she starts to get involved with two of the most popular boys at her high school, Sami faces twists and turns -- Chan is her neighbor, and Pyojun makes her have conflicted feelings. Things get more complicated when she finds out that Chan has feelings for Pyojun as well! With her mom’s only keepsake in hand to keep her feet on the ground, Sami navigates obstacles that she wasn’t prepared for -- and aren’t even in her budget!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Full Color

name: Honobono Isekai Tensei Days ~Level Counterstop, Item Mochikoshi! Watashi wa Saikyou Youjo Desu~
description: A young girl dies on Christmas day and is reincarnated into the world of her favorite game as her player character!
tags: Reincarnation, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Sparks
description:
High school girl, Tomori, is dating an unstable boy named Inukai who is relentlessly violent toward Misato, a new transfer student. Refusing to listen to his friends or Tomori's pleas to stop, Inukai's obsession steadily escalates. Is this from hatred, or for some other reason?

Meeting, drifting apart, and inevitably drawn to each other again... Sparks fly when they cross.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Mitsudomoe
description: The somewhat precocious and sadistic girl Mitsuba, the somewhat lecherous muscle girl Futaba, and the somewhat mysterious gloomy girl Hitoha. Better known as the (mischievous) "Marui Sisters," this is the story of how these triplets go about their days in Class 6-3 with their cute yet wild antics.
tags: Loli, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Amai Seikatsu
description:
The complicated story of a young man who goes to work for a lingerie company. 
One of the very first harem manga, done by a former shojo mangaka known for his peculiar tendencies 
(was known to cross dress among other things) and serialized in the now defunct Business Jump.
 
Volume titles and Romaji equivalent:

tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Exhibition Catalog INOUENO: Mikazuki Edition
description:
An exhibition catalog that details the background of the "Inoue Takehiko: The LAST Manga Exhibition," held in the early summer of 2008 at the Ueno Royal Museum, through photos and text. It reveals why the exhibition was held at this time, and unveils Takehiko Inoue’s struggles and resolve.

The first of two exhibition catalogues (Crescent Moon and Full Moon).
tags: Oneshot, Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Philosophical, Drama

name: Even a Replica Falls in Love
description:
On days when she is sick, on days when she has a tedious day job, on days when she has regular tests.

On days when she is too lazy to go to school, I am called upon.
I am a convenient substitute for the body of a girl named Sonao Aikawa, and that is me.
I may look exactly the same, but my personality is a little different.
I can't go out freely, I can't even make plans for tomorrow,
I am a replica whose mission is to work for the original.
I was supposed to be a replica, but I fell in love.

A very pure and slightly mysterious "love story" that takes place in a town by the sea.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Cool na Doukyuusei no ◯◯ Nengo…
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Drama Queen
description: After saving Earth, aliens have taken up residence with the humans in Japan. Nomamoto, a factory worker with an abusive alien boss, one day meets Kitami, who tells her his own family was killed by aliens. The two quickly forge a friendship, but one day Kitami does the unthinkable…
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Crime, Aliens

name: Sono Hada no Atsusa wo Oboeteru
description: “What would you do if I told you your partner that day was ‘me’?” Gen, a hairdresser, has long been in love with his older childhood friend, Koutarou, who likes his older brother, Kanade. One night, Gen spends the night at a hotel with a drunken Koutarou, bolstered by the thought that he might have a chance. However, Koutarou mistakenly thinks it was his older brother, Kanade, that he slept with. Gen’s used to being mistaken as Kanade, but they felt each other’s heat– to think he was mistaken as him even at night–. A devoted, younger, handsome hairdresser x a naturally airheaded, devilish, older, plain-faced boy’s one-sided, childhood love!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Legal Pirate Parfait
description: The extraordinary Princess Parfait's marvelous fantasy adventure!
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yuuretsu no Ori
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Office Workers, Drama

name: GaCen Shoujo to Ibunka Kouryuu
description: A Japanese arcade worker meets a young girl from England and strikes up a friend(?)ship.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Sasha-chan to Classmate Otaku-kun
description:
I am an aspiring mangaka, currently assisting in the production of erotic doujinshi as a middle school student. While I was reading doujinshi at school, a beautiful girl very interested in erotic things, Sasha-san, suddenly called me “Master”!?

The story of a beautiful, cheerful girl volunteering to be my ecchi disciple.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/57098)
tags: Loli, Romance, School Life, Shota, Slice of Life

name: Ao no Hana, Utsuwa no Mori
description:
Aoko is a ceramic painter at Hasami Wares Pottery, when suddenly an unfriendly and unapproachable man named Tatsuki arrives from overseas. Rejecting her way of life by telling her he isn't interested in painted ceramics, Aoko feels dejected, but can't help but be drawn to Tatsuki's ceramics…  
  
This is a mature love story of a man and woman, both fascinated by ceramics.
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: What Makes Purple?
description: A romance about two stubborn people that like each other.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Umineko When They Cry Episode Collection
description: A series of Umineko When They Cry anthology manga published by Ichijinsha with 5 total volumes.
tags: Comedy, Anthology, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: Shota Oni
description: After leaving a scar on his best friend's face years ago, Tsubaki feels responsible and is determined to grow up big and strong so he can protect Yuu. Yuu is already in high school and Tsubaki is only in elementary, but he is sure that his feelings will get through and Yuu will eventually come to rely on him.
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, Shota, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Yuri!!! on Ice - Sekai ni Hoshi ga Koboreru Kakuritsu (Doujinshi)
description: Pairing: Victor Nikiforov x Katsuki Yuuri
tags: Oneshot, Boys' Love, Doujinshi

name: Shitsurenshita node Vtuber Hajimetara Toshiue no Onee-san ni Motemashita
description:
Shocked after Yuki Himemura found out that the club senpai he was crushing on got a boyfriend, he decided to become a VTuber—something both he and his senpai have always liked—and used his savings to assemble his equipment.

He gets his virtual character designed only to discover that it’s a 3D model of a cute girl and, in the process, unintentionally ends up portraying one!

Not only that but the person who designed and rigged his model and his favorite VTubers are starting to take a liking to him…?

(Synopsis via Novel Updates)
tags: Romance, Crossdressing, Harem, Shota, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Tada de wa Dakaremasen
description: Miyako Kirishima, a university student and aspiring teacher, is a poor girl who enjoys being frugal. One day, she has a meal with Yui Nakano, her friend whom she occasionally tutors. On the way home, Yui invites her to a love hotel. Miyako is reluctant, unwilling to have sex with a friend. However, Yui cuts her off, offering her 30000 yen for sex! Subsequently, Miyako ends up in more "transactions" with her other friends at her women's university!? The curtain rises on a tale of yuri, friendship, money, and sex♡.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Harem, School Life

name: Journey to Seek Past Reincarnations
description: The story is about a little Master, Gong Yao Ying, in order to accomplish the assigned tasks, she travels across the different periods. The stories are created after meeting with the famous historical figures.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Should I Make You a Nuclear Weapon?
description:
Director Kim Jun of the Defense Science Research Institute faces a tragic end while protecting the ADD chip, a military secret of South Korea, during a terrorist attack in 2024.

However, he suddenly finds himself with an unexpected opportunity: he is reborn in the body of his friend Jeon Hyun-seung, who died in 1998!

Revived as Kim Jun, he discovers that he can access future technologies using the ADD chip engraved in his body.

"If you give me the chance... I’ll show you what I can create within three months."

Create the ultimate weapon to overcome the IMF crisis with future technology! Let me know if you need anything else!
tags: Reincarnation, Military, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Koisuru Kichikujima
description: Love is absolutely forbidden! Kaworu, the "public disciplinary commissioner of justice," uses a chainsaw to purge all the men of their sins in order to protect the purity of the girls! Standing in Kaworu's way is the "boy with high femininity," Takahisa, and Kaworu's sister, Mari, the "demon public disciplinary commissioner." In this parallel world of "Freak Island" set in Santa Maria Academy, a storm of blood and love is about to... erupt!!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Gore, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Radiance of Tribulation: The Old Man Leads the Way
description: Together with the Demon Lord, he is reborn 60 years into the past. Witness how the dashing elder mercilessly crushes the Demon Lord, all while safeguarding his beloved.
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yuri!!! on Ice - Nandemonai Taisetsuna Ichinichi (Doujinshi)
description: Pairing : Katsuki Yuuri x Victor Nikiforov
tags: Oneshot, Boys' Love, Doujinshi

name: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin
description:
Cyan Vert, illegitimate son of the Duke and the empire's greatest assassin, is betrayed by the righteous brother whose shadow he's always lived in. But just before the fatal blow strikes his throat, Cyan awakes to find he's just a boy again. The young lord has been reborn, and this time, he's not going to live in anyone's shadow!

---
Cyan Vert, the best assassin of the continent, meets a pitiful death after having been betrayed by his own brother, whom he had trusted all his life.

"If I were given another chance at life, I would live it differently. I would only trust myself, and achieve all the things I want on my own without serving anyone else but myself."

That is how he was given a second chance at life. Cyan Vert, a shadow who lived for others, is no more. He will now pave a path on his own, for only him!
tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Eiyuu to Majo no Tensei LoveCome
description: Choose the world or choose her. Ordinary high school student Shiraishi Godo harbored a "secret"  - he possessed memories of a past life. In a world different from this one, he was a "hero" who saved humanity. However, that was a story of his past life. In this life, he was supposed to lead an ordinary school life—until the arrival of transfer student Mai Shiina turned everything upside down.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: Tou no Kanri o Shite Miyou
description: Kosuke is killed by a truck, his soul is lost in a garden with two beautiful girls. The owner of the place will let him choose whether he will be reborn or summoned to another world, and he maintains the summons. In this new world, the main two girls who were created by the owner of the garden to help him find the mystery behind the world - a Dungeon tower. Will he be able to become the owner of this tower and manage it?
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Twin Moon
description:
A woman identical to me appears in my dreams, crying.  

"Who are you?"  

For three years, Shunaelle, the Demon King of the North, has been haunted by the same dream, growing curious about the woman and deciding to track her down.  

The truth? She’s a fragment of Shunaelle’s soul, cast away into the human realm.  

When Shunaelle tries to absorb the fragment back into herself, the woman resists.  

『I don’t want to be absorbed!』  

Instead, she makes a plea:  
If you want me back, live my life—a life filled with regret—and make it right.
tags: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Dark and Light Martial Emperor
description:
Yeon Hojeong, the first to unite the dark factions as the leader of the Unorthodox Faction, collaborates with the Orthodox Faction to overcome the chaos of the Three Cults. However, he meets an untimely end, entangled in the schemes of the Murim Alliance Leader.

"This really is my home!"

When he opens his eyes, he finds himself in the prestigious and once-destroyed Yeon Clan, a place he never forgot.

"I won’t make a mistake this time. Never again."

Determined to prevent the fall of his family and the future upheaval caused by the Three Cults, he embarks on a relentless journey! This is the struggle of Yeon Hojeong, the eldest son, to unite the martial world.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy

name: A Mother's Love, a Daughter's Prison
description: The torso of a headless, limbless body is found half-buried by a riverbank. It belonged to middle-aged mother Yaeko Miyagawa, and after an investigation and trial, her daughter Hikari eventually confesses to her murder. For many years, Hikari had been subjected to physical and emotional abuse by her mother, revolving around her failure to make it into a top medical school and become a doctor. Even after nine years of futile applications and entrance exams, Yaeko refused to free her daughter from this virtual prison. What led to the fatal stabbing that ended Yaeko’s life? This series, based on a true story, will explore Hikari Miyagawa’s experiences up to her greatest tragedy—and what happened to her afterward.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Azumi
description:
Azumi is a manga series that concerns a young woman brought up as part of a team of assassins, charged with killing three warlords that threaten Feudal Japan with an agenda of war and bloodshed.  
  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Website](http://www.yu-koyama.com)  
- [Live-Action Movie on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6166)  
- [Live-Action Movie (sequel) on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=6167)
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Ninja, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: Gilded Seven
description: Historical Action about a police officer hunting down the "La Llorona" mexican crime cartel. After catching a bunch of high-ranking members, suddenly a Yellowstone volcano errupts & the cop time-leaps to the 19th wild west a few days after Lincoln got assassinated. He steps into a gruesome scene of native americans getting slaughtered. But suddenly the supposedly dead Abrahalm Lincoln appears and kills the attackers.
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Action, Police, Supernatural

name: Shadows House (Official Colored)
description:
Faceless shadow nobles living in a vast mansion, attended by living dolls who spend much of their time cleaning up the soot endlessly emitted by their mysterious masters.  
  
Follow the story of Emilyko, a young and cheerful living doll, as she learns her duties serving as the attendant for Kate Shadow-sama. What dangers and dark secrets will she and Kate encounter, as they become more deeply involved in the inner workings of the shadows' society?
tags: Official Colored, Monsters, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Space Juggernaut
description:
Wanderer, imposing, somewhere in the vast void of space, Rendezvous awaits! The only space station built inside a living being, where the best scientists, warriors, explorers and engineers of the galaxy live.
Follow the adventures of the Rendezvaj against the galaxy's major enemy; The Raccoon-race "preservation" Federation in this epic Space Opera.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Girls' Love, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Aliens, Tragedy

name: Zero no Majutsushi - S-Rank Yuusha Party o Zenryoku de Support Shiteita no ni Tsuihousareta Saikyou no Majutsushi wa Party Kyoufushou ni Natta no de Zenryoku de Ohitori-sama Musou o Hajimeru Koto ni Shimashita
description:
Rood is a magician who was a member of an S-Rank party until he was banished from the party due to the selfish reasons of Toran, the hero. After being betrayed by his comrades, the heartbroken Rood abandoned the town he had been staying in until then, and left on a journey to the neighboring country, Roland Empire, looking to start over in a new land.

(Source: Corona EX)
tags: Action, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kyoukai Meikyuu to Ikai no Majutsushi
description: When Theodore was dropped into a waterway by his half-brother, he suddenly recalled the memory of his past life. He had been a Japanese citizen known as Kirishima Kagehisa, placed inside VRMMO character he had made in Break Force Online. "Theodore" is a Combat Mage that Kagehisa played within BFO, and he realized his skills were progressing well even in this other world. Theodore, who had lightly brushed off his half-brother to make his own place in the world, had ventured off to the large labyrinth existing at the Boundary City, Termuilles.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Video Games, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Himekishi ga Classmate!
description:
After he and his entire class died on a field trip, Odamori accepts a job offer from a mysterious man to be reincarnated. 

However, his new job turns out to be that of a Slavemancer, with the power to dominate the minds of others and turn them into his toys. Soon, however his evil actions lead to a Princess Knight (who turns out to be one of his previous, more popular classmates) being dispatched to apprehend him. 

But Odamori, of course, has something different planned for their reunion...!
tags: Loli, Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Isekai Sniper wa Onna Senshi no Mofumofu Aigan Doubutsu
description: A gun otaku dies after toying with a homemade pistol that explodes in his face. In the afterlife, he is told that he will be reincarnated into another world. When the otaku wakes up, he finds that he is no longer human - he’s now just some little furry thing. Near death, he comes across a beautiful warrior, who decides to take care of him because he’s fluffy. However, things take a turn when he finds out that firearms exist in this world?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy

name: The New Gate
description:
The New Gate — an online game transformed into a life-and-death struggle for its players.

Thanks to the valiant efforts of Shin, the most powerful of them all, an end to the game and freedom for everyone seemed within reach. But just moments after Shin defeats the game’s final boss, he finds himself bathed in an unknown light and transported some 500 years into the future of the in-game world!

Thrown from a simple game gone wrong into a strange new land, one young swordsman of unrivalled strength is about to embark on a legendary journey!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Koisuru Boukun
description: University student Tetsuhiro Morinaga has been in love with his homophobic, violent and tyrannical senpai Souichi Tatsumi for more than four years now. Even though in the previous series, Challengers, he told Souichi how he feels and even managed to get a kiss, he never expected anything more… That is until the long-oppressed Morinaga gets his biggest chance ever. Will his unrequited love finally be returned?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Rebirth in the End Times: I Reached the Top by Opening Boxes
description:
Jiang Xiaoyong was betrayed and killed by a green tea girl in the apocalypse, but was accidentally resurrected a year ago and obtained the blind box system. 

He was always one step ahead of others, collecting supplies and spending a fortune to build a safe house before the apocalypse. He became stronger through the system and avenged his enemies in his previous life. 

From then on, he embarked on the road to the king's counterattack.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King
description:
After being recently discharged from military service and just drifting through life, Hanbin Ryu is suddenly transported to another world.

However, his “guide line,” the system bestowed upon him to help with his survival and growth, was filled with errors, causing him to be stuck in the tutorial stage for over 20 years.

When he is finally released from this personal hell, he finds everyone has turned against otherworlders like him. Just how will this low-level, super-tutorial newbie survive?

---
