tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter
description:
Leslie’s life as the youngest daughter of the Sperado noble family was always used for the betterment of her sister, Eli, who is betrothed to the Crown Prince of the kingdom. After a failed attempt to extract the black magic within Leslie by sacrificing her to transfer it to Eli, Leslie knocks on the door of the monster Duchess Salvatore and, battered, bruised and desperate, pleads for the Duchess to adopt her?!

---

The Speràdo family line possesses a secret: shadow magic. But it's been 100 years since someone last wielded it. When Marquis Speràdo tries to sacrifice Leslie for her favored sister Ellie, little does he know that this awakens the power of darkness in her instead. To escape her family's greed and abuse, Leslie's out to make a deal with the Monstrous Duke: adopt her, and her powers will be at the duke's disposal. Will Leslie escape her parents' cruel grip, or succumb to their evil exploits?

---

**Note:** Chapter 130 is marked by the author as the end of the main story, and Chapters 131 to 150 is listed as an epilogue and flashback-origin story for Duchess Salvatore and her family.

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B4%B4%EB%AC%BC-%EA%B3%B5%EC%9E%91%EA%B0%80%EC%9D%98-%EA%B3%84%EC%95%BD-%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80/2336)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: I Became a First-Class Guide Thanks to My Childhood Friends
description: [The twin brothers love me too much. What should I do?] D-class guide Qiao Yang, because of a drunken accident, discovered that he could use the two A-class sentinels, his childhood friends Zheng Jia and Zheng Yan, to enhance his own class. In order to retain this rare S-class status, he chose to conceal his exploitation of them. However, during the repeated interaction with the two, he gradually becomes aware of their feelings towards him...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Otome no Chikyuu no Hashirikata
description:
Ayumi Miyamura came to Mt. Mitake in Okutama, Tokyo to lose weight.
On her way to the trailhead, she encounters a strange runner who dashed past her and entered the mountain from a back road. Unbeknownst to her, this was her first encounter with a map and compass, and the start of her quest to participate in an "adventure race."

This is the start of a next-generation outdoor manga about enjoying nature with all one's being.
tags: Sports, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Yu-Gi-Oh!
description: Sitting by himself in the back of the class, 10th-grader Yugi always had his head in some game–until he solved the Millennium Puzzle, an Egyptian artifact containing the spirit of a master gambler from the age of the pharaohs! Awakened after three thousand years, the King of Games possesses Yugi, recklessly challenging bullies and evil-doers to the Shadow Games, where the stakes are high, and even the most ordinary bet may result in weirdness and danger beyond belief! Let the games… begin!
tags: Thriller, Traditional Games, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: The Merman Trapped in My Lake
description: “Selvaine, why haven’t you come to see me?” A person, no, a mermaid, calling out to my great-grandfather’s granddaughter who had resembled me. My ancestor, who had treasured the mermaid so, locked him in her lake. What would he have been thinking, waiting for someone who had been dead for over a hundred years. Enduring terrible agony, every day, day after day. Maybe, “I missed you.” … That’s clearly revenge.
tags: Historical, Monsters, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Dark Fantasy Paladin
description:
Two years have passed since Eden was trapped in a dark fantasy game set in a medieval world with a reputation for extreme difficulty.

He has struggled as a paladin and succeeded in destroying 49 demons, now finally able to proceed with the main story of the game. However, the more he plays, the more irregularities occur and the story and relationships with the NPCs change.

Will he be able to prevent the destruction in the game and survive despite the numerous irregularities?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Archduke's Adopted Saint
description:
I was forced to live in captivity for the rest of my life because I happened to be aware of the fact that I was a saint. I was truly a 'real' saint, but that didn’t matter, because there was already a designated saint in the temple. When I died from all the abuse I endured, I was sent back to a time before all those previous events in my life had happened. After fifteen regressions, I was exhausted.

I prayed, "I don't want anything to do with this, so please just let me die."

And at the moment when I thought could finally be able to die, someone said, "How about being my daughter?"

…That monstrous grand duke adopted me.

---
"I want to quit. I don't want to live being exploited again."

Despite having the powers of a saint, she had to live her entire life in captivity—all for the sake of the fake saint who was anointed in secret. Unable to endure the torture any longer, she died alone and returned back in time. Daina, who chose a different path at the end of her forced repeated regressions, was adopted by the Grand Duke in a twist of fate…

"As the sole daughter of the Teresia family, I will make it so that you have everything."

Now that she has a new name and understands the importance of family, Daina decides to exact revenge so she can no longer be used by the temple.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8C%80%EA%B3%B5%EA%B0%80%EC%97%90-%EC%9E%85%EC%96%91%EB%90%9C-%EC%84%B1%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98/3524), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61913707)
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Gal ni Yasashii Otaku-kun
description: Otakura is a high school boy who's clearly an otaku, and Narumi is a high school gal. Normally, these two polar opposites would never cross paths, even at school. But by a strange coincidence, it turns out Otakura is able to use his inherently handy nature to help out Narumi with her own hobby-related requests, one after another?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Turn to Prince Charming
description: Xia Xiaotao, a tone-deaf ordinary girl changes her body with Ling Xi, a superstar and her idol. After experiencing various types of chaos, accidents and setbacks, she gradually stars living a wonderful life in the entertainment circle by conquering different princes charming, and becoming a superstar famous in films, TV and singing!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Hana
description: Hana is a child who is known by the public as a genetically modified mouse. This is the story of what happens after Hana escapes from the lab.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: AV Danyuu Hajimemashita
description: When your company goes bankrupt and your marriage is on the rocks, what’s a guy to do? Move to Tokyo to become an adult film star, of course! This diary-style comedy explores the pitfalls of an everyman who tries to break into the world of porno because it seems like a pleasurable way to restart his life. He soon learns that it’s a harder job than he bargained for!
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: My Wife Is Actually the Empress?
description: With my wife's breathtaking beauty, not even the newly enthroned empress can match her! With my wife's marvelous culinary skills, not even the empress's royal chefs can match her! My wife loves me and cares about me very very much, and I wouldn't trade her for even the empress! Wait, what? My wife is the empress?!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Isekai, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam Define
description: Universal Century 0087, seven years after the end of the One Year War between the Earth Federation and the Principality of Zeon. Ensign Reccoa Londe has provided the Anti-Earth Union Group (AEUG) with information regarding possible mobile suit development at the civilian colonies of Green Noa. Lieutenant Quattro (Char Aznable) with his wingmen Lieutenant JGs Apolly (Andy) and Roberto (Ricardo) head to the colonies to investigate. On Green Noa 1, Kamille Bidan is rushing to the spaceport where the Temptation, a ship a former One Year War ace is on, is docking. He’s hoping to get an autograph from the famed Captain Bright Noa. As Bright explains that he’s on duty, Jerid and company interrupt the two. Jerid smacktalks Bright for receiving a two rank demotion upon refusing to join the Titans and grabs Kamille’s photo saying he should sign it as an elite member of the Federation. The two get into a scuffle and Kamille is hauled off for questioning. Matosh questions Kamille about being an AEUG insider but just then he’s freed after his story checks out. Just as the handcuffs come off, the Gundam MK-II crashes into the building…
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Lord of all beings
description: After falling into the sea and going missing, Woo Young-jang returns to civilization after spending 7 years on a deserted island! His body has become firm and muscular, he can now communicate with all sorts of animals and even employ their special abilities. However, incidents and accidents seem to follow him wherever he goes. Will Young-jang be able to survive in the city, which is said to be even more terrifying than the jungle?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Kaii to Otome to Kamikakushi
description: Mysterious incidents in a city, one after the other. A demonic being is challenged to resolve them. Sumireko, seemingly a plain store clerk, aspires to be a novelist and rocks an alluring body with some ardent admirers. Adashino, an admirer who looks like a boy, is a bookstore clerk. He's steeped in mystery however, at first, until the path of challenges is revealed that he and his sister must face in the city in order to win their ticket back home, outside this world. A story of modern mysteries and romantic aspirations begins.
tags: Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Higanjima - 48 Nichigo
description: The human army lost the battle against the vampires on Higanjima Island. Unable to prevent Miyabi's plan, Japan has become a vampire country. Six months later, there is a one-armed man fighting the vampires in abandoned Japan! The man's name is Akira Miyamoto. A warrior who has already tasted hell on Higanjima.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Black and White
description:
It is said that when the lifespan of a human being come to its end, it is necessary to leave behind everything; family, friends, achievements, even love and meet black and white messengers who will lead them to the cycle of reincarnation. However, the infatuations and love in mind; engraved in the bone, how can it be so easy to give it up. When love has gone through the battle of time either it is it still flawless or the wreckage full of holes.

Another Translation
Legend says that when one’s time is up, only when all traces of love from your previous life must be erased, led by the deities of the Impermanence of Black and White , will you be reborn. And yet a breathtaking, extraordinary love that makes you lose your mind could never be so easily forgotten. When love undergoes the test of time, is what remains the same, pure love, or will that love be battered and bruised, unrecognizable?
tags: Action, Ghosts, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Fuufu Ijou, Koibito Miman.
description: Jirou, a third-year in high school, is forced to live with a gyaru named Akari under a course called the "Couple Practical". In order to be paired with their own romantic interests, they're going to act as a married couple…!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Wazawai no Avalon ~Game Saijaku no Akuyaku Debu ni Ten'i Shita kedo, Ore dake "Yasereba Tsuyokute New Game" na Sekai datta no de, Saisoku Level Up & Hametsu Flag Kaihi de Kage no Eiyuu o Mezashimasu~
description:
The main character loves the MMORPG game called Dungeon Explorer Chronicle (Dun-Ex). During one particular day, a beta test event was announced, and he managed to beat it.
In exchange for clearing the event, he was granted permission to try the beta test server. Forcing to choose different avatar and skill as the system doesn't allow his own, he eventually settled on random. However, he is transferred to a place where, as expected, he finds a fat, villainous mob character...!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: The Princess Stans in Secret
description:
I’ve been reincarnated into a novel with my living and breathing bias.
Now I’m an Imperial Princess, who is known by all sorts of epithets, Agnes Saint!

It’s great that she’s filthy rich and a royal and all, but there’s just one problem…
the hateful trash who just insulted by bias’s very existence is none other than ‘me.’

Regardless, I’m here now and…
I will do anything, and everything, within my power to prevent my bias’s death and ensure he experiences nothing but smooth sailing going forward!

I would never wish for Kylo, my kitten, to suffer any sort of shock.
That’s why I have to hide my fervent adoration.
Besides, nothing good would come from revealing my stanning anyways.
So, for the time being, I’ll be perfect at… 

‘stanning in secret.’
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Please Bully Me, Miss Villainess!
description: I, Yvonne, reincarnated into an otome game as the rich villainess. According to the game's plot, a character loathed by everyone such as myself has the main role of bullying the heroine, pushing her towards the various love interests' romantic routes. But it seems like there's something wrong with Elsa, the heroine! She's getting too close to me!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Tsugou no Ii Hate
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Drama

name: Dandadan
description:
After being aggressively rejected, Momo Ayase finds herself sulking when she stumbles across a boy being bullied. Saved by her rash kindness, the occult-obsessed boy attempts to speak to her about supernatural interests he believes they share. Rejecting his claims, Ayase proclaimed that she is instead a believer in ghosts, starting an argument between the two over which is real.

In a bet to determine who's correct, the two decide to separately visit locations associated with both the occult and the supernatural—Ayase visiting the former and the boy visiting the latter. When the two reach their respective places, it turns out that neither of them was wrong and that both the occult and ghosts do exist.

This marks the beginning of Ayase and the boy's adventure, who shares a name with Ayase's favorite idol—Ken Takakura, as they attempt to fix the surreal supernatural and sci-fi elements around them to return to a normal life.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, School Life, Horror, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto ~Maomao no Koukyuu Nazotoki Techou~
description:
In the imperial court, a young woman is put into servitude, Maomao. The tale is just beginning for the female apothecary from the red-light district, as rumors circulate about the emperor's children's lives being short-lived. Her curious nature and thirst for knowledge pushes her to action. To satisfy her curiosity, this young apothecary  will investigate the origin! What is shifting in the imperial court..!?  
  


---
tags: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Medical, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Tatsuki Fujimoto Short Story Collection
description:
Collection of oneshots from author Tatsuki Fujimoto.

Volume 1: 17-21

- Chapter 1. **There were Two Chickens in the Garden (Niwa ni wa Niwa Niwatori ga Ita, 庭には二羽ニワトリがいた。)**
A strange world where aliens have taken over the human world, and only two humans are left which are apparently disguising themselves as mere chickens.

- Chapter 2. **Sasaki-kun Has Stopped the Bullet (Sasaki-kun ga Judan Tometa, 佐々木くんが銃弾止めた)**
To Sasaki, his teacher Kawaguchi is God. She taught him not to be ashamed of his own dreams and made him feel fully capable to forge forward and make them come true, no matter how low the odds. Yet one day, trouble from Kawaguchi's past follows her into the classroom. With his god in danger of total humiliation, Sasaki sets out to protect his teacher using her very own teachings: to strive for the impossible.

- Chapter 3. **Love is Blind (Koi wa Moumoku, 恋は盲目)**
A one-shot story about a boy that is blind to everything but love. Can he confess to his crush?

- Chapter 4. **Shikaku (シカク)**
A notorious hit-man bites off more than they can chew when their newest target turns out to be holding a supernatural secret. Bullets fly and love is in the air.

Volume 2: 22-26

- Chapter 1. **Siren Rhapsody (Ningyo Rhapsody, 人魚ラプソディ)**
In a world where sirens are common, the protagonist is a hybrid of a human father and a mermaid mother. He's always playing the piano under the sea, when a strange siren approaches him…

- Chapter 2. **"When I Woke Up I had Become a Girl" Disease (Me wo Sametara Onnanoko ni Natteita Byou, 目が覚めたら女の子になっていた病)**
A boy wakes up to discover he has become a girl! How will this affect his daily life?!

- Chapter 3. **Nayuta of the Prophecy (Yogen no Nayuta, 予言のナユタ)**
A tale about a prophecy involving a girl with horns who is said to bring destruction upon the world, and her brother.

- Chapter 4. **Little Sister's Elder Sister (Imouto no Ane, 妹の姉)**
A story about sisters aspiring to be artists.
tags: Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Aliens, Supernatural

name: I'm Quitting the Hero's Party
description:
Raniel Van Trias, the Ashen Wizard, is a highly skilled mage set on defeating the Demon King. After years of fighting alongside the renowned Hero's Party and multiple encounters with the Demon King, he is ousted from the party, left with a curse on his heart, forced to lose half his lifespan, and transformed into a woman! 

Undeterred, Raniel becomes an assistant professor at the Royal Apelia Academy as Rania and searches for a way to lift the curse, oblivious to how challenging his task may be...

---

[Official Japanese release](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/148780)

[Official French release](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/1483)
tags: Genderswap, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Koha-Ace Collection
description:
We're ready to activate Super Dogeza toward basically everybody!

A collection of works by the popular manga artist of Koha-Ace, Keikenchi, has finally arrived. Included in this volume are the ultra-rare collaborations with Prisma Illya, Kantai Collection and Lucky☆Star! It's a volume that's sure to get you hooked on the world of Keikenchi! (Koha-Ace side-story collection, released between Koha-Ace EX and Koha-Ace XP)
tags: Comedy, Anthology, Magical Girls, Magic, Military, 4-Koma, Fantasy

name: Go! Ina Junior High Ping-Pong Club
description:
There are six members of the boy's ping pong club. Two are relatively normal; however, the other four consist of an aspiring sexual deviant, two perverts, and a guy with lethal B.O. Add in a cantakerous girl as a manager, and you have the entire crew.  
  
This series pushes the boundaries of good taste beyond anything the western world has experienced, yet somehow manages to remain vaguely charming. The antics of the ping pong club includes one member's trademark "Protruding Pecker Serve," molesting cross-dressing members, and the infamous "Turtle Sequence," which is much too horrifying to describe.  
  
In 1996, this manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga.
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, School Life

name: Presepe Outside the Cage
description:
After countless regressions, Persepe finally conquers all five male protagonists in a harrowing reverse harem game. Just when she thinks she’s free, a message appears:  

*Secret Mode unlocked! Find the true male lead to escape.*  

Hope reignites — she only needs to woo the real protagonist to return to her original world. But there’s one problem...

"So… who’s the real male lead?"

With no clear answers and hidden challenges, Persepe must navigate shifting alliances, cryptic clues, and her own growing feelings. 

Can she uncover the truth and finally break free? Or will she remain trapped in the game forever?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Paripi Koumei
description: General of the Three Kingdoms, Kongming had struggled his whole life, facing countless battles that made him into the accomplished strategist he was. So on his deathbed, he wished only to be reborn into a peaceful world...and was sent straight to modern-day party-central, Tokyo! Can even a brilliant strategist like Kongming adapt to the wild beats and even wilder party people?!
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Music

name: Daxia Swordsman
description: He is Lu Wu Wei. Seven years ago, he was a nobody. In the midst of family infighting and power struggles, he was framed by traitors, expelled from his family, and stripped of his abilities, earning the nickname “Shame of the Capital.” Seven years passed, and Lu Wu Wei became the most accomplished man alive, invincible in the world. His personal guard, all legendary War Gods, are honored in history as the Da Xue Dragon Cavalry.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Eiyuu to Kenja no Tensei Kon: Katsute no Koutekishu to Kon'yakushite Saikyou Fuufu ni Narimashita
description:
In a world ravaged by war and conflict, Hero Raid Freeden and Sage Eluria Caldwin clashed time and time again over fifty long years as the strongest soldiers of their respective nations. However, their long-standing rivalry came to an inevitable yet bitter end with Eluria’s sudden death. A thousand years later, Raid finds he has been reincarnated—and so has Eluria! The world may now be at peace, but the two have an unsettled rivalry between them and the mystery of their reincarnation looms ominously over their heads. There’s so much that needs to be done, so they decide to...get engaged and attend the Royal Institute of Magic together?!

---
**Links** 

* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-hero-and-the-sage-reincarnated-and-engaged)

tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Erio and the Electric Doll
description: The story centers around Ange, an electric doll, and Erio, a human raised by her. In order for Erio to experience the outside world, the two set out on a journey.
tags: Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Girls' Love, Fantasy

name: Journey To The West
description: The original journey to the west to retrieve the Sutra was a conspiracy plotted by the Heavens! Just after a few decades, the Sutra has vanished. The Heavens search for the Sutra with plans to use it with corrupted intentions. In order for the Sutra to not fall into the hands of Heaven, the journey to the west will begin once again.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Wuxia, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Things I Learned After Death
description:
“My mother’s killer, the one who scarred my face forever, and even stole my fiancé—Kanna.”  

This time, I’ll take everything back.  

But the idea of rewriting the past was nothing more than my arrogance.  

“No matter how hard you struggle, you’ll never beat me, Linette.”  

A relentless battle begins between two sisters—one who lost everything and another who took it all.
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess

name: Number One Beast Master
description: A global anomaly has occurred, and monsters have invaded. Monster trainers now bear the burden of saving human civilization. After Xiao Xingyu crosses over, he awakens the “God-tier Monster Training System”. By opening the Eye of the Demonic God, he can see through all hidden evolution paths of monsters, activate their hidden bloodlines, and unlock infinite evolution… A husky can evolve into the Hellhound! A fairy can mutate into the Twelve-Winged Blazing Angel! Hatching a dragon egg can summon the Nine-Spirited Candle Dragon!”
tags: Long Strip, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Holiday Yasumi's Twitter Shorts
description:
Short comics posted by Holiday Yasumi on Twitter/X.

The chapter numbers aren't important as most of the comics are unrelated to the rest, though some feature recurring characters.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Genderswap, Loli, Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Ninja, Comedy, Mecha, Boys' Love, Incest, Zombies, Martial Arts, Magical Girls, Post-Apocalyptic, Crossdressing, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Shota, Web Comic, Aliens, Supernatural, Tragedy, Gyaru

name: A Savage Proposal
description: When the ruthless Lord Tiwakan seizes the kingdom of Nauk, Princess Liene Arsac faces an impossible choice: marry her captor or watch her homeland crumble. But Lord Tiwakan isn’t just after power; he desires Liene, and his devotion stirs a mix of fear and undeniable attraction within her. With her former betrothed, Lafitte, still missing, Liene must decide whether to trust Tiwakan's promises or hold out hope for a rescue. As dangerous secrets come to light, Liene’s decision could change the fate of Nauk—and her own heart—forever.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Touhou - The Last Supper (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Action, Psychological, Doujinshi, Drama

name: Leveling Up Fast with Divine Measurement Skills
description: In Japan, where explorers excel at dungeon conquering, Namiki Haruka, who remains weak even at level 100, is ridiculed by society as a premature weakling. However, after his own death triggers a transformation, he acquires the unique skill 'Divine Measurement' and begins to awaken.
tags: Official Colored, Action, Long Strip, Fantasy

name: Dungeon Kurashi no Moto Yuusha
description:
After killing the Demon Lord, Blum Dilmond was pursued by the kingdom and forced to leave the country. While spending days trying to avoid the assassins aiming at his neck, he suddenly came up with an idea. He could hide inside the dungeon that was once the Demon Lord’s hideout. If it’s there, then he could be safe.   
  
Without hesitating Blum went into the dungeon, but then he met someone unexpected in the lower levels, one of his former companions with whom he fought side by side against the Demon Lord. Moreover, a maid, called Irene, who once served the Demon Lord is also there. And so since their interests happened to match, the three of them decided to cooperate together to rebuild the worn-out dungeon, working earnestly in order to turn it into their own safe paradise.
tags: Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Mafia's Daughter: Operation Makeover
description: A story about an ordinary boy named Mekh, whose life is about to change the moment he accidentally hit the infamous and easily-misuderstood girl named Saran.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Drama, School Life, Delinquents

name: The Tower Master Who Became the Grand Duchess
description: A once content life shatters when Lacia, the 13th Tower Master, awakens in the body of the disgraced Duchess Eckhardt—powerless and trapped in a ruinous fate. Determined to reclaim her lost magic, she devises a bold plan, only to find herself entangled with the mysterious Duke Calix, who hides his true identity. As they navigate deception and unexpected attraction, will Lacia succeed in reclaiming her true self?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Jintian Ni Louxianle Ma?!
description: Mini is a "Scum Detector", and her latest job is from a rich girl who wants to test her boyfriend's loyalty. However, her boyfriend, Zhao Yueming, is a straightforward gentleman, and Mini's usual methods don't work on him. This is a bit tricky for Mini, who is used to dealing with scumbags regularly. This game of tug-of-war between the womanizer and the one who understands them best is about to begin. Who will fall into the trap of love first?!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Full Color

name: Onii-chan Is Done For!
description:
Mahiro Oyama was just a normal erotic-game loving dude...until he woke up one morning as a woman! Turns out his mad-scientist little sister, Mihari, tried out one of her new experiments on him...with a disastrous outcome, as far as Mahiro's concerned! But Mihari is as determined to study him as he is determined to go back to his shut-in, game-playing life, and one thing's for sure...life is going to get a whole lot weirder from here on out!

*5th place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga  
  
- **Retail:** (Direct Retail From the Mangaka)

tags: Genderswap, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Futoku no Guild
description:
Kikuru Madan, a monster hunter with excellent performance because of his particular job in the forest, decides to quit his job because he doesn't want to waste his youth. The reason he wants to quit was that one of his friends got married. One day there is a new recruit. Enome the Guild Receptionist asks him to accompany Hitamuki Kyan the Lolipai Martial Artist to watch her back and teach her how to work. He accepts the request, half because he was worried about her and half because he wanted her to become his successor before he retires completely. Sadly, his plan to retire is derailed by Hitamuki being useless and always attracting some monster. Can Kikuru Madan retire peacefully, despite being saddled with a useless newbie?  
  
Hunting erotic commentary enthusiastically!
tags: Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Progolfer no Ore ga Imouto no Putter ni Tensei Shiteshimatta Ken
description:
On the green of the All Japan Open final, professional golfer Kazuma Yagami is killed by a lightning strike just before he is about to win! His soul, unable to leave his sister behind, resides in the putter he was carrying at the time, and his younger sister, Ryoko, who inherited the putter, decides to win the tour championship using only her brother's putter!


In order to become a professional golfer, Ryoko enrolls in the prestigious Seven Two Academy, where the elite golfers gather. The challenge of the two of them together is about to begin. ----!
tags: Comedy, Sports

name: Hajimete no Ojou-sama
description: Ojou Kotone is a first-year high school girl who was having trouble using the ticket machine at the station, Suguru Sewa, a first-year high school boy passing by helped her out, and he surprised as she transferred to Sewa's high school. It's her first time to taking the train, her first trying curry udon, Sewa being her first friend. This is a love comedy of firsts between a young lady and a caring high school boy!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: There's a Rat in Our House
description: Amidst the freezing winter, a solitary being huddled on the snow-covered pavement, bearing the burden of deep loneliness and faded scars. It had forsaken itself, fragile and vulnerable. The reason for welcoming this nameless creature into the home was straightforward. "What... does this mean?" "You helped me, and I wish to return the favor." In the complete darkness where no trace of light could penetrate, only two warm bodies occupied the space
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Dragon Quest: The Great Adventure of Dai - Avan the Brave and the Demon King of Hellfire
description: The Demon King's army led by Hadler is attacking the world. The Kingdom of Carl and Princess Flora stand up to stop the invasion. And then there's young Avan! Another heroic story begins now!
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba ii?
description: Zagan is feared as an evil mage, he is awkward and has a sharp tongue, and once again had to put down thieves that encroached on his territory when he was researching that morning. In a dark auction, he finds a white slave elf, Nephie, who holds a peerless beauty. Falling in love with her at first sight, he uses his fortune to buy her, but as poor as he is socially, he doesn’t understand how to connect with her. Thus, the clumsy cohabitation of the mage that can’t convey his love, and the slave that pines for her master but doesn’t understand how to bring it up, begins.
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: S Watari-san to M Mura-kun
description: Intelligent and beautiful female high schooler Reika Sawatari and handsome and astute male high schooler Subaru Emura, both of whom with a certain fetish that nobody knows, have started their relationship after a certain event.
tags: Romance, School Life

name: Saint Seiya: Episode G Requiem
description: The world is wrapped in flames and about to be destroyed by the actions of primordial gods intending to cleanse the planet. While the goddess Athena stands alone in a desperate attempt to contain the worst of the attack, it is up to Seiya, the last Saint standing, to battle the gods and join her to save the earth. The final battle of the Gold Saints is about to begin.
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Ataerareta Skill wo Tsukatte Kasei de Isekai Bijotachi to Ichaicha shitai
description: That day, Ishida Yamada was working his part-time job as usual. After finishing his shift, he opened the back door and stepped into a vast, empty space, where he encountered a mysterious figure claiming to be God. By sheer chance, Ishida was chosen by this God to be transported to another world. Although confused and uncertain, he resolved to adapt and make a life for himself in this strange new place. Using the skills granted by God, he focused on surviving and thriving. As he explored different lands and encountered various races, he made it his mission to form close relationships with many beautiful women along the way.
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Nue no Onmyouji
description: Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games.
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Harem, Supernatural

name: Chiruran: Shinsengumi Requiem
description: In 1912, a young woman tracks down the elderly Nagakura Shinpachi, determined to hear the true story of the Demon of the Shinsengumi, the Vice Commander Hijikata Toshizou. Hijikata's story begins in 1859, when he is a violent young man that is honing his sword skills while peddling his family's medicine. Soon, in his quest to find stronger people to fight, Hijikata starts to come into contact with others who will eventually become his comrades in the Shinsengumi. The first one to make an impression on the brash young man is Kondo Isami, who proves to be a better fighter than Hijikata.
tags: Thriller, Historical, Action, Survival, Samurai

name: Ten Second Kiss Cooldown Game
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: The Constellations Are My Disciples
description:
300 years ago, the invincible warrior Hyeon-oh Kim brought down the Tower of the End, preventing the world’s demise. Though he should have died the moment the Tower of the End collapsed, Hyeon-oh is reborn 300 years later in the body of a 17-year-old boy named Juhyeok Kim.

Meanwhile, he discovers the existence of the Constellations, who were once his disciples 300 years ago but were born during the time when he did not exist in this world. Will he be able to find them again and train them?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Mirai Nikki Redial
description: A story that picks up after the first story ends. It tells the tale of the 3rd Universe's Gasai Yuno after her encounter with the Yukiteru and Yuno of the other universes. Her life seems normal, but something feels like it is missing. She can't help being fascinated with the boy in her grade, Amano Yukiteru, because he keeps appearing in her dreams…
tags: Action, Psychological, Romance, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: It's Over! Empress' Husband Is Actually Invincible
description: Xiao Tian, a human on earth, was summoned by Empress Zi Ruoyan to the Great Yan Dynasty to become her husband at the time of life and death, and got a "Strongest Supreme System", but Xiao Tian only wanted to be the ultimate soft rice prince of the Empress! So he resolutely rejected the system, but he didn't expect that the strong system's style of painting would suddenly change into a "dog-licking system"? ! 【You are a creature from the super high-dimensional plane Earth! 】【This system can only be your slave! 】【Master, please control yourself, you may accidentally kill this system! 】
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Tenkaichi - Nihon Saikyou Bugeisha Ketteisen
description:
Battle tournament manga set in the Sengoku Era. The year is 1600. Ten years have passed since Oda Nobunaga unified Japan. When Nobunaga realized that he was dying, he announced that he would hand over the country to the one who produced the strongest warriors. The warlords, whose dreams of unifying the country had been dashed, set up their own strongest warriors and set their sights on becoming the ruler of Japan.
___
**Alt Official Raws:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/3269754496359886083), [YanMaga Web](https://yanmaga.jp/comics/%E3%83%86%E3%83%B3%E3%82%AB%E3%82%A4%E3%83%81_%E6%97%A5%E6%9C%AC%E6%9C%80%E5%BC%B7%E6%AD%A6%E8%8A%B8%E8%80%85%E6%B1%BA%E5%AE%9A%E6%88%A6)
**Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10585/episode/356567) - United States, Japan, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, & Singapore only.
tags: Historical, Action, Ninja, Martial Arts, Samurai, Gore

name: Dogs and the Brave Are Not Showy
description: Summoned to another world to defeat the demon king, Satou Sousuke, 18 years old and only finished elementary school, is brought back to his world after several years had passed. While unable to find employment anywhere and living off a part-time job, Sousuke encounters a battle between a magician and a demon he thought didn’t exist on earth! He easily defeated the demon, so being marked for his power he’s involved in Demon subjugation?!
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Adaptation

name: Renai no Jugyou
description: In 20XX, the Love Education Law was enacted. "Love" has become a mandatory subject in a response to the declining birthrate. Michitaka Sato, a high school student who has given up on romance and works hard on his studies, is on the verge of failing school. When he attends a supplementary class to avoid repeating a grade, Mai Aihara, a beautiful girl who is a problem child, appears as his partner...? Suddenly, he begins to study love alone with the beautiful girl in the three C's. Close contact, close quarters, and behind closed doors! Does Aihara-san have a secret...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Philosophical, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Mezase Gouka Kyakusen!! ~Sen Shokan Skill De Isekai Rich Life Wo Te Ni Irero~
description: After falling into the ocean, Wataru Toyoumi, finds himself reincarnated in another world! Armed with a skill to allow him to summon boats, he plans to get rich and live a happy life aboard his very own luxury liner.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Osananajimi no Yuri
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Drawing: Saikyou Mangaka wa Oekaki Skill de Isekai Musou Suru!
description:
Akira Kamishiro was a very successful manga author, who was diagnosed with blood cancer one day. He regretted the way he lived, where he could only build up empty relationships. Angry at his mother for asking him to send her some money, he died in a car accident. He was given a chance to choose his new mother and reincarnate in another world.

Akira, not wanting to have a repeat of his past life, decided to choose an ordinary but safe life.. He was reincarnated as Akira, the only son of a magic store, with his previous life's memories. He had no talent for swordsmanship or magic, but he didn’t care as he was still loved by his family. At one point, he realized that he can embody various things by "drawing a picture". That's when he noticed his cheat ability...!?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Isekai Kaeri no Saikyou Tamer, Tsukaima wa Osananajimi
description:
“But I’m powerless without you, my Master.”

After being suddenly summoned to another world and saving that world from a crisis, high school students Wataru and Rumi have safely made it back to the real world. But the real world has been completely transformed! Dungeons are popping up and people have awakened their skills… It’s as if the real world is turning into the world they just left behind…

A dungeon fantasy story where the returnees from another world, the tamer Wataru and his familiar Rumi, mow down everything in their way as the strongest combination that is closer than childhood friends but not quite lovers!
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Devil Never Cries
description: Aang, the strongest human warrior on the verge of death, has inexplicably travelled 60 years into the past, with the double-edged sword of the “strongest demon” power hidden inside him. “The only way to escape the fate of the pastis to evolve. Aang: “Don’t let yourself be a slave to your limits, break free and become a demon that reigns!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I Don't Feel Like Doing Anything
description:
One spring day, after the recent death of her mother, Summer decides to quit her stressful city job. She moves to a small beachside town, where she plans to use her entire life savings on two years of doing absolutely nothing. She calculates that she can subsist for this long without finding a job by leading a minimalist, free life. She finds peace and makes friends in her new environment But after a while, the walls of her home are repeatedly vandalized with death threats. Will Summer be able to catch the villain, find normalcy in her life, and make peace with herself?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Naver>](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=4998319)

description:
Satou Sou is accidentally swapped with himself in a parallel world with a male/female ratio of 1:39. He finds a kind family and lovely women at the place where he was switched. Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.
