description: A comic essay about the author's love for cats and her daily life with her 3 cats.
tags: Animals, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: It's Not My Fault for Being Delicious
description: Bai Qian Qian, a human, fell into the demon world and became an ingredient! Now the handsome looking demons want to eat her!!! QAQ In order to survive, she signed a contract with the bamboo demon Xia Zhu and became his main ingredient... Wait, something's not right. Shit, is this what love feels like?
tags: Historical, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Cooking, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Holy Knight
description: Mizumura Shinta didn’t know what to make of the situation when the sexiest girl in school, Kishimoto Ririsu, starts seducing him and things get extremely physical. Shinta isn’t rich or the popular guy in school so it doesn’t make sense that Ririsu would be so interested in him. But Ririsu is in fact a vampire, a secret that she will kill to keep hidden. As the relationship between Shinta and Ririsu grows, it gets harder for her to keep the secret hidden. And when those close to him, like his semi-romantic childhood friend Makimura Chizuru, are involuntarily thrown into the chaos, deep dark secrets get revealed.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: My Gemini
description:
Who died at that time... Which one?

John is red-haired and freckled. His only pride is that he is a close friend of the school's popular twins, Jekyll and Hyde. The twins always pretended to be each other, but suddenly one of the twins died. Who was left... Which one!?
tags: Historical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Noah's Contract: I'm an NPC in Another World
description: Players, this is a continent overrun by monsters. Danger lurks everywhere, so please make full use of your talents and help us eliminate the monster army. What? You ask who I am? I’m just an NPC.
tags: Action, Demons, Fantasy

name: I Have Revived the Chinese Gods!
description: Glaciers are melting, and the sea clans are invading. The Western gods rule over humanity, while the Huaxia people, without gods, become the target of everyone. Until a giant stone statue crosses the starry sky and crashes into the land of Jiuzhou, Zhao Feiyu comes through the void...
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy

name: Seichou Cheat de Nandemo Dekiru you ni Natta ga, Mushoku dake wa Yamerarenai you desu
description:
I, Ichinosuke, failed to get a job 100 times in a row. In fact, my lifelong unemployment streak remains unbroken. On my way to yet another job interview, I was involved in an accident with a truck and tragically passed away. Suddenly, a goddess bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal... and another goddess, making a mistake, bestowed upon me the ability to grow at a speed 20 times faster than normal, before sending me to a game-like other world.

Wait, 20 times 20... 400 times faster than normal?!

However, knowing that I would not become stronger even if I continued growing while being jobless, I aimed to get a job... but I discovered that remaining Jobless was a cheat in and of itself, provided you can stomach the slow leveling process... Which I do at 400 times faster than normal. As my Growth Cheat and Jobless Cheat existed side-by-side in this other world, the story of my adventure, no doubt certified by the job-placement agency as harmful material, begins here.
tags: Loli, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Bocchi the Rock!
description: Hitori Gotou is a high school girl who's starting to learn to play the guitar because she dreams of being in a band, but she's so shy that she hasn't made a single friend. However her dream might come true after she meets Nijika Ijichi, a drummer girl looking for a new guitarist for her band.
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Music

name: A Hero Who Does Everything Perfectly
description:
In 2024, Na Gang-in wakes up in the heart of South Korea. He can't remember who he is or where he is, but through a combat support AI named Jeon Ji-in embedded in his body, he discovers he's affiliated with the Earth Alliance from 2082. 

To regain his memories and figure out why he ended up here, he needs to gather information. With nothing to his name but plenty of skills, this is Na Gang-in's clumsy journey of adapting to Earth!
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Wicked Spot
description:
Sada is a modern-day witch who is tired of living quietly deep in the mountains. In fact, she wants more attention! Why can't witches be known by humans?!　

This is a story of modern “witches” who break the curse and live freely and uninhibitedly!
tags: Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Marika-chan no Koukando wa Bukkowarete iru
description:
I’ve gained the ability to see the affection levels of the girl I like.──I don’t have the courage to confess my feelings to my childhood friend, Marika-chan. One day, I made a strong wish upon a shooting star: "I wish I could understand the feelings of others, like in a dating game." Then, that wish came true...!?

Floating above the girls in my class are affection meters. While confused by this surreal sight, I decide to check Marika-chan’s meter, only to find it has broken past its limits, turning into a hellish meter...!?

Marika-chan, you don’t like me, so why are you so kind to me...?
──What is Marika-chan’s hidden truth behind her cute façade? Does she really hate me!? Or is it something else...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: The Gods World
description: My first ever manga and is a joke manga will not be taken seriously and will get updated at random
tags: Genderswap, Official Colored, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Self-Published, Isekai

name: I Was Reincarnated as the Heroine on the Verge of a Bad Ending, and I'm Determined to Fall in Love!
description: One day, office worker Suzune (Reine) is reborn as Raine, the heroine of a "work-based otome game" that is too far away from romance. She wants to fall in love with a handsome man in this life! However, she finds herself in a world where there is a magical caste system, and to her surprise, she is the lowest rank! Her family treats her coldly and she is on the verge of being expelled from school. ...... Even so, she is undeterred by the "strong mentality" she has developed in her previous life. Practising magic, studying, and increasing the likability of her targets, she runs hard to avoid a bad end and get a sparkling school life! As Rene pushes forward with such a bright and positive attitude, her high-spec brother Julius, with whom she was supposed to be on bad terms, somehow begins to dote on her - or does he? A school fantasy about a strong mental heroine who is loved by everyone!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Hajimete no Gal
description: Spring. The 'season of love' has arrived and it seems that finding himself a girlfriend was harder than Jun'ichi believed. To break the status quo, Jun'ichi's friends have forced him into confessing to the gyaru, Yame Yukana. However, things do not go quite as he expected.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Fate/Grand Order - Daily Chaldea (Doujinshi)
description:
Daily Chaldea is an unofficial daily slice-of-life fancomic created using art assets from the game Fate/Grand Order and building upon the existing lore of the franchise.

The story follows the adventures of genderswapping protagonist Ritsuka Fujimaru and the many Servants they've summoned, with the tone ranging from comedic to philosophical. The comic is 'live' with the NA server of Fate/Grand Order, with new characters appearing in the comic around the time they appear in the game and comics often referencing recent events in the game.

Enjoyment of this comic relies heavily upon the reader's familiarity with the game and its characters, so the author recommends playing Fate/Grand Order before reading this comic.

---

This comic is being uploaded to MangaDex by reader request and with the approval of MangaDex staff. All art is copyright TYPE-Moon / FGO Project, Aniplex Inc., Lasengle, and other copyright holders as appropriate. This comic is not for profit (through ad revenue or otherwise).

Some early use the original white backgrounds. Later comics have darker backgrounds and additional art assets for improved quality.
tags: Self-Published, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Ichi the Witch
description: In this world, witches must hunt down their magic! Deep in the forest, the terrifying king of magic and the strongest witch are locked in deadly combat. But suddenly, a young boy joins the fray. His name is Ichi and he is just a hunter. But he has the power to flip the magic world upside down in this magic hunting fantasy epic!
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy

name: Modern MoGal - Big Game!
description:
A short story featuring Robots and Big Monsters that takes place in the "Modern MoGal" Universe.  
  
Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821), uploaded to MangaDex with permission.
tags: Action, Mecha, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic

name: Fujii on the Roadside
description:
Is he an eccentric or a hermit? Does the seemingly unremarkable company employee, Fujii, redefine the definition of "happiness"?

In the workplace, he's a plain middle-aged man who doesn't stand out. While he does his job properly, he's not one to waste words. Come quitting time, he disappears like a ghost. He's not the type to be invited to after-work drinks in the first place. More like, he's the guy who's thought of as "I wouldn't want to end up like that..." by his juniors.

Yet, he piques the curiosity of others... "I wonder how he was raised?", "Does he have friends or a girlfriend?", "What does he do on weekends?". Suddenly, you realize you've become captivated by Fujii... 

This elusive emotion that's hard to put into words is vividly captured by the author of "Reborn no Kishi" in this bewitching life drama!
tags: Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Kotonoba Drive
description:
The story centres on Suu-chan, a girl who works part-time at a pasta restaurant named "Lamp." She witnesses mysterious events while riding her moped in the night, such as the past of a person or place.   
She can only experience these visions five minutes at a time.   
  
A loose sequel to a PositioN chapter
tags: Psychological, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Yorozuyama Juban Shobu
description:
Yorozuyama Goro, a hero known as the monster of the Heisei era, has appeared after winning five consecutive tournaments from the makushita stage!! A man with extraordinary strength who will never become a yokozuna or an ozeki...
What is his true intention?…!?
tags: Sports, Martial Arts

name: Roro-chan wa Kahogo na Kyodai Musume
description:
(Translated from Amazon description)

Paolo, a hunter who makes a living hunting monsters, sets forth into unknown lands to capture a legendary Divine Dragon... but when losing his grip while climbing a deep valley, he loses consciousness.

And when he comes to, he finds himself in a bath with a legendary dragon! And she's adorable!

Now kept against his will as a giant dragon girl's pet, the initially hostile boy tries to escape, but... when he sees how earnestly this giant girl takes care of her pet (him), his feelings begin to waver. Should he run, or let her keep him?

A gentle giant girl and a tiny hero's fluffy, heartwarming... pet-raising comedy!?
tags: Romance, Adventure, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Love Advice from the Great Duke of Hell
description: The girl of your dreams barely knows you exist. Your friends can’t help. Your family is clueless. So where do you turn for love advice? Who can provide you with that essential assistance for the lovelorn? If you’re average everyday teenager Paul, you summon a powerful demon from deep in the recesses of Hell and frankly, hope for the best.
tags: Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: SHY
description: In the middle of the 21st century, the world was on the brink of World War III. But superheroes from across the globe appeared and helped bring an era of peace. With the crisis averted, the Heroes returned to their home countries where they now help with domestic matters. This is the story about the young Japanese heroine named "Shy"…
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Ninja, Comedy, Superhero, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Iken Senki Völundio
description:
On a desperate battlefield... I'll start running a tavern!

Cleo, a man who has been a mercenary for 10 years, meets a mysterious girl named Kohaku. In order to survive on the battlefield, where "different swords" with great power are flying around, the two of them start running a "tavern" where soldiers gather!
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy

name: Zannen Jokanbu Black General-san
description: Braveman is your average superhero. Unfortunately for him, his arch-nemesis also happens to be a stalker and his number one fan. Follow their story as Braveman struggles to overcome his greatest adversary and retain his peace of mind.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Martial Arts, Military, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Gundam EXA
description:
Gundam EXA (ガンダム EXA) is a manga written by Tomohiro Chiba and illustrated by Kōichi Tokita, published by Kadokawa Shoten and serialized in Gundam Ace magazine in 2011. Being Gundam Ace's 10th Anniversary Project, it is tied in with the arcade and PS3 Game Mobile Suit Gundam: Extreme Vs. Full Boost.  
  
The story takes place in unnamed timeline, where humanity has highly advanced technology. However, the human population is decreasing and it seems that they're on their way to extinction.  
  
The protagonists are Leos Alloy, Sthesia Awar and their Haro. They work on a Jupiter base called "Jupiter X", using "General Answer" (or "GA") which contains a massive repository of data about the previous eras of humanity, Leos travels to the Earths' of the previous eras in an effort to collect data that might give them a hint for the evolution of mankind.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Romance, Mecha, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Military, Drama

name: Gal Can't Be Kind to Otaku!?
description: Takuya Seo is an otaku who likes "anime for girls" and can't say he likes it out loud. One day, he hooks up with two gals from his class, Amane and Ijichi, but it seems that Amane is also an otaku...
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Dungeon Porter
description:
A world where only those with innate talent can become adventurers who conquer dungeons.
The world defined "Nagi" as a porter who cannot become an adventurer.

But if you clear a dungeon, doesn't that make you an adventurer?

Combat skills: 0! Survival abilities: Max level!
The dungeon conquest story of the all-purpose porter, Nagi, defying fate!
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Kawaii No Wa Ore De Aru
description:
Yuki, the visual representative of a famous dance influencer group with one million subscribers, had a problem. He could never maintain a relationship for long! He was immediately labeled as frivolous, suspected of cheating (even though he wasn’t), and dumped—over and over again. Even though he was dating them because he truly liked them…!

One day, at a drinking party, Yuki became intrigued by a reserved and elegant girl, Yurino, who was trying to leave early. Curious, he followed her out of the venue. Little did he know, this was the beginning of a never-ending spiral of romantic misfortunes.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Touhou - Suwakoto! (Doujinshi)
description:
Yotsuba meets Touhou. An awesome adaptation of an awesome manga.  
  
Part of [Touhou](https://mangadex.org/?page=search&title=touho) series.
tags: Comedy, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: GALAXIAS
description:
It's been ten years since the assassination of the Dragon King, the land's most powerful ruler. Off in the corner of the kingdom where tailed dragonfolk dwell, Jio, a human girl, yearns for adventure and an escape from rural life. However, when she meets the mysterious, amnesiac young man Neraid, Jio's life turns upside-down! With courage and curiosity knocking on the door, the two of them find the ultimate adventure waiting for them!! A traditional battle fantasy from a rookie artist begins!! (K MANGA)
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/GALAXIAS_manga)
**Official English:** [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10608/episode/352898) - United States, Canada, Australia, New Zealand, & Singapore only.
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Tokiwa Kitareri!!
description: Tokiwa Yasaka lives in an unusual time, and according to his dreams, it's about to become even stranger. He's been having a dream of a woman called Rein ever since the robot Deus Ex Machina III came to his home. He and Machina attend the same school, where their other classmates include a secret ninja (Kanata Kusanagi) and a sorcerer (Haruka Yata). When Tokiwa, the robot, the ninja, and the sorcerer rush to rescue the student council president from a demon, the boys find that they've all been having the same dream! What is going to happen to their world?
tags: Action, Comedy, Mecha, Martial Arts, Magic, School Life, Supernatural

name: Asura’s Verdict
description: "Only do good deeds."—Asura follows his late mother's teachings and always strives to do good in life. No matter how much he is bullied, he goes on with a smile, firmly believing that evildoers will receive divine punishment. Until one day, an ominous old man offers him a key that can open the doors to hell...
tags: Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Reborn as a Demonic Cultivator: Starting with a Zombie Planet
description: Chu Xuan traveled through the Cangxuan world and became a demon cultivator of Wuji Sect. The so-called demon cultivation is to plunder the essence of heaven and earth and seize the essence of all things. After slaughtering thousands of people, he became the Great Demon Lord. However, killing is not tolerated by the heavenly way of the human race. Wuji Sect was also destroyed by the righteous sect. When he was helpless, Chu Xuan accidentally got the blood mirror, which could take him to a doomsday planet full of zombies! He suddenly discovered that this place is simply a paradise for demon cultivators!
tags: Thriller, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: haike, arashi hini saku hana tachie
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic

name: The Daily Life of a Middle-Aged Online Shopper in Another World
description:
Kenichi, a single man in his 40s, is transported into another world for no apparent reason. As he tries to escape a dangerous forest teaming with monsters, he realizes he has the power to access to a huge online store. By using this power to exchange goods he found in this new world for cash, and then buying modern ones off the internet, he was able to quickly create a very popular business. However, his goal is to have a slow and leisurely life. Instead of growing his business even more, he decides to settle down and live off of the power of Jeff Bezos.
___
[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2945eg/) (jp)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ame to Kimi to
description: On a rainy summer evening, a woman and a "dog" happened to meet each other and life has never been the same since.
tags: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Make the Exorcist Fall in Love
description: As the strongest exorcist, a boy chosen by God was engaged in mortal combat with the Demon Kings. Although he bears the fate of humanity on his shoulders, he actually wants to make sweets peacefully. One day, he meets a girl... This is a story of love and hope growing in the midst of a holy war.
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Gore, Drama, Supernatural

name: HongKong Comic - Honkai Impact 3rd
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Action, Mecha, Zombies, Superhero, Video Games, Horror, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Shuumatsu Train Doko e Iku?
description: Not found
tags: Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Adaptation

name: Youkai Gakkou no Sensei Hajimemashita!
description: Haruaki is a scaredy-cat with a fetish for girls' school uniforms, but he also wants to be a good teacher. However, his new school isn’t exactly what he thought it would be: it's an academy for monsters, demons, ghosts and all sorts of supernatural creatures!
tags: Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural

name: Zekkyou Daiyogen
description:
♪'Lalala, the cute puppy will die in a while.'♪  
  
♪'And I feel that fella near waterfall will fall and drown, oh yes, he will.'♪  
  
A karaoke prophet wanders around the town singing weird prophecies into his trusty handy karaoke. No matter how you look at it he's a risky guy, but his sinister prophecies are always right. A puppy that high schooler Yori got from her boyfriend dies. Later, a middle-aged man drowns after falling into a waterfall, a giant fire occurs in the city, and… even more?! The scary, the grotesque, even the ridiculous: a collection of bizarre horror stories!
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Comedy, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Domestic na Kanojo
description: Natsuo Fujii is in love with his teacher, Hina. Attempting to forget his feelings towards her, Natsuo goes to a mixer with his classmates where he meets an odd girl named Rui Tachibana. In a strange turn of events, Rui asks Natsuo to sneak out with her and do her a favor. To his surprise, their destination is Rui's house—and her request is for him to have sex with her. There's no love behind the act; she just wants to learn from the experience. Thinking that it might help him forget about Hina, Natsuo hesitantly agrees. After this unusual encounter Natsuo now faces a new problem. With his father remarrying, he ends up with a new pair of stepsisters; unfortunately, he knows these two girls all too well. He soon finds out his new siblings are none other than Hina and Rui! Now living with both the teacher he loves and the girl with whom he had his "first time," Natsuo finds himself in an unexpected love triangle as he climbs ever closer towards adulthood.
tags: Romance, Incest, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Makigama no Pandora
description: Eri Hourai, a second-year high school girl, takes over "Pandora" - a bakery specialising in wood fire cooked goods.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Lalalab☆ ~Gal to Kagaku to Seishun to!~
description: Lala Mizusawa might look like a flashy gyaru and act high-energy, but don’t be fooled—she’s a hardcore science geek and a third-year biology major with dreams of becoming a great scientist! While her lofty goal sometimes shakes her confidence, she’s got her quirky labmates to keep her going: the refined and otaku-spirited Hanako Naito, and the lazy pajama-wearing Toki Busujima. Together, they celebrate the thrill of growing microbes, steam sweet potatoes in the autoclave, and dive headfirst into their delightfully chaotic campus life (if you can call it that)! ☆
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Smoke Blue no Ame Nochi Hare
description: Sakutaro's former colleague and No. 1 sales rival, Shizuka Kuji, saved him from danger when he was out having a good time one night.When Kuji left the company a step earlier than Sakutaro, he looked at him with envy, thinking that he must have a brilliant second career now.But when Kuji reunites with Sakutaro for the first time in eight years, his sarcastic personality is still the same, but for some reason, he is now working as a translator, looking languid and with long hair...
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Girl Meets Rock!
description: With a passion for richly textured Japanese rock, first-year high school student Chihiro Hatono steps into the world of the light music club, new guitar in tow. But what awaits her behind those doors...? A drama of unfiltered youth and musical ambition takes the stage!
tags: Award Winning, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Music

name: Do you like a baby-faced boss?
description: A romantic comedy story between a baby-faced boss and a mature subordinate.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Stigmata
description: Asako Minami has a "unique constitution." He senses the lingering thoughts of murder victims, and experiences the circumstances under which they died with his own body in a reaction similar to stigmata. This proves useful in solving difficult cases with the Metropolitan Police Department's Special Investigations Unit Six. Asako's partner is the reserved Superintendent Kuroiwa Hiroto, rising through the MPD ranks despite doubting his own abilities.
tags: Action, Psychological, Boys' Love, Gore, Drama, Police, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Love Live! Sunshine!! AZALEA COMIC ANTHOLOGY
description:
Love Live! Sunshine!!: AZALEA Comic Anthology
Cover Illustration: Mezashi

1. Otome Chick ka nan ? (乙女チックかなん?) by Kou Kuzu
2. Onayami?! AZALEA (お悩み?! AZALEA) by Mezashi
3. Torikoriko Please!! (トリコリコPLEASE!!) by Shinji Tanaka & Dia Fuuka
4. Tokimeki Sakushigaku (ときめき作詞学) by Ripo Day
5. Mezase AZALEA no Hana (目指せAZALEAの花) by Yuuki Nanaji
6. Galaxy Hide and Seek (GALAXY HidE and SeeK) by Uzuki Houshou & Satsuki Konoe
7. Hanamaru to Yousei no Fuku (花丸と妖精の服) by Gratin-dori
8. Innocent Bird (INNOCENT BIRD) by Shinji Tanaka & Dia Fuuka
9. Tokimeki Bunruigaku (ときめき分類学) by Nata Nakane
tags: Comedy, Anthology, School Life, Music

name: Hanamaru Kindergarten
description: Anzu goes to a preschool with her friends, the shy Koume and the eccentric Hiiragi. Together, they try to gain Anzu attention from their male caretaker Tsuchida, though he is clearly more interested in the pretty Yamamoto who supervises the class next door.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Vtuber Savior ✟ Messiah-chan
description: A horror manga where viewers watch and join in on Messiah-chan's stream activities.
tags: Comedy, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Shouwaru Tensai Osananajimi to no Shoubu ni Makete Hatsutaiken o Zenbu Ubawareru Hanashi
description:
A twisted girls' love story featuring: A devilish girl hiding behind the mask of an honor student x An ordinary girl who hates losing.

Wakaba Yoshizawa has a childhood friend named Komaki Umezono.

This girl wore the mask of an honor student with good morals who's blessed with both beauty and brains, but in reality she's an evil genius who looked down on people. For the sake of regaining the dignity she lost to Komaki, Wakaba challenges her to a match, but Komaki tells her "Each time I win, I will take one precious thing from you." as a condition!? Every time she loses to the girl she "hates", her true feelings get exposed.

(Source: Young Ace Up)
tags: Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Adaptation

name: Animal Maimai
description: Not found
tags: Animals, Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: WORST Gaiden Saburoku Santa Namonaki Karasu-tachi
description: This manga depicts the one-year gap in the story when Harumichi Bouya leaves Suzuran Boys High School until Hana Tsukishima arrives at Toaru City.
tags: Action, Animals, Crime, Drama, Delinquents

name: Why I Quit Being the Demon King
description:
In a time of chaos, the Demon King traversed through 665 realms before invading the human realm. It was a brave hero who ceased the war. Thanks to their divine sacrifice, mankind barely managed to survive.

But that led to the story of the new Demon King.

Meet Demon King Demiourgos, the 666th. “I quit being the Demon King,” he said, before leaving the demon realm. This is a story about a runaway Demon King and a hero who becomes his subordinate.

Why did the Demon King quit?
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adaptation

name: Maseki Gurume: Mamono no Chikara wo Tabeta Ore wa Saikyou!
description: In this world, It's only me who can get stronger by eating Magic Stones! At one point, I received an offer to have a smooth life reincarnation from the Goddess-sama… But the skill I got as a prize is Toxins Decomposition EX. Ugh, what a plain skill! It's so pitiful that even my own family makes fun of me… However, one day I realized that because of the effect of this skill, I can eat and gain power from Magic Stones! I've also been notified that I'm the prince from a neighboring country!? What awaits me in the castle are days of experimenting with Magic Stones and training, the perfect environment for me to become the strongest man there is… And to top it off, I received the Magic Stone of Dullahan! The story of a boy on the path to becoming a King while being chased by an assertive fiancee and Female Knights starts here!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Isekai Shachuuhaku Monogatari - Outrunner PHEV
description:
One young salaryman, who adores his plug-in, hybrid car that uses both electricity and gasoline, had been using camping in it as an escape plan from everyday life. Suddenly, he finds himself transported to another world with his car!

He'll start his life anew in this different world!
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Ningyou Pass
description: A group of high school students visit the inside of a mountain on an agricultural trip. While staying at a farmer's home, they learn the rural life. However, the village doesn't exist…? A shudder runs down everyone's spine as a lot of inexplicable events happen in the village, that now restricts entry. What are the high schoolers' fate?
tags: Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Your Ultimate Love Rival
description: Naturally charming, Irene attracts women like a magnet, even when she doesn't mean to. Enter her best friend, Claudia, who refuses to marry any of her three suitors because of her affection for Irene. As a result, these powerful and mentally unstable men declare Irene as their rival in love and threaten her life. She knows none of them deserves to be with Claudia, but she doesn't want to die! To save both her friend and herself, Irene must prove she's their ultimate rival, but will she succeed?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Blue Archive - Kankan's Blue Archive Logs (Doujinshi)
description: A collection of Blue Archive short comics by artist ポテトルス on pixiv.
tags: Action, Comedy, Doujinshi, School Life, Web Comic

name: Youkai Gakkou no Seito Hajimemashita!
description:
As the cherry blossoms fall, a new school year kicks off at Hyakki Academy—a school attracting youkai from all over Japan! Unfortunately, the first years are far from model students, especially the troublemaking idiot duo, Mamekichi Maizuka (a mame-danuki) and Tamao Akisame (a nekomata). It’s time for the lovable but rambunctious animal youkai to steal the spotlight in this spinoff comedy, set a year before the events of "A Terrified Teacher at Ghoul School!"

(Source: Manga UP! Global)

Serialized on Pixiv Comic.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Supernatural

name: Beastmaster: I can see the complete encyclopedia of evolution
description: An awakening in a desperate situation, Li Wenxuan, an ordinary college student, was pushed into the era of fantasy beast masters by fate. Starting from the lowest level fantasy beast, he groped forward in revenge and protection, pursuing his own power and beliefs. This is a golden age where fantasy beasts and humans coexist, and Li Wenxuan is destined to embark on a unique path of rise.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Full Color

name: My Hero Academia - Rondo of Opalus (Doujinshi)
description:
Inspired by the fantasy AU illustrations.
Todoroki Shouto x Bakugou Katsuki
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Magic, Doujinshi, Fantasy

name: The Blood Princess and the Knight
description:
I, who was a sacred knight, was defeated and captured in a battle against the vampire clan.   

"Oh? Letting you die? In your dreams! Accept my embrace, and in the future, please take care of me, my lovely daughter~"   

The silver-haired Queen of the Vampire Clan lifted my chin and smiled cunningly, her sharp canines drawing closer to my neck… 

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative raw (Bilibili)](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc28199)
tags: Genderswap, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: The End of the World: The Emperor Banner invites all female disciples to take their seats
description: Su Bai was about to ascend to heaven but was framed by his female apprentice. When he woke up again, he had traveled to a modern society where zombies were rampant and he had become an ordinary person. The only thing he could use was a low-level magic weapon, the Ten Thousand Souls Banner. With the awakening of the Ten Thousand Souls Banner system, Su Bai had hope of returning to the top. What made Su Bai even more excited was that the female apprentices who framed him also traveled to this world with the turbulence of time and space.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Survival, Horror, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Yè De Mìng Míng Shù
description: In the blue and purple neon, under the dense steel sky, the front end of the data torrent is the world after the technological revolution, and it is also the boundary between reality and illusion. Steel and body, past and future. Here, the outer world and the inner world coexist, and everything in front of you is like a wall of time. Darkness gradually shrouded. But you have to understand, my friend, that we cannot deal with darkness with tenderness, but with fire.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Dokyuu Hentai HxEros
description:
In a world on the verge of a great disaster, heroes who, with the help of a device called HxEros, use the power of Ecchi (H) and erotic power (Ero) to save the planet from libido-devouring monsters!  
  
Five years ago, an unknown type of alien called "Censor Bugs" invaded the Earth. They plunder "H energy" in an attempt to evolve their own race and make mankind extinct. To save the Earth from this alien threat, high school boy Retto Enjo joins the "HxEros" team, partnering with four gorgeous high school girls; one of whom is his childhood friend Kirara Hoshino. However, it turns out that Kirara has changed her personality a lot which leads to an estrangement between the two childhood friends.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Kagurabachi
description: Young Chihiro spends his days training under his famous swordsmith father. One day he hopes to become a great sword-maker himself. The goofy father and the serious son--they thought these days would last forever. But suddenly, tragedy strikes. A dark day soaked in blood. Chihiro and his blade now live only for revenge.
tags: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Crime, Samurai, Mafia, Magic, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Imasara desu ga, Osananajimi wo Suki ni Natte Shimaimashita
description:
A manga adaptation of the [novel](https://note.com/saranami/) written by Maruto Fumiaki. The artist for this adaptation is Yom, the mangaka of *Ganbare, Douki-chan*.

_____________
**Links:**
- Buy the collected volume on [Melonbooks](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=2491232) or [Toranoana](https://ecs.toranoana.jp/tora/ec/item/040031176072/).
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: Arknights: 123 Rhodes Island!?
description: Get to know the operators with Amiya and the Doctor!
tags: Comedy, Video Games, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kyuubigitsune no Hanayome
description: Rasen is the eldest son of a historian, whose family has passed down the legend of the bride of the nine-tailed fox for generations. He was meant to be the heir, but due to his daily laziness, he is offered as a "bride" to the mountain where the nine-tailed fox is said to live. A man appears there, so beautiful that it seems unearthly, indistinguishable from a human except for his ears and tail. Just by making eye contact with the man, Rasen's body mysteriously tingles, and he can't help wanting to touch him and be touched by him. Soon after meeting him, Rasen loses his virginity to the nine-tailed fox. Furthermore, he learns that he is not a bride, but in fact a sacrifice...!?
tags: Historical, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Noyu Girl
description:
Hibari Otaka, whose hobby is to have a bath in such wild hot springs, travels alone around the country to visit them! You'll be fascinated by the unknown world of wild hot springs!

 (Source: Shogakukan, translated)
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Unaware His Majesty Is a Girl
description:
The new emperor, Qi Nian, acceded to the throne many years ago. He kept refusing the requests by his officials to choose a consort, brushing them off by saying "the affairs of state are important, and I am busy with my work". But Qi Nian finally relented as rumors that "the emperor is impotent" spread ever more widely.

Yu Dingdang was a particularly dim-witted girl, but born to a prestigious family. This led many to say: "Madame Yu exchanged her brain for her looks". Who could have expected that Yu would be selected by the emperor to be his empress consort?

A happy and dramatic girl-girl romantic comedy set in the imperial palace. Yu couldn't have expected that this lofty emperor up on high was actually a girl?!
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yeonwoo's Innocence
description:
Yeon Woo possesses such a delicate appearance that he could be mistaken as a female student. However, he has a secret crush on the school idol, Kang Haesol. But the shy and timid Yeon Woo has never said a word to her…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5483716), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=752532)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/yanyudechunqing/list?title_no=1786&page=1)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romance/yeonwoo/list?title_no=2335&page=1)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Kimi to Nara Koi wo Shite Mite mo
description:
Thanks to a past trauma, Amane, a high school student, has given up on the idea of seriously loving anyone.

On the first day of his new life in Enoshima, he met Ryuuji, a boy his age. Ryuuji happened to be Amane's type and he'd also like to hang out with him more. But what started out with light feelings is now beginning to change into something unexpected...
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life

name: Gakuen iDOLM@STER - Comic Anthology
description:
A comic anthology of the popular game "Gakuen iDOLM@STER Comic Anthology"! ! Contains 14 original manga overflowing with love for "Gakuen iDOLM@STER"!

Cover Illustration: Mana
tags: Comedy, Anthology, School Life, Adaptation

name: Super no Ura de Yani Suu Futari
description:
Sasaki, an overworked salaryman, goes through an average stressful day just for a single light at the end of the tunnel: Yamada, the always-cheerful clerk at his favorite convenience store. 

One day, Sasaki takes an extra amount of time at a company meeting, and by the time he gets to the convenience store Yamada has already clocked out. However, as he leaves, he notices a young woman with piercings smoking behind the store?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Manga UP!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/261)
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Souei Sousho
description: Shou, a young boy living in the red light district is suddenly taken to live in the imperial palace. He was selected to become the prince's shadow and act as his shield. In the palace where conspiracies swirl will Shou be able to protect himself and the prince?
tags: Historical, Comedy, Drama

name: Isekai Yakkyoku
description:
A young pharmacologist and researcher in Japan died from overworking, and was reincarnated in a Medieval Parallel Europe. He was reincarnated as a 10-year-old apprentice to a famous Royal Court pharmacist, had attained an inhuman skills of ability to see through disease, material creation, and material destruction.  
  
In a society in which dubious medical practice are rampant, price gouging thru the monopoly of the pharmacist guild, and good medicine aren't available to the commoners. He was recognized by the Emperor at that time and opened a Pharmacy at the corner of the town. He will wipe out the fraud that has swept the world, and deliver to the commoners a truly effective medicine that was developed using present day pharmacology. Thus the boy pharmacist will cheat by using his previous knowledge to create innovative medicines while helping the people of the parallel world, a story about living his new life to the fullest this time.
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Shinyuu no Musume ni Semarare Komatteimasu
description: Kiyoharu's predictable everyday life comes to an abrupt end when his best friend's daughter suddenly shows up, declares that she'll be living with him, and demands he make her his wife.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: I Just Want to Mooch off Your Luck
description: After being reborn, Zhao Mingxi had no choice but to mooch off of Fu group's young master's luck to avoid death by terminal illness. Although his ears would turn so red as if they're bleeding whenever he sees her, he still keeps up an act of prideful indifference: "Can you stop being so clingy?"  The next day, Zhao Mingxi really did leave to mooch off of someone else's luck. The small dog bowed his head down, and grumbled: "I'll let you cling to me, alright? Happy now?"
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Sanda
description:
In the year 2080, the world is like it is now, yet different. Government-arranged marriages, elaborate plastic surgery, and medical science are at the forefront of Japanese society.

Sanda Kazushige is a middle-school student who hasn't quite matured, despite being in the thralls of puberty. Put into a life-threatening situation by his classmate Fuyumura, Sanda discovers his uncanny ability to turn into a burly (and more grown) Santa Claus, and is thrown into a world of chaos to save his fellow students in only ways Santa Claus can do, while trying to solve the mysteries of the school he attends and the truth to where his supposedly-dead classmate Ono went.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Police, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Mujina into the Deep
description: Am I "necessary" in this world? What is the true nature of the person called "Mujina" who flies in the sky with a sword on her back in the midst of ordinary life? What is man, what is society, what are human rights, and what is happiness?
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Delinquents

name: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun
description: Hopeless pushover Iruma Suzuki has found himself in a devil of a predicament… His trashy parents have sold off his soul, and he now has to live and attend school in the Netherworld. But with his unique survival skills and doting demon grandfather’s support, Iruma will surely make it through this hellish experience. He’ll just need to subjugate rival classmates, summon familiars, and more, all while never revealing that he’s human… Easy as *aleph, bet, gimel*, right?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy

name: Release That Witch
description: A male engineer transmigrated into another world, and became a prince. This place strikingly resembles the Middle Ages of Europe, but at the same time, it seems kind of different? Witches truly exist, and they even possess magic powers! Magic powers are productive forces! Save the witches, liberate the productive forces! Open map, fight demons, break conspiracies, climb up the science and technology tree, and open the path of hardcore ‘farming’!
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Witch's Fantasy Cosmetics
description:
Welcome to the “Fantasy Cosmetics” shop where witches create a world full of dreams and magic.

Following a scent trail of flowers lies the “Charme Dresser” cosmetic shop. It is said that it grants wishes of those who visit with the use of “Fantasy Cosmetic” magic…

Drawn by the big hit illustrator meeco, these charming and fantastical cosmetics will make your heart flutter just by looking at them! A full-colour comic and illustration collection featuring short and unique stories of those who visit this store.

Strawberry quartz, Princess Grape extract and love fortune flower buds… adding these last touches to your own “fantasy”, it’s time to prepare your Fantasy Cosmetics.
tags: Fantasy, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Tsukiaitai Kareshi
description: Tobari, who has bad luck, finds himself in big trouble. It all starts when Saeki, the most popular guy in school, confesses his love to him in front of the whole school...!? Emuemuo's cute trouble love!!
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life

name: Botsuko-chan
description: "Botsu" as in "rejected/unused concept"
tags: Web Comic, Full Color

name: Fubar
description: A totally normal countryside story involving a minor, an autistic asian mom, an eldritch horror, and the unspeakable - A Fr*nchman
tags: Thriller, Self-Published, Horror, Mystery

name: Kyou mo Veranda de
description: A freelance designer loves to relax from work through gardening on his balcony. There he starts talking to his new neighbor next door over the wall without knowing her face.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Metsuki Warui Ko Kawaii Ko
description:
This delinquent is stupid cute!

High schooler Tanaka-kun believes that scary girls are actually cute. Thus, sitting next to the delinquent Mizuno-san he strives to get closer to her. However, in addition to having a scary expression, she's the subject of many rumors and feared by her classmates!!

Although getting the cold shoulder at first, Tanaka's feverish offensive opens Mizuno's heart up bit by bit. But Tanaka's plan to help her fit in with their classmates during the school festival is threatened when disaster strikes!

(Translation of the Volume 1 synopsis on Amazon by KasketBox)

A twitter short by @hamita1220
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: TenPuru -No One Can Live on Loneliness-
description: That's right, I'll become a monk! Not knowing what to do with his worldly desires, Akagami Akemitsu aims to live a stoic life. However, the thick karmic blood flowing in him will not permit it!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Pen to Wappa to Jijitsu-kon
description: A middle-aged detective, Eiji Kirisame (40), meets a strange high school girl at the scene of a certain crime. She doesn't speak a word, but she helps solve the case using her drawings. However, suddenly this middle-aged detective is getting a marriage proposal from this girl!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crime, Gore, Police, Mystery

name: Saikyou Onmyouji no Isekai Tenseiki: Geboku no Youkaidomo ni Kurabete Monster ga Yowai Sugirundaga
description:
Haruyoshi Kuga’s power as the strongest exorcist is all for naught when he is betrayed by his closest ally. With his dying breath, he casts the secret Spell of Reincarnation — when he next opens his eyes, he finds himself in a different world altogether, reincarnated as Seika Lamprogue, the son of a family of magic scholars!

He quickly learns that the magic in this new world is quite unlike the sorcery he learned in his past life and that he can’t use it. Fortunately for him, with his mastery of curses and the hordes of youkai at his disposal, he doesn’t need to. 

Haruyoshi (now Seika) is determined not to repeat his past mistakes in his second life by smartly laying low and avoiding flaunting his power. Yet accomplishing his goals and without drawing attention to himself proves to be easier said than done — will his powers be enough to live a happy life?! 

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-reincarnation-of-the-strongest-exorcist-in-another-world)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: The Menhera Rabbit Is Adored by the Yandere Wolf
description: A dangerous and twisted love between a menhera girl x yandere boy!? Tsumugi is a menhera girl who's been dumped by a string of boyfriends for being too clingy. Her last boyfriend got angry at her for sneakily looking through his phones and kicked her out of the house. And that's when Itoshi, the super kind younger guy who completely accepts her, comes to the rescue. His gentle comfort soothes Tsumugi's broken heart, however, there's something he's hiding...!?
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama

name: Yakuza ni Ofuro de Hatarakasaretemasu.
description:
Miyako Yamazumei, who grew up in a single-parent household, returns to her hometown for the first time in 10 years after the death of her father. Her father left Miyako with the public bathhouse that he cherished, and a debt of 10 million yen that he owed to the yakuza. Miyako and the yakuza money-lender are determined to rebuild the bathhouse to make it profitable again.

(Source: Natalie.mu, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Slice of Life

name: Tyranno
description:
Sexual violence tag is for chapter 1 only.

The setting is the year 202X, in Kamata, Ota Ward, Tokyo, which has become one of the world's leading entertainment districts due to the opening of the Kamata Line. The area attracts huge economic benefits and is surrounded by organized crime, foreign mafias, terrorists, smugglers, prostitution rings... and the hidden agendas of political, financial, and governmental power players. A newly assigned police officer, Nonogami, stationed at the station's front police box, feels despair over the corruption of power. However, with the overwhelming violence of "Tyranno," a massive female police officer, the cases begin to be solved.
tags: Action, Comedy, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Delinquents, Police

name: Takamori-kun o Damarasetai!!
description: Minamikawa-san, a girl with the ability to read minds is curious about the boy sitting next to her, Takamori-kun. It's because Takamori-kun's mind is so damn loud...!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Regression of the Close Combat Mage
description: When Vidrak the Death God invades and the fate of humanity hangs in the balance, the greatest mages of the realm stand in defiance… only to find that their spells have no effect, as the dark overlord effortlessly picks apart their attacks. Overwhelmed by a horde of monsters, long-range mage Setsuna Cromwell uses his last resort, the Amulet of Resurgence, to travel 10 years into the past. Now a freshman twice over, Setsuna must go against the grain by studying melee magic, known as the least prestigious domain – and the only one with a chance of defeating Vidrak.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Full Color

name: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai
description: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Soushi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Not found
description: Rintarou is a middle-aged actor, recently gaining popularity thanks to a BL part. How will Sonoda, his manager, react when a titty monster actress appears and tries to seduce the man he loves?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: Wind Breaker
description:
Jo Ja-Hyun (Jay) is the student president of Taeyang (Sunny) High. He is not just a smart student but an extreme biker with high techniques. As you follow his bike, you will meet his friends, love, and adventures.

---

**Contents:**
- **Season 1:** 65 Chapters + Prologue + Special (0-65)
- **Season 2.1:** 65 Chapters + Prologue (66-130)
- **Season 2.2:** 117 Chapters (131-257)
- **Season 3:** 128 Chapters (258-375)
- **Season 4:** 53 Chapters (Ongoing) (376-)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Bakuon!!
description:
Sakura Hane has to ride her bicycle up several steep hills just to get to her new high school. As she is desperately pedaling, she sees and hears a motorcycle zoom past her and instantly falls in love with it. It turns out that bike was driven by her new classmate Amano Onsa, one badass girl who decided to attend this school because of one reason, there is no policy against motorcycles. Not only that, there is apparently a motorcycle club on campus. Hane and Onsa instantly become friends and she is able to convince Hane to start riding a bike. Now the only thing Hane has to do is get a license...  

---
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/mimana_o)  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=17745)  
- [Anime on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=17959)
tags: Comedy, Sports, School Life

name: Red Blue
description: Suzuki Aoba, a gloomy, social outcast, is satisfied with his Highschool life though he occasionally gets beaten up by his classmate Iwase Sannosuke in "play-fights". One day, Aoba is saved from a "play-fight" by none other than Akasawa Kenshin, a boy from the class next door and the rising rookie superstar sensation of the MMA world. However, Kenshin wonders aloud if Aoba feels empty when Aoba states that he doesn't have a dream, which Aoba doesn't react to kindly. He vows to land one punch on Kenshin in the future. Aobas joins the Shark Gym lead by the sloppy Kanenari Tokiwa to achieve his dream of besting Kenshin.
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, School Life

name: My Intern Bullied Me Again!
description: Referred to as “The Cobra” by her employees, art director Lu Meihe appears to most as a strict and callous boss but she is actually rather innocent at heart. She has a secret crush on her intern Lin Wenjing, but because of her public image, she cannot express her feelings openly and instead pours them into the sketchbook she always carries with her. One day, she accidentally leaves the sketchbook behind only for it to be discovered by Lin Wenjing. Lu Meihe soon realizes that while Lin Wenjing may seem gentle and carefree, she may actually be hiding a secret persona of her own. Today my intern bullied me again, I’m so happy I don’t know what to do!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Chijou 100-kai
description:
21st Century, Tokyo. People called “challengers” are gambling their life trying to escape from the state-owned 
100 Story Tower to win 10 billion yen. 
But what will happen when Tatsuki Kuroumi awakes at this tower without remembering anything about his prior life, 
including entering the tower as challenger?
tags: Action, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Mystery

name: The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity
description:
In a certain place, there are two neighboring high schools. Chidori High School, a bottom-feeder boys' school where idiots gather, and Kikyo Girls' School, a well-established girls' school. Rintaro Tsumugi, a strong and quiet second year student at Chidori High School, meets Kaoruko Waguri, a girl who comes as a customer while helping out at his family's cake shop. Rintaro feels comfortable spending time with Kaoruko, but she is a student at Kikyo Girls, a neighboring school that thoroughly dislikes Chidori High.
___
**Links:**
- [Official Twitter (JP)](https://twitter.com/kaoruhana_mp)
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10023/episode/320130) (U.S. Only | Simulpub)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Death Note
description:
A shinigami, as a god of death, can kill any person—provided they see their victim's face and write their victim's name in a notebook called a Death Note. One day, Ryuk, bored by the shinigami lifestyle and interested in seeing how a human would use a Death Note, drops one into the human realm.  
  
High school student and prodigy Light Yagami stumbles upon the Death Note and—since he deplores the state of the world—tests the deadly notebook by writing a criminal's name in it. When the criminal dies immediately following his experiment with the Death Note, Light is greatly surprised and quickly recognizes how devastating the power that has fallen into his hands could be.  
  
With this divine capability, Light decides to extinguish all criminals in order to build a new world where crime does not exist and people worship him as a god. Police, however, quickly discover that a serial killer is targeting criminals and, consequently, try to apprehend the culprit. To do this, the Japanese investigators count on the assistance of the best detective in the world: a young and eccentric man known only by the name of L.
tags: Thriller, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Crime, Survival, Office Workers, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
description: Kazuma Sato is a video game-loving shut-in-or at least he was, until a humiliating traffic accident brings his young life to an untimely end. But after his death, a beautiful girl claiming to be a goddess invites him to enter another world and gain some respectable perks in the process. But Kazuma’s choice is going to have serious consequences for the goddess and the dead man alike…
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Zombies, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Player
description:
Through posting a "Best Comment", I somehow became the main character of a webtoon!

---

- BGM done by [<Team MSD>](https://www.youtube.com/c/TeamMSD/search?query=%ED%94%8C%EB%A0%88%EC%9D%B4%EC%96%B4)

tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: 12 Suicidal Children
description: The story is a locked-room mystery where 12 kids go into an abandoned hospital to give up on life. In the room where they meet, a boy is already lying dead, and no one knows who he is.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Baili Jin Among Mortals
description:
Baili Jin, a fairy who was living in heaven, eating and drinking without a care, broke her Majesty’s colourful, stained-glass plate at her birthday and got banished to the mortal realm. Now she has to begin her adventures in the mortal realm with all of her spiritual powers gone! In order to survive, the former fairy has to deliver take-out….  
  
An endearingly silly fairy, a gentle restaurant manager, a reserved top student and a hard to resist yandere onee-san (kind on the outside, dark/possessive on the inside) , let the story of their beautiful friendship and youthful days begin!  
  
Author's weibo: [@Viva喂娃酱](https://weibo.com/vivaandjulys)   
Artist's weibo: [@Julys橘奶司](https://weibo.com/julys0723)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Yume de Furarete Hajimaru Yuri
description:
For your very average high school girl, Tsukushi, there's her cool and beautiful childhood friend (with some very particular weaknesses) Hinoka. Tsukushi always thought they would be normal childhood friends forever… That is until Tsukushi saw Hinoka rejected her confession in a dream.   The hypnagogic romantic comedy between a cheery maiden, and a cool girl which begins with a dream, starts right now!

 [Serialization of Popular Twitter manga by Hijiki](https://mangadex.org/title/088db207-6c42-4fa9-9e6f-1b831c21c1ac/a-yuri-manga-that-starts-with-getting-rejected-in-a-dream)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Modern MoGal
description:
The daily experiences of modern monster girls.   
  
Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821), uploaded to MangaDex with permission.
tags: Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Keep Your Hands Off Eizouken!
description:
Asakusa Midori wants to create an anime, but she's too disheartened to make that first step by herself. But by pure chance, she meets Mizusaki Tsubame, an up-and-coming socialite secretly dreaming of becoming an animator. Together with Midori's money-loving best friend Kanamori Sayaka, the energetic trio slowly work towards making their "ultimate world" a reality!
___
**Additional Links:**  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Official Anime Twitter](https://twitter.com/Eizouken_anime)
- [Official Anime Website](http://eizouken-anime.com/)
- [Official Live-Action Website](https://eizouken-saikyo.com/)
tags: Comedy, Adventure, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Ani no Yome to Kurashite Imasu.
description:
Since the death of her brother, seventeen year-old Shino Kishibe has been living with her sister-in-law Nozomi. Nozomi wants to be a person Shino can lean on, while Shino is determined not to be a burden. Together the orphaned high-schooler and young widow try to support one another while carrying on with their everyday lives.  
  


---

name: Bunny Girl and the Cult
description: Strange bunny girls have been appearing all over the city, attempting to recruit people into a mysterious cult known as "The Warren Divine".

name: Clinic of Horrors
description: In a strange city, there is a clinic that will treat the victims of horrific diseases. For a price.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Medical, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Demon Prince & the Salaryman
description: A salaryman summons Astaroth, a Prince of Hell, to help him stop getting bullied at work.
tags: Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Weile Fuhuo Anlian De Shi Zun Wo Bei Po Kaile Hougong
description: Not found

name: Pest ga Aketara Asobimashou! ~Chuusei Europa Sekai to Gendai Bunmei Slow Life~
description: In 14th Century Middle Age Europe, the spread of the Black Plague has led baker Rachel Becker to move from the city to a village. There, she meets Ema Müller, a "witch" who claims to come from "another world" 700 years into the future, bringing with her modern technology that feels like "magic" to the people of the middle ages...
tags: Time Travel, Comedy, Girls' Love, Isekai, Slice of Life

name: Meme Girls
description: Memes, gaming consoles, and websites turned into anime girls! Please enjoy this compilation of meme comics, oneshots, and shorts from the team behind Merryweather Comics!
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Anthology, Self-Published, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Winter Moon
description: A gay sorceror and a seductive priestess cross paths in an Online RPG.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Link Click
description: Sitting in a corner of the city is a seemingly normal shop called 'Time Photo Studio'. The shop owners, Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang, can dive back in time through photos. One day, an uprising star in the Chinese opera world — Lin Kai — visited the studio and tasked Cheng Xiaoshi and Lu Guang to find a cassette tape from 10 years ago. They only have one photo, and one chance...
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Tale of a Scribe Who Retires to the Countryside
description:
A scholar who failed the national exams is picked up by a martial arts master and given the task to record his life into a book. Through their journey, Son Bin meets many great people and soon finds himself following the same path as the master, as the Martial Arts King.   

---

name: 1-Nen Inai ni Ojousama o Kouryaku Suru Maid no Ohanashi
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: The Red Knight Seeks No Reward
description:
The Imperial Knight Judith was once a scumbag who would do anything for money. She lived as a slave to money as a dog of the imperial family and a tool of her commander. Under the guise of destitution, she abandoned her guilt. But what was at the end was betrayal and death.

However, when she opened her eyes, she went back to being a new knight after six years?

'I'm not going to be a swordsman for money anymore!'

In front of Judith, who is determined to live a different life than before, the commander of the Red Knights and scouts appears...

"I assure you that you will be treated fairly. Why don't you join the Red Knights?"

Judith decided not to pursue money blindly as a Red Knight, abandoning her past of being a Black Knight. Can she live this life without regret?

---
After dying at the hands of her backstabbing superior, money-grubbing Judith learned the hard way that bounty is never worth bloodshed. When she somehow finds herself alive and well, six years prior to her death, she decides to use her second chance at life to abandon her greed and become a genuine knight. She begins by accepting Captain Kaillou Lewalmeigh's offer to join the honorable Order of Red Knights. Will Judith be able to redeem herself by overcoming the wrongdoings of her past?

---
