name: Ghost Hammer (Pre-Serialization)
description:
The Hellish Romantic Adventure of Apprentice Angel Yu Dante. 

Pre-Serialization work.
#Fantasy #Action #Worldbuilding #SuperpowerBattleSeries #ShonenRoyalRoad
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: A Rogue Guard in a Medieval Fantasy
description: In a brutal, lawless medieval world where war and poverty reign, and twisted magic defies all reason, the captain of the guards grinds through another grueling day, pushing his battered body to the limit in a land where survival itself is a merciless test.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Hardcore Leveling Warrior: Earth Game
description:
"I’m... back!"

After a comet collides on Earth, a gaming world filled with monsters and dungeons becomes a reality. Amidst the chaos, Gong Won-Ho wakes up as Hardcore Leveling Warrior, an almighty game character with exceptional luck and power.

Once again, he will embark on a journey to become the strongest... but this time, on Earth!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Web Comic, Full Color

name: How to Survive Restructuring
description: The moment the company receives notice of a person subject to restructuring, With a roaring sound as if the sky had collapsed. And the world has changed. [The sale of this district has been decided.] [This will result in a workforce restructuring.] Restructuring for Lives Missions that you can capture to gain special powers If it's a miraculous prank, I'll do my best for it! "I found it. A way to live together." Restructuring candidate Lee Eunho's super-fast promotion starts now!
tags: Official Colored, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Blue Archive - BlueSechi's 4-Koma (Doujinshi)
description: Short comics from the animator BlueSechi based around their [Blue Archive animations](https://www.youtube.com/@BlueSechi).
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Doujinshi, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

description:
As soon as he entered high school, Shiki Koshiyama was invited to the mysterious "Quiz Study Group" led by his senpai. What will Shiki run into when being dragged along by his classmate Mari into the dazzling world of competitive quizzes?! 

Get ready for a manga that features fierce quiz competitions!
tags: Comedy, Sports, School Life

name: A Sharp-Eyed Classmate
description:
With her fierce eyes and sharp impression, and wary of everyone, 'Ahn Se-young' is a woman to watch out for.
Everyone is cautious around her, but a lone boy stands in front of her.
"I like you, go out with me!"
"......What?!"
Se-young is taken aback at the sudden confession of love, but this was just the beginning...
The tug-of-war between 'Ahn Se-young', who shows an unexpected side to her as you get closer, and 'Nam Ho-yeol', the straightforward guy who tries to break down her impenetrable facade, begins now!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Special Civil Servant
description: Socially-awkward Maru Han bombs his fifth attempt at getting a dream job in the civil service. But after a strange creature attacks him in the mountains, he finds himself recruited into the Special Civil Service for the Ministry of Environment. This secret organization is dedicated to fighting nachal, human-devouring demons who appear in clouds of yellow dust. As Maru struggles in his new job fighting nachal, he must find out why they're mysteriously drawn to him before the prophesied end of the world arrives.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Chronicles of the Reincarnated Demon God
description:
The Junior Heavenly Demon, Yeon Woon-hwi, was born without a dantian.

However, through dark arts and his shitty personality— er, preternatural ability, he became the junior lord of the Heavenly Demon Cult.

He was a man of many epithets:

‘Great Sorcerer of the Dark Arts’

'King of the Wandering Lost Souls’

But the people’s assessment of him was simple:

“If he smiles, run as fast as you can. His smile is a death sentence.”

“Catch his eye, for he shall provide you with lifelong protection. That is, if you can.”

He was living the good life, when suddenly, he was betrayed in a coup led by the vice-lord and elders of his cult.

“You seem to have forgotten what kind of person I am, Uncle. So die. All of you."

Using the holy relic of the first Heavenly Demon, he self-destructed, taking the traitors with him. And then, he opened his eyes to the most unexpected of places...

"I'm in the Tang Clan? And a branch family at that?"

He awoke as Tang Woon-hwi, an illegitimate son of the Nine Dragon Branch Family, a subset of the Sichuan Tang Clan.

Will Woon-hwi be able to find his master, bring together his scattered followers, and rebuild the Heavenly Demon Cult?
tags: Reincarnation, Official Colored, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Adaptation

name: Genkai Dokushin Joshi (26) Gohan
description: Hiiragi-san is a single woman who is exhausted from work and life. No matter how depressed she is, she always ends up hungry.
tags: Psychological, Comedy, Philosophical, Slice of Life

name: Wu Liu Qi: Heibai Shuanglong
description: Mo Lang, a bad boy, and Bai Qi, his genius friend, lived a quiet life in a village in the distant country of Niuzhan. Until one day, a mysterious assassin from the country of Xuanwu appears, who completely subverts their lives, forcing the two youngsters to embark on an adventure that will change the world. The manhua is a prequel to the animated series Scissor Seven, chronicling events from before the original series.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Flower of Youth
description: "Pob, Pob Panus," a renowned solo female artist with an impeccable reputation. However, deep in her heart, Pob has been longing for her first love that faded away many years ago. And that love is "Kan, Kan Thiwa," who once promised to become a singer alongside her. One day, Pob encounters Kan again... as a flower shop owner and a single mother?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Music, Full Color

name: Zig the Blacksmith
description: Having lost his ranked account to a hacker, Kang Yoohan wants to get even. Assuming his lost equipment was sold, he’s hoping that as blacksmith Zig, it will come back to him through repairs and lead him to the hacker. After breaking many swords, however, he finds this is no walk in the park. Thankfully, he’s able to see cracks in the equipment and enemies that show their vital points to make or break them! Armed with these skills, Zig is looking to get things shaking, or rather, smithing!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Bocchi Tenseiki
description:
I don't trust any human being.

An unemployed, virgin 29-years-old Loner man who has a very deep distrust toward humans was trying to save a woman who was almost raped. He is stabbed in the chest by the assaulter and left to die alone while cursing the humans. When he came to, he realized that he had reincarnated in another world as the second son of a lower noble family where magic and spirit exist as a human baby named Ash Hawkwood.

Without talent for [True Magic] or [Swordmanship] this the story about how he build his own empire from scratch by using his own power.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Adaptation

name: Vampire Princess Miyu: Saku
description: A half-human, half-vampire girl named Miyu is trapped in a body that will remain a teenager forever. As a vampire, it is her duty to hunt down demonic beings known as Shinma who have wandered into the human world and send them back to the Darkness. The new story begins with Miyu transferring to a certain middle school.
tags: School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural

name: The Secret of the Partner Next to You
description: Yang Kiryong is an ordinary high school boy who has a classmate named Yoo Jae-Kyung, who is somewhat clumsy and clueless. Both have a very good friendship, but without any kind of love attraction. Until one day, by chance, Kiryong discovered the deepest secret of his friend and because of this his heart began to beat, will it be beats of fear or love?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Ennui
description:
Is the terrible heartache caused by a distant lover? Or is it the ties and obsession that follow along, like love that won't come true...?
*From the same author of Missing Love: The Marrying Man
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: The Two-Faced Heroine is Obsessed with Marking Me
description:
A scheming, manipulative alpha pretending to be an omega × an omega pretending to be a cool-but-cowardly alpha

Gu Yu, who was originally a top-designer at a high-end bespoke fashion boutique, happened to read an ABO novel without purchasing a subscription. Shortly after, she was inexplicably forced to transmigrate into the story. Worst of all—she became the novel's evil side character, a fake alpha who was actually an omega, left to the grim fate of being burned alive by the heroine for abusing her. As she stared at the blackened "two-faced" heroine Su Yue kneeling in the rain outside, Gu Yu felt completely devastated.

To save her life, Gu Yu decided to risk acting out of character and she secretly—yet while openly caring for the female lead—designed the most beautiful and unique evening gown in the world for her, clung onto her tightly, provided her with resources, helped her dominate the entertainment industry, and reclaim everything that was rightfully hers. But Gu Yu never expected that the "innocent little princess" she had been caring for so preciously not only turned out to be a fake omega, but an alpha! This wasn’t how the story was supposed to go! Believing her days were numbered, Gu Yu waited for her impending death in despair. However, Su Yue, exuding a strong red wine-scented pheromone—pinned Gu Yu down and whispered, “Are you prepared to be marked by me?” That familiar voice rang in Gu Yu’s ears, completely disrupting her soft heart.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Komi-san wa Komyushou Desu.
description:
Komi-san is a beautiful and admirable girl that no one can take their eyes off of. Almost the whole school sees her as the cold beauty that's out of their league, but Tadano Hitohito knows the truth: she's just really bad at communicating with others.

Komi-san, who wishes to fix this bad habit of hers, tries to improve it with the help of Tadano-kun by achieving her goal of having 100 friends.
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: My Wife Is From a Thousand Years Ago
description: Jiang He, a girl from the Tang Dynasty, traveled through a thousand years and appeared in front of Xu Qing. Fate brought together this love that spanned a thousand years. Everything the girl was familiar with has become history. Relatives, friends, and enemies have all been left behind 1,200 years ago. The boy is unreserved and leads the girl to start a new life. Pain, confusion, cheers, and laughter will remain in this new world.
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Swordsman Romance
description:
140 years ago in Kyoto, with the coming of the American "Black Ships," there arose a warrior who, felling men with his bloodstained blade, gained the name Hitokiri, man slayer! His killer blade helped close the turbulent Bakumatsu era and slashed open the progressive age known as Meiji . Then he vanished, and with the flow of years, became legend.  
  
Ten years later, a young woman's life is saved when she happens upon a strange wandering swordsman named Kenshin. The young woman accepts the wanderer into her dojo, despite his secretive past, and the two become fast friends. As their relationship grows, they meet and make more friends (as well as enemies), and they grow accustomed to their life together.  
  
However, one man can only run from his past for so long, and it isn't long before Kenshin is forced to face the life he thought he'd left behind. Now, together with his friends, he must fight the ghosts of his past if he wants the people he loves to have any kind of future.  
  
Contains a side story called Yahiko no Sakabato.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Samurai X** (2001)
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Samurai, Drama

name: Seton Academy: Join the Pack!
description: Seton Academy, a school full of animals where, thanks to population decline, there are fewer humans than any other creature. Mazama Jin, an animal hater and the only human male in his class, falls in love with Hino Hitomi, the only female human, the moment he lays eyes on her. However he soon finds himself entangled with various other creatures after he reluctantly joins the 'pack' of Lanka the wolf, the only other member of her pack.
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Isekai de Kekkon Soudansho Hajimemashita
description: Mien Sotono, who works at a marriage counseling agency, is trying to protect a couple who have arranged a marriage and is hit by a car. And when she woke up, she found herself in a different world filled with values different from modern times!! Mien opens a marriage counseling agency in order to survive, but “marriage hunting” is extremely difficult in a world with different cultures and common sense. Is it in hard mode…!?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: N
description:
My vision and my heart were completely taken over by "N."

The case of five missing junior high school boys. The massacre of an entire elementary school class. A car crash resulting in the deaths of two people. The letter "N" was left at each of these crime scenes.

An urban legend circulates, suggesting the main culprit is "N," a religious group thought to have collapsed 2,000 years ago.

What exactly is "N"?
tags: Psychological, Crime, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: I'll Try to End the Male Lead
description:
I, Kwon Jinha, began feeling sick after reading a romance novel.

I became connected to all the emotions and sensations of the female lead, Elvi.

I even went to the hospital due to severe pain and sorrow but the result said there’s nothing wrong with my body.

So, I ended up sending an email to the novel’s author, begging for the male lead to stop tormenting the female lead. But instead, all I got was a happy reply...

“Do your job properly, Elvi”.

I found myself possessing Elvi’s body in the novel.

I got slapped by the male lead as soon as I possessed Elvi’s body, upon that, I had only one thought.

“The male lead? It’s over if I kill him, right?”
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Uzaki-chan wa Asobitai!
description:
Annoying! Cute! But Annoying!  Shinichi Sakurai is a grumpy-faced, athletic and quiet college student who just wants to be left alone,  but he is frequently teased by his cute, stacked underclassman Hana Uzaki, whom he has known since high school.     Sugoi Dekai means something along the lines of "impressively huge."
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raws: [KADOComi](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_004657_S?episodeType=first), [KADOKAWA](https://promo.kadokawa.co.jp/uzakichan/)
- [Official X](https://x.com/uzakichan_asobi)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Koi yori Aoku
description:
Takamine, who can't find anything she likes, and Sakikura, who loves books. The two girls meet by chance and spend their after-school hours together. Are they friends? Or is it a nameless relationship spun between the two girls?

------------
Note: Serialization of the oneshot of same title by Fukaumi Kon in COMIC Ogyaaa!! published by Homesha.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Little Shark's Outings
description:
The adventures of a baby shark in nostalgia-filled Yauo Town. 

Cider on a summer day, freeze pops, radio calisthenics, festival stalls, and hanging out with friends. The world sparkles when reflected in the eyes of the baby shark.

A little retro, a little wistful, and the warmest short comic!
tags: Animals, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Rewriting My Third Life
description: After being abused and killed by her family in two separate lifetimes, Blesse Lavian expects nothing from them in her third life. This time, despite knowing the horrible end that awaits House Lavian, Blesse decides to keep quiet and flee when the time is right. But the more time she spends with her cold-looking father and half-sister, the more she realizes that the Lavians aren't so bad after all. Will Blesse take a chance and rewrite her third life, or will she end up betrayed once again?
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Villainous Duke's Daughter's Special Method of Growing Rice
description: When you transmigrate into a novel as the villainess destined to die, there are different ways to survive: flirting with the male lead, learning to fight, or finding happiness elsewhere—but not Erica! She has decided to become a successful rice farmer just like in her past life! What follows is an epic (and rather surreal) quest to find the last rice seeds in the world, tame a giant rabbit magic beast, recruit magicians to water the fields, and—Wait, did she just turn the Holy Sword into a hoe?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: Like Blue Like Summer
description:
《This is a story about the time I spent with that person, which was as quick as a blink of an eye, but which I will never forget.》

Dan was the basketball club's first-year ace and had been drawing attention from the club.

However, with the IH approaching, he was injured and needed a month and a half to recover, and now he was in the depths of despair.

He tried to attend club activities for the first time in a while, but felt uncomfortable, and just as he was about to leave, he was harassed by some delinquents.

Then, Kaito, a third-year student he had never met, suddenly appeared, helped him and asked him to come to the art club after school...!?

[Innocent basketball boy x mysterious art club member], an unforgettable summer love begins, a fresh depiction of the youth and struggles of a high school boy.
tags: Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Monster Girls

name: Level One Dreamers
description: Although Captain is handsome, kind, and good at sports, he’s also an avid gamer. That’s the reason why Kiss decided to start learning how to play games in hopes of winning over the senior she has a crush on. However, this turned out to be the beginning of an unexpected online relationship between Kiss and Miguel, who is secretly the world's number one pro player!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Sports, Video Games, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Studio Cabana
description: Yukari Maki, a diligent high school girl. One day, she spots her classmate, Yusuke Kusaka, who was rumored to be a delinquent, singing a love song. Never having imagined such a sweet, yet sad, singing voice could come from him, Yukari was instantly captivated—without knowing that it would soon be the beginning of a sad, unrequited love.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Music

name: Sensei to Seito wa, Ai wo Shiranai.
description: “The person I loved the most in the world turned out not to love me at all. I had no choice but to hate that person.” This is a story about two people who don't know how to love and gradually become attracted to each other.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life

name: Deriwo no Oshigoto
description: "I wanted to understand my oshi's feelings." ― Sakurako, a shut-in otaku, called a call boy and tried to perform a sexual act for the first time in her life. However, just before the act, Sakurako became afraid, and in her rush, she accidentally revealed an eroge she was in the middle of playing, causing her to panic! Having her fetish revealed to the extroverted and handsome call boy Fuji-kun, she becomes embarrassed, but as she despairs, it's revealed that Fuji-kun was an otaku comrade as well...? This is a pure oshikatsu love story between an otaku girl and a call boy!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Yuki-chan, Aishiteru!
description:
"Hold me a lot today too" "Yuki-chan...!!!!!"
Haru and Yuki are childhood friends and are currently lovingly living together.
Even though we've been closer than anyone since we were little and have been together for such a long time, our love for each other is bottomless.
I want to be tight, and I want to have sex!
However, there were many conflicts before they came here... We will deliver the precious daily life of these two in full emotional style.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Azur Lane 4-koma: Slow Ahead!
description: Official 4-koma webcomic from the popular mobile game Azur Lane.
tags: Comedy, Video Games, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: The Infinite Mage
description:
After Sirone was abandoned in a stable, he was found by a family of hunters and raised in a loving home. 

Despite the hardships of the peasant life, he learned how to read from a young age and became obsessed with books, especially ones on the history of magic. One day, he has an unlikely encounter with a mage and learns how to enter the "spirit zone," the first step to learning how to use magic. 

Although they say only nobles can be mages, will Sirone be able to prove his infinite potential?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: My Dearest Self With Malice Aforethought
description: Urashima Eiji, a college student, goes to sleep after a fun drinking night with his friends. When he wakes up he discovers a beautiful girl next to him who treats him as if they are in a loving relationship. Later, Eiji finds out that 4 days have passed since he went out with his crew. What did he do during all that time and why does he have no memory of it? By confronting that reality, he will be caught in tragedy…
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: The Story of My Village
description: A story based on real-life events in 1966. The Sanrizuka Struggle told from the perspective of the peasants fighting for their land.
tags: Historical, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Hilde Takes House Arpeggio
description:
"I was a noble this whole time?!"

Hilde, a commoner who works at a restaurant in the village, is suddenly notified by a handsome man named Logan that she is a family member of one of the empire's four duchies and hears that her mother 'Lucia Arpeggio' was a powerful mage in the past.

Duke Arpeggio offers to make her an official member of the family if she can prove that she has strong magical powers, and Hilde accepts in order to escape from her oppressed commoner livelihood and enjoy a comfortable life.

However, her excitement doesn't last long… Culture, magic, history, literature, etc. The number of things nobles needed to learn were endless! In addition, forget about welcoming Hilde, her family members only sent her cold looks and even put her life in danger…

"You've left me with no choice. I, a former commoner, will be taking over this duchy!"
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I Raise Skeletons
description:
A necromancer is a profession considered the noble of nobles, with less than 1,000 in the population worldwide! I was born with a diamond spoon, no, a necromancer spoon in my mouth! 

... Or so I thought. 

"I’m just a defective necromancer." 
*Using skill, [Summon Ordinary Skeleton (E-Rank)].*

You'd think a necromancer should be able to summon liches, Dullahans, or death knights. But nope, I can only summon skeletons. But then one day, suddenly… 

[Hidden condition achieved!]
[Condition: The 10,000 Uses Rule]
[Your rank has upgraded to D-rank!] 

I achieved the hidden condition and gained the ability to raise my skeletons. From E-rank to S-rank! 

The story of Joo Donghoon unfolds, the world's only cursed necromancer, who’s speeding toward becoming a ranker!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kirawaremono no Tenisha wa, Demodotta Isekai de Dekiaisareru
description:
Thirteen-year-old Towa, suffering from a severe case of "Chuunibyou" syndrome, is suddenly transported to another world. Although he is a rare foreigner in the new land, he has yet to manifest his "gift"—a unique ability granted only to otherworlders. To hide his lack of powers, he puts on an arrogant front, which ended up pushing away even the person he secretly admired, his own guard knight, Griz. One day, he was attacked from behind. "I’ve been killed!" he thought—only to wake up back in his original world.

Fifteen years passed, and he lived a mundane life as an ordinary office worker, haunted by memories of Griz. Then, he suddenly found himself lost in that other world once again! Determined to live a quiet life this time, but for some reason, Griz, whom he's reunited with, keeps closing the distance between them...?
tags: Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy

name: Ghost Story Club (Remake)
description:
Lee Joon was an ordinary high school student.

During the entrance ceremony, he was caught up in a strange phenomenon and died.

[You have died.] [Restarting from checkpoint.] [Loading…]

But then, a message appeared before his eyes.

『Congratulations on your acceptance at Nakseong Highschool, the school of secrets and mysteries. Uncover the shady secrets hidden within the school, or fight against the legends and ghost stories of the campus in order to earn points to unlock special abilities. Additionally, you must gather comrades to prevent the resurrection of the Demon King before graduation. The world is in your hands.』
tags: Long Strip, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Blue Box
description:
Taiki Inomata is on the boys' badminton team at sports powerhouse Eimei Junior and Senior High. He's in love with basketball player Chinatsu Kano, the older girl he trains alongside every morning in the gym. One Spring day, their relationship takes a sharp turn ... And thus begins this brand-new series of love, sports and youth!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2023)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Guilty Circle
description: April! Sawaya Doji's college life at his dream school of Seio University starts with an encounter with the beautiful Kaede Hoshimi during the club recruiting fair. Sawaya believes that if he goes to Tokyo... if he joins a university... if he joins a club, he can get a girlfriend! It's a great way to meet new people, but what kind of club has he gotten himself into?
tags: Sexual Violence, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Dungeon Reset
description: Dawoon's ordinary life is turned upside down when he is summoned into the Dungeon, where he must play a deadly game, outlasting dangerous monsters and life-threatening traps. To make matters worse, he's only a mere crafter with zero combat abilities. But after Dawoon falls into a trap and survives after a glitched reset, he's gained random but oddly helpful skills. He'll need to get creative to clear the game and return home, with a bloodthirsty assistant and an adorable ground squirrel along for the ride. Now that the rules no longer apply to him, what possibilities await in the tunnels below.
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Cooking, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Grand Warlock Streamer
description:
Jung Hyunwoo is just an unlucky gamer barely making ends meet in the VR game "God Wars." He even ends up losing access to his game account due to a horrible accident and is forced to create a new character. 

In the process, he discovers that he has an ability that allows him to see hidden information in the game, which leads him to become a Grand Warlock. 

Now equipped with a mind-blowing skill and a legendary class, all that's left is for him to level up and go from zero to hero...

---

- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_7M4wH6g1eI)
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Keikenzumi na Kimi to, Keiken Zero na Ore ga, Otsukiai Suru Hanashi
description:
Ryuuto Kashima is a gloomy high school student. Because of a punishment game, he was forced to confess to Runa Shirakawa, a girl from the top of school caste and admired by everyone. They ended up going out for the unexpected reason of "Err, I'm free now so..." but, Ryuuto ends up following and eavesdropping Runa getting confessed by a handsome soccer club member, and Runa bringing Ryuuto, whom she just started dating, to her own room as a matter of course. 

They have different friends and ways to have fun, different in just about everything. And yet, surprised by their differences everyday, accepting it, they begin to relate with each other.
___
**Character Designer:** [magako](https://mangadex.org/author/fd30d521-18ba-4638-94c3-700858ce7c43)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Sousei no Onmyouji
description:
Rokuro Enmado is from a family of exorcists who remove evil Kegare, but his real dream is to be a singer, a soccer player, or anything other than an exorcist. When another exorcist, a girl named Benio Adashino arrives, Rokura is suddenly inflamed with competitive spirit and decides to put his natural knack to good use. Their rivalry gets more complicated when they both learn they are the destined "Twin Star Exorcists," two ultimate fighters fated to marry and create the prophesied child who will eliminate all the Kegare in the world.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Twin Star Exorcists** (2019)
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy, Gyaru

name: Trinity of the Royal Palace
description: In the Kingdom of Wardell Ceram, a realm rich in flowers and trees, the charming duo of Luca and Sylvain live outside the law. As the Wolf Claws, they are a chivalrous thieves who target those nobles who commit evil deeds. Their deeds bring them to the attention of the Kingdom's Princess, who wants to recruit them for a very special task. A romantic comedy about love that transcends class!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Magic, Fantasy

name: Bocchi the Rock! Gaiden:  Kikuri Hiroi's Heavy Drinking Diary
description:
25 years old Kikuri Hiroi is a "genius bassist" who leads the indie band "SICK HACK" and loves alcohol. 
She often gets drunk and breaks the equipment inside concert clubs, so she's often short of money. 
She lives in a 52-year-old bathless apartment so she borrows showers from her friends sometimes. 
Regularly attacked by anxiety about her future, she counters that with a alcohol-fueled "happiness spiral". 
What is her daily life like...?!
tags: Comedy, Survival, Slice of Life, Music

name: The Seven Deadly Sins: Four Knights of the Apocalypse
description: Percival, a kind boy, lives with his grandfather in a remote place called "God's Finger". However, the world will not allow him to live in peace. An encounter with a mysterious knight changes their fate, and a shocking secret is revealed. The boy sets out on an endless journey. Whether you know "The Seven Deadly Sins" or not, you can still enjoy it! The world's most awaited adventure fantasy!
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Demonic Emperor
description:
Because he had the heritage of the ancient Demonic Emperor, Demonic Emperor Zhuo Yifan met the misfortune of being betrayed and killed by his trusted disciple. After being reborn, his cultivation went back to zero and he was trapped by a heart demon, given no choice but to become the housekeeper of the Luo Family's lone eldest miss. From being a Magic Emperor to being an insignificant housekeeper, how would he get along with his "heart demon eldest miss" and what power would he gain in order to lead himself and the declining family to rise back to the peak of the continent!


---

**Note:** 魔 can mean "magic" and "demon", while 管家 can mean "butler" and "housekeeper". I'm not sure as to why the previous translator decided to use "Magic" when it's a cultivation world, but I'll just follow. And Zhou Fan never does the work of a housekeeper throughout the manhua.

---

[Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/the-servant-is-the-demon-king/info)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Ryuroden
description:
Middle schoolers, Shiro and Masumi, encountered a mysterious dragon that brought them back to the time of the Three Kingdoms; situated in ancient China. As soon as they arrived, they were rescued by the Han Kingdom. Not long after these events, Masumi was kidnapped and Shiro barely escaped death… Soon the story gets more complicated as they are stuck in the past.  
  
In 1997, Ryuurouden won the Kodansha Manga Award for shōnen manga.
tags: Award Winning, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Isekai de Haishin Katsudou wo Shitara Tairyou no Yandere Shinja wo Umidashite Shimatta Ken
description: Living in Ataraxia, a world of swords and magic, a reincarnated individual decided to make a living out of streaming. Living in a world where such a thing did not exist despite the many forms of entertainment, he quickly made a name for himself. This is not the tale of just a streamer... but of a boy who becomes a legend as a haishinsha.
tags: Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: GhostBlade
description:
Long, long ago in Neraland, the pious human built a great tower to show the respect to their Goddess Nera.  
Goddess Nera was deeply moved by human piety; to reward them, she opened a door at the top of the tower. This ethereal door connected to another world; it was known as *Heaven's Eye*.  
However…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Bukuro Kicks
description: The setting is Tokyo. Rumors are going around Tokyo of a prize of ten million for beating "Gyokutei Shinjuku" at blind soccer, and blind soccer experiences a sudden surge. Meanwhile, not far away in Ikebukuro, a South Korean girl named Ji-he recruits members for a blind soccer team. And one day, while working at a cabaret club, a blind young man named Oyamada comes in. Despite never playing blind soccer before, Oyamada is somewhat forcefully dragged into the team to fill out the numbers. However, this man actually is...
tags: Sports, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Void Man
description: Gods have descended upon the world, and Da-il's ready to drag them all to hell. After the lives of his loved ones were taken by the gods, Da-il offers his soul in exchange for the powers of the very killer of gods, the Void.
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Konjiki no Word Master -Yuusha Yonin ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat-
description:
In an RPG-like fantasy world consumed by warring nations and racial discrimination, the human kingdom summons five high school students from 21st-century Japan for assistance in their conflict with the demonkin. Now those students, with their experience of MMORPGs at their disposal, will hone their skills to protect the human kingdom of Edea.  
  
However, this isn't their story.  
  
Out of the five students, four of them were given the title of Hero and the fifth one the title of Innocent Bystander. He had been summoned by accident since he sat near the other four students. His name is Hiiro Okamura, an aloof bookworm with traveling and reading as his raison d'etre. Hiiro sees no reason to help the human kingdom in their offensive war with the demonkin, seeing that he isn't a Hero and that he has no real obligation to help them, and decides to leave the kingdom to go on his own adventure.  
  
Soon, Hiiro finds out that he has the very unique skill of Word Magic: magic that can materialize the definition of a word. As he travels more and more, he finds many uses for his Word Magic and many opportunities to find books, level up, and gain some of his own companions. Even with the outbreak of war on the horizon, Hiiro stays true to his desire to travel the new world he's in.
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: The Suspicious Boy Is One of the World's Top Ten Masters
description:
In the aftermath of Madorim's decline following the World War, a captivating tale unfolds as the maternal grandson, son of Lord Daesannim's daughter, returns to the city. Despite initial feelings of abandonment, he emerges as a figure of unexpected beauty in a martial arts world marked by rugged aesthetics.

Unveiling his true identity as the King of the Mu-myeon Mountain, a teenage expert who conquered the Dragon King of the Yellow River, the series promises a gripping narrative. Driven by his mother's last words and a determination to restore Madorim to its former glory, Jin Murip, this unparalleled teenage expert, arrives in Madorim.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Monster Male Lead Living Under My Bed
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Landmine-Type Senpai Who Gradually Develops a Liking for Younger People
description: Not found
tags: School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: The Reluctant Demon Cult Leader
description: The leader of the demonic cult is a formidable entity that everyone is afraid of. However, while the demonic cult members expect him to exude great violence, the new Demonic Cult Leader, Do Yu-gang, wishes to live a simple and peaceful life. Will his modest wish be granted in the end?
tags: Official Colored, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Second Life Ranker
description:
Yeonwoo’s brother disappeared years ago, and he’s devastated to learn of his death.

As he copes with his loss, he’s given a pocket watch and learns there’s more to his brother’s death: he was betrayed while competing in the Tower of the Sun God.

Now it’s Yeonwoo’s turn to use the knowledge his brother left behind.

Can Yeonwoo navigate that world and gain enough power and experience to reach the top of the tower, defeating his brother’s enemies and all those who stand in his way?

---

- [Alternative Raw (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%91%90-%EB%B2%88-%EC%82%AC%EB%8A%94-%EB%9E%AD%EC%BB%A4/2335)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Returner’s Road to Retirement
description:
After the first Gate opened in 2018, Lim Dae-In survived for 20 years on Earth while being connected to other dimensions. 

The day after his long-awaited retirement celebration, he regresses by 20 years, back to when he had nothing…
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - The JOJOLands
description:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure. 

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
tags: Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Reborn as the Heavenly Martial Demon
description:
Humanity lost the war. Businessmen who sold out their fellow compatriots, hunters who turned to the monsters, stepping on countless human corpses, all in order to earn profit. The otherworldly monsters that entered our world seized it bit by bit like a raging fire. That was until Zuo Chi arrived. 
"Back then you all were gladly invading our world, so why are you weeping now?"
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Full Color

name: Nano Machine
description:
After being held in disdain and having his life put in danger, an orphan from the Demonic Cult, Cheon Yeo-Woon, has an unexpected visit from his descendant from the future who inserts a nano machine into Cheon Yeo-Woon's body, which drastically changes Cheon Yeo-Woon's life after its activation. The story of Cheon Yeo-Woon's journey of bypassing the Demonic Cult and rising to become the best martial artist has just begun.  

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_t397hfZC3w)
---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/drama/nanomasin/list?title_no=2085)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/moutianchengweimoshen/list?title_no=1519)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2194)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000948)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/th/action/nano-mashin/list?title_no=2171)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Mane Mane Nichi Nichi
description: In a certain school lies a certain club and its three managers. Though unremarkable, days that can't be found anywhere else have begun! Drawn by Yamamoto Souichiro is a brand new Sports ground youth story!
tags: Comedy, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Realist Maou ni Yoru Seiiki Naki Isekai Kaikaku
description:
In a dilapidated castle, Astaroth awoke as a Demon King. With his ‘wisdom from his past life,’ he would rule over his lands as a thorough ‘realist.’ “Demon King, why are you attacking the level 1 Heroes?” “Defeat them before they become stronger. That is called strategy.”  “Demon King, why are you sending fake money to the enemy country?” “To bring chaos to their economy, so they will self-destruct.” “The werewolf troops have attacked. Should we use silver bullets?” “Not bullets, shoot them with cannons.”  
  
And like that, Astaroth ‘reformed’ the old tendencies. He became a lord who was loved by the people and his subordinates, and he would go on to be called the most powerful Demon King in history.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Nou Aru Ogre ga Tsuno o Kakusu
description:
A hero who dies in a fight with the Demon King is cursed on the verge of death. The curse was to reincarnate the hero as Rama, the daughter of a half-ogre and a half-human. 

Sixteen years have passed since then. Rama, who was reincarnated in an ogre village, was tormented by discrimination and prejudice because of her origin, but she had grown beyond the confines of the ogre village, making use of her experience as a former hero. The village chief, who has taken notice of her, gives her an order. The order was to select Rama as the new "Demon King Candidate" from the Ogre village.
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: I Love Amy
description:
"Is this how it feels to have a friend?" 

Bibi is obsessed with Peter, the prince of the school. When she spots Amy next to him, she starts to feel jealous. She invites Amy to her house to warn her, but instead takes a liking to the girl. They agree to be friends on the condition that Amy has to help Bibi confess.
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kuro no Shoukanshi
description:
"If you truly want to get stronger, you have to challenge and defeat those stronger than yourself."

While being transmigrated to another world, Kelvin bartered away his memories for a collection of powerful new abilities. Setting out on the ultimate adventure as the world’s strongest Summoner — with his first Follower being the very goddess who brought him over! — he soon discovers his true nature as a battle junkie. Someone wants to pick a fight? Sure, bring it on!

Facing off against one formidable foe after another, Kelvin can hardly contain his delight as he revels in the absolute exhilaration of a good fight! The curtain rises on the start of an epic saga as this black-clad warrior and his allies carve their way into the annals of history! 
___
**Character Designer:** [Kurogin (DIGS)](https://mangadex.org/author/ad469135-32c7-4fcc-b490-d0ebc07eea16)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Official Raw Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1222ci/)
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/black-summoner)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
A sickly girl is reincarnated in another world as a princess. However, she is looked down on as she does not possess any type of magic. Her purification ability awakens just in time a hero is summoned from another world. Feeling needed for the first time, she starts to fall in love with him... but, for some reason his attitude seems cold?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://www.pixiv.net/novel/series/1234739)
tags: Demons, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Under Ninja
description: The once-prosperous Japanese ninja are said to have been dismantled by the GHQ following the Pacific War and disappeared. In reality, the ninja still exist in secret, and their number is rumored to be as many as 200,000. Some of the elite ninja work behind the scenes at the national level. On the other hand, the ninja at the end of the line are often unable to find work. One such ninja, Kuro Kumogakure, is living the life of a NEET.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Ninja, Comedy, Military, Gore, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: A Middle-Aged Man Who Returns From Another World Goes Back to When He Was 17 and Becomes Unbeatable
description:
A black company employee in his 40s, Namba Kazu, died of overwork and was reincarnated to another world. After saving the world, he returns to find himself regressed to his 17-year-old self. 

Kazu realizes that he can use the abilities he acquired from another world and is excited to restart his life over again. However, through the help of his childhood friend, Yui, he learns of the existence of human-eating abomination called Variant in the world he was born in. 

Kazu knows from his past memories that Yui will die in the near future. In order to save Yui, who is on a mission to fight against variants, Kazu decided to throw himself into battle in this world as well.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Kaina ~ Duel Before the Lord of Suruga ~
description:
This manga features violent stories of passion and swordsmanship, set in the Kan'ei era (1624-1643). It opens with a match between two damaged swordsmen. Irako is blind, and his opponent, Fujiki, is missing an arm. It has been decreed that their match will be fought with metal swords, instead of wooden, so one of these men will die. The story that led them to this final match, and gave them their handicaps, involves ambition, the selection of the heir for a dojo, and the passion of two women– one the dojo master's daughter and the other his lover.  
  
(From MangaHelpers)
tags: Historical, Action, Gore, Tragedy

name: Ohayou Toka Oyasumi Toka
description:
"When you lose something, there is something that you remember."

Hinata Wahei, a 28-year-old professional house-building planner, with the sole ambition to start his new single lifestyle, was suddenly forced to live together with three sisters from his father's second marriage. The unforeseen co-existence is filled to the brim with trouble, as Wahei adheres to a self-sufficient, no-family-sentimentalisms personal code, having been raised as an only child in a family marred by divorce.

A story about a small family of four. It's a tale that goes from "I'm home" to "I'm off", and from "building a house" to "building a home".
tags: Drama, Slice of Life

name: The Demon King Who Lost His Job
description: He is the Demon King who was impeached. She is the brave hero who was laid off because of a failed expedition. Bound by destiny, the two of them embark on an adventure to repay their debts.
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: My Wife is a Heavenly Big Shot
description: The opening scene mentions a wife who has reached her power ceiling, who still wants a bicycle, and demands to eat only soft rice?! But when Xiao Yifeng said I was really your husband, I was nearly strangled to death by this future wife… something’s not right, I must have taken the wrong script!
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kono Kaisha ni Suki na Hito ga Imasu
description:
_"Why don't the two of us date? …In secret"_
 
Tateishi, who works in accounting at a snack-making company, has a secret. That secret is the existence of his cute lover that he's had since yesterday. Why keep it a secret, you ask? Because his lover is his unyielding colleague from the planning department of the same company— Mitsuya!
 
A pure office romance story about a couple who started their relationship in secret, and want to keep it that way!
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Marrying a CEO
description: To become my woman, He Qiaoyan, you must fulfill these three conditions: to like being pampered, to like being loved, and to like being taken good care of. You have fulfilled all the requirements, and all that's left is for you to be aware that you belong to me!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Infinite Devouring: From Zero to Hero
description: Yang Chen, who keeps failing his performance assessments in an immortal cultivation academy, accidentally discovers that he has the Ancient Dragon Soul. In a world where such souls are rare, he quickly becomes an almighty Heaven Master and is ready to venture into the unknown world with his newfound talent.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: In the Bizarre Invasion, I Took Over the Body of the God of Death and Became the King
description: Su Mu is reborn and re-enters the “Apocalypse” system, facing deadly situations where Death itself comes knocking and an array of demons and eerie creatures awaken to threaten the world. Against all odds, he turns the tables and becomes an unstoppable king, joining his teammates in a desperate fight to reverse their fate and ignite a nationwide awakening and evolution.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I Rely on My Invincibility to Deal Tons of Damage Passively!
description: In his previous life, Cheng Qianmo attained the prestigious title of ‘God’ across all professions in the game ‘Genesis,’ poised to ascend to the pinnacle of the gaming world. However, just when he stood on the cusp of becoming the game’s top player, he suffered a regrettable defeat. Yet, fate granted Cheng Qianmo a second chance as he unexpectedly traversed into a world with a setting eerily identical to ‘Genesis,’ a world where everyone could switch professions freely. Armed with the god-tier title across all professions, he resolves to rectify his past regrets, embarking on a path no one has ever tread before.
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Isekai, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Hijiri-kun wa Kiyoku Ikitai
description: Tsuchimikado Hijiri is a man playing the role of the perfect student council president, with his good looks and excellent grades in both school and sports. After school, he witnesses his usually quiet female classmate Sado Mitsuki, tormenting their teacher Tamura in a very sadistic way! The perfect student council president gets caught up in Sado-san's secret fetish!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: I Contracted Myself
description: This is a world where awakened people and alienated beasts coexist. Zhang Ping was lucky to become an awakened person, but his ability was rated as useless. He was unwilling to live a mediocre life, so he resolutely swallowed the contract gem that ordinary people avoided like snakes and scorpions, contracted himself, and became his own summoned beast! From then on, the whole world opened up to him. Ever-changing superpowers, endless alienated beasts, and dangerous parallel worlds, everything is possible.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Listening to the Stars
description: Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Music, Full Color

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Bakuen wo!
description: A spin-off of Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! that focuses on Megumin.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Myriad Realms Gatekeeper
description: Planets dying, gods falling. “Anomalies” and “Calamities” invade the human world. As a dark age descends, Shen Ye finds himself flung into this strange new reality. To his surprise, his power is to summon a door – a door leading to countless worlds, offering him a chance to adventure and train across the multiverse! Beyond the door, he encounters a mysterious skeleton with an unknown past…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Horror, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Arctic Cold War
description: The Ice Age apocalypse is coming. After being betrayed and killed by my secret crush, I was reborn and gained a magical ability - the snacks I ate suddenly turned into plants? What's surprising is that this ability can be used in this way... Crisis is everywhere, I want to live for myself in this life!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yuusha Party wo Oidasareta Kiyoubinbou ~Party Jijou de Fuyojitsushi wo Yatteita Kenshi, Bannou e to Itaru~
description: Being a "Jack-of-all-trades" is a sin!? Despite trying his hardest, he's been told that he's out of a job!! A member of the Hero's party, Orun, is suddenly told by the party leader; "You're insufficient, you need to leave." Additionally, Orun is mocked by his former comrades as a "Jack-of-All-Trades, Master of None". True, he is well-rounded with no particular skill standing out. Still, he would complete every task with a skillful hand, what's more, he always performed at peak performance...! Orun, having grown frustrated, began working solo. However, deep within his heart lay the drive to become the ultimate "Jack-of-All-Trades, Master of None", an "All-Rounder"!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Lord of the Mysteries
description:
With the rising tide of steam power and machinery, who can come close to being a Beyonder? Shrouded in the fog of history and darkness, who or what is the lurking evil that murmurs into our ears?  
  
Waking up to be faced with a string of mysteries, Zhou Mingrui finds himself reincarnated as Klein Moretti in an alternate Victorian era world where he sees a world filled with machinery, cannons, dreadnoughts, airships, difference machines, as well as Potions, Divination, Hexes, Tarot Cards, Sealed Artifacts…  
  
The Light continues to shine but mystery has never gone far. Follow Klein as he finds himself entangled with the Churches of the world—both orthodox and unorthodox—while he slowly develops newfound powers thanks to the Beyonder potions.  
  
Like the corresponding tarot card, The Fool, which is numbered 0—a number of unlimited potential—this is the legend of "The Fool."
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Inkya Datta Ore no Seishun Revenge: Tenshi sugiru Ano Ko to Ayumu Re Life
description:
This is the story of Niihama Shincirou, who collapsed after being ravaged by a black company and woke up to find that he had been sent back to his second year of high school. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a time leap to his second year of high school. His high school life... was gray and shady, but he’s sure he can start over now.

The beautiful girl of his dreams, Haruka Shijouin, whom he met again over time, is even more innocent and cute than he remembered, and above all, she has been staring straight at Niihama.

*"I feel like you've changed a lot from the Niihama I knew yesterday. You're still kind, but you’ve grown up, and that's wonderful!"*

If I could change the future, I would definitely save her life after she took her own life after being severely bullied. With the adult mentality and corporate power that I’ve acquired, I’m going to take my revenge on my second youth with her–!
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Mahou Sensei Negima!
description:
Ten-year-old prodigy Negi Springfield, has just graduated from magic academy, and in order to become a master mage he is sent to Japan to teach English at an all-girls middle school. But Negi has a bigger dream than just becoming a master mage. He wants to find his missing father, "The Thousand Master", the strongest mage that has ever lived. And he soon finds that searching for his father wont be as easy as he first hoped. In fact, it pushes him and his students into life-or-death battles that decides the fate of millions.

---

Alternate official English:
- [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/193)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Heisei Haizanhei ☆ Sumire-chan
description:
A formerly unsuccessful idol turned vagrant, Sumire-chan (31). A vanquished survivor of the cutthroat competition in the showbiz world, with her mind and body both beaten by the struggle, she now lives in a run-down apartment where she spends her days lazing around, for the time being.  Her cousin Yuusei, a first-year highschooler, has been keeping an eye on her and comes to her with a proposal for a moneymaking idea.

“You have a nice body, so let's release a doujin gravure photobook.”

Will Sumire-chan actually be able to stage a comeback in the world of the Reiwa era!? Stay tuned!
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai
description:
Kuroiwa Medaka was born in a temple and is currently a monk in training. Because of his temple's rules, he can't interact with girls - and what's more, he doesn't even know how to regularly socialize with them. Mona, the "queen bee" of the school, however insistently tries to make him fall in love with her, but he always ignores her in order to maintain the rules of his temple.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10032/episode/312982) (U.S. Only)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Diamond no Ace - Wan Senchimentaru Shiizunzu (Doujinshi)
description: When Chris has his injury and Miyuki is made the starting catcher, they must renegotiate the relationship between them.
tags: Oneshot, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Doujinshi

name: Sonic X Shadow TOKYO MISSION -Episode 0-
description: A specially drawn comic describing the prequel story not told in the movie!
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Action, Adaptation

name: Akujo Kyosei Keikaku
description:
"Hey, Seraphina. Even when you grow up, don’t end up killing me, okay?"

The wizard Arvel meets his end at the hands of his former fiancée, Seraphina, who later became the emperor’s mistress and a notorious villainess. However, when he comes to, he finds himself face-to-face with a young Seraphina! Astonishingly, he has returned to being his 13-year-old self. Seeing Seraphina before she became a villainess, Arvel makes a resolution: he will raise her to become a proper person and save his own life.

To start, he begins searching for a way to prevent the death of his brother, Sho, who was once engaged to Seraphina. However, the situation is far from simple, as he must contend with Seraphina’s neglectful family, men vying for the beautiful Seraphina’s attention, and a web of conflicting intentions.

In this journey through time, can Arvel alter Seraphina’s fate and save her from becoming a villainess…!?
tags: Time Travel, Action, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

name: Hiyoku no Tori
description:
The setting is ancient-China. Our main characters are poisonous (sometimes domesticated) harpy-like creatures, who get their poison and the ornate coloring that they’re so proud of, from the toxic plants which they eat.  
  
This is a yaoi focusing on the (somewhat fraught) relationship between two such harpies.  
  
If you’re here for a human x harpy relationship… Well, let’s just say you won’t be disappointed either.
tags: Monsters, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy

name: Tensei Shitara Ken Deshita
description: When he realized it, the protagonist was in another world and had become a sword that was stabbed on an altar in a great plain, crowded with devil beast. The world he was in had a game like system; HP, MP, Strength, Vitality, Agility, Intelligence, Dexterity, Titles and Equipment. Following his instinct as a living sword, he traveled to find the one who could be his wielder, until he met with a cat girl that was about to be attacked by a bear type devil beast.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Happily Ever Afterwards
description:
I transmigrated inside the novel of my favorite character, the second male lead. A tsundere who listens to all the words of the female lead while grunting, with a straight forward personality, and a handsome face. Matching all my preferences, he was even single after the ending. Nice! I’ll pick up the second male lead! However, I overlooked one thing… The tsundere, who had been abandoned by the female lead blackened, and had become a terrifying man!

“Get lost.”

…I-is it safe for me to pick up the second male lead?

---
What would you do if you were reborn as a character from your favorite romance novel? For Peony, an avid fan of *The Song of Askar*, the answer is simple: Marry her favorite character, of course! Reincarnated as the princess of the Kingdom of Garten, Peony is determined to marry Richt, the second male lead of *The Song of Askar* and former prince of the Fairspren Empire, who was banished to an inhospitable land after the novel’s happy ending (which didn’t end so well for him). Amidst trials and tribulations, can Peony and Richt make the most of their second chance at life and love?

---
[Original Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=761498)

**Official Translations:**
