tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Dorei wo Choukyoushite Harem Tsukuru
description: A man purchases three little slaves and begins to groom them into perfect girls for his harem. You will never have a gaggle of lolis with horns in your life. ;_;
tags: Loli, Demons, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Motokano Sensei wa, Choppiri Ecchi na Katei Houmon de Kimi to no Ai wo Hagukumitai.
description: The new teachers at high school student Touma Nijino's school are his ex-girlfriends who dumped him in the past! Moreover, both Akamine Shuri and Shirasawa Kohaku are still in love with him. He is happy to see them again, but.... But he is not happy to see them again... "Hey, can I kiss you?" "Do you hate sleeping with me?" They start competing with each other at the same time, trying to make an already established fact with Tohru before graduation. Moreover, they live in the same apartment complex as Tohru and are trying to secretly nurture their love as a "commuter wife"...? This is a sweet love comedy with ex-girlfriend teachers who tempt you with everything they've got!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation

name: Good Morning Leon
description: Jack (Siamese cat) — the cat who never fails to look after his owner so that the latter can be a good fella, a fella who will not be an embarrassment. So what if Jack causes a ton of trouble for his owner, Leon? Can’t blame the dashing, handsome cat who performs his duty with all stoic elegance. Presenting to you, the story of Leon, the Gentleman, and Jack, the Dashing Cat, who live together in the grace and elegance of England.
tags: Animals, Slice of Life

name: Evolution Begins With a Big Tree
description:
Reborn as a willow tree!? Resurrection of spiritual energy, rise of all things. The reborn willow has also embarked on the path of evolution. It can evolve infinitely, is it “divine power” or “curse”?

Official Translations:
[Japanese](https://piccoma.com/web/product/146958)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Hana to Gin
description: Four years ago, Souda Gin and Hanai Kosuke worked a case together as two anti-organized crime police officers. Now they’ve both quit the force, Gin to become a private detective and Hanai to become a yakuza! A heartwarming romantic comedy unfolds in a retro cityscape!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: Garuru Girl
description: Mochizuki's high school life suddenly took an interesting turn when he reunited with his childhood friend, Tsukimi Kawaru, whom he had a crush on since they were in elementary. Through a coincidence accident, he found out that Kawaru is actually a wolf girl, who couldn't control herself around him. Because Kawaru broke her promise of keeping herself in check, her sister, Utsuru, decided to pull her back home, but Mochizuki didn't like that idea and he came up with a solution to allow Kawaru to continue attending high school while keeping her identity a secret...
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Giant Killing
description:
A truly great coach makes the game of soccer interesting! Tatsumi Takeshi is 35 and has spent the last few years coaching in England before being brought back to Japan to coach his old team. His favorite pastime? Causing giant upsets a.k.a. Giant Killing! 

---
Official Release:
- English release by [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/778-giant-killing?utm_source=mgd), [Azuki](https://www.azuki.co/series/giant-killing)
- Indonesian release by Level Comics

---
- In 2010, this manga received the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga.
tags: Award Winning, Comedy, Sports, Drama

name: Space Brothers
description:
One night in 2006, when they were young, the two brothers Mutta (born 1993) and Hibito (born 1996) saw what appeared to be a UFO heading for the moon. They decided that night to both become astronauts and travel out into space.  
  
In 2025, Hibito has become an astronaut, and he's going to go to the moon. Mutta ended up following a more traditional career path with an auto development company. However, Mutta just ruined his career through a violent altercation with his boss. Now, not only has he lost his job, he appears to be blacklisted in the entire industry. Maybe this is a rare opportunity for Mutta to once again chase his childhood dream and become an astronaut like his little brother!
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
From classmates to brother and sister, living under the same roof.

After his father’s remarriage, Asamura Yuuta ends up getting a new stepsister, coincidentally the number one beauty of the school year, Ayase Saki. Having learned important values when it comes to man-woman relationships through the previous ones of their parents, they promise each other not to be too close, not to be too opposing, and to merely keep a vague and comfortable distance.

On one hand, Saki, who has worked in solitude for the sake of her family, doesn’t know how to properly rely on others, whereas Yuta is unsure of how to really treat her. Standing on fairly equal ground, these two slowly learn the comfortable sensation of living together.

Their relationship slowly evolves from being strangers the more the days pass. Eventually, this could end up in a story about love for all we know.
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kasanegasane no Hatsukoi Desuga
description: Hassaku Tamao came back to his hometown to teach and fulfill a promise he made when he was younger. However, he's not the only one who remembers a promise he made...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Enkan no Lapin
description: The much-anticipated serialization of the popular SNS sensation "Rabbit × Miniature Garden × Dark Fantasy" begins!! With white ears, pale skin, and red eyes, Teddy the rabbit is shunned at the orphanage due to his unusual appearance. One day, he receives an invitation from someone claiming to be his father, leading him to a mysterious Western-style mansion. There, he meets Adele, someone who shares the same peculiar traits as him...
tags: Animals, Horror, Fantasy

name: Heaven Burns Red Official 4-Koma
description: A humorous 4-koma series about the daily activities of the Seraph Squadron that helps us to know a bit more about their personalities and outlook on life.
tags: Comedy, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Sewayaki Kitsune no Senko-san
description:
Like many hardworking members of the workforce, Kuroto Nakano is perpetually stressed out by his job. Still, since he lives alone, he must carry on to sustain himself. Little do humans like Kuroto know, this stress takes the form of darkness residing within a person's body and will bring one's life to ruin.  
Fox deities can see this darkness and have the duty to save people before it is too late. To help rid Kuroto of his stress, Senko-san, an eight hundred-year-old foxgirl, volunteers to take care of him, and will do everything she can to ease the tension in his weary soul.

---

**Notes:**
- Despite initial serialization ending by November 2022, Comic Newtype announced on 9 February 2023 that the series would later resume publication.
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural

name: The Male Leads Trapped in My House
description:
I reincarnated as the heiress of a powerful conglomerate family in a novel.  
The problem is, this world is about to be destroyed by monstrous viruses.  

With nothing but money to spare, I quickly bought a mansion in the countryside to build a shelter to escape the monsters…  
But the world ended far sooner than I had anticipated. Damn it!  

*  

On top of that, somehow, the male leads ended up trapped in my house with me.  
And these guys don’t seem to have any intention of leaving.  
Why do they look like they have no plans to go to the female lead?  

“Who exactly are you?”  
“You seem like someone who knew the world was going to end beforehand.”  

They were full of questions about me, but I couldn’t answer them. They wouldn’t believe me anyway.  
Right now, all I see them as is a good source of labor.  

“Alright, let’s work. You need to earn your keep for what you eat!”  

If I can find the cure for the virus causing the apocalypse, this hellish time will finally end.  
So, until then, I’ll make use of the male leads and hang on!  

*  

But one problem has come up.  
It turns out that this old mansion I purchased is far more suspicious than I thought.  
What on earth is happening in my house?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Post-Apocalyptic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Chilling Flame
description: "The world will become your enemy if you descend into Jianghu..." The young patriarch of a declining family, Baek Mujin, prepares for a journey into the outside world to restore his family's fortunes. Despite the foreseen future where the world will stand as his enemy, Mujin begins his lonely battle.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Kougekiryoku Zero Kara Hajimeru Kenseitan
description: Although Eugene was blessed with an extraordinary talent for defensive magic, he had no talent for offensive magic. He is ridiculed as incompetent by those around him and enrolls in a magic academy to escape. However, his "useless" defensive magic came in handy there, and as expected, he was assigned to take care of the beautiful Demon King Erinyes, who once ruled the world...!?
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: 99 Boss
description: ’99 Boss’ (meaning the best fighter among those born in 1999). The protagonist, Na Seon-wook, was born with the heart of a tiger. He was a troublemaker, but at the request of his parents, he hid his strength and transferred to Gukyang High School, a school located in a remote area that he thought would be quiet. However, it was a place where various old-fashioned cultures and dangerous people gathered. Seon-wook, who wanted to graduate quietly, eventually he couldn’t help but feel his hot blood and began educating them!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Full Color

name: Odette
description: A clumsy, but cheerful girl and her boyfriend (a cat?!)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Level 0 no Munou Tansakusha to Sagesumaretemo Jitsu wa Sekai Saikyou desu ~Tansaku Ranking 1-i wa Nazo no Hito~
description:
The weakest me, partying with two of the most powerful girls!?

After dungeons suddenly appeared on Earth, the concept of levels was inscribed on humanity. Levels were quantified, and as the law of the jungle became more and more prevalent, Level 0 Suzuki Hinata is the most discriminated against person in the world. Even though he's incompetent, he dreams of becoming a dungeon explorer, but for some reason Hinata suddenly becomes close to Kamui Hinata, a beautiful silver-haired girl with S-rank potential whom he meets at the high school he enrolls in?!

"Could the identity of the number one explorer be...?"
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Arctic King
description: The stars shift, the blizzard persists, the icy apocalypse is imminent, food! Temperature! Violence! Dependence! In this dilemma, under the distortion of human nature, has desire given birth to monsters? How to break out of adversity and find a way to survive!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Maou Gun Saikyou no Majutsushi wa Ningen datta
description: “Maou Army’s strongest magician” I’m called. Ike, a demon capable of capturing a fort alone. Clearing away enemies with immense magic, he is without a doubt a monster held in awe by friend and foe. However he has a secret he can’t tell other demons. “I, actually am a human you know.” Using modern knowledge to keep his secret, he became treated as a great commander and the driving force of the Maou’s army.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ishuzoku Reviewers
description:
In our world, the human race constantly debates about several important issues, such as: which girl is the best girl? How good is something as fapping material? 
Which fetish is the sexiest? And why your Waifu is the best while everyone else has shit taste... 

Accompany these great warriors as they present us with different girls, different opinions, different boners, showing us that their fantasy world may not be all that different from ours, 
as they analyze and meticulously review the most important thing of all: what they should put their **** in.
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: The Boy of Death
description:
Lee Kyung Ho's mind was engulfed with ending his life due to bullying and the loss of his mother. He attempts to, but is saved. His determination to commit suicide somehow entices Sierra, a grim reaper who later offers him a contract. This contract blesses him with the ability to borrow the powers of the dead in their previous life in return of sacrificing years from his lifespan. For the sake of attaining what he wishes for, he eventually agrees to it.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=730656)

---
**Official Translations:** [Chinese (Traditional Characters) / 漢語](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/fantasy/theboyofdeath/list?title_no=1771),  [Indonesian / Bahasa](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/ticket-hero/list?title_no=2195)
tags: Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: May the Congressman Protect You
description:
A fantastic duo of a political master and a complete novice!

I’m Gu Yeongjin, a six-term congressman — the pinnacle of South Korea’s political world, the nation’s hope!
One fateful day in 2008, betrayed by my closest aides, I faced a special investigation and chose to end my own life.
When I opened my eyes… it was Seoul, 10 years in the past?!

Now a ghost, no one can see me or hear my voice.
No one... except one person, Cha Jaerim, a 25-year-old Level 9 civil servant.

No connections, no money, stuck in miserable circumstances...
But look at that ambition, that fire in his eyes... I like it! Fine. I’ll make him my partner.

“You need to go into politics.”

And I’ll get my revenge.

A political genius ghost, Gu Yeongjin, teams up with a clueless rookie, Cha Jaerim, for the ultimate combo in
<May the Congressman Protect You>
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Demon King of the Royal Class
description:
Upon dying, the author of "The Demon King is Dead" is given two choices: go to hell or be reborn in his novel and survive till the end.

The problem? He's reborn as Baalier Junior, a weak demon prince, after his realm was conquered! To make things worse, his attempt to escape somehow gets him enrolled as a student of the Royal Class in Gradias Temple, a prestigious human school.

In the midst of plotlines and political schemes, can this author keep his identity a secret and reach a happy ending?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Youngest Is Preventing the End of the World
description:
"The stupid youngest one, the one who doesn't know how to do anything, but causes trouble with her cute face."

Exasperated, I looked in the mirror once again and exclaimed, "Why am I the 'stupid youngest one' Diana Cartier!"

In the novel *The Ending Can't Be the Destruction of the World*, Diana is an evil woman who repeatedly commits evil deeds and is brainwashed by the villain, contributing greatly to the destruction of the world! If something could go wrong for the villainess, it will. But when something went wrong for me, I recalled my past life instead? As an ordinary college student in my past life, I made up my mind when I realized that I had been reincarnated as Diana Cartier, the villainess in the novel.

"The world is going to end. But I'm not going to let it happen."

Yes, I will prevent the end of the world with my own hands! And save my brothers from the conspiracy at the same time! Wait a minute. What's that pitch black thing sprawled out on the floor over there? Wait. That face, where have I seen it before? 

'Is that Linus del Stein?!'

Why are you lying there, Mr. Protagonist of the novel who will destroy this world?

Diana and her brothers are trying their best to stop the end of the world! And cute animals and other stuff? Our sweet youngest is preventing the end of the world, get out of the way!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: I’m in Love with My Foe
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I Was Reborn as His Highness the Prince's Little Evil Dragon
description: An 18-year-old young man who lived a peaceful and normal life is murdered by an unknown man. He is reincarnated as an evil little dragon who is the pet of the crown prince of a magical kingdom. He discovers that the prince is actually his reincarnated assassin, and that he has a secret mission to destroy the kingdom. The little dragon will have to face the dangers and intrigues of the royal court, while at the same time trying to get closer to the prince and discover his true feelings. Will he be able to stop the prince's evil plan and find his happy ending?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi
description:
Futaba Igarashi is a diminutive office lady who finds that her towering and boisterous work senpai Harumi Takeda always gets in her hair, but he always has her back, he always keeps her company, and she starts noticing that her heart is slowly veering towards him…  
  
1st place of Tsugi Manga Awards, Category Webmanga (2018)

---

tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Noah's Notes
description: Professor Noah Minami Umberbach is not your average archeologist! For one, he's prone to whipping out his gun and blowing up stuff to make dramatic entrances. But that's just his eccentric nature. He's actually a man on a mission. A mission that may very well be the most important mission of all time. And he's dragging history-hating student Kotobuki Mirai along for the ride!
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Mystery, Gyaru

name: Golden Light Gratia, The Child Loved By God
description:
Gratia, a girl considered useless and despised by her family, has a revealing dream where a mysterious man predicts a great future for her. She soon discovers that she is the lost daughter of the influential Luciffero family. In a surprising event, after being attacked, a golden light erupts from Gratia, forcing everyone around her to close their eyes.

When the light dissipates, young Gratia disappears and in her place an adult version of herself appears, with distinct features of Luciffero. With an imposing stature and undeniable beauty, she comes across Nea, her mother, and realizes that the transformation expected for the future happened that day.

This was the moment when ten-year-old Gratia and twenty-year-old Gratia switched bodies for the first time.
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Kono Oto Tomare!
description: Since the graduation of the senior members of the club, Takezou ends up being the sole member of the "Koto" (traditional Japanese string instrument) club. Now that the new school year has begun, Takezou will have to seek out new members for the club, or the club will be terminated. Out of nowhere, a new member barges into the near-abandoned club room, demanding to join the club. How will Takezou be able to keep his club alive and deal with this rascal of a new member?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Music

name: The Male Leads Were Stolen by an Extra
description:
A woman who has lost her male leads to an extra who did not appear in the original story... That's me.

Selonia fell into a coma on the way back from defeating the Demon King. After wandering through death for several months, she survived, but what? 

“I want you to break off the engagement. I want to hurry up to marry Grace.” 

“I want you to pretend my knight’s oath to you didn't happen.” 

“Give me back my heart. I’ll give it to Grace.” 

The fiancé who was the male lead, the paladin and the dragon who were the sub-male leads, and the fellows all turned away. These reckless bastards! There was a lot of cursing, but what can I do to stop it? I was trying to start a new life in a cool way. By the way… 

“Do you know me?” 

How is the dead demon king alive? 

“What, I don’t know…”

“No, you know me. tell me Who am I?” 

To make matters worse, the Demon King, who has no memory, sticks to my side and does not leave. Inevitably, I tried my best to prevent the return of the Demon King. 

“How can I always hold your hand?” 

Why is it not enough to spit out vulgar words? 

“Are you going to kill all those who left you? Just speak.” 

He’s even going to kill the male leads for me!
tags: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: BanG Dream! - Earl Grey With Sugar Cubes (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Game Master
description:
Amid a repetitive and boring everyday life, a game appeared as if it were fate - "Heroes Destiny". After spending ten years playing it, I finally completed the game, but all that remained was the emptiness of having to return to an ordinary life. At that moment, a message appeared on the screen:

"Do you desire a new adventure?"

[Yes/No]

Little did I know that I would wake up in an unfamiliar body and an unknown place.

"Remember, I am now Calix Shaekin."

And thus…

"I will become the protagonist of this world!"
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Urasekai Picnic
description: The story is set in the modern world, but there exist doors that can take people to the "other side," where strange urban legends and internet stories prove to be true. College student Sorawo Kamikoshi finds herself exploring one of these doors, and almost dies on the other side, when she is rescued by another girl named Toriko Nishina. Toriko is a mysterious girl, but very skilled with a gun, and she seems to be searching for someone else on the other side. Together, both girls start to explore these doors to the other side.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Girls' Love, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Kirio Fanclub
description: Aimi Miyoshi and Nami Sometani are two high school girls who often find themselves talking about a boy in their class, Kirio. This lighthearted romantic comedy follows the daily lives of these two friends and rivals on a journey that, for now, seems to be heading everywhere but love.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Yani Neko
description: A chain-smoking catgirl struggles with her cigarette addiction.
tags: Psychological, Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Mitakihara Anti-Materials
description: Due to a slight misunderstanding, Homura begins her cohabitation with Mami. But in slice-of-life, everything turns out better than expected.
tags: Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Chairman Kang, the New Employee
description:
I’m Kang Yong-ho, the Chairman of Choi Sung Group, one of South Korea’s top 10 conglomerates.
Just when I was basking in the glory of my retirement declaration, out of the blue, a new employee fell from the sky and landed on my head. But hey, where’d my body go, and now I’ve turned into a new Employee?!

“What’s this? Are you telling me to start with Excel or something?
tags: Long Strip, Adventure, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Shuujin Tensei
description: Chris, caught in a suicide bombing carried out by escaped death row inmates, finds himself reincarnated in a world of swords and magic. Determined not to lead another miserable life, he resolves to make the most of his innate special abilities. However, he soon discovers that the death row inmates have also been reincarnated into this world...!?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Akebi-chan no Sailor Fuku
description: The setting is Roubai Private Academy, a prestigious girls’ middle school in the country. For Akebi Komichi, donning this school’s sailor uniform is a dream come true. Her middle school dream life is finally beginning! Verdant open countryside vistas. The slowly flowing time of youth. With a gentle touch, the genius artist Hiro brings you this simple school tale… now enrolling!
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Ninja to Koroshiya no Futarigurashi
description: Many fatalities?! A naive female ninja and a high school assassin live together in an unpredictable way! A naive female ninja who escapes from a ninja village meets a high school girl assassin!? Their life together, which begins by chance, is full of danger (and excitement)...!
tags: Ninja, Slice of Life

name: Mission: Yozakura Family
description:
Taiyo Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyoichiro. What drastic steps will Taiyo have to take to save Mutsumi?!

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Mission: Yozakura Family** (2023)
- [English volumes (Viz Media)](https://www.viz.com/mission-yozakura-family)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy

name: Kaminaki Sekai no Kamisama Katsudou
description: Yukito, the son of a questionable cult leader, lost his life due to the cult's ridiculous training practices. Now to his surprise, he was reincarnated into another world! It was an ideal world for him without the concept of "God" or "religion" BUT...!
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Genderswap, Loli, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Gyaru

name: Hangyaku no Yuusha ~Skill wo Tsukatte Haraguro Oujo no Kokoro to Karada wo Shouakuseyo~
description:
When Sasahara Shinta was suddenly summoned to another world with the objective of subjugating the Demon Lord, he makes full use of his cheat skill that sees people’s status and tries taking a look at the Princess who summoned him, but when he did, it says that the Hero is arranged to be assassinated after the Demon Lord’s subjugation.

That’s right, this is a shitty otherworld where the Hero’s life is treated like dirt!

To avoid being assassinated, Shinta pretends to submit, but…
tags: Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Black Serpent
description: In the final battle against the Demon Cult, the Black Serpent leader Jeonghwa was betrayed by the Murim Alliance, losing all her comrades. Barely surviving, she swears to eliminate both the Demon Cult and the Murim Alliance who drove her comrades to their deaths. “Heavens! If justice truly exists… grant me the opportunity to avenge my fallen comrades!”
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Ars Goetia ～The Boy Who Was Called Incompetent Uses 72 Demons to Become Unstoppable
description:
“I have decided not to expect anything from you anymore.”

One day, Norman is told this by his father and is kicked out of the house.

There was no way around it. Because Norman could not use magic at all.

However, Norman’s fate changes drastically when he encounters the Grimoire “Ars Goetia”.

The Grimoire called “Ars Goetia” was used to summon 72 demons.

The demons summoned by it, however, bring about a shocking revelation to Norman. Yes, there was a reason why Norman could not use magic.

And so, Norman becomes the strongest sorcerer in the world by subduing numerous demons
tags: Action, Demons, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Beneath the Lady's Mask
description:
Mother always said to Qinran: "Your stepfather is from a famous family, your eldest brother is a genius, and your sister is a top student in her high school. You, a country bumpkin, don't embarrass them."

Everyone with status in the capital received a warning from Mr. Juan of the Cheng family: "Mr. Juan's wife is from the countryside and doesn't understand our current situation, and she has a bad temper. In short, everyone should be extra patient."

Until one day, when Master Juan was investigating a certain big boss, his men fell into a confused silence while looking at one of the waistcoats of his sister-in-law who claimed to know nothing…
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Astral Pet Store
description:
In the era of astral pets, only the might of pets was essential! However, making the pets stronger has always been a slow and arduous process for pet warriors. That was until the appearance of a mysterious pet shop that changed everything!

The weakest skeleton could slay a great golden dragon with a single strike after training at this pet shop! Even the humble watchdog of the shop possessed ten legendary skills, and the female worker in the shop claimed to be a Goddess...

As for what the shopkeeper Su Ping thinks: I'm merely training these cute pets to become exceptional overlord beasts. What? Is it not normal?
- - -
In the era of beasts, pet strength determines everything! The battle pet master works hard and slowly to improve the strength of the pet. Until a mysterious pet store came out of nowhere!

In just a few days of cultivation, the lowly skeleton can kill the golden dragon with a single slash. Does the guard dog have ten secret skills of pet beats? The working girl even calls herself a god...

As for the owner, Su Ping: Isn't it a regular practice to breed cute pets into prehistoric king beasts?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Onna no Karada ga Iya nano de Mune o Torimashita
description:
The author, who is non-binary (seeing themselves as neither male or female), chronicles their decision to have top surgery. 
Essays on the actual experience, from planning the surgery, to what happened afterwards.
tags: Genderswap, Philosophical, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Undead Unluck
description:
As an UNLUCKY girl prepares to face her death, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Vicious, violent and buck naked! An unprecedented picaresque hero appears in Shonen Jump!  
  
- Winner of the 2020 Tsugimanga award.
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Zombies, Martial Arts, Drama, Supernatural

name: Apocalyptic Super Farm
description: The apocalypse has dawned upon the world, and food and survival are once again the most important topics of people's concern. Rice and flour have become luxuries, and vegetables are even more expensive! But just then, someone posted a video on a website that shocked the world. Sweet vegetables rolled into a hot pot, emitting a tantalizing green color! A golden leg of lamb is seared in oil! Fish soup simmers as white as milk! The little girl beside me begged: Bro,  I really can't eat anymore!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Post-Apocalyptic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Mashou no Otome no Yakumawari
description: Kairan Girls' Academy. A boarding school rich with history and tradition, attended only by orphans. It has a special system in which students are given "roles" that align with their individual goals. Hanako Shimura, a kind-hearted girl filled with dreams and expectations, enrolls into the academy hoping to make friends with everyone at school. But will she be able to?
tags: Girls' Love, School Life

name: Torano Tantei Jimusho e Youkoso
description: Due to a string of bad luck, Yano Kaisei is without a home, a job, or money. He happens to stumble upon a job posting for a live-in position at a detective agency, but the employer is Torano Jiu, a mighty tiger beastman! After Yano Kaisei starts working at the detective agency, his day-to-day includes juggling work duties and taking care of Torano’s niece, Yui… A romantic comedy between a Beastman x Human!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: A Tidal Wave of Glory
description: Halo, the best musician of the time, suffers a traffic accident on the way to the Grammy ceremony. And when he regains consciousness, he finds himself in the body of a little Korean boy named No Hae-il. He finds himself in a completely different place and time. He confirms that No Hae-il's English name is Halo and feels a strong destiny. Halo, who entered Hae-il, proves to be a musical genius at this time as well.
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Sometimes Even Reality Is a Lie!
description: Kaoru Terasaki is a gamer who’s into MMORPGs, and he’s finally meeting up with someone he’s been friends with in-game for a long while—this time, offline and in person. He’s worried that his friend will be disappointed to see Kaoru is a guy, unlike his female character in the game. But he’s the one who’s in for a surprise when, instead of another guy, his friend turns out to be a cute girl, Nanami Osaka. On top of that, Nanami told her parents that she would be bringing a friend over—a female friend. Even worse, Nanami’s dad is the super overprotective type who won’t allow any guys near his daughter. There’s only one solution to this dilemma: Kaoru has to cross-dress as a girl! Will Kaoru’s efforts pay off in the end?! Will Kaoru and Nanami remain just friends, or will their time together IRL change everything? Follow their romantic-comedy adventures to find out!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Crossdressing, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Blue Giant Supreme
description:
After leaving his mark on Japan, Dai is taking on Europe!

Direct continuation of Blue Giant, a manga about the evolution of the young saxophonist Dai Miyamoto in the jazz world. Blue Giant Supreme sees our protagonist travel to Europe. Having just arrived in Munich, without being able to speak a word of German and with just average English, he manages to secure a roof over his head, food and drink, but struggles to get the most important thing: a place where he can have his music heard.
 
A whole new element added on top of the enthralling story that enchants every music lover: the discovery of a new culture. Dai will travel all over Europe, from Germany to France, accompanied by his instrument, growing as a musician and a person in the process of fulfilling his dream of becoming the best in the world.


[Official Site](https://bluegiant.jp/)
tags: Drama, Slice of Life, Music

name: Daigaku Nyuugakuji Kara Uwasa Sareteita Bishoujo San Shimai, Ikiwakareteita Gimai Datta.
description: The three sisters, once clingy and needy as children, have now grown into beautiful young women—and for some reason, they've developed a strong possessive streak! This youth romance-comedy kicks off as they reunite, and the beautiful trio start competing for attention!
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Kekkon surutte, Hontou desu ka
description: Takuya and Rika are co-workers for a travel agency and have barely ever interacted as they are both introverted, anti-social people. Both are doing their jobs as normal when an announcement from the higher-ups comes down: in one year, an overseas branch will be opening in Siberia, and an employee from their location will be sent to work there! While there's no telling who will be chosen to go, it is explained that people who are married and have families are far less likely to be sent! Neither Takuya nor Rika want to go to Siberia! Desperate to protect their solitary lives, they develop a plan: pretend that they are getting married to each other! Will they be able to keep up this charade for 365 days, and, maybe, even fall for one another in that time?
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Mikadono Sanshimai wa Angai, Choroi.
description: Though Ayase Yuu is the son of a renowned and talented actress, he is below average in anything he does. He is entrusted to live under the care of his mother's friend, and later discovers that he will also be rooming with the three sisters from his school who possess both beauty and talent. Though Yuu thought that an understanding would be impossible to reach between an ordinary person and those blessed with talent, the three sisters are surprisingly...?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Dead Dead Demon's Dededede Destruction
description:
Large mysterious alien ships have been looming above Japanese towns for three years, filling the sky. Everything changed three years ago. And yet, nothing has changed. No weapon used against the invaders' ships had any success, beyond destroying part of Japan and leaving its economy in shambles. JSDF is fighting a guerrilla battle against the aliens all over Japan. America is joining the 'war' effort with more aggressive tactics, dividing Japan over the pacifist principle laid out in Article 9 of the Japanese constitution. But this may just be the mundane story of young high schoolers.

"No matter what happens, I won't back down. At least not until this world filled with lies and deceit crumbles away. The real threat to humankind is not invaders, but me."
___
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga** 
- **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Excellence Award in 2022**
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Office Workers, Military, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Aliens, Mystery, Tragedy

name: God of Blackfield
description:
“Who am I?!”  
  
Leaving only black soot and dead bodies in his wake, Kang Chan, the “God of Blackfield,” struck fear into the hearts of his enemies.

But one day, in the chaos of battle, his life was abruptly snuffed out.

“I’ve been shot… but the bullet came from behind me!”

Revived three years later, this “god” is now a wimpy high schooler with major problems — savage bullies, shady business dealings, and even girls.

Revenge seemed like a straight shot, but high school is a battlefield all of its own!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Crime, Martial Arts, Military, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru
description:
Recently dumped, Akane is just about to quit the game she used to play with her boyfriend when she meets Yamada in the same RPG. Yamada in real life turns out to be somewhat of a legend. The only problem is - he is ONLY interested in the game. As Akane's feelings grow, will Yamada's focus stay on the game?
___
The manga won the Tsutaya Comic Award in 2022.
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Project Yuriforming!
description: Yuri addict and alien Lily runs out of stimulus and decides to get involved with humans to create "real yuri"
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Aliens

name: Dating to Survive
description:
The exorcist fell in love with me, a ghost...?!

A survival love story of a ghost who resorted to a false confession to survive from the exorcist.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Revival of Zeon - Remnant One
description: In U.C. 0092 the "Cerberus Squadron," of Newborn Neo Zeon —a Newtype unit led by Brown and Meyer— are ordered to capture Fifth Luna.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Tragedy

name: Ouji-sama no Tomodachi
description:
I'm always at the mercy of the prince!?
A slapstick romantic comedy with a handsome girl!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Unemployed Gye Baeksun
description: With no savings, average qualifications, and a bank balance consistently below 10,000 won, can the Backbone Breaker Gye Baeksun really escape unemployment?
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint
description: Dokja was an average office worker whose sole interest was reading his favorite web novel 'Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse.' But when the novel suddenly becomes reality, he is the only person who knows how the world will end. Armed with this realization, Dokja uses his understanding to change the course of the story, and the world, as he knows it.
tags: Award Winning, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
A polite and lethargic boy was reincarnated in another world as a vampire bishoujo. In this world of swords and magic, this protagonist who was reborn replete with all kinds of cheat powers was searching for one thing??!

"Three meals a day, snacks and an afternoon nap, I guess."

Are you really the protagonist!? And thus begins the fantasy comedy of a vampire looking for the ideal moocher lifestyle.
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation

name: All Hail the Sect Leader
description: All the members of my sect are abnormally strong. All my disciples turn out to be big shots, and I'll definitely become invincible in this world!
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Heaven Official's Blessing
description:
Eight hundred years ago, the pure-blooded and noble Crown Prince, Xie Lian, was a well-regarded child of heaven with unlimited boundaries. However, who knew that after ascending, achieving immortality and becoming a Martial God that thousands of people worshipped, that his life would only go downhill. He was demoted and fell down the ranks until he reached rock bottom.  
  
Eight hundred years later, Xie Lian has ascended once again, but this time he has neither the followers nor any incense burned in his name. One day, on his way back from collecting trash, he picks up a mysterious youth and takes him home. This particular youth however, actually turns out to be Hua Cheng, the infamous Ghost King known throughout the three realms who could change both his gender and appearance at the flip of a dime.  
  
NOTE: Heaven Official's Blessing has been re-released on bilibili from the prologue with some special extras due to the original release not being very coherent unless you've read its source material (novel). This is the new version.
tags: Historical, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru
description: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Utsuranain desu
description: A high school boy who sees things that shouldn't be there encounters an enthusiastic girl from the occult research club. (Manga Mogura)
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Class no Daikirai na Joshi to Kekkon Suru Koto ni Natta
description:
High school student Hojo Saito married his classmate, Sakuramori Akane, the girl who's his worst enemy in school.

"If you tell the rest of the class we’re married, I'll kill you."
"I don't want them to know either. There’s no point in that."

Their newlywed life wasn't going so well, and they were constantly at odds. However, as they progress through their daily lives, the distance between them closes, they have more enjoyable moments together, and they gradually come to understand one another. Saito learns about Akane's cute side, which he never saw before, and Akane gradually began to recognize the feelings that she’s been keeping inside...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The Woodbridge Project
description:
Set in an alternate world, we follow a group of friends as they encounter and deal with the many absurdities within the city of Woodbridge. Whether or not they'll stop these elusive figures for good is up to question, because these villains come from places most wouldn't expect!

Be sure to support @sekora2000 on IG, Tiktok, Twitter, and Patreon!
tags: Thriller, Action, Crime, Superhero, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Self-Published, Office Workers, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Police, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Kameba Kamu Hodo Amaku Naru
description: Akari is a high school girl full of curiosity that lives surrounded by her favorite people and things. She leads an exciting life, and thanks to a strange turn of events, she becomes interested in the “Disinterested Prince” (Kyoumi LESS Ouji), a boy that doesn’t show any interest in people or things in general. And although he said "Isn't it just annoying to get involved with strangers?” He sometimes looks lonely, making Hikari’s desire to know more about his world grow…
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Houkago Play
description:
In the Houkago Play Series:  
  
V.1: 4-koma about a high-school gamer and his bossy but tsundere girlfriend.  
V.2: About a gamer and his mangaka girlfriend.  
V.3: About a boy and a girl who are both gamers, though they play with different styles.  
V.4: R  
V.5: High Heels  
V.6: Maniax  
V.7: High Heels 2  
V.8: High Heels 3
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Salaryman ga Isekai ni Ittara Shitennou ni Natta Hanashi
description:
Dennosuke Uchimura is a simple Salaryman, who one day is run over by an elderly lady on a scooter and left in the street to die. When he regained consciousness he discovers he was summoned to another world by the Demon King himself, who offers him a position as one of his Four Heavenly Kings. 

Can Dennosuke survive as a servant of the Demon King, and meet his expectations?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Tanaka-kun wa Itsumo Kedaruge
description: Sighing, leaning on his elbows, sleepy eyes. Tanaka-kun is a boy that basically doesn't try but isn't disliked. This is a laid-back youth comedy about Tanaka-kun and the quiet Oota who can't leave him alone.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Burning Kabaddi
description:
The story centres on first-year high school student Tatsuya Yoigoshi, a former ace soccer player who dislikes sports. 
He gets invited to join the team for an Indian contact sport called Kabaddi. 
He scoffs at the idea at first but becomes interested after watching a kabaddi practice.
tags: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Miniamaru Kareshi
description: Iroha Aoyagi is a normal 16 year old girl, except, she's never fallen in love. She suspects there might be something wrong with her; until she meets her classmate Kusakabe-kun who seems well-versed and cynical about matters of love. Will Iroha be able to handle someone like Kusakabe-kun?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life

name: The Day of Salvation
description:
Nishioka Kyoudai's anti-war epic, told in their signature surrealist style.   
  
A man wakes up one morning to find the world outside of his house a wasteland. As he searches for signs of life, he finds a fetus in a ditch, which promptly latches onto his thumb and won't let go, and things only get stranger from there…
tags: Psychological, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Horror, Tragedy

name: Watashi wo Koroshita Wankokei Kishi-sama ga, Yandere ni Job Change shite Kyou mo Inochi wo Nerattekuru
description:
Tiana's engagement was broken off by the prince of her own country, and she was sentenced to exile. However, the knight of a neighbouring country, who was an aide to that country's prince, suddenly proposed to her. Since he was her type, Tiana accepted the marriage proposal and traveled with him to his country, but what awaited her was an unjust death. However, although she should have died, Tiana finds herself back when her engagement was broken and she was proposed to by the knight!

"Now... Now it's too late... I'll have to kill her."

The last words the knight spoke before killing her lingered in her mind. But Tiana doesn't want to die again! Terrified, she tries to refuse the marriage proposal, but she can't escape from the knight who has gone completely crazy! A cat-and-mouse rom-com about Tiana, whose memories construe murderous intent, and a knight who refuses to let her escape and gets more and more yandere...

---
[Original Web Novel](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n7132gu/) (R18)
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: TS Akuyaku Reijou Kamisama Tensei Zen'nin Tsuihou Haishin RTA ~Kiraware Tsuihou End o Mezashiteru no ni Saikyou Musou Road kara Orirarenai~
description:
A man who lost his life in an accident is reincarnated into an otome game world with a mission given by gods who want entertainment. And the background story in the game is that she is incarnated as a villain princess character, which turns out to be a good person but she is instead exiled after that the game will be speedrun and streamed!? He was told the sooner he was exiled the more benefits he would get in the next life, along with the start of the game he invited all the characters to fight so he could be exiled quickly, but instead, he was invincible and became a popular person... !?

Respected by the original protagonist, a handsome aristocrat makes the main character his goal and he is trained by a cheat class, in the end, this otome game deviates from the original story too!! She's gradually getting ready to get the ending of being exiled, but the event of death always comes to her….. as the daughter of a marquis “marianne biesround” who is fighting for her next life, she will destroy all those who stand in her way (and blow them away) with magic. strongest, “meteor”! The manga adaptation of the violent webnovel otome game has begun!!!
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: The Heroine’s Friend Strikes Back
description: Reborn as a side character wrongfully accused and executed, Mia resolves to rewrite her fate. Returning to the moment she first met the villainous heroine, she vows to stand tall and fight back, sparking a thrilling rebellion against a fabricated destiny.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute! Shadow Gaiden
description:
An official spin-off of the the super famous fantasy "The Eminence in Shadow".  
OP main character × isekai reincarnation × misunderstandings!? This is the beginning of a spin-off of the super-famous web novel isekai fantasy "The eminence in Shadow".  
Cid is a boy who reincarnated in another world, and decided to enjoy a scenario of being "the eminence in shadow, someone who meddles with the story from the shadows, and exhibits his true power in secrecy". Thus unfolds the story of him and the secret organization he leads—shadow garden—as well their their pleasant friends! An easy-going 4-koma manga starts right here and now!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magic, Harem, Isekai, 4-Koma, Fantasy

name: Star-Crafter
description: Consists of several short, poetic stories revolving around themes of love, childhood, and introspection. With her intricate, cut-out line drawings and sensitive style, Nakano immerses us in a world of hauntingly nostalgic beauty, blending everyday struggles with a touch of fantasy. The stories include that of a woman who applies makeup to conceal her beauty from the eyes of other men, reserving herself for her lover; an author who discovers an elf in his garden; and a little boy who encounters a fantastical being capable of controlling the stars. These are all small, captivating tales to be savored slowly. A carefully crafted collection of stories, where each word and illustration is infused with poetry.
tags: Anthology, Adventure, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Otogi Matsuri
description:
The manga starts off with a very odd killing. Then, it jumps to a few days later where Yousuke ends up breaking a small shrine. It later gives him the guardian Suzaku - just in time too, for he must face the murderer that opened the manga.

Note: Retail links are for the New Edition which has 8 volumes instead of 12.
tags: Action, Romance, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Kuroda-san no XXX ni Furetara...
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, School Life

name: Dorohedoro
description:
This is the story of Kaiman, a guy who does not remember who he was before he was transfigured by a Magic user. 
This transformation left him with a reptile's head, and a desire to find out the truth about who he really is. 
Accompanied by Nikaido, his female companion, he tracks down Magic Users in "The Hole" and unceremoniously 
chomps down on their head, hoping to find out who it was that put him in this state. 
One by one, they witness this "second man" inside the head of Kaiman, and after pulling them back out of his mouth 
he asks them all a question "What did the guy inside my head say?"  


---
tags: Action, Psychological, Comedy, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Zatch Bell!!
description:
Every 1000 years, 100 demon children are sent to Earth to compete in a battle to become king of the Demon World. Each demon is paired with a human partner who is given a spell book of a specific color. The human can cast the demon's spells through their book. If a demon's book is burned, they disappear and return to the Demon World. The last demon remaining becomes the king. The show is oriented around Gash Bell and his human partner, Takamine Kiyomaro.  
  
---
- **Won the 48th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen**
tags: Award Winning, Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san
description:
"И на меня тоже обрати внимание..."

Alya, the incomparably beautiful silver-haired girl in the next seat over, occasionally mumbles to herself in Russian. She says she switches to it whenever she’s badmouthing me… but I know the truth! I know for a fact that she just said "Pay attention to me, too." to me! 

Masachika Kuze has native-level skills when it comes to Russian comprehension, but Alya has no idea about that... and that’s why she keeps on hiding those sweet feelings about him in her native language!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Fushigi no Mayuri-san
description:
Yuusuke, a 7th grader, is interested in his friend's older sister for various reasons.
The older sister, while a little strange, is a kind and caring girl.
She's mysterious but is popular with everyone.  
This is an ordinary comedy about Mayuri-san's mysterious everyday life.
tags: Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Alice-san Chi no Iroribata
description:
After ten years, Alice returns to her hometown from Tokyo to live alone in a traditional Japanese house with a sunken hearth. Harumi, her childhood friend, nervously meets her again after such a long time, but the warmth of the hearth with Alice is just as warm as it was in the past...

Next to the hearth in Miss Alice's house, let's have a leisurely meal together.
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Kami no Fune de Nemuru
description: Kitahara Kei is a screenwriter whose prodigious talent is taking the world by storm, but the people on whom he models his protagonists invariably end up dead. Dismayed by the misfortunes piling up in his wake, he abandons the pen and falls into dissipation, spending his days drinking in underground bars. One night when Kei is drunk and collapsed in the street, he is approached by a young amateur photographer named Youichi. Kei finds himself irresistibly drawn to Youichi’s ever-changing expressions, his radiantly pure smile, and sometimes sultry gaze… Being with Youichi, Kei finds the words spilling out of him once more, and yet he knows that he will only bring misfortune to Youichi…
tags: Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Tragedy

name: Return to Player
description:
Ten years ago, a group of gods turned everyone on Earth into players of a sadistic game that forced them to kill monsters in real life - or be killed themselves. 

Kim Sehan has already seen how this game will play out: everyone in the world dies except for him. 

When he’s given the chance to go back in time and start a second playthrough, Sehan is determined to change the course of events and beat the gods at their own game.

---

tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Isekai Nonbiri Nouka
description: Having died of sickness at the age of 39, Machio Hiraku is given the opportunity to go to another world. When asked what his wish is by God intending to give him strength, he requests to have a healthy body, offered a second wish, he chooses to live peacefully, a third wish to be able to know the local language, and for a final wish, to be able to be a farmer.
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Mayonaka Heart Tune
description:
"Late at night, alone on my bed, your voice was the only thing that saved me. I want to talk to you again. There's something I want to say."

Without knowing her real name or face, Yamabuki Arisu, a second-year high school student, was looking for a girl named "Apollo'' who was a livestreamer. However, one day, Arisu gets a clue about Apollo from the broadcast club of the high school where she is going. There were 4 beautiful girls who dreamed of "getting a job related to voice"!! Who is Apollo? What will happen to the dreams of the four people?
___
**Links:**
- Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10568/episode/347385) (U.S. Only)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: sleepy life of servamp
description: Not found
tags: Action, Animals, Comedy, 4-Koma, Doujinshi, Vampires

name: Hirayasumi
description: 29-year-old freeter Ikuta Hiroto is a carefree young man without a love life, regular job, or any real worries about the future. He inherits an old house from the neighbourhood granny, where his 18-year-old cousin, Natsumi moves in with him to study art in Tokyo. This is a story about Hiroto and the people around him who struggle with life.
tags: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Whisper Me a Love Song
description: Bubbly, energetic first-year high school student Himari falls head over heels for her senpai Yori after hearing her band perform on the first day of school. Himari tells Yori she just loves her, and, to Himari’s surprise, Yori says she loves Himari back! But when Himari realizes that she and her senpai are feeling two different kinds of love, she begins to ask herself what “love” really means…
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: Watashi ga Shinde Manzoku desu ka?
description:
Countess Rorona Ryus died in an accident. 

The news came the day after her fiancé, Bellveut, called off their engagement. Rorona was accused of mistreating her sister, a crime she had no right to be accused of, but she accepted the blame without hesitation. 

She was found dead in an overturned carriage on a suburban street, her face smashed in.

When Rorona's sister learned of her death, she was delighted. "Bellveut is now mine," she said. Bellveut laughed. "I wish she had died sooner." 

But they did not know that Rorona's death would bring them more than just good fortune....
tags: Psychological, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Musume no Shinshitsu
description: He had sex with his own daughter-though, of course, only in a dream. Goto, a university lecturer, had seemingly built a happy family: a beautiful wife who is a painter and lovely, talented children... But that happiness was merely a facade. During the day, he suspected his wife of infidelity, and at night, he was tormented by nightmares, gradually wearing down his mental stability. One day, Goto returned home to find his room in chaos and his daughter in tears. Convinced that his wife was to blame, Goto vows to protect his beloved family...!?
tags: Loli, Psychological, Incest, Sexual Violence, Drama, Mystery

name: Betrayal of Dignity
description:
Would you sacrifice your honor to marry a Duke?

In order to save her family from ruin, Chloe Verdier must find a groom for her sister, Alice. 

She soon runs into the handsome but arrogant Duke Thisse who makes a proposal that could save them.

When Alice flees with a mysterious man, Chloe must seek out the Duke in the biggest gamble of her life.
tags: Historical, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Rule Ihan wa Iku made H!?: Osananajimi to Doukyo hajimemashita
description:
Yuki decided to live alone when she got a job.  
  
However due to a mistake in the contract she has to live with Keita, her childhood friend!  
  
The two of them then established a set of rules for their cohabitation life together but there's a penalty if one break the rules!  
  
What's the penalty?!
tags: Romance, Office Workers

name: 303-Goushitsu no Kami-sama
description:
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/24367326/series/236717)
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Wistoria: Wand and Sword
description: The new, magical dungeon-adventure fantasy series from the author of Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? Seeking to fulfill a promise to a childhood friend, Will Serfort enters Regarden Magical Academy with the goal of making it to the top of the magical world. There’s just one problem: he can’t use magic! Will his sword skills be the key to unlocking his true potential?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Gore, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Random Chat
description:
Joonwoo hates school and has trouble making friends. The only time he's happy is when he's talking to strangers on the Random Chatting phone app. That's how Joonwoo ends up befriending a girl on RanChat who turns out to be his classmate Sungah but she has no idea about it! Will Joonwoo be able to fight his social anxiety and become closer to her in real life?  

---

name: Samurai Akiyama
description: Not found
tags: Samurai, Web Comic

name: Kyou, Eki de Mita Kawaii Onna no Ko.
description: Kameyama, a middle-aged man, can't help but notice what the pretty girl he sees at the train station is wearing. That Milbon scent is loved by all of mankind! This glittering case is from Sebon Star! That glowing skin... isn't a treatment, just a highlight! Which brand's cosmetics wear off, and which ones last? "I wanna know all about it!" he thinks to himself. Many of those "young lady things" he's become obsessed with now, appear before him!
tags: Comedy, Crossdressing, Slice of Life

name: Tate no Yuusha no Nariagari
description:
Naofumi Iwatani, an uncharismatic Otaku who spends his days on games and manga, suddenly finds himself summoned to a parallel universe! He discovers he is one of four heroes equipped with legendary weapons and tasked with saving the world from its prophesied destruction.  
As the Shield Hero, the weakest of the heroes, all is not as it seems. Naofumi is soon alone, penniless, and betrayed. With no one to turn to, and nowhere to run, he is left with only his shield. Now, Naofumi must rise to become the legendary Shield Hero and save the world!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: I Am a Hero
description:
(from ebookjapan):

The series has sold over 8.3 million copies! The gold standard of zombie manga, "I Am a Hero," is now available in a "complete edition" with a new cover design, reprinted color pages from the serialization, and over 80 pages of new artwork in the final 22 volumes! Witness the new ending of the story. 

He is 35 year old who spends his time as an assistant to a mangaka, sometimes escaping into delusion in order to win over the agonizing reality. One day, however, a mysterious infection begins to spread without him noticing...and the real world begins to break down...⁉ 

He wanders into a world where the ordinary and the extraordinary, the mundane and the insane intersect. A personal survival panic horror story! 

[Official English](https://www.darkhorse.com/Books/25-142/I-Am-a-Hero-Omnibus-Volume-1-TPB)

---  
- **Won the 58th Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga in 2013**

---
