name: Yume to Koi dewa Tsuriawanai
description: Kurata Hikaru has fallen in love with her classmate Kira Kairi at first sight. Now, she's too lovestruck to concentrate on her studies. Her plan? Get Kairi to reject her so she can focus again.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9 - The JOJOLands (Fan-Colored)
description: Not found
tags: Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Fan Colored, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: My childhood friend keeps asking me for a selfie to use as a reference for his drawing, what do I do?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Shinigami no Hanayome: Yomei 7-nichi kara no Koufuku
description:
The reaper loves seeing the cries of humans before swinging down his scythe to reap their souls. He lives for the hunt of humans souls before their passing. Yet one night, he encounters a dying girl with flowers blooming in her room looking back at him with a smile.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Square Enix Manga & Books](https://squareenixmangaandbooks.square-enix-games.com/en-us/series/bride-of-the-death-god)
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Seitokai ni mo Ana wa Aru!
description: When it comes to the face of this student organization, it's a little weird, like a fool, scary, or moody. However, mysterious and futuristic days that seem strangely cute pass by.
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Senkou Shoujo
description: Hamano was an aspiring photographer who has assumed the role of adviser of high school photo department. With is devotion, he brings other members around him, especially Hikari. Meanwhile, the road to professional photography starts to open in front of the Hamano again…
tags: Slice of Life

name: Dao of the Bizarre Immortal
description:
High school student Li Huowang possesses an ability: whenever he closes his eyes, he enters a bizarre cultivation world. In that strange world, he is captured by someone who calls him “Master” and is made into a living medicine—a human cauldron that could be turned into a pill at any moment.

In the real world, however, Li Huowang is a mentally ill patient living in a psychiatric hospital, unable to attend school. The doctors tell him that the bizarre cultivation world is nothing but a hallucination.

Now, caught between reality and illusion, truth and lies, Li Huowang breaks down, crying and shouting:
“Mom, I really can’t tell what’s real anymore!”
tags: Sci-Fi, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Watashi wa Erabarenai
description:
Although her marriage was arranged by her parents, Chloe, the daughter of a count, had deeply loved her fiancé, Ernest, the eldest heir of the Ordrand Marquis family, since childhood. However, she is struck by the shocking reality when Ernest decides to break off their engagement and choose her younger sister, Emily, instead.
Amid the pain of betrayal and heartbreak, Lionel, a young duke from the renowned Cislay family, suddenly appears and proposes marriage to her without any warning.
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy

name: Urban Legend Maker
description: The protagonist Yuan Zhenji crossed to the parallel world of Jiangshi, and found that this world was full of various horror and weirdness, and ordinary humans were as fragile as paper in front of them. He used a notebook called "Urban Legend Records" to create urban legends that affect reality, punish criminals and contain weirdness, absorb the weird rule ability "use magic to defeat magic", and become a monitor who fights against weirdness, and fights with his partners against the coming doomsday-level weirdness...
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Gendai Shakai de Otome Game no Akuyaku Reijou wo Suru no wa Chotto Taihen
description: In the tough times after the Japanese economic bubble burst, a career woman suffering through the aftermath reincarnates as Keikain Runa, the villainess of an otome game with a modern setting! However, not long after reincarnating, she realizes just how dire a situation her family is in due to the ongoing financial recession. Using knowledge from her previous life, Runa sets out to rescue her new family from crisis and stand against the tide of 'the times' that caused her past life to end in misery.
tags: Reincarnation, Video Games, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Akuninzura Shita B-kyuu Boukensha - Shujinkou to Sono Osananajimi-tachi no Papa ni Naru
description:
Gray, a B-rank adventurer, was supposed to be just a mob character in the RPG *Bright Fantasy*. However, by chance, he saved an orphan who was attacked by thugs on the roadside and decided to raise him as his father. But the orphan turned out to be the protagonist of this world, “Isuka”!

This choice would greatly change the fate of the world.

**Note:** While even the English on the Japanese covers gets this wrong, the orphan saved is the *protagonist*, not the *hero*.
___
**Character Designer:** [Hara Kazuhiro](https://mangadex.org/author/edaf7a28-c9c9-4b83-a3be-4087b3e4fcae)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Last Boss Shoujo Akari - Watashi Yori Tsuyoi Yatsu ni Ai ni Gendai ni Iku
description: Not found
tags: Genderswap, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kuromaku Ikka ni Tensei Shita Kedo Gensaku Mushishite Dokuritsu Suru
description: A voluntary banishment declaration from the family, known as a 'mastermind family'! In order to avoid destruction, Yuri decides to live an unconventional slow life in the frontier...!?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Okinawa de Suki ni Natta Ko ga Hougen Sugite Tsura Sugiru
description: I, Nakamura Teruaki, transferred to Okinawa and I'm in love with Kyan, but I don't understand her dialect. Higa is always helping me out by interpreting the dialect...
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: 100 Miles
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Sports, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Eighty Eight wo 2 Dewatte
description:
Mitsuru Fujita is a girl who loves playing piano. When she moves into her high school dormitory, her roommate is Kanade Kobayashi, a former rival at piano competitions. She was hailed as a prodigy, but Kanade has given up the piano due to trauma she suffered while studying abroad. Until Mitsuru invites Kanade to play a duet with her…

(Source: Manga Time Kirara, translated)
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Music

name: A Genius Writer's Random Workplace
description: Jinwoo Kim had been slaving as an assistant writer for 6 years with nothing to show for it. He quits his workplace. Later, he abruptly has a notification pop up and now he has scenes popping into his head and system prompts telling him he must be at a location to write. Maybe this is how he will become a star writer??
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Apocalyptic Chef Awakening
description: Shin Young-jun, a sergeant chef, was greeted by the apocalypse just days before vacation. The battalion turned into chaos in an instant, and the communication network was cut off. Then something appeared before his eyes! [Congratulations on your awakening!] [Job: Novice Chef Lv.1] If I had been a warrior or an assassin, I would have tried to stand alone... What was assigned to him was chef, which is obviously a support job. There's nothing to be done if it's like this. "From here on, I will feed you."
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Cooking, Full Color

name: Light of the Dawn (Remake)
description: Sergeant ‘Burkey’ is a war hero from ‘Sun Empire’. An excellent master of martial arts and the loyalty she has shown to the emperor made her the role model of the Empire’s Soldiers, But behind all that and what anyone does not know, her ultimate goal was always to get revenge on the emperor by overthrowing the Empire. Can bucky get her revenge again the colossal empire?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Brother, Am I Cute?
description:
Si-hyuk finds himself thrust into sudden responsibility when his parents tragically pass away in a car accident, leaving behind his much younger brother, Si-ha, who is two decades his junior. At the funeral, amidst the hushed murmurs of relatives, discussions arise about the uncertain future of the two brothers.

"What's the plan for those two? Who's going to step up?"
"Goodness, now that he's in college, how will he manage to care for his little brother?"
"Wasn't there some insurance payout?"

Amidst the chaos and uncertain discussions, Si-ha utters his first clear words. "Brother. Brother." It's a heartfelt cry, not for Mom or Dad, but for his older brother. Si-hyuk moves slowly toward Si-ha, embracing him tightly. "I'll take care of you," he whispers.
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Shashin
description: Jongli Chu, a warrior of the Death Heavenly Sect who killed Hwang Jung to avenge his older brother. In order to avoid the pursuit of Death Heavenly Sect, he looked to an assassin of the Death Soul Agency, Crimson Assassin, for help and got swept into a huge mess known as the Obliteration. In order to escape the shadow of the Obliteration, he had no choice but to become a legendary Death God! Can Jong Lichu become a Death God and find freedom in the stifling rules created by the orthodox sects?
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Liu Sui Kaishi Chengwei Nvwang
description: I woke up to find myself transmigrated into a novel as the “background character that's doomed to die.” Now stuck in the body of a six-year-old, I’ve got some serious challenges ahead of me. But I’m not about to let fate have its way. Even if I have to become the villain, I’ll do whatever it takes to survive!
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Full Color

name: Genius Hitter Hits Fastball
description:
Even he, Kang Geon-woo, a genius major leaguer who gained wealth, fame, and everything, could not continue a happy married life with his wife. He, who felt regretful about his wife's absence, returned to the past with the power of a mysterious ring.

As a high school student in the midst of a fresh romance, will he be able to find love this time?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Sports, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Return of the Superhero
description:
Zero was mankind’s first real superhero. Under his watch, countless other superheros appeared and followed in his footsteps. However, after 5 years of war, Zero disappeared without a trace.


---

**Note:** this is not your usual Chinese manhua, please read them from right to left (similar to Japanese format).

**Links:**
- [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/1002/)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Superhero, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Shin no Jitsuryoku wa Girigiri Made Kakushite Iyou to Omou
description:
A world where you can form a pact with gods and gain skills. Born as the third son of a famous knight family, Yuno was so busy controlling his innate power that he was eventually called "incompetent.".
However, in the magical knight academy, where he was enrolled for some reason, he fulfilled his fateful encounter with an unnamed god who was despised as "incompetent" like himself..  
Yuno, who formed a pact with the goddess and named her [Athena], secretly decided to make her the highest god, and decided to get a little more serious.
tags: Action, Romance, Magic, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: JESUS Sajin Kouro
description:
Continuation of the manga "Jesus". The legendary killer, hiding under the guise of school teacher Fujisawa Shingo, returns to Japan after more than ten years! What made him come back? What has he been doing for these ten years? Is one of his new students connected to 24?
Read on and find out in JESUS: Path of the Sandstorm!
tags: Action, Crime, Mafia, Military, Drama, School Life, Police

name: Kimi no Love woo Misetekure!
description:
Komichi Shijou, the most famous person at her school, was troubled.
Despite being a romantic comedy manga artist, she had no understanding of 'the feeling of love' was stuck in a creative slump.
One day, a certain boy and girl appear before her.
With their arrival, Komichi Shijou's investigation into 'genuine love' begins…!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Magan no Akuyaku ni Tensei Shita no de Oshi Chara o Mimamoru Mob o Mezashimasu
description: I was reincarnated as “Luxe,” the villain with the “Evil Eye” that appears in the game, but I didn’t want to meet a miserable end after being reincarnated into my favorite game! I decided to find happiness, I started training in “Dark Magic” from that day on in order to fight off the forces that attacked me insearch of the Evil Eye. And eventually, I’ll become a mob that watches over… my favorite characters! This is the story of how I, who was reincarnated as the villain of my favorite game, and my efforts to change my fate.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation

name: I'm Really Not the Evil God's Lackey
description: Lin Jie is an otherworlder who manages a bookstore. He’s kind and always recommends soul-healing books for his dejected customers. Sometimes he’d even share his own works too. As time goes on, these customers start to respect him a lot. They bring simple local products every day to show their gratitude and ask for book recommendations. They even start telling tales of this ordinary shopkeeper. His respectful and cordial titles include “Hyena of the Evil God”, “Herald of the Flesh Gospel”, “Author of Cultes des Goules” and “Shepherd of the Stars”???
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Long Strip, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Boku wo Shirita Sugiru Shimizu-san
description:
Atago Gato is a shy and reclusive high school boy. One day, while preparing for the school festival, a cute and cheerful classmate named Shimizu Roman finds out that he is aiming to become a manga artist. Isn't that amazing? The popular girl, who seems to live in a different world from him, takes an interest in him and asks him a lot of questions he never expected! When he confesses a traumatic experience after being criticized on SNS... Shimizu-san tries to help him overcome it in a slightly strange way...? A youthful romantic comedy in which a cheerful girl and a gloomy boy struggle to make manga!

(Source: AniList)
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Kichiku Eiyuu
description:
It's been 10 years since Takamichi reincarnated in hell. His Incubus power becomes stronger by having sex with women, but his growth peaked. 

"I'll move to a new area, wait for me beautiful women of the new world!"
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Seolyusang Appa
description: Orphan Ah Young is a financially struggling 23-year-old who takes care of her 8-year-old sister Dan Bi while juggling part-time jobs. One day a 28-year-old man Yoo Sang appears in front of Ah Young offering to be her dad through a signed agreement.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Madou Kensei -Densetsu no Kikan-
description: The hero who holds both the strongest title in magic, “Mage,” and the strongest title in swordsmanship, “Sword Saint,” returns to a world 1000 years after becoming a legendary figure!! Balua Westgarden, the “Magic Sword Saint” who once mastered both magic and swordsmanship and etched his name at the pinnacle of human history, challenged the absolute demon king Giranher in a decisive battle for the survival of humanity. However, due to the interference of mysterious forces, both Balua and Giranher lost their lives. For 1000 years, Balua’s soul was bound to the world by regret for dying halfway through his journey. But when Direa Westgarden, a boy who admired the Magic Sword Saint, was attacked by monsters and left on the brink of death, Balua returned to the mortal world by borrowing his body.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Sekai o Horobosu Majo o Sodatemasu!!
description: Takeru, a “Nurturer,” who was born into a family that trains monsters. To make money, he accepts requests from the Demon King and works hard to raise vicious monsters. One night, a wounded witch visits him and asks him to train Anna, a young girl. In fact, Anna is the last survivor of a legendary witch family… Will a bond be formed between Anna, whose ultimate goal is to destroy the world, and Takeru, the best “Nurturer” in the demon world? What will become of the world?
tags: Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Martial Arts Alone
description: A place where you casually use blood or ma in your name, I lived in Murim for 7 years. I was miserable, and I did a lot of dirty things. But I had to do anything to survive. That's 'Nangin' Finally, I crossed the line and experienced death in a desire to become stronger. But when I opened my eyes, it was modern. The world has changed and we are connected to the fantasy world of Pangea?! And as a returner with the only class? Let's scratch the lottery tickets!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Otonari no Onee-san wa XXX Shitai
description:
A love suspense story between a psycho lady and a lonely boy!!
Naoto, who gets treated terribly by his parents, has Naruko, a beautiful lady, show up at his doorstep and starts living next to him as his neighbor. Naruko seems to be kindly accommodating Naoto, but her actions are somewhat "unnatural"... A love suspense story between Naruko (a psycho lady) and Naoto (a lonely boy) unfolds!!
tags: Shota, Mystery

name: Putting My Life on the Line, I Go All-in on Luck Enhancement
description:
Amano Kyouhei was a man abandoned by luck, but after hitting rock bottom, his fate finally begins to change. After a video of him defeating a monster goes viral on the internet, he becomes famous overnight.
This sudden reversal of fortune leads Kyouhei on a lifechanging journey of unforetold adventures. Will this stroke of luck bring him to true fortune, or will he face new trials to overcome…? The answer to that question will be found in his upcoming journey!
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Tomehane!
description:
Tales of a high-school calligraphy club.  
  
A story about a high-school calligraphy club on the verge of breaking up that enters in a major competition while overcoming problems. Yuki, a promising female judoist, and Yukari, a quiet Canadian-raised boy who just returned to Japan, end up joining the club for the sake of maintaining the membership required to keep the club. Together with the old club members with unique characters, they gradually discover the fun of calligraphy and work together to win in the competition.  
  
Tomehane! was nominated for best manga at the first two Manga Taisho.

Live action series adaptation (2010): [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/742-tomehane)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Miracle Physical Therapist
description: Lee Gijeok Physical Therapist. The center is failing, and my girlfriend is drifting away…! On a day when nothing goes right, after being hit by a falling star, a status window appears?! This is a story of a self-centered Man becoming the best physical therapist!
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Marriage Gray
description: My wife is suspicious!! Why did she marry a guy like me…? Ordinary average guy Tsuchioka Naotsugu ended up with Yoshino, who's perfect in all angles of beauty, know-how, and sociability. It's not "marriage blue" it's everyday life questioning over things, so it's "marriage gray" newlywed life, go!
tags: Romance, Slice of Life

name: Mamono Kurai no Boukensha
description: Rude is an adventurer who makes a living by collecting medicinal herbs in dungeons filled with miasma, relying on his unique skill of “abnormal status nullification.” Because of this, other adventurers avoid him because he smells like miasma, and he cannot form a party, so he is derided as a “miasma diver.” Then, a new labyrinth is discovered, and Rude is invited to join a party that needs him as a baggage carrier. In order to change the situation, he challenges the labyrinth. However, after encountering a powerful monster in the labyrinth, the adventurers who accompanied him betray Rude and are abandoned as a decoy… After a life-or-death battle with the monster, he is injured, loses all his supplies, and is in a desperate situation. With the monster’s corpse lying before him, Rude tries to survive by gambling on the forbidden “monster food”… The more he eats, the stronger he becomes. This is the start of an exciting gourmet adventure fantasy!
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Adaptation

name: Split Lover
description:
“If my true heart leaks, I wonder what feelings I will convey…” In this world, if your dissatisfaction rate reaches a certain level, your "Split" will satisfy your desire for you; Fission Syndrome.  
  
Makoto, a first-year high school student who fears Splitting and confessing to his crush, was accustomed to keeping his feelings hidden… Until, one day, in front of Makoto's eyes, his crush develops Fission Syndrome?! Moreover, it was a terrible Split that appeared…  
  
Received a grand prize at the 3rd Manga Box Editorial Club. "I can't hide my thoughts in this world," the Split Love manga is finally published!
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: My Younger Sister Was a Genius
description: Yoon Hajoon, who struggled to pursue his musical career despite his iffy talents and ended up sacrificing his own family along the way, " If only I could turn back time...! " One day, after living with regrets and alcohol for a while, he woke up and found himself had returned to the past. Just then, it dawned on him. The fact that my younger sister is a musical genius...! Now is the time to turn my life around, that is by producing my younger sister into becoming the best singer!
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Music, Full Color

name: Class no Bocchi Gal wo Omochikaeri Shite Seisokei Bijin ni Shite Yatta Hanashi
description: On a rainy night, Akira Akamori, a high school student about to transfer to a new school, saw his blonde classmate, Aoi Soutome, standing in the park drenched from the rain. "...I don't have a home anymore." Though Aoi was a complete stranger to him, Akira couldn't leave a girl alone, so he took her home. "Thanks for the help." "I-It's fine..." When Akira heard about Aoi's complicated situation, he decided to help her and let her live with him until he transferred to a new school. While confused by their new cohabitation arrangement, the two slowly grew close to each other. It is a love story of two people who repeatedly come together and drift apart, like a spinning record.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Mesh
description:
The story follows the life of a teenage boy named "Mesh," so-called for his unique "mesh"-colored hair: blonde with silver strands on the sides. It begins with a scene where Mesh, after being beaten, escapes from a mob and encounters Milon, a forger and painter. Mesh ends up staying at Milon’s house, and the two form an unlikely bond as they navigate life together. Each chapter is a poetic blend of crime, peaceful everyday moments, or the vibrant nightlife of artists in a fictionalized Paris.

"Mesh" is regarded as one of Hagio Moto’s defining works, marking a pivotal shift in her artistic style. It was her first series to adopt a more realistic look while retaining the ethereal beauty characteristic of 1970s shōjo art. The story ventures into more mature themes while continuing to explore Hagio's recurring motifs, such as parent-child relationships and adolescence.
tags: Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Okutama Kojin Meikyuu - Shinshoku shite Kita Isekai Meikyuu
description: "Dungeons are invading Japan! Conquer dungeons of swords and magic with 'modern science'!" A dungeon suddenly appeared in the modern world. And the witches by the magic essence "mana" overflowing from the erosion mouth. A new occupation "Adventurer" is born.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Ore Dake Mugen Sosei Suru S-Kyuu no Saiyaku Tou
description: Not found
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Isshou Watashi no Joshu de ite!
description:
"The relationship between a detective and their assistant is not unlike romance!"

Due to his natural tendency to assist others (a "helper type" personality that makes him constantly want to lend a hand), Mitomo Tasuku had always lived in the shadows. To break out of this, he made it his life's mission to "become number one." However, at the high school he transfers to, he encounters three detective girls, who happen to be his rivals from elementary school with whom he formed a detective club together. Thus begins Tasuku's fierce battle for the top detective spot! However... these girls seem to harbor passionate feelings of a different kind...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Our Guild's Idol
description: "Ah-jin," who was enjoying the game using her younger brother's account, approached the female user [Flower Princess] for the sake of the guild, but ended up being identified as a lurking female. "Actually, I'm a woman...!" Meanwhile, 'Ji-hyeon,' who is secretly active as [Flower Princess], feels that the voice in the video sent by Ah-jin sounds familiar...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Professor
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, School Life, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Countach
description:
The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun receives a letter… from himself? It was written 25 years before for his future self. 
That letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. 
With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Slice of Life

name: Azure Radio
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Honkai Impact 3rd - Valkyries' Dining Escapades
description:
This is a story about the Valkyries living in the dorm and their culinary adventures. Each valkyrie has a different specialty but they all share the same desire to convey their feelings to their loved ones through cooking.  

---

Valkyries are more than warriors. They are also exquisite chefs and connoisseurs of fine living. Study from these masters of the kitchen because their recipes actually churn out delicious gourmet food!

---

tags: Long Strip, Video Games, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Full Color

name: M Collection
description: This tongue-in-cheek semi-autobiography follows the absurdly gruesome adventures of a lonely boy and his singularly crazed family. His escape from the madness that surrounds him is his collection of pickled animal and human body parts, to which he adds as one family member after another meet with a grotesque and sometimes terrifyingly funny death... (Source: AniList)
tags: Monsters, Ghosts, Comedy, Anthology, Zombies, Gore, Horror, Supernatural

name: S-Rank Monster no Behemoth Dakedo, Neko to Machigawarete Erufu Musume no Kishi (Pet) Toshite Kurashitemasu
description: The elven girl Aria is a stunning and swift adventurer. When a small cat-like beast with an adorable face embraces Aria's fruitful chest during a dungeon exploration, she decides to keep it as a pet and names it "Tama". At first sight it's just an average cat, but Aria has yet to notice that Tama is a reincarnated chivalrous former Knight and that its identity is not that of a cat, but of a young monster of the strongest class "Behemoth".
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Sasada wa Tomodachi
description:
Yuki Takahashi attends Chabatake High School. Life is a series of party chances and she loves to have fun. Emi Sasada, who also attends Chabatake High School. She is a 16 year old who loves canned snakes and praying mantis and is still uncertain of her own form. The two of them, who were at the farthest end of the class, meet by chance one day after school and...?

This is the kind of manga that makes you think, "maybe my memories of high school, which had been so dull, weren't so bad after all."
tags: School Life, Slice of Life

name: Slime Blossom: A Reincarnated Genius in a New World
description: Taiga Hiiragi, a delinquent, lived a life consumed by daily brawls. One day, Noel, a genius slime reincarnated from another world, appears before him. When Taiga finds himself in a pinch during a fight, Noel uses his intellect to help him out. Then Noel declares to Taiga, “Slimes and Yankees(delinquents) should go to Tokyo University!!” Noel claims he’s here to help Taiga pass the Tokyo University entrance exam, but…?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy

name: My Blossoming Summer
description: This is a story about friends, & their evolving relationships through school. Our main protagonist in this story follows Hideo Asano, a student & his friends. His younger brother Mitsuru, His Christian Childhood friend Ayaka, who loves him. His gaming classmates, Kou & Shoji, Ayaka's friends Kohaku & Haruko & many others as the series goes on.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, 4-Koma, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: The Ember Knight
description:
When Nagyunn’s twin brother, Najin, is murdered before his very eyes, he vows to avenge his brother’s death by assuming Najin’s identity. 

But although the two may look alike, when it comes to fighting, Nagyunn lacks the talent and skill his brother possessed. In order to successfully execute his plot for revenge, Nagyunn resolves to train himself to become the prodigious knight-in-training his brother once was. 

Will Nagyunn be able to keep his identity a secret before others begin to catch on to his act?

---
- [Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SC46p8Zh2g4)
---

tags: Action, Long Strip, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Albus Changes the World
description:
The Demon King was defeated. The world is at peace. But… it was too late.

Hero Albus is in a hurry. The story turns and begins again, as if naturally, from the place where it all started. The well-informed hero Albus embarks on a new adventure, where time is of the essence. 

Time-saving! Efficient adventure strategy! When recruiting a priest, be forceful! It doesn’t matter if you are mistaken for a new kind of scam. And suddenly, he challenges an S-class dangerous monster. 

Hero Albus seeks to reclaim the future he desires from the past in this ultra-fast readventure (real-time attack) fantasy!
tags: Time Travel, Action, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Pumpkin Night
description: After escaping from a mental institution, a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her, face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.
tags: Action, Psychological, Gore, Drama, Horror, Tragedy

name: Ore ni Trauma wo Ataeta Joshi-tachi ga Chirachira Mitekuru kedo, Zannen desu ga Teokure desu
description: Kokonoe Yukito has always been unlucky when it comes to women. He was rejected by his childhood friend, which he thought they had mutual feelings for each other. His sister hates him. His mother neglected him. Due to all these trauma stacking with each other, his emotions were completely destroyed. When Yukito enters high school, the girls who inflicted these pain on him started to care for him...?!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Incest, Harem, Drama, School Life, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Yumizuka Iroha wa Tejun ga Daiji!
description: Yumizuka-san grew up as the daughter of one of Japan's leading families of archery. But she had a secret about her seemingly perfect life! A tempestuous romantic comedy about a captivating archer!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, School Life

name: Bokura no Ai wa Kimochi Warui
description:
Everyone is hiding a "secret."

Azuki Komugi is obsessed with ruminating on her memories of her high school girlfriend "Meguru," and creating a body model of hers out of clay.

One day, Azuki drops her homemade "Meguru" at the 100-yen shop where she works part-time, and sneaks into her workplace on her off-shift to get "her" back. However, what she sees there is a fellow co-worker, high school girl Yoyuki Remu, who is about to express her lust for "Meguru" in a way that is different from Azuki's...
tags: Girls' Love, Drama

name: The Senpai Behind Me
description: A car date with my favourite senpai ♡
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Girls' Love, Tragedy

name: Shigoto Kaeri, Dokushin no Bijin Doushi ni Tanomarete
description:
One day, a young clerk named Haruhiko was suddenly asked by his boss to do one thing: get her pregnant.

“We have nothing to do with anything else… We just have to do it, that is, you have to get me pregnant, and I have your baby.

The loveless relationship between the two had begun. Although the condition was not to fall in love with each other, the distance between the two gradually narrowed.

The romance story between a typical worker and a divorced female boss. It has officially begun.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!
description:
Tomoko Kuroki naturally assumed she'd be popular when she got to high school... but then cold, hard reality swooped in for the attack! Turns out all the popularity points she's racked up in her video game dating sims are worth squat in real life, and Tomoko's far from prepared to navigate high school! 

How can she possibly hope to impress her classmates when she can't even talk to them?! A new high-school heroine is born (maybe?)!
tags: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Shonan Pure Love Gang!
description: Eikichi Onizuka and Ryuji Danma are members of infamous biker gang, Oni Baku. When not out riding around, they can be found in school, trying to pick up young women. This is the story of the young Onizuka, who would later become the greatest teacher in Japan.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Kannou Sensei
description:
Narumi Rokurou is still adrift in life in his forties, unmarried, and working as an editor at a publishing company while writing hardly lucrative literary fiction. His days enjoying life at his own pace are brought to an end one summer night, when a strange twist of fate brings Rokurou together with a mysterious beauty, beginning the story of their crazed love.   
As once was spoken by Zarathustra: “Everything in a woman is a riddle.”.
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Kuro Hitsuji no Ayumi
description: The protagonist, Asahi, returns to her hometown after seven years. On her first day at the new school, Asahi is happy to be reunited with her beloved childhood friend, Haruhiko, but she soon sees something terrifying outside the window. At that moment, the classroom is enveloped in a strange atmosphere...
tags: Psychological, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: Soul Land II - The Peerless Tang Sect
description:
A land without magic, dou-qi, martial arts, but with essence spirits instead. This is the continent 10,000 years after the formation of the Tang Sect. A new hero and his friend walk the land, a new "Seven Monsters of Shriek." Will they keep up the name of the Tang Sect? Or will it crumble due to a new essence system?  

---

**Notes:**
- This is Soul Land's sequel, but you don't have to read it before reading this. There might be spoilers though.
- Starting at chapter 181, the manhua format changes to long strip.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Sounds Like
description: A dazzling survival band audition, youth? Revenge? Well, the only thing for sure is… ‘As long as I’m here, you won’t debut gracefully.’ My brother, Ha Seong-woo, a famous singer-songwriter, was murdered. The killer was Baek Do-hyung, my brother’s friend and colleague. The moment I found out, I, Ha Su-in, also died in an unexpected accident… After a moment of excruciating pain, I opened my eyes to find myself back 5 years ago, when my brother died. This second chance, I won’t just stand by and watch like before. I’m going to enter <PICK BAND 2>, the follow-up season of the audition my brother won and the grand debut stage for the killer Baek Do-hyung, and ruin everything. Just me? No, I’ll gather geniuses that no one can mess with. After all, I’ve replayed this audition hundreds of times.
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Music, Full Color

name: Minami no Teiou
description: Centers around Ginjirou Manda, a loan shark who charges toichi — 10% more interest every 10 days, or 365% every year. Thanks to his unrelenting money-collecting tactics, he is feared as "Minami no Oni" or the "Demon" of Osaka's Minami business district.
tags: Action, Crime, Mafia, Video Games

name: Kimi no Tame no Eden
description:
"Please... Kiss Me"

The young man, Yuusei Hakozaki, carries the memory of being kidnapped and confined along with six girls during his childhood. One day, as an adult leading a peaceful life, a girl suddenly appears before him and demands a kiss...!?

Yuusei is told of a single "rule": He must kiss the girls once every 24 hours. If he fails to do so, their heads will explode and they will die.

To save the girls from their deadly fate, Yuusei starts a communal life with them where he must "kiss them every day." In this closed-off miniature Eden, the story begins to unfold. Can Yuusei discern their lies and truths and find his one destined partner?
tags: Official Colored, Long Strip, Romance, Harem, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Stuck in the Tower
description: A world where gates open and monsters come out to play— Hyunsoo longs to enter the tower and take on the role a sa hunter. But in reality, he works as a porter and meat shield of E Class Hunters who are worse than gangsters. Moreover, he was taken advantage by this hunters to the point where he was about to meet death. As soon as he thought that he was dead, he was summoned to the tower, was revived back from the dead, and began climbing up the tower to become a hunter that he had been longing to be. Depending on how much coins one has, the tower offers them the chance to challenge it. Hyunsoo looks at the number of coins he has…. [You have an infinite number of coins!] “Then I’ll awaken myself in the 100th floor and go home!!!” Hyunsoo, who is stucked in the tower, begins his conquer!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Tsuma ga Kuchi wo Kiitekuremasen
description:
***Winner of the 25th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize for "Short Story!***

A highly discussed and polarizing work that delves into marital issues, sparking major media reactions!

*Why is my wife angry...?*

A husband who thought he was living a peaceful life with his wife, daughter, and son as a typical four-person family suddenly finds himself in an unspoken crisis. One day, his wife stops talking to him. Days turn into weeks, and eventually, this wordless existence stretches into six years. There's no memory of a major fight, and household chores and childcare continue as usual. The only difference? Beyond the bare minimum of necessary communication, his wife doesn't speak to him at all.

Originally serialized to great acclaim on the *Yomitai* website, this much-anticipated book includes the shocking final chapter written exclusively for this release.
tags: Slice of Life

name: Gakuen Idolm@ster: Gold Rush
description: The story of girls who attend a school where dreams come true!
tags: School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music

name: Meccha Shoukan Sareta Ken
description:
Name’s Inori Takafuji. I’m not really much of a “go-getter,” if you catch my drift — sleep’s more my style — but getting summoned to another world kinda messed things up.

Bit hard to chill when you’ve got a king in your face telling you there’s a bad guy you’ve gotta go slay or whatever, you know? Plot twist, though — it’s actually not so bad. Getting the hero treatment sounds pretty nice, right?

But then it happens again! Some other clown summons me, I get my obligatory superpower, and off I go. And sure, that’s fine. It happens, sometimes you get isekai’d to the wrong place. But then it happens AGAIN! Someone ELSE summons me, I get ANOTHER superpower, and then I’m somewhere totally new.

Repeat ad nauseam.

No idea what’s going on, but all I want is one thing: stop !@#$ing summoning me!

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/oversummoned-overpowered-and-over-it)
tags: Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation

name: Revolutionary Princess Eve
description:
After the fall of the empire due to the homunculi, Evienrose, the 7th Princess, dies after drinking poison given by her younger sister who has taken their side. When she opens her eyes again, she has returned 8 years to the past. To stop the fall of the imperial family, Eve decides to turn 'Mikhael', the leader of the homunculi and the 'Monster of the Floating Prison', into her appointed knight.

"Mikhael, I need you, very much."

---
Princess Evienrose, despite advocating fiercely for the rights of the homunculi rebels, now awaits death at their hands… that is until she is poisoned by her own sister! Awakening eight years in the past, Eve now has one goal: become the Empress and liberate the homunculi to stop the rebellion from ever happening! To do this, she appoints the rebel king himself, Mikaelis Agnito, as her personal knight. But with Eve’s scheming sisters standing in the way, the fight for the crown is on, and the fate of the Hadelamid empire rests in her hands!

---
The seventh imperial princess, Evenrose, once died. Her last memory was of the royal family was destroyed by the Homunculus, the rebelling slaves, and of her sister who had sided with the rebels and urged her to escape her painful execution by swallowing poison. But when she opened her eyes again, "I...I'm not dead." She realizes that she had gone eight years back in time, back to a time before her cruel sister Bridgette was chosen as the next emperor. Given the opportunity to prevent the fall of the imperial family by being chosen as the next emperor herself, she decides to write her own article about Michael, the king of Homunculus and the monster of public prison, in order to win the emperor's heart. "I need you, Michael. Very badly." Will Evenrose be able to get him and protect the imperial family safely?

---
Other Official Translations:

* [Simplified Chinese / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/The-Traitor-Conqueror-Princess/3471)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66840)
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Superstar From Age 0
description:
From elves, fairies, slimes, gift items, devils and more, countless and thousands of reincarnations have led to a new life. I, Lee Seo Jun, have been reborn as a human child!

In the library of my life, where memories of my previous lives remain like fairy tales, I happen to see a past life with the dream life I desperately wanted. On top of that, I’ve been given abilities that grabs people’s attention!

With my hansome face doing all the hard work! My insane acting skills! This time, at long last, I will achieve my dream and become a superstar!

Wet’s dow it! (Baby Accent)
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Global Examination
description: This is a test that puts your life at stake. Pass the test and survive. When the two-faced examiner Qin Jiu meets the cold examinee You Huo, the two amnesiacs are put head to head in a fight by the inhumane system. However, they form a tactic agreement. The system collapses after a series of warnings and the erased memories gradually become clearer. It turns out that at the end of this smoke-filled world, you are still the first person I met. The world is brilliant and grand. Welcome home.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Survival, Adaptation

name: Kiss n Karess !
description: This is a girls love series. When a delinquent and a role model student start dating, they must conceal their relationship because of their reputations. People would be outraged and not approve of such a couple. Even though Alix and Skip are complete opposites like night and day, they manage to maintain a loving relationship.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: The Demon King Levels Up
description:
Now that the demonic realm and the heavenly realm have called a truce, the human world has returned to an era of peace.

Jeon Minchul lives the life of an ordinary college student until the day he comes across an artifact from the war and remembers — in his past life, he was the demon king who brought the world to its knees.

Upon recalling these memories, Minchul awakens his old powers, along with some new ones. But can this demon king harness the powers of both good and evil to protect the peace?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Game That I Came From
description:
With the rise of a popular RPG called Tianyong Game, its max-level players called "awakeners" have come to dominate the real world in terms of wealth and power. 

Despite Ling Ce's natural talent for the game, it's nearly impossible for him to catch up to these players because he started playing the game a year after its release. But as luck would have it, a glitch in the game's teleportation system takes him back three years into the past with his memories intact.

Now, Ling Ce is determined to utilize his knowledge and experiences to become an awakener and turn his life around. No amount of carnivorous plant monsters or insanity level dungeons will stop the determined hero from reaching the peak!


---

**Links:**
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/88411)
- [Official Korean Translation](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58409509)
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: How I Attended an All-Guy's Mixer
description: Tokiwa, a university student, is invited to a three-on-three blind date by Suou, a fellow classmate. On the day of the mixer, he goes to the pub where they are supposed to meet, only to find a group of handsome men waiting for him...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Slice of Life

name: The Saga of Tanya the Evil
description:
A young girl fights on the frontlines in war. She has blonde hair, blue eyes, and nearly transparent white skin as she flies through the air and mercilessly strikes down her enemies. Her name is Tanya Degurechaff and speaks with a young girl's lisp while she commands the army.

Tanya used to be one of Japan's elite office workers, but because of a wrathful god was reborn as a little girl. Prioritizing optimization and career advancement above all, she will become the most dangerous entity among the Imperial Army's sorcerers.  

Adapted from Light Novel of same name.  

---

**Note:** Manga and Light Novel Licensed in English by Yen Press as "The Saga of Tanya the Evil".
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Historical, Action, Psychological, Survival, Magic, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Papa no Iukoto wo Kikinasai!
description:
The story is about the daily life of a college freshman in the Literature Department of Tama University. He and his sister grew up on their own together after their parent's departure, but he decided to start living by himself when she got married to a man with two daughters from previous marriages. Shocked by their marriage, he attempted to distance himself from the family, leaving home before his sister gave birth to the man's third child. Approximately 3 years later he was asked by his sister to visit and babysit the girls…  
While he was looking after the girls, the plane which their parents were on went missing. He decided to take with him his three nieces (aged 14, 10 and 3 years old), resulting in the four of them sharing his tiny apartment.
tags: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Gantz (Official Colored)
description:
How long will you stay in the game?

The last thing Kei and Masaru remember was being struck dead by a subway train while saving the life of a drunken bum. What a waste! And yet somehow they're still . . . alive? Or semi-alive? Maybe it's reanimated . . . by some kind of alien orb with a nasty message . . . "Your lives are over. What you do with your new lives is up to me!" And what this orb called "Gantz" intends to do with their lives is make them play games of death, hunting all kinds of odd aliens, along with a bunch of other ordinary citizens who've recently met a tragic semi-end. The missions they embark upon are often dangerous. Many die-and die again.

---
Links: 
* Alternative [official raw](https://www.shueisha.co.jp/books/search/search.html?titleauthor=GANTZ+%E3%82%AB%E3%83%A9%E3%83%BC%E7%89%88&digital=1)
tags: Official Colored, Action, Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama, Horror, Tragedy

name: The Great
description:
A girl who dreams one day, a woman who loves one day. Now I'm a wife and mother of two.

My dreams were crushed by reality, and the memories of love were too short to comfort her.

Her ordinary life, or her..."The Great"
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Blue Lock
description:
Yoichi Isagi lost the opportunity to go to the national high school championships because he passed to his teammate who missed instead of shooting himself. Isagi is one of 300 U-18 strikers chosen by Jinpachi Ego, a man who was hired by the Japan Football Association after the 2018 FIFA World Cup, to guide Japan to winning the World Cup by destroying Japanese football. Ego's plan is to isolate the 300 strikers into a prison-like institution called "Blue Lock", in order to create the world's biggest "egotist"/striker, which has been lacking in Japanese football.

---
**Notes:**
- **Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**

**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10008/episode/318774) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/blue-lock/)
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Disease
description: Terminally ill lad, after losing his family in an incident, finds out that hidden behind the disease is an extraordinary power. While pursuing the truth behind his family's death, he himself gets dragged further down the mysterious, dark abyss…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Sunyu of the Shadowless
description: Some children are raised in the hands of Kwak No, After establishing a Disciple-Master relationship, the children dream of their own dreams by practicing martial arts and walking in that path to become masters. In order to make a living, Kwak No always had to leave his seat, and Seon-yu, the eldest of the children, has to take care of the Children, and He’ll be the Great Master.
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy

name: The Kingdoms of Ruin
description: Due to the Gear Expansion, witches who had been friends with the people become unnecessary. Humans, who were afraid of unscientific power, begin a witch hunt… And a human boy who has his beloved witch killed becomes the “Wizard of vengeance”.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: My Son, Quickly Rely On Your Father's Prestige
description: Qin Chuan transmigrated into a mysterious fantasy world. Not only did he gain a son, Qin Zi, for free, but also a cheatcode—a system that made him stronger every time his son caused trouble. After discovering that Qin Zi was a weakling with immense plot armor, Qin Chuan started on an endless journey to troll his son…
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Action, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: The Heavenly Demon Became an Idol
description:
One day, a handsome man dressed in martial arts attire appeared in front of Manager Jeom So-Eui of the martial arts idol group 'Noble Alliance'. Introducing himself as 'The Heavenly Demon, Wi Hwajin', the man abruptly declared his intention to become an idol. Jeom So-Eui tried to pass this problem to the martial arts fanatic CEO of K-tsch, the agency of 'Noble Alliance', but the suspiciously wealthy martial arts enthusiast decided to let the Heavenly Demon join 'Noble Alliance'.

The Heavenly Demon, who claimed to represent the righteous faction, entered 'Noble Alliance'! However, there is a hidden motive behind the Heavenly Demon joining 'Noble Alliance' that even Jeom So-Eui doesn't know about....
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Isekai, Full Color

name: Mujikaku na Tensai Shoujo wa Kizukanai
description:
She is a genius in all fields of magic, swordsmanship, alchemy, domestic affairs, music, painting, and novels?! She was able to do anything. However, she always tried not to be selfish, and decided to run away from home...! She is now an adventurer in a new world due to a chance encounter. Liliane unknowingly demonstrates all her talents...?!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n3032hc)
tags: Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Slave B
description:
This is a world whose peace was destroyed by the Shadow Lord, ‘Secneum’. ‘Niro’ is a half-elf, half-human boy who lost his parents as a baby and was adopted by a slave couple. In this world, slaves are not treated as humans. Since Niro’s adoptive parents are slaves, they are mistreated and eventually lose their lives. Now Niro is alone once more, and must shoulder the burdens of his family and do whatever is takes to protect his two younger siblings. If Niro wants to escape this fate, there is only one thing he can do. He must graduate from the academy, ‘Excanum’ just like the current Emperor, ‘Muren’ who was once a slave!

---
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E8%B6%85%E5%A5%B4%E8%8B%B1%E9%9B%84/86)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/647954)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/74286)

- [Official French Translation](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/Slave-B)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/slave_B_%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%AA/7)
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Chihayafuru
description:
Chihaya is a girl in the sixth grade, still not old enough to even know the meaning of the word zeal. But one day, she meets Arata, a transfer student from rural Fukui prefecture. Though docile and quiet, he has an unexpected skill: his ability to play competitive karuta, a traditional Japanese card game. Chihaya is struck by his obsession with the game, along with his ability to pick out the right card and swipe it away before any of his opponents. However, Arata is transfixed by her as well, all because of her unbelievable natural talent for the game. Don't miss the first volume in this story of adolescent lives and emotions playing out in the most dramatic of ways.

---
  
- **Won the 2nd Manga Taisho Award in 2009** 
- **Won the 35th Kodansha Manga Award for Shoujo in 2011**
  


---

**Official Websites:**   
- [Live-Action Movies](http://chihayafuru-movie.com)  
- [Chihayafuru Charity Fund Info](https://chihayafund.com/)  
- [Chihayafuru Charity Fund Store](https://chihayafund.stores.jp/)
tags: Award Winning, Traditional Games, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Ohitorisama ni wa Naremashita no de. Konyakusha Houchi-chuu!
description: Countess Nicole's fiancé, Chaos, is always by his childhood friend, Princess Caroline's side. As a result of being constantly neglected by Chaos, Nicole has awakened to the idea of ​​being alone, thinking, "If that's what he likes, then I should do what I like too!"...? While Nicole has discovered the ease of being alone, Chaos, on the other hand, doesn't seem to understand the seriousness of the situation...? The long-awaited comic adaptation of the slapstick love comedy of Chaos and Nicole, whose mutual unrequited love has become complicated!
tags: Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Since I don't know about it, should we part ways, Your Majesty?
description:
Due to a carriage accident, Lumiere suffers from amnesia. 
While searching for her memories, she discovers a warning in her diary.

[Do not fall for him.]

At that time, a man claiming to be her lover appears.
“I know everything about you, even the parts you don't know yourself.”

This man, who doesn't exist in her memories.
But she finds herself increasingly attracted to him…

… Were we really lovers? Why did we break up?
Is approaching the truth really the right thing for me?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Full Color

name: Heavenly Demon Wants to Be A Chef
description:
Due to a gate-related accident, Woojin regains the memories of his past life... a life as the Heavenly Demon, ruler of China! 

However, as the Heavenly Demon, there was a dream he never managed to achieve. Now, in this life, he'll do whatever it costs to fulfill his lifelong dream of becoming a chef! 

This is the legendary(?) story of Cheon Woojin, the former Heavenly Demon, chasing his dreams!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Cooking, Full Color

name: I'm Being Mistaken for a Soccer Genius
description: The Korean boy, Lee Jian, who was released from a prestigious youth team in Italy, spends his days idling away as a substitute even after arriving at the youth team of AC Firenze, almost as if he were running away.As usual, he boasts to his childhood friend, Kim Jiwoo, claiming to be a genius, but then he hears the shocking news that Jiwoo is coming to Italy to study abroad. Determined not to disappoint his precious (?) friend Jiwoo, Jian sets his sights on becoming a starter...
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Sports, Drama, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: Takahashi met Nanase, a beautiful and seemingly innocent woman, on a dating app. They were steadily growing closer in their relationship until one day, when he goes to Nanase's house, he finds a shocking sight...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama

name: Foam of the Waves
description:
"Never forgive me."
Margret, who was brutally murdered by her lover, is reborn 7 years later as 'Meg'. Will 'Meg', who doesn't know anything about the world, be able to acclimate well into her new life...? A story uncovering the truth behind her death and the growing love between the characters!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Beginning After the End
description:
King Grey has unrivaled strength, wealth, and prestige in a world governed by martial ability. However, solitude lingers closely behind those with great power. Beneath the glamorous exterior of a powerful king lurks the shell of man, devoid of purpose and will.

Reincarnated into a new world filled with magic and monsters, the king has a second chance to relive his life. Correcting the mistakes of his past will not be his only challenge, however. Underneath the peace and prosperity of the new world is an undercurrent threatening to destroy everything he has worked for, questioning his role and reason for being born again.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Bonnou☆Saiyuuki
description: The manga is a re-imagining of the famous Chinese classic Journey to the West story, and centers on the Buddhist priest Genjō and his journey to India as he is accompanied by three beautiful and charming women: Son Gokū, Cho Hakkai, and Sha Gojyo.
tags: Genderswap, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Heavenly Demon Will Give You a Massage
description: Heaven-bound Heavenly Demon, once known as Kang Taehan, Returns to his original life after 60 years! "Ah, in such a blessed era, to be in this shape!" "Your body is screaming to be saved, haven't you heard?" The project to physically and mentally rejuvenate everyone, The journey of the Heavenly Demon Kang Taehan begins!! Weary office workers tired from alcohol and overtime, Athletes whose bodies are ruined and performance declined, Heads of families crushed by the weight of life, Modern people who have accumulated fat to withstand life’s burdens. All you modern people who are weary of their life, come and get a massage!
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Tenshi no Saezuri
description:
Sanae Kitajima is a psychiatrist specializing in end-of-life care. Her boyfriend, Takanashi, who once struggled with a deep fear of death, returns from an Amazon expedition profoundly changed. What happened during the expedition? What is the true meaning behind his cryptic words, "I can hear the whispers of angels"?

A complete manga adaptation of Yusuke Kishi's original novel, known for producing numerous masterpiece horror novels such as The Black House and Lesson of the Evil.
tags: Thriller, Horror, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: The Life of a Returning Officer
description:
Choi Jong-hyuk, captain of the intellectual crime unit, loses his mother and his own life to a mysterious mastermind for digging too deeply into a case. In his last moments, Jong-hyuk catches a glimpse of the man who kills him before waking up as his 17-year-old self.

 To prevent his mother's death, Jong-hyuk swears to hunt down the one responsible. Luckily, he has knowledge about the future and his experience as an officer.

Will these tools be enough to catch the criminal that eluded him once?
tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Crime, Drama, Fantasy, Police, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Tensei Shitara Sainou ga Atta Ken ~Isekai Itte mo Doryoku Suru~
description:
In a twist of fate, a diligent ronin student finds himself transported to an unfamiliar realm. This unexpected journey began when he valiantly attempted to stop a robbery alongside a female store clerk. Longing for a unique ability that he could hone through hard work, he sought the blessings of a deity. Consequently, he was endowed with two rare talents: "Innate Talent," allowing him to consistently surpass others, and "Clairvoyance," which grants him the insight to assess both individuals and objects. Yet, there's a catch; he requires thrice the standard experience to ascend in levels.

Reborn as Mars, the second son of a noble viscount lineage, he remains committed to refining his abilities. However, the town's periphery shows alarming indications of an imminent monster incursion. Thus, Mars' extraordinary journey of reincarnation in this fantastical world commences.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Maknae Has to Be an Idol
description:
"I will leave the debut group."
I can't make it in this group. I should leave and set up a chicken restaurant so that my brothers could at least make a name for themselves.
Destined to be a failed idol, I decided to leave the group for the betterment of the others.
However,
[A member dies if you leave the debut group.]
What?
"...This is making me crazy."
The struggles of Bong Tae-Yoon, the Maknae on top, whose hands hold the lives of his group members, begins now!
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Sokushi Cheat ga Saikyou Sugite, Isekai no Yatsura ga Marude Aite ni Naranai n desu ga
description:
Growth cheats? Infinite magic power? The ability to utilize all archetypes? What’s the point if instant death ends everything with a single attack? 
 
Awaking to absolute chaos and carnage while on a school trip, Yogiri Takatou discovers that everyone in his class has been transported to another world!

He had somehow managed to sleep through the entire ordeal himself, missing out on the Gift — powers bestowed upon the others by a mysterious Sage who appeared to transport them. Even worse, he and another classmate were ruthlessly abandoned by their friends, left as bait to distract a nearby dragon. Although not terribly bothered by the thought of dying, he reluctantly decides to protect his lone companion. After all, a lowly Level 1000 monster doesn't stand a chance against his secret power to invoke Instant Death with a single thought!

If he can stay awake long enough to bother using it, that is...
tags: Action, Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Official "Test" Manga
description:
From the creator of popu***l***ar ser***i***es like ***T***wo Pi***e***ce, Da***r***uto, ***a***nd Detergent, comes the series Test, an award winning romantic comedy about a high schoo***l*** weapon meister named Yugi as he trave***l***s the entire world collecting all the Life Notes, so that one da***y*** ***h***e can recover h***i***s bro***t***her's body after performing the taboo of one punching the Titan we saw that day with his Stand and becoming the Nokage Pirate King -dattebayo. Watch as he roams through the Ho***l***y ***E***mpi***r***e of Britannia with his Onii-chan and generic harem girls as they conquer all odds with the power of friendship, love and…(why don't they just bang each other.) In this feature length epic rivaling that of Gilgamesh and the Iliad we will explore the mentality and sociology of these societal menaces as they ravage the Earth in their never quenchable thirst for imoutos.  Reviewers gives this series a 10/10 for the unconventional portrayal of the magical girl genre.  Nominated for the 1st Mangadex Award for Worst Manga of the Year.  Winner of the 2nd Mangadex Awards for Best Manga of the Year.  Best manga ever written, as stated by meichiro noda

---

**Note:** Please do *NOT* add genres or Test will pollute genre searches. Because this manga is the most purest form of any manga [The plural of manga is manga]
**Fun fact:** In the year 127, when this manga was originally released, it used to be called Taest, but because of American per/letter printing costs it was shortened to Test.

+++ hah

I'm not really… not really sure what happens at one centimeter away… 'cause it's my first time. I don't really understand it either. Seriously. name: Prey
description: Park Yun-yeong has a mysterious power which allows her to see ghastly creatures that seem to inhabit our world but not interact with it - unless they notice you acknowledge their existence. That’s when they stop being harmless.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Ghosts, Long Strip, Survival, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: The Guy She Was Interested in Wasn't a Guy at All
description:
Fashionable and upbeat high schooler Aya falls head over heels for an employee at a local CD shop. He’s got an air of mystery about him, always dressed well, and has impeccable taste in music. Little does she know — this supposedly male employee is actually her female classmate Mitsuki!

Mitsuki generally keeps to herself, but since her seat is right next to Aya’s, she can't help but be extremely aware of the other’s crush. Revealing the truth is out of the question — but perhaps getting closer to Aya wouldn’t be so bad...

***Overwhelming winner in the Web category of the 2023 Tsugimanga Awards (by Kadokawa).***
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Music, Gyaru

name: Madame Petite
description:
It's the 1920s and Mariko, age 16, is married to a man 30 years her senior. She is honestly happy 
to be his wife and really excited to board the Orient express in Turkey on their honeymoon trip. 
But her life takes a rapid turn when her husband is discovered dead after the first night on board… 
And that's only the start of Mariko's great adventure.
tags: Thriller, Historical, Romance, Adventure, Drama

name: 2.5 Jigen no Ririsa
description:
From Seven Seas:
“I have no interest in real girls!” So claims Okumura, the president of the school’s manga club. He’s your typical otaku, obsessed with a sexy (fictional) 2D manga character known as Liliel. Then the new school year starts, and a (real!) 3D girl named Lilysa whose passion is cosplay joins the club. Lilysa convinces Okumura to become her photographer–and guess who her favorite manga character is? Not only that, but Lilysa is into modeling the fetishy stuff, The boundaries between 2D and 3D start to blur as this hot-blooded romantic comedy unfolds.

English volumes by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/2-5-dimensional-seduction/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Dentist Won't Stop Teasing Me
description: After suffering from an unbearable pain caused by a wisdom tooth, Cai Tong'an visits the dentist, only to be greeted with a beautiful and gentle Dr. Xie Ruanqing. To her surprise, she turns out to be the senior she secretly admired during her university days...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Medical, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Tougen Anki
description: Ichinose Shiki, an inheritor of the blood of Oni had lived out his entire childhood oblivious to this fact. However, when an unknown man comes rushing into his home in attempts to assassinate him, his foster father finally reveals the truth. In a world where Oni and Momotarou have never been able to coexist, join Ichinose in his struggle for power and unifying the two races!
tags: Action, Demons, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Vagabond
description:
Growing up in the late 16th century Sengoku era Japan, Shinmen Takezou is shunned by the local villagers as a devil child due to his wild and violent nature. Running away from home with a fellow boy at age 17, Takezo joins the Toyotomi army to fight the Tokugawa clan at the Battle of Sekigahara. However, the Tokugawa win a crushing victory, leading to nearly three hundred years of Shogunate rule. Takezo and his friend manage to survive the battle and afterwards swear to do great things with their lives. However, after their paths separate, Takezo becomes a wanted criminal and must change his name and his nature in order to escape an ignoble death.  
  
**Awards:**
- Won the 24th Kodansha Manga Award in the general category in 2000.
- Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2002 
**Note:** was nominated for the 2003 Eisner Award in the Best Writer/Artist category.
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Psychological, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: Kekkai Sensen Beat 3 Peat
description: Kekkai Sensen: Beat 3 Peat centers around the crime fighting organization "Libra" and their battles in Hellsalem's Lot, formerly known as New York City. Hellsalem's Lot was created in a single night when a portal to the "Beyond" opened, and now it is a paranormal melting pot of monsters, magic, and the everyday mundane city life. It's up to Libra to prevent the horrors of this city from spreading to the outside world.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Adventure, Office Workers, Video Games, Vampires, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Omiai Shitakunakatta node, Murinandai na Jouken wo Tsuketara Doukyuusei ga Kita Ken ni Tsuite
description:
One day, Yuzuru Takasegawa — a first-year high school student — is urged by his grandfather to go on an arranged marriage meeting, insisting that he wants to see his great-grandson before he dies.

However, not wanting to bear the weight of a fiancee at the tender age of a freshman in high school, Yuzuru tries to avoid the arranged marriage meeting by imposing an irrational condition that, “If she is Blonde Haired, Blue Eyed, Fair Skinned with big boobs, only then I will think about the marriage”.

But somehow, he finds the girl who meets the conditions that Yuzuru has put out, and he reluctantly ends up going to matchmaking only once.

And on the day of matchmaking, it was Arisa Yukishiro, a beautiful girl with reputation at school, shows up on the scene. [adapted from Novel Updates]
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: Isekai Chikyuu kan de Kojin Boueki Shite Mita
description: By chance, Wataru discovers a gate that allows him to travel between Japan and a different world, and makes a lot of money by bringing sugar and other goods into the new world.
tags: Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Return of a Crazy Genius Composer
description:
Success, fame, family… In an instant, the genius composer, Min Hyunseung, lost it all. On the brink of death… he wanted to live a different life, one where all those continuous misfortunes couldn’t just be claimed as karma.

“How did this happen…?”

He was given another chance to live.
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Music, Full Color

name: Tatari
description:
Tatari is a lone stray cat. He is taken care of by his siblings Takeru and Yuki. In a ramshackle apartment, they lived a poor but happy life. Until that day.

"Tatari" is the Japanese word for the curse of a vengeful ghost, by the way.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Supernatural

name: Eiyuu to Hanzai Ou no Kikan - RE: Criminal
description: Not found
tags: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Fantasy, Police, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Hikaru ga Shinda Natsu
description:
"So, Hikaru is no more... If that's true then..."

Yoshiki and Hikaru are two boys who live in a certain village. They're the same age and have always been together growing up. But one day, Yoshiki noticed that "something else" has taken Hikaru's place. Even after learning of this, Yoshiki still wants them to be together. And so, his life with the "something" that looks like his friend begins.

At the same time, strange incidents keep occurring in the village...

[Yen Press English Simulpub](https://yenpress.com/series/the-summer-hikaru-died-manga-serial)
tags: Award Winning, Boys' Love, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Twinstar Cyclone Runaway
description:
Six thousand years in the future, humanity has established a civilization in the atmosphere of a gas giant named Fat Beach Ball. There, inhabitants of the resource-starved planet catch Besshu, fish-like creatures that "swim" through the skies. Fishers (exclusively male-female pairs customarily seen as a married couple) use malleable aircraft to bring in their catch.

The story follows Terra Intercontinental Endeavor, a woman looking for a partner, and Diode, a mysterious girl with terrific piloting skills, as they work to establish their same-sex partnership and bring home a successful catch.

Manga adaptation of the cosmic yuri SF novel series written by Ogawa Issui. Ogawa's original "Twinstar Cyclone Runaway" short story was nominated for the Seiun Award in 2020.
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Adventure, Girls' Love, Adaptation

name: The Sage's Otherworldly Teacher Life
description: Not found
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: 20th Century Boys
description:
Humanity, having faced extinction at the end of the 20th century, would not have entered the new millennium if it weren't for them. In 1969, during their youth, they created a symbol. In 1997, as the coming disaster slowly starts to unfold, that symbol returns. This is the story of a group of boys who try to save the world.  

---  
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2001**  
- **Won the Seiun Award for Best Comic in 2008**

name: The Long Summer of August 31
description:
Suzuki-kun and Takagi-san — two high-schoolers who found each other in a time loop on August 31. The two are the only ones who keep their memories when it loops. As for the cause of the time loop, one thing comes to mind — Suzuki-kun's lingering regrets for the summer, a guy's greatest ambition...

It's a time loop comedy of youth, romance, and facing love head-on!
___
**Alt Official English:** [K MANGA - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10613/episode/353159)
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Not found
description:
San-gun, the owner of the mountain, was reborn as a tiger and became a spiritual creature. A girl visits San-gun, who lived in peace, and says she will serve him. San-gun tries to drive her out, but she has nowhere to go back. San-gun finally decided to take back the girl. And there are countless threats to him…

---
