After returning home due to dad’s persuasion, the families and my dad fought to adopt me. My uncles and aunts gathered to protect me, and future psychos began to have strange obsessions over me.

“Happy Birthday, Ayrin. You’re the head as of today.”

On top of that, the duke’s position was my birthday present.
Everything is going just as I expected.

[Hey, how long are you going to sleep? Grandma said she is gonna take you off life support!]
[Cha Miso, you’re going to die!]

What is that voice?
Will I be okay like this? (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
tags: Monsters, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kill the Male Lead to Become the Villainess
description:
After killing the male lead, the originally innocent girl transformed into a villainess.
Just as she was about to enjoy her newfound freedom, she died a violent death and returned back to the start of the game.
Having carried over with her all the skills she acquired in her previous "playthrough", she was prepared to kill the male lead again; however, the current circumstances seem a bit... strange?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Villainess, Full Color

name: Dívčí válka: Maidens' War
description:
The year is 1420. A small village in the Kingdom of Bohemia is wiped out by marauding Crusader knights. A young peasant girl named Šárka is the sole survivor of the massacre. She meets up with Jan Žižka, leader of the Hussite army, and chooses to take up arms…
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/divci-valka-maidens-war)
tags: Historical, Action, Sexual Violence, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Tragedy

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 5: Golden Wind (Official Colored)
description: The highly-acclaimed fifth arc of Hirohiko Araki’s JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure shifts the action from Japan to Italy, as Koichi Hirose heads to Europe to find an aspiring gangster named Giorno Giovanna, the secret son of Dio Brando, scourge of the Joestar family. Organized crime meets family drama and unbelievable enemy Stands in JoJo’s Bizarre Adventure: Part 5—Golden Wind!
tags: Official Colored, Action, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Adventure, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Tensei Oujo wa Ai yori Ryouchi ga Hoshii no de Seiryaku Kekkon wo Kibou shimasu!
description:
Princess Fairis, reincarnated into the world of strategy simulation games, uses her knowledge of the games she played in her previous life and is called the Warrior Princess. However, as soon as the war ends, she is ordered by the king to marry. In addition, she competes with her sister in arranged marriages and, depending on her partner, cannot get involved in national politics. ...I want to build my country, not get married! As she struggles to arrange a political marriage that will give her more territory, Orpheed, a wizard who is also her trusted subordinate and a potential bride, unexpectedly confesses his love for her...?

A love comedy between a reincarnated princess with zero love skills and the strongest wizard with an intense love.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Monochrome Days
description: A reliable office worker, Hanaichi Fudo, undoubtedly had a gift for the arts but gave up on his dreams of becoming an artist to lead a normal life. One day, his senior at work, Saori Wakaba, asked Hanaichi for help in writing her manga. Will he take up the pen again?! Written by Yosuke Matsumoto, author of "The Lady Becomes an Idol", a unique new take on aspiring manga artists!
tags: Office Workers

name: Kunigei - Okuni University Art Department Film Program
description:
Daisuke Kanami has enrolled in the film department of an art college.

He had won a film award when he was in high school, and was filled with anticipation for his promising youth, but he was shocked by his classmate Kado Osawa, who is overflowing with talent...!?

Aspire to be a famous director! A modern story of youth in film school
tags: Psychological, Drama

name: Hero Organization
description: In a near-future where humanity stands on the edge of extinction, we turn our gaze to the stars. But in the depths of space, a new menace looms—the 'Star Beasts.' To combat these creatures, warriors donning mechanical armor emerge as humanity's last hope. Prepare yourself for a groundbreaking mecha action saga, where breathtaking visuals meet an expansive universe. The battle for survival starts now!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action

name: Navigatoria
description: Enter a world where the First Space War has ended, and Earth has claimed its first extraterrestrial colony. Manabu Houo, a boy born into a totalitarian state, finds his only joy in watching forbidden movies with his childhood friend, Hina-chan. However, one day upon returning home, he finds a group of government officials waiting for him...?! Watch as this thrilling sci-fi school drama unfolds on a distant planet!
tags: Sci-Fi, Military, Drama, School Life

name: Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan
description: Rikuo Nura is descended from Nurarihyon, Grand Master of the spirit world, but appears to be just a normal kid. He usually just wants to live peacefully as a human, but when his friends and allies are in trouble, his spirit blood boils, and he transforms into Nurarihyon to wipe out evil! A new concept story combining spirits and chivalry! A piquant, gallant ghost action story!
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Insect Girl
description: In a world where humans and insects are in conflict with each other, Mashiro heads for the mountains to eradicate the insectoid menace. There, he runs into a mysterious girl named Yuren, who lives with her mother on this hazardous hill riddled with bugs. Mashiro is shocked by this fact, but, perhaps, there is more to Yuren than meets the eye...
tags: Action, Monster Girls

name: Stellar Friends
description: Unable to accept the death of his best friend Octo-chan, Yota makes a forbidden wish on a night of despair. What appeared before his eyes was...? The genius Ichinohe-sensei debuts with an impactful serialization! A new sensational fantasy tale of everlasting friendship!!
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Drama, Aliens, Tragedy

name: Hope You're Happy, Lemon
description:
"I've been cheating on you. Oh, and it's not just one guy. It's three. Sorry about that."

Back in middle school, Akiyoshi Sunao's first-ever girlfriend shattered his heart, and he swore off love. However, all that changes when he develops a crush on a girl in his university's film club. Just as he's finally beginning to move on from the past, he bumps into his ex-girlfriend. Little does he know that this is only the beginning...

To his horror, he wakes up in her body the next morning!
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Supernatural

name: Ron Kamonohashi: Deranged Detective
description: This unusual duo brings the hidden truth into the light! Ron Kamonohashi, a private investigator with serious issues, and Totomaru Ishiki, a pure-hearted but dim police detective, team up to solve the most baffling mysteries!
tags: Comedy, Crime, Drama, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Rougo ni Sonaete Isekai de 8-manmai no Kinka o Tamemasu
description: After growing up an orphan, Mitsuha has a healthy respect for money and a desire to live well—at least, until she dies after being pushed off a cliff. Waking up in a strange fantasy world, Mitsuha narrowly survives an encounter with a pack of wolves, then realizes she has the power to move between this world and the real one. A lesser person might embark on heroic adventures—Mitsuha instead immediately recognizes the lucrative possibilities of her new situation, and heads out to buy an arsenal of modern weapons. Her goal: to acquire 80,000 gold, and the life of leisure she's always dreamed of!
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: The Art of Reincarnation
description:
Despite having only one arm, Daven had finally proven his worth after defeating his cousin Kazin in honorable combat. But Kazin took advantage of Daven’s mercy, stabbing him in the back and imprisoning him for life.

500 years later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and unknowingly summons Daven’s soul into the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka.

As the pair work to reveal the truth of Daven and Kazin, Vincent must relearn the art of combat while Yulian discovers the art of reincarnation.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Flying Witch
description:
Kowata Makoto is an airhead with a bad sense of direction who just moved into her relative's house… 
but is that all?  

Note: The Oneshot was originally published under a different pen name (Ishioka Chikai).  


---

name: TS Eiseihei-san no Senjou Nikki
description:
An ex-pro gamer of the FPS genre (♂) reincarnated in a fantasy world filled with magic... Only to learn that what greeted him was not a scene from one's dreams, but a muddy battlefield full of bullets flying to and fro! Moreover, he's now an orphan girl named Touri Noel?!

After her aptitude for healing magic was discovered, she decided to volunteer in the army as a second-class medic, all to raise money for the orphanage where she was born and raised. However, without even getting magic training, she was attached to an assault squad, repeatedly fighting on the most cruel battlefields of the "Western Front."
The mission given to her was to become the personal medic of the frontline's ace, Garback, and not let him die at any cost. But he turned out to be the worst commander, who will try to get results whatever the cost, even if it means the death of his subordinates!

On the battlefield, mired in unreasonable orders and violence, Touri's fierce battle for survival continues...
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not Your Typical Reincarnation Story
description: I was the villainess who would die at the hands of the male lead, but I know this is a cliché! I thought it was a pretty good deal to die unjustly, as a payment for the price I paid for being the villainess. Until I realized that I couldn’t escape from the original plotline. If I was going to die anyway according to the original, then let’s give a kiss to my handsome husband!… Why did the original plot start to change?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Hakanai Kimi wa Moukou wo Hajimeru
description: Kagari, an ephemeral beauty, reunites with her older childhood friend, Nana-kun, and begins her romantic assault on him.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Akuyaku Reijou wa Dekiai Route ni Hairimashita!?
description:
In my past life, I was an unpopular woman nearing her thirties. However, when I died, I got reincarnated in a dating sim as the villainess, Luciana.
At this rate, I'll face a hopeless future of exile in a punishment event...
And that's bad! I'm going to do my best to avoid all the romantic interests in the game and live a peaceful new life so that I can escape that event!
But... Why are they all approaching me?!
I want to stay low-key, but the people around me just won't leave me alone!
tags: Romance, Reverse Harem, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess

name: Xie'e Lianjin Shushi Gao Buding Ziji De Shiyan Ti

description:
In a world where magic and monsters exist, Lin Moyu has hit the age of acquiring his very own profession. While most would be lucky just to obtain a high-level combat class, Moyu becomes the ultrarare necromancer!

Being the first and only one of his kind, he has no idea of the potential he possesses on his journey to level up and face great challenges.

What new heights will Moyu achieve with his unique army of undead?

description: When I woke up after an accident, I was reincarnated as a mid-boss destined to die in the early stages of the game! In order to avoid being killed by the hero who should come attacking soon, I will fight and make the women my subordinates to increase my allies!
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kimi wa Yotsuba no Clover
description: Uichi was once popular, but now he is being bullied excessively. Then suddenly, his first love, Yotsuha, appears in front of him. What is this cute and brave girl's purpose...?
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Nichiasa Suki no Otaku ga Akuyaku Seito ni Tenseishita Kekka, Hametsu Flag ga Houkaishiteiku Ken ni Tsuite
description:
Yugo Kurei is a high school student that loves tokusatsu hero shows. One day, he loses his life protecting a child from a street slasher, but he is reincarnated in another world as Yugo Clay, a character from a certain game. However, Yugo is the most disliked person in the school and is destined to die tragically... He was reincarnated as a villain, but with the new power of magic in his hands, he aims to become a hero!

"In this world, I can become the strongest hero!" A hero story of a tokusatsu otaku who rises from the bottom while crushing his doom flags!

name: Chika Idol wo Kage de Sasaeru Ore
description: Kageyama, an unremarkable boy, secretly receives a message from gal classmate Natsukawa, saying, "Meet me at the usual karaoke place after school." He goes to karaoke with her alone. There, Kageyama reveals something he had been asked by Natsukawa to show her.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: The Jet Black Hedgehog: Shadow the Hedgehog
description:
The meaning of his birth. The answer he leads to is—

A new serialization of a full-speed action franchise that has attracted the world's attention!

An adaptation of the much-talked-about *Sonic x Shadow Generations*! CoroCoro's No.1 antihero has arrived.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Isekai Shoukan Oji-san no Juumusou Life ~Sabage Suki Salaryman wa Kaisha Owari ni Isekai e Chokki suru~
description: The middle-aged man and airsoft enthusiast Daisuke Koga is summoned to a different world on his 40th birthday. Given the ability to turn airsoft guns into real guns, Daisuke must save the other world while traveling back and forth between reality and the fantasy world. Alongside female swordsman Rena, Daisuke becomes the only gun user and dominates in the fantasy world after work!
tags: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Military, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Ame to umi
description: Not found
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Ookami wa Tsuki ni Koi wo Suru
description:
I'm the only one who knows my senpai's face. Senpai, who was supposed to hate me, ended up saying "I like you" to me...

The perfect but slightly scary Student Council President, "Wolf-senpai" aka Ookamigawa Rina, and the frivolous and clumsy Vice-President, Tsukiyama Yuuga. These two are complete opposites of each other, save for the fact that both of them have a secret face. One day, at his secret part-time job, he discovers Wolf-senpai's secret face...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Sword Gai
description:
A woman dies a suspicious death in the forest. Her tragic child, Gai, is adopted by Amon, a master swordsmith. More than ten years later, Gai becomes Amon's apprentice, but loses his right arm in an accident while making a sword. Amon crushes the magical sword "Death Dragon" and rebuilds it as an artificial arm for Gai, but...?
A young boy accepts a cruel fate in a whirlwind of battles. Is it darkness that lies ahead for him, or...?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Survival, Superhero, Martial Arts, Samurai, Military, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Shikanoko Nokonoko Koshitantan
description:
No one knows Torako used to be a delinquent. All of her classmates only know her as the perfect student. But everything changes when Nokotan, a transfer student with antlers, enters her life. Antlers aren’t the only thing strange about Nokotan. Her deer nose can sniff out Torako’s secret past! Whether it’s at school or the zoo, chaos follows this doe-eyed girl’s every step. Torako has so many questions! Is Nokotan a deer, a girl, or something in-between?

Trivia:
- The author is the illustrator/'mama' for Hololive Vtuber [Amane Kanata (天音かなた)](https://www.youtube.com/@AmaneKanata). Because of this, physical copies on Amazon sold out within a day.
tags: Animals, Comedy, Survival, School Life, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim
description: Na Kang Lim, a high school student who enjoys reading webtoons, experiences a strange event one day when the female lead from his favorite webtoon appears before him. Even more surprising, the same incidents that put her in danger in the webtoon start happening in real life. The problem is, there's no protagonist in the real world to save her! Ultimately, Na Kang Lim takes on the role of the protagonist, looping through time to save her.
tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: May I Ask for One Final Thing?
description:
The engagement between Scarlet, a noblewoman from a ducal family, and Second Prince Kyle was suddenly annulled during a ball. 
She had been falsely accused of harassing a girl called Terenezza, daughter to a baron, whom the Prince doted on heavily. 
Condemned by everyone around her and forced to burden all manner of crimes, she finally decided enough was enough.  
  
“Before I leave here, may I please ask you just one last thing?”  
  
As the crowd threw their boos and jeers, and that good looking guy flung his insults── 
her palm spun like a drill and the ballroom floor was stained with blood. From her fists, their reckoning!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Osu!! Karate Club
description:
The series began as a fairly humorous and lighthearted satire of Japan's teenage delinquent-gang subculture told from the perspective of Matsushita Tadashi (who also narrates these early Karate Bu stories), a 2nd year student at Kangokou High and a constant target of Kangokou's numerous bullies who beat him up routinely after school. He is almost always accompanied by his best friend Saitou Takaki, who is also constantly harassed.  
  
As the pair grow increasingly tired of being victimized they decide to join the titular Karate Club, which is notorious throughout Osaka's youth gangs for training and producing the city's most hardened and toughest teenage thugs while maintaining the facade of a legit school sports club. But when they join the club, they find themselves picked on just as much if not worse by the club's current members. But as the story progresses they grow to be increasingly capable fighters.  
  
Along with the manga's change in attitude and central character, the various teenage fighters throughout the series grew increasingly stronger and even began to tap into superhuman ki abilities, putting Osu!! Karate Bu in the company of other similar epic Shōnen fighting manga such as Yu Yu Hakusho, Dragon Ball, and Fist of the North Star.  
  
Osu!! Karate Bu was wildly popular in its native Japan, but is otherwise almost completely unknown in most other countries. It spawned a four episode OVA mini-series released over a period of two years from 1990-1992, a 1990 live action movie, and a 1994 Super Famicom fighting game.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Tsumi to Kai
description:
Under immense pressure to achieve academically both at school and at home, Minedera Zen turns to taking upskirt photos of girls as a form of escape from his life. One day, while doing his usual rounds, Zen is caught by the subject of his upskirt at the time, Houjou Ayame…

Seeing the outside of these women, he's relieved to see that the number of men and women has changed, but not much else. However, their inner lives are filled with conflicts and troubles.

One day, Mikan, who hates men, learns that she is a succubus.

name: Farmer of Spirits
description: After training for 11 years to reach superhuman status, I gave up on my dream and returned to the family farm. But suddenly, Hawa appeared! She’s a powerful farming spirit who can make anything grow—even produce that enhances people’s powers. Now I’ve got my superhuman ID card, more spirits-friends, mouthwatering Grade A+ crops, and quests! Will Hawa and her friends lead us all to fame and fortune and change our lives forever?

description: Miyuki-san is a young lady born in Kyoto. My relationship with her cannot be described as good. Because... "You’re very good at flattery." Are those words sincere? Or just for show?

name: Animalland Saga
description: Animal parody of the manga Vinland Saga

name: Multiverse no Watashi, Koishite Ii desu ka?
description:
Jogo has a crush on his classmate, Miyato. 

One day, they unexpectedly end up walking home together after school. When Miyato is about to be hit by a truck, Jogo throws himself in harm's way to save her. In the final moment before impact, Jogo wishes he could have told Miyato how he felt. 

But then he hears a mysterious voice saying, "You can do it over. This time, don’t have any regrets."

When he wakes up, he finds himself unharmed, lying on the ground, with a different version of Miyato beside him — she looks the same, but her clothes and hairstyle are different...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Classmate wa Isekai de Yuusha ni Natta kedo, Ore dake Gendai Nihon ni Okizari ni Narimashita
description:
"Congratulations! You 25 have been chosen as heroes to save the world!"

Just before summer vacation in their third year of middle school, the class is suddenly transported to another world by the goddess Ashera. The 26 students are given statuses that allow them to use skills and cheat abilities to become heroes in the other world. However, the number of students transported is 25—leaving behind Iori Shu, the boy who had just transferred and wasn’t counted.

While his classmates train in the other world to prepare for their battles as heroes, Shu remains in peaceful Japan, devoting himself to studying the status he was given. Quietly experimenting with his skills, he occasionally uses them to help those around him. But before he realizes it, Shu has become a target of various organizations around the world—!?
tags: Action, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

description:
At a rural junior high school, a man and a woman vowed an eternal friendship. The relationship between the two who became a fateful community toward one dream-two years have passed without any particular progress ...!

　Yuu Natsume, a flower-loving plant boy, and Inuzuka Himari, a girl who hasn't been in love for the first time yet, have been peacefully close friends in the gardening club with only two of them.

description: Demons and angels are natural enemies that have grown tired of fighting each other. In order to coexist peacefully, they decided to arrange a marriage between the two races! If the pair can't get along within the one-year trial period, the marriage will be dissolved. This is how Jiacheng (Demon) and Yu Shanshan (Angel) became the chosen "lucky" pair for the marriage. description: One day, I was suddenly confessed to by a girl, and in order to reject her, I had to find a fake girlfriend! I didn’t expect that my plan to avoid trouble… would lead to even bigger trouble?! The tsundere "Vicious Princess" from the Archery Club, the "White Fox" who is adept at teasing, the "Flower of the Highlands" with straight black hair, and…a sister with a severe case of brocon! Could my youth romantic comedy be wrong as well too?!

name: Kaijin Mira no Dai 2 Keitai ga Kawaisugiru
description:
Cuteness is unbeatable!

Monster Mira is on another rampage, aiming to steal the hero's transformation belt. Having just reached full power thanks to the Doctor's modifications, Mira's new form turns out to be way too cute!

A romantic comedy where justice and evil refuse to back down!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, School Life, Monster Girls

name: Fukushuu Kansuisha no Jinsei Nishuume Isekaitan
description:
Kousuke Kurono was an Avenger. After being raped, his beloved little sister was left out in the cold and froze to death.  
From the time he was 13-years old, Kousuke made use of any possible means in order to exact his revenge. 5 years had passed, he achieved his revenge, but having lived solely for the sake of revenge, at the moment his revenge came to fruition, afterwards he couldn’t muster up the willpower to live on. That’s why, with the same knife he used to kill the culprits, he slit his own throat. However, he then heard a voice; “Is that not wasteful?”. When he came to, he found not his home, his country, nor his world——It was another world.

---

[Webnovel RAWs](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7225df/)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken
description:
The ordinary Mikami Satoru found himself dying after being stabbed by a slasher. It should have been the end of his meager 37 years, but he found himself deaf and blind after hearing a mysterious voice.  
He had been reincarnated into a slime!  
  
While complaining about becoming the weak but famous slime and enjoying the life of a slime at the same time, Mikami Satoru met with the Catastrophe-level monster “Storm Dragon Veldora”, and his fate began to move.

name: Sachiiro no One Room
description:
One day, a fourteen year-old girl was kidnapped… or so the police have been lead to believe. Actually, she tried to run away from her abusive parents and was helped by her stalker who then shelters her in his apartment. Although he considers his actions as kidnapping, the girl is happy about the situation and proposes to him, with the condition that if they are caught, they will commit suicide.

---
One day, a girl was kidnapped. However, that girl started to desire a life living with her captor, and swears that she will marry him. In return, her captor provides her with happiness that she had always longed for. How could a story between a girl and her captor be so heart warming?
tags: Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life

name: My Fiancé is in Love with My Little Sister
description:
There my fiancé stood, gazing intently at my charming younger sister. When I saw them fall in love the moment they laid eyes on each other, I was hit with an overwhelming sense of déjà vu. Aah, again?
My fiancé had been in love with my younger sister even in my previous life. There was nothing I could do but watch it all unfold. And for some inexplicable reason, I’m the only one who keeps returning to that exact point in time. Trapped by fate. And yet, amidst the turns of the hourglass, I still find myself falling for him…
tags: Time Travel, Psychological, Romance, Fantasy, Villainess, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Kimi ga Hoeru Tame no Uta wo,
description: Oogami Haru, a high schooler troubled by her childish appearance and contrasting deep voice secretly uploads videos of herself singing on the internet. One day, when her classmate Narumiya Yuu finds out about this, instead of the ridicule she expected, Yuu instead invites Haru to form their own musical group… A shared story of music and youth between two girls, each burdened by the past.
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Music

name: Don't Forget These Feelings
description: "Handsome people are the best!" Jiho caught Jungmin's eye- a returning student at the freshmen welcoming party… Be it for women or men, Jungmin is actually a major Ul-ppa* (*Korean slang for someone who is weak for beautiful and handsome people) and he finds Jiho extremely attractive. That was the extent of their first meeting, but for some reason, their strings of fate kept getting tangled with each other?!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Shikisaki Shimai wa Abakaretai
description: One day, Tarou Yamada, who runs a detective business, slips on a banana peel and reincarnates into Tsukushi Shikisaki, the younger brother of three beautiful big-breasted sisters who will all die on the same day. As he spends time surrounded by the three beautiful sisters, he finds out that the boy he is reincarnated as will be killed by one of the three sisters ...!?
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Harem, Shota, Slice of Life

name: Meng Shi Zai Shang
description:
Yuan Chu transmigrated as the opposing boss in the novel, but she was wiped out by the male lead Ye Chen Yuan. Fortunately, she reincarnates once more, but back to the past, when Yuan was still young! Looking at the pitifully weak Little Yuan, she is troubled by a dilemma. Should she: 1. kill him, or 2. raise him up and openly ask for treasures from him. However, since she wants to get all sorts of treasures from him, she chooses the second option. Things don't always work out though, as she accidentally raises a sheep up to be a big bad wolf.   
  
Master? Want treasure? Let's cultivate together, but alone, just us two, then.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Fuchou Airen
description: Yan Shuangshuang watched her former lover die before her eyes. An angel appeared, giving her a chance to live again. However, after her rebirth, everything went wrong.

name: I Look Too Much Like the Boss and the World Actually Believes It
description: Moon Lord, Suliang! Tamer of the Divine Lunar Morpho Butterfly, a familiar with abilities to control time and space, yin and yang, I am the invincible youth that stands at the apex of this world! To get such a status upon reincarnation is like getting dealt Pocket Aces… Divine my Arse! The beast in my body is nothing like the Divine Lunar Morpho! It’s clearly the lowest of low level Flash Butterfly!!! Facing millions of fanatical believers, a death match with Emperor Cangyue in three years time, and various sects viewing me as a thorn in their side… This is really an unprecedented beast tamer crisis!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Black Clover
description:
Asta and Yuno were abandoned together at the same church, and have been inseparable since. As children, they promised that they would compete against each other to see who would become the next Emperor Magus. However, as they grew up, some differences between them became plain. Yuno was a genius with magic, with amazing power and control, while Asta could not use magic at all, and tried to make up for his lack by training physically. When they received their Grimoires at age 15, Yuno got a spectacular book with a four-leaf clover (most people receive a three-leaf-clover), while Asta received nothing at all. However, when Yuno was threatened, the truth about Asta's power was revealed, he received a five-leaf clover Grimoire, a "black clover"! Now the two friends are heading out in the world, both seeking the same goal!

---

**Links:**  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18802) (special)  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=19743) (anime)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Mysterious Girlfriend X
description:
One day, a strange transfer student appears before Tsubaki. Urabe Mikoto is an antisocial girl, whose hobby is just sleeping during class-breaks. 
One day, Tsubaki goes to wake her up and accidentally tastes her drool… And gets hooked on that!  
  
After that, he starts going out with her and gets to know her better. Her second hobby, as it turns out, is carrying around scissors in her panties 
and cutting paper into flowers… or whatever else is getting on her nerves…
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Persona 5
description: The story focuses on the 16-year-old protagonist, Akira Kurusu, who got transferred to Shujin High School in Tokyo after he was sued by a man with political connection for a non-existent violence when Akira saved a woman from being molested by the man, leading to his probation. Arriving in Tokyo, he finds a mysterious app got installed into his phone that enables him to enter another world formed from corrupt hearts of adults where he awakens his power called Persona. During his times there, he is joined by two fellow students Ryuuji Sakamoto and Ann Takamaki, and a shape-shifting cat-like creature known as Morgana. Feeling suppressed by their environment, the four form a group known as the "Phantom Thieves of Heart" to steal corrupt hearts of adults and reform society.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Video Games, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: The Blond Yankee and The Punishment Game
description:
As part of her punishment game, the transfer student, Shindou Eruko, must talk to the coolest delinquent in the school, which turns out to be Hoshi Natsuki, the blonde delinquent in the class next door. However, she soon found out that Hoshi-kun might not be as scary as he looks...

This manga is Konogi Yoshiru's fantasy take on  [Shingeki no Eroko-san](https://mangadex.org/title/bdfc7777-f1ee-4131-82cb-2fb5861d32e1/shingeki-no-eroko-san-hen-na-oneesan-wa-danshikousei-to-nakayoku-naritai), depicting a setting with Eruko being in the same age as Hoshi-kun. It was later adapted in the main title as Eruko's dream sequence.
tags: Romance, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Ikemen Dansou Reiya to Renaishitara BL-ppoi NL ni naru Hanashi
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Web Comic

name: Face Slap
description:
Cheon Taepyeong, the President of the Taepyeong Detective Agency, has a peculiar ability to see through a person once he slaps them. He enjoys this process, and has made money by solving requests using his ability alongside the gangster, Won Sangtaek, Special agent Yoo Jungik, and the scammer, Gu Kangjo. He was living a happy life with satisfaction… unlike his miserable past which has been holding him back.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B7%80%EC%8B%B8%EB%8C%80%EA%B8%B0/2626)
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Maigo ni Natteita Youjo wo Tasuketara, Otonari ni Sumu Bishoujo Ryuugakusei ga Ie ni Asobi ni Kuru You ni Natta Ken Nitsuite
description: One day, Charlotte Bennett transferred to Aoyagi Akihito's class. Her proper and refined mannerisms and adorable appearance captured the hearts of his classmates, but Akihito calmly takes a step back, feeling that she "lives in a different world." However, helping Charlotte's lost sister, Ema, throws his daily life into upheaval...?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Sentai Red Isekai de Boukensha ni Naru
description: In the final battle against the evil Exterminators, Asagaki Tougo, a power ranger, traded his life for the enemy's. It seemed like everything was over, but suddenly he found himself in another world! He becomes an adventurer, transforming into Kizuna Red, and continues fighting to save people in trouble! Here he meets a young Wizard named Idola and his journey in this new world begins!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Superhero, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy

name: The Grown Dog Bullies Its Owner
description:
[Black-bellied top student x Two-faced school grass]
"You there, be mine!"

School grass Xia Zhixing, unwilling to reveal his identity as a streamer, borrows the face of the mysterious top student Lin Lang.

Unexpectedly, the student that resembled a cute little puppy had actually desired him for a long time...

"Senior, the reward I want is you."
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Video Games, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Replay Girl
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance

name: Danjohi 1:5 no Sekai demo Futsu ni Ikirareru to Omotta? ~ Geki Juu Kanjou na Kanojotachi ga Mujikaku Danshi ni Honrousaretara
description:
Before he knew it, Masato had been transported to a world where there were just a few more women than in his original world. However, aside from the fact that women were a little more assertive, the world wasn’t much different from the one he came from... or so he thought. 

Little did he know, the kindness he spread, based on the standards of his old world, was saving those around him more than he could imagine. He was unaware that this kindness was causing the women around him to develop intense feelings for him. 

This is the story of a protagonist who believes he can live an ordinary life, unknowingly making the heroines fall in love with him, and eventually realizing just how heavy their feelings are — until they make him understand it for himself...!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kuma to Usagi wa Tomodachi dewa Irarenai
description:
A playboy goes after an innocent-seeming girl, having no idea what he's getting into.

**Note:** Not to be confused with [NoTR](https://mangadex.org/title/03346265-8076-4b14-8c80-78c2f04511be), another series from this same artist.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Delinquents, Web Comic

name: Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou Hanashi
description:
A story about being followed around by a girl who appears to be just a hallucination.

---

Note: The original web comic that was released on on Twitter and Pixiv has been compiled on Amazon into 1 ebook volume titled Genkaku Shoujo ga Tsukimatou (幻覚少女がつきまとう) "A Hallucinatory Girl Follows Me Around" and released on March 25, 2024.

* Alternate Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/116706658)
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Romance, Web Comic, Mystery

name: Ouji no Torimaki A wa Akuyaku Reijou no Mikata desu
description:
From Google Translate:

The first prince is head over heels in love with the pretty daughter of a baron. One day, Roland, known as "The Prince's Henchman A," who is good at flattering others, notices an abnormal situation in which all of the henchman's entourage, including the prince, are obsessed with one young lady. In order to save the villainous young lady, who is the prince's fiancée, from the verge of being unfairly called off, he secretly works behind the scenes.
tags: Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Igyou Atama-san to Ningen-chan (Pre-Serialization)
description: The main character who got worked to the bone as a corporate slave office lady in the current world got transported to another world, where she became the pet of aberrant head-san. Although they both hold romantic feelings towards each other, it's hard for them to develop their love with their difference in species standing in the way.
tags: Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Web Comic

name: Ayashii Iyashi no Yakumo-san
description:
With his eyes narrowed, his kimono on, and his pipe in hand -
the big brother I admire, whom I see every morning, is definitely playing around...
Or so I thought, but in fact he's incredibly pure--!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic

name: The Veiled Queen
description: After being reborn, Sayi vows to break free of her foster mother’s control.
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Bishu no Daichi Fukushu ~Fukushuu no tame ni Kao wo Suteta Onna~
description:
A woman who was robbed of her family by bullying is reborn as another person, and she devotes herself to revenge from hell! , Because of her ugly appearance, she was badly bullied at a girls' school. The leader of bullying is Ayako Takashimazu, the daughter of a large company. Hana, who was accused of theft by her, was forced to leave school...!?

(from mangaupdates)
tags: Drama, Horror, Mystery

name: The Indomitable Wanderer
description:
I am a wanderer martial artist. I don’t shy away from blood, but I’m ready to retire. Should I take one last job? or not?

For many long years, he has roamed as a wandering martial artist's, living as a hired blade to make ends meet.

But now, he finds himself utterly penniless, living in poverty with nothing to his name.

As a master of martial arts at the peak level, he makes a decision, to take on one final, high-stakes mission, earn a fortune, and put an end to his life as a wanderer.

The story follows his journey as he takes on this last assignment and the unexpected twists that unfold along the way.
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Full Color

name: JIN
description:
After a strange encounter with a mysterious carcinogenic fetus he found inside a patient’s skull, brain surgeon Minakata Jin slipped back through time. Equipped with modern medical knowledge, he faces various fatal diseases and injuries. He meets the ordinary people of Edo as well as illustrious figures, as his surgical knife carves out a new history.
___
Notes:
- Won the Grand Prize at Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2011.
- Author Murakami Motoka fully commissioned an English translation of the manga himself. It can be found on [his Patreon](https://www.patreon.com/motokamurakami), [Amazon](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B0D23CB5NS), or [Mangamo](https://www.mangamo.com/manga/jin).
tags: Award Winning, Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Master Villainess the Invincible!
description:
Yeoju is a second-rate author living a mediocre existence in modern-day Korea. A tragic accident lands her in the plot of a bestselling martial arts novel and she wakes up as the infamous villainess Haewon Tang. Hoping to save herself from a gruesome death, Yeoju must figure out who to trust, harness Haewon’s inner chi, and learn martial arts as she fights to save the Sichuan Tang Clan. Can she change the outcome of the novel and prove she’s the worthy hero?

---
Our main character was an unsuccessful romance fantasy novelist when she gets into a hit-and-run then wakes up as the villainess in a best-selling martial arts novel. She uses the information from the novel that she had analyzed in her original life, in order to avoid her death-ending and finding the truth behind what had really happened to her.

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52653435)

name: Kaii-san to Ore
description:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/24367326/series/222807)

**Notes:**
- The Pixiv series does not contain all of the chapters and combines some. Do not follow the chapter numbering on Pixiv. Instead, enable Japanese chapters on MangaDex to see the proper chapter order and links to all of the raw chapters.
- This series uses characters the author used in illustrations beforehand.
tags: Ghosts, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Inaka no Kuro Gal JK to Kekkon Shimashita
description:
Koichi quit his job and became a novelist. However, he could not think of any topic and was unable to write a novel. One day, in order to concentrate on his novel, he decides to move to the countryside to live in the atelier owned by his grandfather. Koichi is stunned by the empty countryside, but there he meets Ichika, a tan high school girl who is out of place in the countryside.

She's sexually uninhibited, promiscuous and she'll let anyone have sex with her right away, but she also has a strong desire to get married, and she's good at cooking and managing people. Koichi is attracted to Ichika, and before he knows it, he wants to make her the heroine of his own novel. For some reason, I ended up living with Ichika!!!?

And so begins the life of living together with a tan gal. When Ichika invites him to have sex with her in order to have a child, will Koichi be able to suppress his rationality and successfully complete his novel?

Based on the ero doujinshi by the author.
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67452)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Gyaru

name: New Chronicles of Goguryeo
description: New Chronicles of Goguryeo In a world unfolding within my dreams, It was the late Goguryeo period, And I became Yeon Namsaeng, son of Yeon Gaesomun. In reality, I am Kim Namsaeng…
tags: Historical, Action, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy

name: Kanojo ni Uwaki Sareteita Ore ga, Koakuma na Kouhai ni Natsukareteimasu
description:
Christmas season.

Hasegawa Yuuta found himself single after breaking up last month when his girlfriend had cheated on him. And it was only a few days until Christmas! After an everyday conversation with his female friend, Mino Ayaka, Yuuta met a beautiful girl clad in a Santa suit—In a lane full of couples no less! Her name was Shinohara Mayu. Will this encounter with Shinohara turn out to be the Christmas present for Yuuta?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Adaptation

name: Kaibutsu-tachi wo Suberu Mono - Saikyou no Shien Tokka Nouryoku de, Kizukeba Sekai Saikyou Party ni!
description: Black Tiger is a party of five young prodigy adventurers hailed as the Miracle Children across the land. Yet, among them, Sol Rock stood apart from the rest. Branded as a worthless support mage and treated like a mere expendable grunt. One day, after completing their promotion quest, he was told he wasn’t strong enough to keep up and was kicked out. What they didn’t know was that Sol Rock possessed the greatest power of all: the “Player,” a godlike talent that allows him to buff his allies and dominate the battlefield. Now, cast out and alone, Sol Rock is determined to prove his worth. He sets out to gather the strongest group the world has ever seen!
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Bunkei no Kimi, Rikei no Anata
description:
Winner of the 30rd Comic Awards Jade Prize.
Published in Yurihime June 2024, pages 575-595.
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love

name: Dr. Slump
description:
When goofy inventor Senbei Norimaki creates a precocious robot named Arale, his masterpiece turns out to be more than he bargained for!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/dr-slump)
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2022)


---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen/Shojo in 1982**

name: Mikiri kara Hajimeru Garyuu Kenjutsu
description: Rio, a boy living in a remote village, attends the village dojo for self-defense, but gives up the idea that he cannot become stronger under the dojo’s teaching methods. However, the village is a dangerous place, and Rio decides to create his own way of fighting – “Garyu Kenjutsu” – in order to survive! A royal road fantasy of swords and magic is about to begin!
tags: Adventure, Fantasy

name: Yoriko from Hannari Girori
description: The manga follows Shindou Yoriko, a 29-year-old Kyoto cigarette shop owner who has a sharp look in her eyes but is actually a kind-hearted person. It may not come across, but she truly loves the city of Kyoto, and is willing to give up some of her time to share that love with tourists and other visitors (as long as they don't get on her nerves).
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Julia in the box!
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Girls' Love

name: Something's Wrong With My Inventory
description: Yuujun Shin, a wealthy crypto investor, spends his time mastering a little-known game and purchasing all the best perks to dominate. When the game unexpectedly merges with reality, Yuujun finds himself in the game world with access to his massive virtual inventory. Now, with his amassed power and resources, he is more than ready to navigate this new reality...or is he?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Musician Genius Who Lives Twice
description: Even if a musician dies, he never dies. It's just covered. Singer-songwriter Kim Han-seok, who became a legend in Korea with just a guitar... Waking up as a college student in the streaming era 30 years after his death!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Music, Full Color

name: Sore wa Rei no Shiwaza desu
description: My name is Torii Nozomu, a plain introvert. Suddenly a new transfer student, Kirishima Kyoko, sits next to me. She's cute, kind, and for some reason she proactively talks to me, even though I'm a nerd! A true saint. Yet I want to get involved with her as little as possible because she's haunted by a "ghost" that only I can see! She's a little naughty, extremely pure and, in some cases, horrifying! Will I ever find a way to handle her?
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Murim Salon
description: In the Immortal Realm, Jinyul was renowned as the Beauty Immortal, leading fashion trends and styles as the personal barber of the Jade Emperor. However, he, who was (literally) intoxicated by his high status, behaved recklessly and caused a major accident, completely shaving off the Jade Emperor’s hair. Enraged, the Jade Emperor banished him to the Mortal Realm. After falling into the Mortal Realm, Jinyul planned to regain his prowess and return to the Immortal Realm once again. But the moment he landed, things started going awry! Can Jinyul regain his status and return to his rightful place in the Immortal Realm?
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Student Council for Two
description:
What do you do when your student council doesn't have enough members to fill all the positions? Well, take most of them on your own, of course!  
  
Seishirou Watari is a middle school student and has the roles of student council president / secretary / treasurer / general affairs officer, and he's accompanied by Ryouko Mizutani, his vice president. Together they, well… make do with whatever little they have. What do you want? It's only the two of them, okay!?
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Dragon Tamer
description: What happens when a girl from a quaint and small town meets the son of a Yakuza crime lord? Will she be able to change him for the better or will he continue down the dangerous and violent path?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Good Doctor
description:
The main character, Park Si-on, suffers from autism and savant syndrome.
With his innate genius like two sides of the same coin, he enters a pediatric surgery resident at a university hospital.
The prejudice of being a doctor with autism and the battle for power in the hospital are getting more and more dangerous...!
Will I ever be able to become a real doctor?

---

- Based on 2013 K-drama of the same name
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Medical, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Adventurer's Guild Universal Advisor
description: Red is an ex-adventurer who was once the driving force in managing his party. He took care of all the busywork, such as dealing with guild requests and supplies for their adventures. Eventually, the hero declared that he was useless in battle and forcefully expelled him from the party. Having everything taken away from him, he spent his time frequenting a guild's tavern. Eventually, a young adventurer who was in trouble was saved by Red, and she begged him to take her on as an apprentice. As time went on, he realized that he had potential in training adventurers. He decided that his true calling was to be a teacher! This is a story about a jack of all trades instructor and his versatile students that will eventually become legendary adventurers who will take down the Demon King.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Meshitaki Onna ni Yakuza no Ai wa Omosugiru
description: Nanao Shindo, a office worker, happens to cook for her neighbor. However, it turns out to be a hangout for yakuzas! The yakuzas love the taste of her cooking, and Nanao becomes a favorite of the yakuzas. The yakuza gang leader, Ren Kazama, sees her and begins to love her...? This kind of love is too heavy!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Yuri Boobs Anthology
description:
A yuri anthology focused on boobs!  
More than a dozen of wonderful authors bringing you some ecchi and funny boob-centric yuri stories!  

Cover: [Konbu Wakame](https://mangadex.org/author/580a9899-14f8-4ef6-a156-bcf1ed53e119)

2. **I've Become An Adult, Right?** by Hachiko
3. **Being Taught By A JK About The Joys Of One's Gender Who's In Their 30's** by Endo
4. **Drunk Oppai Discussion** by Kanro Ame
5. **Luring Bloom** by Majoccoid
6. **Intense Boobs Discourse** by Homura Subaru
7. **Senpai And Me** by Hisagi
8. **Oppai ≤ You** by Kisaragi Mizu & Doggy
9. **Love Breasts** by Yuino Chiri
10. **Forest of Flower Garden** by Kanda Dan

tags: Romance, Anthology, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Kamieshi no Oshigoto
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Ienai Himitsu No Aishikata
description: High School teacher Saeki Nao is secretly a hardcore otaku who loves yuri manga. One day, at a doujinshi convention they participate in, Nao is eager to convey her feelings to "Nyapoleon", an artist she worships. However, it turned out to be a girl from her school, Kurumizawa Haruka, and moreover, she had to help her. After the event, they decided to go out for a meal, at Haruka's suggestion... When she wakes up in the morning, there is Haruka in the bed...?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Nengara Nenbyaku Ansatsu Renka
description: The Haiboshi family's line of work is assassination. Takatori, their princess, picks up a boy named Raika who swore to dedicate everything.
tags: Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama

name: The Reincarnated Assassin Is a Swordmaster
description:
Raon was once a loyal assassin for House Robert until Derus killed him. Not willing to give up, Raon prayed for vengeance and woke as a member of House Sieghart, the most powerful noble house!

He’ll need all of their near-infinite resources to get revenge. Though he carried over knowledge of a powerful Flame Link technique, he also carries the Curse of Bitter Frost, something that’s slowly killing him.

As if that weren’t enough, the demonic embodiment of Wrath is trying to take over his body!?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Maou-sama, Retry! R
description: At the lowest floor of the dungeon, the Demon Lord came face to face with a presence that appears to be the creator of this world. His next destination is the demon territory where there's an ongoing rivalry between devils. A new, incredibly energetic and cheerful high school girl has joined the gang. Once again, our character's bustling personalities and their idiosyncrasies will clash with each other.
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Isekai, Adaptation

name: Magical Realm Shopkeeper
description: The protagonist Chan, who was looking for a part-time job after his previous company went bankrupt, coincidentally discovers a convenience store. Lured by the very high hourly wage, he decides to become a part-timer from that day. But the customers who come in seem a bit strange. Vampires, kobolds, and even succubi??
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Masters of Lightning Knives
description:
A young orphan was alone in the world until he meets the master of a secret form of martial arts. To learn these otherworldly techniques, he will need to endure years of his sadistic teacher’s grueling and weird training. But why does he have to do laundry, cook meals, or play instruments to learn martial arts anyway?! If he can survive long enough (and if his massive ego doesn’t get in the way), he just might be able to wield the unstoppable lightning knives. Will he make the cut or be sliced down to size?

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PlMScBLMT0U)

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%84%EB%A2%B0%EB%8F%84/2355)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/52248)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Oomuro-ke
description:
*A spin-off of the YuruYuri series featuring the Oomuro family of sisters!*

From oldest to youngest, there's **Nadeshiko**, the cool and serious high schooler; **Sakurako**, the silly, lazy, and (slightly) dimwitted middle schooler; and **Hanako**, the intelligent and mature elementary schooler! 

This story focuses on these three sisters, their friends. and the many fun and wild adventures they have together!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: 7-nen Go de Matteru
description:
To regain a piece of my lost memory and to fulfill the promise I made that day I came back to this town.
This is the story of the main character "Haruto" who has lost his childhood memories, and his attempt to regain his missing memories and only remaining "promise to a girl whose face and name he does not know."

note: The hit game with over 6 million downloads has been adapted into a comic book!
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Leveling Up Alone
description:
Living in a world infested with monsters is hard enough, but doing it without powers? That’s Hanyeol’s life in a nutshell.

Fearsome beasts roam the earth and kill everyone in their path. Elite members of society called the Awakened mobilize to protect humanity with their supernatural abilities. Amidst it all, Hanyeol is just a poor porter, tasked as sideline support.

But when a benevolent being gifts him with special abilities, he’s ready to harvest all the loot and take it to the next level!

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%98%BC%EC%9E%90-%EB%A0%88%EB%B2%A8%EC%97%85-%ED%95%A9%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2430)
---
