- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.podoteng.com/)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Aliens, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Cheating Men Must Die
description:
Why torment scumbags for just a moment when you can do so forever? Join Su LuXia as she transmigrates into countless worlds with her ‘Supporting Female Character’s Counterattack System’ to unleash vengeance upon the deplorable male and female leads using a variety of tactics! 

Su LuXia: "The only thing that brings me comfort is the tears of remorse from scumbag men and the agonizing groans of despicable women who can't get what they want." 

System: "Has My Esteemed Host learnt to reel back her vengeful spirit? Nope, I guess not."
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Video Games, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Synonym
description: The manga centers on Yano, a virgin boy who dreams of success as an erotic manga artist. One day, he encounters a totally naked palm-sized girl.
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, Full Color

name: Oshinobi Dousei
description: Tae, a beautiful 17-year-old girl, and Kotaro, a serious office worker. These two seemingly happy people have a secret they can't reveal to anyone - the rival ninjas of Iga and Kouga secretly live together in this laid-back romantic comedy!
tags: Demons, Romance, Ninja, Comedy

name: Sugar Girl Drip
description: Marie, a sparkling university student who craves validation, takes up a part-time job at a concept cafe for their uniforms. There, she meets Akira, a spontaneous and unpredictable person. Their meeting sets off a chain of events that changes Marie's life, and they end up spending time together as…accomplices!? An overdose of desire begins in the neon-glowing sleepless city!!
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama

name: Kuse Tsuyo Kanojo wa Toko ni Izanau
description: Naoto Kiyoshi is a young man who just entered university after failing his entrance exams one year before. When he was looking for a place to live in so that he could move to Tokyo, he found himself living together with Luna, a relative and older girl who he used to have a crush on. The Luna he admired in the past was neat, beautiful and mature... and now she apparently became a slut!? Night after night, he hears her seductive and unladylike moans, and it's making Naoto horny. There are also other men she's unreasonably close to besides him. Luna, whose thoughts he couldn't fathom, is leading him around by the nose! Furthermore, other women with lewd quirks aside from Luna have also gathered there!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Childhood Friend, Big Love
description: I once had a childhood friend who was an angel. However, when we met again, several years later, she had become a gyaru. A yuri story between two childhood friends.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Gyaru

name: Cardfight!! Vanguard SkyRide
description:
A single encounter with a card will take you to the skies!
The Card Game that Soars through the Skies, this is Vanguard's New series, 'SkyRide'!
tags: Traditional Games, Action, Sports, Adventure

name: If The Story Went That Way
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Nikagetsugo ni Seibetsu ga Bareru Josou Danshi
description:
I enrolled in a prestigious girls academy, even though I'm actually a crossdressing boy?! But, in my class lies a secret as well...?

This prestigious school, St. Aster Girls Academy, is where I am entering as a first year. Unexpectedly, I had to crossdress in order to enroll! If my roommate or classmates found out I am a guy, it would be inexcusable!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Tokyo Ghoul
description:
Lurking within the shadows of Tokyo are frightening beings known as "ghouls," who satisfy their hunger by feeding on humans once night falls. Ken Kaneki, an unsuspecting university freshman, finds himself caught in a world between humans and ghouls when his date turns out to be a ghoul after his flesh.

[Written by MAL Rewrite]
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Police, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Valhalla Otintin-kan
description: Shota Iijima picked up a mysterious erotic book during his childhood. Since then he has developed a severe fantasy onee-san fetish. From the age of 12 to 15, he masturbated 999 times. For his 1000th round of masturbation, he had been transferred to a different world and was sold as a slave.
tags: Loli, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Danshi Kokoseidakedo Gyaru ni TS Shimashita
description:
Junpei, a loner high schooler, became a gyaru after saving the god of gyaru from drowning. Through his mother's connections, he was able to transfer to an all-girls school, but it was stuffed to the brim with gyarus! Every day is a sensory overload for Shunpei, who's never even talked to a girl, let alone a gyaru.
___
 [Alternative Official Raw (NicoNico)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67976)
tags: Genderswap, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Kami Chi no Kyuuseishu -0.00000001% o Hikiate Saikyou e-
description: A player who can fight creatures from the wonders of another world. The main protagonist, Ariake Subaru, was bullied and was chosen as a player of the “Rainbow” rank, which is neither gold, silver, nor copper. He acquired the skill to freely manipulate blood, and his life and position changed completely. As he continues to fight every day, he gradually earns the title as a “Savior” who will save the world.
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Saraiya Goyou
description: Masterless samurai Akitsu Masanosuke is a skilled and loyal swordsman, but his naïve, diffident nature has time and again caused him to be let go by the lords who have employed him. Hungry and desperate, he becomes a bodyguard for Yaichi, the charismatic leader of a gang called "Five Leaves." Although disturbed by the gang's sinister activities, Masa begins to suspect that Yaichi's motivations are not what they seem. And despite his misgivings, the deeper he's drawn into the world of the Five Leaves, the more he finds himself fascinated by these devious, mysterious outlaws.
tags: Historical, Action, Drama

name: Banana Fish
description: Nature made Ash Lynx beautiful; nurture made him a cold ruthless killer. A runaway brought up as the adopted heir and sex toy of "Papa" Dino Golzine, Ash, now at the rebellious age of seventeen, forsakes the kingdom held out by the devil who raised him. But the hideous secret that drove Ash's older brother mad in Vietnam has suddenly fallen into Papa's insatiably ambitious hands—and it's exactly the wrong time for Eiji Okamura, a pure-hearted young photographer from Japan, to make Ash Lynx's acquaintance…
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Usogui
description:
There are gamblers out there who even bet their lives as ante. But to secure the integrity of these life-threatening gambles, a violent and powerful organization by the name of “Kakerou” referees these games as a neutral party. Follow Baku Madarame a.k.a. Usogui (The Lie Eater) as he gambles against maniacal opponents at games – such as Escape the Abandoned Building, Old Maid, and Hangman – to ultimately “out-gamble” and control the neutral organization of Kakerou itself.  


---

**Links:**  
- [OAV on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=14163)
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Martial Arts, Mafia, Gore, Drama, Mystery

name: The Secret of House Francesa
description:
The Duchy of Francesca rules the northern provinces on behalf of the fallen Imperial family. After the sudden death of the lord of their household, Duke Den, the twins Damian and Chloe become puppets at the hands of their relatives. Controlled by dark magic, Damian becomes the empty-shelled lord of the household while Chloe, who has a natural talent for swordsmanship, becomes an assassin repeatedly committing unwanted murders. Later deemed no longer useful, she falls to dark magic and kills Damian with her hands before meeting her own tragic ending afterward. However, when she opened her eyes once more, she returned to the past. To the past – the day of her beloved father’s, Duke Den’s funeral. From then, Chloe made a decision. A decision to not allow her past life to repeat itself... and to punish her relatives and the vassals who dared turn their backs on her family.

---
“So many things would have been different if you had become the family head…”

*My older twin brother died at my hands.*

Chloe, who was controlled by black magic and forced to murder endlessly against her will, ultimately ends up killing her older twin brother. With barely a moment to mourn, the tip of her sword was immediately pointed at Chloe’s heart. Chloe died a miserable death. But when she opened her eyes again, she realized that she had gone back in time.

*I won’t repeat my past life. In order to protect my family and my beloved older brother, I will personally become the master by becoming my brother.*

“Look forward to it. You are the ones who pushed me to this point.”

---
**Original Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/54824372), [Naver](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8629075), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/2057181273)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%B9%BC%EC%95%97%EA%B8%B4-%EA%B0%80%EB%AC%B8%EC%9D%98-%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%90%98%EB%A0%A4-%ED%95%A9%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3182), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60828356)
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Crossdressing, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: RED: Living On the Edge
description:
Set in nineteenth-century America, Red is the last living survivor of a Native American tribe that was slaughtered by white men. On a long journey in search of revenge, he travels with Iero Ito, a samurai who ran away to America after being defeated in the Seinan civil war, and Angie, a mysterious prostitute. The bonds of friendship between the three are touching. Although it is all fiction, the story seems very real as it is based on actual battles between US troops, Apaches and other tribes.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics (2005)
tags: Historical, Action, Animals, Comedy, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Crossdressing, Military, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: I Became the Only Healer in This World
description:
Healer who is addicted to gambling has been on a single path for years. Somehow, the world changed and I became the world's only healer. [There is a place that needs you, a unique healer.] [Will you respond to the summons?] ‘What? 'You have a tank dealer but no healer?' No, what. Is there any balance for X network with tank damage but no healer? [The constellations watching you complain that this is not a game, but reality!] *** It has been several decades since the Gate appeared. I heard that a lot of strategies and data have been accumulated over the years. ‘Why is everyone proceeding so inefficiently? 'Frustrating?' I was serious about my strategy, so I just tried my best to close the gate. “It was you who saved me. “I made it so that only you can see it.” 1st place in the former rankings who were said to have been betrayed and went into hiding. “I need you. my savior “My life.” Head of the world's top 10 guild unions. “Don’t abandon me. Because I can’t breathe without you.” Up to 1st place in the current ranking. I was too busy clearing the gate, but strange guys started to come by. 

[Plate/Constellation/Hunter/Himsumjin/Munchkin/Yeojuwon Tower/Salvation]
tags: Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Yojouhan Ohi ~Marie Antoinette Tensei Ohi no Yarinaoshi~
description:
'Marie Antoinette came to my room that day...'

A Lolita-loving high school girl and the tragic Queen Marie-Antoinette in modern Japan. Born, raised and raised differently, the encounter between these two girls changes history.
tags: Award Winning, Reincarnation, Historical, Crossdressing, Fantasy

name: I Raised My Younger Sister Beautifully
description:
When Princess Fleta, who has been mistreated her entire life due to being born with a curse, summons the basilisk and destroys the palace, Princess Cezanne regrets that things could have turned out differently if someone had been by Fleta's side. So when she miraculously finds herself six years back in time, she is determined to take Fleta under her wing and fill her baby sister's life with nothing but joyful light. Will Cezanne be able to dispel the darkness inside Fleta and rewrite the ending?

---
The imperial family collapsed during one night by the basilisk, the summoned beast of darkness which was summoned by the cursed princess, Fleta. “If there is a next life, then… Can I really be your younger sister?” If I had approached you a little earlier, would it have been different from now? The last time everyone regretted it, the time miraculously returned to 6 years earlier. If this is the second chance we've been given.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Winning Pass
description: Haruto Ichinose has an older brother, Shori Ichinose, who has excellent grades, is a basketball prodigy, and is very popular in school. Although he says he hates basketball, he trains alone and challenges his brother, only to be beaten back. On the other hand, his older brother Shori seems to recognize his "talent" more than anyone else, but who is he really...?
tags: Comedy, Sports, School Life

name: Reincarnated as a Genius Prodigy of a Prestigious Family
description:
His talent was forged on the battlefield, but before he could fully develop it, he died.

However, when he opened his eyes again, he realized he had been reborn as Dane Sogres, the youngest son of a prestigious count.

The talent he now possessed... was not limited to just one field?!

A talent in spearmanship, assassination, magic, summoning, and even swordsmanship—which he had not been able to develop fully before!

He can finally nurture his endless talent in the embrace of the happy family he had always longed for.

"Spearmanship! Dane must absolutely learn spearmanship!"

"Are you saying that because you really don't know how useful learning stealth and assassination skills could be?"

"Magic is the future, Father, Mother!"

"For my younger brother... summoning would also be really nice..."

...Mm, this is a happy family, right?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Unnamed Memory
description:
*“As long as you’re the master of that sword and I’m a witch, someday you’ll have to kill me for real.”*

As a child, Oscar, Crown Prince of Farsas, had been cursed to be childless. At the age of 20, he paid a visit to Tinassha, the strongest witch in the continent, to break the curse. He came back bringing Tinassha along as his protector, and in the one year until his contract with her expired, he got embroiled into her past, and an even greater destiny.
tags: Romance, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Hitomi-chan Is Shy With Strangers
description: One day, the ordinary 2nd year high schooler Yuu Usami accidentally encounters a big girl with a scary look. Turns out she's glaring at him, but why…?! Although Hitomi Takano looks like she's scary and awkward, she's actually a kind and adorable girl. This one shall be a happy, heartwarming slice-of-life comedy.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Prices Depreciated, and I Became the World's Richest Person
description: I woke up to find the world had changed! Prices everywhere have decreased by a million times, yet my funds remain the same, making me wealthier than the world’s richest person! How should I spend all this money…
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy

name: Kawaibara-senpai wa Kawaii (Saotome-kun) ga Suki!
description:
Saotome-kun is short and terrible at sports. He thought that studying was his only good point, but in his new high school, his grades are a far cry from stellar. As he was feeling down and thinking he had nothing, the academically brilliant, sporty, elegant, and beautiful "Perfect Student Council President" Kawaibara-senpai approached him.
Having maintained her position at the top of the grade since she enrolled, she offers to tutor Saotome on one condition: he must wear a sailor uniform while studying with her. Their secret study sessions after school begin...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Slice of Life

name: Bully Me If You Can
description:
What if the victim of bullying suddenly becomes attractive. Do you still want to bully him again? Or it will become a new problem for the bully.

Arthur had enough bullying by Elsa and being called meat buns. One day he decided to exercise to lose some weight in hopes of not getting bullied again. But something happened and changed his life forever.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Konna ni Kawaii Otose-kun ga Onna no Ko no Hazu ga nai
description: Otose-kun, a male college student, loves being "cute" while crossdressing! But one day, his classmate Tachibana (♂) finds out about his hobby. What does Tachibana want in exchange for keeping the secret? They connect with each other through "cuteness" ♪
tags: Comedy, Crossdressing, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Kono Kankei wa Gouhou Desu!
description:
YES Sister, NO Touch!

Kouta, who is extremely siscon, decides to live alone in order to "escape from his little sister ". One day, however, he picks up a runaway girl named Ui, who is full of younger sisterly feelings. Although she looks and acts like a child, she is in fact a beautiful 19-year-old girl with big tits!

Protect his sister? or Crossing the line? The days of agony begin!
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's
description: The Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's manga is a spin-off of its anime series. Like the Yu-Gi-Oh! GX manga, the events that take place, as well as the cards used by characters differ from those in the anime. It was published monthly in the V Jump magazine in Japanese, and has been released in English via the Shonen Jump magazine starting with the January 2011 issue. It began serialization on August 21, 2009, and ended on January 21, 2015, with a bonus chapter being announced to be included in the final volume. The author of the manga is Masahiro Hikokubo and the artist of the manga is Masashi Satō. The manga is supervised by Kazuki Takahashi.
tags: Sports, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: The Lady Knight and the Beast-Eared Child
description: A different world where demons are rampant and murderous. Olivia, a female knight, lives with her apprentice Noah, an animal eared child. A tale of a master and apprentice growing up, adventuring and being healed by the strong bond between each other.
tags: Monsters, Animals, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Slice of Life

name: The Prince of Tennis II
description: The exclusive Japanese U-17 training camp was previously only open to the top high school players in the country. All of this changes when 50 of the nation's best middle school players are selected to join the esteemed training facility—including 12-year-old tennis prodigy Echizen Ryoma. But what seems like an ordinary training camp quickly becomes something far greater than any of the middle schoolers are expecting. The climb to the top of the Japanese tennis world is perilous, but even that journey pales in comparison to the world stage that awaits beyond the summit.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Zennin Ossan, Umarekawattara SSS Rank Jinsei ga Kakutei Shita
description: The virtuous will definitely be rewarded! This world judges the deeds and good karma of your previous life, and grants you a rank when you are reborn. The benevolent man, even surprising the gods through this, decides to be reborn as the son Alexander of a noble family in the same world as his past life, and thus starts his SSS-Rank life! Follow Alec's journey as he lives his life as a SSS Rank!!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Yankee JK Kuzuhana-chan
description: At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone. Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Delinquents, Gyaru

name: Harukanaru Ring
description:
(from [wikipedia.ja](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%81%99%E3%81%8B%E3%81%AA%E3%82%8B%E3%83%AA%E3%83%B3%E3%82%B0)):

Yu Takamine was fascinated by the female pro-wrestlers she saw as a child, and overcoming her parents' opposition, she auditioned for and passed the Tokyo Women's Pro Wrestling Association Match to become a pro-wrestler. 

However, this was only the first step to becoming a wrestler. 

This is the story of Yu, an amateur wrestler who is not particularly strong, and her growth as an apprentice, rookie, heel, idol, and senior wrestler as she explores various fighting styles.
tags: Action, Survival, Sports, Drama

name: Lanxi Zhen
description: Lanxi Zhen tells the story of Laojun, Xuanli, and Qingning during the war. It shows a different world of demons and gods.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Yowamushi Pedal
description:
Otaku Sakamichi Onoda has just entered high school and plans to join the anime club. In middle school, Onoda didn’t have any friends with whom he could talk about anime, games, Akihabara and other otaku things, and he is hoping he can make such friends in the anime club, but he finds out it's been disbanded. In order to reestablish the club he tries to find 4 other people who would like to join.  
  
Since he was a little boy, Onoda has ridden his mamachari–a bulky bicycle with a step-through frame mainly used for short rides, such as for casual fun or to pick up groceries–to go to Akihabara every week to check out or buy otaku things. Fellow freshman Shunsuke Imaizumi and bicyclist, while training, notices a boy (Onoda) riding his mamachari up a steep road.  
  
Freshman and road racing cyclist, Shokichi Naruko visits Akihabara to get some Gundam plastic models for his younger brothers and meets Onoda who catches his attention because of the his cycling skill on the mamachari and later find out they go to the same school. Later on, both Naruko and Imaizumi try to convince him to join the bicycle racing club, but will he?


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics as **Yowamushi Pedal, Go!**

---
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2015, which it shared with The Seven Deadly Sins**
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Kodomo no Jikan: Houkago
description: This is a side history of "Kodomo no Jikan" original story. It is a recopilation of some one-shots, 4-koma and side-stories, with a special, with the events after the last chapter (093) from the main story.
tags: Genderswap, Loli, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life
