name: I'm the Only One With Genius DNA
description:
A status window appeared in front of Ryu Young-jun, a researcher at a pharmaceutical company.  
Rosalin's status window, an artificial cell that knows everything about biology.

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%98%BC%EC%9E%90-%EC%B2%9C%EC%9E%AC-DNA/2412)

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/64743)
tags: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kusunoki's Flunking Her High School Glow-Up
description: After his traumatic years in junior high school, the ultra-introvert Shizuki Keisuke decides to turn his life around, and gives himself a complete make-over for his high school "debut." His new high school life seems promising, as no one is aware of his hidden past...except for one person: Kusunoki Shizuka, who also changed herself in pursuit of a more successful high school life! As their fates intertwine, will Keisuke ultimately be able live a peaceful life in high school...?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Gwijjal Romance
description: Seonwoo Yoo, a senior in the photography department, is working as a photographer. One day, he receives a collaboration proposal from a famous overseas magazine.For a while, such a fluttering heartRecently, a jokjok ghost taking a picture is taken together'Seon-woo', who suffered from a psychic phenomenon, tries in various ways to solve it, but it is not easy.In the meantime, the psychic picture was not taken.They find the only subject... It is none other than the most famous playboy on campus, 'Choi Moo-young! "Model? Let me do it. Go out with me instead."Will 'Seonwoo' be able to take a picture of 'Mooyoung' and debut safely in a famous overseas magazine?!The dilemma of a horror romance with him, who never wants to be involved, begins!
tags: Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Horror, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Honto wa Motto, Shitai dake
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Doujinshi

name: Patalliro!
description:
Patalliro is the story of the young boy king Patalliro and his many misadventures as he avoids being assassinated by various beautiful boys thanks to the skills of his bodyguard, Major Jack Bancoran from England's Information Bureau. 
Later they're joined by the hot-blooded Maraich, and a beautiful love-and-hate relationship blossoms between him and Bancoran.
tags: Action, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Military, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Koi Toka Yume Toka Tententen
description:
Kai-chan is a 29-year-old part-time worker who moved to Tokyo 10 years ago with dreams in mind. She is busy making a living, and time just passes by. She even gave up drawing, something she loved, because it was painful when she didn't get any "likes" from anyone when she posted her pictures on social media. Meanwhile, Kai-chan falls in love and moves from Tokyo to Osaka! A story of love and dreams that keeps rolling in for Kai-chan, whose first unrequited love of her life is unstoppable.

2nd placer of the women's edition of "Kono Manga ga Sugoi! 2025", just behind the winner "Tamaki & Amane".
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Saint Seiya: Rerise of Poseidon
description:
The sanctuary is exhausted after the battle against the Lord of Darkness Hades.
In the absence of Seiya and the others, the land was about to meet its end in the wrath of the goddess Nemesis!
At that moment, the Emperor of the Sea Poseidon awakens to Hades' call and, together with the Seven Marina Generals challenges Nemesis and their Heroic Souls who serve her in battle!
tags: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

name: Captain Kid
description: In the 19th century, there lived a young pirate king, feared enough to be called the “Devil of the Sea”. His name is Captain Kid! With his mysterious guardian sword, Black Lightning, he sails the seven seas aboard his vessel, the Golden Drake!! What awaits him? Is it hell, or the furious waves of the ocean?! The adventurous tale of Kid and his band of rogues begins here!!
tags: Historical, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic

name: Hanayamata
description:
Normal appearance, normal intelligence, normal in arts and sports… just normal. This is the entirely normal 14-year-old, Naru Sekiya. While she admires "Heroines" she continues to live a normal life until one moonlit night she meets a fairy. This foreign girl then guides her into the extraordinary world of the yosakoi dance.


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
tags: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Saijaku Tamer wa Gomi Hiroi no Tabi o Hajimemashita
description:
When Ivy was born into this world, she remembered her past life. Remembering her preincarnation, she strove to avoid strife. But fate curdled at the status check, when kids learn who they are. For she had only one skill – Taming – and not a single star. Ivy was weak from the start – at most, she could tame a slime. And in her world, most people did not give the weak their time. Only one woman in her village would treat her as her own. But after she died, Ivy got the hint and ran from home. While on the lam, she met a tiny slime and made Sora its name.  And such begins the heart-warming survival story of a small girl who can tame.

- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9629ex/)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Disney Twisted Wonderland - The Comic - ~Episode of Savanaclaw~
description: Hirasaka Yuuka, a high-school student who lived an average life, and a black carriage that suddenly appeared in front of her one day on her way home from club. After seeing it and losing consciousness, she awoke in another world called "Twisted Wonderland"...?
tags: Action, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Mahou Shoujo Ikusei Keikaku: Restart
description: 16 Magical Girls have been chosen to participate in the Magical Girl Raising Project by an unknown person and this time, there's prize money involved. Every three days, their Magical Phones will pull them into an RPG-like simulation where they have to clear the game to get out!
tags: Thriller, Action, Magical Girls, Magic, Fantasy

name: Dark Castle
description: A dark gloomy castle with endless stairways and an ancient library. Scary, mysterious creatures live here, hiding in the night. One day, a girl who lost her memory ends up there. Who is she and how can she get back? And, most importantly, how will the owner of the castle decide her fate?
tags: Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: I Can't Fall in Love With Paperman
description: When a BL comic artist transmigrated into the princess of Liao, she resumed her career... but encountered her "dear son" who crawled out of the book and refused to be gay! Faced with a sword to her neck, will she surrender or resist? What's worse, the plot is no longer under her control; who's the mysterious person behind the scenes controlling everything?
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Dangerous Lover
description:
I've long known about your ill intentions!

Huang Yun'er, a D-lister deliberately gets close to female CEO Ou Chenxi, intending to seduce her in order to gain access to the Ou family and investigate her cousin's death. Ou Chenxi sees through Huang Yun'er's scheming, but believing she can fully control the situation and finding Huang Yun'er aesthetically appealing, she doesn't reject this dangerous woman's advances. At the same time, she wants to investigate Huang Yun'er's motives.

One deliberately seduces but wavers due to love amidst her calculations, while the other is irresistibly attracted despite knowing the danger... These two cunning individuals sink together while fully aware, parrying each other's moves while desperately trying to suppress their growing feelings. As they struggle with their emotions, they gradually uncover secrets from the past.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Onna no Sono no Hoshi
description:
The story starts when Kagawa, a student, delivers the class journal to Hoshi-sensei. As the students play word chain game "Shiritori" in the form of drawings in the remarks column of the journal, Hoshi-sensei becomes troubled...

---
- **Won the 25th Japan Media Arts Festival Social Impact Award for Manga in 2022**
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Toilet-bound Hanako-kun
description:
"Hanako-san, Hanako-san… are you there?"  
At Kamome Academy, rumors abound about the school's Seven Mysteries, one of which is Hanako-san. Said to occupy the third stall of the third floor girls' bathroom in the old school building, Hanako-san grants any wish when summoned. Nene Yashiro, an occult-loving high school girl who dreams of romance, ventures into this haunted bathroom… but the Hanako-san she meets there is nothing like she imagined! Kamome Academy's Hanako-san… is a boy!  
  
**Note:** Volume 0 includes the original pilot version of Jibaku Shounen Hanako-kun and the debut oneshot of Aida Iro - Dear My Living Dead.
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Gan Manga ~Watashitachi wa Daibyou Shiteiru~
description:
Manga artist Shungicu Uchida, whose numerous hit works include the revolutionary child-rearing manga "We are Reproducing," and "Minami's Lover," which has been dramatized for TV many times, was suddenly diagnosed with colorectal cancer in 2015...!

The slapstick events leading up to the discovery, hospitalization, and surgery, the mechanism and side effects of anticancer drugs, the physical and environmental changes that ensued, and the turbulent days with her four children before and after the surgery... The author's unique comic essay on the battle against cancer faces cancer head-on and describes it in her trademark frank style.
tags: Comedy, Drama, Medical, Slice of Life

name: Silver Bullet Exorcist
description: In a chaotic Joseon dynasty with vampires, ghosts, and shamans, Park Moon-soo, who calls himself a dark-speaker, destroys a corrupted official. In order to subdue the dark master Park Moon-soo, who is trying to revive the vampire king, the court dispatches Anson, a military officer who has just passed the exam, to find Hong Kil-dong, an outlaw who is good at swordsmanship and martial arts and dispatches him to Taebaek Mountain.
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: The Legendary Mechanic
description:
Han Xiao, a veteran player of the game "Galaxy" died unexpectedly in the middle of doing a leveling request. He was transmitted to the game world ten years earlier and became an NPC with a player's panel and was reborn in the base of the game's villain. In order to survive, Han Xiao resolutely chose the "Mechanic" occupation and concentrated on cultivation. Familiar with the iterations and rules of multiple versions of the game, he vowed to lead the army of machines, overthrow the villains, and rise from scratch to become the strongest.

Alternative RAWs:
[IQIYI](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_1ttzvn5jsqd.html)
[BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc30386)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Mecha, Virtual Reality, Video Games

name: Yuurei to Tsukareta Kaishain
description:
No matter how hard things seem to be, there is always 'someone' watching over you.

A ghost who remained in this world with lingering attachments, one day encountered an office worker left exhausted from work, Nozaki.

"Nobody even looks at me..."

Nozaki was consumed with loneliness.
The ghost, who was all alone at the end of his own life, decided to watch over his daily life.

Though left at the mercy of his job, Nozaki desperately carried on each day.
Until one day, he encountered someone new.

The feelings he lost amid the restless day-to-day, through connecting with others, Nozaki will gradually take back.
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Office Workers, 4-Koma, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Twst 4koma
description: A series of slice-of-life 4koma strips featuring the characters from the popular mobile game Twisted Wonderland.
tags: Comedy, Video Games, Magic, 4-Koma, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: TEN
description: "I didn't even know what had hurt me." Min Jiho, a former second-tier idol, ended his idol career, leaving only confusion in his heart. Planning to leave the entertainment industry entirely, Jiho unexpectedly encounters his idolized top actor, Kang Taeyeon, during a variety show as a substitute. This leads him to become embroiled in a light scandal...
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Demon Maid Only Wants to Be Bullied by the Villainess Noble Lady
description:
The Noble Lady binds Tentacle Maid

Sharan, a pious girl, has secured a well-paying job as a maid. Her mission is to serve a prideful, sadistic noble lady named Lynette. However, her job won't simply be that easy....
tags: Demons, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Magical Girls, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Beyblade X
description: What has not yet been seen, and what cannot be seen - "X". Beyblade, accelerated to the limit (extreme), blasts through a new era!
tags: Traditional Games, Action, Sports, Adventure

name: Urenokori no Dorei Elf o Hirotta no de, Musume ni Suru Koto ni shita
description:
Weiss, a magician living in the scoundrel-filled Zenith, finds a high elf girl for sale, a higher level elf species that is said to be extinct.

He decides to buy her and raise her as his daughter. The high elf doesn't even know how to speak the language, but Weiss' hard work in raising her seems to be paying off...? 

A warm and fluffy fantasy featuring the rookie dad Weiss and his cute little elven daughter!
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: White Tiger and Black Tiger
description:
White Tiger went into the woods to find a strong tiger called "Black Tiger" and met Black Tiger, the shrimp.

It's a web manga on Twitter by NITORI Sasami, the author of "Wonder Cat Kyuu-chan" (Fushigi Neko no Kyuu-chan).
tags: Animals, Comedy, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Pokemon - Someday, Under the Sea of Falling Stars (Doujinshi)
description:
Miu, the coddled princess of an underwater kingdom, yearning for freedom.
Cel, a simple, free-spirited denizen of the sea, yearning for knowledge.

One day, they meet thanks to an unexpected (?) twist of fate, and a bond forges itself between them, in the form of a mysterious pendant...  and maybe something more?
tags: Adventure, Doujinshi, Drama, Fantasy

name: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kitan - Jack the Ripper no Jikenbo
description:
In 1888, a number of prostitutes were murdered in London, by someone known only as "Jack the Ripper". The murderer takes to the streets each day, looking to slit some unfortunate woman open... The past of Jack the Ripper, the English gentleman who represented the human side in the fourth round of the struggle between God and mankind known as Ragnarok, who was one of the top-three most popular characters in the character poll, is finally revealed!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/z_R0212)
tags: Historical, Action, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You
description: Aijo Rentaro has asked a hundred girls out and struck out every time. In desperation, he prays for guidance, only to be told by a god that his rejections were due to a cosmic mishap! Now this god will set things right by making sure Aijo gets one hundred dates. Except, as things often go with gods, there’s a catch: each of his one hundred dates is Aijo’s destined soulmate! Worse, if he doesn’t return their feelings, they’ll all die in horrible - and hilarious - accidents!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Little Mushroom
description:
“Until the day humanity falls.”

In the year 2020, Earth’s magnetic poles disappeared and humankind was nearly wiped out by cosmic radiation. Within the span of a hundred years, living creatures began to mutate and devour each other while the remaining humans, numbering in the tens of thousands, struggled bitterly in their man-made bases.

In the Abyss, home to the mutated xenogenics, there lived a sentient little mushroom. Because it had been nourished by the blood and flesh of the deceased human An Ze, not only did it take on a similar-looking human form, but a similar name as well: An Zhe.

An Zhe is determined to go to the human base to search for his spore, which had been harvested by humans. Once there, however, he faces the omnipresent risk of discovery and certain death as he tries to keep his non-human nature hidden from the Judges, whose responsibility is to inspect for and eliminate xenogenics like himself. And of all the Judges, Colonel Lu Feng is the most perceptive and merciless—as soon as he determines that someone is a xenogenic, he will execute that person on the spot.

But An Zhe’s mutation goes undetected by Lu Feng’s eyes, and so a tale of humans and xenogenics unfolds…

Silver Award winner at the 12th Chinese Nebula Awards for Chinese Science Fiction.
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Log into the Future
description: At the beginning of the martial dao, abnormal beasts invaded the world. Humanity’s martials had to retreat in defeat time and time again. Lu Sheng transmigrates to that time, but in his dreams he enters a world 10 000 years later. The foundational body refining method from 10k years in the future is several thousand times more effective than the current one. Then there’s the breathing method, body refining pill formula, and sacred martial law from 10k years later… Despite developing martial arts for 10k years, humanity was annihilated! Their martial arts civilization reached the apex, and yet there was no one left to inherit it. Except Lu Sheng, he’s exactly that last spark of hope!
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Tenseisaki ga Shoujo Manga no Shirobuta Reijou datta reBoooot!
description:
I recalled memories of my past life after Grandfather told me my engagement was broken. At the same time, I realized this world was the same world as in my favorite shoujo manga. The villainess who exhausted every method possible to bully the heroine… I reincarnated as that villainess’ chubby follower. I shook upon remembering the future lined up for her. When the villainess’ evil deeds came to light, she pinned all her crimes on Britney. I was a character that gets executed.

To reliably avoid this, I must not become the villainess’ follower. As this villainess only keeps those who are exceptionally uglier than her by her side, I may be able to do something if I slim up. For now, let’s go on a diet!

---
* [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4774dz/)
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: My Dearest Nemesis
description: The whole company knew that they they were polar opposites who fought like cats and dogs. Yet during the year-end party, the wall between them shattered after they got drunk! And so the two of them went from always being close to going off on each other to feeling very strange things following the accidental mishap...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Heart of Thorns
description: One day, Liu Hai happened upon a dilapidated magic book. When she imitated the wizard in the magic book to create a magic circle, she accidentally summoned a monster girl named Chi Liu. Chi Liu is the source of strength in the country of Chi. She had been imprisoned for a long time and finally managed to escape. While Liu Hai in the human world was experimenting with the magic circle, the two met...
tags: Monsters, Demons, Long Strip, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Fate/EXTRA CCC FoxTail
description:
Being flung from the world of Fate/Extra Kishinami Hakuno finds himself in a very strange predicament. Caster Route.  
  
Note: There are no missing chapters. Chapter #32-33 are missing due to a difference in the volume and magazine numbering. Some earlier small chapters were combined in the volumes causing the number difference. Chapter 34 directly follows Chapter 31.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu
description:
High school student Misumi Makoto is called into a fantasy world by the god Tsukuyomi, in order to be a hero. However, powerful others in this world aren't as thrilled to have him there, and they kick him to the edge of the world just as Tsukuyomi declares that he must leave Makoto to find his own way. Now it's up to Makoto to find his own way!

[Official English Light Novel](https://hanashi.media/tsukimichi-moonlit-fantasy/)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Kowamote Koukousei to Jimiko-san
description:
“I’ve come back for you.” The handsome boy who moved away ten years ago has returned… with a super scary face?!  
  
Sachi, the 26 year-old manager of a little florist shop, was closing up when suddenly a high schooler with a terrifying face approached saying, “I came as promised.”   
  
The manly and earnest high schooler with a terrifying face X the super dull plain jane, in a heart bursting love story! ♥   
 <Translated from comic.pixiv>
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Koharu to Minato: Watashi no Partner wa Onna no Ko
description:
A sweet essay by a real-life couple, that attracted a lot of attention on SNS, is now being serialized on Yuri-Hime!

Koharu and Minato are a long-distance couple who finally got the chance to live together. Their lovey-dovey daily life, even with a 10-year age difference, will heal you from the fatigue of modern life...!
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Critically-Endangered Species Hacchin-Pamos
description:
The Hacchin-Pamos is a critically-endangered species. Let's find out why.

A daily comic series from Q-Rais.
tags: Animals, Comedy, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Digimon 04: Infinite Zone
description: The spirits of ten legendary warriors, who in ancient times had saved the Digiworld, now present a new power to the Digidestined! To save the Digiworld from evil, Takuya, Koji, Tommy, J.P and Zoe must band together as a team to find their chosen spirits! The journey into the new frontier - the Digimon Frontier - is about to begin!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Tensei Youjo. Kamikemono to Ouji to, Saikyou no Ojisan Youhei-dan no Naka de Ikiru.
description:
Lise found herself alone in a strange meadow as a young girl. Also, there is a big dog in front of her. There wasn't a dog like that in the neighborhood, and that's when Lise was convinced. 

"I see... This is what they call reincarnation in another world!"

 Then, a group of muscular mercenaries appears in front of Lise. It seems that they have come to defeat this dog. But to her surprise, this dog is a divine beast! Ranagh, the divine beast, has grown fond of Lise, who is the only one who can understand him. So, the leader of the mercenary group, Arlagia, offers to protect Lise and Ranagh with his mercenary group...? 

A young girl, a divine beast, and the strongest group of mercenaries - a wacky otherworldly fantasy with a cast of unorthodox characters!
tags: Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Yuusha-sama wa Houshuu ni Hitozuma wo go Kibou desu
description:
The hero, Chloe, is a strange hero who demands a bounty when saving people. And what makes it different is the prize... He only likes married women, so he demands the prettiest Milf in town.

**"If you want me to save the city, give me your most beautiful married woman!"**

 A unique erotic fantasy story created by a hero!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, Fantasy

name: Confinement King
description:
A girl who calls herself a devil appeared before a timid student named Fumio Kijima. The girl claims to be a campaign girl from the demon world and she gives him the ability to "summon a room" from nothing but thin air. At first he doesn't abuse his power and uses it as a convenient ability in his every day life. But one day he is bullied by his classmates under an unfair pretext and is made to suffer. In the past, he would have wallowed in misery and cried himself to sleep, but now he had a power to call upon.

"I will make them regret it!"

Using his powers to summon his "room", he begins his era of confinement and brainwashing to achieve his goals.
tags: Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Harem, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Everywhere & Nowhere (Discover)
description: A fun romantic comedy about two characters having fun in various countries all over the world.
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Musuko ga Kawaikute Shikataganai Mazoku no Hahaoya
description:
Lorem, an infamous and fearsome demoness, has had to settle down for the sake of Gospel, her baby boy. Try as she might, she is a loving and doting mother, but she remains fearsome to both fellow demon and human onlookers because she retains the dire reputation of her wild and terrible youth years past.

For the sake of motherly love, she has to persevere, to learn and to thrive in a world where she's not alone. For the sake of Gospel and his future.

Feel the Love in it!
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, 4-Koma, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Skip Beat!
description:
Kyouko Mogami lived solely for her childhood friend Shoutaro "Shou" Fuwa. She follows Shou to Tokyo so that he may realize his dream of becoming a famous singer. When his dream is realized, Kyouko overhears the truth behind his decision to bringing her with him: he was using her as a maid.  
  
Shocked and enraged, Kyouko swears to take revenge by outdoing him in show business. With a new look and a new attitude, she joins LME, the agency where Ren Tsuruga (Shou's rival and the #1 actor of LME) works, in the hopes of achieving her goal of destroying Shou's pride.  
  
Along the way, she discovers her true self, makes new friends (and enemies), and finds herself at the heart of some interesting situations that will change her life, and the lives of all others involved, forever.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: How to Survive as a Maid in a Horror Game
description:
"How did you know? I hid it well so that no one would find out."
 
Adrian Caesar von de Paltzgraf, the successor to the Paltzgraf Family. He is hailed as an angel in this world, but only I knew that the serial murders and murder attempts happening in the area which everyone was talking about were all committed by a young, good-looking gentleman.

[Adrian's murderous intent has increased.]
[Convince Adrian to lower his murderous intent. If not, you die.]
[Adrian's murderous intent is at 92%.]

I am the only one who knows. I was the only one who transmigrated into the world of this ridiculous horror game.

---

Note:
- Only Ridibooks has all the volumes, due to Volume 1 of the side stories being R19.
- "No Exit Horror" is the English name on the ebook and physical Korean novel cover.
tags: Thriller, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Video Games, Isekai, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: A Nameless flower
description: The young master, son of an earl, Luan, while wandering in the forest, met a boy his age. He fell in love with a sweet and kind boy, although he does not know his name. Gradually he began to neglect his training as a successor.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Full Color, Tragedy

name: The Duke and the Tutor
description: Jace, an Academic Honours student, once had a very bright future! However, his life has gone downhill ever since he punched a noble classmate. When he finally manages to get a chance to work as a private tutor… The duke is so handsome that he cannot concentrate!
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Hellper 2 <KillBeros>
description: Indeed it is, indeed it does. A street action comic featuring the life of Jang Gwangnam leading up to the creation of the Killberos Tribe.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Shibou Yuugi de Meshi wo Kuu.
description:
Player name, Yuuki. Seventeen. Place of residence: murder games.

Dressed up in a maid outfit attempting to find her way out of a death mansion, murdering other players clad in a bunny suit, and such to win money is how she makes a living. For some reason, she chose to stay "here" no matter what. 

Overcoming the border between life and death, she aims to attain an unprecedented 「99 Consecutive Wins」.
tags: Action, Survival, Gore, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Absolute Dominion
description:
"I shall devour this Jianghu!"

Says a mysterious son of the fruit merchant, holding the Monarch Sword in his left hand, and the Hell Blade on his right.

Possessing not only eloquence but even an overwhelming martial prowess, what could be his ultimate goal?

The delightful journey of the twenty year old youth, ' Jeok Leegeon', who dreams of dominating the martial world, begins!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Isekai Mokushiroku Mynoghra: Hametsu no Bunmei de Hajimeru Sekai Seifuku
description:
Bedridden and abandoned, Takuto Ira spent his days in the hospital trying to beat the illness that was slowly killing him. His only solace lay in the nation management strategy game Eternal Nations, where he had built a reputation as the greatest player to ever live. 

After succumbing to his disease, Takuto awoke within the game next to Atou — the Hero unit for his favorite civilization, Mynoghra. Now they’ll set out to conquer the world together (again), one unit, settlement, and level at a time!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Cool na Tsuma no Saa-chan
description: A romcom featuring 2 childhood friends who'll get married one day and the process that leads to that point.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Koibito Ijou no Koto wo, Kanojo Janai Kimi to
description:
Having to deal with his abusive boss day after day while working an exploitative job, Yamase Fuyu has become tired of it all... Until one day he accidentally runs into Minase Ito, his ex-girlfriend from university. 

The sudden reunion lifts Fuyu's spirits, who wastes no time inviting Ito to chat over drinks. The two have a whale of a time sharing gripes and reminiscing about the past. But just as Fuyu begins to appreciate their new relationship as "just friends", they end up spending an intimate night together...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Goth Loli JK Mujintou Hyouryuuki
description: On a school trip, two high school girls fell to the sea and washed up on a deserted island. What are they going to do about about food? And clothes? A cute survival 4koma on a deserted island, except for a mysterious creature.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, 4-Koma

name: Suterare Elf-san wa Sekai de Ichiban Tsuyokute Kawaii!
description:
"Dear top players, this game is a real parallel world. If you reincarnate and save the world, any wish you have will be granted."

Former popular voice actress Ayano responded to the proposal from the goddess. In order to shine as a voice actress once again. Reincarnated as the strongest species of high elf, she aims to "clear the game" in the parallel world with the strongest and cutest kemo-eared heroine using her gaming knowledge, but –!?
tags: Reincarnation, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Nonohana Katarazu
description:
A story of a girl named Nonoko and the flowers that bloom in the fields.

When she was young, she showed no interest in wild plants, but recently she has been looking intently at encyclopedias. Looking for a certain flower, when Nonoko goes out to the garden with a pictorial book...

(Source: Natalie, translated)

*Note: Switched from Futabasha's Web Action to Kobunsha's Comic Nettai in December 2024.*
tags: Slice of Life

name: Good Night, Stray Sheep
description:
Japan is the country with the shortest sleep time in the world. Despite being born in such a sleep-deprived country, Shinya Moroboshi is an unemployed man who sleeps a lot and lives a self-indulgent life that has nothing to do with lack of sleep. One day, Moroboshi finds an unfamiliar "sleep selling app" on his phone. He uses it with some skepticism, but to his surprise, he is able to actually sell his sleep and make money...!? This is a story that will light up the tomorrow of a deep, never-ending night.

(Source: Comic Zenon, translated)
tags: Psychological, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Tensei Shite High Elf ni Narimashitaga, Slow Life wa 120-nen de Akimashita
description:
Life in the Great Pulha Woodlands is the very definition of stillness and tranquility—and Acer’s had enough of it! That’s right. Acer isn’t quite like the other high elves of the forest. For starters, he remembers living a past life as a human in another world...meaning he’s got a taste for meat, adventure, and plenty of other decidedly un-elven things! He’s also bored out of his skull after 120 years of the peace and quiet of their serene sylvan lifestyle. So with nothing more than his trusty bow, a bundle of life-giving fruit, and his close bond with the spirits of nature, Acer leaves the monotony of the forest behind to seek a new life, one that’s more his pace. See what excitement awaits in the outside world full of humans, dwarves, and even other elves!

* [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/enough-with-this-slow-life-i-was-reincarnated-as-a-high-elf-and-now-i-m-bored)
tags: Reincarnation, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: My Favorite Savior Girl
description: [Translated by Mystic Willow Scans] As Lee Yeo-ju hums a song that comforted her during her long hospital stay, she is approached by an idol star named Park Jae-ha, whom she has only seen in videos. "I'll help you. You need money for the surgery, right?" Jae-ha becomes Yeo-ju's savior and favorite. However, five years later, he ends his life by making an extreme choice... Yeo-ju, in shock, cries out to a shooting star to save him. Did her wish come true? She goes back seven years and possesses the body of Jang Bo-ran, a top idol at the time and a judge on the audition program "I Am the Strongest Idol"... Among the audition participants is trainee Park Jae-ha!"Just like you saved me, I will save you this time."
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Music, Full Color

name: Maken Gishi Bacchus: Shinken o Mezasu Tenseisha wa, Kutte Nonde Tsukutte Sugosu
description:
A blacksmith reincarnated into another world sets out to forge the ultimate magic sword! Bacchus, a jack-of-all-trades craftsman with memories of his past life, steps into the world of magic and magic technology with the aim of making magic swords. Despite his diverse skills, Bacchus’s magical prowess is expected to cause a lot of trouble, but he doesn't care. He spends his days eating, drinking, crafting magic swords, and occasionally helping others with their problems. While he faces a few complications involving women, Bacchus continues to live his life one day at a time.

---
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw -[Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/70493)
tags: Action, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Catenaccio
description: Yataro Araki, a member of the Tojo High School soccer team, has big dreams. Within a decade, he sees himself conquering the soccer world’s loftiest peak: European “football!” Fast forward to what may be his last soccer match before graduation, the match that will make or break his dreams. Having thus far failed to attract the attention of scouts, he is now desperate to do whatever it takes to prove himself. Yataro is prepared to get his hands dirty if it means winning. If it means standing at the top! Welcome to the world of international football! Nothing is sacred, no rule is left unbroken! Not when victory is on the line!
tags: Psychological, Sports

name: Summer, Lemon, and Overlay
description: A struggling voice actress who goes by the name of Yunimaru is barely making ends meet. Constantly thinking about when she will escape her miserable life, she's contacted by Konno Sayaka—a beautiful and successful woman working for a big company—with a job offer: to read a farewell letter at her own funeral. While grappling with whether or not to accept such an absurd job offer, Sayaka makes her a proposal that she can't refuse. Now with an opportunity to escape her situation, Yunimaru also finds herself aiding Sayaka in the completion of her letter.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Fukigen na Mononokean
description: Ashiya has spent his first seven days of high school stuck in the infirmary because of a youkai attaching itself to him. He ends up asking the owner of a small tea room called the 'Mononokean' for help. This is a tale involving the very morose owner of the Mononokean guiding mononoke that happened to wander into this world go to the next world.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Boku no Noroi no Kyuuketsukihime
description:
In Japan, vampires have emerged and are rampaging throughout the country, eating and killing humans. In order to protect his friends, Isuzu, the leader of the anti-vampire security force, plans to kidnap the vampire slayer " Baroque," who is unofficially detained by the government. She is a legendary "vampire" that drives those who see her crazy with her sheer beauty.
___
[Official English Volumes (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/my-dear-curse-casting-vampiress)
tags: Action, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural

name: Tasogare no Utsuwagami
description: Hana, a samurai living a life of idleness in a huge underground prison city, and Josui Amanogawa, an ayakashi vessel god who has fallen from the heavenly city. Their encounter begins a journey of rebellion against the heavens.
tags: Historical, Action, Gore, Drama, Supernatural

name: Nimotsu Mochi no Nousuji Musou
description:
The more he carries, the stronger he becomes! An unmatched fantasy by the weakest adventurer duo!

Ryuk, a boy with a unique skill “Porter,” which allows him to carry a massive amount of items, was being exploited as a chore boy for the S-rank party “Black Lion of Foresight.” One day, the party managed to acquire a storage item more convenient than Ryuk’s skill, thus no longer needed, Ryuk is banished inside a dangerous dungeon. Despairing in this hopeless situation, suddenly he meets a shrine maiden girl, Mio — and then?
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Boku no Kawaii Musume wa Futago no Kenja: Tokugi ga Debafu no Teihen Kuro Mashirube-shi, Sodateta Futago no Musume ga S-rank no Dai Kenja ni Natte Shimau
description:
Elcan, a dark magician, is fired from his party due to his lack of talent with offensive magic.  As he wandered the streets he came across twins, who were abandoned by their parents. 

"I couldn't be a good dark magician, but I want to make their lives better!" 

He decided to retire from being an adventurer and raise these two girls as his own. And so, he raised his daughters, Corona and Selena. Teaching them black magic and enrolling them in a prestigious magician’s academy. 

After learning more about magic, the girls return to see their father with some important news… They are S-rank Sages?! And they want to form a party with him?! 

A new adventure between a father and his daughters begin!
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Omiai ni Sugoi Komyushou ga Kita
description: Itami, a middle-aged businessman, registers with a marriage agency to find a marriage partner, but luck doesn't seem to be on his side when it comes to matchmaking. Unable to see him like this, his subordinate, Ms. Sonoda, introduces him to a friend.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Yuurei-san to Furyou A
description:
Azuse Nagi transfers to the infamous Fukura High School, known for its bad reputation.
There, in an unused student guidance room, he meets a ghostly boy who introduces himself as "Yuurei-san."
No matter how much he ignores him, the persistent ghost keeps asking, "Let's play together".
Reluctantly, Azuse agrees to a game: if he wins, the ghost will leave, but if he loses, he'll have to follow one of his requests.
What starts as a trivial bet begins to significantly change Azuse's school life.
This is the beginning of a school fantasy that depicts the thrilling friendship between a ghost and a delinquent!

(Source: Comic Walker, edited)
tags: Ghosts, Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural

name: Mii-chan and Yamada-san
description:
Shinjuku, 2012. Yamada, who works as a hostess in a night club, meets Mii-chan, a new girl who is no good at anything she does. Mii-chan is energetic and motivated, but she can't read kanji or the atmosphere, so she is ridiculed by those around her and labeled as "pitiful." Nevertheless, Yamada is gradually drawn to Mii-chan as she works diligently.

(Translated from Magazine Pocket.)

(Originally serialised on X/Twitter under a pseudonym and released in collected volumes on Kindle. The original manga began with shorts, then ran "Mii-chan and Yamada-san" as a lengthier story. This is a reboot with the same basic premise. The author worked in a hostess club when she was in college, but has publicly stated in interviews and on social media that while there was a "Mii-chan" who served as the inspiration for the character, everything else about the story is fictional.)
tags: Sexual Violence, Drama, Tragedy

name: Oyasumi Fumi-san
description: Rinta, who moved to the city from the countryside and enrolled in a university in the heart of the city, meets "Fumi-san," rumored to be the most beautiful girl on campus, in the literature club he joined. After attending a drinking party together, he ends up walking her home. He safely escorts her to her house and is about to head back when suddenly... Fumi-san transforms and forcefully invites him to her bed—!? "I wonder how long you can keep being a good person, Rinta-kun...?" Fumi-san pushes Rinta to his limits, testing his self-control until it shatters.
tags: Psychological, Romance, School Life, Web Comic

name: Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
description:
Among the class transported to another world, Nagumo Hajime is an ordinary male student who didn’t have ambition nor aspiration in life, and thus called “Incompetent” by his classmates.
The class was summoned to become heroes and save a country from destruction. Students of the class were blessed with cheat specifications and cool job class, however, it was not the case with Hajime, with his profession as a “Synergist”, and his very mediocre stats. “Synergist”, to put it in another word was just artisan class. Being the weakest, he then falls to the depth of the abyss when he and his classmates were exploring a dungeon. What did he find in the depth of the abyss, and can he survive?


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/s/arifureta-from-commonplace-to-world-s-strongest)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Reporting for Duty, Duchess!
description:
As a successful captain in the military, Lee Yoon-ah is an icon of success and power.  But after an accident on the battlefield, she finds herself trapped in a romantic fantasy novel!

Stuck in a supporting role as the best friend to the main protagonist, Yoon-ah is determined to overturn the plotline and change Rosalie’s fate. Will she be able to change Rosalie’s fate and find happiness in the new world? 

Will she return to where she was originally from?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Military, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Muhoutou
description: A prequel to Jisatsutou. The Japanese government exiles convicts facing execution to a remote lawless island to fend for themselves.
tags: Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror

name: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie
description:
The story begins when the gods call a convention to decide whether to let humanity live or die, and settle on destroying humanity. But a lone Valkyrie puts forward a suggestion to let the gods and humanity fight one last battle, as a last hope for humanity's continued survival. 13 gods will fight against 13 human champions in one-on-one battles to decide whether humanity lives or dies.
___
**Alt Official English:** [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/record-of-ragnarok-manga/61/), [MangaHot](https://mangahot.jp/site/works/e_R0002)
tags: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: My Daddy Is A Cultivator
description:
The almighty Demon Cultivator Xie Tian gave birth to a child during the demon king selection and lost his place as the demon king! Now at the bottom of the pit, he decides to bring his son Duoduo and get his man back from the succession and marriage ceremony of the righteous sect! Who is the father?!   
  
Bai Jing: Since you're already, then you won't be going anywhere else. I want both the father and the child!  
Xie Tian: Marriage? Sure. But I'm on top!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Wuxia, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Tada no Murabito no Boku ga, Sanbyakunen Mae no Boukun Ouji ni Tensei shite shimaimashita
description:
Prince Rudolf gained knowledge of the future 300 years from now during a near-death experience. He uses his wits to change the future in which he will be assassinated as a tyrant prince! 

Meanwhile, discrepancies between the story passed down to posterity and reality gradually emerge…
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Gate - Teikoku no Bara Kishidan - Pinya Co Lada 14-sai
description: A spin-off focusing on Princess Pinya's (from "Gate - Thus the JSDF Fought There!") life before the "Gate" opening to the other world event.
tags: Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Isekai Izakaya "Nobu"
description:
Imagine there is a bar with many weird kind of food and drink that might bring you to another world! The bar, so-called "Nobu" is located in a alley of the old city Aiteria. At the very first step, diners feels like falling into another completely country, with cold, super cool beer, so-called "Toriaezu Nama"! (from: MU)  
  
Adapted from [web novel (raw)](http://ncode.syosetu.com/n9773bj/) / light novel of same name.  

[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20594)

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E7%95%B0%E4%B8%96%E7%95%8C%E5%B1%85%E9%85%92%E5%B1%8B%E3%80%8C%E3%81%AE%E3%81%B6%E3%80%8D)
tags: Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: The Evil Ring
description: 18 years ago, a prophecy emerged that a boy with a black ring, deemed inferior, would rewrite the survival rules of the world of the gifted. The only remaining descendant of the “Divine-Tier” status, Shannon, wears a black ring and lives as an inferior being in the filthy exile zone. However, his peaceful life is shattered when his identity is exposed, and the top-tier forces, seeing him as a threat, send out an assassination squad to kill Shannon. Five gifted individuals, who have existed since childhood to protect Shannon, are summoned at the same time. They rush to the exile zone to protect the last descendant of the “Divine-Tier” status, and a battle among the “rings” is about to ignite!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: A Good-Natured Craftsman Leisurely Travels Through Another World
description: Ryoichi Ishikawa, a young man who lost his father, who was his only relative, also decided to close the electrical shop that he and his father had been working on. From a strange matter, I choose to transfer to another world by my own will. It was supposed to be the second life of a leisurely trip, but I can not leave a person in need. We solve many worries by making full use of the cheat skills given by God and the skills of a craftsmen. Sometime around, friends with one or two habits gathered…! ?The journey of a good-natured craftsman in another world begins here!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Gojuu, Rokujuu, Yorokonde
description:
Aki-san (50), a divorced woman, has been getting along well with Rokujo-san (60).
People around them are worried about their pure relationship, but there is no need to worry. At a summer festival, the two quickly grow closer, and their feelings for each other continue to grow.
They envision a future together, and finally....
"I want to spend the rest of my life with the person I love."
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Uchi no Meido ga Uzasugiru
description:
Former Air Force Master Sergeant Kamoi Tsubame tries changing careers to finally get cute girls to wear her cute self-designed clothes. To that end she tries to get a job in the Takanashi household as a maid and babysitter to Yasuhiro Takanashi's spoiled daughter Misha Takanashi, as it seems that her mother is no longer present.  
  
Misha has successfully gotten rid of previous maids through playing devastating pranks like throwing mud, laying out banana peels to slip on and lighting the washed clothes on fire. In face of the newest applicant boasting that she has military experience, Misha even thinks about researching bomb making.
tags: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Girls' Love, Military, Slice of Life

name: Servamp
description: When a stray black cat crosses Shirota Mahiru’s path, the high school freshman’s life will never be the same again, because "Kuro" is no ordinary feline, but a Servamp, or servant vampire. While Mahiru’s personal philosophy is one of non-intervention, he soon becomes embroiled in an ancient, altogether surreal conflict between vampires and humans.
tags: Action, Animals, Comedy, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Isekai No Ochibi-chan wa Kyou mo Nanika wo Tsukuri Dasu
description: One day, Ochibi (5 years old) who lives in the slums suddenly remembers that she has been reincarnated from another world. Ochibi has the "Imagination Creation" skill, which allows her to create anything she imagines. She decides to start a business with the Japanese items she obtains with her "Imagination Creation" skill! A heartwarming story with a boy named "Onii" and a girl named "Nene" who aim to escape the slums!!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Astro Baby
description: The remote town of North Hill has been quarantined to prevent the spread of the mysterious Couper disease that is turning people into cannibals. Young soldier Billy returns to his hometown for the first time in six years for the woman he loves, but what horrors will be awaiting him...?
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore

name: My Hero Academia: Vigilantes
description:
In the world of Kouhei Horikoshi's Boku no Hero Academia, nearly everyone in the world has powers known as "Quirks". Normally, the law enforces the rule that citizens cannot use their Quirks out in the open, and that privilege is reserved only for registered superheroes. However, a select few have chosen to reject this rule. They are known as vigilantes - people with the hearts of heroes, but the reputation of villains.   
  
This is their story.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Superhero, Drama, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Oversleeping Takahashi
description: From the one-shot of the same name that amassed over 1,580,000 views! A classmate who is always nonchalantly late to school, but his true identity is...?! The new serialized story of battles and oversleeping begins!!
tags: Action, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy

name: Machi and Oboro
description: From Miyagi to the bustling life of a Tokyo high school, Machi Nishina wanted anything but the ordinary. Her wish is granted in the most unexpected way when she encounters Oboro Kasumi, a classmate harboring a secret, who ends up following her home...?!
tags: Ninja, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: No Gyaru in This Class
description:
Mirei, a diligent honor student, longs for the flashy, fashionable ‘gyaru’ lifestyle she admires in manga. With newfound courage, she decides to give herself a makeover and reinvent her image upon entering high school. There, she meets Yushin, a rough-around-the-edges boy, and… they hit it off?!

Shigure Tokita, the author of *Don’t Blush, Sekime-san*, presents a classroom comedy that unfolds around this fateful encounter!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Katekyo Hitman Reborn!
description: Tsuna comes home one day, only to be greeted by a little baby mafioso who apparently is his new home tutor. His job is to guide Tsuna into his role as the 10th Boss of the Vongola mafia family. With the help of all his new friends and an array of special items such as the "Dying Will Bullet", he might just be able to do it.
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Get Away, Matsumoto！-100 days escape-
description: Formerly a three time back-to-back winner of the All-Japan Intercollegiate Road Cycling Championships, Mastumoto now spends his days doing bike deliveries to pay the bills. Just as he contemplates giving up cycling for the sake of his future, Matsumoto suddenly finds himself at the center of an unbelievable incident...! Make way for this hard-hitting high-speed action!!
tags: Thriller, Sports, Drama

name: Legend of the Galactic Heroes (MICHIHARA Katsumi)
description:
Manga adaptation of 1980s.  
  
Five hundred years ago, Rudolf von Goldenbaum united the disparate governments of humankind and established a mighty human empire, a tribute to his own greatness that stretched across the galaxy. Demanding loyalty and discipline, Rudolf created an order designed to long outlast his own rule; but all human works fade in time. Today, the decaying empire faces the threat of the Free Planets Alliance, and military leaders on both sides jockey for power in the face of a seemingly inevitable conflict. On the side of the empire, the young general Reinhard von Lohengramm sees war as opportunity, and the empire as soft clay ready for his own sculpting. On the side of the alliance, would-be historian Yang Wen-li would like nothing better than to live out his days in peace - but times of war have little use for men who waste their days studying the mistakes of the past. Circumstances will make heroes and villains of both these men, as they write new history one blood-splattered page at a time.  
  


---
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: The Story About Time
description: A young girl named Fu, travels into the past to make sure that her parents don't get together...
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Mii-chan wa Kawaretai
description: Iori is a young man in his twenties who has been stressed at work, lost his cat that he had kept for many years, and is suffering from insomnia and loss of appetite. The next morning, he finds a beautiful, naked girl lying beside him...?
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Sijila
description:
Sijila was once the most adorable mythical creature in the world. Its overwhelming cuteness earned it the reverence of humanity, granting it a carefree life of plenty. However, as people became preoccupied with admiring Sijila's charm and stopped being productive, coupled with Sikila's ever-growing appetite, it soon consumed all the world's resources.

The gods could no longer tolerate its behavior. They stripped Sijila of all its "cuteness power," turning it into a ridiculed ball of flesh. They transformed a mere fraction of its "cuteness power" into a group of little Corgis, tasked with helping it atone for its sins.
tags: Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Full Color

name: Sousei Yuugi
description: The head of the largest yakuza organization in the Kansai region has decided to divide the organization into two groups, just for the sake of naming his successor in six months—one of his two twin sons, Rin or Rui.
tags: Action, Boys' Love, Incest, Crime, Mafia, Gore, Drama

name: Soya Duck
description: Ge ge's name is You Tiao, Di di's name is Soya. A cute comedy series about their daily lives!
tags: Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Arum Daun
description: A story about a girl that's friends with nature. Will she be strong enough to face her life that's full of difficulties? Or will she need nature's help?
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Top 1 Fighting Tutoring
description:
The bullied loser Kim Jaehyuk receives 'Top 1 Fighting Tutoring'!
Kim Jaehyuk is a high school student who has been living in despair under the torment of bullies. He's good at studying, but he'd rather be good at fighting.
Then, as if by fate, a 'fighting tutor' comes into his life!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Punch Rush JK Tara-chan
description:
Nikaido Katsuo, AKA “Fist King”, is the most powerful and undefeated delinquent in Japan. However, no one knows that behind the stories of his legendary battles, there is a girl behind the scenes… Her name is Tabara Nikaido. She is the fighter who took her brother's name and fought in secret, and defeated all the strong men in her way…… A slightly naughty story about a legendary fighter who happens to be a “tsuyokawa” JK!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550689798659821656)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, School Life, Delinquents

name: Akame ga KILL!
description:
Tatsumi is a fighter who, accompanied by his two childhood friends, sets off to the Capital in search of a way to make money to assist his poverty-stricken village. After being separated from his friends, Tatsumi not only fails to enlist in the army, but is swindled out of all his money. He is then taken in by a noble family who offer him help; after finding himself in a messy situation Tatsumi is rescued by a group of assassins known as Night Raid, and is invited to join their ranks. Composed of the swordswoman Akame, a young woman armed with a huge pair of scissors named Sheele, the string manipulator Lubbock, the armored warrior Bulat, the sniper Mine, the beast fighter Leone and their leader Najenda, Night Raid is also part of the revolutionary forces assembled to overthrow Prime Minister Honest, who manipulates the young emperor for his and his men's personal gain, leading the rest of the nation to poverty and strife.  


---
tags: Action, Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Bumpoor
description: His life hits rocks bottom, but he is the ultimate in assassinations. The legend of a hitman with absolute lethality begins. 333 yen in his pocket. Occupation: assassin. In a life of extreme poverty, all he has is hunger and his mission. Whenever his stomach rumbles, the poor but strong Nojima Ryou appears, shattering both reality and fiction! The start of a pitch-black assassination drama depicted with overwhelming realism!!
tags: Thriller, Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama

name: Jahy-sama wa Kujikenai!
description:
Jahy-sama (pronounced jah-hee) is an existence to be feared and respected throughout the Demon Realm. Well, was.

The (former) Demon Realm No. 2 is now busy with house chores and work…in the human realm! Her dinner is just beansprouts, and she can't afford anything except water at cafes, but she won't get discouraged!

---
**Note:**
Jahy's shirt says '魔界復興', which seems to translate to 'Demon Realm Restoration'.
tags: Loli, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Magical Girls, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: I Failed to Divorce My Husband
description:
I've been reincarnated as the extra character who stalked her husband, the male lead, for 10 years and died. Of course, I tried to divorce him before the female lead appeared.

But, I found out that my young husband was secretly abused in the house. At that moment, I immediately became overwhelmed with the responsibility and sense of duty a modern adult would have. 

**

Aiden had his back turned away from her and suddenly grabbed her arm forcefully. The strength of his hands alone could have ripped her arms off. Erin timidly called his name and spoke. 

"I already reminded you yesterday. We're a married couple, so I'm always on your side." 

"..."

"So, everything is alright." 

She comforted him with these sweet words like it was a spell. And as if he was under her magic, Aiden stopped trembling. 

**

The adult Erin requested to divorce her husband Aiden before the female lead appeared. As soon as those words left her lips, Aiden's smile disappeared. 

"A divorce? Never."

Aiden tore the divorce papers into such thin sheets, the contents were no longer legible. Erin smiled at the sight. (Synopsis source: Gourmet Scans)

---
Ellen's plan is simple. Before turning into an obsessive villain who gets executed, she's going to get a divorce! But after she becomes Ellen Lianster, her plan gets complicated. Her new husband, Aiden, has developed a debilitating fear of being touched, and Ellen is determined to discover the cause and cure. As she finds ways to help him, an affection-deprived Aiden slowly begins to seek comfort from Ellen. With both hearts opening up to each other, can this marriage succeed... at failing?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: MAD
description: Mysterious alien life-forms invade Earth! Most of humanity is wiped off the face of the planet. John, his sister, and the remaining survivors hope to find a new world to inhabit… But one day, they’re targeted by aliens again! (MANGA Plus)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Horror, Aliens

name: City Where the Moon Does Not Rise
description:
Ha-jeong, a high school girl living an unfortunate life, has only a glimpse of the daily life of the influencer "Daldalrun."

Ha-jeong has an obsession level of affection for her and even hacked into the wall pad of her house and peeks at even her very private life. One day, while peeking into Daldalrun's room as usual.

Ha-jeong witnesses Daldalrun's death, and the next day, she finds she's possessed Daldalrun's dead body....
tags: Thriller, Long Strip, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

description: When the Devil King announces his retirement, he calls forth his two sons, Yomi and Sora, to give them each a quest. Whichever of them finds a pure Yamato maiden within a year would inherit the throne of the Devil King, while the other would die. Thus begins Sora's sex-fuelled adventure to find a woman that can satisfy his father…

A transfer student suffering from an incurable disease called curiosity meets a mysterious being (human) who is beautiful, cute, cool, and terrifying. The first of a new generation of horror comic authors presents an abyssal love story, a ghost story to peek into and sensuality to you.

name: Veil
description:
"He", a police officer on his shift, happened to meet "her" on the streets, by chance.

Through its bold yet delicate brushwork and elegant prose, this stylish, full-colour comic
illustrates the subtle air of intimacy between these two individuals.

---
A chance encounter. A handsome policeman. A beautiful woman. A tentative love affair smolders on the snowy cobblestone streets, 
out of sight from those that might keep them apart. 

*Veil* is a beautifully illustrated full-color romance manga, told in stylish short vignettes, beautiful illustrations, and secret moments.
tags: Historical, Romance, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: My Roommate Is the Great Old Ones

name: Sword Art Online Unital Ring
description: A year has passed since Kirito and Asuna’s return from the Underworld. With them is Alice, who has been given a physical body. But their peace is quickly broken when the three are suddenly thrust into an unfamiliar game, Unital Ring. This new world is a survival MMO that fuses together every VRMMO created with the Seed program. As soon as it starts, Kirito finds himself with nothing but his underwear. Now, he’s got to challenge a mysterious VRMMOSVG under desperate circumstances!
tags: Action, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Prince of Tennis
description:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?
tags: Comedy, Survival, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Gray Summer Taxi
description: Note: Won an honorable mention for Shonen Magazine's 113th upcoming mangaka awards.
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: My Girlfriend's Not Here Today
description: It's a secret that I'm dating the love of my life at school. There's no way I can tell anyone, especially when we're both girls. But I can't help my feelings from slipping out in the background. It's not the ideal way to be a couple, but I can put up with it because I really love her... But such loneliness has also nurtured dark thoughts in my head.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Knight Under My Heart
description:
Have you ever skipped studying to play video games? Unfortunately for high school senior Yushin Lee, the stakes are a little higher than flunking, as he finds himself trapped in a VR-based MMORPG. 

Yushin was selected to beta test the game, only to be forced to fight for his life in a seemingly endless loop. What was supposed to be a light distraction from the stress of high-school life becomes a desperate struggle for survival as Yushin battles his way through REAL Online, a dark fantasy world created by a mysterious tech company with uncertain motives.

---

- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=hgICDv_sf9k)

name: Kusuburu Kemuri no Nare no Hate
description:
Whose feelings are simmering...?

When Masaki goes to college, he ends up staying with his cousin Haruomi, whom he admires and has a crush on. However, when he meets him again for the first time in several years, he has completely changed from the older brother he admired to a sloppy old man. He is shocked by his appearance, but he remains kind to Masaki, and his feelings for him grow stronger once again. However, no matter how hard Masaki tries to tell him how he feels, Haruomi stubbornly refuses.

"I love you."

Masaki is frustrated that he can't even accept his words, but he can sense that Haruomi is indecisive...
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Incest, Drama

name: Watashi wo Suki Sugiru Yuusha-sama wo Riyou shite, Konse koso Nagaiki suru Tsumoridattanoni (Tabun, Mata Shippaishita)
description:
Lisette, the daughter of an earl, is destined to be killed and eaten by a monster on her 20th birthday.
She is currently living her fourth life with all her memories intact.

In order to live longer this time, she goes to live in a sanctuary (the countryside) where monsters do not appear, but one day she reunites with Ralph, the handsome son of an aristocrat.

He is the young man whom Lisette saved when he was an orphan in her childhood.
The first words he says to her are, "I lived for you."

The first volume of a fantasy about a heroine who fights against her fate of death and a submissive, high-spec yandere hero, a devoted and doting love story!
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Waka-chan wa Kyou mo Azatoi
description: Tomoya is a college freshman on a mission to finally get his first ever girlfriend, but with one small problem: he's still a virgin! While he's gotten close with the beautiful and charming girl Waka Sakuraba in his club at school, he can't wrack up the courage to take the first step and ask her out. One day, Tomoya stumbles upon a hidden side to his crush Waka...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Super Ball Girls
description: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...
