name: Hero x Demon King x Villain
description:
A noble <Hero> who punishes evil while under the protection of gods.
A demon born with tremendous demonic powers, is the last surviving <Demon King>.
And I’m an experienced third-rate <Villiain> that roams around the land.

I want my Villain’s life to be over.
I was going to retire and spend the rest of my life in comfort but the child I picked up by accident turned out to be the demon king and the hero is chasing me to "repay the favor".
My comfortable retirement years are ruined!

The 99 demons that guard the Villain ?
Prepare to die… Yes, may God bless you, now die!
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Indulging a Crazy Beauty
description: After being reincarnated to a year before her death, Bai Man's sole purpose in life is to kill the tyrannical emperor and take his place. To achieve her ultimate goal, she decides to seduce the formidable General Zhou Rong, a cold but beautiful woman. Who would have thought, however, that Zhou Rong is actually a crazy beauty?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Sankakkei no Kowashi-kata
description: Koto, Aya, and Erika were secretly in love with each other. Koto's thoughts reach Aya for a short while, but Aya disappears as if she had been spirited away. Seven years later, however, Aya appears to Koto and Erika as she was then...
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Momogusa-san ga Momogusa Sugiru!!
description:
A romantic comedy about a cute housekeeper who takes care of Momokusa-san in various ways ♡

Shoji Hatakeki, an ordinary high school boy, ends up working part-time as a housekeeper at the house of Momokusa, the most beautiful girl in school!!
Momogusa-san is a perfect girl who is talented and talented in both literary and military arts, but at home she becomes a super lazy "Momogusa-san"!?
For some reason, Hatakeki has grown fond of her, and ends up taking care of Momokusa, who is unsuspectingly pampered at close range...!?
A romantic comedy about flirtatious housework with a lazy girl!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Uso Kareshi Demo Ii Kara Tonikaku Shitai Mashiro-chan
description:
Mashiro Naomoto wants to have a taste of romance and even get to try lewd things, now that she has become a high school student.

However, she has low self-esteem and as a result of lacking confidence in herself, she began to think that it's probably impossible for her. Right at that moment, to her surprise a handsome male classmate named Oosagi-kun confesses to her. Mashiro starts to suspect that his confession must be some sort of punishment game, but her own desire to do lewd stuff wins over it and as a result, she does the opposite and makes a move on him... it's a case of sexual desire winning over suspicion?!

This is a romcom where a high school girl's libido will run wild!!

(Source: Comic-Meteor)

---

* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/nekomattaaaaan/status/1851462156996551019) (Preview) *Posted with the caption: Doushitemo Sukebe Shitai JK no Manga Kakimashita (どうしてもスケベしたいJKの漫画描きました) "I drew a manga about a high school girl who wants to do perverted stuff no matter what"*
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Iinazuke ga Dekita to Omottara, Sono Iinazuke ga Gakkou de Yuumei na "Akuyaku Reijou" Dattan dakedo, Dou Sureba Ii?
description:
"I have a fiancée...?"

One day, Higashi Kujou Hiroyuki, an ordinary high school student, is told a surprising fact by his father about an arranged engagement.

His fiancée is Kiryu Ayane, the "Villainess" at school, known to everyone for her sharp tongue and coldhearted personality. 

A heartwarming love story of two high school students that melts the icy heart of a "Villainess" begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation

name: Umibe no Q
description:
"Why won't this city get destroyed…"   
Chiho, a middle school girl teased for not having a smartphone goes to the seaside to vent her anger, there she meets the strange creature, Q!! Chiho takes a liking to Q, who feeds off human's negative emotions, then decides to secretly bring back and adopt Q, what mysteries does Q hold…?   
Thus begins, in the port city of Numazu, the "invader life" of Chiho and Q.
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: ‏Your Grace, Please Leave Me Alone
description:
“Will you stay with me until morning again…?!”

While I thought I had been reincarnated as the wicked wife, why is he looking at me with such love?

One day, I found myself becoming Ilze, the villainous character in a novel I had read before. Ilze is the wife who tries to disrupt the relationship between the protagonist, Gilbert, and the heroine, and her tragic fate ends with her falling into a brothel.

To avoid this dreadful fate, Ilze decided to peacefully ask Gilbert for a divorce. She thought that if she could change the ending, she might be able to enjoy life in this new world. However, her plans didn’t go as expected, as Gilbert suddenly appears in her room and starts behaving in unpredictable ways.
tags: Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Zombie Sekai de Harem wo Tsukurou!
description: The world is on the brink of collapse due to the zombie threat. Meanwhile, I’m living the most thrilling and tantalizing days of my life! A high school boy who loves shogi and gaming discovers a mysterious power he possesses for the first time in this zombie-infested world.
tags: Thriller, Comedy, Survival, Zombies, Harem, Gore

name: I Tried Asking My Cool Girlfriend for a Favor
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Web Comic

name: Bokura no Kiseki
description: From a young age, Minami Harusumi has had recurring dreams of Veronica, a princess whose kingdom is on the verge of destruction. He believes them to be recollections of his past life, and that he is her reincarnation. Because of this, he is ridiculed by his classmates. One day, when the mockery escalates into bullying, he rediscovers magic—something Veronica had studied and used. Reassured his past life is not merely a fantasy, Minami tries to learn more about his past memories and the reason behind them…
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Psychological, Romance, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Trapped in a Cursed Game as an NPC
description:
I'm going to live a normal life!

...said Shari Azriel, the apothecary of the Dover village.

Then one day, I realised that I possessed an NPC in a video game! I've been locked up here for two years, and I only just noticed.

If I can't get out of the game...
"A, in their 20's, was found starved to death while playing VR games."
This could be what I'm remembered as!

"I have to get out!"

However, it was too late when I came to the realisation that... I can't log out because of an error!

That means, the only way out would be approaching the male lead, "the Lord of Nightmares," and helping his comrades defeat the final villain. So I have no choice but to wait until the game ends...

The difficulty level, the story, the likelihood of failure in such a heinous game, a game that nobody won before...

"The Lord of Nightmares has a strong urge to kill you."

Somehow, I believe that dying by the male lead's hands would be faster.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Kaette Kudasai! Akutsu-san
description: Ooyama-kun normally doesn't get involved with Akutsu-san, a delinquent girl in his class, but for some reason she makes his house her hang-out place! Will she do something horrible to him behind closed doors or will he chase her out? But dealing with Akutsu-san's sexy, cute behavior in such a confined space... he’s sure to get flustered! He wants her to go home, but he also doesn't?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: The Moon on a Rainy Night
description: One rainy night, Saki is rushing to a piano lesson when she crashes into a beautiful, long-haired girl, dropping her sheet music in the process. Saki stutters an apology, but the girl simply hands back her sheet music and leaves without a word. Saki begins her first day of high school the following morning, only to find the stranger from the night before sitting at the desk next to hers. She learns that the girl’s name is Kanon and that she is not quite completely deaf, but very hard of hearing. Though Kanon needs to be close to people to read their lips, she tends to push people away with her icy demeanor. Through one kind gesture, Saki slowly begins breaking down the walls around Kanon, even as she feels something new blossoming within her.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Kakurete Ichaicha Sharehouse!
description:
This is a story about two yuri couples in a shared house, who secretly flirt with one another without the other couple knowing.
- A cool, cute, simple-minded senpai x An energetic puppy kouhai
- A carefree gal senpai x A she-devil kouhai

Enjoy the sweet and affectionate interractions between these two couples!
tags: Romance, Girls' Love

name: I want to NTR the loser heroine
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Senpai, Chotto ii Desu ka?
description: A super-sheltered girl, Shiranui Rei, has a lot of things she doesn’t know! She asks her questions to her senior, who is also a library committee member. But sometimes, her questions are hard to answer…!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kabukicho no Joou Aina, Kyuukyoku no Sekkyaku Skill de Isekai no Ou ni Naru
description:
Aina, a top cabaret club hostess reigning over Kabukichô, suddenly awakens to find herself... transported to another world! Furthermore, she gets entangled in a succession battle full of despicable men...!? Witness the beginning of a legendary tale in another world, as the queen of hostesses, who understands the hearts of men, takes the stage!

name: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon
description:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Nanashi wa Ittai Dare Deshou?
description: "There are three things that worry me in this moment. First, before I noticed, I was here. Second, I have no memory. Third, there is a girl with a knife in front of me. Who on earth am I?"
tags: Romance, Drama, Mystery

name: Henjo ~Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko~
description: Amaguri Senko is a high school girl with a cool personality (as in kuudere) and a big pervert. She openly reads porn, masturbates and isn't perturbed in the slightest at the sight of penises and such. The story centers around Senko's daily life with two male handymen working for her father's company  which she also helps out with, Takamura Ryou and Sugita Kouhei. Takamura ends up being constantly sexually harassed by Senko, partially due to his phimosis dick that caught her interest,  but little did he know, she wasn't joking when she bluntly said "I like you"…
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Nishina-kun no Henshuu Boukenki ~Ranobe wa Danjon de Tsukurareru~
description: A college student, Hiroki Nishina, was introduced by his senpai to a part-time job in the light novel editorial department of a publishing company, but on his first day of work, he was somehow transported to another world(?).
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Etrian Odyssey III: The Deep Sea War Princess
description:
An original story adaptation based on the third installment in the Etrian Odyssey franchise.

Former Princess Celia Zoe Granvania and her Ninja retainer Fuuka hitch a ride on a merchant ship sailing to the magnificent Sea City of Armoroad, where an enormous World Tree of Yggdrasil looms over. 

Wanting to explore the vast labyrinth that it houses underneath, Celia hopes to uncover the reason why everything she once held dear is gone...
tags: Action, Ninja, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Mujaki no Rakuen
description: A 25-year-old guy has been thinking about his wasted school years when suddenly he is back in his adolescence in elementary!!
tags: Time Travel, Loli, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Tsuihou Sareta Maou wa Chikyuu wo Mezasu!
description:
Exiled by her own kind and sealed by a hero, the demon lord is finally revived after an eternity. 

She awakens in a wasteland, with a dark sky full of twinkling stars. The air feels thinner, and her body strangely light… After gathering herself and trying to sense the hero’s presence, it seems the hero is on a distant blue planet in the sky...? 

She doesn’t know exactly where she is, but one thing is certain: the demon lord will fight to defeat the hero!
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Shima-chan Chi no Tsugai Jijou
description: Let's… Let's get married! Shima-chan has two fathers, happy go lucky Akane (α) who likes to do things his own way and tender Aoi (Ω) who is a man of reason. Presently, they’re happy parents who love their daughter Shima-chan, but things were not smooth in the past. From their first encounter to their wedding, this omegaverse memoir tells the story of two young bad boys and how they formed their happy family.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Desharow Merman
description:
Desharow, a Biology student at the Russian Maritime Academy, embarked on a long distance voyage with his mentor, Rhine, where the two caught a mysterious black scaled merman in Iceland. Little did he know that this mysterious black and evil creature had long viewed him as his prey…

Official Translations:
[Official Korean Translation](https://www.peanutoon.com/ko/comic/detail/11357)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Mugen no Skill Getter!
description:
During a Once-in-A-lifetime ceremony, the young boy, Yuri, receives the trash skill “Life transfer”, allowing him to transfer his life force to another person…
Crushed by despair after receiving the skill, Yuri encounters a woman who loses her life right in front of him. Wanting to be the one to decide who he gives his life to, he activates “Life Transfer”, dying on the spot. It had appeared as though the woman’s life was ended rather abruptly, however, the woman turned out to be the daughter of god. As a “thank you” for saving the life of his daughter, god resurrected Yuri, and in addition, gave him the ability to receive double the experience points each month.
With the endless amount of experience he gains, Yuri will leisurely walk the path to the world’s strongest, collecting endless amounts of skills along the way!
***
[Orignal webnovel](https://www.alphapolis.co.jp/novel/587737999/279349914)
tags: Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Way to the Glory
description:
The Goddess of War died with grievances. Now after being reborn as Ye Weiyun she is on her way to start a new and happy life.   
  
What revenge? What scum? Violence should be fought with violence!   
  
I will become a rich woman, and build my own harem.   
  
"In the past I got bullied and never resisted. Now, take a good look at the queen I have become."

Alternative Raws: [Kuaikan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/5975), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc27719)
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Apocalyptic Thief
description: A storm of the universe brought species mutations. The poison, undead, giants and monsters in the city roared as they waved their weapons. As the beasts in the woods fought over territorial rights, humans, too, awakened an ability known as star power… Zhou Zheng, without star power, traversed to this apocalyptic world. Using the abilities of the thief character in the game, he destroys the darkness and fog, seeking supreme power!
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Wuxia, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Subdue My "Villain" Hubby
description: The dainty flower idol Chen Cong Rong unluckily fell into a trap and awoke to a stunning naked man in her bed! Hahaha, is it okay to be with such a beautiful man? Hang on… Are you telling me I've switched places with the toxic, evil, and manipulative side character who won’t even survive 20% of the plot?! No, I'm definitely not ready to die!! Watch as I keep on living my ideal life!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Villainess, Full Color

name: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 4-bu 「 Kizokuin no Toshokan wo Sukuitai!」
description:
As Rozemyne wakes up after almost two years she finds out that the world around her has undergone great change causing her to feel like Urashima Tarō from the Japanese fairy tale. However, there is no time for her to get acclimate to the new world as she is quickly sent off to the Royal Academy to become a true noble.   
She is presented with the difficult task of raising Ehrenfest's ranking while being surrounded by eccentric teachers and children from other duchies however she is motivated by the Royal Academy's giant library. While there are no other Archduke Candidates or members of royalty around Rozemyne commandeers the library!  
Here begins Part 4 of this biblio-fantasy as we enter the Royal Academy!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)
tags: Reincarnation, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Imo Ichirou's Twitter Shorts
description: Short manga posted by Imo Ichirou [@cheesesama24] on Twitter.
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Full Color

name: Kinyoubi no Baby Violet
description: To her coworkers, Mizuno Sumire is hard-working, capable, and cold-blooded, but she is actually hiding a shocking secret. What happens when this secret is suddenly uncovered by someone else?
tags: Romance

name: Host to Maou
description: Suddenly, the Demon King has arrived in Kabukichou from the Demon World. By chance, he enters a host club and encounters Yuusha, Kabukichou's No. 1 host, and challenges him to a contest...?! The strongest and most beautiful battle(?) comedy in history has begun...!!
tags: Demons, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: We Are Not Dating!!
description:
“Why do you keep asking if we’re dating? We’re just holding hands, we’re not dating!!”
It’s a slice-of-life romantic comedy about couples who aren’t really couples!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Muhyo & Roji's Bureau of Supernatural Investigation
description: Are you a victim of unwanted spirit possession? Is there a ghost you need sent up and away…or down to burn for all eternity? If the answer is yes, then you need Muhyo and Roji, experts in magic law. Serving justice to evil spirits is their specialty.
tags: Action, Comedy, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Jitsu wa Ore, Saikyou Deshita?
description:
To be reincarnated into another world with the promise of a "cheat" power is one thing... but to be reborn as a baby, and then left for dead after your royal parents think you're powerless? That's another thing entirely!

Now the newly-born Reinhart — or Hart to his new friends — must find his way through a dangerous world. But luckily, he's got magic that's quite literally off the charts!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10050/episode/322262) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/am-i-actually-the-strongest/)
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ichikoe, Nifuri, Tachiaoi
description:
A brand new girl-meets-girl story, woven together by two people with completely opposite “looks” and “personas”!

Cram school teacher Kataoka Aoi was born with a beautiful face. From an early age, she always garnered the affection of everyone around her, yet the countless dramas it caused made her desire a quiet, modest life instead.

One day, she (reluctantly) accepts the principal’s request to act in their school’s commercial. But it quickly goes viral, resulting in her becoming popular inside and outside of the cram school, drawing attention wherever she goes.

Amidst the attention, the well-known and quirky store clerk, Yamada, approaches her and then…
tags: Girls' Love, Drama

name: Otsubone Reijou to Shiyuka no Kisetsu
description:
Alellia, who has had her engagement broken off, is past the marriageable age, and is known behind her back as the "domineering female supervisor." She spends her days performing her duties as the right-hand woman of Marquess Istilia Wegmund, "the cold-hearted prime minister."

One day, while performing her duties, the Prime Minister asks her to marry him.

Rumor has it that the Prime Minister is in love with another woman. Alellia accepts the engagement, believing that she is being asked to enter into a contractual marriage.

A newly-married life with the cold-hearted prime minister begins...!
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: "Omae ga Kawari ni Shine" to Iwareta Watashi. Imouto no Migawari ni Reikoku na Henkyou Haku no Moto e Totsugi, Shiawase wo Teniireru
description: Both my parents had only loved my sister and I had no place at home.  I lived my life believing that as long as I worked hard, I would someday be loved. One day, my sister received a royal order to marry a frontier count who was rumored to be ruthless. My father, who loved my sister, said to me, "You will marry into the frontier count's territory instead. But on the way, the carriage will be attacked by demons - you will die." As planned, I was attacked by monsters, but the one who rescued me was the ruthless Count of the Frontier, a beautiful man with bright red hair and sharp golden eyes...
tags: Monsters, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Yancha Gal no Anjou-san
description:
Seto is a completely ordinary and somewhat boring high school student. Yet, for whatever reason, his errant gyaru classmate Anjou just won't leave him alone! The serious Seto and energetic Anjou make a contrasting duo, but Anjou doesn't seem to mind, as she has too much fun teasing him. On the other hand, Seto has a hard time dealing with all of her endless antics; little does he realize that his humorous reactions are precisely the reason Anjou enjoys his company.

But… just how much of her flirting is merely an act?

**Official English:** [emaqi - USA & Canada only](https://emaqi.com/manga/anjo-the-mischievous-gal)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: And They Lived Happily Ever After
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Namaiki na Gal Ane wo Wakaraseru Hanashi
description: Every time she opens her mouth, it's nothing but abusive language, and her problematic behavior never stops. The protagonist has had enough and sets a “plan” into motion…??!
tags: Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Gyaru

name: Fei Ren Zai
description: Chinese Mythical Beasts living in modern China.
tags: Monsters, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: One Story of Hunters
description:
In a world where prehispanic cultures developed an steam powered industrial technology, a young redheaded girl — the huntress Metzli — is tracking an interesting bounty. Maybe this commission is bigger than she expects. 

"It's like The Witcher but in Mexico" - a random guy, probably
tags: Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Mao
description:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Medical, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: We are the Main Characters of the Demon World!
description:
Shaoron Teufel is an ambitious demon who has enrolled in the demon school known as Babyls, aiming to become popular and join the Student Council. However, a number of trials await him as soon as he arrives! Being recruited by a shady division, summoning a familiar, participating in a flying test… Will Shaoron be able to stand out even more than the special student, Iruma-kun?   
  
A collaboration between *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun* and a popular Japanese YouTube channel, *We are the Main Characters of ◯◯!*  

- [We are the Main Characters of ◯◯! channel](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCIZzHNbzlIskx3TxGznRyYg)
tags: Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy

name: Nezumi no Hikouki
description:
More ratventures from Tamura.

---
Published in Bikkuri House November 1979.
tags: Oneshot, Animals, Comedy, Full Color

name: The Walpurgis Witch Doctor
description: Kina, a witch doctor living on Mount Walpurgis, hears a prophecy from a titmouse one day that she will be executed within six months and will meet three men who will share her fate. Determined to escape her destiny, she hides in the mountains, but soon finds herself swept away by one man and sent to the imperial palace, where court intrigue awaits her. Can she survive the palace's plots and escape her foretold fate?
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Ijimekaeshi. -Fukushuu no 31-
description:
I was bullied by everyone, so in return I'm going to slaughter them all.  
Taking inspiration from the 31 days of the calendar, the uber popular girl group Calendrier was formed. Behind the bubbly appearance, in the shadows, there is one member that is bullied by the others on a daily basis. "If you can't smile, then neither will the fans."  
She is willing to do anything to regain the smile that was robbed by her group mates.  
  
With 30 members as her opponents, this is the story of the crazy number 31.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Survival, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama

name: A Confident Marriage
description: Workaholic Lee Dain, the dazzling actress and national goddess, never saw herself walking down the aisle. But when her grandfather falls ill, she grants his final wish by marrying her failed one-night-stand, Seo Dojun. Suddenly, her life spins into chaos: handling wacky in-laws, dodging a junior actor's advances, and dealing with her hubby's ex. Armed with her trademark confidence and sass, she's ready to take it all on. But will this rollercoaster marriage ever find its happily ever after?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Demon's Darling Daughter
description:
I'm Mia, a child abused by my family. One day I had a 'dream' and saw the future. A future where I fell for my aunt and uncle's schemes, accidentally murdered my older half-brother, and causing a great war. Things just can't end like this, so I'll change the future with my own hands! 

With the information gathered from the dream, the first thing I have to do is find my biological father!

"Gimme thild thupport!"

(If only I didn't lisp!) In return for selling information about my uncle's schemes and taking all the backlog of child support from my biological father, I was planning on leaving…

But then my eldest brother, who boasts an aloof beauty, said, "I'm thinking of building you an amusement park."

My reckless second eldest brother interrupted and said, "Shall I buy you a tropical island covered with pretty flowers?"

And the most handsome man in the world, my Papa, replied on a whole nother level! "I'll buy you an artifact which calls for mermaids."

No, no, no! All three have terrible liquidity! The cleverest, smartest, most materialistic, devilish answer is… "Please make me a slide made of pure gold!"

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%A7%88%EC%9D%98-%EC%82%AC%EB%9E%91%EC%9D%84-%EB%B0%9B%EB%8A%94-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%9A%94/3114), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60450303)
tags: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: One Piece: Ace’s Story—The Manga
description:
Washed up on the shores of a deserted island at the edge of the East Blue Sea, two men from different backgrounds unite in their shared thirst for adventure. One of them, Portgaz D. Ace, will follow in his infamous father’s footsteps as the fearless captain of a pirate crew. The other, Masked Deuce, becomes the reluctant first member of Ace’s Spade Pirates. Survival is not enough for these seafaring buccaneers, as together they seek treasure, excitement, and a route to the New World.

---
**Note**: Includes two oneshots part of the **One Piece Cover Comic Project** in which other manga authors recreate Eiichiro Oda's original One Piece chapters in their own style.

[One more oneshot](https://mangadex.org/title/7bd37661-c0b1-4166-87c1-7e633adb55ac) was drawn for this project by Komi Naoshi.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Colori Colore Creare
description: The town of Onobori is located on an island and is protected by a noren (a traditional Japanese curtain). Aka is a naive girl living alone with her grandfather who runs a coffee shop in a quaint windmill hut. An encounter with a giant black cat opens the curtain on a story of creating the colors of the future by weaving together the colorful splendor that is scattered throughout daily life!
tags: Sci-Fi, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Taika no Risei
description:
As birth rates decline, in an effort to increase the total population of Japan, the country has implemented... a pet-humanism policy...?
As more and more owners "humanize" their pets--having them become members of society--Japan begins to experience a hike in economic growth, as well as in increase in crimes committed by these "dogmen" and "catmen"...
In the midst of such social unrest, what could possibly be of bigger concern to one cynical high school girl named Ao...?
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Animals, Crime, Philosophical, Gore, Drama

name: Yabai Aidoru no Manager ni Nacchatta Hanashi
description: Reluctantly becoming a manager, I was assigned to my first role managing the super popular idol, "Maron," who has a hidden side... On stage, Maron shines brightly, but in her private life, she's a caring but strange girl who can't give up smoking and requires a lot of attention. As her manager, I have to support her and keep the true face of this "perfect idol" hidden!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, Delinquents, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Zai x 10
description:
When ten criminal acts collide, what's going to happen!?  
  
From the creator of Danshi Koukousei no Nichijou.
tags: Action, Comedy, Crime

name: The Age of Arrogance
description:
The lord of Pervaz, who led the 28-year war to victory, Asha Pervaz. 

For Pervaz, who was devastated by the long war, Asha heads to the imperial family to receive the victory reward promised by the emperor.  However, the only reward that came back was the "right to choose a marriage partner." 

As the best choice, Asha pointed out the Duke of Carlisle Haven, the first prince who had recently been deprived of the title of crown prince.  If she was refused, she intended to receive compensation from the emperor... 

"Marquise Perbaz. I will accept your marriage proposal." 

Contrary to expectations, the Duke of Carlisle accepted Asha's choice.  Promising tremendous support for Pervaz...!

---
After winning a long war, Asha Pervaz is expecting the emperor to compensate her with money. Unlike her expectations though, the emperor asks Asha to choose her own husband from a list of nobles. Asha chooses Duke Carlisle Haven, the emperor’s eldest son and former crown prince. Asha expects him to object and pay an alimony instead, but the duke actually agrees to marry her! He even promises to help Asha rebuild Pervaz. What does the duke really want? And will Asha get what she wants without getting embroiled in the growing royal conspiracy?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Witch Hunter
description:
Witches suddenly declare war against humans, causing two-thirds of the world to fall apart. They summon monsters called "Supporters" and devastate human residences… but why?

Survivors gather people with the power to combat the witches and called them Witch Hunters! Tasha Godspell is one of the strongest nicknamed "The Marksman" along with his "Jack-O-Lantern" looking Supporter. He fights the witches but cannot really bring himself to hate them…

---

**Note:**  
*There are no missing chapters between 93 and 119. There is a difference in chapter numbering between the volume and magazine chapters which caused the gap.*
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

name: Fate/Apocrypha
description:
The setting of Fate/Apocrypha is a parallel world to Fate/stay night where the Greater Grail was removed from Fuyuki after the Third Holy Grail War and disappeared for many years. Around the 2000s, around the same time as the Fifth Holy Grail War would have happened, the group that plundered the Grail, Yggdmillennia, openly declares their secession from the Mage's Association and that they are in possession of the Grail. The Association dispatches fifty magi to retrieve it, but all but one are instantly slaughtered by Lancer of Black. The one remaining manages to activate the reserve system of the Greater Grail, allowing for the summoning of fourteen Servants in total.  
  
This marks the start of the Great Holy Grail War in Trifas, featuring two different factions, the Black Faction, whose members are part of Yggdramillennia, and the Red Faction, whose members were sent by the Mage's Association with the exception of one from the Church. The Grail itself also summons Ruler to act as a mediator of the Holy Grail War.
tags: Thriller, Genderswap, Historical, Monsters, Action, Survival, Zombies, Martial Arts, Crossdressing, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: School Rumble
description:
She's a second-year high school student with a single all-consuming question: Will the boy she likes ever really notice her? He's the school's most notorious juvenile delinquent and he's suddenly come to a shocking realization: He's got a huge crush, and now he must tell her how he feels.  
  
Chapter 232 does not exist, there's no chapters missing.  
  
Special Chapters:  
  
bb1 What's up Doc (February 9, 2010)  
Diamonds on the Inside (November 30, 2016)  
Give it Away (March 15, 2017)  
Hello Again (November 8, 2017)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Behind Your Eyes
description: Not found
tags: Action, Psychological, Survival, Self-Published, Magic, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Wolf-chan wa Sumashitai
description:
The cool, lone-wolf girl and her precious, unrequited crush!

(Source: Ganma!, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Crows Gaiden Housenka - the beginning of HOUSEN
description: Before Narumi Taiga, Bitou Tatsuya, King Joe and Tsukimoto Mitsumasa, there was Terakado Butta. This is the story of how, under his leadership, Housen became the powerhouse that would become Suzuran High School's greatest opponent. Butta was there the year the school was founded, and without him, we would have never had the Housen Hitman we know and fear today.
tags: Action, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents

name: HUNTER x HUNTER (Official Colored)
description: Hunters are a special breed, dedicated to tracking down treasures, magical beasts, and even other men. But such pursuits require a license, and less than one in a hundred thousand can pass the grueling qualification exam. Those who do pass gain access to restricted areas, amazing stores of information, and the right to call themselves Hunters.
tags: Thriller, Official Colored, Action, Psychological, Animals, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Nana to Kaoru: Black Label
description:
This Arashi series begins 8 months in the future of YA, with Nana and Kaoru in the summer of their final year of high school.  
  
This series uses a different support cast & a different location setting than the original serialization, and as such it doesn't really spoil anything from the main series.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Nanako-san Teki na Nichijou RE
description: The adventures of Nanako continues.
tags: Comedy, School Life

name: Girls of the Wild's
description:
Wilds high, it has a history of 42 years as a fighting specialist all girls private highschool meant solely for the elite. The place Wilds-League is held, the most popular event in the country, the only place in the world where teenage girls have brutal fights with their lives.  
This year has been changed into a mixed gender school. The only male student- Song Jae Gu, has been granted a full 3-year scholarship regardless of grades. Being someone who had to spend every moment working or taking care of his two younger brothers, he accepted.  
However, the scholarship was granted with the sole condition he does not leave. But after meeting Queen, the bloody champion of Wild's-League, drenching her in coffee, calling her a "Monster" and getting caught while she was taking a shower… that could prove fatal.  
  
By the artist of Pet Diary and Nineteen Twenty One, Zhena (Kim Hye-jin), and the writer, HUN.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Harem, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Ousama Ranking
description:
The web manga centers around Bojji, a deaf, powerless prince who cannot even wield a children's sword. As the firstborn son, he strives hard and dreams of becoming the world's greatest king. However, people mutter about him behind his back as "a good-for-nothing prince" and "no way he can be king."  
  
Bojji is able to make his first ever friend, "Kage" — a literal shadow on the ground who somehow understands Bojji well. The story follows Bojji's coming-of-age as he meets various people in his life, starting with his fateful encounter with Kage.
tags: Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy

name: Centuria
description: Stowing himself away on a slave ship, Julian sets sail for the great continent with a hundred slaves, all yearning for freedom, until...?! Embark on a groundbreaking journey through this action-packed dark fantasy saga!!
tags: Monsters, Action, Survival, Magic, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Overgeared
description:
Shin Youngwoo (aka Grid), an unlucky man in life and a low-level player in the popular VR game Satisfy, finds a powerful item that earns him a rare legendary class title: Pagma’s Successor. Now a skilled blacksmith, he can forge unique weapons and equip the game’s most powerful gear!

Grid resolves to use his new abilities to achieve fame and fortune, but as his very existence begins to stir up trouble in Satisfy, he realizes that life as a legend may be more than he bargained for….
tags: Award Winning, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Is this Girl for Real!?
description: Late one night when Jun was out on his bike, he came across a drunk, half-naked girl sprawled on the side of the road. She came to be uncomfortably affectionate, but Jun took her to his home to sleep it off with gentlemanly discretion. It turns out that she is Kawase Narumi, his author mother's new assistant. Unfortunately, she has no idea what she's doing in her new job, so Jun's going to have to coach her. He's also going to have to deal with her habit of getting drunk, mostly naked, and cuddly. Jun's life will never be the same!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Samurai Harem: Asu no Yoichi!
description: A boy swordsman, Yoichi and his father stays in mountain training for his descent from the mountain. Yoichi comes to the city to lodge and stay with 4 beautiful sisters. A new more severe "training" regiment awaits him.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, Drama, School Life

name: Surviving the Apocalypse
description:
A boy was locked in a basement and trained his entire life. His deranged father, the one who confined him, declared, 


“The Apocalypse is coming.” 

Now, armed with the training and survival skills he had honed over years of practice, he must survive the impending apocalypse.
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon
description:
Kobayashi lives alone in an apartment, until one day, Tooru appears and they end up living together. Tooru looks down on humans as inferior and foolish, but having been saved by Kobayashi-san, she does everything she can to repay the debt and help her with various things, although not everything goes according to plan.  
A mythical everyday life comedy about a hard working office lady living with a dragon girl.
tags: Loli, Monsters, Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Boku no Tsuma wa Kanjou ga Nai
description: A story about the humble marriage of a corporate slave salaryman and a housework robot.
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Shangri-La Frontier ~Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su~
description:
Second-year high school student Rakuro Hizutome loves nothing more than finding so-called “trash games” and beating the crap out of them. When he decides to change things up by playing a new, “god-tier” VR game known as Shangri-La Frontier (aka. SLF), he does what he does best: min-maxes, skips the prologue, and jumps straight into action! Rakuro may be a seasoned gamer, but a meeting with an old rival will change the fate of every SLF player forever.

Clad in nothing but shorts and a bird mask, Rakuro (player name: Sunraku) launches into the world of SLF. Things are going well at first as he takes down a goblin, a bunny, and even a python. But then Sunraku comes up against a huge, hard-hitting wolf known as Lycagon the Nightslayer. Will Sunraku’s years of “trash game” experience be enough, or is he about to suffer a rude awakening just a few hours into his SLF adventure?
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Zombies, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Ao Haru Ride
description:
Yoshioka Futaba has a few reasons why she wants to ‘reset’ her image and life as a new high-school student. Because she's cute, she was ostracized by her female friends in junior high, and because of a misunderstanding, she couldn't get her feeling across to the one boy she has always liked, Tanaka-kun.

Now in high school, she is determined to be as unladylike as possible so that her friends won't be jealous of her. While living her life this way contentedly, she meets Tanaka-kun again, but he now goes under the name of Mabuchi Kou. He tells her that he felt the same way as she did when they were younger, but now things can never be the same again. Will Futaba be able to continue her love that never even started from three years ago?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kaji Ryuusuke's Agenda
description:
Kaji Ryusuke is a second son of a great politician. However, his father and brother both pass away from a car accident. Now, those who supported Ryusuke's father want Ryusuke to carry on the family business as a politician. At first, Ryusuke tries to get out of the responsibility, but he eventually enters an election to become a politician.  
The manga chronicles Ryusuke's rise in the world of Japanese politics.
tags: Drama, Slice of Life

name: My Crush's Crush
description: This story begins when the protagonist, a boy named Sora Akizuki, confesses his love to Miya Fuwa, a girl he has been in love with for a long time, and is rejected. When Sora learns that Miya likes someone else, he visits the dubious “Trialing Club," of which he is president, and tries to find out if he is the right person for her. The first episode shows the reality of the Trialing Club, whose activities one cannot imagine from its name, and the reason why its president, Suzukaze, created the club.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: William in the Closet
description: Julia Green is a teenager who lives in California alone. When she was feeling her loneliest, she unexpectedly encounters an unknown yet strikingly beautiful boy in her closet. Following that incident, whenever she was going through a rough time, William magically appears in her closet. For example, when she spent her birthday alone, on the night of a dance party she has to go to unaccompanied, or having to spend a sad dawn, he appears. Julia naturally ends up falling for William, who stood by her side in every tough moment... A magical love story that transcends time and space, where they have to fight to stand by each other.
tags: Psychological, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Graymark
description: The ruthless criminal “Great,” exiled to space for his countless crimes, is banished to the past alongside the King of the Universe, “Rohollah,” after their encounter in space. Great attempts to right the numerous wrongs he committed in the past to try and rewrite a better future…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Saikyou de Saisoku no Mugen Level Up ~Sukiru [Keiken-chi 1000-bai] to [Level Free] de Level Jougen no Kase ga Hazureta Ore wa Musou Suru~
description:
Makoto Sakura, sixteen years old, finds himself without a place after dropping out of high school. Suddenly, an otherworldly relic appears before him. On that day, dungeons began to appear all over the world. Humans acquired a level system that completely overturned their previous values. Amidst this revolution, Makoto finds his place inside the dungeons.

Acquiring cheat skills like “Experience Points x1000” and “Level Free,” he becomes a level 10,000 powerhouse. As the strongest “Player,” he embarks on dungeon exploration!
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Akagi: The Genius Who Fell Into Darkness
description: The year is 1958, in the midst of a period of rapid economic growth. One rainy night at a mahjong parlor, Nangou, who was challenging the yakuza to a life-threatening game, was gradually being pushed into a corner. Suddenly, a soaking wet boy walks into the parlor. Nangou senses something extraordinary in him, and asks the boy, who has never even held a mahjong tile before, to play in his place. This is when the legend began. The boy's name was Akagi Shigeru, later known as the "Man of the Divine Realm."
tags: Traditional Games, Psychological, Mafia, Drama

name: Tsuihousha Shokudou e Youkoso! ~Saikyou Party o Tsuihou Sareta Ryourinin (Lv.99) wa, Inaka de Nengan no Boukensha Shokudou o Hirakimasu!~
description: After getting kicked out of the strongest party, the level 99 chef fulfills his dream of opening an adventurer diner in the countryside.
tags: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Kaifuku Jutsushi no Yarinaoshi ~Sokushi Mahou to Skill Copy no Chouetsu Heal~
description:
"Healing magicians cannot fight alone."

Keyaru, who was bound by this common knowledge, was exploited again and again by others. But one day, he noticed what lay beyond healing magic, and was convinced that a healing magician was the strongest class. However, by the time he realized that potential, he was deprived of everything. Thus, he used healing magic on the world itself to go back four years, deciding to redo everything.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Loli, Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Sally the Witch
description:
(from ebookjapan):

"Sally the Witch" is a princess who came from a magical land to make friends with humans. Sally built a house in the human world and started going to school there, but her father, the emperor, did not like it and tried hard to bring her back to the magical land. 

And even a mischievous little cub comes along...? 

This is a landmark work that was adapted into the first TV anime for girls.
tags: Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, Magical Girls, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: I, The Invincible Villain Master With My Apprentices
description: Shen Shi was very disappointed when he transmigrated into the book he wrote and didn't even end up as the protagonist. He also didn’t understand why the invincible hero became a girl? Even worse, why did all his apprentices want to become his wife instead! The protagonist asked him, “Master! Would you like to take me right now? Or do I have to kill off the other apprentices first before you'll have me?”
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Isekai Monster Breeder
description: When sent to a different world, Souta was given the unpopular profession of "Monster Tamer." However, Souta also got the skill "Absolute Domination" which gives him a 100% chance to capture anything!
tags: Genderswap, Loli, Monsters, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Tsugihagi Darake no Saikyou Yuusha
description: Arikawa Ougi, 16 years old, suddenly found himself reincarnated as a zombie?! Embarking on a journey to subjugate the Demon Lord as a zombie hero, but the use of "power" requires a "price"...? A dark fantasy in another world.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Tragedy

name: Fujiyuu Sekai
description: Reo and Meiko were friends in high school. However, now Reo is serving as Meiko's slave, doing whatever Meiko requests. The story uncovers why their relationship turned out this way.
tags: Romance, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Misumi-san Can't See Through
description: A romantic comedy about Yuri Tsuguto, who has clairvoyance but isn’t good at it, and Misumi Mitsuhashi, a girl who likes strange things. One day, when Yuri looks at Misumi’s back, he notices that her jacket is transparent and behind it is the message “If anyone can read this, come to the astronomy clubroom after school.” When he goes to the clubroom and explains his clairvoyance ability, Misumi becomes excited and asks “Why don’t you let me study you?”
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural

name: The Strongest Harem of Nobles
description:
Yuuto is suddenly reincarnated into the other world in a smartphone game and becomes the third son of a noble family. “Skills” exist in that world, and Yuuto was reincarnated with “Noblesse oblige.” When Yuuto, who has become an adult, embraces a woman as a ceremony, “Noblesse oblige” is activated. That is a rare skill, the skill that lets him copy the skills of the woman he embraces!

Yuuto embraces women possessing skills one after another, becoming the strongest with the skills he acquires, and building a harem of women who fall in love with him. Furthermore, it was discovered that “Noblesse oblige” can awaken skills and evolve skills, and the cheating keeps on coming! All the women and skills I want are mine! The strongest cheat harem begins here!
tags: Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Strongest Harem of Nobles
description:
Yuuto is suddenly reincarnated into the other world in a smartphone game and becomes the third son of a noble family. “Skills” exist in that world, and Yuuto was reincarnated with “Noblesse oblige.” When Yuuto, who has become an adult, embraces a woman as a ceremony, “Noblesse oblige” is activated. That is a rare skill, the skill that lets him copy the skills of the woman he embraces!

Yuuto embraces women possessing skills one after another, becoming the strongest with the skills he acquires, and building a harem of women who fall in love with him. Furthermore, it was discovered that “Noblesse oblige” can awaken skills and evolve skills, and the cheating keeps on coming! All the women and skills I want are mine! The strongest cheat harem begins here!
tags: Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Sentai Daishikkaku
description: Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10,000 meters in the sky to invade Earth! The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety! The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest...?
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Superhero, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Giant Ojou-sama
description:
I can't believe my ojou-sama is so huge!  
  
Fujido Oriko is the buxom young head of the Fujido Zaibatsu, a group that has a monopoly on Japan's vending machine industry. And serving at her side is her personal butler, the eccentric Dr. Sebastion.  
  
When a monster suddenly attacks the city, Dr. Sebastion slips his ojou-sama an experimental energy drink his team in R&D has been developing. As a result, she quickly finds herself growing into a giantess, matching the attacking kaiju in size! Will she be able to stop his rampage, or at the very least, keep her dignity intact?  
  
*[The pre-serialization version was the winner of Shounen Jump's Dec 2020 Bronze Rookie Award. The current serialization is on Sunday Web Every.]*
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy

name: Mahou Shoujo ni Akogarete
description:
Hiiragi Utena, a girl who loves Magical Girls, lives her ordinary everyday life wishing to be like them. One day a curious character appears in front of her and offers her the power to make her wishes come true, but…  
Magical Girls vs. The Forces of Evil, the fierce battle begins!  

---
**Links:**

- [Alternative Official Release by Coolmic](https://coolmic.me/titles/1110)
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Superhero, Magical Girls, Sexual Violence, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy

name: Sousou no Frieren
description: The adventure is over but life goes on for an elf mage just beginning to learn what living is all about. Elf mage Frieren and her courageous fellow adventurers have defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the land. With the great struggle over, they all go their separate ways to live a quiet life. But as an elf, Frieren, nearly immortal, will long outlive the rest of her former party. How will she come to terms with the mortality of her friends? How can she find fulfillment in her own life, and can she learn to understand what life means to the humans around her? Frieren begins a new journey to find the answer.
tags: Award Winning, Monsters, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Nyoroko's Live Broadcasting!
description: "Uhm-uhm… N-Nice to meet you! I'm Nyoroko". A girl – not good at talking to people – is invited by her friend Matsuri and and challenged into doing a live broadcast for her first time. A youthful 4-koma comedy!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Buddha
description:
(from ebookjapan):

Some 3,500 years ago, the Arians living on the banks of the Indus River had established a caste system with Brahmins at the top. Shortly before the birth of Siddhartha, the hero of this story, Chapra, who was born a slave, became his adopted son after helping a general of the Kosala kingdom. 

He then hid his origins and sought the position of power, but Chapra, too, could not escape the curse of the status system... 

Here begins the epic story of the Buddha's life and the times in which he lived!

The complete biography of Buddha, as seen by Osamu Tezuka.  


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Kodansha US](https://kodansha.us/series/buddha/)
- Indonesian release by Kepustakaan Populer Gramedia (KPG)



---
- **Won the 21st Bungei Shunju Manga Award in 1975, along with another short work of Tezuka's, Animal Tsurezuregusa (included in Paper Fortress)**
---
**Volumes 287-300 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Reincarnation, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Medical, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Itadakimasu
description:
It's about a young divorcée who works in a bridal salon beneath her ex-husband who wants nothing more than for Naeko to forgive his cheating and she wanting nothing more to do with him. By chance she runs into the young man Ouji, who is in her dreams and they are going to get married?  
  
Spanish version created by Heaven of Temptation (ex FBD), Alura's World and Manganeko
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers

name: Nami no Shijima no Horizont
description: Riku is an elementary school boy who loves football. Yori is a high school girl who is the ex-girlfriend of Riku's brother, and she is full of secrets. This is a story of first love that unfolds with the sea breeze, from a pre-adolescent perspective.
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Summer Trend
description: After her parents divorced, Lu Yang moved into her mother's good friend's house and began living with the friend's daughter, Su Gui. Su Gui is smart and gentle, like the warm sun in winter, kind yet unobtrusive. She illuminates Lu Yang's life and shines into Lu Yang's heart. Lu Yang saw her as a sister, a friend, and a mother figure... Later on, Lu Yang didn't want to be her little sister anymore, she wanted to date her. However, after realizing that her feelings for Su Gui had changed, Lu Yang did not want to ruin their current relationship. She was afraid to lose her identity as "little sister". She had to change her dependence on Su Gui and distance herself. But after reuniting with Su Gui at work, the suppressed feelings bloomed like a rose, tightly binding Lu Yang and Su Gui together. Was it a long-term scheme or destiny?...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Devilish Son in Law
description: Not found
tags: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Fate/Prototype: Sougin no Fragments
description: An adaptation of the novel *Fate/Prototype: Sougin no Fragments*.
tags: Action, Psychological, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Pokémon SPECIAL Sword & Shield
description: Pokemon Sword and Shield Manga Adaptation, featuring Gear Meister Soudo and computer scientist Schildemilia.
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Sports, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: ATTITUDE: 13
description:
Life's an adventure dammit!

A group of high-school kids goofing around instead of studying, teachers struggling to get a grip on their work and personal lives, a man worrying about his looks, and so on.
This surreal comedy is full of odd, interesting, positively absurd people who live in dizzying harmony, dealing with the nonsense of daily life. Beauty in chaos. Sunshine in disaster.
tags: Comedy, Self-Published, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Tensei Shita Ore ga Kawaii Sugirunode, Aisare Kyara wo Mezashite Ganbarimasu
description:
I was hit by a car while protecting a child, and before I knew it, I had been reincarnated in another world as Yumie Granbell, the extraordinarily beautiful daughter of a count.
When I looked in the mirror, the reflection staring back at me was that of an angelic girl, absolutely peerless in beauty!

The Granbell family, into which I was born in this life, is a prestigious magical family with considerable influence.
I thought I had hit the jackpot, reincarnating into a winning life, but it turned out that the family was on the verge of collapse.
And to make things worse, the cause of that collapse was... ME!?

Now, I want to finally obtain the family I've always dreamed of!
With my cuteness, I'll solve any problem and restore the family to its former glory!

(Source: Comic Walker, edited)

___
Alternative raw: [Niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/69838)
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Bloody Sweet
description: When the daughter of a shaman gets "strung up" with a centuries-old vampire, is it love or something more sinister that binds them? From Narae Lee, artist of the hit OEL manga ’Maximum Ride,’ comes the story of two misfits and their quirky, fantastical romp to find one another.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, School Life, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Yuuryou Shoujo Famiryan
description: The meetings and conversations of yankee girls at a family restaurant. Sometimes observed by an unknown salaryman who overhears their conversations.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Tsuihou Sareta Tensei Ouji, "Auto Craft" Skill de Ryouchi o Bakusoku de Kaitakushi Saikyou no Mura o Tsukutte Shimau
description:
Third Prince Theodulf has been banished to a wasteland known as the Land of Death because he didn’t receive a gift from the Goddess. It’s a barren land where the air is so noxious, nothing can grow there. Surviving there is impossible…or so everyone thought! As it turns out, Theodulf is a reincarnated being and has received a power known as “Auto-Craft” from the Goddess. Using this powerful gift to automatically create everything, the prince proceeds to turn the Land of Death into one brimming with life!!

(Source: K Manga)
tags: Reincarnation, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Iroiro Ushinatta TS Ko.
description: Not found
tags: Genderswap, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Sekai no Owari no Encore
description:
The valuable treasure, the “Encore” which was left by the legendary Elline the Brave Hero, has the recording of the end of the world and the reincarnation of the world. The countries and brigades (parties) all over the world are searching for its whereabouts; the age to fight for the Encore. The boy called Ren who wants to become a knight has no talent in wielding swords despite looking exactly like the Elline the Brave Hero, he has been having a lifestyle where people taunts him as the “Fake Brave Hero”. The one that appears in front of him is the legendary Dragon Princess Krische, who had woken up from her seal. She mistakes Ren for Elline, though she gets disappointed since he simply looks like him, but she later finds out a hidden potential in him. And she invites him to the journey to find the Encore together with the Archangel Phia and the Demon-Lord Elise that saved the world before. “Do you want to come with us?”. This is the prelude of wild excitement played by the heroes. The boy known as the fake Brave Hero cross paths with the legend now!  
  


---
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Dr. STONE
description:
Imagine waking to a world where every last human has been mysteriously turned to stone…  

One fateful day, all of humanity was petrified by a blinding flash of light. After several millennia, high schooler Taiju awakens and finds himself lost in a world of statues. However, he's not alone! His science-loving friend Senku's been up and running for a few months and he's got a grand plan in mind—to kickstart civilization with the power of science!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Is it Normal to Raise a Yandere Heroine as a Villainess ?!
description:
Jiang Yang was a lead designer for a popular game company until she fell to her death while gathering inspiration for a new game. After waking up in a world of cultivation, she trained tirelessly to return to her original world, when a thread of fate pulled her into the world of an otome game.

Jiang Yang quickly realizes she is in the world of the very first game she had worked on. The thread of fate connected her to Stardew, the heroine of the game who is being bullied during her first year at the Royal Academy of Magic.

As the game progresses, Jiang Yang remembers the ridiculous story the game follows, and she decides that she can’t stand by while the game makes Stardew suffer. She helps Stardew deal with the flirtatious love interest of the original game, Crown Prince Miller, and even imparts her with some of her cultivation power. To protect Stardew from the game’s story, she even puts herself in danger. However, as Jiang Yang and Stardew’s relationship becomes closer, Jiang Yang realizes that the thread of fate connecting her and Stardew is not as simple as she imagined.
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Warrior Returns
description:
After saving one world, warrior Kim Minsu returns to Earth only to find that he’s lost everything… so he decides to destroy the world he used to call home.

In his rampage, he kills teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. But instead of dying normally, Jeongsu is transported to another world, where he finds that he’s now a warrior himself. After killing the demon king of this alternate world and honing his skills as a warrior, Jeongsu returns to earth, hell-bent on revenge against Minsu.

As the two warriors fight with the fate of their country in the balance, who will emerge victorious?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Superhero, Post-Apocalyptic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Debby the Corsifa wa Makezugirai
description:
*"I know! I'll destroy some humans to kill time!"*   
  
The strongest demon ever makes an unexpected appearance! But she's… a total airhead?! A comedy about a clumsy but emulous demon trying to kill time begins!
tags: Traditional Games, Demons, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Surviving as a Twin Princess (PROMO)
description:
'I wish I'd never been reborn as a twin from the royal family.'

This was the only wish in my heart on the night I was framed and died. To think I would be betrayed by my twin older sister whom I believed was destined to be my better half.

However, why on earth did I return to the past out of nowhere! I'm just an ordinary citizen who never dreamed of defeating my chosen older sister! I really, really didn't, but...

"Oh my, wawawa! Has our cutie pie baby daughter awwived?"
A mother who becomes a fool for her beloved daughter.

"Dada... Did you say it, baby?"
A father who's a crybaby when it comes to me.

"Can... I give you a hug, too?"
My mom's first knight, who was called both a mad dog and a loyal dog.

"Bicbic! Beepp!"
A bird which almost lost its life and was saved.

"Only your highness is the owner of my heart now."
The top nobleman of the kingdom whom my 7 year-old sister had a crush on.

"Become the first holy king to manage the wizard."
The crazy wizard called God's mistake.

"I promise I will choose you forever."
Even the prince of an enemy country...

Everyone is on my side.

At this point, isn't it worth giving it a try?

This is the story of a twin sister who has to defeat her older twin against all odds. It is a child care story and the survival of a twin princess!
tags: Oneshot, Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Daily Life
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Tragedy

name: Tonari no Kurokawa-san
description:
_The secret between me and her is trivial yet important._

Hajime Takahashi, enrolled in Shuubi High School solely because it's the sacred place of his favorite manga. Everywhere in the school are locations that appeared in the manga, and he's super excited! Amidst this excitement, Takahashi meets a beautiful girl, Yayoi Kurokawa, who looks just like the heroine from his favorite work, and they come to share a certain secret.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Lookism
description:
Park Hyung-Seok is an unattractive loner who wakes up in a different body. Now tall, handsome, and cooler than ever in his new form, Hyung-Seok aims to achieve everything he couldn't before.

How far will he go to keep his body... and his secrets?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Shut Up, Evil Dragon! I Don't Want to Raise a Child With You Anymore
description:
After being defeated and captured, the dragon slayer Leon became a captive of the Silver Dragon Queen. With the awareness of death, he used forbidden magic to curse the queen, but unexpectedly, the queen lost control. 

He thought that this would make the queen live with shame for the rest of her life, and it would be worthy of the dragon slayer's mission. 

But two years later, when Leon opened his eyes, next to him was a little dragon girl with a tail...
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Les anecdotes de la SD
description: Not found
tags: Slice of Life

name: Is My Second Life a Healing Life?
description: Eugene Felivia, the beloved youngest son of the noble Felivia family, known for its great warriors, gains a second life thanks to the grace of 'Felin, the Wizard of Creation.' Eugene dreams of becoming a wizard like Felin, who saved him, and using his powers to make the world a better place. However, the dark and harsh realities and his fate still refuse to let him go...
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Long Strip, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Masochist Gal Himekawa-san
description:
