name: Honey Lemon Soda
description:
Fifteen-year old Ishimori Uka is a very shy girl that can't stand being in front of someone. One day she meets a boy on the streets who's just as refreshing as lemon soda. He helped her when she was bullied and that boy made her wanting to change so she can properly express herself.

---
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Ribon](http://ribon.shueisha.co.jp/rensai/honeylemon/)
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life

name: Getsuyoubi no Tawawa  (Twitter Webcomic)
description:
A salary man is quite depressed, especially on Mondays. At his lowest point a well-endowed High-School girl calling herself Ai-chan stumbles breast-first into his face. The concussion she gave him served as the start of their relationship.  
  
Features additional single-page images of other side-stories, that were posted on the Authors Twitter every Monday before.
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Doujinshi, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: These Two Will Be Married In 100 Days
description: A Twitter comic by Hata Kenjiro about a couple that will be married in 100 days.
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Full Color

name: Blue Archive - JAZZ's Twitter Content (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Doujinshi

name: Kaiju No. 8
description:
A man working a job far removed from his childhood dreams gets wrapped up in an unexpected situation…! Becoming a monster, he aims once again to fulfill his lifelong dream…!

---
Kafka hopes to one day keep his pact with his childhood friend Mina to join the Japan Defense Force and fight by her side. But while she’s out neutralizing kaiju as Third Division captain, Kafka is stuck cleaning up the aftermath of her battles. When a sudden rule change makes Kafka eligible for the Defense Force, he decides to try out for the squad once more. There’s just one problem. He’s made the Defense Force’s neutralization list under the code name Kaiju No. 8.

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [Viz](https://www.viz.com/kaiju-no-8)
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Military, Drama, Horror, Aliens, Supernatural

name: That Time I Was Blackmailed By the Class's Green Tea Bitch
description:
Green Tea Bitch (n.): A woman who pretends to be pure and innocent but is in fact manipulative and calculating.

When school ends, a good honor student is threatened by the class's green tea bitch.
"I never thought a wide-eyed goody-two-shoes like you would get up to something like that."
"If you don't want me to expose your shameful secret..."

A cute romance that stems from a misunderstanding begins in *That Time I Was Blackmailed By the Class's Green Tea Bitch*!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: My Food Seems to Be Very Cute
description: A vampire who has been sleeping for nearly two hundred years, Maria is awakened by a passing werewolf girl by a chance, and the moment the coffin is opened, the curse falls on the werewolf girl. The two girls set foot on the journey to the city
tags: Monsters, Long Strip, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Kippo
description: An irreplaceable "spot…" and the greatest friends in the world! Just when it seems like peaceful everyday life will continue forever, disaster strikes, and that's when these men move to protect what matters most to them! A compilation of stories about the legendary boys of Hiroshima!
tags: Action, Comedy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Kara no Kyoukai: The Garden of Sinners
description:
A very popular early work from Kinoko Nasu from the Tsukihime & Fate fame, the Kara no Kyoukai universe has meet great success as an animated film adaptation, novels and radio dramas.  
  
Kara no Kyoukai depicts a world where the true dark nature of the human being is being reviewed and exposed by shocking and ruthless events, and in the center of it all we have Ryougi Shiki, the true heir to the long lived, wealthy and mysterious Ryougi clan and Kokuto Mikiya, a would be normal high school student if it wouldn't be for his amazing deductive & investigative progress.  
  
The moment Kokuto and Shiki meet is the moment that the wheel of fate started to turn, however is this fate moving forward naturally on it's own accord, or is it all being orchestrated from behind the scenes by an enigmatic persona? Only time will tell.
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Mythic Item Obtained
description:
In a world where technology and magic are almost indistinguishable from one another, monsters and creatures of myth and legend reign terror upon mankind. In humanity’s darkest moment, individuals with special god-like powers emerge to save the day. They are — the Awakened.

Meet Jaehyeon, a feeble Awakened human Raider, who struggles to make ends meet until one day a series of confounding events allow him to claim a powerful item that will change the course of history forever…
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: I, Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits, Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples
description: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?
tags: Genderswap, Loli, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Soyokaze Takeoff
description: Not found
tags: 4-Koma

name: Ouritsu Mahou Gakuen no Saikasei ~Hinkongai Agari no Saikyou Mahoushi, Kizoku Darake no Gakuen de Musou Suru~
description: "Magic." A sacred mystery usable only by those chosen. One day, a child from the slums named Arus finds he has the power to use magic. A sorcerer by the name of Genos Willzard learns of his talent and raises him, turning him into the greatest of assassins. One day, Genos gives him an order: To enroll at the Magic Academy...?!
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Goddess of Victory: Nikke - Sweet Encount
description:
In this manga, NIKKE and their friends live peacefully. A loose comedy in which the main character N102 works as a maid at a maid café called "Maid For You", where Cocoa and Soda work too!

The first official manga based on the popular mobile game *Goddess of Victory: NIKKE* with over 25 million downloads worldwide!
tags: Sci-Fi, Loli, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Isekai Ojisan
description: Having survived an isekai for 17 years, 34 year old Ojisan (uncle) returns to modern day Japan. Takafumi, Ojisan's nephew, now gets to witness what throwing a diehard Sega fan into an isekai for 17 years does to various things and people, both past and present.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: The Spark in Your Eyes
description:
The witch Hildegar, who received the blessing of the Sun Goddess Karia, is known far and wide for her fearsome reputation.  
The Northerner Elkin, who lost his homeland, chases after the witch towards a nameless castle…
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Everything but your life
description: A transfer student desperately seeking someone to relate to pursues the attention of a mysterious boy covered in bandages, thinking he might finally be able to build a friendship for the first time since a tragic accident.
tags: Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Web Comic

name: Kubera
description:
Gods with everlasting lives. Sura who possess unrivaled power. And humans, caught helplessly in-between.  
When Kubera's peaceful village meets its fiery end, a mysterious magician named Asha comes to her rescue. Together they begin a journey in search of answers and revenge. Meanwhile across the realms, a web of entwined fates is growing tighter. One by one the other players of the game will emerge, each with their own agenda to pursue.  
At the center of this maelstrom stands Kubera, the girl with a god's name. Will this sixteen-year-old be the salvation of the world or its destruction?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Beni Tsubaki
description:
Kisshouin Tsubaki, also known as the Crimson Camellia, wants to satisfy her intellectual (and physical) curiosity by having a hands-on experience with every Yokai she can find. 
Let's follow this attractive occult reporter in her travels, accompanied by her trusted camera man Yokomizo-kun!
tags: Monsters, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Tokko
description: Shindou just became a new investigator for Tokki: The Special Mobile Investigation Force. On the day of his graduation, he finally saw the half-naked girl that he had always saw in his dream in real life and finds out that she's part of Tokko: The Special Public Safety Task Force. Shindou ends up joining Tokko to avenge his parents' deaths, whose bodies were ripped into pieces…
tags: Action, Horror, Supernatural

name: Kono Ai wo Owarasete kurenai ka
description: Yuzu is Hayami Madoka's ardent fan. Having no friends or family that care for her, Madoka is her only solace. Being that Sachiko is Madoka's best friend, she is Yuzu's most hated existence. To vent, she opens a secret account where she posts malicious comments about Sachiko. When she discovers this, she instead attempts to befriend Yuzu and offers her a chance to talk to Madoka. However, an accident occurs and they end up switching bodies with Sachiko being left in coma.
tags: Psychological, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Mujaki no Rakuen Parallel
description: As a direct continuation of Mujaki no Rakuen, we see Shouta in even more troublesome and various situations.
tags: Time Travel, Loli, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Joou no Hana
description:
Long ago, there existed a land divided into four countries: Sou, Kou, Do, and Ah. The King of Ah took on a wife from Kou and soon thereafter one from Do, creating a shaky alliance between the three nations. When the Second Queen gave birth to a son, the King cast aside the sickly First Queen and her daughter Aki into the depths of the Palace. But as Fate would have it, Princess Aki encounters a slave named Hakusei, who has peculiar golden hair and sky blue eyes. He promises his life to her and helps her train in the Six Arts under the guidance of the enigmatic merchant Seitetsu. However, when Aki outshines the Prince during a hunt in an attempt to gain her father's acknowledgement, she inadvertently sparks a war by besmirching Do's honor and drives the Second Queen to poison her mother. With nothing left but her faithful Hakusei, Aki is banished to the small country of Kou with a vow to return to Ah one day for revenge. But in the face of the mighty allied nations of Do and Ah, will the two survive long enough to carry out Aki’s vow?  
  
*Winner of the 60th Shogakukan Manga Awards for Best Shoujo.*
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Tragedy

name: The Tsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsundere Girl Getting Less and Less Tsun Day by Day
description: The tsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsuntsundere girl getting less and less tsun day by day.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Sora wo Matotte
description:
Haro Ogawa, a high school student, is also a self-taught oil painter who is trying to paint the ultimate nude. 
After an unexpected encounter with an elusive "witch", he sets his sights on applying to art school... 
The mystery that resides in the human body, the ultimate "beauty", will be painted on canvas! 
A skin-colored coming-of-age drama!
tags: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Ashi-Girl
description:
From the author of Gokusen and Koudaike no Hitobito comes the story of Yui Hayakawa:
an ordinary, uninspired high school girl who's only good at one thing - running! 
But because of her genius younger brother Takeru and his latest experiment, a time machine, 
she accidentally gets sent back to the Sengoku Era missing her beloved dinner steak! 
Will young Yui finally find that 'something' where her entire potential was hiding? 
And will she ever be able to eat that delicious steak her mother made for her?
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life

name: Not found
description: Nagomu Irino returns to his Kyoto home for the first time in ten years when his father is hospitalized. Nagomu is eager to take over Ryokushou, the family's Japanese sweet shop, but he's instead asked to be a father figure to Itsuka Yukihira, the girl everyone calls the successor.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: House Mayton's Youngest
description:
As the author of "Swordmaster Sade," Cha Sungmin had no idea how dangerous his plot-hole-riddled novel could be until he's reborn as Rasen Mayton, a spoiled side character destined to die at 17. As if being stuck in the body of a rude scumbag despised by everyone wasn't enough, Sungmin also discovers that he was reborn at a point before his story began. 

With almost no knowledge about the current timeline, will Sungmin be able to survive in this unwritten world as House Mayton's youngest?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: A Sleepless Maid's Night
description:
After the ruin of an aristocratic family in England, Eva Macy has been living a difficult life as a maid at an acquaintance’s house, where she happens to meet her ex-fiancé Prince Edward.

Despite being a strong and cold-hearted person, he is affectionate towards her. After he leaves, Eva realizes that he’s her first love. However, she decides to give up on her current feelings, believing it to be in her best interest to do so.

After overcoming such a difficult time, Eva's feelings for Edward calmed down, but one day, Edward suddenly appeared before her as if to stir up Eva’s heart again.

Eva becomes a chambermaid for her ex-fiancé Edward, where he constantly tries to seduce Eva.

The relationship she thought had ended a long time ago continues again in his chambers...
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Touhou - Komachi & Eiki 4 Lovey-Dovey Manga (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, Doujinshi

name: Yajin Tensei: Karate Survivor in Another World
description:
When 34-year-old Nozaki Hitoshi is hit by a truck, he is sent to a fantasy world by a dismissive god and dropped into a harsh wilderness without even the clothes on his back. His only salvation is a newly granted karate skill and his general survival instincts. Luckily, Hitoshi is up for the challenge–he’ll weave clothes out of tree bark, test fruit for poison, and crawl through the mud to test his kicks and punches against goblins and other creatures. No matter how much he levels up in this world, he still longs to find other humans to share his solitude. An engrossing fantasy that pits karate technique against swords and sorcery in another world!

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
- [Web Novel Raw](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5771ei/)  
- [Alternate Raw: NicoNico](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/41841)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kurai Anoko to Shitai koto
description: That gloomy girl is so beautiful! Let's aim for it!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: High School Boy
description:
Hong Il-tak, the only red spot at Daemun Namgo. Despite his name and nickname, he's a boy, and his dwarfism and peculiar appearance have led to him being looked down upon by everyone from the nerds to the elders, and he's at the bottom of the school hierarchy. 

In the past, until his sophomore year, Iltak had been a famous member of the Iljin, but a problem of his own brought him to the bottom of the food chain... 

"His secondary sexuality. If only he'd come to me...!" 

After enduring daily teasing and bullying because his body stopped growing like his peers, Hong Il-taek thought of a way to move up in the ranks... 

"If I can befriend this guy, who's in the second grade at Dae-moon Boys' High School, I'll be able to move up again!" 

But for some reason, Lee Hyun-woo tries to keep his distance from Hong Il-taek... Can Hong Il-taek find his former glory again?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Boys' Love, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Zenbu Kimi no Sei - Extras / After Story
description: Extras and After Story of [Zenbu Kimi no Sei](https://mangadex.org/title/82476383-e6a9-41a7-b98c-87cc8be9efbb/zenbu-kimi-no-sei), mainly centred around Ryou and Nagisa. (the Official Raws are free to view)
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, School Life

name: Cacomistle's Anthology
description: An unofficial compilation of oneshots / 4-komas by Cacomistle (カコミスル) in their twitter profile.
tags: Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Comedy, Mecha, Anthology, Adventure, Magic, 4-Koma, School Life, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural

name: PAINU BLUE
description: [Winner of the 2024 Summer Afternoon Kishi Prize] The story of Jui, the son of a soldier, and Maaya, a teenager from Painu Island. Different backgrounds have torn apart their friendship, but an attack by a demon named Moon that lurks on the island brings them together again!?
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi

name: Mary-san
description:
Mary-san who calls you on the phone, telling you she's nearby...nothing but a prank call, right? Witness the cute and charming life she lives!

This is based on the Japanese urban legend Mary-san.  If it makes no sense at all to you, see https://www.kowabana.net/2018/06/09/mary-san/ and it will be a lot more comprehensible, while still being cute.
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Fire Punch
description:
In the not-too-distant past, the Ice Witch blanketed the world in snow, starvation and madness, leading the inhabitants to seek their salvation in fire. With that, an unusual destiny unfolds for two young orphans, Agni and Luna, blessed with the ability to regenerate. But will this ability prove to be more of a curse than a blessing?

Nominee for the 2017 Manga Taisho Award.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Lunatic Terrapop
description: Seventeen year old Satsuki Moriyama is enjoying her life to the fullest with the boyfriend of her dreams! After 3 months of dating, they finally hold hands and Satsuki is over the moon! Sasaki-kun is the coolest and her reason for living, yet...
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Aliens

name: Hell’s Paradise: Jigokuraku
description:
Gabimaru the Empty, a former ninja assassin feared as a heartless husk of a man, spends his days on death row wondering when an executioner skilled enough to so much as harm him will arrive, as he thinks nothing of seeing an end to his meaningless existence… Or so he thought. 
Then the lady executioner, Asaemon the Beheader, rekindles his hope with an astounding proposition. 
If he ever wishes to see his beloved wife again, he must embark under the auspices of the shogunate on a perilous voyage to the mysterious mystic island said to house the elixir of immortality. 
Should he be the one among many rival death-row fiends and scoundrels to find the elixir, he'll earn a full exoneration, and, more importantly, a chance at an ordinary married life with the light of his life: the woman who made the world seem not so ugly. 
What awaits them is a journey like no other!
tags: Historical, Action, Romance, Adventure, Gore, Drama

name: Rugby Rumble
description: The Japan under-16 rugby team—nicknamed the Perfect Squad—shattered the power balance of high school rugby after sweeping the world cup. With so many former Perfect Squad members in their home prefecture, Rikuzen High’s rugby team has given up all hope of victory and now takes a laid-back approach to training. Enter transfer student and rugby novice Kinzan Yamada. He may be new, but he’s ready for the world of rugby. The question is whether they’re ready for him...
tags: Sports

name: Sachiroku 〜Sachi’s Book of Revelation〜
description: ‘Humanity’s Judgment’ — a process by which an angel and a demon meticulously pass judgment upon a human, and the final score determines the fate of mankind. But this time, the chosen subject is the incredibly mischievous 6-year-old elementary school student, Sachi Ueno?! Just how will the unconventional living arrangement of an angel, a demon, and a human shape the future of humanity?
tags: Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Taro Miyao Becomes A Cat Parent?!
description: Taro Miyao is a renowned novelist and ardent admirer of Niccolò Machiavelli. Use whatever means necessary to achieve a goal…Taro has modeled his life after his beloved Renaissance philosopher. One day, he is struck by an epiphany: having a cat around would cure his stiff shoulders! Lo and behold, Taro becomes a proud cat owner but it’s not all kittens and rainbows… A warm and fluffy comedy about living with a cat by Sho Yamazaki, the creator of “Excuse Me Dentist, It’s Touching Me!”
tags: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Smother Me
description: In the oppressive city of Detroit, Akio is sold by his dad and becomes an assassin known as Snake. Day after day, he simply follows orders. But suddenly, he meets a blind girl and finds new meaning in life…!
tags: Thriller, Crime, Drama

name: Ochikobore Shiro Madoushi Cecil wa Taishougai no Hazu deshita
description: During a party, Cecil, a clumsy white mage, spills on Oswald, the popular leader of the first squadron of holy knights, a homemade antidote. The reason is that he emitted a strong evil aura. An upset Oswald kidnaps her an takes her to his mansion, and she panics: "My chastity is in danger! Cecil grows impatient, but he rebuffs her, telling her: "You are not to my liking". It seems that Oswald is behind Cecil's potion, which was the first to take effect on a curse he had received in the past. Oswald formally asks Cecil to treat him, and she decides to take the opportunity to make a name for herself and accepts the request....
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Maid in Japan
description: In order to be bought by a rich family, Narumi Inoue, hiding the truth that he is a man, goes to a girls' school. As a trainee, Narumi was sent to serve a girl from a rich family who hates maids (only weekends). Keeping the 'heart of treating/serving people,' Japanese maid, Maid in Japan, Narumi's battle will start? If it is found out that Narumi is a man, he will be castrated.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Harem, School Life

name: Mizu Zokusei no Mahoutsukai
description:
Upon being reincarnated into a fantasy world, Ryo wants to live out his days in peace with his newfound water magic. He can only conjure a cupful at a time, but it’s enough to eke out a comfortable existence — or so he thought.

The powers that be cast him into the wild outlands with nothing more than a humble shack, a single knife, some food... and abilities that are yet beyond his comprehension. The area is overrun by monsters and there’s nary another human in sight. Ryo must now figure out how to survive above all else, but he’s ready to take bulls, boars, and a whole host of other monsters by the horns if it means seizing the life he wants for himself.

Each new victory brings a new challenge, but what could a fateful encounter with a headless horseman, a dragon, and a castaway swordsman have in common? They’re the first steps on a grand journey that will take Ryo beyond the borders of all he knows to become the greatest water magician the world has ever seen — one adventure at a time.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: To Aru Kagaku no Railgun
description:
Welcome to a world where mysticism and science collide, and supernatural powers are derived from either science or religion. At the heart of this world is Academy City, an advanced metropolis whose population is comprised mostly of students The majority of students are enrolled in the city's "Power Curriculum Program," where they must learn to master their latent psychic powers. Out of several million students, only seven are deemed powerful enough to have Level 5 status.

Meet Mikoto Misaka, the third most powerful Level 5 ESPer in Academy City. Together with her best friends Kuroko Shirai and the other members of Judgment, a student-run law enforcement agency, Mikoto delves deep into the dark heart of the scientific sprawl she calls home, and uncovers secrets she wishes she hadn't!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Gore, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Ahiru no Sora
description: He’s short, weak, and has just transfered to a new school. Kurumatani Sora is the main character in this story who loves basketball. He has been shooting hoops ever since he was little and has been trying to grow tall just like his mother, who “used” to be a basketball player. What happened to her and what Sora will do at the new school is all up to you to find out!
tags: Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Blue Archive! (Japan)
description:
Blue Archive JP's official 4-Koma, featuring snippets of the daily occurrences in Kivotos!

The series is titled (Japan) to differentiate it from the Global 4-Koma.

---

**Links:**  
- [Blue Archive JP's Twitter](https://twitter.com/Blue_ArchiveJP)
- [Global Server's 4-Koma](https://mangadex.org/title/6348a562-067b-45cb-ab2b-c6f33f0e7ead/blue-archive-global)
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Daily Life of Sa-chan, a Drugstore Clerk
description: A series between the expressionless drugstore clerk, Sa-chan, and her boisterous childhood friend who's head over heels over Sa-chan but hesitant in confessing his love for her. Join them in their romcom-packed everyday life working at a drugstore.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Midnight
description:
Midnight is the story of a taxi driver named Shinya Mito (whose name is literally Japanese for "mid" and "night") and his various passengers, each of whom he helps in various ways. Shinya drives a taxi as a way to earn money for the treatment of a young woman named Mari, whose brain was injured sometime earlier as the result of an accident Shinya was responsible for causing. The taxi Shinya drives is equipped with a fifth wheel which makes the car more maneuverable under any kind of road conditions.

---
**Volumes 354-359 of the Osamu Tezuka Complete Works**
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Adventure, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Yagi-san Yuubin
description: University student Hirose Kiyotaka finds a love letter tucked into the pages of a borrowed book. While attempting to return the letter, he encounters the charismatic Hanashiro Seiji and quickly becomes involved with him. As their tentative relationship develops, however, he finds himself wondering how serious Hanashiro's feelings for him really are. Meanwhile, the letter falls into the hands of Hanashiro's colleague Sawa Jinichiro, who entraps its writer, Arihara Mineo. Sawa's actions are seemingly ruthless, but his true motives regarding Arihara are far from clear.
tags: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Gokusotsu Kraken
description: Controlling the Queendom of Sebek's female prison with the Power of the Kraken!
tags: Monsters, Action, Crime, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Kekkon shiyou. Rikon zentei de.
description:
After turning 30 as a NEET, Kyousuke was kicked out of his parents' house. 
That's when Rui, his closest friend, proposes a solution: to get married, then divorce!


A guy and girl who've been 'just friends' for around a decade decide to enter a pretend marriage.
He's a romantic and she's just a pragmatic girl.  A pair unsuited for marriage.
What will they discover after 100 days together?
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Heimin no Watashi desu ga Koushaku Reijou-sama o Taburakashite Ikiteimasu
description:
Lilah, a commoner, is cast out of the only home she's ever known, finding herself lost in the depths of a forest, on the brink of death. Fate, however, has other plans, as she miraculously reunites with Eva, a young lady of nobility she once played with as a child, narrowly escaping a dire end. Moreover, this encounter leads Lilah to an unexpected role as Eva's personal bodyguard. Now, she faces the ultimate challenge: can a commoner like her rise above and excel in the world of the nobility?

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Amazon Link (Individual Chapters)](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0CBGWG5K2)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, School Life, Fantasy

name: Astro King - Shoukan Yuusha dakedo Kakyuu Nintei sareta node Maid Harem o Tsukurimasu!
description: After being transported to another world with all of his classmates, Yoshitsune was ordered to conquer the dungeon as a hero. While his peers were all reeled in and tamed by the offer of unlimited sex with the castle maids, Yoshitsune, a low-rank hero, devoted his cheat skills to getting more and more maid wives...
tags: Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Adaptation

name: Isekai Drug ~Yakugaku Chishiki de Monster Musume-tachi wo Toriko ni shite Nariagaru~
description:
One day, Dr. Shiro, a harmless and kind-hearted doctor of agriculture, is transported to another world along with his students and laboratory. It's a hopeless world where humans are treated as slaves and ruled by monster girls! In this grim world, he'll use his knowledge of pharmacology to subvert and control the cruel monster girls!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63813)
tags: Action, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Not found
description:
The Fierce Demons pride themselves as being the reigning delinquent gang of Mikado High School, but their name lets on much more, as they are being influenced by strange occult forces.
Dan Hayato, a mysterious transfer student with an unknown past, arrives at the school with a hidden agenda. With his power to separate his soul from his body, what does he know about the motives of the Fierce Demons and what events will lead to the destruction of the school?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Magic, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Medusa Dorei o Katta
description: I’m not sure why I decided to buy a medusa in the slave market, but since then she insists a lot that I remove the blindfold from her eyes. Is she trying to petrify me? Or does she really want to see me with her own eyes?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Captain Corinth: The Galactic Navy Officer Becomes an Adventurer
description:
In order to protect the planet Ares from invasion by the Bugs, Alan Corinth has set his sights on nothing less than ruling the entire continent. The Kingdom of Belta, which borders the Great Demon Forest, is the ideal spot to start putting his plan in motion, so he and his party set off for the gathering place of the finest adventurers the kingdom has to offer: the citadel of Gantz.

Will Alan be able to keep the hostile aliens from overrunning this fantasy planet?  The sci-fi medieval fantasy story begins!
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Adaptation

name: Nanjou-san wa Boku ni Dakaretai
description: From their worst encounter comes a story about their ultimate happiness! This romantic comedy explores the ups and downs of a serious relationship.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Gyaru

name: Sayonara demo Aishiteru
description:
From Midnight Scans:  
  
Story 1: Sayonara Demo Aishiteru - Yutaka's version  
Yutaka has decided to confess to Mariya, the girl who saved him during the entrance examination. Being an average girl, Mariya was bewildered by the confession of the charming Yutaka. Even though there are strains in their relationship, the distance between the two slowly shortens. However, Mariya has suddenly asked for a breakup!  
  
Story 2: Sayonara Demo Aishiteru - Mariya's version  
  
Story 3: 1% No Kiseki  
Nana falls for her rumored cold teacher.  
  
Story 4: Sumetaku, Amaku, Koi O Shite  
Rinka has always been perceived as a cold girl and is popular with the freshman boys, until that is they found out about her true personality. There is yet another freshman that proclaims that he fallen in love with her at first sight, but she gave him a blunt reply as she have given many others. However it seems that he has not been shaken by her reply, how will Rinka react?
tags: Romance, School Life

name: Sound of a Racing Heart
description:
On the first snowfall of that year, Dan Xianchun, who had been roped in to help as a photographer for a cosplay shoot, unexpectedly captures a picture of a girl in a long, green dress through her lens. The girl’s gaze—staring at her—full of complexity and affection, seems to be locked on her, leaving Dan Xianchun as though her heart had been gently pricked.
Many years later, when she crosses paths again with the girl who once captivated her so, what kind of sparks will fly between them?
tags: Long Strip, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Idol Shikkaku
description:
Keita, a boring university student, is a gachikoi (fan who's seriously in love) otaku of Mimika, the center of the idol group Tetra. Even though he's aware that it's a love that will never happen, he continues to push on with giving her his emotional support. 

On the other hand, as her group's popularity continues to rise, Mimika bears anxiety over the uncertainty of the future even while she's happy with the fervently cheering Keita's affection. 

One day, Mimika falls into despair after her mother gets into a traffic accident, and with the help of social media, she heads towards Keita's part-time workplace...
tags: Romance, Drama, Adaptation, Music

name: Worst Gaiden Mr. Zetton
description: After years of studying, Hanazawa Saburou, AKA Suzuran's legendary Zetton, has finally become a high school teacher. But on his first day at work, the principal tells him he was actually hired not to teach, but to make the students of his homeroom class drop out of school?!
tags: Action, Comedy, Mafia, School Life, Delinquents

name: Harem Yori Heion o! Isekai de Shizuka ni NEET Hime sasete Kure
description:
An elite salaryman (aspiring NEET), gets reincarnated and genderswapped into a princess living an idle life of masturbation...!?

Kishibe is an elite office worker who dreams of becoming a NEET who has attained FIRE (Financial Independence, Retire Early). The fulfillment of his dream is now right before his very eyes!! ...or was, when he died saving a girl from getting hit by a car. A self-proclaimed god felt pity for such a man, so she reincarnated Kishibe into another world where he could live as a NEET. The next thing he knew, he had become Iris, the princess of a superpower kingdom!!

Blessed with incredible beauty and not having the need to work even once, Kishibe won the jackpot with a life full of indolence, freedom and masturbation!! ...is what he believed, but there was a catch. Princess Iris seemed like she possessed a trait that made others love her at the highest level (a skill?), and various girls just keep coming on to her (who was formerly a man)...!?

This is another world where one can experience endless love and eat meals that one didn't work for (does it taste good?), it's an envy-inducing, genderswap isekai story with a super NEET harem!

(Source: Nico Nico Seiga)
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Loli, Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Ironna Onnano-ko to Kiss wo shiteitara, Yuri-Kiss ni Mezamete shimaimashita…
description:
One day, Higashi Kaede, a first-year high school student who loves helping people, witnesses something falling from the sky. When she went nearby, there was a "girl''!?

"You are my partner!''

Then, she asked me to do something...? There's friendship, effort, and sometimes battle!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Harem, School Life, Supernatural

name: Ironna Onnano-ko to Kiss wo shiteitara, Yuri-Kiss ni Mezamete shimaimashita…
description:
One day, Higashi Kaede, a first-year high school student who loves helping people, witnesses something falling from the sky. When she went nearby, there was a "girl''!?

"You are my partner!''

Then, she asked me to do something...? There's friendship, effort, and sometimes battle!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Harem, School Life, Supernatural

name: Subete no Jinrui o Hakai Suru. Sorera wa Saisei Dekinai.
description: This “youth graffiti” manga centers on two people in the 1990s who play the Magic the Gathering trading card game.
tags: Traditional Games, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Shiganbana
description:
In this seemingly peaceful country, there lives a hitman that hunts down others of his kind - an assassin of assassins. Before eliminating his targets, he always questions their motives for killing - this is his way of embracing his destiny.

 From the author of "Until Your Bones Rot" and "The Shadows of Who We Once Were," Utsumi Yae presents a thrilling drama about the lives of those existing on the edge between life and death.
tags: Action, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Mystery

name: Teisou Gyakuten Isekai de Sukebe na Bijo-tachi ni Kakomare nagara Boukensha Seikatsu
description: Akira Kusaba is summoned to the other world of Rumisia by the beautiful silver-haired woman Lucia. Akira wasn't summoned to save the world... but to help her make money!? Feeling exhausted, Akira begins working part-time in the other world, but gradually he notices the strangeness of this world. There's a female adventurer who wants to have her breasts wiped by a man, a slime that tries to drain the vitality out of men, and even Lucia, who summoned him, forces him to sleep next to her and secretly enjoys solo play in the bed next to her... Yes, this other world is a world where the concepts of chastity between men and women are reversed!
tags: Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Aisaretagari no Shironeko Miko-san
description: Miko is a white cat who used to be a stray but has since become the most pampered cat in the world! she doesn't care if her owner is working or on a call -- she demands affection at all times.
tags: Animals, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Saikyou Skill "Inochigoi" de Kuyashii Kedo Musou Shichau Moto Maou-sama no Sekai Seifuku Katsudou
description:
Village girl Chelsea, who is beloved by everyone, is actually the reincarnated ex-Demon King. However, when she reincarnated, for some reason neither her magical powers nor skills were inherited, and she was forced to live as a normal human being.

Humiliating days continued until one day, the remnants of the Demon King's army appeared to loot the village. Hunted down by her former subordinate, who did not realize her true identity, Chelsea finds herself in a perilous situation. Then, a skill finally manifests! The name of that skill is "Begging for Mercy"!?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Kuchibiru Kara Ai
description: Riku, a beloved handyman known throughout the town, struggles with crowds due to his sensitive ears.After failing his entrance exams for that very reason, the one who supported him was his high school friend, Sumiharu.Despite being busy running his own business, Riku found comfort in Sumiharu's companionship. However, oneway, during an ordinary phone call, Riku unexpectedly felt aroused just from hearing Sumiharu's voice.Confused by this sudden change in his feelings, Riku begins to notice that the physical closeness between him and Sumiharu is steadily increasing. What could this mean for their relationship?
tags: Romance, Boys' Love

name: Tsumugu Kon
description:
――From today onwards, this guy is my bride.

The third son of the prestigious nine-tailed fox family, MItsu
×
The fox caretaker, Tsumugi

One day, due to Mitsu's selfishness, the two, who were once master and servant are now husband and wife…!?
tags: Animals, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy

name: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - The Mysterious Beautiful Uma Musume Picture Book Author was a Hero Story (Doujinshi)
description: She is a picture book author under the pen name "Yoneda Okome", she is the former G1 Uma Musume Rice Shower. One day, she met an active Tracen student topple over due to her abnormal breathing named Kisera Crisis. This chance encounter is what caused the revelation of the Mysterious Man's Plans. And what of the secret of Kisera's Past? Will Rice Shower be a Hero than uncover all of these secrets!?
tags: Sports, Doujinshi, Slice of Life

name: 20-Nen de Iroiro Kawacchatta Hero to Shounen
description: Bravely is the hero of justice. 20 years later, he wakes up and finds that he somehow has become a cute girl...?!
tags: Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Lord El-Melloi II-sei no Jikenbo
description:
When Lord El-Melloi II, the later Waver Velvet, gets asked to claim his inheritance over Adra Castle, he travels there with his apprentice Gray to do so. But they are not the only ones called that way. The will of the previous owner states that the assembled contestants—including Luviagelita Edelfelt—must compete in a game of wits to win the castle.  
  
Based on the light novel of the same name.
tags: Historical, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Blue Archive - Sensei Gyakutai Yume Senpai Imouto Gainen Series (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Action, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Doujinshi, Gore, Drama, Web Comic, Tragedy

name: Miss Not-So Sidekick
description:
Hyejung loved to read to escape her daily stress. But that's before she woke up inside the bizarre world of her favorite novel! Instead of the main heroine who courts three eligible men, she is now Latte Ectrie - a minor villain that everyone hates?! One way or another, it's a chance to live out her most beloved storyline, with popcorn in hand to watch all the drama! Taking charge of the narrative takes on a whole new meaning!

---

**Contents:** 139 + 30 (epilogue) + 9 (side story) = 178 chapters
- **Vol. 1:** main story (ch. 1-139)
- **Vol. 2:** epilogue (ch. 140-169)
- **Vol. 3:** side story (ch. 170-178)

name: Dragon King’s Palace: The Richest Son-in-Law
description: I am nothing in the eyes of others; my mother-in-law despises me, thinking I just rely on my wife and spend her money. And then there’s a group of lowlifes who are constantly coveting my wife. Who says a man marrying into his wife’s family can’t rise to greatness? Ji Xueyu! From now on, I’ll be the one to protect you
tags: Action, Romance, Martial Arts, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Boku no Kanojo Sensei
description: Can sensei be the heroine? Please?    Due to a traumatic experience, I have a distrust of people called "sensei". I, Saigi Makoto, was called by after school by the most popular and beautiful teacher at my school, Fujiki Maka-sensei. "I... love you" Eh– a confession out of the blue!? "Until you say you love me, I will continue to pursue you." Ever since then, I've been called by for "guidance counselling" after school, somehow watched AV together, being given excessive skin-ship, went on dates together. Over time, I gradually became conscious of Sensei...? But isn't it bad for Sensei to go out with her student? Lesson start!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Infection
description: A new infection has spread around the planet, that turns people into undead. The story begins a few minutes before the first recorded case, and shows the struggle of six young to survive this new world.
tags: Loli, Action, Romance, Zombies, Harem, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror

name: Wonder Cat Kyuu-chan
description:
There’s more to this kitty than meets the eye! Kyuu-chan loves snacks, cuddles, and bow ties, but most of all loves Hinata, the young professional who adopted this mischievous wonder cat into his home.

As the two adjust to life together, they discover that they have a lot to learn from each other.

The ordinary and the extraordinary live side by side in this delightful slice-of-life manga!

---

tags: Animals, Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: I Really Don't Want to Be Reborn
description:
Little had I known, I Chen Hansheng; the former elite of society and a Diamond Bachelor, was reborn. When I woke up, I was a senior graduate in high school? 
Later, Chen Hansheng was walking near the crosswalk, he seemed hesitant. A precious girl; Shen Youchu and two other girls; Bai Yueguang and Xiao Rongyu, who will he pick? All of them? One of them? Two of them? Read to find out. 

Side Note:  Diamond Bachelor is a slang word that means someone who’s insanely rich and single.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Eleceed
description:
Jiwoo is a kind-hearted young man who harnesses the lightning quick reflexes of a cat to secretly make the world a better place – one saved little child or foster pet at a time. Kayden is a secret agent on the run, who finds himself stuck in the body of a …um… decidedly fat old fluffy cat. Together, armed with Jiwoo’s super powers and Kayden’s uber-smarts, they’re out to fight those forces who would let evil rule this world. That is, if they can stand each other long enough to get the job done.

---

tags: Action, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Majo wa Mangetsu ni Saku
description: Koichi Hotaka is a second-year junior high school student who is a bit of a shy. One day, he meets a mysterious girl, Shima, who calls herself the "Witch of Alstroemeria" and is chosen as her "contractor". A fantasy of love and magic set on the night of the full moon!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Maryoku Mugen no Manaporter
description:
Thanks to his infinite mana, Ishua has been working as a mana porter to the hero party, doing a perfect task of supplying mana to the party members who consumed a lof of MP and earning the trust of his companions. However, Alan, the hero decides to banish him from the party in a fit of jealousy. 

"We don't need a mana porter!"

And chasing after Ishua through the forest Aria, the saint, appears wishing to continue adventuring with Ishua. The story of the banished strongest mana porter begins here!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Seto-san o Warawasetai Tsumugi-chan
description:
Seto-san is a beautiful and cool class president. Her smiling face must be absolutely wonderful. I want to see it! 

This is a short comic in which Tsumugi-chan, a ditzy girl with whom Seto-san has had a little bit of contact with since the entrance ceremony, boldly tries various strategies to make Seto-san laugh — but usually fails. However, there seems to be something quite interesting about Seto-san...
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Devil Who Kisses My Feet
description:
Maria, who is in an unhappy marriage with her sadistic husband, unexpectedly receives news. Lowell, her husband's half-brother, had returned from the battlefield.

 Maria, who had personally educated and raised him, learned that he  was no longer the small child or immature boy Maria remembered. He had the appearance of a grown man. 

With his appearance, a rift slowly began to appear in the seemingly peaceful Marquis Redford.

Where would this relationship, which should never have begun, end?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Demon Slayer - Kono Futari Fukakouryoku ni Tsuki (Doujinshi)
description: Pairing: Tomioka Giyuu x Shinazugawa Sanemi
tags: Historical, Demons, Comedy, Boys' Love, Doujinshi, Fantasy

name: You, Aquarist
description: A delinquent boy was out at a festival when he finds a discarded goldfish. Recalling his childhood experience of buying a goldfish from a festival stall and bringing it home only to have it die, he tries to make up for it by releasing the goldfish into the river. However, a mysterious girl stops him and tells him that it is not allowed to let out goldfish into the wild, and he learns how to keep goldfish at home and becomes a proper "aquarist."
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Delinquents

name: Sekai Saikyou no Kishi wa, Kanarazu Shinu Heroine wo Sukuu Tame Isekai Demo Saikyou no Kishi to Naru ~Ryoutei ni Hana wo, Ryoute ni Ken wo~
description:
He who fell in love with the heroine overturned her destiny to save her from her timely demise.

Abandoned by his parents, bullied in high school, and left in solitude—a young boy named Mikazuki Kenya.

At the brink of despair, he encounters a fateful meeting in his only hobby, VR gaming.

A meeting with “Kaguya” and “Reina,” the heroines from the immensely popular game “Knight of Giant.”

The time spent with the two heroines saved him, and he was head over heels for both of them.

However, in the story, one of them is destined to die…

To change that fate, he dedicated his life to mastering the game and becoming the strongest in the world.

Suddenly, Kenya finds himself entering the world of “Knight of Giant”?!

The strongest gamer embarks on a heroic tale of becoming the strongest in another world, in order to save the heroines he fell deeply in love with. The story begins.
tags: Action, Romance, Mecha, Virtual Reality, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Adaptation

name: Misaki-kun wa Kouryaku Chara Janai
description: Misaki-kun may be adorable, but he's just the 'best friend' type character you can find in any gal game. However, the protagonist, Kihara Hareta, isn't set on wooing any of the heroines; he has his eyes set on the Unobtainable Misaki-kun!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Video Games, Crossdressing, School Life

name: Unmei no Makimodoshi
description: An organization that saves people who have tragically died, the Space-Time Police Special Task Force, also known as the "Rewind Officers"! Their weapon is the time machine "Retry Eye" embedded in their right eye! Rewind time dozens, hundreds, thousands of times until you solve the case!
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Action, School Life, Police, Mystery

name: Corridor of Mirs
description:
One day, a girl woke up from a near car accident, and her name was Baek Nabi. After her chance encounter with a beautiful man, who saved her from the accident, Nabi starts to see things she has never seen before. Creatures who live off from human’s negative emotions are called ‘parasites’ . Nabi’s once normal life has overturned and becomes intertwined with several men all at the same time… “You’re a special existence. You just haven’t remembered yet.” A fantasy romance of Nabi and the mysterious beings around her.  


---

Official English translation by Comico's [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/208)
tags: Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Magic, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Entomologist in Sichuan Tang Clan
description:
Spicy Fabre, a million-streamer known for his expertise in poisons and venomous insects, was bitten by a black mamba during a local shoot in Africa and subsequently reincarnated in the world of Murim.

Now in a jungle raising poisonous insects, the streamer has caught the attention of the Sichuan Tang Clan, renowned for its mastery of poison arts, who wants him.

"Join us and become a member."
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kyou mo Kitansu ka, Yoda-senpai.
description: This woman makes herself at home in my parents' house. She is a senior in the same high school and a friend of my sister's. It seems to take her two hours to get to school each way, so she stays at my house almost every day. Yoda is defenseless and a bit out of the ordinary, and I'm always on the edge of my seat!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Blue Exorcist
description:
Rin and his exorcist classmates are caught in a secret war against the forces of darkness.
Raised by Father Fujimoto, a famous exorcist, Rin Okumura never knew his real father. One day a fateful argument with Father Fujimoto forces Rin to face a terrible truth—the blood of the demon lord Satan runs in Rin’s veins! Rin swears to defeat Satan, but doing that means entering the mysterious True Cross Academy and becoming an exorcist himself.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Gore, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: If I Added the Receptionist to the Party...
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: THE ISEKAI DOCTOR　Any sufficiently advanced medical science is indistinguishable from magic.
description:
Can modern medicine work in another world? No cheats, no modern equipment. One doctor stands up against a world where magic rules!

Tadato Amami, an active doctor, is transferred to another world where medical magic is monopolized. He is surprised by the slimes, chimera, beastmen, and other inhabitants he encounters for the first time! But with the little medical equipment he has and his own knowledge, he is able to fight diseases and injuries!

Will he be able to cure the inhabitants of the other world and save those who suffer?!
___
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States/Canada/Australia/New Zealand/Singapore/Japan only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10576/episode/352607)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Animals, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Medical, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Yandere Cafe e Youkoso!
description:
Welcome to Yandere Cafe!

A story about a high school boy's first visit to the Yandere Cafe.
tags: Boys' Love

name: Kichikujima
description: University students shipwrecked and forced to board a deserted island with a serial killer.
tags: Action, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Love Scribe!
description: "I like what I like!" An encounter between two trendy people and their friendship!
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Crossdressing

name: The Days of Diamond
description: Despite his athletic gifts, Ayasegawa Jiro is a loner who causes others to lose or give up on their dreams, all because of him. While struggling with his loneliness, he discovers the "Bambies," an uncompetitive baseball team whose motto is "having fun." Jiro finds joy in his baseball life with his teammates, but...This is a baseball youth drama that explores the relationship between a genius and his peers.
tags: Sports, Drama

name: Fake Saint of the Year: You Wanted the Perfect Saint? Too Bad!
description:
[The Eternal Scattering Flowers: Fiore Caduto Eterna] is a game ill-suited of being known as a galge, as the main heroine would – regardless of the chosen route – meet her demise.

Fudou Niito, a resident of Japan, went to bed dissatisfied with the ending of the game. When he next awoke, he found himself in the body of the game’s hated fake saint, Elrise. Confused, but with an understanding that Elrise’s actions would spell disaster for many lives in the future, he took advantage of the situation and acted to change the course of history.

As a result, despite her rotten personality, Elrise was adored by those around her as a perfect saint. Furthermore, the game itself was intrinsically linked to his original world and changed accordingly to suit Elrise’s actions. Without any knowledge of what the hell was going on, the fake saint Elrise continued to alter her fate.

A saint on the outside, but a man on the inside.

The transmigrator was a piece of shit and the person he transmigrated into was also a piece of shit. A combination of shit and shit would cause an accident – to create the greatest fake saint shitshow of the year!
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Kimitte Watashi no Koto Suki Nandesho?
description:
“Hey Kuroya-kun, do you like me?”
“How did you know!?”

Unrequited love. What a shame for Kuroya, a gloomy student in high school.
The other party is Kasumi Shiramori, a senior in the literature club and a transcendentally beautiful girl. While spending time alone in the club, I should have hidden this feeling for a long time…!
Senior told Kuroya in desperation.

“Then -? Want to try dating me first?”

There’s no way a relationship exists in the minds of these two!? No, wait, it should be like this-
Both the feelings and the super-sweet romantic comedy of youth are full of faintness in the misery of a longing senior who is teased despite being in a relationship!
  
---

**Links:** 
- [Official LN (EN)](https://tentaibooks.com/en/books/you-like-me-dont-you-so-wanna-go-out-with-me-volume-1)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: Majo Taisen - 32-nin no Isai no Majo wa Koroshiau
description:
Joan of Arc, the hero who saved France, was sentenced to be burned at the stake. But at the moment of her death, a demon sent her to another world. There, she found 32 women from across history, known as “witches”.
___

description: Meet Masamichi Watanabe.

name: How the Little Brother Who Turned Into a Girl Became His Big Brother's Girlfriend
description:
When I returned home for the first time in a long time, my little brother transformed into a girl!?

description:
A short, mixed genre anthology collection of oneshots by amateur artists whose panels are bursting with drawn detail. Sold only at Comitia 2023. 

---
