name: Katakoi Strategy
description: My dear best friend likes someone else...?
tags: Romance, Boys' Love

name: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray
description: Uma Musume: Cinderella Gray is a spin-off title of the Uma Musume project by Cygames. It follows Oguri Cap through her time at Kasamatsu Training Center Academy and on her journey of becoming a legendary horse girl.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Sports, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Genshin Impact 4-koma
description:
Official 4-koma comic for the award-winning game, [Genshin Impact](https://genshin.mihoyo.com/). 
A relaxing trip in Teyvat ><, let's go together!
tags: Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Zom 100 ~100 Things I Want to do Before I Become a Zombie~
description:
After three years of working for a black company, Akira was exhausted both mentally and physically.  
But one morning, what he saw on his usual way to work was nothing but a town full of zombies.   
How will the former company slave, Akira, live his life in a world that has completely changed overnight!?  

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead** (2023)
tags: Action, Comedy, Zombies, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: Saiai no Onee-sama ga Akuyaku Reijou datta no de, Kami ga Sadameta Scenario ni Aragaimasu @COMIC
description:
"I will defeat the destiny that stands in my sister's way!"

The younger sister adores her older sister, the villainess, from the bottom of her heart. Without caring about how it may look, she stands up against her sister's bad end! 

An energetic loop fantasy that spans time with only love and persistence!
tags: Comedy, Fantasy, Villainess

name: Blue Archive - Aoharu Record
description:
Blue Archive JP's second official manga drawn by Sergei.

---
**Links:**
- [Blue Archive JP's Twitter](https://twitter.com/Blue_ArchiveJP)
tags: Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Legend
description: Reiji Saeki was living in a north-eastern countryside town and lost his life in an accident during summer vacation. But before he knew it, a mysterious ball of light appeared in front of his eyes in a world of whiteness. Being a magician from a parallel world, that ball of light is looking for someone qualified to inherit the magic they had created in order to prevent it from being lost. Reiji, who took on that suggestion, lives in the parallel world Elgin, with a new body and powerful magic.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Welcome to Japan, Ms. Elf!
description:
Kitase Kazuhiro is an ordinary salaryman who always leaves the office on time. Though this is Japan, so perhaps he's not really ordinary after all. What's truly strange comes after that; Every night, he takes a shower, changes into his pyjamas and has a good night's sleep. Then he dreams of a fantasy world, and only wakes up when he dies or sleeps in that world. One day, he's killed after stumbling onto a dragon's lair. "A nightmare," he sulks, until he finds his elf friend in his bed.
  
Curious to see an elf waifu experience daily life in Japan? How's it like to walk with every man's fantasy on the streets of Tokyo? This manga is for all you elf lovers out there!
___
- [Official LN (EN)](https://j-novel.club/s/welcome-to-japan-ms-elf)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kitchen Soldier
description: Korea's representative dirt spoon, Kang Sung-jae, an opportunity to become a legendary cook who has come like a ray of light in an uneasy military life!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Video Games, Military, Drama, Cooking, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Magabanashi: Ghost Stories Spreading on Social Media
description: Based on the popular horror radio show Magabanashi, this anthology captures supernatural stories that have taken on a life of their own across social media. Readers are cautioned that these tales come with risks, as they tap into deep-seated fears and blur the line between reality and the supernatural.
tags: Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Bannou Skill no Rettou Seijo Kiyosugiru no de Binbou ni wa Narimasendeshita
description: "So, you're an inferior saint, huh!"                                                                Soara, who received the divine revelation of a saint, was invited to the party of her childhood friend, the hero Zeno. Everyone in the party had S-rank skills and high expectations of her, but she was banished for not having any outstanding talent.  Although shocked, Soara did not lose heart and transitioned into a freelance adventurer. She deepened her bonds with the companions she met during her travels, gradually recovering from the shock of being expelled from the party and achieving success along the way—but—?
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: King Golf
description:
In Teirin High School, you are either part of a gang or an elite sports player. Sousuke Youki, called 'the predator,' is an undefeated master at fighting. One morning, as he finishes up a fight, Kazumi, a prodigy amateur golf player, took a look at Sousuke, ignored him, and walked right by. Infuriated, Sousuke sets out to get revenge on Kazumi for dissing him but Sousuke's revenge takes a detour as he gets himself involved in playing golf by the thuggish golf coach. Will this delinquent break legends and become "the King of Golf"?  
  
King Golf also won the 56th Shogakukan Manga Award in January 2010 in the boys category.
tags: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Sports, Adventure

name: Life Changer Voice Phishing
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kuroko no Basket - Hajimari no Closing Credits (Doujinshi)
description: Pairing: Akashi Seijuurou x Kuroko Tetsuya
tags: Oneshot, Monsters, Action, Demons, Boys' Love, Magic, Doujinshi, Fantasy

name: Tenshi wo Ikasete Item Get!! Ikigacha de Dungeon Kouryaku!
description:
One day, Haruma Kozai was suddenly transported to a town centered around a dungeon. The special skill he was given was [Summon Angel].

This skill with a mysterious name does not simply summon an angel - rather it's a slightly strange skill in which angels are summoned for a price.

 ...At least that's what he thought, but it seems like “pleasure” is the price to pay!?

Make the summoned angel cum and decide on the cheat boost. A very naughty journey to another world begins~!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Isekai Suicide Squad
description: Not found
tags: Action, Long Strip, Superhero, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Omae, Tanuki ni Naranee ka?
description:
"Tired of life? Be a tanuki!"

A story of being scouted by a raccoon dog when trying to die.
tags: Animals, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Kinnikuman
description:
Kinnikuman (Muscleman), a weak and clumsy super hero, constantly getting into wacky situations. As the series progressed, the story began changing from comedy to action as Kinnikuman battles stronger and stronger foes in the wrestling ring. The series continually introduced new Super Human characters, known as Chojin, who would challenge Kinnikuman and his friends for various purposes.  
    
---
- **The initial serialization lasted from 1979-1986 and ended with Vol. 36. The series directly continued in 2011 with Vol. 37.**
- **The 2011 Chapters resets the Count to 1 during it set of volumes (Beyond Vol 36)**

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1985**
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Sports, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: BE BLUES ~Ao ni Nare~
description:
If you're born in Japan and you play football, you'll eventually want to wear the national team uniform! It's the same for everyone! Ichijou Ryuu is a boy whose dream is to become a Japan national team player. With his twin childhood friends, Yuuto and Yuki, their first goal is to win the Japan Under-12 Football Championship!  
The excitement of a one-on-one! The tension in front of goal! The elation from pulling off the perfect link up play! The essence of what makes football enjoyable is here.  
  
Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Best Shonen Manga in 2014.  


---
tags: Award Winning, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Hana Himeru Kimi no Meteor
description:
"On that night, I became the cursed monster's bride—"

Stella, the eldest daughter of the Viscount Quinwitch, though she was adopted, lived happily with her kind family. However, one day, Stella's younger sister Lilinette was chosen as the "Monster's Bride". Once a century, a cursed monster confined to a castle requires a sacrifice, so Stella resolves to go there in place of Lilinette. And there, she meets the monster - a bloodstained vampire named Ravi.
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires

name: More Than Lovers, Less Than Friends
description: Ex-AV star Miyako unexpectedly runs into a former coworker at a marriage interview...?! The secretly connected pair are bursting with more pure energy than you can imagine! This cute adult love comedy hits different and will heal your soul.
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Isekai Craft Gurashi ~Jiyuu Kimama na Seisan Shoku no Honobono Slow Life~
description:
Miyabi always had dreams of being an architect, creating buildings that would inspire awe in others. And in the MMORPG Yume Sekai, he was finally able to achieve that dream - even if his constructions were used entirely to house marriage proposals. 

One day, Miyabi received a message from the admins of the game - as his architecture was so good for couples, they are gifting him with a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to go to a new world. Assuming they mean a private server, Miyabi accepts - and quickly gets transported to another world.

After confirming that he was spirited away, Miyabi discovers that all of his crafting skills from the game are intact here. No longer tethered to his job in the real world, Miyabi now has a real goal: to build his own house and family.
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/isekai-craftsman-a-relaxing-tale-of-chilling-and-building-from-scratch)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Jakdu
description: Kwon Yong-jin, a protagonist who doesn’t believe in superstitions, experiences unbelievable events right after his 16th birthday.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I Thought My Time Was Up!
description:
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanchett, was told she only had three months left to live. She decided that she didn't want to go quietly, so she decided to create and complete her bucket list! 

1. Treat her maid Anne to cakes
2. Gain independence and wealth
3. Get rid of her fiancé, the Marquis of Secreb
4. Date someone handsome for three months
5. Take a trip to the West!

...But it was only after she ran away that she realised... the fact her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
Lariette, the daughter of the Duke of Blanche, was diagnosed with a terminal illness and three months left to live. She decided to try to achieve her bucket list since she was going to die anyway. First, dumping an older fiancé whom she doesn't even love. Second, dating the monster Duke of Candel for three months! But it was only after she ran away from him that she realized, the fact that her terminal illness was a complete misdiagnosis!

---
**Original Novel:** [Naver Novel](https://novel.naver.com/webnovel/list?novelId=825581), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4502291)

**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=9021824), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=801711)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/haiyiwieshijuezheng/list?title_no=2313)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Bremen
description: Reiji and Kasuga head out to Tokyo to become the "Gods of Rock," but they seem to always attract trouble. On their way, Hayama Ryo and Fujii Ran join them in their quest. Despite its rockstar type look, this manga really is about action.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life, Music

name: Baby Prisoner of the Winter Castle
description:
On the night the kingdom fell and the entire royal family was being executed, Clarisse, who naturally thought she would also die, heard something unexpected. 

“We cannot execute anyone who has not reached the age of eighteen. Instead, I will kill you the day you turn eighteen.” 

And so, Clarisse is given ten years to live. 
Clarisse then heads North as a “prisoner.” 
And she asks the Grand Duke for only one thing… 

“Um, is it okay if I take this friend with me? It’s my only friend.” 

But what Clarisse holds out is a rock? 

It’s a new life in the North! 
But this life as a “prisoner” keeps on getting better…?
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Infinite Level Up With Phantoms
description: Not found
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: In This Life, the Greatest Star in the Universe
description: Sun Woo-joo, an aspiring idol with shining talent, dedication, and passion, had only one shortcoming: "dancing." Having to give up on his lifelong dream of becoming an idol due to this one flaw, he was preparing for a different path in life when a miracle suddenly appeared! "I'll become a superstar brighter than anyone." His once lacking dance skills were no longer a problem. The UV Starship. Five perfectly prepared idols are finally ready with everything they need. A monstrous rookie is about to debut in the entertainment industry! Presenting 'The New Black.' This life, he's destined to be a cosmic superstar!
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Music, Full Color

name: Put It All In The Ring! 2
description: At the end of Ring ni Kakero 1, Ryuuji Takane went up against Superstar Jun Kenzaki for the World Title. Now, 17 years later, Rindo Kenzaki, the son Jun Kenzaki and nephew of Ryuuji Takane, lives with Ishimatsu Katori, the "Kenka Champion" from Ryuuji and Jun's time. Rindo will meet up with a new generation of boxers to create a new Golden Japan Jr. to take on the world.
tags: Action, Sports, Martial Arts

name: Watashi o Aisuru Sannin no Danna-sama
description: Rio Yamabuki died saving a cat. When she wakes up, she finds herself 15 years in the past, on the day her husband proposed to her. She believed that marrying him would bring her happiness. However, the reality was a disastrous marriage filled with her husband's abuse, caring for his parents, and ultimately being killed by her husband and his lover for insurance money. A grim reaper appears and tells her, "Redo your marriage as you wish." If she can redo her life from rock bottom, this time she will live for herself and seize happiness!! Just when she thought that, three high-spec men claiming to be her husband appear...!?
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Immortal Maestro
description:
The person who is ranked No.1 in the world rankings of the AOS League of Infinity game and the strongest person who is nicknamed the devil on the battlefield.
However, a man wearing a golden mask appeared before the strongest person who had suffered a setback in a traffic accident and was abandoned by everyone and proposed.
“If I come back, can I become a world championship winner?”
The strongest person who goes back to the past becomes the maestro who leads the battlefield between earth and other worlds and shows the best game of all time.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Naze ka Tsukaima no Usagi wa Boku wo Dekiai Shisugiteru
description: Aidan McGuire is a new magician in the ‘Guardians of the Order’. Every Guardian has a humanoid familiar, and summoning one is mandatory! But during the summoning ceremony, Aidan summons a cute rabbit! He was told ‘deeper contact’ was necessary for the familiar to showcase its true power… so when he tried kissing it, the rabbit disappeared and a young man named ‘Jougasaki Hidetora’ appeared in its place! A cute (?!) fantasy BL story about a magician with a vague memory of some other life.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy

name: Ice Master
description: “Strength and power, that’s all there is in this world.” As someone living a poverty-stricken life, Yunfei, an orphan of the Donghua Clan, is considered the weakest in the world simply because he lacks power. To escape this wretched fate, he chooses the path of a eunuch. Yunfei receives the seed of the ultimate martial arts technique, the Extreme Yin Art of Bai Yihong, and becomes part of the emperor’s special forces as part of the [Great Murim Extermination Plan]. In this era of great upheaval, amidst constant intrigues and fierce power struggles, the story follows the escapades of “Yunfei”, a master of deceit and cruelty, as he navigates the world of martial arts with his ice arts!
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Koori no Reijou no Tokashi kata
description: Kagami Asahi: a blunt yet overly caring high schooler and Himuro Fuyuka: a classmate who never lets anyone near her, earning her the nickname "Ice Queen." These two never had any chances to meet, but from Asahi's meddling, the closed off soul of Fuyuka might just be showing change?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adaptation

name: Kyouryuu-chan to Kaseki-kun
description:
Rinko Shinobu may seem like a normal high school girl, but she is actually a hybrid between human and dinosaur. Although she usually stays in human form, sometimes her T-rex bits will pop out when she's distracted. The only person who knows her secret is the dinosaur nerd Kazuya Kobake, who tries his hardest to help hide her dinosaur form. But his distracting antics are drawing strange stares from their classmates and stressing him out…

(Source: Natalie.mu, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Hanakotoba no Inouryoku o Te ni Shita Ore wa, 'Gyakkyou' no Chikara de Musou Suru
description: Confronted by the “Weed,” a mysterious entity infested with plants, the protagonist Yu finds himself in dire straits against its overwhelming power. In this moment of absolute crisis, Yu awakens to an unknown ability that transforms him into a Weed. This is a world where the language of flowers becomes supernatural powers. With the ultimate ability that blooms in “Adversity,” he’ll mow down every enemy!!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Yuta, a boy transported to another world along with his classmates, finds himself in a realm where earthlings are summoned for their high inherent power. These powers are used to operate humanoid machines known as magic-machines through a special ability called Ludia that resides within humans.
However, Yuta’s Ludia value is shockingly low, with a reading of just 2. While his classmates are auctioned off at high prices, Yuta is sold at the lowest price and becomes a slave. But an encounter with the white magic-machine, Arleo, might just change his destiny.
From being an unwanted slave to becoming the strongest hero who shakes the world! The new era of Mecha Battle Entertainment has begun!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Adventure, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Pastel Love
description: "Millie" (golden haired), the perfect little girl whose life is fully equipped with everything, but because of her timeless mother, Millie has become an indifferent day-to-day person until she meets "Zen" (black-headed), an ordinary little girl whose life focussed on only studying, without Zen knowing that she herself was stirring up Millie's heart to beat again.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Full Color

name: I Became the Youngest Member of Top Idol
description: “25…that’s too old to become an idol.” Do Seohan, who got eliminated from the successful idol survival audition program ‘Stardust Project’. Giving up his dreams, he is trying to find his way working part-time jobs. When all of a sudden, he wakes up 8 years in the past after an accident. Right before the ‘Stardust Project’ started! As the youngest (but most experienced), can he make it to the final lineup this time?
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Music, Full Color

name: Beloved
description: Dr. Wei struggles after finding out that the girl she hooked up with was only sixteen years old, but somehow it's not as easy to avoid the girl as she had thought.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kuse ni Narisou ♡
description: ☆ I'm Shiratori Nagisa, an idol! Tossing people around is a hobby of mine. Is there a strong and cool boy out there somewhere? Finally, a super hilarious romantic comedy! Includes 2 other stories.
tags: Romance, Martial Arts, Crossdressing, School Life, Delinquents, Music

name: Rei no Heya ni Irerarechatta Osananajimi no Futari
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Double Helix Blossom
description: The manga is set in the near future, and begins with the awakening of police officer Kiku Shinonome, who was put into cryogenic stasis for 60 years to stave off what would have been a fatal wound. In a new world unfamiliar to her, she is forced to team up with Kyo Tsukisagari, a criminal with a big rap sheet but equipped with psychic powers. Together, they solve paranormal incidents, even while their personalities butt up against each other.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Crime, Fantasy, Police, Supernatural

name: Hitoribocchi no Isekai Kouryaku
description:
The strongest doesn’t need any cheats! Haruka, who spends his high school life a loner, was suddenly summoned to another world one day along with all his classmates. When ol’ God enters the picture, Haruka believes he can just choose whatever cheat skill he wants to help him survive in the new world… But, contrary to his expectations, that list of cheat skills works on a first come, first serve basis. And so, his classmates pick out all the cheat skills. His choices now limited to leftovers, Haruka finds himself incapable of assembling a party due to his own “loner” skill. Even though it’s a different world, it seems his adventuring days will be, as per usual, a solitary affair… After becoming aware of a crisis looming over his classmates, Haruka makes a silent vow to save them. No relying on cheats! He will walk a heretical path of strength that transcends the need for them.  
  
The curtain rises on the strongest loner’s otherworld strategy guide!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: APPLE
description: The mysterious assassin, Apple, has been caught by President Bruno. Seemingly unarmed and tied to the ceiling, Apple must make use of some unorthodox methods to escape. Just what does Apple have up his sleeve and how does this tie to a magical spring called “God’s Fountain”?
tags: Oneshot, Thriller, Monsters, Action, Crime, Mafia, Military, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Witch Craft Works
description: Takamiya Honoka, a regular student, sits next to Kagari Ayaka, the idol of the school, and a perfect girl in every way. Her fans are hostile to the extent of harassing anyone who gets close to their princess, so Takamiya-kun is always in trouble. One day Takamiya is suddenly attacked by an unknown force, but he is rescued by a powerful sorceress of fire, who happens to be… Kagari Ayaka herself!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Yama, Kaimashita ~Isekai Gurashi mo Warukunai~
description:
When I bought a mountain, I never expected it to be from another world!
And while I was leisurely enjoying a countryside life suited to this strange realm, I unknowingly began making the mountain more powerful!?

(Source: Amazon JP, edited)
tags: Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Yameru Hoshi yori Ai wo Komete
description: Suicide is a daily occurrence for people on this planet, where they coexist with "Fluffy," a special clinical creature provided by aliens with the ability to give super-powerful healing to its hosts. What is the drama for people living in this strange world?
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Magic, Drama, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Cardcaptor Sakura: Clear Card
description: It is spring, with cherry trees in full blossom, and Sakura is just entering middle school. Her beloved Syaoran has returned from Hong Kong, and life couldn't be better. But when she awakens from a strange dream to find her Sakura Cards powerless, how can she protect Tomoeda from disaster?! [Kodansha]
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Kaijin Fugeki
description: Night, phenomena that were once known as natural disasters. Faced with the threat of inexplicable destruction, children offer their prayers in the form of dance in order to borrow the power of the gods, quell the Night's fury, and deliver the world from ruin. In a fateful encounter, a boy from a rural town in Japan, Jin, meets Gao, a British soldier who was forced to flee his homeland by the Night. The two spend their halcyon days with their friends in the quiet town surrounded by nature. Until one day, the Night suddenly falls on them once again!
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Yaotome x 2
description:
Yaotome Kai is a sixth grade elementary school student with a new neighbor living in the apartment next door. The slightly weird girl Yaotome Haruru. Eating school lunches, having likes and dislikes, and forgetting things as elementary school students do. Casually hanging out whilst their parents get along, as next-door neighbors do.

The latest work by "Seitokai Yakuindomo" author Ujiie Tozen.

A comedy of two elementary school neighbors.

(Source: Pocket Shounen Magazine, translated)
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Zatch Bell! 2
description:
The sequel to Konjiki no Gash!!, aka Zatch Bell.

Once the battle to decide the king of the demon world, in which 100 demon children fought against each other, had come to an end… the king of the demon world was crowned, and the demon world lived out the rest of its days in peace.

Or at least, that was how it was supposed to be.

Now, a shocking fact about the current state of the demon world comes to light. And in the depths of their despair, three demon children decide to risk it all for one last chance at survival.
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Rurouni Kenshin: Hokkaido-hen
description:
It is the 16th year of the Meiji era. Five years have passed since Kenshin Himura stopped the uprising of Makoto Shishio. Though the flames of his budding revolution were extinguished, the scars left in its wake are still felt across Japan. Remnants of his group—though scattered—still exist. Some have found peace while others continue to fight.  
  
After a remaining faction tried to revive the revolution, Shishio's old sword fell into the hands of Ashitarou Hasegawa, an orphan boy who has never known a home. The conflict also leaves both Aran Inoue, a 16-year-old half-Japanese, half-American boy, and a mercenary girl named Asahi Kubota with a hefty price to pay off, with nowhere else to go. But luckily for these individuals, the Kamiya dojo has always been a place to accept wanderers without prying into their pasts.  
  
The three are keen to start fresh, so when two members of Asahi's former clan show up demanding her return, Asahi refuses and things start to get ugly. In the midst of the chaos, the clan members drop a package containing a picture of dojo proprieter Kaoru Kamiya's presumably deceased father and his location—Hakodate, Hokkaido. With only this information, the members of the Kamiya dojo embark on an adventure across the sea in the hopes of finding news about Kaoru's father and the reason he is being targeted.



---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Samurai X: Hokkaido Arc** (2022)
tags: Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Supernatural

name: Bakidou
description: After more than 2,000 years, Nomi no Sukune's successor is born. This time, Baki will challenge the god of sumo.
tags: Action, Psychological, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: On his very first day of starting high school, Namito Kominato's homeroom teacher has him sit behind a strange girl who wears a paper bag over her head and is always soaking wet with sweat. Her name is Samidare Kamiyama, a extremely shy girl with severe social anxiety. Ultimately, she meets Hinata Arai (the student council president who's kind and helpful, but alarmingly obsessed with her uniform) and Harusame Amano (a girl who only speaks to a cardboard cutout of a magical girl). These three unfortunate, but beautiful girls form a "conversation club", opening the curtain on this somewhat pitiful and comedic tale of adolescent romance!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: The World Grew Spines
description:
Where did the [Cactusmen](https://mangadex.org/chapter/a7a4df6c-5749-4d12-a12a-610e8f08cf20) come from?

---
Published in Bikkuri House August 1983.
tags: Oneshot, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Maou Reijou no Kyouiku Gakari ~Yuusha Gakuin o Tsuihou Sareta Heimin Kyoushi wa Maou no Musume-Tachi no Katei Kyoushi to Naru~
description:
Flay Garnet has been fired from the academy after being set up by his colleague. He receives a job offer from a mysterious maid. The job offer is to be a tutor to the five daughters of the Demon King! At first, they didn’t trust him to be taught by a human, but as he demonstrates his abilities, he begins to gain the trust of the Demon King’s daughters.
Flay’s new life as an educator, under one roof with five cute but problematic girls with varying personalities, begins!
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Otokotachi
description:
(from ebookjapan):

Shinichi, who has been transferred to Tokyo for work, asks his uncle, who lives in downtown Tokyo, for a place to live and visits an apartment named "Eastern". 

However, it turns out to be a devil's cave with many residents who have their own peculiarities! His uncle, nicknamed "Dharma," is the head of the apartment. What is the fate of Shinichi, who has been in deep trouble since the first day he moved in? 

A visceral work by the master storyteller, Tetsuya Chiba!
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: If You’re Obsessed, You’re Doomed
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy

name: Maertza Family - The Sisters
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Self-Published, Slice of Life

name: NTREVENGE
description: An introverted high school student, Souichi Sakuraba, is being bullied severely by the “Yokai” classmates. The bullying escalates, and Souichi’s childhood friend, Azusa, who was the only one who trusted him, is defiled by them. In front of Souichi, who was in the depths of despair, the succubus, Asmode, appeared. Souichi makes a contract with a succubus who possesses a mysterious ability, and decides to make the bully’s loved ones suffer the same pain as himself by “cuckolding” them. The obscene revenge by “NTR” begins.
tags: Sexual Violence, Magic, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: I Created a Salvation Organization
description: He got a doomsday salvation system. As long as he saves the world, he can have everything. He recruited top talents to build the Pan-Human Principle Guardian Association. He descended into the doomsday worlds as the guardian of human principles, allowing the whole world to admire him and worship him as a god. The ultimate natural disaster. The mutation frenzy. The whisper of the evil god. Thus, a huge organization spanning many worlds, taking the protection of human principles as its own responsibility and saving civilization from the fate of destruction, gradually appeared in the eyes of the world.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Superhero, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Asura
description: There was someone who set out after receiving orders from the Absolute One who first unified the continent to learn the secret of immortality. He believed that he would definitely discover the secret of immortality even if he had to travel all over the world. He never returned until the Absolute died and the empire collapsed, leaving behind only numerous speculations and gradually being forgotten in people's memories. And after a long time...
tags: Historical, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Isekai Kenkokuki
description:
A protagonist reborn in another world.  Apparently he had been reincarnated as an abandoned child.  Before his eyes were abandoned children like him.  In order to survive, he led them into farming.  Little by little, orphans gathered, and upon hearing rumors of a village, others began to migrate.

The group that had been nothing but children had become a village before anyone realized. Then various countries in the surroundings started to have an eye on it. This is the epic tale of the man who would later be known as the Divine Emperor.
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Sins of the Gods
description:
As a sinner, Ying Tian and his tribe were imprisoned in the City of Sinners with collars that restricted their supernatural powers. However, Ying Tian was told that he was the descendent of a god. Just when Ying Tian was confused, an unexpected disaster destroyed the entire City of Sinners, leaving no one alive. Ying Tian himself escaped from death and came to the outside world, carrying the blood feud of his entire tribe. In order to find out the truth of the world, Ying Tian and his partners embark on a journey, while he also reveals the true power of a god…

---
**Link:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Bilibili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc36782)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy

name: Yuukoku no Moriarty: The Remains
description: A manga adaptation of the Yuukoku no Moriarty light novels.
tags: Historical, Psychological, Crime, Drama, Police, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Kidnapped Bride
description:
A once in a lifetime opportunity comes to Lucina, the illegitimate daughter of Lord Berek. Hakkan, the great conqueror who rules the dragon lands of Tayer, gives Lucina the opportunity to be his kidnapped bride. Desperate for any kind of freedom, Lucina agrees and steps into the unknown world.

---

**Note:** The novel originally serialized as R15, once its web serialization was completed, it released as R19 as an ebook (volumes). The webtoon will follow how it originally released, which is R15.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Ogami Tsumiki to Kinichijou
description:
Today, we live in an age of diversity. The phrase "non-humans" is a thing of the past. "Genjin" live their lives interacting with human beings.

One human boy, Yutaka Shinsou, is troubled. He is so used to being in tune with his surroundings that he no longer understands his own feelings. At Keiki High School, where many "Genjin" attend, he meets Tsumiki Ogami, a werewolf. She is cute, powerful, a little out of the ordinary, and kind. When he spends time with her, Yutaka's heart is somehow noisier than usual. Spinning an "unusual" everyday life with Tsumiki the werewolf.
tags: Award Winning, Animals, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: GATE - Jieitai Kanochi nite, Kaku Tatakaeri
description:
A gate appears in Tokyo's Ginza district sometime in the 21st century. From the gate pours out monsters, knights from middle-age Europe, and other fantasy-like beings, and they kill many of the citizens of Tokyo. This event is known as the Ginza Incident.  
The government sends a small group of soldiers from the Japanese Self-Defense Forces to the alternate world beyond the gate. Led by otaku soldier Youji, they find that the villages in the world are being attacked by a dragon. An elf girl who is a survivor from the dragon's rampage joins the group in their travels across the dangerous new world.  
  
 [Official Thai](https://shopee.co.th/Gate-%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%99%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9A%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B0%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%82%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B8%B4-%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%B0-1-10-i.30847586.4202197419)

- [Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%82%B2%E3%83%BC%E3%83%88_%E8%87%AA%E8%A1%9B%E9%9A%8A_%E5%BD%BC%E3%81%AE%E5%9C%B0%E3%81%AB%E3%81%A6%E3%80%81%E6%96%AF%E3%81%8F%E6%88%A6%E3%81%88%E3%82%8A)
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Machigatta Ko wo Mahou Shoujo ni Shite Shimatta
description: While searching for a brave candidate to become a magical girl and defend the world from evil, a mythical creature finds Kayo Majiba, a cute young lady who seems like the perfect fit. But when this newly turned magical girl proves to be a crude delinquent who goes berserk in a conflict, it becomes clear that this may have been a terrible mistake. Now evil—and any innocent bystanders—will face the rage of a magical girl gone wrong!
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Superhero, Magical Girls, Magic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Hokenshitsu wa Futarikiri
description: A collection of interconnected yuri stories in the nurse's office.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Maigo no Onnanoko o Ie Made Todoketara, Genkan kara Detekita no wa Gakunen Ichi no Bishoujo deshita
description:
One day, Kuroda Yusei, an introverted high school student with zero dating experience, returns a lost little girl to her house... when the most beautiful girl in his grade, Shirakawa Ayano, appears! 

"As thanks for saving my sister," she begins to approach him boldly for some reason, and every day is filled with mishaps!? On top of that, a busty otaku classmate and an attention-seeking junior girl also appear, and his daily life suddenly becomes more glamorous!? 

A school romance comedy where fate changes as you suddenly become close to "the girl of your dreams"!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Desire for a Reply!
description: A oneshot by Nisioisin and Miyokawa Masaru. Sunaki is a back-up player on the baseball team and he finally gets the courage to give a love letter to the idol of the school. Where will his actions take him?
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Sports, School Life, Gyaru

name: Not found
description: A 34-year-old NEET gets killed in a traffic accident and finds himself in a world of magic. Rather than waking up as a full-grown mage, he gets reincarnated as a newborn baby, retaining the memories of his past life. Before he can even properly move his body, he resolves to never make the same mistakes he made in his first life ever again and instead live a life with no regrets with the new one that was given to him. Because he has the knowledge of a middle-aged man, by the age of two, he has already become a prodigy and possesses power unthinkable for anyone his age and even older. Thus begins the chronicles of Rudeus Greyrat, son of swordsman Paul and healer Zenith, as he enters a new world to become the strongest mage known to man, with powers rivaling even the gods themselves.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Nine Peaks
description:
After just starting at his new school, Mashio Gaku is suspended within a week for getting into a scuffle with a third year. After returning home to his disapproving dad's okonomiyaki joint, his father, Mashio Harumi, can't help but reprimand him and refuses to serve him. Their harsh words are the last exchange they share before an unfortunate traffic accident takes Harumi's life.

At his father's wake, Gaku finds out he was, in his words, a big fuckin' deal. In mourning, Gaku heads out to fish like him and his father always would, only to hook a big catch and get pulled into the water... When he comes to, he finds himself staring a familiar stranger in the face... **in the year 2000.**
tags: Time Travel, Action, Delinquents

name: Mieruko-chan
description:
All of a sudden, Miko is able to see grotesque monsters all around her; but no one else can. Rather than trying to run away or face them, she instead musters all of her courage and… ignores them. Join in on her day-to-day life as she keeps up her best poker face despite the supernatural goings-on.
___
[Alt Raw (niconico Manga)](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/37662)
tags: Award Winning, Monsters, Psychological, Ghosts, Comedy, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Liquor Gummies
description: Xiang Qihong, a college student who has been unwilling to go to school for a long time, was entrusted by a university professor and a friend one day to help take care of their nephew! So now all of a sudden there's an older student/neighbour who had an elusive personality. Can Xiang Qihong get along well with the other party if he is so used to living alone?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Ponkotsu-chan Kenshouchuu
description:
Mito is a boy with a big heart and the frightening face of a thug. He wants people to rely on him, but he scares people off at first sight. That is, until his schoolmate Yumesaki asks him to help her.  
  
Yumesaki has a problem. Every day she is given a new, random supernatural ability by an mysterious being called God, as she has to test them in order to stop a giant meteorite that will destroy the planet in a year.  
  
Sure, the goal is to save the planet, but when a boy and a girl spend time together, there are more tender things to discover too!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Isekai Furin ll ~Michibika Reshi Hitodzuma Tachi to Bukiyo Tensei Yuusha~
description:
An office worker, Yuuto Aida, witnesses his wife's affair at home!  When he jumps out of the house, he gets hit by a truck and is reincarnated in another world as a hero!!  However, due to the misunderstanding about Goddess Reincarnation, he only had one skill, it was a skill that could captivate other people's wives!!

(MTL)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Okiku-san wa Ichatsukitai
description: The centuries-old evil spirit Okiku has decided to return with one objective: flirting as much as possible with Hijiri Ryouyou - the most powerful and beautiful exorcist of modern times.
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daiyonshou - Seiiki to Gouyoku no Majou
description: Natsuki Subaru defeats the white whale and the archbishop of the "Sloth" deadly sin, and is reunited with Emilia. The two have reconciled after overcoming a painful breakup, but new turmoil awaits them...
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: FPS de Shoshinsha Bokotte Real Fight ni Hattenshita Kekka w
description:
After I beat a noob in an FPS, he challenged me to a fight in real life!?

I decided to go along with it just for fun, but when I got there, a cute girl was waiting for me!

This is a romcom featuring a scummy male lead and a feisty female lead!

(Source: [BookLive](https://booklive.jp/product/index/title_id/1564434/vol_no/001))
tags: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Yoku Wakaranai Keredo Isekai ni Tensei Shiteita You Desu
description:
Ren, a young orphan girl, has been sold off to a merchant with sinister plans for her. Suddenly, memories of her past life on a world called Earth come flooding back, and Ren remembers that she used to be a research scientist – and a grown man! As Ren escapes into the Dark Forest, magical powers awaken within her. In order to survive the harsh realities of this world, she must use her rekindled knowledge of Earth's science as well as her newfound powers! Will her magical cheat powers and past-life knowledge be enough to keep her freedom, or is she doomed to a life of servitude?
___
**Character Designer:** [Kaoming](https://mangadex.org/author/259d2f17-2e24-4346-aca8-1ecd2224c491)
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Ittare Elf-neechan
description:
**Buy:**
- [BOOTH](https://umehatago.booth.pm/items/4428290)
- Melonbooks: [physical](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=1723135), [digital](https://www.melonbooks.co.jp/detail/detail.php?product_id=1784006)

- [Fantia](https://fantia.jp/posts/3024229)
tags: Comedy, Doujinshi, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Rave
description:
The Continent of Song is in chaos. The sinister secret society known as Demon Card is using the power of Dark Bring to destroy everything in their path. The only things capable of stopping Dark Bring are the Rave stones. Unfortunately, the Rave Stones were scattered around the globe in an explosion 50 years ago, so now they must be collected by the Rave Master in order to stop Dark Bring once and for all. This new task has been given to Haru Glory; a sixteen-year-old boy from Garage Island. The World's fate now rests on the new, young Rave Master.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The Grand Duke of the North Wants to be Loved
description:
**A short romance fantasy manhwa by Seomil.**

Allen Pratt, the cold-blooded northern Duke. He’s the unlucky prince who was exiled to the north because he could not inherit the throne. Thus he turns dark, turning into the villain of this world. He said that he’ll wreck havoc in the future, but...

I was the only one who knew. No matter how evil he is, I am certain. He’s the person who can both save me and the story. My only <lifeline>.
tags: Oneshot, Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Not found
description:
He killed the heroes, killed the king, the devil beast then found the “baby of fate”…

Having both superior intellect and destructive power, such is Clevatess, the devil beast king.
Angered by the 13 heroes' attempt to take his life, he had decided to bring ruin upon humanity, but he gets entrusted with an unexpected nuisance: a newborn human baby.

Is this the tale of a world close to apocalypse or a diary of new-era childcare?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [LINE Manga](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000841)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Sensitive Boy
description: Kaede, a victim of past sexual abuse, is obsessed with becoming “normal”…
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Ponkotsu Fuukiiin to Skaato take ga Futekisetsu na JK no Hanashi
description: Sakuradaimon is the school's prefect. A prefect is a student who is authorized to enforce discipline. As a prefect, he's supposed to be a role model to other students, but unfortunately he's not perfect. Kohinata is one of the people who Sakuradaimon has tried to discipline into wearing appropriate school attire, but she has thus far been disobedient.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Gyaru

name: Eiyuu ni Akogareta Shoujo wa Kyuuketsuki ni Ochitemo Eiyuu o Mezasu
description:
"We'll kill all vampires. Sharing our own fallen 『 blood 』 as a weapon...!!"

Arbitration Knights travel around the world to protect peace. Rinslet, a girl who has just become a regular knight, meets Yuri, a vampire girl with cool silver hair and crimson eyes. 
Rinslet learns that she is an abomination who kills her own kind by manipulating the power of 《 blood armor 》, which materializes blood into swords, bows and arrows. She becomes Yuri's kin in exchange for her life, and her goal is...?

A Yuri x Vampire x Dark Fantasy!
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Zombies, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Gore, Fantasy, Vampires

name: Oni Ure Idol ga Kyou mo Watashi wo Oshitekuru
description: Unpopular underground idol and actress, Enatsu Sayuki, faces her work diligently everyday to achieve her dreams of making it big in the world of acting. But, for some reason, the superstar idol Touma Sera – who should be her rival – becomes her biggest fan! Adorable enough to make Sayuki jealous, Sera takes every chance to passionately declare her love, throwing Sayuki’s life into chaos. Will Sayuki be able to achieve her dreams? And what will become of the one-sided love(?) between Sera and Sayuki...!?
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Cleric of Decay
description:
Not all job classes are created equal!

Marnac was pulled into a game while trying to play as one of its worst job classes, Cleric of Decay. Now he’s the only cleric of the Order of Decay, serving a goddess who’s been reduced to an animated hand that repeats the word “MURDER!”

Will the Order’s last cleric become powerful enough before the prophecy of “the end” comes true?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Koibami Shoujo
description: High school student Ooishi Kyou is afraid of women. Suddenly, five girls confessed to him. Among them, four are creatures called Koibami - beings that devour human romantic feelings. If he has his romantic feelings eaten by these girls, he will never be able to love again. However, he cannot abandon the feelings of the one who confessed to him for real - Kyou decides to find the one he truly loves among the five!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Mystery

name: Moriarty the Patriot
description: In the late 19th century, Great Britain rules over a quarter of the world. Nobles sit in their fancy homes in comfort and luxury, while the working class slaves away at their jobs. When young Albert James Moriarty’s upper-class family adopts two lower-class orphans, the cruelty the boys experience at his family’s hands cements Albert’s hatred of the nobility he was born into. He asks the older of the two boys—who has a genius mind and a killer instinct—to help him rid the world of evil, starting with Albert’s own family!
tags: Historical, Psychological, Crime, Drama, Mystery

name: Phoenix of the Nine Heavens (Remake)
description: Feng Ming is on his way to school when he saves a child about to die, losing his own life in the process. He is given the chance to cross time and space to have a new life and awakens in the body of the crown prince of Xi Lei. This crown prince, however, does not have the high status that Feng Ming expects. Instead, the prince regent Rong Tian holds the highest power in Xi Lei. Rong Tian notices the crown prince’s sudden change in demeanor along with Feng Ming’s habit of suddenly blurting out modern words and phrases, and becomes interested in him...
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Minamoto-kun Monogatari
description: Minamoto-kun has a face pretty enough to make people think he's a girl. Because of his face, he was bullied by the girls in middle school who were jealous of his face. He developed a fear of women due to the trauma and ended up attending a high school for boys. Just as he enters college and makes a promise to himself to overcome the trauma of his past, his father remarries and asks him to move out of the house. His father arranges him to live with his aunt (Minamoto-kun's father's younger sister) for the time being. She is an extremely beautiful woman who is also a non-tenured professor at his college. When he arrives at her apartment, she shows him her breasts and tells him that he will be her "guinea pig" in her reverse Hikaru Genji project.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Incest, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Honzuki no Gekokujou ~Shisho ni Naru Tame ni wa Shudan wo Erandeiraremasen~ Dai 2-bu 「Hon no Tamenara Miko ni Naru!」
description:
After the discussions with the temple master and head priest ended, Myne won the right to be treated as a noble with the role of a blue-robed shrine maiden apprentice.   
Work in the temple began and Myne could read books in the long-awaited temple library.   
However, there were many problems in the temple, such as adapting to the class system and dealing with the problem children assigned to her as attendants.   
Overcome adversity to be able to read books in peace!   
A biblio-fantasy written for book lovers and bookworms! The second part begins!
___
**Character Designer:** [Shiina You](https://mangadex.org/author/bf3b6af9-eac9-4886-be15-bc4a75640ede)
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Wheel of Reincarnation Rinne
description: As a child, Mamiya Sakura mysteriously disappeared in the woods behind her grandma's home. She returned whole and healthy, but since then, she has had the power to see ghosts. Now a teenager, she just wishes the ghosts would leave her alone! At school, the desk next to Sakura's has been empty since the start of the school year. Then one day her always-absent classmate Rokudo Rinne shows up, and he's far more than what he seems! After school one day, Rinne helps Sakura deal with the ghost of a boy who has a crush on her. Rinne, it seems, knows just how to handle such ghosts, and has the skills and tools to properly dispatch them to the afterlife (for a small fee of course). Sakura starts to learn more about her mysterious classmate, and her curiosity about Rinne draws her deeper into the amazing world between life and death.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Riso no Otoko
description: The story begins when a man ten years younger, a man of the same age, and then a man ten years older appeared in front of our heroines, who had taken a break from love. A coworker, a husband, a colleague, a one night stand… Do they truly understand their feelings, and are troubled by being together? You don’t have to be with your soulmate… Is it enough to be with a man who fits your ideals?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Death Preparation Hero
description:
Several decades have passed since the Hero defeated the Demon King and brought peace to the world, and the Hero has grown old enough to only vaguely remember his magic spells. When the remnants of the Demon King's army attack the Hero, he decides to set out on a journey again. This time, it's not a journey to save the world, but a "death preparation journey" to look back on his life.
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/69537)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Onban Kikou
description:
The secret of the record left by a grandfather, an underground record shop dealing with forbidden pop music, and an old jukebox in a future diner... 
A collection of short stories that traces the memories and feelings contained inside music records.
tags: Historical, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery, Music

name: Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu - Daigoshou - Mizu no Miyako to Eiyuu no Uta
description:
The 5th arc of the Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu manga.

Subaru and Emilia receive an invitation to a party from Anastasia and decide to go to Priestella, the city of the watergates.
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: I Was Reborn as the Villainess' Father and I Need XXX to Survive?!
description:
We all know the isekai formula. The MC is always some nobody, they wake up in a perfect body, and they always end up dominating their new world. Sure, Satoru got the first two tropes, but he sure didn’t choose to be reborn as an evil king in his ex-girlfriend’s otome game. He’ll have to quickly figure things out before the hero slays him and his villainess daughter…. all while dealing with sexy magicians, handsy kings and a craving for men’s… *ahem* spiritual energy. Forty-five might be a bit late for a sexual awakening, but better late than never, right?  
  
*Note: This is a all new original English comic.*  


---
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Gabai
description: This is the story of a young boy, after being sent from Hiroshima to Saga (10 years after the second World War, in 1958) by his mom because of a lack of money, journeying to a faraway place, and living in conditions alien to him, definitely makes him miss home. Worse, he is not familiar with his grandmother and her ways too. But with his Gabai Granny, he will slowly discover with his growing pains, just how resourceful Granny is…
tags: Historical, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Azamukare Seijo to Shugoryuu no Konyaku
description: For some reason, Philia, who grew up in an orphanage, was able to use the "healing power" of a royal daughter. She was bought for her ability to act as Princess Lovetta's "healing power" behind the scenes. However, Philia's life was in danger due to Lovetta's scheme, who was driven by her jealousy. Just when she had prepared for her death, a dragon prince appeared...
tags: Demons, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Boukyaku Battery
description:
Two geniuses who made a name for themselves in the middle school baseball world but had distanced themselves from baseball have serendipitously come together at an obsecure public high school in Tokyo.

Kiyomine Haruka, a pitcher with a flawless, powerful arm. His battery partner, the shrewd catcher known as the 'General', Kaname Kei (who's currently a complete amateur due to memory loss!). And then there are those who once fell in defeat to these two...

Their paths have crossed once more, and now their high school baseball story begins anew, springing into action!
tags: Sports, Slice of Life

name: Metro・Survive
description: Mishima is your average spineless pushover, working as a repairman for the Exopolis Tower, Tokyo's largest and hottest highrise business and entertainment building. He promised to come home in time to celebrate his son's birthday, but when he lets his pushy boss saddle him with overtime, the task takes him all night. On the morning subway train heading home, a massive earthquake strikes and collapses both Exopolis and its underground train lines. Now Mishima is trapped deep underground with the other passengers of the train, some of whom are less than cooperative. Will he be able to take the initiative for once and lead them all to freedom, or will they starve in their underground prison?
tags: Survival, Drama, Tragedy

name: The Duke's Daughter Is Going on Strike
description:
Aeryl Frey Brixia had lived all her life hiding behind a mask.

She was shunned by everyone including the father she craved affection from because of the ugly mark on her face that branded her a monster.

At the end of her miserable life, she was falsely accused of selling military weapons to the enemy nation and sentenced to execution…

The blade of the guillotine dropped and everything went black.

The next time she opened her eyes, she was in her room again as a young girl.

This time, she was determined things will be different. She will no longer be a puppet. She will no longer be manipulated.

And the first thing for her to do is to cooperate with the two officers leading the investigation against her father
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Apparently, Disillusioned Adventurers Will Save the World
description: Life isn’t going well for veteran adventurer Nick. Despite his loyalty to his party, he was betrayed by a teammate who accused him of embezzlement, then kicked out by his mentor. On top of that, his girlfriend dumped him too! Tired, heartbroken, and looking for a drink, Nick chances upon a few kindred spirits who are as jaded as he is. Can these disillusioned heroes put their faith in each other long enough to save the world together…?
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Henkoi!
description: The main character finds his possessions "abused" by some unknown person until he finally caught the culprit… masturbating to them?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Ore dake Fuguu Skill no Isekai Shoukan Hangyakuki ~Saijaku Skill "Kyuushuu" ga Subete o Nomikomu made~
description: Nakatani Yuto, a high school student, and his classmates are suddenly summoned to another world as "heroes". While his classmates are given powerful skills, Yuto is given the unfortunate skill of [Absorb]. Yuto, who has no use for it, is mortally wounded in a battle with a demon, but his classmates leave him to die. But at that moment, Yuto hears a voice out of nowhere...?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Sakamoto Days (Official Colored)
description: Taro Sakamoto was the ultimate assassin, feared by villains and admired by hitmen. But one day…he fell in love! Retirement, marriage, fatherhood and then… Sakamoto gained weight! The chubby guy who runs the neighborhood store is actually a former legendary hitman! Can he protect his family from danger? Get ready to experience a new kind of action comedy series!
tags: Sci-Fi, Official Colored, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Mafia, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: The Delivery Lady Came
description: Not found
tags: Shota, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Double Play
description: Having forgotten his keys, Tamao Hiroi a high-school student, returns home using the back entrance and is surprised to find a stranger in his bed… Soon he realizes this is no stranger but Ran Homura, one year younger, softball ace and one of the most beautiful girls at school! Hiroi watches her masturbating on his bed and instinctively does the same peeking through the glass door.
tags: Romance, Sports, Harem, Drama, School Life

name: The Anemone Feels the Heat
description: Nagisa Ootsuki shed her former self out of shame from failing her highschool entrance exams. On her first day in her new highschool, who does she meet but the girl who made her fail the exam! How does Nagisa deal with these complicated emotions?
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Futago Matomete "Kanojo" ni Shinai?
description:
Usami is a beautiful classmate with good morals and top grades. At school, she views Sakuto as her rival. But when he bumps into her after school, he sees a different side of her. She was playing at an arcade after classes, and she had this innocent smile that one couldn't imagine on her at school.

For the sake of getting along with her, he gets close to her at school and then plays together with her after school. They each have their places where they can deepen their bonds, and at last…

This is the start of a heart-warming love triangle romcom!
___

- [Alternative Raw](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/67850)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Tonari no Seki no Yatsu ga Souiu Me de Mitekuru (Fan Colored)
description: Of course, viewers are excited, but will those being watched feel the same excitement...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: ORIGINAL CHRONICLE Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha The 1st
description: The supplemental manga for Magical Girl Lyrical Nanoha Movie 1st, adding scenes inspired by both the original anime season and its Sound Stages into the movie verse.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Magic, Drama, Fantasy

name: Gachiakuta
description:
A slum where criminals' descendants live... People beyond the border look down and discriminate them as "tribal people." Ludo, an orphan boy, lives in the slum with his foster parent, Legt, and makes a living using his extraordinary physical abilities. However, one day, he was accused for a crime he didn't commit., and is thrown into the "abyss" which even the slum people fear.
___
Living in the slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Legto try to coexist with the rest of the town's residents, but Rudo despises the wastefulness of the upper class. Ignoring the warnings from those around him, Rudo regularly rummages through the town's garbage in search of anything useful or valuable to save from the "Abyss"—a massive hole where anything considered trash is dumped, including people. Rudo's biological father was one such person, having been thrown into the Abyss after he was accused of murder.

One day, after running into a mysterious figure on the way home, Rudo returns to find Legto's dying body on the floor. He is immediately found at the scene by the authorities and is charged with murder. No one believes his claims of innocence, and he is thrown into the Abyss. Instead of dying, however, he finds himself in a strange, foul-smelling place surrounded by monsters made out of trash.

When Rudo is attacked by said monsters, he is saved by a man named Engine, who reveals himself to be a "janitor"—someone who uses special weapons called "jinkis" to combat these creatures. In order to get his revenge on the one who killed Legto, Rudo reluctantly becomes a janitor to fight his way back up and out of the Abyss.
___
**Additional Links:**
- Alternative Official English: [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10010/episode/325146) (US Only)
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: The False Report of Weather Forecaster Amano Wakaru-kun
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Tonari no Seki no Yankee Shimizu-san ga Kami o Kuroku Sometekita
description:
"I dyed my hair black for you... so notice me."

Shimizu-san, the delinquent highschool girl who sits next to Hondo with her newly-dyed hair, gradually lowered her voice, slightly blushed, and laid her face down on the desk. After that, when Daiki Hondo talked with his friend about how he wanted be with a girl who can cook, the next day Hondo ended up partnered with Shimizu-san in cooking class, even though she used to always skip class. 

When Hondo mentioned that he wished he could try a girl's hand-made cooking, for some reason she brought two bentos to lunch the next day and shared one with Hondo…

This is a coming-of-age romantic comedy with Shimizu-san, a delinquent highschool girl who is clumsy in love.

---

- [Official Twitter (LN)](https://x.com/yanmizusan)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Osananajimi Kanojo no Morahara ga Hidoin de Zetsuen Sengen shite Yatta
description:
My childhood friend is also my girlfriend. A dream come true, right? Hell no. She insults me on a daily basis. She grinds my dignity into shreds and it takes a toll on my mental well-being. I can’t take it anymore.

So I’m left with no choice, I’m going to break up with her. In order to maintain my sanity, it’s the only option.

And thus, the story of my break up begins…
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: Peach Boy Riverside
description:
Sarutorine Aldike, or Sari, is a bright, cheerful princess who wants to go on an adventure because she is bored of her tiny little castle in the countryside. One day, a hoard of vicious demons known as "Oni" come knocking on her doorstep, threatening the lives of everyone in the Kingdom. Thankfully, they are saved by a lone traveler named Kibitsu Mikoto who slays these monsters with a mysterious "Peach Eye". Shocked by the dangers of the outside world, Sari decides to set off on a journey of her own. Little did she know that she will set in motion a chain of events that will come to determine the fate of this magical world.

Remake version of Cool Kyoushinsha’s popular webcomic of the same name.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Youchien Wars
description:
Welcome to Kindergarten Noir, an exclusive school catering to children of the global elite!

Rita, one of the teachers, has been on the hunt for a boyfriend but has had absolutely zero luck so far. One day, an assassin comes after one of the children... and he’s totally dreamy?!

Dive into this action-packed rom-com as it unfolds inside the world’s "safest" kindergarten!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Samurai, Mafia, Gore, Drama, Police

name: Shiba Inu Rooms
description: A newly built 1LDK apartment with rent of 4,800 yen! The reason is the "earthbound spirit of a Shiba Inu"...!?
tags: Animals, Comedy, Supernatural

name: Magokoro Scramble! What Lies in Your Heart?
description: Is this love natural instinct or fate? Koharu is born to a bloodline who can read people's minds. Although he told himself he would never open up to anyone besides his family, those plans are thrown off when he meets an eccentric girl by the name of Yuki. With their encounter, Koharu begins to fall deeper and deeper... into the pit of romance!
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Crossdressing
description:
Update : 18-September-2023

---

Part 2 Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/111246570)
tags: Romance, Crossdressing, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Sket Dance
description:
The hilarious misadventures of the "Sket Dan"; a group of high-schoolers who help out people as part of their club activity. Himeko, the hot-headed ex-delinquent with a soft spot for cute things and a taste for strange food. Switch, the brainy otaku who only talks via a computerized speech-application. And Bossun, the atypical leader of this looney bunch, with the amazing power to… concentrate very hard!

- Won the 55th annual Shogakukan Manga Award in 2009 for best shounen manga.  


---

- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **SKET DANCE** (2015)
