tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Mamono no Hanayome
description: Sumioka Hana has lived on her job without making her lover. One day when her overwork peaked, she fell off the platform of the station. When she noticed, she was transferred to the world of fairy tales she read when she was young. Hana, who was injured by herself, is saved by Flora, the main character of her picture book. She was, however, caught by her brother Nicholas, and she was sacrificed to a human-eating monster. When I thought she was sucked by a man who was a vampire, she suddenly got hot in her body ...?
tags: Monsters, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Vampires

name: I Became the Sacrificial Princess
description: Unknowingly swapped upon birth, Princess Brianna lost her identity as a princess and became a vagrant orphan. One day, her Imperial Father suddenly sought her back, reinstating her back to her rightful identity as the nation's princess. However, what awaited her was not a family reunion nor was it an extravagant life, but instead, she was to become a sacrifice for the god. Reincarnated into the body of Princess Brianna, our main character only wants to change her fate of death, yet realises that the best way to do so is to become the sacrifice. The only way she can live is by becoming the sacrifice, as hidden scheming along with its causes and effects, slowly unravel in front of her eyes. (Synopsis: Gourmet Scans)
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Survival, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Vinland Saga
description:
As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Vignette Witch! ~Joshi-ka no Mahou to Isekai Seikatsu~
description:
Recently, Hama Konpachi has been having nightmares about a ribbon growing out of his chest. That's not to mention all the strangers who mistake him for a girl, and the nickname "princess" that his classmates use. His childhood friend Shintarou says he worries too much about his femininity, but Konpachi just can't abandon his wish.  "I need to become a big, strong boy as soon as possible!"

But then one day, he's pulled into a strange book in the library and meets Marianne, the self proclaimed "strongest witch in history." She makes him an offer. "Will you become my pupil?" Magic is something that can only be used by "maidens," but somehow the male Konpachi has the potential?

But before Marianne can finish speaking, that ribbon from his dream begins growing and wraps Konpachi up! And when the ribbon comes undone, Konpachi has become... a girl?

Can Konpachi use his feminization magic to escape from the Vignette in this gender-bending fantasy story?
tags: Genderswap, Magic, Fantasy

name: Negai wo Kanaete Moraou to Akuma wo Shoukan Shitakedo, Kawaikattanode Kekkonshimashita ~Akuma no Niidzuma~
description:
Young orphaned adventurer tries summoning the devil to help his career as his own skills are lacking. The devil comes in form of a beauty who offers to grant him one wish. 
He’s so enamored with her appearance that he asks her the first thought in his mind, to be his wife. She blushingly agrees to his surprising demand to join in his future adventures together.
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Shota, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Shoukan Suru Sekai
description:
A brand-new series from the creator of *Blood Lad!*

When creatures, items, and even space itself can be summoned from other worlds, no one should want for anything…right?
Tokoyo, a boy who was abandoned to live with the Summoned in the Fantasy District aims to become a summoner to help all his Summoned friends.
When he arrives in Tokyo to attend the Summoning Academy, he’s told he’ll never make it by the first summoner he meets!
Tokoyo realizes he has a lot left to learn…and finds a new dream: to become the bridge between humanity and the Summoned!

- [Official English by Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/the-world-of-summoning/)
tags: Monsters, Action, Magic, Drama, School Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Toaru Majutsu no Index
description:
The story is set in a world where supernatural powers exist through science, and magic exists through religion.  
  
In the story, Touma Kamijou is an ordinary high school boy with terrible academic scores and a power called Imagine Breaker. Imagine Breaker can defeat any other power, but it also undermines Kamijou's own good luck. His Imagine Breaker's immense strength is literally immeasurable, so hapless Kamijou is listed at the supernatural level of 0. He happens to meet a girl in white hanging off his window balcony. The girl says she is being chased by sorcerers, and Kamijou learns that the girl is a Church of England nun whose memories have been forcibly replaced by Index-Librorum-Prohibitorum — the 103,000 forbidden texts of the Church.
tags: Sci-Fi, Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: GOLDEN MAN
description:
The city of freedom, Neo York, is targeted by villains day and night, but it's also home to the strongest hero, Golden Man!!! But one night, during a rescue operation at a fire at an abandoned factory, Golden Man suddenly disappears. Left in his place, a single amnesiac young man with the Golden Man suit in his hands... Who on Earth is he?
___
- **Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550668106005965940)
- [Official X](https://x.com/goldenman_comic)
tags: Action, Romance, Superhero, Mystery

name: Babel II: The Returner
description:
(from ebookjapan):

After 40 years, "Babel II" is miraculously back!

This time, the enemy is the world's most powerful military nation, the United States of America! 

A supernatural battle of modern warfare vs. Babel II breaks out...!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Animals, Mecha, Survival, Superhero, Adventure, Military, Drama, Aliens, Supernatural

name: The Girl Who Never Wins
description: Two female classmates engage in a playful game challenge involving games such as poker, shogi etc... with the loser forced to fulfill embarrassing requests. Confident at first, one girl quickly loses each round, leading to increasingly awkward and funny situations.
tags: Traditional Games, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color, Gyaru

name: The Wi-Fi Love Story
description:
Two lonely persons, two different fates. Him, a weak guy that suffers from albinism and permanent near-sighted. Her, an unwanted child, ostracized at school because she doesn't speak Vietnamese... In a twisted fate, they found themselves connected through Wi-Fi Network Names, but will their relationship last?

Omake arts done by [Flygombal](https://www.fiverr.com/zamrutzh)
Cover arts done by [Artiya](https://www.fiverr.com/kazisain)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Ishuzoku Joshi ni Marumaru Suru Hanashi
description: The only human student at an all-girl school is on a mission to sexually harass each of the monster girls.
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: A Galaxy Next Door
description:
After the death of his father, Kuga Ichirou, a shoujo mangaka fresh out of high school, has to take care of his two little siblings, Machi and Fumio, all by himself. Struggling to meet a deadline after his previous assistants get their manga debuts, he hires a new assistant through his editor. However, his life takes an unexpected turn after this new assistant is revealed to be a beautiful and mysterious girl…

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/a-galaxy-next-door/)
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Slice of Life, Aliens, Mystery, Tragedy

name: My Hero Academia - FUGUE (Doujinshi)
description: Pairing: Todoroki Shouto x Bakugou Katsuki
tags: Ghosts, Boys' Love, Magic, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural

name: My Maid, Miss Kishi
description: Kiichiro Hayase has a reputation as the wealthiest, hottest, most eligible bachelor in town. But as they say...behind every successful man is the maid who keeps him from tripping over his own two feet! Enter Miss Kishi, the most competent, professional maid around—and the only thing keeping from Kiichiro quite literally crashing and burning. He owes it all to her, but can he ever make it up to her? He's sworn to try... no matter how many things must get broken, scattered, or lost to do so!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: A Gangster Became a High Schooler
description:
"My dream is to enter college."

Kim Deuk-pal, an uneducated man whose lifelong wish was to attend school, dies in a car accident while trying to save Song Yi-heon, a boy who jumped off an overpass while driving, on a rainy day.

'I hope that little thing lives.'

When Kim Deuk-pal wakes up and finds out that the real Song Yi-heon tried to kill him due to school bullying and outing, he decides to take revenge and goes to the high school of his dreams. However, Choi Se-kyung, Song Yi-heon's unrequited love, begins to suspect Song Yi-heon

"You're not Song Yi-heon."
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Oda-chan to Akechi-kun
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Walking
description: Through the ordinary small events of his professional and personal life, a forty-year-old man lets himself go on impromptu escapades at random along the paths that the big city offers. This vagrant impulse soon takes on the appearance of a sentimental journey, punctuated by images of the walker's youth.
tags: Slice of Life

name: The Nine Heavens Swordmaster
description:
“He is the master of the Nine Heavens.”

Yeon Jeokha was the child of a second wife. Viciously bullied by his father’s first wife and his siblings, he was later imprisoned in a warehouse after his father died of illness…

It has been ten years since his escape after he had learned martial arts that were out of the world.

“I regard the Yeon Family with great bitterness.”

The unstoppable adventure of the sole successor of the Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Yeon Jeokha, begins now!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Majo Maid wa Joou no Himitsu o Shitte Iru
description: Liz, whose engagement is broken off due to her mysterious power to see the future is hired as a maid by Her Majesty, Queen Schriess of Lynphilia. Her Majesty is neither married, nor has an heir, and her five younger brothers have started a struggle for succession. But, Liz ended up finding out, finding out that the queen whom everyone wishes to have a prompt wedding for the sake of the future hides a big secret.
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Reverse Harem, Magic, Fantasy

name: Crimson Grimoire
description: Oomugi Wakaba inherits a mansion from her late great-grandmother, an expert pen artist. Within a hidden room, she meets the mysterious blue-eyed girl wrapped in crimson chains, Red Riding Hood. Together with the strongest beast, she comes to learn about the world of magic, witches and grimoires.
tags: Action, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Detective Conan
description: Shinichi Kudo is a high school detective who sometimes works with the police to solve cases. During an investigation, he is attacked by members of a crime syndicate known as the Black Organization. They force him to ingest an experimental poison, but instead of killing him, the poison transforms him into a child. Adopting the pseudonym Conan Edogawa and keeping his true identity a secret, Kudo lives with his childhood friend Ran and her father Kogoro, who is a private detective.
tags: Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Police, Mystery

name: 30 Minute Sisters AROUND!
description:
"30MS 4-panel comic begins!"
Enjoy the relaxed everyday life of the sisters ✨

Official 4Koma posted on the 30 Minutes Sisters Twitter: https://x.com/30msisters
Also available on the Bandai Hobby Site: https://bandai-hobby.net/site/30minutes_sisters/extra/around/
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Dark Summoner to Dekiteiru
description: Amona, a dark summoner and demi-human who uses demonic powers, is the newest addition to the party of the uptight priest Roni. Everyone expected the two to dislike each other and to have nothing to do with each other. But to their surprise, on their first day together as an adventuring party, they had a one-night stand...!
tags: Monsters, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: I Am the Fated Villain
description:
Immediately after Gu Changge realized he had transgressed into a fantasy world, the world's protagonist, and fortune's chosen, vowed to take revenge on him. Envied by all, not only is the female lead head over heels for him, but he's also treated as a distinguished guest wherever he goes. Fortunately, Gu Changge's prestige and power are superior to everyone else's, so shouldn't it be easy to trample on a mere fortune's chosen?

Hold on… There’s a system dedicated to milking and harvesting the protagonist? Gu Changge smirked. “Seems like even fate wants me to fulfill my destiny as the villain of this world!”
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: 6-nin no Shinanai Shoujo to Kanarazu Shinu Unmei no Hito
description:
"I prayed to a god to have a girlfriend, and now I have to die and restart over and over again!?"

Follow the guy who is destined to die among the six heroines!
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Gomi Yashiki no Kamakura-san
description:
Exhausted by his job, Kamakura shut himself in a house overflowing with garbage.
But his time, which stopped on "that day", started moving forward once again when a neighbor he had never spoken to before stepped into his house.

A good-natured neighbor x a traumatised resident of a dirty room
Boys' love tale of rescue and rehabilitation drawn by a genius newcomer.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love

name: Splatoon
description: A serialization for the hit game Splatoon with manga-original characters featuring Team Blue's, and more specifically Goggles', antics.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Sports, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Adaptation

name: Not found
description: The Tokiwadai student council election is approaching. Shokuhou Misaki, one of the leading candidates, is in the midst of an election campaign in spite of her own expectations due to the people around her and the fate of being the head of the largest clique...!!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: The Possesive Tyrant and His Sleepy Cat
description:
I've found myself trapped in a mature-rated novel as a cursed cat, whose mere existence is believed to be harmful to the empire. This place has killed every cat in every alley all because of one prophecy...
The moment anyone finds me will be my last moment in this life.
"What's this?"
Before I could even think of escaping, the male lead, who's fated to become a mad tyrant, effortlessly snatches me up.
tags: Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Marriage Toxin
description:
A hitman and a marriage swindler set out on the world’s most grueling battle for marriage!

Gero is a young man from a clan of hitmen, which has been in existence for hundreds of years. As someone who’s never gone to school and lived his life dealing in the dark side of the business, he considers himself to have “no prospects with women” and marriage as “something not for him.”

However, one day, in fear that their lineage would dissolve, his clan warns Gero that if he doesn’t marry and produce an heir, they would have no choice but to…force his little sister into doing “that.” Driven to his wits’ end, Gero asks the target of his work, a marriage swindler, to…

------
- [Official English Volumes at Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/marriage-toxin)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, Delinquents

name: I’m the Max-Level Newbie
description:
Kang Jinhyeok, a gaming streamer and content creator, is the only person who has cleared the game, [Tower of Trials]. However, as the game’s popularity declines, it becomes increasingly difficult for him to continue making a living as a content creator. Jinhyeok prepares to end his 11-year-long relationship with the game and say goodbye to his humble group of subscribers. But on that very day, the Tower of Trials appears in reality with a message saying that humanity will perish unless all players clear each floor within 90 days.

Jinhyeok, who knows the game better than anyone, decides to use his knowledge to his advantage and dominate the tower. 

"It’s time to show everyone what a hardcore gamer can do!"
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Superhero, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Sono Akuyaku Kizoku, Mama Heroine ga Suki Sugiru ~Shinshi na Doryoku de Saikyou to Nari Fuguu na Oshi Chara Tasukemakuru~
description:
The mom characters that appear in the game are all unfortunate sub-heroines who always get bad ending routes. “Why… Why does such a cute mom have to die?!“ Even though the protagonist tried very hard to request a route where they get saved, all of his efforts were in vain, making him spend his days in frustration. Then, he suddenly gets reincarnated into the world of MamaFan on a certain day. …However, he gets reincarnated as a villainous aristocrat who’s got nothing but the worst routes. This guy, who’s crazy about mom characters — his fulfilling days of saving his beloved mom characters and his journey to create his harem full of plump women are about to begin!

---
**Additional Links:**
- Alt Official Raw: [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/71300)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Video Games, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy

name: Gyaru ni Koisuru 5 Byou Mae Anthology Comic
description:
"You’re bound to fall in love when a gal is kind to you!". Despite dressing flamboyantly with a smidgin of lewdness sprinkle in, these gals occasionally show a pure side that will leave you mesmerized and-?

This is an Anthology collection of 6 chapters:
-Don’t seduce me, Sakihara-san! (by Kazawa Youhei)
-Kiyokawa-san is definitely a gyaru! (by saku)
-The gyaru childhood friend wants to give a warm welcome! (by Urano Ritsu)
-The gyaru likes ramen! (by Hidari Ude)
-Munching ♡ Kanna-chan ~A recipe for making gyaru fall in love with you~ (by Noki Kuzuri)
-The inexperienced gyaru asks for her teacher’s lessons (by Kamon Shoumi)

Cover illustration: Kazawa Youhei
tags: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, School Life, Gyaru

name: Becoming a Witch in a World Full of Monster Stories
description:
Day 1: Recently my eyes seem to be a bit off, always seeing strange things. Wait, the cabinet seems to be moving, I'll go check it out.
......
Day 13: I see them! Damn! Why is this world full of monsters!?
......
Day 101: There's nothing to be afraid of anymore! Donning a witch's gown, I've become a monster myself!
tags: Genderswap, Action, Long Strip, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: “Okaeri, Papa”
description: A high school girl is trying to get obsessively close to her kind stepdad. Even going as far as watching him in bed with her mom.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Incest, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: The Café Terrace and Its Goddesses
description:
Kasukabe Hayato has been accepted to Tokyo U on his first try. Receiving news of his grandmother's death, he returns to his childhood home, Cafe Terrace Familia, for the first time in three years to find five strange girls there who claim to be "Grandma's Family"! Hayato's unexpected life in a seaside town with these five girls of fate begins here!
___
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10009/episode/319474) (U.S. Only)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Mystery

name: Unmei Dakara Akiramete?
description: Taichi, who moved to Tokyo and dreamed of meeting his "soulmate" on his first day at university, suddenly fails miserably on a dating app! He is saved by a mysterious handsome man when he is in trouble at a hotel, and things are going well... or so he thinks, but they break up just before the two of them get together. While he is feeling frustrated about being toyed with, he meets the "mysterious handsome man" again, now known as Kiryu Chisato, who is actually a senior at the same university as Taichi!? A foolish DK who tends to go out of control and a super cool senior who is good at paying attention, are these mismatched two destined to be together? Or...?
tags: Romance, Boys' Love

name: Flawed Almighty
description: Do good or go to hell. The conditions of his new curse seem simple enough for once-hopeful hoodlum Jeonji Kim. Or so it seems when his perky guardian angel shows up on his doorstep one day and heals his limp. But will simply going through the motions of helping people be enough to appease a petty god with a grudge?
tags: Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Cuddle: Juujin Omegaverse
description:
For the sake of those we love, we take turns to lie

Beryl, an omega who lost his husband and was burdened with debt, decides to have an arranged marriage with an aristocratic Alpha in order to protect the house of his memories.
However, the beautiful beastman Shia appears and sets out conditions for him to take his turn. To enter the same school, to become a servant,
And - good physical compatibility. Shia is arrogant and throws Beryl around, but he also has to protect him.
There's a reason... Also includes twin brother Hugo x servant Theo!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Nakayoku Shiyou ne Otonari-san
description:
A nightlife worker and a public server, two opposite poles living as neighbours. Before noticing it, they started spending time together and, unintentionally, they start caring for the other.

Mukojima, a police officer who has some suspicions towards his neighbour, lives alone in an apartment which reminds you of the Showa Era. One night, Mukojima faces a crisis inside his apartment and the one who came to his rescue was none other than Mikoshiba, his neighbour. By taking his invitation, Mukojima ends up in his neighbour’s apartment, where they share some drinks.
tags: Boys' Love

name: Papa x Papa - α To Ω De Sorezore Yattemasu
description:
Blue-collar omega Kosuke lives with his alpha author/homemaker husband, Haruka, and their two children, Marin and Yosuke. Between chores, child-rearing, and being an omega, Kosuke has his work cut out for him. But despite the difficulties and craziness of everyday life, each day is filled with joy, all thanks to Haruka’s overflowing love…!




A lovingly crafted Omegaverse Family BL about married life.
tags: Boys' Love

name: Tonari no Kumazawa-kun
description: What I want is not a place to fit (in), but a place to eat
tags: Oneshot, Drama, Web Comic

name: Nobunaga no Chef
description: Ken is a modern-day chef who wakes up one morning in war-torn 16th century Japan. Faced with an impossible situation, he does what he does best – he cooks. Soon, word of his wonderful food reaches the capital, and the ears of warlord Oda Nobunaga, who immediately orders Ken to cook for him. What will happen to Ken as he finds himself stumbling around in an era he doesn't belong?
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Samurai, Drama, Cooking, Tragedy

name: Sweet Home Mofumofu Tanuki Kyoudai to Kazoku ni Narimasu
description:
The corporate slave meets a pair of fluffy brothers?!
Hinata Chihiro is the so-called “corporate slave” who works for a black company. Today, after buying a convenience store box meal, as usual, he arrived home late at night just to find a lost kid wandering near his house?! Chihiro then welcomes the adorable small tanuki, Rio, and his tsundere older brother who hates humans, Itta. And that’s how his life with the fluffy tanuki brothers, who were driven out of their natural habitat, begins…!
tags: Animals, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama

name: The Political Broadcast of the Onee-Sho-Tou Party (Tokyo Governor Election)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Loving Summer Sky
description: Baek Gihu, who loves the sky more than people, takes pictures of the sky with his camera. One summer day, a girl named "Haneul"—her name means "Sky"—transfers to his class and sits in the seat next to him.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Breaking Into The Body of The Emperor's Daughter
description:
After transmigrating to another world as a wealthy young master, Su Changqing only wanted to live a low-profile life as a rich second-generation heir and enjoy his days in comfort. However, his plans are suddenly disrupted when his family faces an unexpected crisis, and he accidentally discovers the Emperor's secret - that she is actually a woman.

While he initially feared the female Emperor would stop at nothing to silence him, to his surprise, she instead becomes interested in his mysterious ability to transform his appearance. She wants him to become her male body double. What Su Changqing never expected was that being the female Emperor's male substitute would mean he has to visit the imperial harem on his very first day. His peaceful life completely falls apart from that moment on...
tags: Genderswap, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description: A poor high school boy, Izuki Tomonari, got caught up in a kidnapping attempt on Hinako Konohana, a young lady from one of Japan's largest conglomerates. On the surface, Hinako appears to be a brilliant and beautiful young woman, but in reality, she is a lazy girl with no life skills. However, due to family reasons, Hinako has to play the role of the "perfect young lady" at school. Wanting to protect her, Izuki took on the job of caring for her. Eventually, Hinako began to spoil Izuki with all her might. "I don't want... Izuki to leave my side right now." This is a love story that begins beyond the master-servant relationship featuring a princess with a beautiful facade.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation

name: BTOOOM!
description:
Sakamoto Ryouta is an unemployed 22-year-old who lives with his mother. In the real world, there may be nothing really special about him, but online, he's one of the world's top players of the combat game "BTOOOM"!  
  
One day, he awakes in what appears to be a tropical island, though he has no memory of how or why he has come to be there. While wandering around, Ryouta sees someone and calls out for help. The stranger responds by throwing a bomb at him! Now Ryouta realizes both that his life is in danger, and that he has somehow been trapped in a real-life version of his favorite game! Will Ryouta be able to survive long enough to figure out how and why he ended up here?  
  


---
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama

name: Ankoku Delta
description:
In the otherworldly city of Delta, its grotesque residents sustain themselves by consuming human energy...!

This gritty, action-packed tale marks the first full series from the up-and-coming talent who captivated audiences with the one-shots “Death Salmon Hunter” and “Composter Funeral”!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Supernatural

name: Tensei Akuma no Saikyou Yuusha Ikusei Keikaku
description: Kakyu, a former Japanese who was reincarnated as a low-level devil in hell, has acquired unparalleled strength over two thousand years. However, unexpectedly, he is exiled to another “different world,” liberated from the harsh underworld. Kakyu, who was enjoying his dream slow life, witnesses the village he owes everything to being attacked. Despite rushing to the scene, the village is annihilated. Picking up the only surviving baby, Alus, Kakyu resolves to raise Alus to become the happiest person in the world to repay the debt…!?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Tokyo 卍 Revengers: Baji Keisuke Kara no Tegami
description:
“Tokyo Revengers“ official spin-off!

The story of Keisuke Baji and Chifuyu Matsuno, from their first encounter to their separation. Chifuyu Matsuno, the First Division vice-captain, has not yet accepted the death of Keisuke Baji, the First Division captain, who died in the battle against Valhalla. At that time, a letter from Baji before his death arrives at his hand.

---

tags: Action, Comedy, Drama, Delinquents, Tragedy

name: Kuni o Owareta Ryuushi-san, Hirowareta Ringoku de Ukkari Musou Shite Shimau. ~Jakushou Kokka ga Tairiku Saikyou no Ryuu no Rakuen ni Naru made~
description:
Breed, an old dragon master, is not only fired from his job but also exiled from his country… but the dragons love him and follow him!?
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [MagaPoke](https://pocket.shonenmagazine.com/episode/2550912964695382195)
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Military, Fantasy

name: Major 2nd
description: A sequel to the successful baseball manga MAJOR by the same author. The series follows Gorou's son Daigo.
tags: Sports, Drama

name: I Won't Touch You Anymore
description: In their high school days Shiraishi would tease her classmate Arashi constantly always touching his shaved head. Now, many years later, Shiraishi finds herself enthralled with a rising celebrity that she sees on TV an in magazines. This celebrity being none other that Arashi, her former classmate, now with long grown out hair. She wanders the streets hoping that by some happenstance she might once again meet him and be able to tell him the things she's kept in her heart for so many years. A tale of lost opportunities and love separated by time...
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Tamanokoshi Goyoui Shimashita
description:
"Playing the role of a rich man's lover is fucking impossible."

Aoi's family broke up afterhe graduated from middle school. He now makes a living by staging crashes, but fate would dictate that he eventually got caught by a luxury car. Inami got out of the car, unfazed by Aoi's pretense and screams of pain. Instead, he offered Aoi a deal he could not refuse, literally, to pretend to be his lover. Aoi starts living at Inami's appartment and the training begins, from English conversation to table manners. Every day presents Aoi with a new experience!
tags: Boys' Love, Adaptation

name: Gap Couple
description: This is a story about a man and a woman who met each other under false pretenses.
tags: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Ouji-kei Kanojo no Akuheki
description: A romantic comedy between a prince-type girl and a girl-faced boy.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Gun-Ota ga Mahou Sekai ni Tensei shitara, Gendai Heiki de Guntai Harem wo Tsukucchaimashita!?
description: Hotta Youta is killed while returning home from work on a cold evening. He wakes up being carried by a bunny-eared woman.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Anmitsu Hoippu! Watashi ga Inakucha Dame na Kanojo no Hanashi
description:
"I can't live without you!"

A cohabiting yuri couple, Anzu and Mitsuki, have a relationship where they simply can’t live without each other! A lighthearted and sweet Girls' Love comedy that depicts the lovey-dovey everyday lives of this co-dependent couple. ♪
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: It's not Ba, it's Va
description:
Choboraunyopomi x Vanguard

The crazy unit comedy four-panel story begins!
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Aliens

name: Akuma de Kore wa Koi janai!
description: Aguri, is a young girl who is a demon apprentice. She comes to the human world after her teacher assigned her "to make a human fall in love with her". She thinks it will be easy since she is quite famous in the demons' world, but her target, Kyou-kun, is much better than her...
tags: Demons, Romance, Fantasy

name: Oshi ni Amagami
description:
Hina is a reclusive otaku vampire. She wants to move to a sacred place for otaku life, but a boy who looks exactly like her favorite vampire lives next door! And this boy seems to have blood that attracts vampires from all over the world...? A bloody love comedy between an otaku vampire and a slightly tongue-tied handsome man!

Note: Adapted from the author’s oneshot that was released in Hana to Yume 10-11/2022 combined issue.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Vampires

name: Curves of Her and Me
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Shounin Skill de Maoujou no Kouryaku wo Mezasu ~Isekai Tenishita no de Saikyou Item to Tookujutsu de Ikinuku to ni shita~
description:
One day, Sota, a university student, is summoned to another world! Moreover, after being summoned, he was mistaken for a hero and imprisoned in the Demon King's Castle, where he was in a desperate situation...! Sota gets through the predicament with his natural skill, but for some reason he ends up solving the embarrassing problem of Fafnir, a super beautiful demi-human...!? 

Win the hearts of the demi-human girls living in Demon King's Castle and aim to escape from Demon King's Castle! A fantasy romantic comedy that opens up a different world with its natural business spirit, begins!
tags: Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Baby Pharmacist Princess
description:
Just by clicking the wrong button, I ended up possessing the game's princess character, "Cherise"! Yoon Che-ri, a graduate of a pharmaceutical university. Like the so-called 'hardcore gamer' she is, She unexpectedly appears in the VR game she plays every day. A red rabbit puts her in debt to the game, owing 10 billion gems...

If she doesn't repay the debt of 10 billion gems, she won't be able to log out?

♡ Surprise Quest Triggered ♡

User's ability confirmed as "Pharmaceuticals," customized settings have been completed accordingly. Future quests will focus on "Pharmaceuticals."

[Confirm] ◀

Huh? Why do I feel excessively capable...? If things go on like this, I might be able to return soon!
Will Cherise really be able to settle the 10 billion gem debt and return to her original world?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: I Became a Doting Father
description:
I've become a single father!

24-year-old Juwon Lee works part-time at a convenience store and lives alone in his small apartment. One day his uncle passes away and leaves behind a 4-year-old daughter, the cute little Yeondu. Instead of letting her be sent to an orphanage, Juwon steps up and decides to be her new guardian.
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Snake in the Office
description:
A naga starts a new job in a new town.

Posted with [author permission](https://twitter.com/DanielLCarrier/status/1769140595296207140).

---
Alternative Official English: [TheDuckWebComics](https://www.theduckwebcomics.com/Snake_in_the_office/5771894/)
tags: Office Workers, 4-Koma, Monster Girls, Web Comic

name: Home Plate's Villain
description: To meet his dead parents again, Hong Bin made a deal with the Baseball Fairy, who agreed to return him to the past if he achieved 3,000 career hits as a baseball player. And at the age of 40, Bin the baseball legend hits his last ball and goes back in time. After reuniting with his family, Bin decides to pursue his old dream of joining the major league. The only issue is that he's lost all his old skills as a pro! But will his past experiences be enough to help this legend fulfill his new goal?
tags: Long Strip, Sports, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I Became the Tyrant's Chambermaid
description:
When Lee Chaerin kicks the bucket, she's whisked into a dark fantasy novel as Rose Estania, a chambermaid at the mercy of the tyrant crown prince, Kalix Forsman. Armed with nothing but her real-world hotelier skills and a diary from the real Rose full of cryptic hints but no escape route, she's forced to navigate a dangerous world teeming with Kalix's enemies. Can she keep his wrath in check, evade death, and find her way back to reality before it's too late?

---
Your Highness- That is absurd!!

"Your Highness, did you just cough-!!!"

I'm doomed! I've been transmigrated to another world! As an extra chambermaid from a 19+ impoverished novel from the early 2000s! For now, I'm trying my best not to upset the male lead's temper so I can survive and return home...

"Your Highness! Please have mercy!"

"Your Highness! That is such an absurd thing to say!"

"Could you please stop with that damn antiquated language?!"

Seems like the etiquette here is a bit different from what I know...

Anyway, after defeating an assassin and taking an arrow for him, I feel like I've become somewhat closer to the male lead.

The ominous journal that seems to understand my words, and the male lead, who orders me around, seems a bit fishy too. Can I survive here and return home?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Japanese History Detective Conan
description:
Conan and the Detective Boys are asked to help kids who have been send backwards in time. These "Time Drifters" explore different eras of Japanese history in search of the Time Stones that will help them return to the present day.  
  
[Official Website](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/pr/ntconan/)
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Comedy, Anthology, Crime, Adventure, Drama, Police, Mystery

name: Suguru-kun Fight!
description:
When Suguru, an ordinary high school student, comes home as usual, he bumps into his older sister's friend, Noriyuki! 

Deciding at first glance that the huge and rugged-looking Noriyuki is the type he doesn't like, Suguru leaves the house to escape from him, but for some reason Noriyuki starts to pester him persistently...!?
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life

name: The Artistic Genius of Music Is the Reincarnation of Paganini
description: The Rebirth of Paganini, Joo-won Moon. He was once a gifted violinist, but due to an injury, he gradually distanced himself from music and lived the life of a regular high school student. “I don’t pursue music.” However, perhaps the irony of fate… Joo-won Moon accidentally transferred to the music class of an arts high school, he picked up the violin… Will Joo-won Moon be able to overcome his psychological trauma? And is there a chance for him to be reborn as a true violinist?
tags: Long Strip, School Life, Web Comic, Music, Full Color

name: Hero Eden
description: Panthera, a totalitarian state where both brutal oppression and despair exist. Heroes who resisted the government were branded as traitors and executed. Now, the son of a fallen hero, Eden, must face the question: Can he survive in Panthera? In the near future, after a second nuclear war, the surviving humans continue to live in a small world called Panthera. However, the intense control and exploitation by the government has caused immense suffering, gradually turning various districts into slums. The “heroes” who once defied the regime and claimed to be superheroes were ruthlessly eliminated by cyborg killers under the government’s command. The few surviving heroes now hide their identities, barely scraping by in the slums. Disillusioned and filled with grief and hatred, people who once had a glimmer of hope in these heroes have now lost faith and stopped waiting for any saviors. One day, a seemingly ordinary high school student named Eden, who is frequently bullied by his classmates, experiences a “Soma Awakening,” a unique trait of superheroes. However, haunted by the memory of his father’s gruesome death as a hero, Eden rejects the life of a hero, longing for a normal life with his mother. Yet, the increasing oppression of the government and the threats to his only family make this difficult. In such a world, will Eden choose to become a hero and stand against the forces oppressing society? The journey of Eden—a beautiful yet scorched, intense yet chilling tale—begins.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Superhero, School Life, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Confessing My Love to Him, the Treacherous One
description: When Natalie went back in time after her death, her only desire was for revenge. Instead, she accidentally confessed to the most dangerous man in the empire?! Natalie, the only daughter of the Count, was tricked by her stepmother and stepsister into marrying an abusive scumbag before dying tragically. After going back in time, she decided to turn her back against them and prepared to interfere with her stepsister’s love for the young master of the Duke’s mansion, Eli. But what she didn’t expect was for an accident to occur, and she ended up confessing to his uncle instead?! Help, this man is notorious for being difficult to deal with! Is it too late now to withdraw the confession?
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Dai Uchuu Kaijuu Dai Bouei Taisen
description: Not found
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Washi Jijii, Yowai Rokujuu ni Shite Tenpu no Sai ni Kizuku
description: In a world where special abilities called "skills" manifest, sixty-year-old Diru suddenly gains power one day. Unfortunately, it's a combat-focused ability that he struggles to handle now that his physical strength has declined. "I’m already an old man...," he says, but despite his age, he’s filled with determination to make the most of his second chance. With his natural talent for charming people and his slightly overzealous sense of justice and kindness, he embarks on a new life, savoring it to the fullest. A man over sixty begins his second life—a life that's not fast but not too slow, gentle yet intense!
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Golden Print
description:
I wanted to design!

A dream I have had since I was 12 years old and have nurtured since then. For thirty years I worked hard, not missing a single day, but the reality is that I'm a construction site manager constructing buildings for other people. If I hadn't made that choice back then... Would I have become an architectural designer? Thirty years after all that, a miracle happened to me.

I went back to my university school days 20 years ago, in 2010.
I'm 22 years old, but with 20 years of field experience, I'm going fulfil my dream of being an architectural designer and make world famous designs of my own!
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Shingeki no Kyojin - Mikasa o Ishiki Shichau Eren no Hanashi (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Post-Apocalyptic, Doujinshi, Web Comic

name: Taida na Akujoku Kizoku ni Tensei shita Ore, Scenario o Bukkowashitara Kikakugai no Maryoku de Saikyou ni Natta
description:
I've been reincarnated as the villainous noble Weiss from my favorite academy game, and the fate that awaits me is nothing but the worst possible ruin, with no salvation.

I absolutely have to avoid that at all costs!

Then the only way out is to gain overwhelming power that even surpasses the game's protagonist and become the strongest!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/69646)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Garbage Brave: Isekai ni Shoukan Sare Suterareta Yuusha no Fukushuu Monogatari
description:
While on a regular school day, Tsukuru along with his classmates got transported to another world.  
  
However, at the other side of the summoning there was a hero's auction, where each nation would bid for the heroes to defeat the demon kings of each territories.  
  
While his classmates received cheat jobs and got auctioned quickly Tsukuru got the useless job "Chef," as no nation bid for him, he got thrown out through a transfer gate. At the other side of the gate was a territory dominated by strong monsters…  
  
As he manages to survive the monster's attacks while nearly dying, Tsukuru goes forward on the path of becoming the strongest!  

(Series went on Hiatus starting in September 2024 due to artist's maternity leave)

---

[Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2248el/)  


---
tags: Monsters, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Komada-san wo Komarasetai
description: Komada is a short high school girl who is constantly troubled with something. Her junior, Kagai, who is big in various ways, is always playing with her and annoying Komada! However, there is a reason why Kagai annoys her, and that is simply because... The more you love someone, the more you want to annoy them!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Maimaimaigoen
description:
### **Sanrio's first ever innocent suspense comic!**

New teacher Okada Yuu and his senior, Ms. Rumi are on a field trip with their 16 preschool students to Sanrio Puroland. But suddenly they wander into a mysterious and horrific theme park called "Yuropia"! Amid their confusion, ominous Frog Egg mascots announce that the only way for them to escape is to "conquer the attractions and gather 10 medals." Will they be able to get out of "Yuropia" in one piece?! This is a story for "those of you" who "carry pain in your heart"―.

©2021 SANRIO CO., LTD. TOKYO, JAPANⒽ
tags: Psychological, Survival, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Azure Legacy
description: Meng Chuan witnessed his mother killed before his eyes, so he trained very hard hoping to one day avenge her death. But his peaceful days were broken as his wedding engagement being called off, an invasion by foreign forces, the sanctuary fallen into enemy hands… In order to protect the people of Ning City, he picked up his sword and vowed to be the strongest. This is a heavy responsibility and a long journey…
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Administrator Kang Jin Lee
description: Is he crazy? Or just the typical attention seeker? Lee Kwang-Jin, who doesn't understand the difference in people, and his Master Kwak No who's the one helping him to understand the differences of people. A warm human story of a student and his Master.
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Aura of a Genius Actor
description: Shin Yoomyeong is an unknown actor who kept on chasing his dream despite playing minor roles for 15 years because of his weak presence. One day, he meets the Acting Spirit, Yeonghwi, who he signs a contract with, and begins to shine in his career. In fact, he was always an acting genius,  but he was overshadowed by his weak presence. He creates a perfect character for every work he takes and slowly raises to stardom. However, Yeonghwi, who he saw as his benefactor, starts to seem suspicious…
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Moto Kouzou Kaiseki Kenkyuusho no Isekai Boukentan
description: Kaoru Mochimizu, a 30-year-old female research scientist who studied the three-dimensional structure of everything. However, one day, she died in an earthquake and met a goddess. Having covered for her kouhai during the earthquake, she was allowed to reincarnate in another world with two skils. Kaoru Mochimizu is now Charlotte Elbaran, the eldest daughter of a duke in the Kingdom of Elida, on Planet Garland. With memories of her past life, and taking advantage of the skills "Structural Analysis" and "Structural Editing," she will live a good life.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Okiraku Ryoushu no Tanoshii Ryouchi Bouei
description: A man was reincarnated as Van, a boy of noble birth, who grew up to become a child prodigy through hard work. But when it was discovered that he possessed "production magic," he was immediately relegated to a remote village. However, his magic, which was called useless, turned out to be truly extraordinary, capable of producing anything as long as he had the right ingredients! With the knowledge from his previous life and the overpowered magic, the small, poor village will grow to become into a great city.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Dang Clan’s Swordmaster Heir Just Wants a Normal Life
description: The Dang clan of Sacheon, once renowned for its poison and hidden weapons, is now on the path to its demise. That is, until Yeonmyeung Dang, an outcast boy of the clan, awakens by recollecting the memories of his past life as the 'god of swords' who devoted his life to mastering the sword. Will the boy be able to protect his family and fulfill his dream of living a normal life?
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Futari Solo Camp
description:
Kinokura Gen loves camping solo. He enjoys the quiet solitude away from the hustle and bustle of the city, and being able to appreciate nature all by himself. But on one camping trip, his solitude is broken by the appearance of Kusano Shizuku, a young woman who wanted to go solo camping by herself, but is ill-prepared and completely out of her league. While he tries to to get her to go home so he can camp in peace, she refuses, and stubbornly insists on accompanying him on future camping trips until she's ready to camp solo. Thus Gen and Shizuku's days of solo camping together begin.

**Note**: "Part 1" concluded in February 2023 with 3 extra chapters due to start in April as the series is moving magazines from Kodansha Evening to Kodansha Morning.

The series resumed its publication in December 2023.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Fuguu na Ossan no Kekkai Jutsu Musou
description:
“The barrier mage’s job is done, right? Then, why not join the Kingdom’s Royal Mage Corps?”
For the last 30 years, a protective barrier shielded the kingdom from the Demon King’s forces. Initially maintained by a hundred barrier mages, their numbers dwindled until only one, Blake, was left to uphold it. At last, came the day when a hero defeated the Demon King. But, in this peaceful world, barrier mages were now considered “useless”— a bottom-rung job with no real purpose.
Blake was at a loss on what to do until he received an unexpected invitation to the capital from said hero. Alice, the Hero who he once saved, encouraged him to join an elite squad reserved for only the best in the kingdom. She insisted that, if he could prove his worth, even those who doubted him would have to yield.
“Barrier mages are useless!”
“Then, all he needs to do is show his strength, right?”
The story unfolds as this underestimated middle-aged man, unaware of his unparalleled skills, wields and strengthens his barrier magic! The tale of a fantasy hero’s rise in another world begins here!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy

name: Uragirareta Boukensha, Andeddo Toshite Yomigaeri Musou Suru
description:
(skills). A power humans can only receive once from god, which is used to fight against monsters.
Chrome, who aspired to be an adventurer while owning a skill that is useless in combat, is unable to throw away his ambition, and is despised for his inability, so he is left in charge of menial tasks and chores for his career.
But, when he is running away from a monster as a decoy, he loses his life. But at that time, his skill activates. The skill (Revival). For one time only, he can come back from the dead, and Chrome miraculously revives as a Skeleton monster, a “Wight”.
Chrome, who despairs at his new body, finds out that as monsters evolve, their appearance changes in accordance, so he decides to evolve as fast as possible. Believing he can regain his human appearance, Chrome spends his days hunting monsters. As a by-product, Chrome gains a multitude of skills, whereas a human can only ever hold one––!
Powerful monster abilities and the intelligence of a human. Overcoming adversity with chance, Chrome once again aims to be the strongest adventurer!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Magic, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Hazure Waku no [Joutai Ijou Skill] de Saikyou ni Natta Ore ga Subete o Juurin Suru made
description:
Mimori Touka has always been something of a background character in his high school. So when he and his classmates are summoned to a fantasy land and gifted with incredible skills, it seems like the perfect opportunity to make a name for himself. The only problem? Mimori’s skills are abysmal at best, and he’s banished to a deadly dungeon. But as he begins to test these new abilities, he discovers just how powerful he’s become. Can Mimori fight his way back to exact revenge?!
___
**Compositor:** [Uchiuchi Keyaki](https://mangadex.org/author/3b71274c-d84b-4505-bed0-1ee2adda188f)
**Character Designer:** [KWKM](https://mangadex.org/author/d7705978-2785-490d-8292-71738dc20ef3)
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ore Igai Dare mo Saishu Dekinai Sozai na no ni "Sozai Saishuritsu ga Hikui" to Pawahara suru Osananajimi Renkinjutsushi to Zetsuen shita Senzoku Madoushi, Henkyou no Machi de Slow Life wo Okuritai.
description: Lloyd, the assistant mage of the genius alchemist Ruby, has an abnormally low chance of gathering materials for alchemy use. Hence, he is treated as baggage and is made to be the bottom of the entire country’s joke. Everyday is a day he is scolded by Ruby. It’s become too much of a despairing environment that he’s come to hate it. And so, he finally decided to part ways with her. However, unbeknownst to everyone was that the materials Lloyd gathered were all high-grade materials no one else could gather. The mage, who was treated as "incompetent" and saw himself as such, now aims for an ideal easygoing life!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Gokudo Parasites
description: Mai Shintani, who works at the Kitakabane Police Station was suddenly assigned in the "Organized Crime Countermeasures Division", commonly known as the "Sotai". Immediately after that, she gained influence within her jurisdiction. The leader of expanding yakuza faction "Tatsygamigumi" Shogo Mikuro mysteriously disappeared. There's a tension in the conflict between cases of opposing Yakuza groups. And for some reason, Shintani is looking composed at the northern police station. Behind it is an absurd shocking truth?!
tags: Action, Psychological, Comedy, Mafia, Drama, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Chouten Hoshokusha ~Chikyuu Saijaku no Ore ga Uchuu Saikyou~
description: Earth's weakest becomes the universe's strongest with cheat abilities–!? While all of humanity awakens to their powers due to the invasion of extraterrestrial life forms (EVA), the protagonist Vi is the only one without abilities. Just as he's about to die, devoured by an EVA, a cheat-level ability activates… A highly anticipated modern battle fantasy!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kill Six Billion Demons
description: Not found
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Full Clearing Another World under a Goddess with Zero Believers
description: After his class gets buried alive on their way back from a school trip, 18 year old Makoto Takatsuki and class get transported to another world. Unlike the rest of his classmates who gained powerful abilities, Makoto barely gains any power. "This other world is unbalanced!". With the threat of a great Demon Lord rising again and a goddess with zero followers, can Makoto make his way through this new world and clear the isekai!?
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kakkou no Iinazuke
description: Nagi Umino was mistakenly switched at birth, and now attends a prestigious private high school. One day, he has a chance meeting with Erika Amano, an incredibly high society highschool girl who claims she's on the way to meet her fiancé, and who asks/forces him to be her fake boyfriend. Neither of them, at the time, understood the significance of their meeting for Erika was the girl Nagi was switched at birth with, and Nagi was Erika's soon-to-be fiancé!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: You’re So Sloppy, Hotta-sensei
description: Makoto Kuribayashi is your typical high schooler with a not-so-typical after-school gig as a housekeeper. His latest client? None other than his school’s most popular teacher, the gorgeous Rumiko Hotta. But Hotta-sensei is hiding a dirty little secret: she's a total slob, the polar opposite of her flawless public image! Now, Makoto's got the unenviable task of cleaning up after her mess. Will his admiration for Hotta-sensei survive a dose of harsh reality in this irreverent comedy?
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Gunman
description:
The No.1 Hitman, Kim Gun, finds himself plunged into the world of martial arts due to a mysterious accident. To return to his original world, he must complete a mission called 'Martial Arts Conquest.'

With a total of 2 guns, Kim Gun's adventure to subdue the unfamiliar martial arts world begins.
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Isekai, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Onikirimaru
description:
There was once an oni mother who gave birth to a human-looking child. Instead of an oni's horn, this child was born with a sword in hand called the "Onigirimaru" or Oni Slayer. He has no name and is only referred to by the name of his sword. Though he appears human, he is pure oni.  
  
Believing that he will become human once all of his kind vanished from the world of humans, he sets out on his destiny to slay all of his kind. Even now, in the mother world of Japan, he is still out there slaying oni.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Haikyuu!! - Omega no Kodomotachi Kurotsuki / Omegaverse; side Ω (Doujinshi)
description: Tsukishima has gone into his first heat in Kuroo's presence. Then he has to think about what he wants from Kuroo.
tags: Oneshot, Boys' Love, Doujinshi

name: Pokemon - Festival of Champions (Doujinshi)
description:
The Indigo League: the ultimate challenge for Pokémon trainers. Structured like a massive tournament, anyone eager to show off their Pokémon can participate, from rookies to gym leaders to even the Elite Four themselves.  
  
This is the story of Red, Blue, and Green, three friends who decide to partake in the tournament.
tags: Action, Adventure, Doujinshi, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: VRMMO wo Kane no Chikara de Musou suru
description: Tsuwabuki Ichiro, the young master of the Tsuwabuki Conglomerate, is incredibly wealthy. When his cousin, Tsuwabuki Asuha, asks for his help in finding someone within a game, he descends upon the world of the next-generation VRMMO “Narrow Fantasy Online.” However, Ichiro, who won’t be satisfied unless he reaches the pinnacle in everything, begins to dominate the game world using his talent & financial power!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Ranma 1/2
description:
(from ebookjapan):

Soun was disappointed to find that Ranma was a girl. However, when Ranma got out of the bath, he turned into a boy and the panda turned into Ranma's father, Genma. The two had fallen into a fountain during their training in China, a fountain that turned them into a woman and panda respectively when they touched the water. 

The Tendo family is initially in turmoil, including Akane, who has become a prospective bride, as they face the troublesome duo who go back and forth between man and woman, human and panda, although they can be restored to their original state if they are bathed in hot water. 

This is the first volume of a new edition of the popular manga.


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/ranma-1-2)
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Supernatural

name: Lilia Pregnant The World End
description:
"The world will be destroyed if you have sex with the Demon King's daughter."

After defeating the Demon King and saving the other world, the hero Takahiro returns to the real world. One day, Lilia, the daughter of the Demon King, suddenly arrives at Takahiro's place, where he leads a peaceful life. Takahiro braces himself for revenge, but her goal is to bear the strong Takahiro's child...!?
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Bakuten Shoot Beyblade
description:
Tyson's on a mission to be the best Beyblader ever! But his enemies, the Blade Sharks, are super tough and they'll do anything to win! Tyson just ight have what it takes to win when he busts out with a new Beyblade given to him by a mysterious stranger. Now the Blade Sharks want his new Beyblade and they're prepared to use any dirty trick to get it! 


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media 
  
The following link is to AnimeNewsNetwork for all of the various manga, anime adaptions, sequels, and spinoffs:  
[Beyblade](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/manga.php?id=4062) (manga)
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Fantasy

name: Kingdom
description:
Millions of years have passed since the times of legends, when the worlds of man and gods were still the same. In these times it was the desires of man that moved the world. It is the era of the 500 year war: The warring states period. Kingdom is the story of a young boy named Shin who grew into a great general and all the trials and bloodshed that lead him there.  

---
  
- **Won the Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2013**
- **Earned a Guinness World Record on December 12, 2012 for Manga written by the most people. -Note- The record was due to its "Social Kingdom" campaign in which fans and other artists were given the task of redrawing the entire 26th volume.**

As of June 2022, Kingdom has over 90 million copies in circulation, making it one of the currently best-selling manga series of all time. 

Parution: Weekly Young Jump

---

**Officially Translated:**  
- In French by [Meian](https://www.meian-editions.fr/meian/licence/kingdom/1131)  
- In Italian by [J-pop](https://j-pop.it/it/fumetti/manga/kingdom.html)
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: The Idaten Deities Know Only Peace
description:
Hayato is a young deity with a foul mouth who has always heard legends about Demons that were sealed away about 800 years ago. Follow the epic saga of several young deities, who end up having to fight demons, humans and overcome several challanges.  
  
  
A remake of a web manga of the same name with new art by Cool-Kyou Shinja.
tags: Action, Demons, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Fantasy

name: Mannen D-rank no Chuunen Boukensha, Yotta Ikioi de Densetsu no Ken o Hikkonuku
description: Lucas has a hard life. In his mid-thirties, a mixture of failures has left him old and crippled, playing pack mule to a couple of young adventures. Then one day, he pulls a magic sword from a stone that tells him he has been chosen to become a hero. Given a youthful form, Lucas must use the power of the sword to vanquish evil and attain a massive harem.
tags: Action, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Revenge Of the Bloom Flower
description:
The scripture that brought a bloodstorm to Jianghu was the "Wisdom of the Secret Master," a legendary book that is said to hold the power to seize all the world's authority and wealth. Because of it, Woonseon lost all his loved ones overnight. 
Now, he casts aside his bright and pure past and embarks on a desperate journey for revenge. The flower will wither in ten days. Nothing in this world will be eternal, whether it's wealth, power, or love.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Shoujo-tachi no Kizuato ni Kuchizuke wo
description: The girls spend their time at a school built in a deep forest. Their secret is that they are all vampires. In order to hunt without being noticed by humans, the girls are bonded by blood, and what does the "sisterhood" bring to them?
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires

name: Aorikei Game Haishinsha (20-sai), Haishin no Kiri Wasure ni Yori Ii Hito Bare Suru.
description: Nakayama Haruto is a game commentator who streams provocative content under the name "Oni-chan." He attracts attention for his radical streams , but his true identity is that of a good older brother who streams to raise money for his younger sister's tuition and living expenses. However, he accidentally forgets to turn off the streams, and his true personality is revealed to the public. Just when it seems like he's going to cause a major uproar, the contrast with his usual self turns out to be a big hit with viewers...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Osananajimi no Yuri - FANBOX
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Nigoru Hitomi de Nani o Negau - Highserk Senki
description:
One day, Raizou ​​Takakura, an average salaryman, had a heart attack and his life ended that day. But, he got a second life in a different world.

Reincarnated with strong skills― wasn't what happened to him. Instead, he was reincarnated as a foot soldier in a small country, Highserk Empire, which is surrounded by large countries. With a new name, Walm, he was thrown into the frontlines of a war. Covered in blood and stench of death, along his comrades, he was slipping through the life-or-death situations.

An adventurer party with members who could use powerful magic, transferees with overwhelming power called the "heroes." In a deadly battle with them, Walm gradually developed his talent as a warrior which would've never awoken if he were to stay in times of peace. While his eyes becoming dark and muddy over time.
___
**Character Designer:** [So-taro](https://mangadex.org/author/c4ae5d7f-3399-4b1f-a509-d7388ad47826)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Psychological, Survival, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Kuitsume Youhei no Gensou Kitan
description:
After the soldiers’ mercenary group where he used to work had been utterly destroyed, Loren, who survived the disaster, decided to walk the adventurer’s path as a way to make a living. However, for Loren who had no acquaintances and empty pockets, receiving a single quest seemed like a faraway aim. So, as he was contemplating about what he should do next, another adventurer called out to him.
___
**Character Designer:** [peroshi](https://mangadex.org/author/18c02af4-21c4-4b2a-a75a-6f0c5ee3d172/peroshi)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Zombies, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Wolf in Love and Mille-Feuille
description:
Maya Suou, A highschool girl who was called “Wolf Girl” in the past, was living her usual everyday life.  
I don’t want to get involved in extraordinary events anymore… Even though Maya decided that, she was suddenly dragged into a fight between a “Little Red Riding Hood” and a “Wolf”.  
Maya smirked unconsciously  
  
“I have a plan. I also have the means.  
Ending everything here despite that would be such a waste and I won’t allow it.”  
  
And so began this dark fairy tale as the wolf fell in love.
tags: Monsters, Action, Magic, Girls' Love, Drama, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: The Story of a Girl Who's My Best Friend, She's Acting Strange Lately
description: My best friend is a girl I have known since elementary school.  She was like a boy, but nowadays she acts odd. We were like two guys, but now... she tries to increase the skinship and gets upset when I speak to girls.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
When vlogger meets top-of-the-industry writer, what could go wrong? Everything! Nothing has gone my way ever since meeting her.

Hu Luoluo, on the brink of having her vlogger account relinquished, is shoved into the path of scandal-ridden writer extraordinaire Song Li purely by accident. Being featured on hot topics, paired up as a couple, finally gaining traffic... Will it finally make her the greatest vlogger of all time?
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Beast Complex
description:
A collection of short stories that involve anthropomorphic animals and their troubles with coexisting with different species. Paru Itagaki's debut manga.  
  


---
tags: Psychological, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Ragna Crimson
description: Ragna is a dragon hunter along with his partner, the strongest dragon hunter Leo. He didn't have much talent at hunting dragons but he had decided to entrust his whole life for her. However he was shown the feel of true despair by his future self on what would happen if he stays weak as he is now. With that, it seems that the reaper of the dragons had now appeared earlier than the original history, but will it be enough to change the future?
tags: Action, Comedy, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Touhou & Dragon Ball - EAST VEGETA (Doujinshi)
description:
Vegeta's time machine goes out of control and he finds himself in Gensokyo. Vegeta is cool. "Fight me!" (Cirno)
An ongoing Touhou and Dragon Ball crossover series featuring Vegeta and many Touhou characters.
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Magic, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Void: No. Nine - 9-banme no Utsuro
description:
300 years ago, God destroyed the old world and killed humans, leaving only the "emissaries".

But underground humans live in the tunnel-filled Reform City. They search for relics, while living in fear from the threat of being hunted by the "emissaries".

(Source: Anime News Network, edited)
tags: Sci-Fi, Mystery

name: The Shiunji Family Children
description: The love between brother and sister. The love between man and woman. That which is most forbidden is most unyielding. The two sons and five daughters of the Shiunji family shine like brilliant gems, each with intelligence and beauty in equal measure. And with the pedigree of their wealthy father behind them, how could they not be the talk of the town? Eldest son Arata has spent his life being tossed around by the whims of his colorful sisters, yet a little teasing won’t stop him from valuing his family over anything and anyone else. But when his youngest sister turns fifteen, their father reveals a long-hidden secret of the Shiunji "siblings" and knocks Arata’s world off its axis...
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: We Are Young
description:
Since the old days, mystical creatures have existed to help humans. However, now that the times have changed, they suddenly receive a warning from their god: "Prove that you are still needed".

While grappling with how they can assist humans in the modern era, these creatures decide to send their younglings to the human world to seek answers.

Meanwhile, university student Park Geuru, who lives his miserable days commuting for five hours to school due to a sudden move, accidentally ends up making a bet with the goblin Sihan... 

This is a story about the daily life of these young mystical creatures, exploring the human world in order to avoid their own extinction.
tags: Official Colored, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Isekai Meikyuu de Harem o
description: A man was about to commit suicide and decides to search for a way to die in the internet, but then he found an odd site that asked a lot of questions and had a point based system that allows you to create skills and abilities for a character. He took interest in it and when he finished setting his character he was asked: "You will now be transported to a world with the settings you choose, coming back is not possible, do you still accept?" Without thinking much of it he pressed YES and found himself in another world with the skills and abilities he chose to have.
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Was I Hypnotized by a Classmate?
description: I was walking normally until a girl appeared in front of me and tried to hypnotize me, as I didn't want to embarrass her I pretended... And now she thinks I'm really hypnotized...!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: CHARGE
description: In a world like ours, where gods and mythical creatures walk among us and souls are a source of energy and power, academies were created to train soldiers and wise men. But over time they became centers of education and training became a job known as "Vormund". Jen Renaud, a 2nd Year student, tried to leave the world of "Vormund" for good, but his past and his new pupil, 1st Year Milena Torin, force him to return and face his monsters...
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Senpai is an Otokonoko
description:
The story of a crossdresser who receives a confession from a junior.

---
