tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Blood Rain 2
description: Sequel to Blood Rain (Min)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Martial Arts, Mafia, Drama, Tragedy

name: Hotel Helheim
description:
Tanaka-san is a legendary hotel man (concierge), and after his death, he became a legend in the underworld. In the underworld, Mei works at the dilapidated Hotel Helheim. It was once a glorious hotel, and one where Mei has many fond memories. One day, Tanaka-san appears, ready to restore the Hotel Helheim to its former success. Mei will become the famous Tanaka-san's assistant, as he works to make Hotel Helheim a top-class underworld hotel!  
  
*Originally published in Jump Square as a 3-volume series from November 2014 to September 2015, the series was later republished under the Shonen Champion Comics label from December 2019 to January 2020. The volume count reflects the republished version, as it is the only one currently available.*
tags: Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Office Partner
description:
“Cha Min-young, do you want to cross the line with me?”

Min-young, who has been busy every day serving her ‘male friend’ Tae-ha, whom she has known for over 20 years, is shocked by the betrayal from her boyfriend. In a moment of impulsiveness, she ends up committing an act with her friend Tae-ha.

“Shall I make it a draw, Cha Min-young?”

After that fateful night, Min-young realizes that the old feelings she has harbored for Tae-ha were not just jealousy.

“Cha Min-young, do you want to cross the line with me? Exactly three months.”

With that tempting and sweet offer made once again, Min-young willingly steps onto a path with a set end.

“Let’s do it. Let’s jump into this fireworks.”
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy

name: Ganzi Monster
description: Eunho Cha is, without a doubt, the biggest outcast at school. He spends his days avoiding bullies and daydreaming about his crush. He'd give anything to be popular, so when he discovers a face editing app called Icing, he spies an opportunity. With Icing's help, Eunho now looks like a superstar... or at least Ganzi Monster (GM), his online alter ego, does. But just when GM and his dance videos are starting to get popular, someone discovers his secret, and Eunho's days of being invisible are about to come to an end...
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Full Color

name: The Beginner, Formerly Ranked Number One in the World
description:
A beginner who was once ranked number one in the world.

『Prophecy Online』 is what is known as a scam game. It was said that those who managed to clear it will be able to obtain unlimited wealth, and the protagonist, Endou Rei, believed in those words and risked his life to challenge the game.

However, what awaited him after clearing the game was its end of service, and a remaining balance of 3,584 yen. Rei wallowed in despair, thinking that it was all over, but… just a week later, the world went through a great change!

Monsters started appearing in reality, and a message from the game 『Prophecy Online』 appeared in front of his eyes. While everyone was shocked and frightened, Rei, who knew about every strategy and information in the game beforehand, realized, “this is my chance…!”

“I will turn this power into money!” Fearless in the face of money, his exciting solo run and money-making adventure begins now!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Why Did Men Stop Wearing High Heels?
description: Kim Manseok is your average, everday guy but with one particular hobby: his love for high-end high heels. He owns his own personal blog and is known as a woman online but one day, his identity is exposed! Will he be able to continue his life as an ordinary salary man?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: A Tactical Genius on the Field
description: If there is one thing that Ma Jungwoo is good at, it's football. Although he is a genius strategist, others look down on him because of his lack of education and debt. But things seem to turn around when he finds out he has just inherited his late grandfather's British football team. He plans to sell the team and start fresh, only to find out the team has massive debt! Left with no other choice, Jungwoo must use his tactical genius to help this team rise from the ashes and be number one!
tags: Long Strip, Sports, Drama

name: Isekai de Skill wo Kaitai Shitara Cheat na Yome ga Zoushoku Shimashita: Gainen Kousa no Structure
description:
***A harem cheat fantasy with super-enhanced slaves!***  
  
When an entire bus of people was summoned to another world, Souma Nagi doesn't go along with the idea of being a Hero like the rest. Thus he leaves the palace and starts his life in another world with his ability to restructure skills. This is the first time I've ever been to a game where I've been able to do that & the first time I've ever seen a story about a girl who is a slave, a wife, and a cheat!
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kuro Gal-san ga Kuru!
description:
A beleaguered office worker finds his way to a cafe where he decries the hardships of his routine. In there, a friendly gyaru high schooler notices his lamentations and after hearing him vent out, she cheers him up the "gyaru" way and they exchange contacts.  
  
What will become of this unlikely friendship?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Beethoven Reborn
description: Only music sustained me from the maddening pain. If only I could hear my music... with my own ears... Even as my soul was falling apart, I prayed to God... and prayed again. Ludwig van Beethoven is considered the greatest composer in human history. I closed my eyes like that. And 180 years later in Seoul. The saint of music, known as an immortal genius, has been reborn. <Beethoven Born Again> And then I began to hear the voice of an angel. "Dobin.. Dobin.." Only music sustained me from the maddening pain.
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Music, Full Color

name: Wolf in Sheep’s Clothing
description: Even boys can be harassed.
tags: Thriller, Comedy, Self-Published, Web Comic

name: Kaisha no Kouhai ga Mahoutsukai datta
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Magic, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Babysitting the Male Lead
description:
I somehow took over the body of a villainess in a novel. Originally, I was supposed to die after coveting the male lead, but instead, I decided to become a rich unemployed woman and enjoy a life full of pleasures.

"You said you wanted to raise a puppy, so this brother went to hunt one for you. How's your brother's hunting skills?"

Until my brother came back after hunting the male lead who had turned into a wolf…
–
Having been forced to look after the male lead, I somehow succeeded in taming him after many twists and turns. Now all that's left is to look for this mysterious female lead and hand over the leash, then it will be all over. But…

"Have you become tired of me?"

"No, not at all."

"Then why do you keep trying to send me to a strange person?"

Maybe it's because he has stayed with me for too long, but it seems he has lost his social skills and has also developed separation anxiety.

"That person is someone very important to Your Highness."

"The only person who is important to me is you."

"Are you sure?"

"Yes, because I've imprinted," he whispered and curved the corner of his eyes, "on you."

The half-bent, bright yellow eyes were brimming with obsession.

---
Rosetta Kazel is enjoying her life as the villainess of a novel, until she's given a silver wolf to be her new pet. Rosetta knows this is none other than the cursed male lead of the novel, Prince Sihael von Idris, who's become stuck in his wolf form! To follow the novel, all Rosetta has to do is look after the wolf prince until the female lead can show up. But what if events have changed so much from the novel that she never turns up? How long will Rosetta be stuck caring for this unruly pup?

---

[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55937153)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EB%A5%BC-%EC%9E%84%EC%8B%9C%EB%B3%B4%ED%98%B8-%EC%A4%91%EC%9E%85%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3091), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60651851)
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Oversummoned, Overpowered, and Over It!
description: High school student Takafuji Inori, along with his classmates, gets summoned to another world. Just as he was expecting to begin a new life, a magic circle suddenly appears beneath him again, and he is recklessly summoned to yet another world! After repeated summonings, what remains in Inori’s possession are numerous protagonist-level, overpowered abilities...
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Purpose of Marriage
description: Yoon Seol-young faces a harsh reality: a cheating boyfriend of three years, a forced blind date with a divorced man ten years her senior, and the burden of financially supporting her suffocating family. Just when she wishes to escape her stifling life, Ki Tae-hwan, the executive director of Shinhwa Group, rumored to be gay due to his excessively clean private life, approaches her with a proposal: "Let's get married. I'll take you to a higher place." Overnight, Seol-young goes from being the secretary in the executive director's office to becoming his daughter-in-law. But what is the true purpose behind Tae-hwan's marriage proposal?
tags: Romance, Drama

name: Level 596 no Tanya Minarai
description:
The beasthuman Noa has a dream of becoming a blacksmith, as Noa's father, Nomad, used to be the acclaimed Divine Blacksmith.

Since Noa's mother died, Nomad has drowned his days in liquor and grief, so Noa ventures to dangerous places to get Nomad's smithing materials. This leads to Noa's life being in continual risk.

Noa is now 14 and doing normal work as a smithy to support Nomad, when Nomad makes an unreal discovery about his child! All of the materials Noa's collected are unbelievably rare! Nomad calls his familiar adventurer to check Noa's level...and it's at an amazingly high 596!

What's the secret to this super-high level, higher than even the kingdom's hero?! Check out this adventuring fantasy that unfolds around a puppy-human apprentice that's out of this world!
tags: Action, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Furi2Play!
description: Daily life of a group of foreigners working for a game company in Japan.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Office Workers, 4-Koma, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Happy End no Kyuseishu
description:
Nao is a college student who draws indie eromanga. The morning after a grueling deadline crunch, he finds a little snakey boi, which invites itself inside his room. During a nap, it starts sucking on Nao's willy and gulping down the seed... and of course Yasu, Nao's kouhai, walks in.
Dismayed as he is by Nao deciding to keep the tentacle as a drawing assistant and manga inspiration, Yasu lets Nao use his hand to jerk off every time it's time to feed the now-named 'Wiggle-michi' its semen. 

Truthfully, Yasu has always had a crush on Nao.
Could this sentient tentacle be their cupid?!
tags: Boys' Love, Fantasy

name: Mouhitori no Saikyou no Ore -Teihen Kara no Nariagari-
description: Not found
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Sesesese! ~Mezase Hatsu H! Doutei Joshi no Tokimeki Daisakusen~
description: A high-energy sexually-charged comedy! Nagara Ayano, who has transformed from a virgin college student into a female version of his middle school self, blindly rushes in headfirst to try and achieve his first sexual experience, but things aren't going as smoothly as he'd hope...!
tags: Genderswap, Psychological, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life

name: Blue Lock Legions
description:
Rai Genji always dreamed of becoming a world-class professional football player, especially one to play for the Japanese team. And by the efforts of his passion, he was invited to the Blue Lock project, where he developed his ego. Coming across foes, rivals, teammates, and friends; Rai learns time and time again that he needs to learn and improve beyond anything he thought was possible to survive. Will he be able to conquer the Blue Lock? Or will he be doomed by the very people he stands with?

Blue Lock Legions is a Blue Lock spin-off created for the purpose of pure enjoyment and not profit. The series follows very similar concepts to the original Blue Lock series, but with an original twist on the characters, plot line, events, etc.

Blue Lock Legions stands independently from the original Blue Lock Manga, and is posted on Mangadex without any involvement in the websites views, beliefs, practices, or problematic norms. It is simply here as the website provides a proper layout for the series to be viewed.
tags: Thriller, Action, Comedy, Sports, Self-Published, School Life, Web Comic

name: Pokémon RéBURST
description: The story begins with the protagonist leaving his town where people and Pokémon live in peace together in order to locate his father. The hero doesn’t know much about his father besides the fact that he is a powerful swordsman. On his journey, the protagonist meets up with new friends and foes and discovers the power of Burst Heart Crystals, these crystals entrap a Pokémon inside and allow humans transform themselves partly into them in order to take advantage of their special abilities and attacks.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: LOVE-BULLET
description:
Since the dawn of humanity, those who have never experienced love and meet an untimely end are granted a second chance at life as Cupids by the Goddess of Love.

Present day Cupids have traded in their bow and arrow for modern firearms, but their mission remains the same: find suitable lovers for their targets and make them fall in love!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, Supernatural

name: Kokage-kun Bewitched
description: Yumeko dreams of being a pampered princess, but reality has her living in a shitty old apartment building. With a forest on the roof. And a witch in the forest. Tadaa! Maybe she can get this witch (who is a guy, weird) to magically grant all her wishes, up to and including making her destined prince (high school crush) fall in love with her.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Shippaisaku no Tsukaima to Majutsushi
description: A mage adopts an abandoned familiar. After 80 years of raising her and trying to teach her magic and emotion, he passes away, and she embarks on a journey to help other abandoned familiars and tour the spots that remind her of her late master.
tags: Monsters, Demons, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Million Times Attack Speed
description: After being reincarnated into the Tianwu Continent, Ye Yun activated the Multiverse Devouring System and received the reward of a million times attack speed in the beginner's gift package. From then on, he became an invincible powerhouse! As the saying goes, in the world of martial arts, speed is paramount. Do you think I was just picking my nose and cleaning my ears? In fact, I just executed thirty-five thousand people with a single sword strike and eighty-seven thousand people with a single sword swing, while also unleashing various boxing techniques and secret arts.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Hitori de Shinitai
description: A hardworking career woman who never married died alone, found in a miserable state. Her niece, Yamaguchi Narumi (35 and single), who was hit hard by the news shifted from looking for marriage to preparing for her death. She decided that the only way to die alone without bothering anyone and die better is to live the same way. This is the birth of a definitive beautiful human life story about facing love and death in earnest.
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Bunny Sensei
description: Previously post as chapters (Ch 1-8) of **[Imo Ichirou's Twitter Shorts](https://mangadex.org/title/2242193d-8634-4a74-8bfa-45744e53866f/imo-ichirou-s-twitter-shorts)**
tags: Official Colored, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Shota, Web Comic

name: Bloodline
description: Yeren, who dreams of being a vampire hunter, is unwittingly caught in the crossfire between a vampire girl and the Holy lands. As a temporary blood servant, he doesn't know what to do when the hatred and strife between them have been ongoing for thousands of years… This is a story about Lilo·Ai, the last vampire.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Rikudou
description:
Riku experienced a lot of pain and tragedy in his early life. After his father's death, a former-boxer Yakuza man taught him how to do a basic punch, and that punch saved his life when he had to defend himself from his mom's drug dealer. He ended up taking the drug dealer's life, marking him as a killer. Criminals continued to come after him, leading to more tragedy for the people who attempted to care for him. All of this drove him to ask that same former boxer to teach him to become stronger, which led him to a rundown gym, his door to the world of pro boxing!  
  
**Officially published:**  
- In french by [Kazé](http://manga.kaze.fr/catalogue/ri_ku_la_rage_aux_poings) as "Riku-Do, La rage aux poings"  
- In italian by [J-Pop](https://www.j-pop.it/855-rikudo)
tags: Action, Psychological, Romance, Sports, Martial Arts, Sexual Violence, Drama

name: The Too-Perfect Saint: Tossed Aside by My Fiancé and Sold to Another Kingdom
description:
Born into a family of saints, Philia’s childhood was filled with harsh education. Nevertheless, it formed her into a great saint and secured her engagement with the second Prince, Julius. But when she became too perfect and thus not cute in his eyes, Julius broke their engagement! That's why he decided to make her leave her homeland and make her a saint for a neighboring kingdom in exchange for money and resources. Philia was prepared to be treated miserably but what awaited her was an unexpected welcome!

Confused by her new circumstances, she began to use her powers to help solve the citizens' problems such as creating a barrier against monsters and creating a cure for the illness that wreaked havoc on the land. With her new found position, Philia recollected her memories of being in a novel and the future outbreak of monsters that was to come. She used her knowledge and with the help of the people, they quickly dealt with the problem! But at the same time, the very same country that sold her off was also in danger-?!
tags: Demons, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Gideon of the 3rd
description: The stage is the eve of the French Revolution. There is the commoner Gideon, who wants to save the impoverished country side-by-side with the members of the Estates General. Then there is the aristocrat, Georges, who will use any means to achieve his purpose. A man who wants to change the country, and a man who wants to destroy it. Both begin their journey forward. Will their joint efforts of love and hatred, justice and evil lead them to a hell of bloodshed, or an ideal future?
tags: Historical, Action, Drama

name: Yonkoma 13 Kihei Bouei-ken!! ~Kochira Sector X~
description: A 4-Koma adaptation of the simulation adventure gem "13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim" created by Atulus & Vanillaware. 13 boys and girls overcoming the intertwined past, present and future... slapstick drama!? (Source: Amazon Kindle)
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Montage
description:
One day, 10-year-old Yamato and his friend Miku discover a man in a back alley who's suffering from vicious stab wounds. The man recognizes Yamato, and uses his last breath to share a secret with the children: Yamato's father was the perpetrator of a bank robbery that is known throughout the country as the most puzzling unsolved crime of the 20th century. He warns them to "never trust anyone."  
Miku makes Yamato swear to keep the man's final words a secret. A few days later, Yamato's father is found dead, and the boy is taken in by Miku's family. The death is ruled as an accident, but Yamato has his doubts. Six years later, Yamato still can't stop wondering about the incidents, and resolves to take action.
tags: Action, Psychological, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Runin
description:
(from ebookjapan):

Manhattan, New York in a future where catastrophe has swept the world. Violence has replaced order, justice has collapsed, and emotions have faded. Two Japanese, Takeru and Gamon, live in such a time. 

What are the ideals that they are carving out for themselves? 

A near-future action adventure in a world in ruins!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Mecha, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Tragedy

name: Truth Weavers
description:
In the country of Lavarta, mages are oppressed and seen as filthy beings. Leon is a talented but rather weak mage. Zechs is an orphan boy with great innate magical talent. Their meeting will change their lives as well as the world around them.

Note: "Lineage of sorcery" is the literal translation of the Japanese title, but it's not the official translation.
tags: Award Winning, Action, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: MAIDes - Maid Attacks In Destiny
description:
"……W-what should I do? I’m being transported to the battlefield of hell!"

In the midst of the war against the demonic beasts, where humanity faces the threat of extinction, the maid girl Orsela accidentally finds herself transferred to a forest on the front lines of the battlefield. She has no weapons or combat experience; all she possesses is her seemingly useless inherent magic, which can only summon things that people no longer need.

When she encounters a large magical beast—a dragon—and finds herself in a desperate, life-threatening situation, she gambles everything and summons a magical weapon: a revolver, and a battle-crazed girl of heroic class!?

The magic that was thought to be useless turns out to be more suited for battle than any other magic...

Before she knows it, she becomes the last bastion protecting humanity!

The weakest class maid carves out a future for mankind!
A survival fantasy of rising to the top in a world on the brink of collapse begins!
tags: Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kanzen Kaihi Healer no Kiseki
description: A college student, Sakurai Hiroki was summoned to another world to defeat the Demon Lord. And since he got “Priest” as a job, his starting Recovery Stat was more than enough to heal any wounds, so he dumped all of his Stat Points into Evasion. In other words, he’s aiming for an Evasion Healer who will never get hit by enemy attacks. But unfortunately, people in that world couldn’t understand his ideal! The King got angry against him and labelled him as useless almost immediately! And thus, the story of how Hiroki become an odd Healer who can even avoid Dungeon Boss’ attacks with ease has started!!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Cosmic Heavenly Demon 3077
description: After countless years, the Heavenly Demon, sealed within Mount Tai, finally awakened, only to discover that humanity had long abandoned the radiation-soaked Earth and was now exploring the far reaches of the galaxy.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Sekai de Tada Hitori no Mamonotsukai: Tenshoku shitara Maou ni Machigawaremashita
description: After searching for a long time, Noah finally found the [Divine Job Tome]. With it, he just might be able to get away from his current Divine Job [Hero] and its responsibility! Or so he thought. Because the new job that had been granted to him, [Monster Tamer] was completely unheard of…!?
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Knight in the Area
description:
Aizawa Kakeru is an energetic and dedicated eighth grader who serves as the manager for his school’s football team. Though he was well known for being a talented player the previous year, an accident during one of his games caused Kakeru to vow never to play competitively again. Still passionate about the sport, Kakeru dreams of one day becoming a professional football trainer so that he can work alongside his older brother Suguru, the ace of the school team who has represented Japan in international competition.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=13559) (anime).
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life

name: 0.0000001% Demon King-nim
description:
The 72 Demon Kings, who received the order to destroy the earth, each went through a trial by the Great Demon King Astrea. Those who passed the trial earned the title of Demon King, and each Demon King was granted special powers by the Great Demon King.

So far, each Demon King had been granted extraordinary abilities. When Karos became a Demon King, he received a power from the Great Demon King, but… 

“Great Demon King, no matter how much I think about it, there is a problem with my power.”
“Problem?”

Among the Demon Kings with extraordinary abilities… Karos received the [Gacha] ability. 

“Gacha as the power of a Demon King? How am I supposed to rule the world with Gacha?!'”
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Do It Yourself!!
description: Building furniture and friendships have a lot in common. Intention, effort, and hard work are needed for both crafts. This is a story of girls in a DIY club building both as they carve out their futures. None of it comes easy, but that doesn’t stop any of ’em. Furniture, friendships, and the future—they’re building it all with their own hands!
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The Red Thread
description:
When Dean, the captain of the swimming club, takes the podium during Pharm’s university orientation, something unusual happens. Though the two have never met before, they’re unable to hide the turmoil that suddenly wells up inside them as they can’t help but feel that this isn’t the first time they’ve laid eyes on each other. Perhaps the red thread of fate links them together from their past lives...

**Note**:
This is the manga adaptation of the Thai novel "*The Red Thread*" and it's drama adaptation "*Until We Meet Again*".
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Tragedy

name: Kowloon-jou de Mou Ichido
description: Kowloon Walled City: A lawless slum packed to the brim with high-rise buildings. In this confined city where various races and families live crowded together like sardines, Ryouma works as a landlord. But one day, he meets Méi Zhī, a spirit who had been inhabiting a tea pot...
tags: Romance, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: The Holy Grail of Eris
description:
Constance, the daughter to a Viscount whose only value is her honesty, and Scarlet Castiel, the most reviled villainess of the era who was sentenced to death ten years ago. When the two people who were never supposed to meet encountered one another at a night party, the story that should have ended with Scarlet's death began anew.  
  
Although their relationship only began out of mutual interest, they soon became true partners in an effort to unravel the mysteries of a grand conspiracy borne out of the past, that still has a vicious grip on the present.
tags: Historical, Ghosts, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: This Monster Wants to Eat Me
description: High school girl Hinako is living a quiet life in a seaside town, but she feels somewhat detached from her friends during the summer months when she is reminded of when her family died years ago. One day, she meets Shiori, a mysterious girl who reminds her of the ocean, especially when it comes to her translucent blue eyes, but Shiori soon reveals that she is actually a mermaid who has been looking for Hinako for a long time.
tags: Monsters, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Dragon Tofu
description: Toshiki and Kazu Fujiwara are brothers who live an ordinary life in an ordinary world working as insurance salesmen. While Toshiki is content with this salaryman life, Kazu strives to be part of a Guild: a registered group of individuals who hunt artifacts and capture criminals. After finishing up a quest, they begin to unravel the truth: that everything is not as normal as it once seemed.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Doujinshi, Web Comic

name: Ookiku Furikabutte
description:
*Ookiku Furikabutte* isn't just a baseball manga. It's the story of a timid young man who was made an ace pitcher in middle school because of family connections. Now he's in high school and it's his time to shine as an ace in his own right.

Reading this story will get your blood boiling, heart pumping, and tears flowing. It has been popular since it was serialized, a true Japanese high school baseball manga!

---  
* Won the Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize for best creative work in 2006
* Won the Kodansha Manga Award for general manga in 2007.

*Discrepancy in chapter numbering (mag vs. tank), there are no chapters missing inbetween 25.2 and 53.
tags: Award Winning, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Break Shot
description:
A boy named Oda Nobusuke is very infatuated with billiards. Problems arise when a new student body president, Mako, suddenly decided to cut the funding for his billiards club. Unhappy with that, Oda wants to convince Mako that his billiards club is worthy of the funding. He decided to challenge a two-time former national billiards champion. Will Oda be able to defend his club?


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media
tags: Comedy, Sports, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kakeru
description: When high school student Kakeru Daiba runs for long enough, he enters into a runner's high state that heightens his senses. When his crush, Natsume, disappears mysteriously one day he's forced to use his ability in ways he never expected.
tags: Thriller, Crime, Sexual Violence, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: I accidentally became invincible while studying with my sister
description: Zhong Yuan watched helplessly as his sister, Zhong Lan, died in front of him, but he was powerless. After a rebirth, Zhong Yuan vowed to protect his sister. Returning to life, Zhong Yuan discovered that he had gained the ability to successfully absorb 100% of the Resonance Crystals from creatures. Inadvertently, he became invincible!
tags: Thriller, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Harem, Military, Fantasy, Full Color

name: The Hero Is Standing in My Way
description:
I reincarnated into a novel that I think I read sometime in the past. In the not far future, I'm fated to become the fiancée of the villain, but that's well... Won't it change following the way that I live?

"My ideal type is a man who is 190 cm, handsome, rich, has a rank at least above a Count, and won't grow a gut even when they get old!"

But before I could even find a husband I saved the life of the young male lead? After that my plan for an easy life kept getting messed up!

"I'm sorry, but Ariel said that she can't take her eyes off me because I'm the prettiest and handsomest person in the world."

"What? I did?"

"P-pardon my rudeness. Please forget my marriage proposal!"

"Hold on! No! Wait!"

---
[Original Web Comic](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58561966)

**Official Translations:**
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/97402)
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: City of Darkness
description: Everyone in his Triad gang looked up to him. He was the boss's favorite pupil, but then in a single night, after he had won so many territorial fights for his gang, he lost everything! Why?
tags: Action, Psychological, Martial Arts, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Burai na Kaze Tetsu
description:
Jockey Tetsu is a man who lives by his own style. One day, he is charmed by a certain horse and follows it to the end. What Tetsu finds is a runaway horse on the verge of being killed by poison.

---
* Includes three-chapter story "Samba Never Learns" in the same volume.
tags: Sports, Drama

name: Ryuusa no Ori
description:
The Solminati Academy is a prestigious school that harbors the dreams and hopes of ambitious students.

A young man named Nozomu Bountis entered the school for his lover's dream. As time went on, his powers deadlocked and could no longer advance, and his grades fell. Eventually, his lover was stolen by his at-the-time best friend. Heartbroken and lost on what to do next, he focused even harder on his training. 

Eventually, he meets an old woman, who triggers the catalyst to his growth. The future is uncertain but gradually, his world changes.  
  
---
  
[Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7408y/)
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Bijutsubu Girl
description: Middle school life isn’t all fun and games for an art club girl either! From club activities to studying, games to manga, hobbies, BL, and “mufufu” fantasies…or even…love?! “Uchida” is a member of the “art club.” She’s got a lot of strange obsessions and she’s not great at dealing with people. A short candid manga about the ups and downs of school life with the classmates surrounding her and the adolescent boy who sits next to her.
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Yuusha ni Zenbu Ubawareta Ore wa Yuusha no Hahaoya to Party o Kumimashita!
description: As a member of the hero's party Ceres, has set out to defeat the demon king. But one day, he was suddenly dismissed by the hero, and he had to leave the party. All alone, Ceres sought to find a domestic slave to take care of him. What he saw at the slave market was Shizuko, the hero's mother, being sold as a slave?!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Puniru is a Cute Slime
description: The slime he created transformed into a girl!? Kotarou, a young boy, is constantly pushed around by Puniru's freewheeling behavior. It's a fun and exciting daily life!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Monogatari no Kuromaku ni Tensei shite
description:
There was a globally popular game called *The Legend of the Seven Heroes*. Ren cleared the sequel of that game at the fastest record in the world, and thus he obtained a bonus special data. However, no matter where he looked inside the game, he could not find the data. The moment where Ren was about to give up the search, he decided to start playing the second round of the game.

Suddenly, a notification message “Do you want to start a special story?" appeared on the screen.

When Ren chose “Yes” without hesitation, he lost consciousness, and when he woke up, he was a baby. —Could it be that he was reincarnated as one of the heroes in *The Legend of the Seven Heroes*? Ren, who thought such a thing was impossible, could not believe his ears when he heard his name from his mother's mouth. It was the name of a classmate who betrays the heroes in the middle of the story.

Of course, he wishes to live in peace. But he meets a saint whose life he's supposed to take, and doesn't. Furthermore, he ends up saving a character (the boss of a great noble family) who was supposed to die. All of these things creates a development that he doesn't know about coming to play…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700427572694145),  [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1862hs/)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Back Street Girls
description:
A group of 3 yakuza failed their boss for the last time. After messing up an important job, the boss gives them 2 choices: Honorably committing suicide, or go to Thailand to get a sex reassignment surgery in order to become "female" idols. After a gruesome year long training to become idols, they successfully debut, with overwhelming popularity, much to their dismay. This is where their tragedy truly begins.  
  
Link:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20851) (anime)
tags: Genderswap, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Goze Hotaru
description: After losing her mother early on, Hotaru, a girl surrounded by warmth and tranquility, finds her life taking a dramatic turn. An unexpected event draws her into the world of “Goze”, setting her on a path through unknown lands with music as her guide. Armed with her talent and a heart full of questions, she embarks on a quest, seeking her missing father and her true calling…!
tags: Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Music

name: 100 Ghost Stories That Will Lead to My Own Death
description:
One day, an elementary school child named Yuuma tries to jump out of his classroom window. His classmate Hina stops him and, in a bid to stall for time, asks him, “Do you know the round of a hundred ghost stories?” Hina tells Yuuma about a ritual where, if you tell a hundred ghost stories, you’ll see ghosts afterward. Learning this gives Yuuma a new lease on life. Chapter by chapter, he shares ghost stories with the reader, slowly but surely inching his way toward one hundred…

(Source: Seven Seas Entertainment)
tags: Monsters, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Duel Masters
description: The story centers around the card game Duel Masters, which revolves around five civilizations consisting of Fire, Water, Light, Darkness and Nature. The original storyline follows Shobu Kirifuda, a young boy who likes to play Duel Masters. He and a few duelists are known to bring the monsters on the cards to life in their duels. Shobu engages in this card game so that he can be the best duelist like his father was.
tags: Traditional Games, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Fantasy

name: Doctor, Live Again
description:
A medical mission turns fatal as Dr. Jin’s life slips away. Miraculously, he wakes on a battlefield. Instinct takes over. He tends to patients before realizing that this is the martial arts world of The Reigning Heavenly Demon! He’s reincarnated as a child with mastery of modern medicine and soon his skills draw notice. From the renowned White-scaled Doctor to the infamous Gongson Family, everyone sees his potential. But how much is Dr. Jin willing to sacrifice before risking death again?

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%9D%98%EC%9B%90-%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%EC%82%B4%EB%8B%A4/2440)
---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/66743)
- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%82%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%A0%E0%B8%9E/458?tab=episode)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Isekai, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Ayame-senpai wa Boku to Himitsu no Keiyaku wo
description:
On his way home from school, Mitsuya Daiki - an ordinary high school student - finds a girl covered in wounds. Upon closer look, he finds that the girl has animal ears, but she licks Daiki's ears and leaves. Daiki begins to wonder if it was just a dream, when Sakuragami Ayame appears upon him…? After telling her of the ability of Daiki's ears, Ayame feels responsible for dragging him into this, and proposes an oath of absolute servitude to protect him at all costs!   
- [Alternative Raw](http://www.takeshobo.co.jp/book_d/shohin/2820601)
tags: Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Sekai Saikyou no Kouei: Meikyuukoku no Shinjin Tansakusha
description:
Workaholic assistant Atobe Arihito fell asleep in his company's bus that was traveling for a vacation. When he awoke he learned he had died due to the bus getting into an accident, and that he had reincarnated into a world of reincarnators - to the Labyrinth Country. To his surprise he was discovered by his slave driving manager, Igarashi Kyouka, who further explains their role in this world. 


In Labyrinth Country, Reincarnators are expected to choose a job and form parties to fight against monsters in Labyrinths. "Valkyrie" Kyouka had expected Arihito to work with her once again, but he declines due to his knowledge of her demanding nature. As they depart she vows to make him regret not choosing her. 

And thus starts Arihito's adventure as a "Rear Guard".
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Taida na Succubus-chan
description: Not found
tags: Demons, Comedy, Web Comic

name: Kage no Eiyuu no Nichijou-tan
description:
In the Great War of Heroes, the heroes and the Demon King fight for survival and power in each reincarnation. In the fourth war, the heroes defeated the Demon King... but that is only on the surface.

The true hero who defeated the Demon King was Tweight, a shadow agent who would destroy any enemy who asked him to.

After the Great War, Tweight, who wished to lead a peaceful life as an unsung hero, wished to enroll in the Normal Course of the Bildarz Royal Academy.
tags: Action, Magic, Military, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Nijiiro Photograph
description: Yamabuki Aoi is an exceedingly withdrawn first-year high school student who lives together with her older sister Satsuki, a popular novelist. What will happen to their daily lives when, due to certain circumstances, Sara Flory, a little foreign girl, begins to live together with them?
tags: Slice of Life

name: Kimi no Risou no Maid ni Naru!
description: A few months into his high school life, Renya Nijou has neither friends nor a girlfriend and spends his days living alone. But one day, he witnesses a group of mysterious men dressed in black attempting to kidnap Maya Kamishiro, the most beautiful girl in his class. Apparently, Maya's parents sold her off to pay their debts, so Renya decides to help her with the financial resources he obtained through investments. Maya can't help but want to return the favor, and declares that she will become Renya's maid...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: ef - a fairy tale of the two.
description:
Hirono Hiro is a high school student, and secretly a shoujo mangaka, to all but his childhood friend and kouhai, Kei Shindo.  
  
One cold Christmas after meeting a mysterious woman in church, a strange girl steals his bike.  
Running after her, he finds her collapsed on the street.   
  
Learning her name is Miyamura Miyako and that her bag was stolen by a man on a motorbike, Hirono finds himself spending time with Miyako, much to the dismay of Kei…
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: Isekai Shikkaku
description:
A second life in another world with cute girls by your side and video gamey powers—sounds like a dream, right? Not so for a certain melancholy author, who would quite literally rather drop dead.

Honestly, all the fantastical adventure is just getting in the way of his poetic dream of finding the perfect place to die. But no matter how much he risks his hide, everything seems to keep turning out okay.

Will our terminally depressed hero find a new lease on life in this cheerfully bleak isekai comedy?

Inspired by the famous Osamu Dazai's book *Ningen Shikkaku* (*No Longer Human* / *Disqualified from Being Human*).
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Muryoku Seijo to Munou Oujo ~Maryoku Zero de Shoukansareta Seijo no Isekai Kyuukokuki~
description: One day, listless part-timer Tamura Nana was summoned out of her room and into another world, after which her summoners declared her a saint and asked her to save their world. However, though she was hailed as a saint, it turned out that Nana possessed no magical power at all! To make matters worse, she was chosen as a partner by a princess who can't use magic...
tags: Romance, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Succubus Dorei to no Nichijou
description: Not found
tags: Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Tsukihime: A Piece of Blue Glass Moon - Moon Phase
description: An anthology featuring characters from Tsukihime: A Piece of Blue Glass Moon.
tags: Anthology, Magic, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Major
description:
Shigeharu Honda is a Japanese League batter on the rise. His son Goro is a Little League pitcher who one day hopes to follow in his father's footsteps. Momoko Hoshino, Goro's schoolteacher, is the first woman Shigeharu has been interested in since the death of Goro's mother. The destinies of these three individuals will become intertwined as father and son experience both heartbreak and triumph on the baseball diamond. But when an unspeakable tragedy visits the family, it will take everything they have to pick up the pieces and reclaim their dreams.  
  
Won the 41st Shogakukan Manga Award in the Shounen category.
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life

name: Atsumare! Fushigi Kenkyu-bu
description: Goryo Daisuke is still unsure about which club to join. When he meets the three girl members of Mysterious Research Club while looking for the school's warehouse, he gets hypnotized to sign the registration form. Suzu who is obsessed with scary curses, Chiaki who only relies on her monstrous strength to perform dangerous magic tricks, and Kotone who can control people by hypnosis.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Ann's Forbidden Memories
description:
In a small village that suffers from famine, a young girl full of life named Ann does her best to face the challenges life throws at her.

---
You can find chapter previews and sketches on the author's [Twitter](https://twitter.com/pokorotomas).
tags: Loli, Historical, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: A bird, A plane, A man
description: A young Clark Kent helps different people as he comes down from flying through the skies for a while.
tags: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Self-Published, Slice of Life

name: Mukiryoku Neet na Moto Shindou, Boukensha ni naru
description:
Ilvis is a genius boy who has been called a prodigy from an early age.  However, his motto is "I don't want to work"!  

After graduating from school, he was living his long-cherished NEET life, but one day, his sister Arisa finally told him, "If you don't work, you will be kicked out of the house."  Ilvis aims to be an adventurer in search of a free way of working!?  

A misunderstanding warrior tale by an unconscious former cheat prodigy!
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Watashi no Kareshi wa Amaetagari da.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy

name: A Splendid Revenge Story of a Super-Dreadnought Cheat Villainess
description:
Lunaria il von Solfege. The protagonist, who was reincarnated as the villainess of her favourite game, was flooded with tragic memories of Lunaria. She was condemned, left alone and uncared for, and tried to commit suicide by stabbing herself with a dagger.
"Leave everything to me, Lunaria. Now that I'm Lunaria, I won't show them any mercy."
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Cooking Papa
description:
Araiwa Kazumi is your run-of-the-mill salaryman and father. He’s also secretly an amazing chef! While his coworkers at Kanemaru Industries all eat out for lunch, he pulls out his lunchbox… It’s time for this cooking papa to show off his pro-level cooking skills!

(from Manga Helpers):

Araiwa Kazumi is an energetic salaryman who is able to perfectly manage his responsibilities at work and at home. Kazumi is also a fantastic chef, though many of his coworkers are unaware of it.

His wife Nijiko, who works as a journalist, has a bit of trouble making time for her home life. However, she tries to always be a cheerful mother.

With their son Makoto, who is 7 at the beginning of the story, they have a very happy family. This is a story that follows the Araiwa household and their delight with delicious food. Cooking instructions are also often included throughout the story.

---
- **Won the 39th Kodansha Manga Award Special Prize in 2015**
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking, Mystery

name: Spunk
description:
“I love you!” I hate “boring” things! **I won’t compromise on my “fun”**!!
夏菜(かな)**Kana** is a powerful girl who freely desires her loved ones.

"Because..." "But..." "When you're like this..." Men and women, the outside world, the world, and even self-reflection are "blockers".
冬実(ふゆみ)**Fuyumi** is a literary girl who thinks, "The person I am is still **nowhere to be found**.''

Two contrasting girls meet in an unknown world... the **SM world**!?
**New queens “Kana” and “Fuyumi” are doing SM!**
Laugh! Live! Human beings, run with all your heart and soul!

A truly earnest and humorous hymn to humanity, by a genius who has produced many controversial works, opens with the simultaneous release of volumes 1 and 2!!

**[SPUNK]...Courage, energy, cheerfulness, liveliness.**
tags: Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Kimetsu no Yaiba
description:
Since ancient times, rumors have abounded of man-eating demons lurking in the woods. Because of this, the local townsfolk never venture outside at night. Legend has it that a demon slayer also roams the night, hunting down these bloodthirsty demons.  
Ever since the death of his father, Tanjirou has taken it upon himself to support his mother and five siblings. Although their lives may be hardened by tragedy, they've found happiness. But that ephemeral warmth is shattered one day when Tanjirou finds his family slaughtered and the lone survivor, his sister Nezuko, turned into a demon. Adding to this sorrow, a demon hunter named Tomioka Giyuu arrived and was about to finish Nezuko off, but to his surprise she and Tanjiro started to protect each other. Seeing this oddity and Tanjiro's promising fighting skills, Giyuu decides to send them to his old mentor to be trained.  
So begins Tanjiro's life as a demon hunter, bound on a quest to cure his sister and find the one who murdered his entire family.  
  
MangaPlus: <https://mangaplus.shueisha.co.jp/titles/100009>
tags: Historical, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Morning Glow is Golden: The IDOLM@STER
description: The spinoff manga centers on the character Kotori Otonashi, an office clerk at 765 Production, during her high school days.
tags: School Life, Slice of Life

name: Gemini wa Otoshigoro
description: She was just my classmate until yesterday but now she's my cute girlfriend☆! But everyday is nerve racking with her almost identical twin brother around. This is the popular three man fluff + meddling brother romantic comedy!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Maji de Tsukiau 15-fun Mae
description: Growing up in the same apartment complex, Yuuki and Natsuha have known each other forever. They’ve been friends for so long that everyone just assumes they’re a couple! But as they both approach the final stretch of high school, they get a silly, totally-not-serious idea— what if they actually started dating? What a ridiculous thing to say! Unless…?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Tonari no Furi-san ga Tonikaku Kowai
description: Ordinary High-schooler Taira Namito, who is ordinary inside, unknowingly becomes the target of the female delinquent-looking girl Furi Youko, a pure maiden at heart, who sits next to him.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Gal to Bocchi
description: Stone-faced Hina Kawai says she is not good with gyarus... but that's not an impediment for Hayashibara, her classroom's most noticeable gyaru.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Level Up with the Gods
description:
“Maybe Inner Gods can never defeat Outer Gods…” so thought Yuwon Kim, a plucky, high-ranking warrior, after a bitter defeat.

But Yuwon is too tenacious to give up. His loss becomes the dawn of a new journey as a returnee. With renewed determination, Yuwon starts back from where he began, smashing monster after monster and relearning his skills before taking on the Tower once again.

But can he fight his way through the tutorials and level up once more, or will his conquest crumble before him?

name: Tensei Mae wa Dragon Deshita
description: The hero and the dragon defeated the Demon King, saving the world, but they died. Then they were reincarnated in another world (Japan)... This is their story.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Doujinshi, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Gamer ga Isekai Konten Shite Harem Jinsei e Continue suru Sou desu
description:
After opening the last route of a certain FPS game, the protagonist jumps for joy, slips and dies. However, due to God - a game lover - feeling sorry for him, he decides to continue his life in a different world as the boy Wayne (although he seems to have no memory of his previous life). 

Life at military school in a world where magic and adventure are commonplace, and meeting heroines who truly love him.

This is the second life of a gamer down the harem route!?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Incest, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Military, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Shota, Adaptation

name: Happy Happia!
description: Yuki Iwatsuki is a transfer student, today is her first day at her new school. There seems to be some kind of trauma, her classmates "Koneko," a high-tension girl, and "Akizora Hako," a box-head girl, are very interested in Yuki! Will she get along with everyone?
tags: Sci-Fi, Animals, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Mosquito War
description:
After a genetic mutation, mosquitoes have become the strongest predator on the planet. Will mankind be able to fight back?

name: Iinchou Desu ga Furyou ni Naru Hodo Koi Shitemasu!
description:
Ryoko Masaki is a serious class president, yet she has decided to become a delinquent to catch the attention of her childhood friend, Masato Todoroki. The reason is that as a discipline committee president, Masato always goes out of his way to remind delinquents about their attire, yet he doesn't pay any mind to the serious Ryoko. That's why Ryoko decided to dye her hair and shorten her skirt, and when Masato saw her, he was devastated and concerned. Is this what Ryoko had hoped for...?

A ridiculous rom-com between a serious class president and a dense discipline committee member!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Monsters Convent
description: Gags of a Catholic Convent on a Fantasy World.
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Our Field of Dreams
description: A soccer loving boy Takasugi Kazuya dreams of playing soccer with his Japan League star father at the National Yoyogi Stadium. The story follows Kazuya's life as he travels to Argentina, plays for Yamaki, and goes to the 1998 World Cup in France.
tags: Sports, Drama

name: Enchanter Enchanter
description: Enchanters possess special talents that set them apart from the average human. They are recognized by their ability to manipulate Chi. However, some use their abilities for personal gain. Some rise against Enchanters to uncover the secrets of the world. Others seek to become the highest power or simply wish to erase Enchanters from existence. Even if it’s destiny, karma, or nature, in the Enchanter world, one must understand the blur between life and death.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Ghosts, Martial Arts, Self-Published, Gore, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Jitsu wa Imouto deshita. ~Saikin Dekita Giri no Otouto no Kyorikan ga Yatara Chikai Wake~
description:
Akira, my stepbrother, was brought into my life as a high school student after my parents remarried. He is a cute boy but shy because of the complicated family environment he grew up in. I had a crush on my brother, so I always spent time playing with Akira for his sake... He loves me... We hit it off, and the distance between us grew rapidly! I asked him, "......Brother, do you like me by any chance?" "Of course I do."

The misunderstanding between the two of us deepens. And finally, I realized that Akira was my "sister" and I was confused... "I like the distance between my brother and me as we have always been. I'd rather be with you more than I am now." Akira's approach to me, aiming to make us "lovers" instead of "siblings", has begun!
 ___

**Links:**
- [Official Light Novel (JP)](https://fantasiabunko.jp/special/202111jitsuimo)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Incest, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Noa-senpai wa Tomodachi.
description:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Murim RPG Simulation
description:
A scout in the infamous Demon Cult, Seolhwi is on a routine patrol when his squad unexpectedly encounters a fearsome master of the Mount Hua Sect, the sworn enemies of the Demon Cult. Without warning, the Mount Hua Cult master slaughters the entire squad. As Seolhwi lies dying, lamenting years of service to the cult with nothing to show for it, he is suddenly faced with a video game prompt, asking if he would like to start again. Given the opportunity to start over and make different choices, Seolhwi vows to survive and become stronger so he can rise to the top of the Demon Cult.

---

name: [Pakupaku desu wa] Tsuihousareta Ojou-sama no "Monster wo Taberu Hodo Tsuyoku Naru" Skill wa, 1-shoku de 1 Level Up suru Zendaimimon no Saikyou Skill deshita. 3-nichi de Jinrui Saikyou ni narimashita wa~!
description: Marquis' daughter, Charlotte, was blessed with a 「Gift」 known as 「Monster Eater」, which allows her to deliciously consume monsters. However, she was exiled from her real family because 'eating monsters is vulgar!' Thus, she embarks on a journey of adventure. And so, she reaches the pinnacle as the strongest existence...!!
tags: Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Tsuma, Shougakusei ni Naru.
description: The trials and tribulations of a single father, who one day meets the reincarnation of his deceased wife, who perished a decade before.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Office Workers, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Yattara
description: A gluttonous monster, Yattara, is drawn to a city of splendor and opulence. Its only pleasure in life: eating. It finds its favorite meal, children, and is ready to dig in as usual but then…a flash of inspiration strikes?
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Demons, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: Dragon Ball
description:
Dragon Ball follows the adventures of Goku from his childhood through adulthood as he trains in martial arts and explores the world in search of the seven mystical orbs known as the Dragon Balls, which can summon a wish-granting dragon when gathered. Along his journey, Goku makes several friends and battles a wide variety of villains, many of whom also seek the Dragon Balls for their own desires. Along the way becoming the strongest warrior in the universe.

Part II (the post-time skip portion) of Dragon Ball is also known as 'Dragon Ball Z' in North America.

---

- **The 4th Best Selling Manga in History**
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Be-bop High School
description:
The story revolves around the lives of two rough-and-tumble high school friends Kato Hiroshi and Nakama Toru, who seemed to make a habit of getting into trouble and starting up fights. In keeping with the spirit of the manga, Toru and Hiroshi sport slicked back 50's style ducktails and adopted exaggerated swaggers that made them comical and yet also oddly cool. The drama also features an assortment of outlandish characters who sport even weirder fashions and hairdos. To describe the action in this drama, think Fight Club meets The Breakfast Club.  
  
---
 - **Won the 12th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 1988, which it shared with Bonobono**
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Tyranny
description: I am from Egypt. I love drawing manga as a hobby. I am not good enough, but I am trying. Your comments and testimony motivate me to continue.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Comedy, Superhero, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Higawari Shippo no Ozaki-chan
description: A high school girl, Shiho Ozaki, whose tail grows back every day. Invited by her, a senior who visits the PE storage room almost daily finds himself at her mercy, with her tail, her ears, and whatever else she decides to do.
tags: Romance, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Owari no Seraph
description: One day, a mysterious virus appeared on Earth which killed every infected human over the age of 13. At the same time, vampires emerged from the world's dark recesses and enslaved mankind. Enter Hyakuya Yuuichirou, a young boy, who along with the rest of the children from his orphanage, are treated as livestock by the vampires. Even in captivity, Yuuichirou dreams big. He dreams of killing vampires. He dreams of killing them all.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The Color of the End: Mission in the Apocalypse
description:
A girl walks alone in a world without humans.
Her mission is to search for survivors and cleanse the land.
Will humans be found?
A story of loneliness and beautiful ruins.
___
[Alt Official Raw (KADOComi)](https://comic-walker.com/detail/KC_000736_S?episodeType=first)
tags: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Chronicles of Narnia: The Magician's Nephew
description: On a daring quest to save a life, two friends are hurled into another world, where an evil sorceress seeks to enslave them. But then the lion Aslan's song weaves itself into the fabric of a new land, a land that will be known as Narnia. And in Narnia, all things are possible.
tags: Award Winning, Time Travel, Animals, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Ad Astra - Scipio and Hannibal
description: This is the story of two of the greatest military commanders in history: the Roman Publius Cornelius Scipio and the Carthaginian Hannibal. The story follows the two of them from their early life on. Hannibal is initially shown as a strangely silent infant, who seemed like the gods forgot to put a soul in his little body. However, he soon begins to speak in a way that shows his remarkable abilities. Hannibal and Scipio are driven enemies, and their struggle shaped an era.
tags: Thriller, Historical, Action, Psychological, Animals, Survival, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: Monster Onna Kanbu wa Osanaki Yuusha wo Dekiaisuru
description: When a young hero appears, Arachne is ordered to hunt him down, and is moved by the hero's attitude and falls in love with him. On the contrary, she wants to use the power of the young hero to become the strongest demon... A reversal story of Arachne and the young hero who were trying to entangle each other but were entangled in love!?
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota

name: Akane Matsuri
description:
They are friends but not just friends.
This is a 4-koma manga about high school girls who just live their daily lives.

Akane: Short bob with black hair. She lives to enjoy life.
Matsuri: Cool blonde hair, serious at heart.
Azuki: Cute and petite dark girl.
Momiji: A sensible person who always quietly watches over everyone.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Followers of King
description: Gao Jing, you're a maniac. Almost exactly like Gao Sheng was. In your eyes, is the world truly so horrid, horrid enough that you'll go to such extremes to save it? Gao Jing, are these the rules you've laid down for every sect under the sun? You're so delusional your plans are something not even your great grandfather would've dreamed off. So be it then, go and execute your plan, I want to see, if all the sects in the world will be brought to their knees in front of you, or if the Jin dynasty will be destroyed by your very hands!
tags: Historical, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Yuusha-sama, Yukagen wa Ikaga desu ka?
description: The story of the former hero Loki and his time working at an onsen with his monster co-workers!
tags: Loli, Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Ushiro no Shoumen Kamui-san
description: Shizuka is a normal high school girl with the ability to see ghosts. Due to her peculiar tendency to attract ghosts, she works as an assistant to Kamui, a famous psychic. Kamui takes pride in his top-notch psychic abilities, but the way he exorcises ghosts is rather unusual!
tags: Ghosts, Comedy, Horror, Supernatural

name: 7-Nin no Nemuri Hime
description: A wandering prince set off to break an ancient curse bewitching the Kingdom of Amaryllis by waking up its princess with a kiss of true love. However, nobody told him there were 7 princesses to kiss and he must now take responsibility by living with them while they find out why the people of Amaryllis are unable to wake up. Will they reach a happily ever after?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Fantasy

name: Ogura-sanchi no Kinako
description: Not found
tags: 4-Koma, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Pseudo-Singularity IV: The Forbidden Advent Garden, Salem - Heretical Salem
description: As a result of the efforts of the people of Chaldea, the human incineration plan of those who called themselves the Magic King was bitterly stopped at the water's edge, and the destiny of the world seemed to be breathing again. However, suddenly, the singularity of the same level as the singularity so far is observed in modern times. A master who has opened up the future once again puts himself into a layershift to calm down the "subspecies singularities" that appeared in the cursed land "Salem."
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Zombies, Magical Girls, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Shokuba no Onnanoko ni Toushisuru Hanashi
description:
Hatamoto Ikuto, the manager of the local bookstore "BOOK FOREST", is an otaku who can't resist spending money on his favorite characters in games.
Todoroki Miran, the part-time leader, looks up to him but can't understand his obsession with spending on in-game things.
When Ikuto claims, "For me, spending money is an investment", Miran teases, "If that's the case, how about you invest in me...?"
As the two navigate a cycle of investment and returns, the distance between their hearts begins to shrink.
A unique and charming investment-themed romantic comedy!

(Source: Melonbooks, edited)
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: It’s Time to Change the Genre
description:
I woke up inside my favorite novel. 

Not as the protagonist, Luca Winterwald, but as Judith, his abusive aunt and the first character to die — time for a rewrite! 

I’ll hand Luca off to his loving, long-lost uncle as scripted, and then live my own life far from danger. At least, that was the plan. When his uncle arrives, Luca suddenly calls out, “Don’t leave!” 

Now, I must protect Luca from impending family tragedy, raise him to become the hero, and turn this villainess’s ending upside down!

---
