name: The Devil’s Body Temperature
description:
Bei Yao, a cheerful four-year-old, was reborn into 1996 and found herself living next door to a boy destined to become a formidable villain in the future. This boy, Pei Chuan, was only five at the time, confined to a wheelchair and deeply insecure.

Years later, when they were teenagers, Bei Yao had blossomed into the school's most admired beauty. Despite her popularity, Pei Chuan remained guarded and distant. When Bei Yao confessed her feelings for him, he reacted with a mixture of fear and longing.

Having known each other for two lifetimes, Bei Yao was determined to understand the complexities of Pei Chuan's character. As their bond deepened, she discovered a sensitive and vulnerable soul beneath his tough exterior. Their story is one of a healing love that blossoms between childhood sweethearts, as Bei Yao's warmth gradually melts away Pei Chuan's emotional barriers.
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Dropout kara no Sai Shuushoku-saki wa, Isekai no Saikyou Kishidan deshita
description: Violinist Masumi Todo gave up her professional career after failing in an international competition. Despite her disappointment, she is unable to give up the violin, but one day she suddenly falls down a flight of stairs and is lost in another world. In the midst of the confusion, she is accused of espionage and taken to a place where she is forced to explain herself to the Knight Commander Arc. In a situation of absolute desperation, Masumi's destiny is illuminated by a "violin" that has come to the other world with her.
tags: Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Music

name: Madowasenaide Yamori-kun
description: Mori and Yamori, who sits behind him, decide to change their image for the summer vacation. They make their summer vacation debut without any problems, but for some reason Yamori starts cross-dressing. And he keeps saying and doing flirtatious things...!? A hot topic on social media!! A comedy about the mismatched love between a handsome guy and a beautiful girl!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Maydare Tensei Monogatari: Kono Sekai de Ichiban Warui Majo
description:
Makia is a noble lady descended from an infamous witch. Thor, a boy who was raised with her and came from another world, is chosen to be the knight of the "savior." The two are forced apart, and to see Thor once again, Makia aims to be the top student at Magic School!  


---
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Ane no Tomodachi
description:
Hinako, a friend of Asahi's older sister, is a frequent guest at the home of the high school boy. She always misleads his mind with her suggestive attitude while treating him like a little brother... or rather, pet?
___
**Chapters 1 & 2 can be found in the [Pre-Serialization](https://mangadex.org/title/abad18cf-bf72-4bbc-97c8-b55dfa28f9b9/ane-no-yuujin).**
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Falling in Love With My Ex-Fiancé's Grandfather
description: After getting rejected by her fiancé, 20-year-old Mary Menoushire passed out from the shock. She then got possessed by a 50-year-old lady from another world... who thinks her (ex) fiancé's grandfather is hotter.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Candy & Cigarettes
description:
**"You don't need math for murder" - Miharu S.**    

Raizou Hiraga is a retired officer from the Tokyo Metropolitan Police Department. 
After learning that his grandson is stricken with a deadly illness requiring expensive treatment,
Raizou comes across a vacancy flier for the mysterious SS Agency and applies for the job. 
However, after taking his first job with 11-year-old Miharu Suzukaze as partner, he discovers 
that his new occupation is more than meets the eye…
tags: Thriller, Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Military, Drama, Delinquents, Police, Mystery

name: Atagoul Monogatari
description:
Atagoul Monogatari takes place in a fantasy world where humans and cats can talk to each other. 
The story revolves around the adventures of Hideyoshi, a big young cat, and his friends.
tags: Animals, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Anata-tachi Soredemo Sensei Desu ka!
description: One day, school teachers come as freeloaders to the inn run by his parents!? Kazami Hiro, a high school boy, decides to take care of the inn and his future!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Ookii Onnanoko wa Suki Desu ka?
description: Tachibana Souta is a bit of a multi-talented freeter who gets by from one part-time job to the next, his standout characteristic being that he's a bit short. One day he's roped by his older sister into 'serving' their college's volleyball team, of which she's a member. She also happens to be at least 6 and 1/2 ft. tall, as do the rest of the team's members who take quite the interest in Souta.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Incest, Sports, Crossdressing, Harem, School Life, Delinquents, Shota, Slice of Life

name: Mizuki-senpai’s Love Fortune-Telling
description:
A story about an unattractive second-year student, Sakagami, being teased around by a mysterious first-year student who is good at fortune-telling, Mizuki-senpai… But at the same time is actually showing signs that she likes him…

A frustrating and strange romcom begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: My Web Game Wife Is a Popular Idol IRL
description: Kazuto Ayanokoji is an ordinary high school boy. He spends his days playing online games as a hobby. One day, he discovers the true identity of a friend who is so close to him that they are married in-game. It turns out to be a cool idol from the same class, Rinka Mizuki. As Rinka tries to act as his wife in real life, Kazuto is forced to lead a dizzying life.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Naze ka S-kyuu Bijotachi no Wadai ni Ore ga Agaru Ken
description:
High school girls Sara Himekawa, Rin Kohinata, and Yuna Takamori are called “S-class beauties,” admired by everyone for their unparalleled beauty. While the school is abuzz with questions about the mysterious guy that the girls are talking about, Haruya Akasaki, a quiet boy in the class, is feeling anxious. In fact, the subject of the girls' talk is Haruya! He definitely does not want to draw that much attention at school, so he tries to make the girls lose interest in him, but it all backfires and…

This is a school harem comedy between a plain guy and “S-class beauties."
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation

name: Witches' Quarter
description: As demons start creeping in through the Witches' Quarter, its protector must rise to the occasion and stop them from invading the human world.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Zombies, Reverse Harem, Magical Girls, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Dirty Marriage
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Full Color

name: The Secret of Darkness Garden
description: A king adopted eleven children from different species. Including our main character, Jim. Jim is a demon and the son of the demon lord. However, even if his race is different, he still has a heart similar to a human's. One day, the kingdom he's living in was attacked by the generals of the demon lord. With the aim of protecting their peaceful lives, Jim looked forward to facing the threat coming into their lives.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Zombies, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: AI Kareshi to Mojyo Hakase
description:
Due to a request, the genius Dr. Sumiko developed an "AI boyfriend".  
Sumiko is pleased with her success, but the AI boyfriend began to recognize her as "his girlfriend"…!?  
Initially, Sumiko rejected the AI boyfriend.  
However, being subject to his constant love gradually leads her to acknowledge him…  
  
A hot topic on Twitter and pixiv! A love comedy between a handsome AI and an unpopular woman begins ♡  
  
Note: the series is marked as "Cancelled", but it is closer to "Discontinued/Abandoned", as it has not been updated since December 2018.  


---

**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/2_riko_7)  
- [Author's Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/2507244)
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy

name: Tanbo de Hirotta Onna Kishi, Inaka de Ore no Yome da to Omowareteiru
description:
Jin Mita, a farmer living in a small countryside town, discovers an unconscious female knight in his rice field one morning. She calls herself Seraphim, and she seems to have come from another world. She has no knowledge of this world and nowhere to go. Unable to bear seeing her like this, Jin offered to take her in, but apparently the people around him think that Seraphim is his wife...!?

(Source: Magazine Pocket)
tags: Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Seitokai Fukukaichou Yagami Sayuri wa Ganbatte Iru!
description:
Yagami Sayuri is the student council vice president, and her demanding president hates the fact that boys are in their school at all. 

There is a school legend that if a maiden offers her panties to the goddess statue in the courtyard, the goddess will help solve her problems. The actual problem-solving power, though, is with the student council, which monitors the statue's panty offerings. The president often insists Sayuri help solve the girls' problems in her secret identity of Mystic Heart, a scantily clad protector of the school's peace. Most of the students just think of Mystic Heart as a masochistic pervert. 

Sayuri usually ends up naked and humiliated in front of boys, and the shame helps her transform into her sadistic personality. In this form, she can beat up the boys and pee on them. 

The student council helps girls through many troubles, from misunderstandings between friends to peeping toms!
tags: Action, Comedy, Crossdressing, School Life

name: Midwood
description:
As the monster slayer troops, also known as 'Sretu', no longer functioned as it used to, humans became monster feed.
'Jin Cheongdo', who has been living in a world full of monsters for his entire life, uses a legendary item 'Midwood', to turn back in time, for the sake of killing 'Ian' who was the centerpiece of this whole mess...
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Hakui no Tora wa Gokudou de Zetsurin
description:
“I can’t believe my virginity is being taken like this――!”
Momo, a former track athlete, can no longer run due to an injury she sustained during her career. While her treatments aren’t progressing, Dr. Dan encourages her, saying, “Let’s overcome this together.” Moved by his strong words, Momo begins to trust him, only to later discover that Dan is actually the underboss of a yakuza gang controlling the underground world! As soon as she learns his secret, he reveals his true nature, saying, “After treatment, I need women to calm myself down.”
What she thought was a one-night fling turns into being loved deeply and passionately every day ― in ways she never imagined!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Drama

name: Tori Kissa!
description:
Wilcome, wilcome!  
This is a 4-koma about a cafe run by two avian sisters. Originally a oneshot, before winning a newbie contest and being awarded a serialization.

**Wikipedia**
- [Chinese (Traditional)](https://zh.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E9%B3%A5%E5%A8%98%E5%92%96%E5%95%A1)
- [Japanese](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%A8%E3%82%8A%E3%81%8D%E3%81%A3%E3%81%95!)
tags: Award Winning, Comedy, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Kawaii Kouhai ni Iwasaretai
description: Yasu likes his kouhai, Moriyama, who is at the same time extremely assertive, deadpan, and extremely passive aggressive.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: 【Oshi no Ko】After story
description:
This work takes its own route from the original "Oshi no Ko" manga from chapter 158. It portrays a daily life of Aqua and Ruby.

What whould happen if Fuyuko Niino actually stabbed Ruby Hoshino, being envious of young idol's success?
tags: Reincarnation, Psychological, Romance, Incest, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Gore, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Fuun Kara no Saikyou Otoko
description:
After having lived a life full of misfortune, Siegbert has been reincarnated as a result of an accident. His new family is so warm. He can't believe he was unlucky in his previous life.  

He thought he would live a peaceful life this time, but unfortunately, his luck level is abnormally high and his luckiness attracts "chance" and can make whatever his wish come true if he can tackle these "chances". However, these "chances" comes with a price, Siegbert and those around him has to face formidable enemies and a life-or-death situation.  

Siegbert is determined to beat all of the odds with his abnormally high magic power and appraisal eye that he got after reincarnating to protect those around him.
tags: Reincarnation, Martial Arts, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: You Are My Desire
description:
The battle for the scholarship raged like wildfire. At the entrance of the school director’s office, Lin Yujing and Shen Wan came face to face.

After exhausting their tears, the two people stared at each other blankly for three seconds before turning around in unison and leaving.

Shen Wan got onto his private helicopter while Lin Yujing climbed into her Rolls-Royce.

–This is a story of two rich people trying their best to look poor in front of the other.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Terror Night
description:
A certain town where rumors of the occult have suddenly been increasing.  
  
Sei, who lives in this town, encounters a strange girl. The girl wrongly thinks Sei is hitting on her and ends up tagging along with him. However, as it turns out, the strange girl is a certain legendary existence…
tags: Action, Romance, Horror, Supernatural

name: Match Rate 99.99%
description:
"I’ll give you 1 billion won now, and 2 billion won after you give birth."

Did I hit the jackpot?! Wouldn’t it be good to receive 3 billion won and then run away? Three times. We only have to sleep together three times.

…That idea completely changed my life.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Bonkura Bonbon House
description:
A neet, building a house?!
From “3am Dangerous Zone” and “Third-Generation Chemist Kyubee” author, Nemu’s Yoko’s latest work!

After dropping out of college without her parent’s consent, Kazuki returns to her hometown. Back in home, she manages to get her furious parents give her the remaining 2 million yen from her tuition and decides to live in her grandmother’s renovated beauty parlor.

However, even with her unstoppable 2 million yen, it isn’t enough for Kazuki to work on the house and fulfill all of her desires!!!
She ends up renting a part of the house to Seidai, a hairdresser, who was looking for a place to settle down his shop, but before that… it must be renovated…

With the help of Eikichi, a former interior designer, walls and ceilings will be teared down, restoring Kazuki’s house from top to bottom, and with that, Kazuki’s DIY life will officially begin…!

What’s to come to the DIY life of this blockhead? Maybe love will come?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Kimi dake wa Shindemo Gomen
description: The admirable middle-school girl gifted with both beauty and intelligence, Yagami Mitsuko, has a secret. And that is, being an incredibly enthusiastic fan of her classmate Souichirou. From his "good morning" until "good night", she closely watches him wherever he goes. His favorite food, his body weight & height, his bedtime and school courses, even the TV shows he watches, she is undoubtedly a fan who knows everything about him... Or rather, she has become his stalker completely... However, a boy who likes her chases her with the same type of infatuation appeared……!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Akujo ga Kishi no Kyouai Kara Nogareru Houhou
description:
“A fate where you’re destined to be killed by an obsessive knight…!!”

The protagonist finds herself reincarnated as Victoria, the villainess in a romance novel.
Victoria’s inevitable fate is to be killed by her loyal knight, Cain.
Under the influence of a charm spell, Cain loves her blindly, and eventually, that love spirals out of control.
On top of that, if Cain discovers that the real Victoria’s soul has been replaced by someone else, things will definitely not end well…!
To avoid this deadly future, Victoria decides to break the charm spell while pretending to be the villainess.
However, Cain’s gaze, which initially felt terrifying, gradually becomes sweeter and more affectionate…!!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess

name: Orc no Shuhai ni Shukufuku wo
description: Half-Orc Elpis and Margit, the daughter of a corrupt nobleman, go on an adventure in search of WHISKEY, left behind by the teleporter Tanaka!
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy

name: The Amazing Digital Circus
description:
Where is the exit?

The comic adaptation of the dark comedy begins!

Published monthly in print in Corocoro Ichiban! and online in Weekly Corocoro Comic.
___
**Cooperation:** InfoLens Inc.
tags: Reincarnation, Psychological, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Bungo Stray Dogs Gaiden - Ayatsuji Yukito VS. Kyougoku Natsuhiko
description: Known for his biting wit and rapid-fire brain cells, Yukito Ayatsuji is a detective and top-ranked skill user who possesses the ability to expose any crime. When a request to investigate a puzzling murder incident hits his desk, Ayatsuji must team up with Mizuki Tsujimura, a spunky agent sent from the Special Division, to tackle the case. Can the unlikely duo get to the bottom of this mystery?!
tags: Action, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Celeb Lady
description: The Ugly Duckling Becomes the Empire’s Top Celebrity! Juliet Karenina, the era’s hottest celebrity, wakes up in the body of noblewoman Louvetria Diorlos in another world. Faced with a clumsy body and a timid personality, Louvetria endures bullying from those around her: Twins who mock and ostracize her. Her unrequited love, Kedric, who scowls at her. Her step-grandmother, Molga, who torments her in secret. But with Juliet’s spirit inside her, Louvetria won’t tolerate it anymore. “I won’t stand for this, no matter who it is. “Louvetria’s bold transformation begins!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic

name: Nito no Joreishi
description: Gotsuji and Uruka, two exorcists, spend their days hunting down and banishing "evil spirits." Their mission is to track down and slay a specific malevolent spirit. At the heart of this quest lies Gotsuji's deep, unresolved grief and vengeance for a woman who died long ago. While Gotsuji is consumed by a thirst for revenge, Uruka, who struggles to understand this obsession, faithfully stays by his side. Together, these two exorcists are bound on a journey, but where will it lead?
tags: Monsters, Action, Samurai, Supernatural

name: Kanjuten
description: An interconnected omnibus of stories that explores the subtle distortions of everyday life, delving into how ordinary experiences can take unsettling turns. Each narrative weaves together to examine the eerie sensations that arise when the familiar becomes uncanny.
tags: Psychological, Ghosts, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Henkyou Mob Kizoku no Uchi ni Totsuidekita Akuyaku Reijou ga, Mechakucha Dekiru Yoi Yome Nanda ga?
description:
Ragna, the heir to a frontier noble family, is a reincarnated former Japanese citizen who realizes that the world he now lives in is the setting of an otome game. Dreaming of a carefree life as an adventurer, his plans are derailed when a war takes his family, forcing him to take on the responsibilities of managing his family’s lands. Struggling with the unfamiliar duties of a lord, his already chaotic life takes another turn when an unexpected engagement to a noblewoman from a higher-ranking family is arranged.

To his surprise, the bride-to-be is Alicia, the "villainess" of the otome game's story — a character destined for heartbreak, a demonic pact, and ultimate destruction. Now sharing his life with someone fated for tragedy, Ragna is swept up in the wheels of fate. Can he rewrite the predetermined outcomes of this world and secure a peaceful life for himself and Alicia?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun: If Episode of Mafia
description: The beloved characters of Mairimashita! Iruma-kun star in this Mafia-based spinoff! Young Iruma saves an injured mob boss from death... and then becomes his grandson!?
tags: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Drama, Police

name: re CERVIN
description: Once upon a time, an evil dragon lived in this world. To fight it, humans joined forces with the inhabitants of Paradise and, one day, were able to seal an ancient evil. But years passed and the seal was broken, and the dragon was freed to wreak havoc and destroy countries again. A king who has lost his kingdom and a girl who has lost her memory.
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Doteihen Reijou ni Hyoui Shita 800-nen Mae no Akujo wa Hissori Seishun o Tanoshinde Iru
description:
Nora, who had been sealed for 800 years for threatening to destroy the world, was very bored. One day, she heard the voice of a girl—Cecily—wishing to die, and was awakened. By that time, she'd grown feeble, and her body had shriveled. Thus, Nora proposed to Cecily.

"If that's the case, would you lend me your body? In exchange, I promise that in a year, you'll have a friend, a lover, a warm family, and promising future prospect for your perfect restart!"

The "Incorrigible Villainess," Nora, was resurrected in the body of the "Withered Grass Lady," Cecily.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Tsukareta Ouji-sama to Kyouikugakari no Goreijou no Hanashi
description:
Steven, the first prince of the Kingdom of Fierte, used to be called the perfect prince, but now he just spends his days drinking alone in his remote palace from noon onwards in a lethargic mood.
One day, a woman of his age named Ada, the daughter of the Duchess of Raffine, suddenly arrives at his doorstep.
At first, Steven was not pleased with her, but gradually he begins to open up to her.
In the midst of his life, Stephen begins to remember memories of his childhood with Ada...?
tags: Romance, Fantasy

name: I Have No Health
description:
I’ve gone into the body of ‘Ninaina’, the weakest character, who was fated to die once winter came!

With such with weak stamina that it’s hard to even take walks, eat, or just stand, let alone exercise, I have such a tragic life that I even have to endure assassination attempts from my grandfather…

“I will definitely recover my health!”

“Kaiser” who comes to Ninaina’s side with a cold gaze. Receiving the order that he has to keep Ninaina alive, he comes to her side and protects her.

“You will not die. For now.”

---
Ninenya Seiah’s misfortunes began from birth, owing to her mother’s traitorous reputation and subsequent death. Ninenya was thus banished from the noble Seiah family and forcibly separated from her father, Lord Rubenio Seiah. In extremely poor health, Ninenya has mere months to live. To save his daughter, Rubenio enlists the mysterious Count Adelman as her protector. Ninenya must now work with Adelman to improve her poor health and stop her from becoming the victim of a deadly family feud.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B1%B4%EA%B0%95%EC%9D%B4-%EC%97%86%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/2503), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57458770)

tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Main Duties of the Vice President
description: In the student council room, you'll never find more than two people: the president, Haiya Gin (that's me), and the vice president, Kurishita Namida. We used to have a bunch of other officers too, but since the vice president took care of everything so easily, everyone stopped coming. She's incredibly beautiful, and an honor student with no flaws to speak of, but... For some reason, she's always messing with me, and only me?! A comedy featuring the antics of a strangely doting, tall vice president and an adorably tiny president begins!!!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Mankitsu Shitai Jouren-san
description: Izumi, a university student part-timing at a manga cafe, got curious about a regular customer. Her name is Honami, a high school girl who's been coming to the manga cafe recently. This defenseless and seemingly cute girl who he can't take his eyes off of has a secret...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Utsushicha Dame-na Kao
description: Misa is a cabaret girl who frequents a lesbian bar used for one night stands. She meets a shy girl by the name of "Ai" one night and finds herself attracted to her, and discovers later that she is actually a famous actress...
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Devoro
description: If the world fell apart and you could do nothing but survive, how would you do it? What purpose or peace can you find when all that remains is the ruins of the past?
tags: Monsters, Action, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: It Seems Like My Friend Has Already Made Several Loops
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Crossdressing, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Gakuen Mono no Otome Game no Sekai ni Tensei Shita kedo, Cheat-mochi no Haikei Danshi Seito datta you desu
description: Kenta, a freelancer, is reincarnated into a world that resembles a school otome game that his sister likes, and he finds himself a male student with a background character. In his reincarnation, Kenta tries his best to improve his living environment as a commoner, Kent, by making his part-time bakery across the street from his house thrive, but for some reason, more and more attractive women start to appear around him.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Soloist in a Cage
description:
In a prison so big that it is called a city, all sorts of criminals have been amassed. Due to the inescapable walls, the population only continues to grow. Within are a pair of siblings - a young girl and a recently born boy. What will be their fate in this desolate, cold city…? A story of hope and struggle begins.
___
**Official English Volumes:** [Seven Seas](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/soloist-in-a-cage/)
tags: Action, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Drama, Police, Tragedy

name: Amagami-san Chi no Enmusubi
description: Kamihate Uryuu, orphaned since childhood, receives an invitation to stay at the local Shinto shrine. All he wanted was a quiet place to study so that he can fulfill his dream of making it into a top medical school, but after arriving there, he comes across three beautiful shrine maiden sisters... and the head priest requests that he marry one of them and take over the shrine.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: My Harem Consists Entirely of Female Demon Villains
description: I, the earthling "hero" of this story, crossed over into another world based on a video game and suddenly appeared in a villainous female demon's bed when I arrived. If not for the fact that I had married all the villains in the game before crossing over, I'd have been killed pretty quickly. Now, the villains keep pestering me, asking me to help them rule the world, and vying for my hand in marriage. What am I supposed to do? I'll await your answers online! It's urgent!
tags: Long Strip, Harem, Full Color

name: Wakaranai Desu Yoshida-san
description:
Tsukumo Yamada is a simple and unremarkable college student. 

As he is getting ready to go home after finishing his university lecture as usual, a solitary beautiful woman, Mao Yoshida, who is rumored to be a "mermaid princess," passes by. While the boys are in an uproar, Yamada is secretly summoned by Yoshida. When they are alone, Yoshida presses against him. In fact, Yamada and Yoshida have an intimate relationship... 

However, he is unable to grasp the romantic distance between them because Yoshida is too expressionless, and he is having a sweet but bittersweet college life, unable to go from "friend" to "lover".
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Maou to Ryuuou ni Sodaterareta Shounen wa Gakuen Seikatsu wo Musou suru You desu
description: A boy named Ruisha is trapped in a distorted space created by the ancient hero. What he finds there is the Demon King and the Dragon King, who should have been defeated by the hero 300 years ago. Ruisha befriends the Demon King and the Dragon King, and is trained by them, going from a weak child to a legendary warrior with the power of both demons and dragons. Using his power, Ruisha escaped from the strange place and was accepted into the magic academy where the hero’s descendants live. And now he will have to face many challenges to free the Demon King and Dragon King.
tags: Loli, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Uchi no Deshi ga Itsu no Manika Jinrui Saikyou ni Natte-ite, Nan no Sainou Monai Shishou no Ore ga, Sore wo Koeru Uchuu Saikyou ni Go Nintei Sareteiru Kudan ni Tsuite
description: Takumi was banished from the party and lived alone in the mountains. Leia, who claims to be a disciple of Alice, a girl who once protected and cared for him, came to him. She has become a disciple of Takumi, who is rumored to be the strongest in the universe. Since then, a dragon, a great sage, and a goblin king have visited Takumi, who has no talent, and is suspected to be a demon king!?
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Oshitai shite Orimasu.
description: On the day of a matchmaking interview between distinguished families... Riko wanted to call it off because she's in love with her Oshi, while her counterpart Taiyou was also aiming to call it off because of his fear of women! However, they're both able to value what the other "loves" and come to an understanding, so they decide to pretend to be dating in order to deceive their parents!? This is the start of your new favorite Handcraft Boy x Yumejoshi Girl Fake Love Lifestyle♪
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Isekai de Kojiin wo Hiraita kedo, Naze ka Darehitori Sudatou to Shinai Ken
description: Masatsugu was brought from another world in a hero summoning and ended up being part of the lowest possible caste. Awaiting this boy, who possess nothing but elementary skills, is managing an orphanage full of beautiful girls! But, his annoying days are just starting as he finds the building in ruins, and he also has to pay off the huge debt the former director left! And that’s not all, he has no time to rest from all the scumbags threatening the orphanage! Will Masatsugu and the orphans be able to protect their precious home?
tags: Loli, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The House of Diana's Choice
description: After being orphaned at the tender age of 7, poor Diana had little choice but to slave away as a maid to survive. But her fortune takes a turn when she encounters a mysterious mage who introduces himself as her mother's friend. He gifts her better clothes, a beautiful house, and even her mother's inheritance. All that's left is for Diana to spend her days living happily... until another chance meeting with a certain individual reveals a family secret that will change her life forever.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Yamazaki-san
description: Won a Semi-Grand Prize from the *Tonari no Young Jump* COMITIA 145 4-Hour Speed Manga Awards.
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life

name: One Piece Party
description: Spin-off of One Piece, which takes place post-timeskip, showing the cast in SD/chibi form and features their hilarious antics around various islands while out in the sea.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Kawaii nante Kiitenai!!
description:
Madoka is obsessed with shoujo manga—specifically manga that features younger, innocent guys who fall for their Senpai. So she should be thrilled when a gorgeous kohai comes to work at her father’s restaurant…except he’s rude and standoffish, and wants nothing to do with her. But when she protects him from some extra-pushy fans, he finds that maybe he’s found someone letting his walls down for…!

---
Madoka is a high school girl who loves cute younger boys. One day, Shikura arrives as a part-time worker at her parents' diner! Shikura is beautiful and handsome, but he's not super nice?! She thought she would never like him, but the way he sometimes looks is agonizingly cute! How can she not really like him?!
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Laurels of Sand
description: Nanashima’s high school baseball team missed going to the Koshien by one heartbreaking game during his 2nd year in school. Now as a 3rd year and the team captain, he sees that the team is nothing compared to last year. The all star starters from last year have graduated and Nanashima is left with unskilled and, more importantly, unmotivated players that have no shot at making the Koshien. That is when Mr. Toku, an old man in the neighborhood who has watched every practice and every game the school has ever played for the past few decades, secretly entrusts Nanashima with 10.000.000 yen. Mr. Toku wants Nanashima to use the money however he wants to ensure the team makes it to the Koshien. But that large of an untraceable fund is too big of a responsibility for a high school teenager and even a goodhearted kid like Nanashima might fall into its temptation.
tags: Sports

name: RuriDragon
description:
Ruri, a high school student, woke up one morning to find that she had suddenly grown horns on her head!

Her mother told her that she might have inherited it because her father is a dragon. Ruri's mother tells her that she might have inherited it from her father, and she is puzzled, but goes to school anyway....

Her classmates are curious about the spontaneous horn, and another dragon constitution is revealed!

With a slight change in the usual routine, the daily life of Dragon Girl Ruri begins!
tags: Award Winning, Monsters, Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Sirens Won't Sing For You
description: Kanoha Takanashi is a descendent of Sirens and is infatuated with her classmate, Kei Shibuya. Torn between her feelings and the Siren's unique nature of yearning to eat the one they love, Kanoha musters up the courage to confess to him—only to get completely rejected on the spot! But what happens when she finds out Shibuya-kun's secret…? (MANGA Plus)
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Police

name: Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
description:
Magic Level 99990000 All-Attribute Great Sage
All over the world, Monsters suddenly began appearing. The only person who could save humanity from “The Calamity” was “The Great Sage”, Ichikami Atsumu.
But, despite being satisfied in his death, he was reincarnated into the body of a boy who was bullied into killing himself, Kusanagi Minato.
Atsumu, waking up in a Japan fifty years into the future, is shocked to see a peaceful world, and where magic has become far weaker compared to when he was alive.
For now, Atsumu decides to go back to Kamui Magic Academy as Minato, but learns that mages are nothing more than a relic of the past, and in their place exist a class of privileged nobles
.After blowing off his bragging, low-levelled bullies, Atsumu gains the interest of a noble magician girl, Mizuha Yuika, as well as his schoolmates and teachers.
What’s more, Atsumu finds a sign that the Calamity, which was supposed to have been subdued, will return––
“It looks like my power is still needed”
Within the soul of student lies the Great Sage?!
The strongest Great Sage will change this world drunk on peace.
With his reincarnation in the future set, the curtain opens on a new Hero’s story!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Inukai-san Chi no Oshikake JK
description: One day, the thirty-something salaryman Inukai met a high school girl Komugi who claimed to be the reincarnation of his childhood dog. Now she comes over every day looking to play with her owner, but her pet antics don't seem so innocent in human form! A semi-cohabitation comedy between a dog-girl and a single office worker!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Succubus ga Yattekita Ohanashi
description: The story of a Succubus who comes to the human world to absorb life force energy. Accidentally, she lives as a child in a strange man's house.
tags: Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Foxes Always Lie
description:
Tang Ran is a bright and cheerful little fox spirit. To graduate from the Monster Academy, she transforms into a human college student hoping to seduce a human and make them fall in love with her. However, little does she know that the reserved human female professor she has a crush on, Su Qingci, is actually a…

One lie leads to another. To make the other person fall in love with them first, the fox must spin an endless web of “lies.”
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Girls' Love, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Akuyaku Reijoutachi wa Yuruganai
description:
It has been half a year since Aini Mikkola, the saintess in training who hails from a barony in the countryside, arrived at the Royal Academy. 

The school is in turmoil. 

The boys, the sons of aristocrats, are at the mercy of Aini's innocent, natural cuteness, while the girls are angry at her disregard for the manners of the aristocracy. In the midst of all this, there were three daughters who were dubbed “the villainesses,” in reference to a popular story. Seraphina, the crown prince's fiancée and the daughter of an upright marquise. Sandra, the noble daughter of a viscount who made their wealth from commerce. Bernardetta, the brilliant daughter of the current Prime Minister's who is a marquise. 

When a sense of disquiet begins to grow in the school, these women finally stand up! To correct Aini's mistakes and to follow their own hearts.

This is a record of the battle between the three “villainesses” and the saintly apprentices, a battle for the way of life of women.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Kirawaremono no Akuyaku Reisoku ni Tensei shita no ni, Naze ka Mawari ga Hanatte Oite Kurenai
description:
A modern Japanese office worker suddenly dies and finds himself reincarnated into a game world... as the ugly, pushover son of a villain, Klaus Muller! 

Realizing that if he plays out the game as it is in the original, he will be condemned and executed by the hero, he begins to take action to avoid the catastrophic ending. Klaus puts in a lot of effort and gains the trust of those around him, including the heroine and his family. In the midst of all this, he unintentionally makes a big impact and attracts attention…!? 

The grand opening of a fantasy about a scumbag’s big comeback!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Toratsuki-kaicho, Teawase negaimasu!!
description: Saruta Torasuke, an idiot who loves to fight, senses the hidden strength of student council president Fujishiro Senju, and challenges him to a match. In the midst of their fight, something changes in Fujishiro...?
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life

name: Not found
description:
Work, sleep, work, sleep... what a dull existence
Why even live?!
No hopes, no dreams
Everything’s predictable...
Suicide is salvation
But when you wake up in purgatory...
...and it's the same world you left?

One option left
Let's turn this fuckin' world upside down


The story of "Evol" begins in a village occupied by an armed group when a young girl, driven by despair, attempts suicide. She survives and wakes up, but when a man tries to drive her into a corner, a strange phenomenon occurs. The place changes, and something also happens to the boy who wakes up in the hospital after committing suicide.
tags: Action, Crime, Superhero, Fantasy

name: Baki Hanma - Son of Ogre (Shinsoban Release)
description: The climax of the Baki series, "Hanma Baki", newly re-edited! Yujiro Hanma, the world's strongest creature, vs. Baki Hanma, the world's strongest high schooler... A spat between father and son on an unprecedented scale begins here!
tags: Action, Sports, Martial Arts, Military, Philosophical

name: I Was Forced by the System to Become a Villain
description:
Lin Bei, who traveled through time and became the second senior brother of Lingxi Peak of the Qingyun Sect, determined to be a good person, but ended up getting entangled in a system that specialized in cultivating supervillains.

Lin Bei had no choice but to go against his original intention and turn into a big bad guy to compete with the countless children of destiny on the Kyushu Continent for luck and save his life.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Both the Same
description:
‘Ha Miro’, a clumsy yet loveable rookie magazine editor, meets mosquito man ‘Mo Ginam’, who can become a ‘normal [ilban]’ person (when together) when ‘blood [pi]’ is ‘cha’.

‘Ha Miro’, the rookie editor for a third-rate fashion magazine company receives an e-mail from rookie model ‘Lee Jihyeon’s manager. With an excited heart, she excitedly sends a deposit over the phone……
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Toru ni Taranai
description: Two university students struggling with money get inspired after watching a couple earn big money through adult content streaming. Despite not being in a relationship, they end up caught in the flow of making videos.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Temple of Dragon King
description:
This series is adapted from a novel on the zhulang site. 

Lin Qinghan’s grandfather (her father’s father) is facing an imminent danger. His relatives disregarded the stability of Lin conglomerate and used various despicable means to inherit properties owned by him. President Qinghan was framed in the process. However, her husband, Zhang Xuan, who owns the title of “Satan” among the Lords of Dragon King Temple, is resolving everything one by one.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Mafia, Harem, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: SEXY Lupin III
description: SEXY Lupin III is a 5 chapter side story of Lupin III published to promote the airing of Lupin III Part 3 (anime), featuring more explicit versions of its episodes.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Drama, Police, Mystery

name: If You Are Not Careful, Your Name Will Go Down in History
description: Tu Ye, who traveled to ancient times, wanted to kill his country and return to modern times. However, due to a strange combination of circumstances, he got blessed by "fainting", and step by step pushed Daqian, who was about to be destroyed, onto the road to the first empire.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Moonstruck
description: If you love someone, what kind of things might you do? The desire to destroy even while in love, the dilemma of wanting to ruin a love that grows deeper. This is a deeply probing collection of high-stimulation romance short stories titled Moonstruck, exploring how dangerous the emotion of love can sometimes be.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Gore, Drama, Vampires, Full Color

name: There Are No Benefits for the Possessor
description:
Airi, a 10-year experienced professional.

Although she awakened her mana, her pitiful talent led her to go into debt for 3 years to learn magic, only to master hand-washing techniques. In the end, her family collapsed and she fell to the status of a maid.

As a maid, Airi was locked in the duke’s underground library due to the pranks of the young master. There, she found a sandwich appearing daily, a strange magic circle, and only books. Thus, she was forcibly confined to the Academy of Magic Theories…

“When I get out, I’ll sue that kid… No, just let me out.”
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Rascal Does Not Dream of Siscon Idol
description: Not found
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Valkyrie Profile - Enix Supercomic Theater
description: A manga anthology, based on the first Valkyrie Profile role-playing game "Lenneth". It's a collection of shortstories by various mangaka.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Video Games, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Ura de Yancha na Gouinda-san
description:
Bonsuke Hirano, an exceptionally ordinary high school boy, returns to his homeroom after school to pick something up, only to find the school's number-one serene beauty, Kokuru Goinda, fidgeting around in his desk...

"Huh? Does she...like me? Wait, maybe not?"
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Seishun Buta Yarou wa Yumemiru Shoujo no Yume wo Minai
description: Just before summer vacation starts, Makinohara Shouko, a middle school second year student, met a high school student named Azusagawa Sakuta. Sakuta gave Shouko a desire to live, then...
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: The Exiled Heavy Knight Knows How to Game the System
description:
"You good-for-nothing bastard. You are the son of a Sword Saint, yet you dare pull such a defective Class?!"

During the〈Divine Blessing Ceremony〉of the 15-year-old Elma who came from a lineage of Sword Saints, he had manifested a commonly deemed defective class known as the Heavy Knight. He had been deprived of his position as the next head of the Edvan Household and was then exiled. The Heavy Knight class had an unbalanced status and useless skills, to top it off, it was even said to be a class cowardly and indolent people have.

But, Elma knew better—that this world was the world of the game he had used to play before—and that the Heavy Knight class was the strongest class to exist. Elma made full use of the knowledge he had in his previous life and began his efficient walkthrough of the world he was reincarnated into.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Tower Dungeon
description:
The setting is a certain kingdom. In order to save the kidnapped princess of the kingdom, the Kingsguard squadron challenges the "Dragon Tower", a gigantic structure floating in the middle of the sky, but they are blocked by powerful demons. A provocation is made by a neighboring village to replenish the injured personnel, and when a young man is sent to the tower, the wheel of fate begins to turn.
___
[Alt Official Raw (Comic DAYS)](https://comic-days.com/episode/14079602755364316216)
[Official English (K MANGA) - United States only!](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10604/episode/353121)
tags: Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Fantasy

name: TACIT
description:
The world that fell due to pollutants that release the zombie virus and the people who adjusted to that place.
A village called 'Amina' that had great resources and was where professor 'Simon' lived.
However, the people of 'Amina' fall into despair after 'Simon' disappears.
And 'Ruby' who was born in 'Amina'.
Incidents that had been buried slowly start to reappear because of her...

---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001660)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Zombies, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Pokémon SPECIAL Scarlet & Violet
description: Violet, the “prince of speed” who drives Miraidon, runs through the Paldea region in search of the “secret spice” to regain the ability of Miraidon! A showdown with the Nushi Pokemon! Operation Stardust! And the other main character...!?
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Sports, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Zense wa Kentei. Konjou Kuzu Ouji
description:
He was called a Sword Emperor who lived for the sword and died by the sword. And his end was a tragedy. 

However, by strange coincidence, he was reincarnated as the third prince in a country. He was enjoying his lazy lifestyle away from swords and heroism. As a consequence, people began referring to him as Prince Trash.

He never cared about his derogatory name until one day, he encounters someone who gets the wheel of fate to move in motion.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: The Villainess Doesn't Need a New Husband!
description:
What kind of dogs are there?

"The person who will be my groom is already dead!"

It's unfair that she died so absurdly, but she possessed the villain. And that, of course, while holding a 'soul wedding'! All he has is a sunfish body and a run-down mansion.

No, the dead groom isn't rich, but he even has debts? It's the original, it's Nabal, and I have to find my way of life first!

Meanwhile, the Duke of Fitzren came to visit her, claiming to be a close friend of her late husband. If this man touches the hearts of modern people by making warm bath water and iced americano, I think he can be a good shield to overcome this harsh world...

"Please be my fake mistress!"
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I Ran Away and Got Married
description:
“You’re mine.”

When Raphia met her demise after having been used and thrown away by her benefactor, Yuri, she went back nine years in the past.

‘I’m not going to relive that hell!’

Running away from her benefactor, she went to Kasein Soleia, Yuri’s archnemesis, and signed a new sponsorship contract with him.

“I shall kill every single person you despise, Milord.”

“The necessary role happens to be open, and you might just be the right person for it.”

Young Duke. This is a sponsorship contract, right? But why . . . why are we getting married?

===

“Throughout the time I won’t be by your side . . . I will think of nothing but your small, cute head.”

That low voice sent shivers down her spine.

“I can’t believe you’re leaving. I’ll just . . .”

Kasein looked at her sharply as if he was daring her to continue making up excuses.

“You have to answer well, brat. Depending on what you say, all the wagon and shoe craftsmen of the Empire might lose their livelihood.”

Despite his harsh words, Kasein’s touch was gentle. He couldn’t take his eyes off of Raphia, who strangely grew more beautiful by the day.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8F%84%EB%A7%9D%EC%B3%A4%EB%8D%94%EB%8B%88-%EA%B2%B0%ED%98%BC%EC%9D%84-%ED%95%98%EA%B2%8C-%EB%90%90%EC%8A%B5%EB%8B%88%EB%8B%A4/3299), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/61190666)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Witch of Thistle Castle
description:
An experienced witch is ordered to teach magic to a gifted lonely boy captured by the church in modern-day Edinburgh, Scotland.  
  
- Social Media: [@witch\_of\_tc](https://twitter.com/witch_of_tc)
tags: Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Not found
description: An official spinoff of the Senki Zesshou Symphogear series! The divas' next battlefield is a warm gourmet comedy with the chief kitchen maid, Shirabe! Another Symphogear ballad, fresh from the kitchen.
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Goblin Slayer Gaiden: Year One
description: A prequel series revealing Goblin Slayer's past and the events that led him to become an adventurer with the sole purpose of exterminating all goblins from the world.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Kare to Kanojo no Sentaku
description:
A new relationship begins after a seven year reunion!  
  
After being separated for seven years between Hokkaido and Tokyo, a young man waits at the airport to reunite with his best friend. However, what arrives instead is a message from his best friend saying he will be late, and a mysterious beauty! The ever-spirited mangaka, Hiroki Ohara, makes his debut on Comic Newtype!
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Yowamushi Pedal - Spare Bike
description: These are the recollections of a group of men who bet everything on their bicycles. The central pillars of their respective teams, the 3rd years. New stories revealing their pasts is about to begin!!
tags: Comedy, Sports, Drama

name: Jujutsu Literature Club
description: Ever thought, what if jjk characters were swapped with completely unrelated ones? if the answer’s yes, then I guess my 'manga' is worth checking out.For now, I'm adapting part of the gojo vs sukuna fight, but with monika and sayori as the characters.In the lore of JJLC , this fight happens after monika deleted the other 3 girls, but due to a 'bug' ,sayori managed to avoid it. Since monika's power doesn't work on sayori for some reason, they'll have to fight.
tags: Monsters, Action, Martial Arts, Self-Published, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: A Trace of You
description: After a terrible fire all but consumes Sihoo’s home, his life has finally gone back to normal except…he has no memories. An amnesiac, he can’t remember much beyond his own name and the café he works at. Then, one day, his former classmate Yesung Min walks in and helps Sihoo remember everything that ever mattered: they were in love. From the ashes of his life, comes an old flame.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Nito no Taidana Isekai Shoukougun ~Saijaku Shoku "Healer" nano ni Saikyou wa Cheat desu ka?~
description: Hidako Masamune is a high school student who suffers from continuous bullying by his classmates. Becoming tired of it all, he decides to commit suicide, but instead he is transported to another world along with all his classmates. When they arrive, they find that they now possess amazing abilities but he was only granted the status of a "healer," the weakest skill of all. The king decides to get rid of him by transporting him to another faraway place, but not before Hidako swears revenge against the king, the kingdom, and all of his classmates.
tags: Action, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: TV SHOPPING
description:
A collection of creepy, unsettlingly funny and super odd horror oneshots from the Horror M magazine that will make you go ( o_o)

1 • テレビショッピング
2 • 小顔
3 • みどりちゃん のお裁縫
4 • —Mama— ママ
5 • クリスマス キャラメル
6 •  ゴキブリの油ぶくれ
7 • 花開かず枯れる蕾
tags: Psychological, Comedy, Anthology, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: The Story of the Ugly Witch and the Blind Young Man
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Kusuriya no Hitorigoto
description: Maomao, a young woman trained in the art of herbal medicine, is forced to work as a lowly servant in the inner palace. Though she yearns for life outside its perfumed halls, she isn’t long for a life of drudgery! Using her wits to break a “curse” afflicting the imperial heirs, Maomao attracts the attentions of the handsome eunuch Jinshi and is promoted to attendant food taster. But Jinshi has other plans for the erstwhile apothecary, and soon Maomao is back to brewing potions and…solving mysteries?!
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Medical, Slice of Life, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Touch
description:
Tatsuya Uesugi, the older brother who has no relationship with the word "hard work," and Kazuya Uesugi, the younger brother who tries his hardest in everything he does. 

They are twin brothers. They have known Minami Asakura, the only daughter of the neighboring coffee shop "Minamikaze" since childhood. You can't take your eyes off the "youth" of these three...!


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2008)

---
- **Won the 28th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen**
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Rakujitsu no Pathos
description:
What happens when next door to upcoming mangaka Fujiwara moves Yuuki, who was his teacher back in high school and first crush?  
  
Yuuki, now a married woman, is starting a new life in the city, however her husband is always away on business trips. She finds comfort in the company of her former student, but what she doesn't realize is that Fujiwara can listen to everything happening in her apartment through the building's thin walls…
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama

name: Enoch
description: “Chimeras” are people that have been infused with animal DNA in order to give them superpowers and abilities, however society doesn’t favor them so they live in fear and rejection. Our main character, code name “01”, works as a mercenary who happens upon an old acquaintance. He’s then given a job to protect and transport Enoch, a girl who is sought out to be the perfect “material”, to the borders of Canada.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: White Cat Legend
description: This amusing and charming story happened in 7th century ,when the first and only female monarch of ancient China got the throne. We follow the daily life of Chen Shi, a kind young man who came to the capital city Luoyang to look for his brother. To find him, he went to the Dali Court (a government institute like nowadays High Court of Justice). One thing led to another, he eventually became a secretary for Li Bing, a senior official with the appearance of a white cat.
tags: Historical, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Crime, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Fantasy Bishoujo Juniku Ojisan to
description:
Hinata Tachibana, a beleaguered 32-year-old office worker, and his handsome best friend Tsukasa Jinguuji were summoned to another world by a naked goddess. However, because of the goddess's mischief, Tachibana was turned into a peerless beautiful girl?! To get back his body, he has to go on a journey with his best friend to defeat the demon king!!   
  
However... will they be able to keep their hands off each other!?  
  
"An older man that became a beautiful girl" and "A handsome older man"! Let the madness-filled another world journey rom-com begin!!
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Office Workers, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Kao dake yoi Classmate ga Yatara to Guigui Kuru Yuri no Hanashi
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Adaptation

name: 100-nichi Go ni ××× suru Onna Shachou to Shinyuu Shain
description:
Mai is a new employee who made a bad mistake in front of the beautiful company president, Eri. Eri asked Mai to take responsibility, by going out with her, even though they are both women. What will happen with their relationship over the next 100 days!? It's a yuri pure love comedy between the company president x a new employee!

**NOTE: As of April 16, 2023, the series has been terminated due to the author’s poor health making them unable to continue it.**
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Powerful Confession
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Run Wild
description:
“I wish to have you by my left shoulder, with a smile by my right– I wish to run freely in your eyes– I wish for one look to last a lifetime.”   
  
Jiang Cheng, an accomplished student, was "exiled" to the steel mill where his biological father worked. This strange, foreign environment, coupled with his rather vulgar biological father, caused Jiang Cheng to feel quite depressed… that is, until one day, he met Gu Fei, the "Delinquent of the Steel Mill", by chance. Thus begins the story of Jiang Cheng and Gu Fei, a story of salvation and hope…

(by Jupiter Scanlations)
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Shinitagari no Fukushuusha
description:
A high school girl, Shizuku, who despairs of living after being bullied at school and sexually abused at home, attempts to commit suicide at a deserted shrine, where she is cursed with immortality by an eerie raven. 

Unable to even die, Shizuku decides to use her immortal body to inflict deathly retribution on her tormentors.

 A revenge drama about a high school girl with a different power in her hands!
tags: Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Tragedy

name: I Can't Stop Doting On the Empire's Most Notorious Villainess!
description: In high society, Raven is known as a womanizer and a free spirit. But suddenly, Estella, who’s rumored to hate men and is said to be the cruelest girl in the empire, walks into his bachelor life. And this girl proposes that he marry her! “There’s not a chance in hell this marriage will succeed,” thinks the young guy. But... Estella is convinced he’ll be the one to fall head over heels for her. How will it all pan out, and in the end, who will be right...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess

name: Gachaman
description: One day, high schooler Kaito Kuji lost his memory. When he came to, he found the word "Thank you" written on his chest above a dial for a capsule toy vending machine. It's a mysterious capsule toy vending machine, which contains his lost memories and also some special supernatural abilities. But in order for him to turn the dial, he has to have someone tell him, "Thank you"...?!! So he needs to gather people's gratitude and use the toy capsule machine to fight!!
tags: Action, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Supernatural

name: Doku Doku Mori Mori
description: In the deep, deep forest. a Tamagotake mushroom fairy who has been left alone in the world after her parents were killed is chasing after the culprit, a Tsukiyotake, to take revenge on him. In the Sea of Trees, where life and death intersect, can the young Tamago take revenge on the hated Tsukiyo? An unprecedented mushroom suspense begins.
tags: Thriller, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Shitto wa Ai wo Kumoraseru
description:
“Falling in love, I didn’t expect it would only take an instant.” A gifted but burned out pianist x a late blooming genius. A progressive love story about being bound by an inferiority complex!

Kirino feels that his talent for piano is at its limit. On the other hand, his junior, Takase, who is naive and loved by everyone, is blossoming with talent. Kirino feels annoyed by Takase’s admiration for him and views him as a thorn in his side. However, Takase doesn’t even hesitate when he tells Kirino, “Senpai is my everything”……

Kirino doesn’t trust Takase, and uses his longing for him to play with his feelings, wanting to make him feel troubled. “You’re too shy to even look at me when I’m by your side, it’s so cute how you look like a puppy when you’re trembling with expectation.”

Feeling complacent because of Takase’s affection, Kirino gradually starts to depend on him…!?
tags: Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Music

name: Road to Kingdom
description:
This is the story of a young slave gladiator in an underground arena. He doesn’t know about his past or how he got to where he is, only that his name is Aegir, and that he is strong.  
  
One day he kills the boss and escapes the arena, joining a band of mercenaries as a new recruit. During one mission, they encounter the vampire, Lucy, who slaughters the band with her inhuman strength. After learning that Aegir only knows how to kill, Lucy lets him stay at her house, educating and taking care of him.  
  
Two years pass, and on the day of Aegir’s departure, they both exchange a promise that if Aegir becomes a king and owns the land of Erg forest, he can come and take her as his woman. Making this his life goal, Aegir set out on a journey to become a hero, a king, and found his own kingdom.
tags: Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Adaptation

name: Eighteen's Bed
description: Not found
tags: Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kamen Rider Amazon
description:
Amazon, a wild youth in the jungle, is remodeled by the ancient Inca science. With the "Bracelet of Gigi," the key that opens the door to the hidden treasure, on his arm, he protects the treasured ordnance and weaponry, as well as the future of mankind! 

The enemy is Gorgoth, a ten-faced demon who plans to conquer the world with the "Bracelet of Gaga," an opposing key!
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Survival, Superhero, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Horror, Adaptation

name: Tsubanakasu Haru
description: Chiaki has finally found something to look forward to in life-His regular visits to the flower vendor who opens shop once in a few months. When delivering mail to his house, he accidentally stumbles upon his biggest secret, which changes their relationship and gets Chiaki a chance to get closer to Mei.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Supernatural

name: My Shrine Was Destroyed by a Psychopath...
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Please Give Me Your Blood, I Will Serve You in Gratitude
description:
A young man rescues a young vampire girl who has fallen ill; she tries to give her all to repay him for his blood, but she's too clumsy to do so. A vampire rom-com that depicts a warm life among different species where no one is left behind or abandoned!

A long-awaited new series by the author of "Demon Mother: My Son is so Cute, I Just Can't Help Myself!"
tags: Romance, Comedy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Oswald the Overman in the Lesser Planes of Hell
description: An idiot wakes up in hell, and goes on a journey to reclaim their life.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Self-Published, Isekai, Horror, Supernatural

name: Book of Yaoguai: Tale of the Nine-tailed Fox
description: The Yang Eye of this life is a young a literary genius and a high-ranking member of the Imperial court. Facing hardships, one day he meets a fox spirit, starting a wonderful journey. In this life, can the two achieve happiness?...
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Is a Mother in Her 30s Like Me Alright?
description: A 32-year-old single mother is told by her neighbor, a university student around 20, that he likes her. Thing is… he's not particularly *shy* about why he likes her.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: The Basketball Girl
description: The unknown interior designer, Hans Duan (22 years old), was involved in a criminal dispute as he designed the house for one of the members in that group. Unfortunately, he was persecuted as a murderer due to the case and sentenced to death. In the prison, he met a scientist from the government (Code name No.73) who asked him to take part in a human experiment. But the experiment failed and Hans died. His body was buried in a dump in the city. However, the experimental medicine left in his body leads to gene mutation. Hans is revived and changed into a female. What will happen on him (her)?
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Action, Crime, Sports, Mafia, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: D.Gray-man
description:
Losing a loved one is so painful that one may sometimes wish to be able to resurrect them—a weakness that the enigmatic Millennium Earl exploits. To make his mechanical weapons known as "Akuma," he uses the souls of the dead that are called back. Once a soul is placed in an Akuma, it is trapped forever, and the only way to save them is to exorcise them from their vessel using the Anti-Akuma weapon, "Innocence."  
  
After spending three years as the disciple of General Cross, Allen Walker is sent to the Black Order—an organization comprised of those willing to fight Akuma and the Millennium Earl—to become an official Exorcist. With an arm as his Innocence and a cursed eye that can see the suffering souls within an Akuma, it's up to Allen and his fellow Exorcists to stop the Millennium Earl's ultimate plot: one that can lead to the destruction of the world.
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Survival, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: The Emperor is a Pervert!
description:
I became a eunuch as soon as I transmigrated? Fine, a eunuch it is, I'll climb my way up to the top and find a way to wear modern clothes and become a normal man again. My mind is a tangled mess, and I'm going crazy....suddenly, someone interrupts my hopes and dreams: "Mister Xie, tonight the Emperor will sleep with you."

 "......Nani?!"
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Isekai, Drama, Full Color

name: The Wolf's Gratitude
description:
Lu Fei (ex-gangster) wants to free himself from his identity of housekeeper and maid but lawyer, Yang Xiyuan is determined to stop him..It was 1 years ago Yang saved Lu Fei from a dangerous situation related to gang turf war… since then as a sigh of gratitude he has been working as his live-in maid…but what will happen when Lu Fei express to return back to his previous lifestyle..??  
  
This is a story about a famous underworld gangster who become an unconventional housekeeper of a lawyer.
tags: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Slice of Life

name: Trinity Seven
description: Everyday is a normal day in the small town where Kasuga Arata lives. However, everything changed on the day of the Black Sun, and following it, a magician appears before him. The Black Sun caused the Breakdown Phenomenon which destroyed the town where he lives. Because of this, his normal life was artificially reconstructed by a Grimoire that his childhood friend had left. Just what is the purpose of the magician coming to the town? What will he do with the Grimoire's keepsake?
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Nibiiro no Chameleon
description: During the Japanese Asset Price Bubble, everyone, men or women, young or old, lived in a world that was filled with frenzy. In the air where strength overruns weakness, there is a "woman" who tries to avenge her past. But, there's a twist with this "woman". One is that she was a cold killer. Second is that this "woman" is actually a man.
tags: Action, Crime, Mafia, Crossdressing, Mystery

name: I Only Want to Beat You
description: The male lead 'Lee Gigo', who has never lost a single time in his life, and the female lead who defeated him 'Oh Roji'. Who will end up as the victor of this 'bet'?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: E, Shanai System Subete Wan'ope shiteiru Watashi wo Kaiko desu ka?
description: Satou Ai who has been handling the company's in-house system as a one-man show, has received a notice of dismissal upon a change in president. After the dismissal, Ai was alone in deep sorrows until she stumbled upon Suzuki Kenta. Kenta invites her to join his startup company. The company was something he started to get close to others with the name, "True programmer's cram school" with Ai's unconventional, daring and sometimes wild lectures, the student started to look forward to the lessons.
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Shin Devilman
description:
The story of Shin Devilman is supposed to take place between the second and third volume of the original Devilman series. Here we have Akira and Ryo who mysteriously manage to travel in time. Where they discover the have been sent back to dispatch demons that are invading history to end humanity. They visit several time periods including pre-World War Vienna, ancient Greece, France during the Hundred Years' War, Rococo period France, and wild west America. The end of this series also includes a new epilogue for the Devilman series.

* *NOTE: The US official release of Devilman is based on a version that has both the main Devilman manga and Shin Devilman.*
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Superhero, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Tonikaku Kawaii
description:
Described as a story full of "love" and "dreams", Tonikaku Kawaii follows a protagonist whose name is written with the characters for "Hoshizora" ("Starry Sky" in Japanese), but whose name is pronounced as "Nasa". On the day of his high school entrance exams, Nasa encounters a beautiful girl. For Nasa, it feels like destiny is finally calling out to him that he will have a girl friend, but…

Note: Volume 15 and 16's numberings are correct, as this is how they are in the original.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Azur Lane - Royal o Nani da to Omotterun desu ka (Doujinshi)
description: An Azur Lane doujinshi book made by Neon. or Hirose Madoka, artist of "Azur Lane Smile Dish". This is her last work that would touch Azur Lane moving forwards.
tags: Comedy, Doujinshi, Slice of Life

name: The Flame Dyed in Blue
description: Within the dim corridors of an ancient library resides Sohwa, a mystical dokkaebi (goblin) with a flame that burns both fierce and gentle. Her presence is a haunting melody to the restless soul of Yunwoo, a young master who dares to stake his very essence for the chance to hold her love. Through lifetimes that weave heartbreak and longing, and in a dance of reincarnations fraught with missed steps, their bond teeters between destiny and despair. Can the embers of their love reignite amidst the ashes of fate, or is their passion fated to flicker out in the winds of time?
tags: Official Colored, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Anthology, Fantasy

name: Moonlight Act
description:
Gekko Iwasaki, a high-school student, is selected as executor of "Moonlight Ordinance" and fights against the residents. In this fairy tale, there is a world which is strangely affected by blue moonlight once in dozens of years. "Moonlight Ordinance" is a rule to restore the world to its former condition.   
  
**Links:**  
- [Author's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ufujitakazuhiro?lang=ja)
tags: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

name: Kaisha to Shiseikatsu: On to Off
description:
Working people have company (on) and private lives (off). 

Meet two office workers whose professional lives "on" the clock and private lives when they’re "off" couldn't be more different. He dresses like a lolita. She dresses like a punk. 

When their contrasting "on" and "off" modes collide, it inevitably leads to heart-pounding antics!

---

A serialization of the [Twitter series](https://mangadex.org/title/0fa5d834-fdab-4ac4-b3c9-821f1580f991/company-and-private-life) about a handsome salaryman and an unapproachable office lady who dress completely different when they are off work.
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Suga Kimio finds himself hiding in the girls locker room, unable to move or escape the situation as the girls in his school crowd in. Although he originally had no ulterior motives, he found himself panicking as he heard the girls coming in and hid in a locker. Komine Nozomi, one of the shy girls in his class finds him, but surprisingly covers for him. Perplexed but glad, Kimio goes home.  
  
Later that night, he gets a text from Nozomi who happens to live across the way on the same floor of the complex they both live in. She blackmails him into agreeing to show each other’s bodies when she texts him. Kimio has to abide by Nozomi’s insane demands or risk ruining his school life so they both start their little peep show through each other’s windows…  
  
Nozo x Kimi: 2-nensei-hen is the second season of the series, but continues the chapter count from the previous magazine.  
  
[See AnimeNewsNetwork for the anime.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=16241)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Under the Oak Tree
description:
The daughter of a duke, the stuttering Maximilian, married a knight of lowly status at her father’s coercion. After their first night, her husband departed for an expedition without another word. He came back three years later, this time as a famous knight in the whole continent. How will Maximilian face him on his return?

"The more I think of you, the more lonely and lonely I become. I don't know why I can't quit even though it's so painful."

---
A flawless love story of the flawed. Stuttering lady Maximilian is forced into a marriage with Sir Riftan, but he leaves on a campaign after their wedding night. Three years later, he triumphantly returns, ready to cherish her. As life with her husband finally begins, she only has one question — does she deserve this love and happiness?

---
**Note:** Although the novel is R19, the webtoon is R15.

---
[Original Webtoon](https://ridibooks.com/books/4362000001)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://manta.net/series/1255)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/9790/)

**Official English Novel Translations:** [Kindle (S1/R19)](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B09Y5GTH4Q), [Webnovel (R18)](https://www.webnovel.com/book/under-the-oak-tree_21949582605391005)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Yuusha to Yobareta Nochi ni - Soshite Musou Otoko wa Kazoku wo Tsukuru
description: In a world where humans and demons clash, the one who decimated the Demon Lord's army was a lone hero named Lloyd. Possessing power so immense that he was said by the Demon Lord to be near godlike, after the war, Lloyd was appointed by the king to be the lord of a remote territory and was sent far away. Furthermore, he was tasked with subduing the Emperor Dragon residing in that land, which he quickly defeated. However, the defeated dragon transformed into a beautiful woman and chose to become Lloyd's companion!?
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Room 207
description: What happened in room 207?
