tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ninja, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Military, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Police, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Seventh
description:
Lyle Walt is a young noble boy and heir looking forward to the day he can inherit his family’s territory. Except around when he was 10 year old, his parents started neglecting him more and more in favour of his little sister, Ceres.

On his fifteenth birthday, he is challenged to a duel by his sister to see who will inherit the household and horribly loses, being cast out of his family. Afterwards, he gets treated by the family groundskeepers and receives the family heirloom Gem from him that Lyle’s grandfather had entrusted to him. From there, he begins an aimless journey with his childhood friend and former fiancée, Novem, and the Gem-turned-Jewel that houses the memories, personalities, and Skills of seven of his ancestors.
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Centaurs
description:
A centaur race, known as Jimba, have lived in Japan since ancient times. However, humans regard them as tools of war and snatch away their dignity.   
  
During the Sengoku period, a samurai Jimba named Matsukaze, known as the redheaded rock tiger, is caught while protecting his son. He is traded to a feudal lord, and taken to a feudal lord. There he meets another centaur, named Kohibari, whose village was burnt down as a child. He is a tame centaur, and had his arms amputated when he was captured. With his help, Matsukaze escapes with Kohibari.
___
**Official English Volumes:** [ABLAZE](https://www.ablaze.net/products?c=83)
tags: Historical, Action, Drama, Fantasy

name: The Lone Necromancer
description:
Seongwu is a former special forces soldier who has returned to college after completing his national service. His ordinary life as a student is shattered during class one day when he and his fellow students are faced with a mysterious prompt asking them to “select a role.”

Seongwu chooses the necromancer, a rare ability that grants him the power to control the undead.

With the campus and outside world seemingly on the brink of collapse, Seongwu must use his newfound powers to battle fearsome monsters and help save his fellow students. But will they make it out alive?

---

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/silingfashiwanglingzhipeizhe/list?title_no=1981)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/fantasy/lone-necromancer/list?title_no=3619)

- [Official French Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/the-lone-necromancer/list?title_no=4063)
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Chounin A wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Doushitemo Sukuitai
description:
Allen, an eight-year-old boy from a poor family in the royal capital, is living a poor but happy life together with his mother. One day, however, memories of his previous life suddenly come back to him and he remembers that he is in an dating sim game and that the capital will be destroyed by war if he doesn’t do something about it. If this continues, both he and his mother will be killed! 

With a sense of urgency, he decides to rise to the occasion in order to save his precious mother’s life and save his favorite character, the villainous young lady Anastasia, the only girl he liked in the game, from her all too tragic and ruinous end.

This is the story of a man who isn’t even a character in the game, but who strives with his steely determination and uses all the knowledge he has to turn overcome fate!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: FUGA: Melodies of Steel
description:
This story takes place in a world made up of floating islands of various sizes, where two types of races, "Caninu" and "Felineko" live.

Malt, a caninu boy, lives peacefully with his younger sister Mei on their grandparents' farm in the remote village of Petit Mona. One day, their village is suddenly attacked by the Berman Empire, and is burnt to the ground overnight. "How could something like this happen..." Malt and his friends were confused, then a mysterious voice called out from the radio...! ?

A group of children caught in the flames of war ride the mysterious giant tank ``Taranis'' and fight to save their families!
tags: Time Travel, Action, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Military, Gore, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Nagisa no Shark Maid
description:
Wataru is a lonely boy who lost his parents in an accident. For some reason, there is one maid—her name is Kosame, and she has been by his side since he was little. Yes, she never changed... Set in a unique coastal fishing village with rows of houses called "boathouses," a love story of eternal love begins! (MTL)

---
**Links:**  
- Alternative Official Raw - [ComicWalker](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM05203826010000_68) and [Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/62407)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: R15+ Ja Dame Desuka?
description: What should I do to become an adult? Akane Amou, who grew up with her parents forbidding any kind of entertainment, is a little bad with "stimulating" stuff, to the point she can't even watch a kissing scene in a drama. Now that she's a highschool student, she somehow wants to overcome it! Those are her intentions, but it's not that easy. Meanwhile, she got acquainted with a movie otaku named Fuyumine. Will she be able to watch an R15 movie...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Shut Hell
description:
Beginning of the 13th century, Western Xia state in Chinese mainland. 
In those days existed a woman warrior named Shut Hell, the Evil One, feared even by the Mongols, reputed the strongest army in history. 
At first she was just a normal Tangut soldier, but after coming close to death so many times she found a superhuman strength in herself. 
On the other side Yurul, a young Mongol prince, is fascinated by the Tangut, his enemies' writing script, and is worried for their future…
Centuries later a Japanese high school student named Shudo is haunted by a vivid dream of a battlefield...
Is there some sort of bound between these completely different lives ? Will they manage to overcome the obstacles surrounding them ?


- **2012 Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize (New Creator) winner**
tags: Award Winning, Time Travel, Genderswap, Traditional Games, Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Blood-crawling Princess of a Ruined Country
description: I'll take back my life. A cruel and beautiful revenge story of a princess who became a prostitute. Princess Evita lived happily in a small country. However, she was attacked by a neighboring country, her land taken away, and her family was brutally killed. The surviving Evita was sold to a brothel and lived as a prostitute. In the middle off all this, a man from the royal family that she hates appears as a customer...
tags: Survival, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: Akuyaku Reijou no Tsuihougo!
description: Event planner Yuka Sawatani‘s life ended as the result of overwork. Reborn into an Otome game with her memory intact, she becomes the villainess Elizabeth. She tries to resist her fate, but at the ending of the game, she is promptly banished.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Steel-Eating Player
description:
Lee Hyunwook, the Steel Emperor, was the last savior of mankind, but died. 

In order to change the future, the place he regressed to was… The military?!!

"Why here of all places?!"

The start of Corporal Lee Hyunwook, who gets stronger in a special way, by doing a steel mukbang!
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Sazanamimachi to, Hazama no Ko
description: A young woman visits a seaside town. Even though it's her first time there, everything seems strangely nostalgic. Somehow she ends up working at an empty little shop serving the local customers. But what will she discover in this strange town that carries the scent of the sea ?
tags: Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Fashion Fade
description: After growing up in Africa, Fade moves to France to live with her uncle, but her headstrong personality means they cannot get along. However, she soon becomes involved in the fashion industry, making various friends and enemies along the way to success!
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Magnolia Waltz
description: The sequel to Waltz wa Shiroi Dress de. You will see how the lives of Koto, Sajit and Masaomi go on. (Source: MU)
tags: Historical, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Tragedy

name: Futsuu no Koitte Nani?
description:
**Is my "red string of fate" connected to you?**

The high school first year "me" that fell in love at first sight at the school entrance ceremony. But that love was not normal...
A yuri story depicted from the point of view of three high school girls.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Sand Land (Official Colored)
description: In the far future, war has destroyed the entire Earth, leaving only a barren wasteland where the supply of water is controlled by the greedy king. In search of a long-lost lake, Sheriff Rao asked the king of the demons for help...and got the king's son, Beelzebub, and his assistant, Thief. Together the unlikely trio sets off across the desert, facing dragons, bandits and the deadliest foe of all... the King's army itself! It's travel adventure and tank action in this new story from Akira Toriyama, the creator of Dragon Ball Z!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Official Colored, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: 7-Kakan Gentei Kanojo
description:
A yuri romantic comedy centered on a temporary relationship between a gal and an honor student. 

The story begins when Manatsu, a gal who is on the verge of repeating a grade, starts receiving tutoring from Sumie, an honor student. Manatsu loves shoujo manga and romantic gossip but has the vague that having a boyfriend somehow doesn't fit her. 

When she casually brings this up, Sumie suggests, "Why not try starting with just the form?" and offers "How about dating me for just 7 days?"
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Gyaru

name: Gal niPA-chan wa Semararetai
description: The popular teen model niPA, aka Asahino Futaba, is strong willed and independent, but the plain guy who is her seatmate refuses to budge before her... "Damn that four-eyed loser, how dare he tell me off!". However, at the same time, remembering that makes her feel somehow strange. Her fingers slip beneath her skirt as if by reflex and while thinking about getting assaulted by that disgusting man, she pleasures herself against her better judgment while she is brought to climax in her fantasies!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Gyaru

name: RE: united
description:
In a world torn between the Sky and the Lands, siblings Mia and Sera embark on a quest to reunite with the only family they have ever known—Mother Theresa.
Separated by fate, their journey is filled with surprises, wonder, and sorrow.
As they traverse breathtaking landscapes and encounter both friends and foes, they must confront their deepest fears, discover the power of love and hope, and learn to believe in themselves.

Yet hidden within Mia lies a secret that could change their fate—and the fate of the entire world.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Military, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Mix
description:
Adachi's second serialization in Gessan Shounen Sunday, follows the story of three siblings, students of Meisei Middle School. Takes place 26 years after Adachi's biggest title, Touch.  
  
Because of the legend left by Tatsuya Uesugi, Meisei Academy High School was well-known for their strong baseball team. But 26 years after their glory, the team has not been able to keep their record and has since lost their fame.  
  
Two stepbrothers, Souichirou and Touma Tachibana, aim to revive of the once-strong Meisei Academy baseball team and enter the National High School Baseball Championship.  
  
(Source: MAL, edited)
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Moto Saikyou Kouryakusha, Nozomanu Dungeon Haishin de Musou shite Shimasu
description:
The dawn of dungeon conquering. A group of boys who were once known as the strongest party is wiped out in an accident. Five years have passed since then. 

Low-difficulty dungeons have been developed as leisure facilities, and dungeon conquering has become a popular content that video streamers have flocked to join. In order to survive the tough world of showbiz, current top idol Shinonome Kanami also decides to become a broadcaster who seriously conquers dungeons. The man introduced by her sponsor as the best mentor is a rather unreliable-looking man, Amano Fuyuki.

However, when they visit a dungeon together, an incident occurs right away, putting them in a desperate situation –!?
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The White Mage Who was Banished from the Hero's Party is Picked up by an S Rank Adventurer: This White Mage is Too Out of the Ordinary!
description: One day, Lloyd, a white mage, is banished from the hero’s party. Lloyd, who has lost his job, happens to accompany an S-rank party on a quest by chance. At that time, no one knew that the hero’s party would collapse and Lloyd would gain fame - yet. This is the story of an extraordinary support magic-user who thinks he is normal, becomes an adventurer, while he is unaware of how he eventually becomes peerless.
tags: Action, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kanojo no Tomodachi
description: He got a cute girlfriend who was the first in his life, but her friend tempted him with a body that was lewder than her... What would you do if your girlfriend's friend pressed you like this?
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life

name: Shihai Shoujo Kubaru-chan
description:
After fierce bullying, Yuuto Kiba wanted to die. On the verge of committing suicide, his fate changes rapidly when a strange and funky beautiful girl, Kubaru, tells him, “Give me your life”.

Make your life happy with love?! A slightly strange and psycho love drama.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life

name: No\Name
description: In a world where peoples' names grant them superhuman powers... Two agents from the Nordic Naming Bureau (NNB), an agency specialized in investigating crimes committed by "Namers", handle the case of a man and his missing wife and son. Things take a turn, however, when the duo come face to face with the man, who wishes to give his son the same name as himself...
tags: Action, Mystery

name: Hatsukoi Losstime
description: Koji Aiba, who had been living a school life unrelated to girls, suddenly encounters a mysterious phenomenon called "Lost Time" where time stops for one hour a day. Takashi, who is trying to regain his youth in such a static world, meets Tokine Shinomiya, a girl with amber eyes who can also move in the stopped time. In a world where only the two of them can move, they gradually grow closer and closer, and eventually his feelings for Tokine turn into his first love. However, she seems to be harboring a big secret that blocks her feelings.
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Please Lay Your Eyes on Jasmine
description: Jasmine had an accident with her one-sided love, Duke Aion. The straightforward man, who had not paid attention to her before, who had consistently ignored her, for some reason, now caught the feeling… “Don't you like me? Is that a lie? "Why would I lie about that?" “I know. You are that kind of person.” He was in a phase where he broke off from his cursed love, but instead it took a turn for the worse.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: The Return of Elena the Knight
description:
Elena, who spent her entire life as a cold-blooded female knight to avenge her family, ended up dying without claiming her revenge. When she opened her eyes she found that she went back into the past. By day she was a lady in a dress, and at night she carried a sword to change history and prevent her family's destruction.  
  
"I want to marry you, Your Highness," she said to the crown prince. She would do this to save her family.
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: SSS-Class Revival Hunter
description:
In the mysterious, RPG dungeon-like Tower, Gongja Kim lives a mundane existence, envying all the star hunters. One day, his wish for more is granted with a legendary skill to copy others’ abilities… at the cost of his life. Before he can make sense of it, he’s killed by the #1 hunter, the Flame Emperor! But this activates his skill and now he’s copied a new one, the ability to travel back in time upon death.

How will Gongja use these skills to outplay the competition and rise to the top?
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: If Her Flag Breaks
description: Hatate Souta, a young man who can see the "flags" that stand at the crossroads of life, transferred to “Hatagaya Academy”, a prestigious school in the metropolitan area. Not only does he meet beautiful girls in his busy school life, he even goes as far as living with them under the same roof! Surrounded by these flags, this enviable romantic comedy begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Don't Read This
description: There is no story to read here. (Interactive) This series contains themes regarding mental health and anxiety that may not be suitable for all readers. Viewer discretion is advised. If you or someone you know is struggling or in crisis, please reach out for help at [Crisis Text Line](http://crisistextline.org/).
tags: Horror, Web Comic

name: Wicked Cupid
description: The Koinobori yakuza family's souls are expensive commodoties, a source of great pride to those of the demon world's soul bank. But when the Koinobori heir, Ryuji, is born with a pure soul engrossed with fairies and angels, it's up to Maria to become his personal cupid and reform him so that he continues the Koinobori's lascivious family line!
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Magic, School Life, Supernatural

name: Kokou no Hito
description: On his first day of transferring to a new high school, a loner named Mori Buntarou, is cajoled by a classmate into climbing the school building. Despite knowing that one misstep could send him spiraling to his death, he moves forward, and upon finally reaching the top, Mori experiences a sense of fulfillment. That feeling, which seems to be telling him, "You're alive!" gives birth to an adrenaline for rock-climbing.
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Sports, Philosophical, Drama, Tragedy

name: Wolf Constellation
description: This manga is partly inspired by the real-life Japanese horse bandit, Hakuro Kohinata, and depicts the tumultuous life of Kensaku Ohinata, who moved to China at a young age, was kidnapped by a group of horse bandits, but rose to prominence among their ranks and eventually grew up to unite a number of them under the name of Xiao Dongyang. Kensaku's adventurous spirit and ambition, as well as his positive, brave personality, can sometimes lead to light-hearted mischief, but as he matures into a young man, he grows to experience bouts of delusion. Regarded as one of Mitsuteru Yokoyama's most realistic and human works, this manga draws inspiration from another real-life Japanese horse bandit: Date Junnosuke, thus vividly depicting the reality of Chinese horse bandits.
tags: Historical, Romance, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Military, Drama, Supernatural

name: Leveling Up by Killing Gods
description: The abyss descends, and the invasion of the alien races begins... The young boy stands amidst the dense white mist, with no light ahead or behind him. In this situation, how will he make his choices? In the era of the Long Night, do the gods truly live forever? The young boy sees through the lifeblood of all things and executes the gods!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Superhero, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Tonari no Neko to Koi Shirazu
description:
Minato Seno’s high school life had just begun when his homeroom teacher requested his help with Nekozane, the cat-like chronic napper who sits next to him in class. Timid and socially anxious, Minato has never talked to her or even seen her face. But when he finally musters up the courage to wake Nekozane, she unexpectedly hugs him on the spot! Thus begins a sweet tale of two teens awkwardly stumbling into a new friendship, unaware that their feelings are slowly turning into something more!

(Source: Manga UP! Global)
tags: Animals, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Koakuma JK Psycho
description: After the Golden Week holiday, Kokoro Kasai, a stunningly beautiful and naturally charming high school sophomore, transfers to Shimotsuki High School. With her striking looks and engaging personality, she easily handles even the most daring conversations with a smile. Aspiring to become the student council president, Kokoro soon attracts the attention of some troublesome students with bad intentions. However, what they don't realize is that Kokoro Kasai is actually a psychopath.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Creepy Cat
description:
Flora moves into a mysterious mansion and finds it inhabited by a strange creature—Creepy Cat!
Thus begins her strange and sometimes dangerous life with a feline roommate.
This Gothic comedy brings the chuckles…and the chills!

Source: Seven Seas Entertainment
tags: Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Comedy, 4-Koma, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Lumbini
description: A newly emerging religion with a mysterious purpose, "Ilgakgyo," and its educational facility called "Lumbini". The children of Lumbini refer to it as paradise. In this unbelievable paradise where strange events unfold, and the shocking occult thriller experienced by the protagonist "Yeongdo," who finds himself there.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Drama, Horror, Mystery

name: Pseudo Harem
description: The story of Nanakura Rin of the Drama Club, who has indisputable talent as an actress, and her senpai in the same club, Kitahama Eiji. With the power of her acting, Rin teases Eiji with a variety of personas, giving him the harem he's always dreamed of!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: My Crazy Boyfriend
description:
“Please be my friend.” Suzu, a young man searching for his missing brother, gets tangled up with Yakuza, but ends up being saved by Hana, a mysterious and beautiful boy. Suzu works with Hana to find his younger brother, but he almost gets drawn to the innocent looking Hana…
Is this friendship? Obsession? Or maybe… love?
A pure and dangerous crime love story between a clumsy young man and a handsome yakuza boy!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Crime, Mafia

name: Yuusha no Haha desu ga, Maou-gun no Kanbu ni Narimashita
description:
I lost my husband in an accident two years ago and became a single mother, and one day I was summoned to another world with my son. The humans who summoned us called my son a hero and wanted him to fight the resurrected Demon King. It’s ridiculous to have my son, who is in still his first year of junior high, fight against monsters!

Strongly opposing this, I was treated as an obstacle and left alone in a monster’s den. Though I was powerless and already resigned myself to death, it was the demons, who were supposed to be enemies of humans, who saved me. As I spent time together with them, my feelings for the demons grew, but peaceful days do not last long. The only weapons I had to resist against the numerous challenges that faced me were my cooking abilities and my quick wit. 

"I won’t die until I meet my son!" Laboring away with this thought in mind, I had become one of the upper echelons of the demon king's army before I knew it.
tags: Demons, Isekai, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Higanjima - Saigo no 47 Hiai
description:
This is a continuation of the story of Higanjima : featuring an isolated island, inhabited by warring vampires and humans, and surrounded by aquatic demons that foil any attempts at entry or escape that are not explicitly authorised by their vampiric overlord , Miyabi.   
  
Ryousuke, his girlfriend Kazumi, and his friend Yamaoka are shipwrecked by the demons, and wash up on the shore of Higanjima. They soon experience the monstrous cruelty of the island's vampires first-hand but, luckily, Ryousuke is able to join up with the human resistance.   
  
His only desire is to leave Higanjima…however, mainland Japan may not be safe for long either. If the vampiric threat is not eradicated in 47 days, then Miyabi's machinations will transform it into yet another vampire island!
tags: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Tensai Majo no Maryoku Kare
description: Nayu, the one in a million genius witch who has been the talk of the town, has run out of magic! The price for all the things she has been allowed to do because of her brilliance is coming back to the former genius witch like a boomerang... Then, she meets her past student "Komugi" who loves her very much. This is a boomerang love comedy of karmic retribution by a former genius witch who can't be left alone even though it stings a little, abandoned by her magical powers!
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: The Unbeatable Gold-Hunter
description:
Korean national shooting team representative Im Sun-woo, aiming for his second consecutive Olympic gold medal, messed up his competition after rookie fencing team member Min Sunghan shook his hand and said, “I’ll take your chi~^^”.
When Sunwoo confronted Sunghan and demanded his chi back, Sunghan agreed and led him to a secluded place.
Sunwoo assumed Sunghan would return his chi with another handshake, but Sunghan suddenly kissed him, and the two exchanged chi through a deep kiss.
After exchanging chi like that, the two eventually ended up in bed together...
(※The protagonists of each short story will all compete on the same Olympic stage! Look for protagonists from other works in the final episode! ♡)
tags: Official Colored, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Sports, School Life, Web Comic

name: Adekan
description: Laid-back and somewhat absent-mindedly seductive umbrella craftsman Shiro, and hot-blooded officer Kojiro, who stands against all things undisciplined, become involved in a bloody and erotic thrill-ride in an off-kilter town. This action-packed jack-of-all-trades manga will have you swooning at its sexiness and leave you more addicted than opium!
tags: Historical, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Drama, Police, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Misaligned Relationship
description: Initially, Li Li only wanted to sleep with his roommate once, so he could get some money to help his family. But he didn’t expect that before the ‘crime’ could be committed, he would be caught red-handed by his roommate’s older brother, Yan Wen, who got evidence and warned him to stay away from his younger brother. Li Li thought Yan Wen hated him, but when he had no one else to rely on, it was Yan Wen who offered a helping hand. A contract of support then changed the two’s relationship forever…
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama

name: The Witch and the Mercenary
description:
Zig—a tall, broad-shouldered mercenary—participates in a witch hunt. Following a fierce duel with the deadly witch, he becomes privy to her desire. "I want you to protect me," she requests, tired of having her life trivialized. Seeking a place to survive, the witch and the mercenary set their sights on an unknown continent!
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/witch_mercenary)
tags: Monsters, Action, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The Last Human
description: Zuo Tianchen is the last living human in a mutated zombie-infested city. Just when he was sure he'd died, he finds his soul returned to just before that ill-fated day ten years ago. He swears he'll protect the people important to him this time round and reunite with his past lover. Watch his struggles to survive equipped with his memory of the next ten years!
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Action, Comedy, Survival, Zombies, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Horror, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Iyahaya Atami-kun
description: A handsome boy, the most handsome in his school, who is constantly receiving and rejecting girls' confessions. What they don't know is that he is in love with another boy.
tags: Award Winning, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Mobile Suit Zeta Gundam 1/2 - U.C.0087 Another Story
description:
Universal Century 0087, pilot Edgar Edmund Smith, a hero of the story. The pilot of the Titans originally drawn fierce battle Edgar Edmund Smith. This work, however, the year Universal Century 0138, Maddin was discovered manuscripts of Sicilian women writers who died last year, "Diary of Edmund Smith, Edgar," a setting of what was written. Does not exist at all other evidence that the description and the Universal Century of the time in the world, "a fact", and "mere fiction" has become a dispute with pilots and mobile suits that appeared in this film, really century, whether the universe exists in the world has become treated as the unknown.   
  
Episode 1: Half Zeta Gundam vs Gundam MK-II  
Episode 2: Amuro and Kiss!  
Episode 3: Diary of Edgar Edmund Smith  
Episode Extra: Diary of an Irresponsible Umonsamon Universe - Titans
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Tragedy

name: Billy Bat
description:
Billy Bat is a comic-in-a-comic and the real protagonist is a Japanese-American artist named Kevin Yamagata who draws Billy Bat for "Marble Comics". Shortly after they transition to the artist in his studio with his assistant, two actual detectives, looking like Laurel and Hardy in Dick Tracy era suits and trench coats, knock on the door and appropriate Kevin's room for the purpose of conducting surveillance on a room in an adjacent building. 

One of the detectives, the skinny "Laurel", sees Kevin's work and it turns out he's a Billy Bat fan. The other chubby "Hardy" detective picks up a page saying that the characters look familiar and accuses Kevin of translating an old "Jap" comic.  
As Hardy remembers the comic he thinks Kevin is ripping off, we make another Urasawaesque time jump to 1949 Tokyo…
tags: Historical, Psychological, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Akuma Nisei
description: "My mother's body had no heart." The story of a daughter with a deformed blood who is called a "child of the devil" by her relatives.
tags: Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: I Adopted a Villainous Dad
description:
One day I woke up and I was six years old. I had transmigrated into the main character of a tragic novel, Saint Priscilla, who walks through all sorts of thorny paths! Since I’m here, I need to avoid the scheduled special misfortune and live happily with my favorite character. The final boss of the story and the villain, Melchizedek, the tyrant of the Rehel Empire, who has no blood or tears! A happy life of adopting my father and becoming a princess, with my favorite character. I also saved the male protagonist, in order to remove my father’s death flag.

“If you approach my daughter, you will die.”

Why does my father keep putting up death flags?

Moreover… “If you tamed me, you have to take responsibility.”

Why is the male lead so obsessed with me? What’s going on?

---
One day, a girl awakens as 6-year-old St. Priscilla, the heroine of her most cherished novel. The catch? She is destined to suffer with an abusive adoptive family! To avoid this, she adopts her ultimate bias, the ruthless Emperor Melkiades, as her father instead. Although spending her days fangirling and redeeming her bias's tarnished name seems like a dream come true, with so many foes still lurking in the shadows, can this young saint protect Melkiades and find happiness for them both?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Villain's Daughter-In-Law
description: Luciel, a Crystal Fairy skilled in crafting jewels from her emotions, returns to the past after a life cut short by betrayal. Armed with the knowledge of a grim future, she proposes a contract marriage to the empire’s most villainous family. What begins as a desperate strategy to escape her fate soon becomes an adventure filled with unexpected warmth. Can Luciel rewrite her story, or will her past come back to haunt her?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: If You Dare to Long for Regret
description:
“If you marry me, you can go anywhere. Whether you must cross the seas or fly through the skies. Anywhere you wish. I’m the kind of man who can make that happen.”

Catherine, a lowly Duke’s daughter, has spent 25 years trapped in a castle. To her, this was an irresistibly tempting offer.

Her fiancé is Archduke Deimos Pendragon, the empero’s brother.

“I’ve been infatuated with you for a long time.”

His predatory gaze, now finally locking onto his prey, revealed his true intentions. This is no mere proposal, it is an unilateral order for her to become his wife.

“Catherine Caliburn, I will make you loved more than any woman beneath the sky.”

With his alluring smile, Catherine came to devastating realization that her plan to break off the engagement had utterly failed.

“So never, ever think of running away from me.”

For you are destined to die by my hand...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Aishiteru Game wo Owarasetai
description: Childhood friends who have been together since they were little. They both realize their feelings for each other, but are too close to be honest. What connects them is the "I love you game" that they have been playing since they were little. The end of their love is decided in this simple game where the winner is the one who makes the other embarrassed!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Vivid Monsters Chronicle
description: In order to achieve her goal Yumeko Makino starts the game "Vivid Monsters Chronicle." This manga follows her and her friends who she meets along the way, in game and in real life.
tags: Comedy, Video Games, 4-Koma

name: Dungeon ga Arawarete 5-nen, 15-sai de Dungeon ni Idomu Koto ni Shita.
description:
Dungeons appeared in the world five years ago. Police and military are unable to enter these enigmatic spaces, and entry is permitted solely by the free will of individuals aged 15 and above. Leveling up is possible, fantasy items can be acquired, and for some, the transformation can lead to becoming astonishingly beautiful.

Yuuta Rokujou has lived a life of being bullied since his kindergarten days. Due to this, he decided not to attend Dungeon High School that everyone else went to, rather, on his fifteenth birthday, he decided to challenge a dungeon alone.

This story is about how Yuuta, under such circumstances, became stronger than anyone else, becoming one of the twelve individuals capable of moving the world, known as the ‘Twelve Heroes.’
tags: Action, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 9: The JOJOLands (Official Colored)
description:
The ninth story arc of Jojo’s Bizarre Adventure.

O’ahu, present day. Dua Lipa is the trending musician, and COVID is still a major concern. On this island lives a 15-year-old boy named Jodio Joestar. Living with his brother and mother, he acts as a dealer for certain illegal substances. One day, his employer comes and shows him an excellent find: a Japanese person has landed in Hawaii with a diamond worth over six million dollars. Normally it would be impossible to steal, but for someone with a stand…

This is a story of a young boy and his quest to become rich.
tags: Official Colored, Action, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Girls und Panzer Phase Erika - Anecdotes and other side stories
description: A collection of side stories and anecdotes from Saitaniya Spin-off manga "GIRLS und PANZER - phase.ERIKA"
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Military, Doujinshi, Slice of Life

name: Now That We Draw
description: Uehara-kun, who loves 2D, dreams of becoming a comic artist one day! However, his dream is threatened when an editor rejects his work as too boring. The next day, while contemplating giving up on his dream, a gal in his class, Miyamoto Niina, sees his manuscript, and a too-close pseudo-romance for the sake of their comics begins!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Beyond Blood
description: Nicholas Abott wanted to act forever. When the mysterious and beautiful Elise Morin pulls him aside from a filming event, she grants his wish with a blood-stained kiss. But as Nico embraces his new vampiric power, can he also embrace the girl who turned him?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Self-Published, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Kanpeki na Imouto wa Tabun Hentai
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Incest, 4-Koma, Web Comic

name: Singing The Superstar.
description:
"I don't know if I want to rap. I don't have anything I want to sing about...Or anything I want to say."

Oji Yukito is a 17-year-old drug dealer living in the desperate environment of the streets of Osaka, suppressing his emotions each and every day. He lost his drug-addicted mother and his beloved sister when he was a child, leaving him an orphan. Despite his loneliness, he has a best friend who believes in him. In the midst of continuing to sell drugs, enduring beatings from his boss, and bleeding...Just what is it that lies in his heart?
tags: Drama, Slice of Life, Music

name: The Perfect Plan to Avoid the Death Ending
description: Reincarnated as Sienna Winter, a minor villain with a terminal illness, her only goal is survival. However, she accidentally awakens a sealed demon and gets trapped in a lifelong contract. But... she's already dying?!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Batou Shoujo
description: One day, she verbally abused me all of a sudden… and it just doesn't stop there.
tags: Psychological, School Life

name: Sakuran Bocchi
description: Sakura, a girl who has difficulty making friends. Kayo, a girl belonging to a literature club of which she is the only member. Yuri, a girl who seems to have a kind of one-sided rivalry with Sakura. Koyuki, a girl with a rather quiet character. These girls with totally different personalities unexpectedly cross paths when all four join their school's literature club!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Itsumademo Mukashi no Kyorikan na Osananajimi
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic

name: Drunk Bullet
description: After surviving World War I, Gary, a liquor-loving ex-serviceman, finally makes his way home. To his shock, Prohibition has post-war America in a chokehold! The curtains open on Gary's action-packed quest for a sweet, shining glass of booze!
tags: Historical, Action, Crime, Cooking

name: Asoko de Hataraku Musubu-san
description: Sagami Gorou works in sales at Shounan Rubber Industries Co., Ltd. He is secretly harboring feelings for Musubu, a girl working in the company's integrated development department. And what this lovely young scientist is researching day and night are actually…
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Kaze no Iro made Oboeteru
description: The first year of high school: Spring Mori, who has just entered school, learns of his classmate, Michioto, who is rumored to be the "treasure of the boys' school." Mori volunteered to ask for Michioto's contact information on behalf of a friend who was too scared to talk to him. Mori headed towards Michioto without really thinking about it, but the moment Mori sees him, it's love at first sight....
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life

name: Demon Devourer
description:
The descendant of a once great wizarding family, Elric Mervinger is unable to perform magic due to a rare medical condition.

While attempting to cure his disease, he stumbles upon the demon Mephistopheles, who tries to possess Elric to free himself from a dragon’s trap. But when Elric ends up absorbing Mephisto instead, the two become bound together.

With Mephisto by his side, will this new power allow Elric to restore his family to its former glory? Or will he just end up being devoured?

---
- [Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=q5aQzOSvSDw)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Tanuki Chanto Shippo
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Monster Girls, Web Comic

name: Classmate no Moto Idol ga, Tonikaku Kyodou Fushin Nan desu
description: Saegusa, who retired from idolry when she went to high school, is good-looking and intelligent. She is always cheerful and friendly, and is the most popular person at school. Takuya, however, knows a certain side of the highbrow Miss Saegusa. Today, too, a suspicious-looking woman in a dubious disguise appears at the convenience store where he works part-time. She is, in all likelihood, that Saegusa-san...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Hanitora! Shoukan Yuusha wo Hameru Honey Trap Hoi Mou
description: After defeating the evil god with his companions, Yuuri's adventure had come to a term. All that remained was for him to go back to the world he came from... or so he thought, but it seemed like he would have to stay here?! Now that he has to live in this world, Yuuri isn't sure what to do next and fears remaining a NEET. In the meantime, the princess Lunaria, who knows Yuuri has little interest in power or luxury, sets up a honey trap as part of her plan to make the hero never leave her country.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Her Hero
description: Kang Tae-gwu is a monster, from the future, with the mission to eliminate Jung Eun-ji; the woman who grows up to be the famous Monster Slayer. In order to get close to her Tae-gwu has disguised himself as a hero named Sunbae. Will Tae-gwu be able to kill the Monster Slayer of the past and change the future?
tags: Monsters, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Comedy, Superhero, Drama, School Life, Fantasy

name: The Dangers in My Heart
description:
A ‘fearsome psycho-thriller’ centering on the ‘dark side of adolescence’.

Following Ichikawa Kyoutarou, a teenage boy belonging to the very bottom caste of his school, this work details his troubled interactions with a certain classmate, and his attempt to hide murderous impulses that find themselves in the darkest recesses of his soul.

In reality, though, it's a sweet youth rom-com between a messed up boy and a bright, if somewhat strange, beautiful girl.

**Awards:**
- Won the 2020 Next Manga Award in the Web category.
- Was nominated for the 2020 and 2021 Manga Taishou Award.
- Won the top prize of the 2021 Tsutaya Comic Awards.
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Shoukoku no Altair Gaiden - Toukoku no Subaru
description: The curtain rises on an Oriental Reconquista spin-off of Kato Kotono's "Shoukoku no Altair", set far to the east of Rumeliana is the once peaceful and beautiful island nation of Kusanagi, which has been annexed by the larger country of Cinili and fallen into ruin.
tags: Historical, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Virtues of the Villainess
description:
Ginger Torte and Lerajie Atlanta, both noble daughters of marquesses, are lifelong enemies and rivals. When Ginger's fiancé, Kishon Mickelson, is stolen by Lerajie, Ginger decides she's had enough!

But one day, Ginger stumbles upon a strange novel - one where Lerajie is the main protagonist, and she is the villainess! She tries her best to ignore it, but when things start playing out just as written in the story, she has no choice but to rely on the novel to change her doomed future as the villainess.

"Exactly what did I do to deserve this fate?! Why did I have to become the villainess?"
 
Enter the mysterious Prince Izana, the male lead of the novel. Confined within the depths of the Templar Tower for years by King Astor, he finally sees the light of day when his father passes away. But according to the novel, he's destined to fall in love with Lerajie, leaving Ginger to wallow in her own misery!
  
"All I ever did was live life as best I could! But as if stealing my fiancé wasn’t enough, now Lerajie is going to claim the male lead?! No way I'll let that happen!"

The "villainess" Ginger, who now knows Prince Izana’s deepest secret (thanks to the novel), attempts to seduce him with -2% cautiousness and 200% cuteness!

---
For hopeless romantic Ginger Torte, getting engaged to the man of her dreams is a fairy tale come true. It isn’t long before she realizes the gut-wrenching truth — her fiancé has been seduced by her rival! The heartbroken Ginger finds solace in a new book that recounts the tale of a young woman and a cursed prince… But to her horror, the protagonist turns out to be none other than her beautiful nemesis, Lerazie! As reality unfolds according to the book, both ladies fall in love with the handsome prince at first sight. Ginger vows to steal both the spotlight and the prince’s heart! But, does this story harbor a sinister secret?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EC%97%AD%EC%9D%B4-%EB%B2%A0%ED%91%B8%EB%8A%94-%EB%AF%B8%EB%8D%95/2369), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=54363470)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/comics/ginger-and-cursed-prince)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/7932/)
* [French / Français](https://www.delitoon.com/webtoon/les-vertus-de-la-vilaine)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Virtue-of-the-Villainess/3344)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/46403)
* [Russian / Ру́сский](https://moykomiks.com/series/440299/)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kimi no Koto Tabeteii?
description:
I eat the same things at the same time. Your protagonist Omi Sorasaki is a high school student who's a devotee to the ordinary. But one day, a mysterious and beautiful girl transfers over and says to him "I have something to say to you alone after school." Omi's in a panic wondering "am I getting a confession?" as the things she has to say are…  
  
… and what happens after is only just the first wave of an assault on all that is ordinary! Thrust into an unusual world, a forbidden and "predacious" love comedy begins!
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Gore, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Ishigami Senki
description: Mizuho territory in the northeastern part of the island nation of Hiwazu. On the wedding day of his elder brother, Lord Saku, Ukano Isaza, the younger brother of the lord, meets a woman of the "stone people" who is supposed to have been told in a fairy tale, and is forced to make a contract with her...?
tags: Historical, Action, Romance, Fantasy

name: Kodoku no Kochou wa Donna Yume wo Miru no ka?
description:
This world has been invaded by bugs.

With the appearance of the "Armored Bugs," mutating insect monsters that can overcome all modern weapons, humanity has been robbed of much of its living space. The only ones who can stand against such adversaries are the "Noble Butterflies," girls who harbor "Insects" that have gone through evolutions differing from the armored bugs.

One of the candidates to become a Noble Butterfly, Odamaki Ayumi, still suffers from the fact that she is unable to become one. Her best friend, who was supposed to be with her and was her object of admiration, has left her and no longer seeks her company.

Those days of despair came to an end when she was on the verge of death in a battle with armored bugs.
"Don't think that I... will die without doing anything!"

With the end near, the girl's body transformed into a butterfly one. And the flapping of her wings will bring about a revolution in the world...!
tags: Psychological, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Girls' Love, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: "Monban Yattero" to Iware Juugo Nen, Tsuttatetteru Aida ni Ore no Maryoku ga 9999 "Saikyou" ni Sodattemashita
description:
Although Royle is blessed with a good physique, he was told that he had no talent for fighting, and was forced to work as a lonely gatekeeper for 15 years. While he is working, all he can do is fantasize about the adventure stories in which he is the main character, and his job as gatekeeper is replaced by an “automatic surveillance interception magic tool” and he is laid off.
Loyle is at a loss, but on the way to another town, he meets the saint Diz. After meeting her, he discovers that the “strongest original magic” that he always used in his delusions can in fact be used in reality…
An exhilarating story about the strongest man with no communication skills and 9999 magic power who becomes an adventurer and becomes unrivaled!
tags: Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Our Aimless Nights
description: Cheerful, energetic high school girl Chika and shy, reserved boy Waya couldn’t be more different. But they have a secret: every Wednesday after 9PM they meet outside the convenience store where Waya works. Bit by bit, under the light of the moon, a unique connection begins to blossom in this enchanting coming-of-age love story!
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Mandarin Gypsy Cat no Roujou
description: Somewhere, in Asia, in the future... For several years now, men have hardly been born. The latter are often reduced to their role of reproductive partner. Society is built around a matriarchal system. Neither wars nor conflicts disturb the daily life and the balance. But some have decided to flee the city. They settled outside, in a slum. This is where Sanada resides. Sanada has a secret... a secret that could well stir up the lust of her fellows.
tags: Sci-Fi, Drama

name: Girls Zombie Party
description: An extreme survival story of girls in a world where half of humanity has turned into monstrous beings!  That day, Sayo Mitsurugi wasn’t focused on her lessons, due to staying up late the previous night.  During the lunch break, she was talking on the phone with her hospitalized younger brother, and up until that moment, everything was part of her usual routine.  But then. Suddenly, the signal cut off, and the phone call ended. From that moment on, hell began!  Due to the influence of zombies that appeared in the school, the men began to transform into monstrous beings one after another.  By chance, Saya teams up with her classmates, the angelic Maria and Momo, to attempt an escape from this hell!
tags: Action, Psychological, Survival, Zombies, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Watashi no Kouguchi-Sensei
description:
Kouguchi Ruri, a skilled yet socially awkward male manga artist, has built a career creating niche "loli" manga. His carefully structured life takes a chaotic turn when Shiina Karen, an energetic young woman claiming to be a university student, joins him as his assistant.

 While Karen appears eager to learn, she harbors a mysterious secret and ulterior motives for working with Kouguchi. As they navigate the creative challenges of manga production, their quirky relationship evolves, blending humor, tension, and unexpected revelations.

 This workplace romantic comedy dives into the challenges of collaboration, personal growth, and the surprising connections that emerge in the unlikeliest of circumstances.
tags: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Hand Jumper
description: Sayeon Lee despises Aberrants. They wreak havoc on society with their strange, unthinkable powers. It's just too bad she happens to be an Aberrant herself! Forced to fend for her life in the deadly Aberrant Corps, she's determined to make it to the top, and her unusual ability should help her -- if she can figure out how to use it in time.
tags: Thriller, Action, Long Strip, Mafia, Villainess, Full Color

name: Houkago, Family Restaurant de, Class no Ano Ko to
description:
It's kind of fun, and I'm comfortable with that kind of time.

The family restaurant after school is the only place where I can feel at ease, as I have no place at home due to my parents' remarriage.
At the family restaurant, I meet a classmate, Kazemiya Kohaku, who is a solitary beautiful girl who doesn't fit in with anyone.
She also seems to be having problems with her family.

From that day on, the boring time at the family restaurant became an enjoyable time to complain with Kohaku.
At the family restaurant after school, the two of them begin their search for a reason not to return home again today...
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Akabane Honeko no Bodyguard
description:
Honeko Akabane is an ordinary high school girl. The daughter of a lawyer, she seeks to just live a regular life - even if that means chiding her childhood friend, the ever-violent Ibuki Arakuni, whenever he gets into fights with random people. 

However, Ibuki holds a secret only he knows - Honeko was adopted by her current parents, and is actually the illegitimate daughter of a yakuza bigwig. As it turns out, the boss is retiring, and many people in his gang are looking to take his place; since Honeko is his heir, they want to kill her to clean up any loose ends. 

And so Ibuki must protect Honeko from a variety of criminals, without letting her know about her true lineage. Can he act as her bodyguard while simultaneously keeping her unaware of her situation?
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Harem, School Life

name: The Band
description:
The series is a new band story following a young man who sets off on a music journey when his soul is set aflame after discovering a guitar


Source:ANN
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: steel covenant
description:
Qiao An, a student from the Battle Armor Academy’s elite class, failed the battle armor qualification test and was downgraded to the outer department's logistics class. In the post-apocalyptic world, three centuries after the fall of humanity, Qiao An, burdened with massive debt, unexpectedly discovers that he has already formed contracts with not just one, but multiple top-tier battle armors.




"Black or white, which do you choose?"

"I want both!"




With the strongest battle armors, making money becomes a piece of cake.

"Save the world? Not interested, doesn't concern me."

"What? All my debts cleared? Hey, wait a minute!"
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Mecha, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Bless
description: Young Aya Udagawa has already managed to work as a model, but at one time he abandoned the dream of making a career as a makeup artist because of fears of being rejected by others. One day, he decides to help out the nondescript Sumizaki and does her make-up to participate in the school competition. Aya feels that Sumizaki has a hidden charm and charisma and needs only to help the girl prove herself.
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Hanarete mo, Suki na Hito
description: Not found

name: Mannatsu no Spica
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Quiz! Seigi no Sentaku
description: New challengers will challenge the popular variety program “Quiz! Choice of Justice” presented by the video distribution service “Justice” tonight! Do you get "5 million yen for entrepreneurship" or lose your "left arm"? Each decision to be tested on unanswered questions.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Youjo Musou
description: Lilith, the summoner who accompanied the hero party, was betrayed during the battle with the demons and suffered a serious injury because she refused the invitation of the hero. Helped by her demons, she cannot return to the country in a detour, so she decides to become a demon at the recommendation of Astaroth, the four demon kings who helped her. However, she made a slight mistake and she turned into a little girl. Even if she becomes a little girl, her magical power is not the same, but powers up! Summon the spirits and make an outstanding performance in battle and slow life!
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Gyakkou Shita Akuyaku Reijou wa, Naze ka Maryoku wo Ushinattanode Shinsou no Reijou ni Narimasu
description:
Rachel was chosen as the Crown Prince’s fiancée solely by virtue of the immense magical powers she possessed. Thus, when the Saint appeared, she feared that her most coveted position would get snatched away from her.

Spurred by jealousy, Rachel committed evil deeds against the Saint, resulting in her engagement getting broken. As further punishment, she was sent away to a monastery, but her carriage was attacked by bandits *en route*. Just when she thought that death was imminent, she woke up with a start… only to find herself three years in the past — with almost all of her magic gone, and her body so frail and weak that she could barely even leave her bed!

Determined to prevent fate from repeating itself, Rachel resolved to take full advantage of this second chance and call off her engagement pronto. But for some reason, the Crown Prince keeps refusing to break things off with her—?!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9460fv/)
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: 10-Nen Buri ni Saikai shita Kusogaki wa Seijun Bishoujo JK ni Seichou shiteita
description: Yuu Arizuki returned to his hometown after quitting his job at an exploitative company in Tokyo. Just as he was getting ready to start a new life back home, he met a beautiful and innocent high school girl, who turned out to be Haruyama Miya, one of the little girls (brats) Isamu used to play with when he was young. But Isamu didn't recognize her because of how much she had changed after growing up...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Yane Urabeya no Koushaku Fujin
description: The new life of Duchess Opal all started from a dusty attic. The house she resided in after a political marriage with the young Duke, Hubert, was full of hostility. There was also a woman named "Angel," who is treasured by the mansion's owner... Opal gained a bad reputation because of a disgraceful rumor and as a result, she was treated like a hindrance. However, the Duchess doesn't like losing, so it won't end like this! The woman is unrelated to the management of the territory. I will outwit those who let their guard down…!
tags: Romance, Drama, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Reality Quest
description: Due to the school bully's threat to get him game items, Ha Do-wan, the unlucky game shuttle, died after playing games all night long for a week. The moment he died, he got respawned to the classroom one week before he died... Everything is the same as that day. The only thing that has changed is the floating in front of him! What? Use the skills of the games I've played so far to beat the bully?!?!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Shoujo Seikan Hyouryuuki
description: A spaceship in the shape of a horse-drawn carriage travels across the galaxy. Riding in the carriage is Ridley, the scientist who built this eccentric spaceship, and her partner Watari, a shy girl. The two leave Earth, which has become uninhabitable due to environmental pollution, and set off in the carriage. Their goal is to find a safe planet to settle. However, all the planets they visit are very strange! A planet with a god who can bring all things back to life, another planet where the luckiest people are considered the greatest, and a planet with countless libraries… The two girls are sometimes thrown for a loop by these strange worlds…
tags: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Adaptation

name: Ojousama's Forbidden Culinary Detours
description: Yuuki Saji is the daughter of one of Japan's leading zaibatsu families. Aoi Hashisugi, a former delinquent who was thrown into a rich school by his parents, finds classmate Yuuki in trouble on a street corner and decides to buy her a beef bowl, opening her eyes to a commoner's delicacy for the first time. A young lady with a deep window meets a commoner's delicacy.
tags: School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Black Channel
description:
A dark comedy for the modern era, from CoroCoro Comic!

Enter Black, the "Demonic Yo-Tuber"! With his sidekick Camera-chan, and the aspiring 5th grade Yo-Tuber Satoshi, he makes all kinds of crazy videos using his demonic powers. Filming the "true natures" of anyone from top honor students, to class idols, to supernatural monsters, he makes crazy videos with his demonic powers! What will Black film next...?
tags: Demons, Comedy, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: BL Drama no Shuen ni Narimashita
description: A popular BL manga is going to be adapted into a live-action drama. The double lead roles will be played by Aoyanagi Hajime, a talented actor who used to be a successful child actor but is not so successful anymore and Akafuji Yuuichirou, a popular and handsome actor. Aoyagi has a hard time with Akafuji who has an unfriendly attitude, but on the other hand Akafuji has too much love for Aoyagi... Will the two stars succeed in their BL drama?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: Ambivalent ~Doutei wo Sutetara Shinu Sekai~
description: A new type of sexually transmitted infection is spreading around the world. When infected, women's sexual desire increases by several dozen times, while 99% of men die. In a world where casual sex means death, Shindo Sadao, who is a virgin, vows not to have relations with anyone until a vaccine is developed, but the temptations of women overwhelm him!
tags: Comedy, Survival, Tragedy

name: Love is an Illusion! - Superstar
description:
Byul, a popular alpha and a first-year high school student, once trained to be an idol but has since left that path to attend school like a regular kid. His world takes an unexpected turn with the sudden birth of a younger sibling, introducing new challenges to his daily routine. Byul's childhood friend, Siwoo, has secretly harbored feelings for him for years. However, both being alphas, Siwoo has kept his emotions hidden.

As the two navigate their growing closeness after a period of time apart, Byul faces adolescence head-on, grappling with friendships, family relationships, and his sense of identity. Along the way, he rediscovers his passion for music and begins to mature through these transformative experiences.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Kiraide Isasete - Asanaga-sensei to Yanagi-sensei
description: The long-awaited spin-off of Kiraide Isasete, this new series focuses on the growing relationship between Asanaga and Yanagi.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Grand Metal Organs
description: A boy killed by his superhero idol, then he decided to become a Dark Walker. "Saving the world by destroying the world"
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Superhero, Adventure, Gore, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Nakimushi Ouji (♀) no Izumi-kun wa Joshikou no Ouji-sama to Yuri ni naru kamo shirenai
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic

name: Gyges no Futari
description:
Todo, a manga artist, and Hinata, an assistant, have a common problem - a bad deal with the editor in charge. 
When such two people return home from the interview, they awaken to each other's abilities…
tags: Psychological, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Tsuttsukumon!
description: A short story about a girl who is supposed to be a spirit medium, but her lack of self-discipline allows even the spirits of stray cats to take control of her body.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy

name: Otaku ni Yasashii Gyaru
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Web Comic, Gyaru

name: Tonari no Inuyama-kun
description: Kokoro was involved in a traffic accident when she was small, and there was a hero who risked his life to save her. She can’t remember anything about him, except for his back, which was scarred from saving her. Now a high school student, she still can’t forget the guy from her memories. Suddenly, she was assigned to take care of the new transfer student, Inuyama Kei, who’s always quiet and somewhat of a weirdo. He reminds her of her childhood hero, but she wishes her hero was Shun-senpai, the idol of all the girls in school, and who’s been very nice to her lately…
tags: Oneshot, Action, Romance, School Life

name: Kakuu no Sono
description:
After his mom's death, our protagonist strives for every bit of physical affection that his dad would show. Even as a toddler, his dad never held his hand or stroked his head.  
  
Also contains stories:  
- Flower of the Sky  
  
- Dark Eyes  
About a young woman and the man who appears in her life during dangerous times.
tags: Drama

name: Rumic Theater
description:
A sophisticated collection of tales, ranging from the macabre to heartwarming to wacky. The trials and tribulations of daily life.  
  
Volume 1: P no Higeki (released 1994)  
1. P no Higeki (The Tragedy of P)  
2. Roman no Akindo (The Merchant of Romance)  
3. Poi no Ie (The House of Trash)  
4. Hachi no Naka (Hidden in the Pottery)  
5. Hyakunen no Koi (One Hundred Years of Love)  
6. L-size no Shiawase (Extra-Large Sized Happiness)  
  
  
Volume 2: Senmu no Inu (released 1997)  
1. Semmu no Inu (The Director's Dog)  
2. Meisou Kazoku Fire (The Astray 'F' Family)  
3. Kimi ga Iru dake de (As Long as You Are Here)  
4. Chanoma no Love Song (Living Room Love Song)  
5. Oyaji Low Teen (Teen Papa)  
6. Orei ni Kaete (As Way of Thanks)  
  
Volume 3: Akai Hanataba (released 2005)  
1. One Day Dream  
2. Graffiti Pop  
3. Dutiful Vacation / Giri no Vacance / Holiday-In-Law / A Compulsory Holiday (婆婆的假期)  
4. Help  
5. Red Bouquet  
6. Permanent Love  
  
Volume 4: Unmei no Tori (released 2011)  
  
Volume 5: The Witch and the Dinner (released 2019)

Volume 6: The Power of Money (released 2024)
tags: Psychological, Animals, Comedy, Anthology, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Kuu-chan ga Iku!
description: Cute short story about Kuuchan the cat and his adventures at the animal hospital.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Youheidan no Ryouriban
description: The story begins when Azuma Akari, a young man with an ambition to be a chef, trips into another world. Akari is picked up by Gangreve, the leader of a mercenary group. Akari joins the group as an odd job and gradually increases his own value by demonstrating his cooking skills. Each leader of the mercenary group is a quirky character, but Akari connects with them through his cooking. By improving the mercenary group's food situation and occasionally helping with inventions, Akari is gradually recognized by his fellow members of the mercenary group. However, Akari does not yet know that he will become a hero.
tags: Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: The Extra's Academy Survival Guide
description:
Ed Rothstaylor is a third-rate villain in a game, disowned by his family and kicked out of the dormitory for his misdeeds. One day, our main character wakes up as this very Ed, and realizes he must earn a scholarship so he can graduate and be set for life. 

Now living in the woods, he resolves to keep away from the protagonists, but four of the female leads just won't leave him alone. Not only that, his presence starts to change the timeline and events of the game! 

Can Ed help the story progress while staying out of the limelight?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Tokimeke Mahou Youjo Kokopure
description: Spin-off of Onee-san wa Joshi Shougakusei ni Kyoumi ga arimasu. Same degeneracy, but with magical girls.
tags: Loli, Comedy, Magical Girls, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Kago no Naka no Ryuu Seijo
description:
“Even though I was supposed to have been rejected for marriage once…?!”
The Dragon Saintess, tasked with caring for the black dragon “Gramvint,” who protects the Kingdom of Elvasti, is the official fiancée of the kingdom’s prince. The current Dragon Saintess, “Ludia,” has dedicated her life since childhood to taking care of the enormous dragon that resides in a giant cage. She was also engaged to the prince, “Edik.”

However, one day, “Edik” suddenly summoned “Ludia” and informed her of her dismissal as the Dragon Saintess and the annulment of their engagement. To her shock, the new Dragon Saintess was her stepsister, “Leila.” What’s more, “Edik” told her that her next destination would be marriage to the Black General, “Wilfried.” But “Wilfried” rejected the marriage, saying, “You and I are not a good match”…?!
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! - A Day of KazuMegu (Doujinshi)
description: A parody of ["This Croc Will Die In 100 Days"](https://mangadex.org/title/44625/this-croc-will-die-in-100-days)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Doujinshi, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Seijo no Maryoku wa Bannou desu
description:
Sei, a 20 year old office worker, is summoned to a different world after finishing some overtime work. But the person who had summoned her looks at her face and said, "This is not the Saint." Instead, the other summoned lady is lauded as the Saint, while Sei is ignored. Offended at being discarded without a second thought, Sei leaves the royal palace and looks for occupation, and she starts working at a laboratory where she makes potions and cosmetics. She uses her magic to grant people’s requests and slowly people begin suspecting that she is the actual Saint...

Can Sei enjoy her slow dreamy different-world life without her saint title being found out?!
tags: Monsters, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: DDADDICTION
description: Asato, a high school student with a strong sense of justice, is investigating small pranks that frequently occur at school and comes across the newly appointed school nurse, Egou Nemu. Nemu is admired by everyone at school because of her beauty, but she has a curt attitude towards everyone. However, when Asato learns Nemu's secret, he is invited to Nemus home. Asato is at the mercy of Nemu, who has a sweet attitude that he doesn't show during the day, but there is an even more important secret―in that room.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Hone Hime Rosalie: Shisha no Saigo o Tsuitai-ken Shi, Chikara o Hikitsugu
description:
Rosalie, a girl capable of communicating with the dead, is ostracized by society due to her unique ability. She lives in isolation, working as an investigator who gleans critical information from the deceased unearthed in ancient ruins. Her life takes a dramatic turn when she encounters the remains of Hugo, a once-legendary death knight. Through their connection, she inherits his extraordinary powers. This marks the beginning of her journey as "Bone Princess," a figure destined to influence the world.

The story blends supernatural mystery with epic fantasy, focusing on themes of acceptance, legacy, and the power of understanding the past.
tags: Action, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Tyrant Taming Guide
description:
Chu Rong x Xu Yehuai

Xu Yehuai, a social animal, once became a vicious villain who was made into sashimi by the tyrant male protagonist of a cool novel.

In order to survive, he pretended to have amnesia.

Who knew that the violent male protagonist changed his normal crazy and called him "adoptive father"?

The tyrant who was supposed to kill him turned into a loyal dog, caring for him, obeying him in everything, and aggrievedly said that they had "that kind of" relationship! ! ?

Chu Rong approached with suspicion and temptation, and personally laid a trap full of flowers for him, watching him step by step into his own cage, but why was he the one who fell into pain in the end?

A conspiracy that uses love as a game, only until the end can we tell who is the real winner.

TLer: https://youtube.com/playlist?list=PL8lurieGcrLgh4Pmm9YQPcJ7nhRiBB0nn&feature
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Boys' Love, Military, Drama, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Monica Everett is revered as “The Silent Witch.” She’s the only magician in the world who can use magic without an incantation... In reality though, she’s just shy— the only reason she practiced chantless magic was so that she wouldn't have to speak in public! Before even realizing her own talent, Monica is chosen as one of the “Seven Sages,” and is assigned the secret mission of protecting the kingdom’s second prince...?

The antisocial young prodigy will have to hide her true nature while secretly rescuing the prince from encroaching danger in this thrilling fantasy story!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Magika Swordsman and Summoner
description:
15 years ago the world discovered magic as well as mythical beings (basically beings from various legends) in another dimension. Humankind learned to summon these dangerous mythical beings and use their power to great effect. 7 countries formed contracts with these "Diva" and gained their alligence as a result. Diva will chose their summoners on their 14th birthday and give them a stigma. Schools have been set up to train summoners and magical swordsman (basically bodyguards that give the summoners time to cast their spell) as a result.  
  
15 years later after the finding of magic Hayashizaki Kazuki is chosen as a summoner and given a stigma to indicate that. This is surprising since males aren't chosen as summoners due to their low amount of mana compared to females. As the first male to be a summoner Kazuki is under a lot of scrutiny by almost everyone.  
  
To complicate matters his sister (who's a magical swordsman) is against him going into summoner school to train there as a summoner. Because summoners and magical swordsman have a cat mouse thing going on where summoners look down on magical swordsman as inferior so his sister naturally is against him going there. She'll stop him even if it means going to war.  
  
Kazuki however is determined to thrive in summoner school and have already determined to give it his all. Even if he's the lowest ranked student (ranked E) and his fellow students intend to demean him he'll prove himself as the strongest summoner.  
  
Adaptation of the light novel written by Mihara Mitsuki and illustrated by CHuN.  
  
The manga is published in Monthly Comic Alive, a seinen manga magazine by Media Factory.  
  
————————————————————————————————————————————  
  
**Chapters 54-74 already available by official release and they will therefore not be available here.**
