tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Pushoff
description: Dahye was forced to grow up in a cult by her mother, cut off from the rest of the world. However, she meets a half-sister her age named Yunseo, who is her polar opposite, and meets new people.
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: When You’re In Love
description:
"I didn’t marry my wife because I loved her. I just signed a contract with her at her request."
I actually knew the truth, so it’s not his fault. I was the one who developed false expectations. I had spent three years as his wife. and I tried hard to be the right woman for him, but I couldn’t get a piece of his heart.
"I didn’t know it would last this long. It’s annoying."
I was nothing to him to the extent that he all but forgot about me as soon as the heroine appeared. In the end, she was always going to be the main character and I was always going to be an extra. No matter how hard I try, my role isn't changing. So it’s only right for me to leave.
"I’m sorry I’ve been bothering you all this time. Please be happy with her."
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Zettai ni Yuuwaku sarenai Otoko VS Zettai ni Yuuwaku suru Onna
description: Reishi Kiyota, a ronin student, has a phobia of love due to a traumatic experience and has never been with a woman in his life. His neighbor, Aika Toyokawa, an office worker, likes Reishi and tries to seduce him with all her might..!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Ore no Choukyou Skill ga Nanka Hen
description:
Takashi, a beast tamer who can't use his training skill well, is constantly suffering rebellion by his beasts. However, on a particular occasion, his skill is activated! For some reason, the companion it worked on was a girl!? It's a beast taming x pitiful heroine erotic fantasy adventure!

(Source: Futabasha, translated)
tags: Action, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy

name: Watashi no Kokoro wa Oji-san de Aru
description: "Haruka Yamagishi" is a guy who has no friends or family and just goes back and forth between work and home. One day, when he wakes up, he finds himself in a different world. And for some reason, he's turned into a beautiful dark elf! Now, Haruka has inexhaustible magic power, a sturdy body, and a new life where she can do anything... However, through the friends she met and her activities as an adventurer, changes slowly began to take place. The guy who gave up on life in this world begins to feel what it's like to live.
tags: Genderswap, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Watashi to Kanojo no Kawaii Koi no Hajime Kata
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Girls' Love

name: Hangyaku no Nijigasaki
description: Hangyaku no Nijigasaki (Nijigasaki of the Rebellion) is an official Love Live! manga by Choboraunyopomi featuring the cast of Love Live!'s Nijigasaki High School Idol Club.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Web Comic, Music

name: Souzou Renkinjutsushi wa Jiyuu wo Ouka suru: Kokyou wo Tsuihou saretara, Maou no Ohizamoto de Chouzetsu Kouka no Magic Item Tsukuri-houdai ni Narimashita
description: Thor Regus, a boy who lived in the empire, was banished to the territory of the Demon Lord by the hands of his father, the Duke. The reason was that he could only use [Alchemy] and didn’t have any combat skills. The empire was a military country, and those without combat skills were discriminated against. That is why the Empire decided to make him a hostage and sacrifice to the Demon Territory.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Mr. Villain's Day Off
description:
There exists an evil organisation that intends to invade planet Earth.  
  
The man called "General" fights everyday against the Earth's Defence Force, the "Rangers!"  
  
However, today is his day off.

---

Additional Official English Release | [Comikey](https://comikey.com/comics/mr-villains-day-off-manga/231/)
tags: Demons, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Kuuki ga "Yomeru" Shinnyushain to Buaiso na Senpai no Hanashi (Serialization)
description: A slice-of-life story about a new employee who can literally read emotions and an inexpressive but actually very kind senpai at work.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: I'm a Solo Guide
description: Ye Ji-an, the only S-class guide in Korea, was often called the “useless guide” due to her unique trait of having a 0% matching rate with all espers. After failing to match with an esper from Russia and on her way back home, she is suddenly swept away by a gate manifestation and wakes up alone in a strange temple-like place. The world she has traveled to through the gate is the continent of Wisrode, filled only with espers, and in this place, Ji-an is the only guide…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Harem, Drama, Fantasy

name: Tensei Dai Majo no Isekai Kurashi ~Kodai Roman-Fuu Kokka de Hajimeru Mahou Kenkyuu~
description:
"I want to be the wizard of my dreams!"

Zenith, a young girl reincarnated in the ancient Roman-style country of Jupiter, goes to study in the capital with only her momentum. She spreads water magic and floods the classroom. She even falls unconscious after using herself as a test subject, and shoots hot air out of her buttocks in an experiment, and her outlandish behavior never stops. Despite the white eyes of the people around her, she sells shaved ice using ice magic to earn money for her research, and it accidentally becomes a big hit...?

"Amazing! I've made the discovery of the century again!"

Sometimes a catastrophe, sometimes a success(?), sometimes a laugh-out-loud moment!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Unlucky Young Men
description:
Tokyo, 1968: between political turmoil and student riots N, a man with a criminal past, 
casually meets T, a young comedian intent on making a career in the film industry. 
T wants to shoot "Unlucky Young Men", a chronicle of a disillusioned Japanese youth
ready to do anything to realize their dreams; to finance the film, 
the two begin to plan attacking a van carrying 300 million yen...
tags: Thriller, Historical, Action, Crime, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, Police

name: Cool na Megami-sama to Issho ni Sundara, Amayakashi Sugite Ponkotsu ni Shite Shimatta Ken ni Tsuite
description: One day, Haruto Akihara, a high school student living alone, moves in with his classmate Rei Mikoto, an extremely beautiful girl! Rei, nicknamed the "Goddess of Ice", has a cold attitude towards Haruto, who is devoted to her, but gradually...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Ijimeru Aitsu ga Waruinoka, Ijimerareta Boku ga Waruinoka?
description: Aizawa was bullied by Suzuki to the point of becoming truant. He picks himself back up and becomes a teacher. 20 years later, his bully's daughter is one of his students and she's being harassed in class, a secret she keeps from her father.
tags: Psychological, Drama, School Life

name: Akira (Official Colored)
description: Welcome to Neo-Tokyo, built on the ashes of a Tokyo annihilated by a blast of unknown origin that triggered World War III. The lives of two streetwise teenage friends, Tetsuo and Kaneda, change forever when paranormal abilities begin to waken in Tetsuo, making him a target for a shadowy agency that will stop at nothing to prevent another catastrophe like the one that leveled Tokyo. At the core of the agency's motivation is a raw, all-consuming fear of an unthinkable, monstrous power known only as Akira.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Official Colored, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Quadrilateral
description: A geometry project I made back in high school.
tags: Oneshot, Philosophical, Drama

name: A Story About an Atenean Girl at Blackbox
description: A oneshot adapted from a college page shitpost.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Military, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: Nagareboshi
description:
Tensei is a college student who’s a hobbyist photographer. One day while taking photos, he encounters and becomes captivated by a boy with burn scars on his face, Makito. 

Worn down by people staring at his scars from an accident, Makito escaped the flashy modelling industry and instead found work at a small-town library. 
Tensei, who knows nothing about this past, comes to talk to Makito whenever he borrows and returns books. He begins to fall in love with Makito’s delicate and beautiful profile, and before he knows it, he’s pointing his camera at him.

He’s hopelessly attracted to the way Makito looks in his photos. But, as he realizes his overwhelming feelings, a guy from Makito’s modelling past shows up to take him back…?

College kid with a photography hobby and a hidden possessive streak X Ex-model with large burn scars on his face

“Even your scars are beautiful. I just want to mess you up…”

The story of a love affair, played out under a sky full of stars.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life

name: Assault Lily: League of Gardens -full bloom-
description:
When the enigmatic life-forms called the Huge appeared, they nearly brought the world to ruin. But humanity studied the energy called magie and created CHARMs, potent weapons against the Huge. 

Teenage girls, who proved to resonate the most with CHARMs, became the vanguard in the war with the Huge. There is a name for these girls who fight against humankind's end. They are known as elegant flowers of battle—as Lilies.

A manga adaptation of the stage play "Assault Lily: League of Gardens."
tags: Monsters, Action, Magical Girls, Post-Apocalyptic, Girls' Love, School Life, Adaptation

name: Crook Clock
description: Young master Hewlett is a famous work-a-holic watch-maker whose one dream is to make watches only for people who appreciate and love them. And exactly when he thought he’d never meet such a person, his faithful butler Jill made him attend a tea-party where he met the new maid Mulara. And her first words were that her greatest treasure ever is one of master Hewlett’s old watches…
tags: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: DOGSRED
description:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!
tags: Sports

name: Shisei
description:
A love story between two souls separated by their stations in life, in the form of a tattoo.

"Even if we stopped seeing each other, my soul would always be with you."

A man visits a certain tatoo artist. A vivid love story of surreptitious, yet intense longing of two souls.
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Romance, Drama, Tragedy

name: Kao no Nai Otoko
description: Separated by war, a pair of lovers seek to be united once more...
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Cypress Vine Tales: Oneshot Collection
description: Cutlet Warrior's yuri oneshot collection.
tags: Oneshot, Long Strip, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Babel no Tegami
description: Even after all these years, you’re still the only one I think of… I’ll put all of my feelings into this letter for you.
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Romance, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Hibike! Euphonium - I Scream. / Happy I Scream.(Doujinshi)
description: An alternative take on Liz and the Blue Bird. Will Nozomi be able to convey her feelings…?
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Doujinshi

name: The Red Shoes
description:
A collection of some of the earliest one-shots done by Hideko Mizuno, with shared elements of dance and the fantastical.

- **The Red Shoes** (赤いくつ, Akai Kutsu, story by Chiaki Saeki): The tale of Nais and Ruby, a brother and a sister who face turmoil when tragedy strikes close to home, and the titular pair of red shoes, said to give anyone who wears them flawless dancing ability.
- **Something for Misa** (ミサにあげるもの, Misa ni Ageru Mono)
- **Night of the Blue Star** (青い星の夜, Aoi Hoshi no Yoru): Toshiko, a girl in poverty, has always longed for the pair of red shoes at her local store. On the day of her town's star festival, Toshiko encounters a puppy being harassed by some children. This puppy takes an unusual liking to her... Also collected in *[Starry Fantasy](https://mangadex.org/title/3f0d7f7a-06f1-442a-9326-52dbd6b2c740/starry-fantasy)*.
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Comedy, Anthology, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Nina the Starry Bride
description: Nina had a rough start to life, stealing to survive—and eventually being sold into slavery by her own brother. But to her surprise, her captor, Prince Azure, ordained that she would live the life of a princess...specifically, that of the recently deceased princess-priestess, Alisha. But despite her changing fortune, Nina won't give up her old life without a fight...and Azure might just be the one to finally match her wits. But how much can she trust Azure? And can she stop the feelings budding in her heart, knowing she must eventually marry another...? [Kodansha]
tags: Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

name: Dungeon ni Deai o Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka: Familia Chronicle—Episode Freya
description:
"Uh…Freya-sama left a letter and has left…"  
  
The members of the Freya Familia all turned at once to look at the messenger. Leaving the shocked first class adventurers aside, the uninhibited Goddess of Beauty leaves on a journey to fulfill her desire!
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation

name: Otonari no Tenshi-sama ni Itsu no Ma ni ka Dame Ningen ni Sareteita Ken: After the Rain
description: A spin-off of the series *[The Angel Next Door Spoils Me Rotten](https://mangadex.org/title/2fec6641-beb1-4ae9-a32f-204dd06688ac/the-angel-next-door-spoils-me-rotten)* which comicalizes the stories from Volume 5.5 of the Light Novel and its special edition booklet, which contains additional short stories.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Isekai Samurai
description:
The strongest swordsman of the Warring States period, transferred to another world.

At the end of the Warring States Period, Ginko, the greatest swordsman of the time, was always hungry for a fight to the death with someone stronger than herself. After cutting and cutting and cutting, she finally despairs that there is no one stronger than her in this world, and then she is transferred to another world! Before her eyes - a dragon!
tags: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Samurai, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy

name: Ore no vaccine dake ga zonbi-ka shita sekai o sukueru
description: Oikawa Yuu, who has been shut up in his house, is certain to die as a virgin at the age of 21. This is because the whole world has become a place filled with zombies... One day, a survivor visits Yuu's house. The woman, who calls herself Sunny, injects Yuu with a vaccine that may save the world from the zombies... but as a result, Yuu gains the ability to turn zombies back into humans by having sex...?
tags: Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Zombies, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Gore, Medical, Horror, Mystery

name: The Story of the Kiwi Bird
description: A story based on New Zealand's kiwi mythology
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Frontier Alchemist ~ I Can't Go Back to That Job After You Made My Budget Zero
description:
Rust worked in the alchemist association. He specialized in basic research, but the current president, a former government official, failed to understand the importance of the basic research department and slashed its budget. To make matters worse, he was made to transmute basic materials for alchemists of other departments.

But one day, his budget for the next term was reduced to zero, and the president announced the basic research department was disbanded.

The same day, a friend from his academy days invited him to help develop her new dominion in the borderland, and Rust, seeing no future for himself in the association, decided to quit.

Rust was actually one of the greatest alchemists on the planet. The basic materials he transmuted were of the highest quality, and could not be acquired anywhere else. These high quality materials covered a lot of gaps in the association, and Rust’s departure made a big mess.

Feeling liberated after leaving the association, Rust worked in the borderland with a newfound enthusiasm and vigor.
tags: Monsters, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Isekai de Itoshi no Kare♂ ni Chouai Sarechau BL Anthology
description:
A sweet overnight vigil with His Majesty S! A pet contract with an obsessed demon king, etc… The other world life is full of doting♂ flags..!? Lovey-dovey in full bloom♪ The second anthology of Another World x Doting BL! 

Cover: TAKAYAMA Shinobu 

Included works: 
1. "I Was Already Married When I Woke Up"
Art: Homerun Ken
Story: as

2. "Please Forgive Me Demon King"
Art: Hakkomame
Story: Hinya

3. "I Was Drinking Myself To Death Because Of My Unrequited Love For A Quiet Childhood Friend, And I Was Doted On For A Night By An Adventurer Resembling My Crush"
Art:AOI Kurage
Story: Amagi

4. "The Beautiful Concubine Wants To Live Peacefully"
Art: CHASHIBU Tamu
Story: Ishin

5. "A Dream Of Twin Wings"
Art: TAKAYAMA Shinobu
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Romance, Anthology, Boys' Love, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Only the Red Panda Daughter-in-Law Receives Loves
description:
One day, the fairy of books appeared and told Letty that she was a dying extra character.

“Father-in-law!”
“?”
“Father-in-law, please give me your son!!”

Letty came to marry in place of the female lead to survive, but the in-laws are unbearable!

“I don’t want to work. I’ll take a day off today.”
“If you take today off, it’ll be your 194th day off, Your Grace. It’s already mid-June.”

Her father-in-law, who’s supposed to be the head of the family, is incredibly lazy and is about to ruin the family,

Crash! Bang!
“Why are you breaking things again, husband?”
“I don’t know. I just feel like breaking something every time I see your face.”

The successor, her husband, is the head of the division...!

‘Ugh, I just wanted to heal him and escape, but this isn’t going to work.’

Sigh. There’s no helping it. Until the female lead shows up, should I try helping out this hopeless family a bit?

“Father-in-law, at this rate, you’ll ruin the family!! I’m so embarrassed, I could die!!!”

And so, Letty managed to get the lazy father-in-law to start thinking like a hardworking ant,

“Hubby, your heart is racing again? Don’t break things and hold Letty’s hand.”
Crash! Bang!
“Ahhh~ The young master is destroying the mansion again!”

The attempt to reform her husband failed.
tags: Oneshot, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: Shuumatsu no Valkyrie Kinden - Kamigami no Apocalypse
description: Zeus, supreme chairman of the Council of Valhalla, announces to the gods twelve of the thirteen fighters set to participate in Ragnarok--and is met with the dissenting voices of those who were not chosen. However, Zeus has foreseen this, and immediately declares the holding of another tournament to decide the final spot on the Ragnarok lineup, one which will break the taboo on gods fighting one another. Thus begins the "Revelation" of the untold side of *Record of Ragnarok!*
tags: Action, Demons, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama

name: Isekai Koushoku Musou Roku ~Isekai Tensei no Chie to Chikara o, Tada Hitasura ✕✕✕✕ Suru Tame ni Tsukau~
description:
A man who has been reincarnated in a different world acquires the vocation of "pole master" in the new world! However, that special ability is not used to defeat enemies, nor to gain power, but to embrace the beautiful girls who appear one after another with all one's might! A unique story of conquering another world begins here!

The protagonist, “Sao” has been reborn with his memories from his past life. He’s born as a son of a rural villager, but his true identity is a reincarnated person with cheat abilities and the knowledge of the modern world. With the class “Rod Master,” he received as he grows up, and the many skills that came up with it, he can defeat enemies, help people, and even for sex.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Uzugami
description:
Satoru Takeichi, also known as Ichigo, works at a sawmill. 

While working, he got into a mechanical problem and ended up having the first joint of his right little finger amputated. He and other employees searched for the cut off part, but couldn't find it. 

Ichigo goes straight to the hospital and receives treatment. However, when he returned to his apartment after being hospitalized for a few days, he found another version of him... 

From there, a strange shared life with another [Himself] begins...

Adaptation of a web novel serialized on the platform peep.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Crime, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Ore no Level Up ga Okashii! ~Dekiru Otoko no Isekai Tensei~
description:
Zarmen, an adventurer who can't level up decides to retire from the adventurer business. Furthermore, in order to graduate from virginity, he decided to splurge on all the assets that he had diligently saved up since his reincarnation at a high-class brothel.

The woman who appeared in front of him was the finest woman he would ever have known. Thanks to her hospitality, Zarmen fully enjoys his first time, but at that moment, his ears hear a mysterious announcement...

[Impregnation confirmed.]
[Level up!]

"Does this mean that the more 'seeding' I do, the stronger I get?"

An extraordinary implantable foreign world adventure fantasy created by a bottom adventurer who has been at level 1 for many years levels up through sex!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Full Color

name: The Duchess Goes Crazy Once A Day
description: Maid Bella endured long-term bullying in the Duke's house. After being tortured to death, her soul traveled through time and space to become the mad lady. She married the monstrous count and began to take revenge with a new identity.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Ostracized and tormented by his peers to the point of breaking, Kazuhisa Kaya set off into the nearby forest atop the mountain with one purpose: to dig a pitfall and bring about the death of the person behind his suffering. However, right when Kazuhisa was about to succeed in his revenge, a sudden earthquake throws his plans out of whack! Caught unaware, all he can do is patiently lie in wait until someone lumbering across the path happens to fall into his trap. Kazuhisa’s excitement is short-lived, however, as the corpse at the bottom of his pitfall turns out not to be the bully he was expecting but a grotesque, pig-looking monster, and his confusion only grows as he’s suddenly greeted by a pure-white room and a RPG-like status screen.

Strange monsters now wandering the mountain and with newfound powers at his disposal, Kazuhisa is forced to throw all concerns over his tormentor to the wayside as he focuses on a new goal: survival. That’s not going to be as easy as it seems, however, as he’s not the only one to have been wrapped up in this mess…

(Hanashi Media)

[Official English Light Novel](https://hanashi.media/another-world-survival/)
tags: Action, Psychological, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kujibiki Tokushou: Musou Harem-ken
description: I drew a lottery at the Shopping District and won the privilege to go to another world. After drawing a lot of balls, unexpectedly I got a cheat-like skill. Silencing those who are noisy and getting hold of all the things that I want. I will satisfy all my desires.
tags: Loli, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Soul Anomaly
description: Yuichi Shiro is a foolish, narcissistic, and oblivious teenage boy. After a sudden incident his once ordinary life goes through great changes. How will the optimistic self proclaimed genius handle the life he will lead from now on? As well as handle the new acquaintances and enemies it brings with it. Let the story of action, life, romance and stupidity begin. (Original Web [Novel](https://www.fictionpress.com/s/3068594/1/Soul-Anomaly)).
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Harem

name: It is Impossible to Love and be Wise.
description: I have someone I like. Far away. It was a long way away. The reason why otaku don't fall madly in love with their favorite is because of that "distance". Airi is an otaku who rejects live-action films and is a two-dimensional supremacist. In the "2.5 dimension," the space between fiction and reality, she encounters a real-life protagonist.
tags: Romance, Slice of Life

name: Stalker's Game
description: Why did the stalker choose Hyunsung? It began with gifts. First, candies, milk cartons, confectionaries piling outside his small apartment’s door. Then, the meals. Dinner cooked and waiting for him, perfectly timed for when he arrived late from his mundane office job. Soon he began to accept it, the feeling of being watched, like it even. But why him? Who is the stalker? Can Hyunsung really let this continue…trust him? Or is it all just a game…
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Horror, Web Comic

name: Miyu-chan wa Zutto Tomodachi
description: In the summer of his second year of high school, Yuushin Tahara finds that his childhood friend, Miyu Fukagawa, who had moved away, has returned to the house next door. Although Miyu has grown up to be quite cute, there's something a little strange about her...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Hibiki - Shousetsuka ni Naru Houhou
description:
The literature industry is suffering from the publishing recession. 
While the literary magazine 'Mokuren' was grieving over the present state of affairs, 
a composition intended for their Newcomer's Award was sent to their editing department. 
However, it completely ignored the application rules. It could have been torn to shreds, 
but the work caught the eye of a sole editor. As a result, their world began to change.  
  
Winner of the 2017 Manga Taisho Award and the 2018 Shogakukan Manga Award.

Indonesian release by M&C Comics as **Hibiki: Kiat Menjadi Novelis**
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Please Take Care
description: Help! Why is my blind date my 'ex'-boyfriend?!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Oideyo! Magicado Shoten
description: Madoka et al. working in a bookstore? More likely than you'd think! And their manager, Kyuubey, mistreats his employees while bootlicking his superiors (from Head Office)? Treat yourself to this light-hearted comedy with Madoka and friends hard at work in Magicado Bookstores!
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Whimsy Whimsy Witch
description: A prince has been cursed to turn into a frog by a witch. Things went wild from there.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Jashin-chan Dropkick
description:
Jashin-chan Dropkick is a violent slapstic comedy about a delusional gothic lolita, Yurine, who summons a demon girl with the tail of a cobra, Jashin-chan.
They'll have to live together until Yurine finds a way to send Jashin-chan back to hell, or until Jashin-chan kills Yurine.

---

[Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20484)
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Gore, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: ZubaBan
description: It is the Sengoku period. ZubaBan is a wild child who is unbeatable in physical strength, he can easily swing around his giant sword and cut down hordes of enemies! Then, suddenly, Jeanne d'Arc, a knight clad in western armor appears, along with Kanchohi, who came from China (?), and the invincible warrior Golongo. This colorful punch joins forces in hopes of uniting Japan! Zubaban is unbeatable in hand-to-hand combat, but soon the gears of strange fate turn...!? A thrilling, super-period drama depicted on a grand scale!
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Ninja, Comedy, Samurai, Sexual Violence, Gore, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural

name: The Swordmaster's Son
description:
Jin Runcandel was destined to become the head of his swordmaster clan. But despite his best efforts, he's banished for his shoddy swordsmanship. Though Jin eventually makes a contract with the god Solderet and is freed from the curse that hindered his abilities, he meets a rather unfortunate end. In the next moment, however, he awakens as a baby, long before his tragedy began.

Armed with a second chance and some new powers, Jin swears to fulfill his destiny and become the ultimate swordmaster!
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Sousei Mahou no Saigensha
description:
Hermes, the son of a prestigious noble family, was born with enormous magical powers and was a child prodigy with a promising future. However, as a result of the evaluation, it was discovered that he was incompetent and had not inherited the "bloodline magic," a unique magic passed down from generation to generation in the family of nobles. Exiled from the royal capital, he was on the verge of death in the depths of despair, but Rose, a legendary witch who recognized his talent, saved him and made him her apprentice. After training, he mastered the strongest magic—Creation Magic, which can reproduce all magic. Hermes, who has learned that the common sense of the kingdom, which determines the superiority of all values by the power of "bloodline magic," is wrong, returns to the royal capital to further his magical studies, bringing change to a kingdom filled with deception...! A tale of the most powerful magic by a boy with no talent overturns the common sense of the world, and the saga begins!

---

**Links:**
- [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0826gy)
- [Official LN (JP)](https://over-lap.co.jp/narou/824001054)
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Violet Bloom (Promo)
description:
‘Agnes’ was a girl who saved the prince’s life by coincidence.
Thanks to his kindness, she received the opportunity to serve as a chambermaid in the palace.
Though initially staying with him as an old friend, An naturally fell in love with him.
However, as time passed and he become emperor, she knew her unrequited love had to come to an end…

“Do you like men much?”
“…You’re going too far.”

An’s face darkened. She stared at the man who’s eyes burned with an intense fire. His expression was grim and unrelenting.

“It’s true, is it not? Jumping from one man to another, you’re insane…”
“What’s wrong with me meeting with potential partners? I’m marriageable age, after all.”

An bit her lip, while Lennox slowly parted his.

“…What’s the problem?”
“What do you mean?”

Hearing her question, Lennox’s eyelashes trembled slightly. His claw-like hands clamped down on her, pressing her against the wall. An let out a cry and closed her eyes. But fortunately, his hand cradled the back of her head, shielding her from the wall. Trembling, she glared at him.

“You said you didn’t like me.”
“I-I don’t know what you’re talking about.”

An blinked in confusion. It was clear he was referring to that particular incident. This man dug into her unwanted memories, her breath hitching as red crept upon her face. Lennox’s face twisted at the sight of her reaction.

“You clearly said you hated me.”
“Your Majesty.”
“Did you really find me that unbearable?”
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: F-Rank University Journal
description: Not found
tags: School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Martial Peak
description:
The peak of martial arts is solitary and lonely. It is an endless pursuit for unattainable heights as well. In order to surpass the limits of martial arts, growth and the will to survive in adverse situations is necessary.
One day, Yang Kai, a disciple-on-trial (and floor sweeper) of the Lingxiao Martial Arts Sect discovered a Wordless Black Book. That marked the turn in his luck and the beginning of his martial arts journey.
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Hotaru no Yomeiri
description: A romance story set in the Meiji era. Born into a prestigious family and blessed with good looks, Satoko is said to have a short life expectancy. But suddenly, her life is targeted by a mysterious killer...?! In order to survive on the spot, Satoko makes a "proposal" for the killer...?! - A young lady and an assassin... A contract marriage love suspense between two people who should never meet!
tags: Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: Meguru Mirai
description:
Mirai, a man who does not show his emotions, lives happily with his innocent and cheerful wife Meguru, but he has a "cursed disease" that he keeps secret even from his wife.
Then one day, Mirai receives an important call from the police concerning his wife...!
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Haite Kudasai, Takamine-san
description:
Takamine Takane is the goddess of her high school. With perfect grades, athletic prowess, and unrivaled beauty, this student council president sits at the top of the social pyramid. And then there's Shirota Koushi, a below-average student with no friends or social prospects to speak of. One day, Shirota-kun accidentally sees Takamine-san's naked breasts and finds out the secret behind her unbelievable success. From then on, his school life changes.

“Become my closet!”

Shirota is forced into underwear-putting-on servitude!?
___
[Alt Official English (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/please-put-them-on-takamine-san)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Boku to Chourui Hyakka Mise
description: Shirosaki Haru, nine years old, is a 4th year elementary school student with no hopes or dreams for the future. One day, he visits the "Bird Encyclopedia Store", a specialty store that has a collection of birds from all over the world. What will an encounter with Kochikawa Enji, the store's manager full of hopes and dreams, bring about…!?
tags: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Botsuraku Yotei no Kizoku dakedo, Hima datta kara Mahou wo Kiwamete Mita
description:
A man who was enjoying an evening drink got transferred to the body of Liam, the fifth son of a nobleman from another world. 

"I spent easy days practicing the magic I had longed for, and learned not only attribute magic, but also how to summon spirits, obtain powerful familiars, and ended up mastering even the most difficult magic!"

He became an adventurer aiming for independence from his parents' house, which was scheduled to fall, and before he knew it, he became a higher-ranking aristocrat rather than one of the best magicians in the world.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Ake no Tobari
description:
To create a paradise where humans and demons can coexist, a human and a demon strive in order to fulfill that dream. This is their story.

---
- [Official Korean Translation](https://www.comico.kr/comic/38)

- [Official Thai Translation](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/85)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Corseltel no Ryuujitsushi Monogatari
description: Corseltel is a fantasy land where dragons and humans live together in harmony. Dragon Sorcerers, in return for borrowing power from the dragons to use magical spells, must take care of the dragon offspring. Mashel, said to be one of the best Dragon Sorcerers in all Corseltel, is able to use all 7 dragon types meaning that he must take care of 7 different dragon children. The dragon children, each representing the types (dark, light, fire, water, wind, earth, life) learn to harness their power through Mashel and also look up to him as a parent. The cuteness of the dragon kids and the life lessons they learn will capture many readers.
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Lv2 kara Cheat datta Moto Yuusha Kouho no Mattari Isekai Life
description: Banaza, who was summoned to the magic kingdom of Cryroad as a Hero candidate, was disqualified as a Hero because of his ordinary abilities. He was supposed to be returned to his original world, but due to the magical kingdom's mistake, he became unable to return to his original world. However, the moment he reached Level 2, he acquired every single possible skill and kind of magic, turning him into a super cheat with infinite skills! Despite this, he takes Fenris of the demons as his wife, and fully enjoys his newly-married life with an easygoing smile. He changes his name to Fulio and tries to lead his life quietly, but things are a bit chaotic with the likes of a pet saber, four freeloading female knights, a Majin, and even an ex-Demon Lord. However, even with all of this chaos, he still manages to enjoy his life peacefully.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Makyou Seikatsu: Gakeppuchi Boukensha ga Hikikomoru ni wa Hirosugiru
description:
After being expelled from his family home, our main character tries his hand at becoming an adventurer, only to find out that things aren't quite as they seem. Determined to change his fate, and with the money he's saved up, he heads out to purchase a plot of land in the remote, unexplored wilderness, with the intent of forging his perfect new life. Little does he know, this expanse is infamous as the 'Demonic Realm,' a treacherous territory brimming with savage plants and creatures!

But navigating the daily trials of this life-threatening wilderness may prove be a challenge. In his journey of growth, an array of inhabitants, each driven by their motives, decide to follow him, bringing vibrancy back into his life. However, unseen powers resolute in preventing the Demonic Realm from being conquered begin to surface... Will he be able to endure, triumph, and make this land his new home?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Mezametara Saikyou Soubi to Uchuusenmochi Datta node, Ikkodate Mezashite Youhei toshite Jiyuu ni Ikitai
description:
Sato Takahiro was an ordinary office worker and hobbyist gamer until the day he woke up on a spaceship–one that strangely resembled a craft from a favorite space-shooter game. With a decked-out ship, a crew full of babes, and a fantastic universe to explore, he’s going to make the most of his good luck and create the life he’s always dreamed of!


---

**Links:**
- [Official English Light Novel](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/reborn-as-a-space-mercenary-i-woke-up-piloting-the-strongest-starship-light-novel/)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Military, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens, Adaptation

name: Haremono Shinjuu
description: Kei, a diligent cook, must come to terms with personal loss as well as his feelings of alienation. While the people close to him may try to help, he has to reach the important conclusions himself...
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Drama

name: Endou-kun no Jikken Note
description: Tsuda and Endou have come to realize they can't stay the way they are forever. If asked about their relationship, they don't know how to answer. What do they need to stay together? It's not enough. They want more. They can't stop their feelings…
tags: Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Time's Toll
description: In a city where time is currency, Ayla fights to uncover the truth behind a mysterious thief stealing Life Spans. As the stakes rise, love, survival, and sacrifice intertwine in a story where every second counts.
tags: Romance, Self-Published, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Mystery, Tragedy

name: To Your Eternity
description:
An immortal being was sent to the surface of the earth and met a boy living alone in the middle of tundra.   
The being can take the shape of dying things, but only if the "impetus" is stronger than the previous one. What sort of experiences and meetings will the being encounter while living forever?   

---   
- **Won the 43rd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen in 2019** 
   
---

name: Mount Celeb Kaneda-san
description: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!
tags: Comedy, School Life

name: Denki Soukou Raijin
description:
A young man called Kanou Ryoto was once saved as a child by a mysterious hero named "Raijin".

Ten years later, Ryoto works in his sister's dog cafe. While walking the dogs one day, he happens to save a strange dog from drowning. Soon after a monster attacks his sister and suddenly the dog he had saved earlier starts to talk to him. Not only that, he also teaches him how to transform into a battle hero and protect his loved ones.

This is the fateful moment Ryoto changes into Raijin Model One!
tags: Action, Superhero

name: Kokoro no Program
description: An elementary schooler, Usami Kyuu encounters Ichiko, a female robot trying to learn about [heart]. What awaits the two that start to live together... Boy X Robot Girl, Begin!
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Poisonous Healer
description:
In a world where monster hunters are hailed as heroes, Cheon Haesun has been treated like an outcast because of his abnormal looks. As if that wasn't bad enough, a pack of monsters attacks his neighborhood on the day he discovers he's dying from an unknown illness!

With his sister's sacrifice, Haesun survives and somehow awakens to become a Poisoner, a rare hunter with toxic healing abilities.

But will his poisonous powers cure Haesun's illness and guarantee a normal life he's always dreamed of?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Tourigakari ni Wanpointo Adobaisu Shite Iku Taipu no Yankii
description: Sakurai-san looks like a yankee, but gives people he passes one point advice. Those who meet him for the first time are often scared by his frightening appearance but through the advice, they learn of how kind hearted he can be. Slowly, Sakurai's circle of people begin to grow. He's kind, considerate, knowledgeable and versatile in all forms of sports…!! Today, the super high-spec Sakurai who has a ridiculous gap in his looks and personality continues to give one point advice to various people, making their day a little better.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Nigasanai yo? Fukuroji-kun
description: The story revolves around Fukuroji, a high school boy who tries to live in the shadows. However, his life takes an unexpected turn when, as part of a punishment game, he has to confess his love to the most popular girl in his class. Through a misunderstanding, he ends up confessing his feelings to Tsubaki Sakura, the most feared girl in school. As he tries to clear up the confusion, Tsubaki surprisingly attacks him, adding an unexpected and hilarious twist to the situation.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life

name: Fugue Across Worlds
description: During troubled times, Weng Shaoying is one of the most famous singers in Dongping. Many people go to Song of Fairyland just to see her perform. However, under her glamorous facade, she has been controlled for more than 10 years. On the other side of Dongping is Bi Xing Tang, one of the most famous gangs there. After her father’s death, Yanchu became the young female leader of Bi Xing Tang, which caused a lot of rumors to spread. On one inevitably fortuitous night, the two happened to meet. At that time, neither of them knew that they would eventually become the most important person in the other’s life. Starting from that night onwards, the gears in Shaoying and Yanchu’s fate will forever be rotating together.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: How to Win My Husband Over
description:
In the original lines of the novel, I was a villainess—used as a political tool by my father and older brother—who ended up dying at the hands of my future husband.

To save his kingdom, my father desperately begged my fifth groom to take my hand in marriage. The problem is that the man I’m supposed to marry, the legendary knight of the North, is the same man who will end up murdering me and my entire family.

I have to find a way to survive.

Within the novel itself, there are many daunting challenges ahead of me: I have to find a way to save my husband’s little sister, win over my cold-hearted husband, and gain the support of the people of the North, all of whom currently despise me.

“I’m in love with you!”

So please, don’t kill me!

---
I thought I'd finally escaped my hellish life when I died in an airplane crash, but I fell into another nightmare when I awoke as Rudbeckia de Borgia, a minor villain from a historical novel destined to die at the hands of her husband, Iske van Omerta. Surviving with the dysfunctional Borgia family is hard enough, but now I have to marry the man who will kill me! Still, it’s okay, I just have to convince Iske, his family, and all his countrymen that I’m completely harmless! How hard can that be?

---
