name: The Legend of the Northern Blade
description:
When the world was plunged into darkness by the ‘Silent Night’, Martial Artists from all over the place gathered to form the ‘Northern Heavenly Sect’. With overwhelming strength from the Northern Heavenly Sect, the Silent Night was pushed away and the people began to enjoy peace once more. However, as time passed the martial artists from the mainlands began to conspire against the ‘Northern Heavenly Sect’, and eventually caused the death of the Fourth Generation Sect Leader, Jin Kwan-Ho, destroying the sect with it. As everyone left the sect, Jin Kwan-Ho’s only son, Jin Mu-Won was left behind. Mu-Won has never learned anything about martial arts, but he eventually finds the Martial Techniques secretly left behind by his father and begins to acquire the martial arts of the Northern Heavenly Sect. Then one day, a mysterious girl appears before Mu-Won…!!

---

name: Smity and Majesty
description: Sparks fly when bumbling Prince Vain meets the enemy kingdom's royal blacksmith, Valka Voima. He might be visiting to broker peace, but that's all about building relationships, right? If only Valka would actually talk to him... Lucky for Vain, after a world-shaking theft threatens the fragile treaty between their kingdoms, the starcrossed Smity and Majesty are stuck on a run together! Will they be able to survive the shenanigans headed their way, or will they kill each other first?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Wakaba-sanchi no Aoi Koi
description: Youth romcom about 4 sisters who are all experiencing their first love at the same time. While the eldest is having a crush on the guy at her part-time work, the other three are dealing with their first romantic experiences with boys in their classes and school clubs. Every night, the four have heart-to-heart girls talks as they navigate their respective first loves.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Teihen Ossan, Cheat Kokusei de Isekai Rakuraku Life
description: Reincarnated from a bottom-tier salaryman to an adventurer, he possessed only one skill: [Game]. A seemingly dead-end second life enveloped in games even in another world…
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Hug Shite! Kaeru-san
description:
A BL story about two polar opposites in their youth♡ Takanashi, the student council president, is good-looking, smart, and admired by all the students. Recently, he has been sneaking off to a frog-branded milk tea shop - for every cup he buys, he gets a hug from a frog mascot. It's a soothing hug that relieves the pressures of everyday life. Before he knows it, he's curious about the person inside...

A classmate who seems rugged but is always there for him x A student council president who seems like a perfect superhuman but is actually too cute!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Fairy Tail: 100 Years Quest
description:
After overcoming the threat of Acnologia and Zeref, Fairy Tail has become stronger and more energetic! The 100 year quest which Natsu and company left for, and also to the members who had remained at the guild, something new is going to happen!? Although the story was supposed to have concluded, a new adventure now begins!


---

- Indonesian release by Elex Media

name: Yofukashi no Uta
description:
Unable to sleep or find true satisfaction in his daily life, Yamori Kou begins wandering the night streets. He encounters a strange girl who offers to help soothe his insomnia by sleeping beside him, but it is not merely a one-way exchange…

---
- **Won the 68th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2023, which it shared alongside Blue Orchestra**

name: BLACK BOUNDS
description: Not found
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Toaru Anbu no ITEM
description:
In Academy City, where esper abilities have been recognized as a general science. Behind the peace, there is a dark side organization that undertakes missions that cannot be made public.

"Item" is an elite unit consisting of four girls. Takitsubo Rikou is able to read and track the weak power emitted by those with abilities. Frenda Seivelun, who excels in combat using explosives and traps. Kinuhata Saiai, who can manipulate nitrogen at will and plays a defensive role. And one of the 7 espers that Academy City is proud of: Mugino Shizuri. They live freely in the darkness of the Academy City, and quietly set their sights on their target...!

This is a story of encounter, friendship, and darkness that eventually leads to a 'terrible incident'!
tags: Sci-Fi, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Tensei Shitara Akari dake ga Slime Datta Ken
description: The Amusement Club gets transported to another world... and Akari turns into a slime. A new Yuru Yuri isekai spinoff.
tags: Reincarnation, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Kara no Kioku
description:
Between a recent move to Tokyo and the first day of high school, Rei starts his day filled with anxiety and insecurity. His nervousness accompanies him to the classroom, where amidst the classroom chatter, Rei is suddenly struck with a strange dream, followed by an aching in his chest.  
  
Once he wakes up, Rei is greeted by a small creature standing on his desk. Passing it off as part of his dream, Rei heads home. However, to his surprise, numerous other strange creatures of all shapes and sizes roam the streets, seemingly invisible to everyone else.  
  
With countless questions and the small creature from before trailing behind him, Rei's life is changed forever when he encounters a tall one-eyed figure, dressed in all black, smiling at him.
___
**Note:** This manga is based on the song of the same name.
tags: Action, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Neko ni wa Neko no Neko Gohan.
description:
A kitten lies dying in the snow. It seems that it had eaten poisoned cat food.

When our protagonist, Mano Taiyou, chanced upon the kitten, he panicked and hurriedly brought it to the vet.

After being rescued, the kitten was taken in by Taiyou and given the name Yuki. Unfortunately, Yuki has been traumatized by its near death experience from eating the poisoned cat food and is now unable to eat dry kibbles.

This a heartwarming story of Yuki the cat and his owner, Taiyou as he struggles as a beginner cook to make home made food for Yuki.
tags: Animals, Slice of Life

name: Watashi, Shachiku Yamete Douga de Tabeteikimasu
description:
Tired of her exhausting, thankless office work, Midorihara Mitsuha, a corporate slave, decided to quit and pursue her hobby: Making videos. She aims to bring happiness to everyone around the world with her ASMR contents, but it seems to have a different result than she'd imagined...

---

- **Playing with Dolls** - O Ningyou Asobi (お人形遊び)

description:
In modern Hokkaido a brown bear has appeared near an elementary school, so a member of the local hunters' association is dispatched to exterminate it. However he gets killed by the bear and wakes up in a fantasy world, armed with only the Remington M870 shotgun he had when he died.

description:
A beautiful boy detective and his NEET assistant's "hell-bound" case file!

Toono Seiji, who sees criminals as monsters, meets a handsome boy, Saijou Shiroshi, who runs a consultation office in a weathered Western-style house. For some reason, he ends up working as an assistant for Shiroshi, who has excellent insight and bewitchingly good looks...

name: Tensei Saki ga Zannen Ouji Datta Ken ~Ima wa Fukkin 1-kai mo Dekinai kedo Yasete Isekai Sukuimasu~
description: A young man who gets into a plane crash while returning from a business trip overseas is reincarnated into another world after being asked by the goddess to defeat the evil god. However, he was reincarnated as a stupid prince who is known among the aristocrats as the "Pig Prince (Orc Prince)" because of his fat and ugly appearance. If you can't even do one sit-up, how are you going to defeat the evil god?
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Shirokuro Sekai
description: A series of stories between a girl with black hair and a girl with white hair

name: Ryouko no Shinrei Jikenbo
description: Ryouko Midorikawa is a girl in her first year of high school. One day the cat she had raised and loved for 15 years suddenly dies. Although Pow hated water, he died drowning. Ryouko is lost in questions about the cause of his death. But from that night on, terrible things start happening everywhere around her!
tags: Romance, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Immortal, Invincible
description:
From a thieving child to one who would shake the world. Rising to the title of Immortal Master, one of the Godly Twelve Stars, but ultimately betrayed. Now, he has been given a chance to change that, and create a better future- for both him, and the world. Based on the popular novel of the same name.

name: Champignon no Majo
description: Luna, a black witch who lives quietly in a poisonous mushroom house, deep in the Black Forest. She lives in the city making high-efficiency medicine, but it is rumored that one will die if touched by her, and thus she is avoided… The life of a witch who doesn't know the warmth of people is carefully and momentarily drawn.
tags: Romance, Magic, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Tsuraneko
description:
Chibi-chan, a middle school girl, can go no further than 2km from the sacred tree that servers as her town's symbol. That is her "disability".
Then one day, a mysterious figure arrives in town to help the girl's wish to leave, her name is Rokushaku-sensei.
Guided by Rokushaku, Chibi attempts to bypass her "disability" by going to "Nedoko", backroads that can transport her to another location.
However, those places are part of a mysterious world, filled with mysterious creatures.
In her desire to see the world, Chibi-chan will have to triumph over these "Nedoko".
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Senyuu.
description:
Once upon a time, a Demon King named Rchimedes caused havoc and destruction in the Human World. He was sealed away by the great hero Creasion, and peace returned to the world.  
  
1000 years later, Rchimedes has returned, a hole has opened up in the Human World, and countless monsters have sprung up. To prevent any further destruction, the King calls upon all 75 (probable) descendants of Creasion.  
  
This story focuses on the adventures of descendant number 45, Alba, and the royal soldier appointed to assist him, Ross.  
  
[Senyuu Season 1](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu)    
[Senyuu Season 2](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu2)  
[Senyuu Season 3](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu3)  
[Senyuu Season 4](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyu4)  
[Senyuu+](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/senyuplus)  
[Senyuu F5 Reload](http://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/39515)
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Henai Café
description: Somewhere there is a strange café called "Statice" where all sorts of even stranger people meet, each with a very special and different fetish. The owner, Mr. Sennichi, welcomes these special customers every day, and tries to help them solve their fetish related problems.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life

name: Jichou shinai Moto Yuusha no Tsuyokute Tanoshii New Game
description:
Orion is a former hero who has been reborn in a different world he once saved as a "hero". Taking advantage of his second round of heroic heroism, he takes on the world's strongest and wisest maid who was once in the same party with him, picks up a slave girl, and trains her with "heroic-style power leveling"! Even if you are attacked by a thief monster girl, you can easily convert her and get her a friend!

The former hero who never takes responsibility for his own actions, who has acquired a luxurious mansion, the most powerful equipment, beautiful women, fame, and everything else he needs to live his life the way he wants to, has started a new game of strength and fun!
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Kantai Collection -KanColle- 4-koma Comic: Fubuki, Ganbarimasu!
description: Serialized in Famitsu Comic Clear. Based on the Kantai Collection browser game. Enjoy the heartwarming antics of the World War II-Era Japanese Imperial Navy in the form of cute girls training at the ship girl school.
tags: Historical, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Inkya Gyaru demo Ikigaritai!
description: Ichiko and Kuran are members of the subculture research club. They like various subcultures and they like cute stuff. Read along as these two asocial gyaru spend their days in their new kind of "youthful moratorium."
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Gyaru

name: Saint Seiya: The Lost Canvas
description:
This manga tells the story of the previous Holy War, taking place in the 18th century, 250 years before the original series, in the Saint Seiya universe. The story centers on the relation between Tenma, the Pegasus Saint and his beloved friend, Alone, who would eventually become his greatest enemy, Hades.  
  
The story takes place in the same time period as Saint Seiya Next Dimension.
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Ninja Slayer: Kyoto, Hell on Earth
description: The man who annihilated the Soukaiya, the enemy of his wife and child, and buried Neo-Saitama in flames has appeared in Gaion City, Kyoto Republic! Ninja Slayer's new battle begins to eradicate his other enemy, the Zaibatsu!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Ninja, Comedy, Zombies, Superhero, Martial Arts, Samurai, Mafia, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Military, Wuxia, Isekai, Gore, Adaptation

name: Ore no Isekai Shimai ga Jichou Shinai!
description:
*"Live free and be happy."*

These were the last words of Amemiya Yuya's sister, who was seriously ill. Despite her wishes, however, Yuya, who was suffering from the same disease as his sister, was supposed to end his short life without fulfilling his promise. But for unknown reasons, Yuya was suddenly reborn in another world. 

Confused by his new life, Yuya begins his life as the second son of a count. One day, Yuya thinks about the possibility that his younger sister has been reincarnated in this other world just like him. 

In this world, there is a sister, a young fiancée, a slave, a maid, etc. - but one of them is his own sister!

---

- ![Syosetsu](<https://i.imgur.com/HI4jAzg.png>) [Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n4696dd)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Hazure Hantei kara Hajimatta Cheat Majutsushi Seikatsu
description:
One day, all the eighth grade students were transferred to another world.

The princess of the other world summoned them to make up for their lack of strength. The students are threatened and decide to follow the princess, and they are made to take a magical power test to determine their abilities. While everyone is sorted according to their results, Kokubun Kento's result is a flop.

Judged as useless, he is expelled. However, there is actually a tremendous ability lurking within Kento... 

The life-size eighth grader Kento, together with his fellow skeletons, aims to rescue his classmates!

---

[web novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n5782dy/) (jp)
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Shota, Adaptation

name: Romance of Darkness
description: It happened in the blink of an eye. Rikka's world turned upside down when her school field trip bus flipped and plummeted into a lake. Everyone inside that bus drowned… except for Rikka, but she wasn't saved by anything as simple as luck. When she was released from the hospital, Rikka was then attacked repeatedly in a series of bizarre incidents all involving water… and a sadistic aquatic beauty whose name is – Rikka!? What does our heroine have that the sadistic Rikka wants back? What was it that saved her from drowning, and who gave it to her and why…?
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: GetBackers
description:
Blond, hip, pragmatic, and cool, Ginji Amano has the power to generate currents with his body like an electric eel. Brunette, equally hip, bespectacled, and rambunctious, Ban Mido has the mystically mysterious "Evil Eye," the power to create illusions in the minds of his foes. Together, they are the GetBackers, the best retrieval team in the world. They can get back anything taken from clients, and their success rate is (almost) 100%!  
  
However, first they have to get some clients–and soon–or this spry detective duo will starve on the streets!
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural

name: Chii-chan
description:
It was the day Chiichan, who never comes to middle school at all, suddenly showed up in her tattered sweats with dead insects, causing a commotion in the class. Yuua has been with her since kindergarten and cares about her, and her classmate Koudai asks if he can help Chiichan out...
A new series born from a unique collaboration, in which Oshimi Shuuzou depicts the prequel to Chiichan, the aberrant heroine of Naitou Eisuke's film *Poison Girl*, as an original manga *Chiichan*!
tags: Thriller, Sexual Violence, School Life, Mystery

name: A Swallow Falling Into the Sea
description:
Collection of mysterious stories by Chie Shinohara, a great artist of suspense manga.  
  
Story 01 Part 01 & 02: Umi ni Ochiru Tsubame - Swallow Falling into the Sea  
Masako Minase, a scriptwriter, was murdered by Shiki Morimura, her rival in the same profession. Shiki was sure that she had destroyed evidence completely. However, someone who knew the truth appeared, and tried to get Shiki in his power. Is it a mysterious spot or unhappy desire that lurks in her mind?  
  
Story 02: Kioku no Ashioto - The Footsteps of Memory)  
This is the story about Shouko and the almost tragic moment that changed her life and emotions …  
  
Story 03: Shikeidai no 72-jikan - 72 hours of death stand  
Five young people receives a letter saying that they murdered someone and they must go to the address in the letter if they don't want other people to found out. They all find themselves in a old European house, where a crazy lady tells them that one of them is a murderer and if that murderer don't confess in 72 hours, they will all die.
tags: Psychological, Anthology, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Iemeguri
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: New Grappler Baki
description:
Baki Hanma is a generally happy student with a rather odd hobby; he likes fighting. Specifically, he likes fighting in a secret martial arts tournament that gathers the greatest fighters of the world and pits them against each other in really nasty combat. Whether you're a sumo wrestler, a karate expert, or a guy who specializes in ripping out your opponent's nerves, you're welcome to participate (as long as you can keep quiet about it, of course). Anyway, Baki may be the youngest fighter the tournament has ever seen, but he's also the best, and he really enjoys what he does.  
   
AnimeNewsNetwork Links:  
[Season 1](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=2035)  
[Season 2](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=2036)
tags: Action, Psychological, Sports, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama

name: Doku Mushi - The Ruins Hotel
description: Six members of the occult circle will spend a few days at a ruined love hotel during their summer vacation. Upon arrival they meet two additional people who join them, but in the morning of the second day, a female member was found tied & naked. In addition, the exit was locked by someone and the building became a completely enclosed cage. Will this be a repeat of the 'kodoku' that happened 3 years ago?
tags: Action, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror

name: Amano Megumi wa Suki Darake!
description: Shindo Manabu is a student at a very prestigious high school whose goal is to get into Tokyo University. He studies constantly and tries to never lose sight of that goal. That is until his childhood friend, Amano Megumi, who goes to the same school starts to distract him. He originally only remembered her as the tomboy she was as a kid, until he notices how "developed" she has become. As these two get closer to each other, hilarity often ensues and subsequently, Manabu becomes more and more distracted from his goal of getting into Tokyo U.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Greatest Estate Developer
description:
When civil engineering student Suho Kim falls asleep reading a fantasy novel, he wakes up as a character in the book.

 Suho is now in the body of Lloyd Frontera, a lazy noble who loves to drink, and whose family is in a mountain of debt. Using his engineering knowledge, Suho designs inventions to avert the terrible future that lies in wait for him. 

With the help of a giant hamster, a knight, and the world’s magic, can Suho dig his new family out of debt and build a better future?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Eunuch's Rebirth: A Journey Back to Manhood
description:
[By Force & LICO studio that brought you <Return of Mount Hua Sect> and <Chronicles of the Demon Faction>,  and many more!

The eunuch Lee Cheolsu, a secret power figure who controls the affairs of the empire at will. He possesses absolute power, wealth, and even strong martial arts skills… but what does that mean? If he can’t “do that”!!
Through a reincarnation technique, Cheolsu returns to the time before he became a eunuch. He has one goal in mind: to become an alpha male and enjoy life with the most beautiful women!!
A full-fledged 15+ rated(?) comic martial arts story about Cheolsu, who lives purely for his desires, begins!
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG Structures
description:
Shoma Yusa, a new kid who moved to Tokyo with his sister, learns how to make friends through Dueling and creating Structure Decks.  
  
*This series is based on the real life Yu-Gi-Oh! OCG (Official Card Game, known in the west as TCG) and how to build the best deck, based on the latest rule- and banlist.*
tags: Monsters, Action, Drama

name: The Bride who Raises the Villainous Dragon
description:
"It seems a magnificent dragon has fallen head over heels for me?"

Pearl, the cursed daughter of a noble, was on her way to being sold off to a neighboring lord when she was suddenly kidnapped. But the one who kidnapped her is none other than Erik— a descendant of the Great Dragons. This enchanting yet fierce dragon confronted Pearl with a single demand, to say the words "I like you."...
tags: Historical, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Hataraku Saibou Neko
description: Vomiting, poisoning, constipation, vaccines, etc., what is going on inside a cat's body at that time! A must-read manga for cat people to live a healthy life with cats!
tags: Sci-Fi, Animals, Comedy, Medical, Slice of Life

name: GTO: Great Teacher Onizuka
description:
Meet Eikichi Onizuka, a 22-year-old ex-biker. He's crude, foul-mouthed, and has a split-second temper. His unlikely goal: to be the Greatest High School Teacher in the World! Of course, the only reason he wants to be a teacher is so he can try to score with the hot students…  
Before he can become a full instructor, he's got to work as a student teacher to earn his credentials. Onizuka may think he's the toughest guy on campus, but when he meets his class full of bullies, blackmailers, and scheming sadists, he'll have to prove it.  
  
---
- **Won the 22nd Kodansha Manga Award for Shonen**
tags: Award Winning, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life

name: Touhou Suichouka ~ Lotus Eater-tachi no Suisei
description: In this sixth official Touhou manga series from ZUN, the shrine maiden Reimu Hakurei goes to investigate a strange rumor in the human village, where she gets involved with the local Geidontei bar and its poster girl, Miyoi Okunoda.
tags: Thriller, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Convenient Semi-Friend
description: Kuruma Suuna, a gloomy and socially awkward girl, begins her high school dorm life only to discover her new roommate, Hamanasu Ruka, flirting with another girl!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life

name: Disaster Fox Kuzure-chan
description: Not found
tags: Monsters, Animals, Comedy, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Endan Yobanashi
description: This horror anthology presents a collection of eerie ghost stories based on real-life accounts gathered over two decades by the renowned storyteller Yama Yuu. Adapted by Hokamoto Kensei, the manga explores the unsettling facets of human nature and madness, as a mysterious young girl narrates the tales within a secluded room. The stories promise a dark, chilling atmosphere that immerses readers in an eerie journey into the supernatural.
tags: Ghosts, Anthology, Horror, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Starry Night Angels
description: It was published in Monthly Magazine Garo (月刊漫画ガロ) on May 1974
tags: Oneshot, Animals

name: The Modern Witch's Employment Prospects
description: Tamashiro Neko is a young witch in training, sent off by her parents to finish her studies. In her search for a place to stay, she arrives in a quiet town in the countryside, but then her first trial begins.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Ouji-sama no Dakimakura
description:
Mahiro, the head of the disciplinary committee, is assigned to take care of Asuma, the most tardy student in school. Rumor has it that Asuma will never wake up once he falls asleep, no matter what you do. This makes Mahiro worried, but eventually, they become roommates...

One morning, when Mahiro tries to wake up Asuma, who is fast asleep, he is suddenly pulled into his bed! Asuma, who was not supposed to fast asleep, wakes up with a start and says, “It looks like I can wake up when I hug Mahiro-kun!!”

Since then, Asuma has become very attached to Mahiro, and the distance between them is gradually growing closer...!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life

name: Dimension Wave
description:
Dimension Wave—a super popular VRMMO game where players can experience several years of fantasy in just twenty-four hours of real time. Enticed by the entry ticket his sisters won, a young man takes part in the project’s Second Wave. However, as soon as he enters the world of the game, he finds that his sisters have played a trick: he’s been transformed into a girl with the cringy name Kizuna†Exceed. But instead of letting it get to him, he decides to chill and take this new life as it comes. Without sparing a fraction of a second deciding, Kizuna immediately chooses to fish rather than fight on the front lines in this fantasy world. Alongside his sisters, Kanade and Tsumugi, a Japanese-style beauty named Shouko, Yamikage the fake ninja, and other quirky comrades, he works to enjoy his second life to the fullest.

NOTE: Many characters that appear in “Dimension Wave” also appear in “The Rising of the Shield Hero.” However, despite the many similarities, the characters in both series are not related to each other. “Dimension Wave” is not a spin-off of “The Rising of the Shield Hero”, but a separate story in a different universe that shares many similarities.

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/dimension-wave)
tags: Genderswap, Action, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy

name: Kaika Apartment
description:
*Everyone who lives there has a “reason” for doing so.* 

Towards the end of the Taisho era (1912 - 1926), Fuji, a translator, moves into the so-called “Kaika Apartment”—a luxurious housing complex overflowing with elegance. Little does he know that all the residents there harbor secrets…but what are they? And, does Fuji have a secret of his own...?

---

Peculiar tales of an apartment complex filled to bursting with bewitching, intertwining, and twisted human relationships.
tags: Historical, Romance, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Mahou Shoujo 201
description: Fujiyama Shinobu aka Sexy Fujiyama, is a general working for the evil Flower Bud Gang who are trying to take over the city. Standing in her way is the masked magical girl, Princess Mamu, who wouldn't you know it, has just moved in next door to Fujiyama's place...
tags: Loli, Comedy, Superhero, Magical Girls, Slice of Life

name: There Is No True Peace in This World -Shin Kamen Rider SHOCKER SIDE-
description: A completely original manga project spun-off from *Shin Kamen Rider* directed by Anno Hideaki! A dark hero rising story by a superb production team depicting the biggest enemy in *Shin Kamen Rider* and *SHOCKER*!
tags: Action, Psychological, Mecha, Superhero, Drama

name: The Story of Our Corpse Hunt
description:
A boy x a summer x an adventure = "Boy Meets Crime"!

Shocking juvenile suspense!

One day during the summer vacation, a young boy called Isshin, Kazuma Inui, leaves with his friends who attend the same junior high school to meet again with "that girl" who disappeared several years ago.
And all the truths lead to child kidnapping cases that are rampant in the land. Depicting the darkness of society!
tags: Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon: Elma OL Nikki
description: A spin-off of [Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon](https://mangadex.org/manga/15514) focusing on the daily life of Elma.
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, Magic, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural

name: Ramia-Yana
description:
Each time a Demon Lord has appeared, a human hero has slain it, pushing back the demons in the dark lands. 
As the cycle starts over again, a mysterious ancient hero called Ramia reappears. Meanwhile, an abnormal Demon army suddenly strikes the kingdom…
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Self-Published, Sexual Violence, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic

name: Kumo Desu ga, Nani ka?
description:
When a mysterious explosion killed an entire class full of high school students, the souls of everyone in class were transported into a fantasy world and reincarnated. While some students were reincarnated as princes or prodigies, others were not as blessed.  
Our heroine, who was the lowest in the class, discovered that she was reincarnated as a spider! Now at the bottom of the food chain, she needs to adapt to the current situation with willpower in order to live. Stuck in a dangerous labyrinth filled with monsters, it's eat or be eaten!  
This is the story of a spider doing whatever she can in order to survive!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Once Married
description:
The East. The cursed land where the sun never rises, always engulfed in dreary weather, swarmed with criminals, and where depression is the norm. And the monster who governs over this land is the Duke of Eckard. Hedel, who was on the verge of marrying her cousin, receives a marriage proposal from this monster Duke. Although everyone opposes her, Hedel had no choice but to accept the Duke's proposal...

"I've never had this kind of food before!"

"Ever since Madam's arrival, the sun seems to always set here...!"

"The East can never live without Madam anymore."

It seems Hedel has done very well in taming the people from the East. This is the story of Hedel occupying the East, which starts with a marriage.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Vampire Princess Yui
description: A mysterious girl arrives at the door of a church covered in blood. She utters out the name "Nagi" before collapsing. She's taken in by the priest of the church. She starts out with no memories of her past, but slowly has strange dreams about her mother, and from that she discovers her name, Yui.
tags: Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural

description:

name: A Guest Carried By The Waves
description:
Andrew, a charming servant in a grand Irish estate, is known for his playful charisma and flirtations. When Nora Greenwood, a quiet and enigmatic guest, arrives, she becomes the subject of a wager among the servants: can Andrew seduce her?
What starts as a game quickly unravels when Andrew discovers that Nora is far from the timid woman he expected. Beneath her reserved demeanor lies a sharp wit and a surprising strength that turns his lighthearted challenge into something far more complicated.

As their encounters spark a clash of minds and hearts, Andrew must confront the unexpected: has he finally met his match, or is he the one being played?
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Anthology, Drama, Full Color

name: Alice no Gomi Yashiki
description:
Izumi Mitsu's oneshot published in GOOD!Afternoon issue 40/2014. 
Alice hoardes newspapers and furniture in her house for her father, who has gone to war with a neighbouring country and does not know if he will return.
When Carona visits the house, she decides to make her clean up this dump...?
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Touhou - Child and Adult (Doujinshi)
description: A short picture book-esque comic about Flandre and Remilia.
tags: Oneshot, Doujinshi, Vampires, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Kyousou Silent
description: A romance set in 1920s Hollywood, during the era of silent films, the main character faces a unique challenge: she must resist the temptation to fall in love with a leading actor if she wants to achieve stardom herself.
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Romance

name: Onna Chara de Isekai Teni shite Cheatppoi kedo Zako Chara na no de Medatazu Heiwa na Shomin wo Mezashimasu!
description: A little weary salaryman. One day, after waking up… he found himself in another world in the body of a female character, Susie, from the MMORPG he liked to play. Confused, he tried an attack… and made all the monsters flee to the place people live, afraid of his destructive power that’s able to smash a mountain. Having dealt with them, he ended up saving Howard, a local tribune who invited his savior to the village, but…
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Bocchi the Rock! - Senpai-tachi no Pocky Game (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Jii-san to Baa-san Wakagaeru
description: This story is about Ine and Shouzou, two pensioners well into their 80s who are mysteriously returned to their 20s one night.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Mazinger Z 2022
description: A remake of the original Mazinger Z manga in celebration of its 50th anniversary. Most of this story was first published in Gekiman! - Mazinger Z Chapter. So this manga can be thought of as the in-universe version of the story that Gekiman creates in the autobiography manga [Gekiman! - Mazinger Z Chapter](https://mangadex.org/title/a6d69815-f5f9-4ab8-9d53-5b4d1ee6601e/gekiman-mazinger-z-chapter)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Sexual Violence, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: The Earth Lord's School Life
description:
The Earth's Most Powerful Being is always longing for a fight that would excite him.

Driven mad by his love for battle, he possesses the body of a high school student and once again experiences the thrill of combat.

Meanwhile, the Earth's Guardian, sealed away by other gods, seeks to grow stronger in his new body and challenge them.

Will he overcome the gods with his new body and continue to enjoy the thrill of battle?
tags: Action, Long Strip, School Life, Fantasy

name: Kiraware Majo to Karada ga Irekawatta Keredo, Watashi wa Kyou mo Genki ni Kurashiteimasu!
description: A happy slow life begins with a switch! Marietta, princess of the snow country of Snewe, is trapped in a magic tower because she can't use magic. 8 years later, on her wedding day with the prince of the silver country, she thought she had succeeded in summoning a holy beast, but then... What appeared was...?
tags: Animals, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Mitsuboshi Colors
description: Hark! The city is in peril! Who you gonna call? Colors! Sacchan, Yui and Kotoha are here to protect the city, solving mysteries and battling enemies with help from their friends. But their quest isn't an easy one as their arch-nemesis Saitou, the violent police officer of Ueno, meets them at every turn.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Slice of Life

name: Fall Into Your Trap
description: The solo priest Mo Chuan accidentally summoned and created a pact with a beast that has been sealed for a few hundred years. Mo Chuan, who wants to seal back the beast, and the beast, who wants to get rid of Mo Chuan soon engages in a push and pull fight. But in the process, changes occur and feelings quietly starting to arise….
tags: Historical, Demons, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Goth Girl & The Jock
description: An unlikely relationship blossoms. Do opposites attract? Or will their differences tear them apart? Follow the story of the goth girl Ophelia and the popular footballer Tyler, as they go through their high school life, sitting next to each other in class!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Self-Published, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Love ka Like ka Wakaranai!
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Takou no Koori Hime wo Tasuketara, Otomodachi kara Hajimeru Koto ni Narimashita
description:
Nagi Shinonome, known as the "Ice Princess," is a beautiful girl with a cold attitude who does not allow others to get close to her. 

One day, Souta Minori, who saw her being molested on the train, saved her with all his courage, but the next day she appeared again and said, "I want you to stay by my side." 

Can Souta continue as friends with the Ice Princess, who only sweetly melts for one person in the world, that is, himself?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Netorare Manga no Kuzu Otoko ni Tensei Shita Hazu ga Heroine ga Yottekuru Ken
description: I suddenly remembered. This world is the world of an erotic manga, and that I was reincarnated as the scumbag who is supposed to steal the heroine in this world. Well, I don't have such a hobby, so I thought the heroine should get along with the protagonist. But why are you paying attention to me, heroine?
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Delinquents, Adaptation

name: Baki Rahen
description: Following his battle with Nomi no Sukune the 2nd, Baki's half-brother, Jack Hanma challenges the warriors of the underground arena to take on his original fighting style of "Goudou": The way of Biting! Fascinated by Jack's relentless pursuit of more strength, the warriors clash against Jack and his fearsome style. Just what will be the outcome of this blood-ridden contest of purity?
tags: Action, Sports, Martial Arts, Gore, Drama

name: A Story About Getting a Haircut After Hearing Your Crush Prefers Short Hair
description:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/114158543)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Oni
description:
Taisho, year 12 (1923). A tragedy in Hinamizawa village changes the fate of a girl and her friends. The turbulent early life of Oryou, head of the Sonozaki family, one of the Three Great Families, who would later be feared and known as Empress Sonozaki.
The missing link to the original *Higurashi no Naku Koro ni* is now revealed.
tags: Historical, Demons, Mystery

name: Occhoko Doji Onee-san
description: She may seem like a beautiful, sophisticated woman! But on the inside, she is just a XXX lady. The more she tries to act like an mature adult in front of younger boys, the more twisted and perverted she gets!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Ojou-sama, Kekkai Sunzen!
description: A young lady handles a personal problem on her commute to school.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy

name: Mob kara Hajimaru Tansaku Eiyuutan
description:
Takagi Kaito, a low status high schooler, your typical mob character so to say, was just a normal everyday explorer who hunted slimes every day in the dungeons that appeared in Japan, earning pocket money while admiring his childhood friend, the class queen, from afar. 

One day, a golden slime he had never seen appears before him. After he defeats it, he obtains an extremely rare item worth hundreds of millions as a drop, a servant card that can summon mythical beings!! After he makes up his mind and summons it, a warrior maiden with unparalleled beauty appears. 

Rise above being just a mob explorer Kaito! A modern battle fantasy story has begun!

---
**Links:**
- [Web Novel (JP)](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8930fk/) 
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55183)
tags: Action, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ore wa Kage no Eiyuu ja Arimasen!
description:
–--"Hero of Shadows."

A man who appears in crises and battlefields around the world, rescuing people with outstanding magic and then disappearing in the blink of an eye. His true identity is supposed to be shrouded in complete darkness... or so it was thought. 

"My identity has been exposeeeeed!!"

Phil Salmabart, a young noble with a notorious reputation in the streets. Despite secretly acting as the "Hero of Shadows" for a certain reason, one day, his true identity is revealed to the public. Despite his attempts to deceive, girls ranging from a nobleman’s daughter, a lovely saint, and even a princess of the kingdom approach the "Hero of Shadows," feeling indebted to him?!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Maybe Meant to Be
description: ‘How long have i been laying down at home…?’ Han Jia, who is turning 32 this year (she’s a freelancer who’s still doesn’t have a full-time job/jobless), suffers because of the pressure given by people around her that keep telling her to get married. Around the same time, Jin Mincheol, her childhood friend who came to Jia’s hometown for holiday, is having the same problem. Then, the two people got married just like that. Now that they have married….. ‘Huh? We match each other more than i thought?’
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Henkyou Gurashi no Maou, Tensei shite Saikyou no Majutsushi ni naru
description:
There was once a mage called The Lone Demon King on the frontier. He was just a creature that never grew old, but was also loved by the villagers as something of a guardian deity. However, he was destroyed by a magic organization that sees his existence as dangerous. 200 years later, he is reincarnated as the second son of an aristocrat and obtains the strongest magic power.

"Let's pretend to be a human this time."

However, being a human lover, he didn't particularly think of revenge and has decided to pretend to be human in this life. In his past life, he was the guardian deity of a region, and in this life, he's a local aristocrat who lacks common sense. He doesn't know how to take it easy. As the second son of an aristocrat, he is loved by his family and friends, and while he is regarded as a master of magic in the magic guild, he becomes an 'Immortal Mage' behind the scenes.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Aisare Tenshi na Classmate ga, Ore ni Dake Itazura ni Hohoemu
description:
Girls and sweets are full of secrets!? 

Ichise Souma is a high school student who dreams of becoming a pastry chef and devotes himself to making sweets. He meets Satomi Chika, a female classmate, after receiving some sweets. 

Chika is a beautiful girl with a soothing personality, known at school as the “Angel of Peace.” Souma thought she was a good girl who would kindly listen to his worries about making sweets, but... 

"Ichise-san, your embarrassed face is really cute." 

Chika shows an unexpected side of herself only when they are alone, and Souma’s heart is on the verge of exploding! A sweet and stimulating boy-meets-girl story with a mischievous angel connected by sweets begins!
tags: Romance, School Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Shiitagerare no Majutsushi Reijou wa, "Koori Ookami Saishou-sama" ni Dekiaisareru
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy

name: Fuwa Fuwa Therapist
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: 100-man no Inochi no Ue ni Ore wa Tatteiru
description:
Yotsuya Yuusuke along with his classmates Shindou Iu and Hakozaki Kusue have been transported to a strange and unknown world inhabited by mythological creatures. As soon as they arrive, they meet somebody calling himself the Game Master who then grants them a time-limited quest. To aid them in this quest, he also bestows Shindou and Hakozaki with the roles of a Magician and a Warrior while Yotsuya is randomly granted the role of… a Farmer?!  
This is how a hectic life of adventuring began for three students who now have no choice, but to complete random quests for several phases in the fantasy world if they want to stay alive and protect the real world from the demons and monsters they encounter.

---

**Note: All chapters are now available with official English simulpub from K-Manga!**

---

name: Overlord: <Shin> Sekai-hen
description: After winning the battle of Katze Plains and founding the Sorcerer Kingdom of Ainz, they aim for a utopia of perpetual continuity and prosperity, a world where many races kneel before Ainz. As the first step toward achieving this goal, Ainz heads to the Empire to strengthen the Adventurer’s Guild and incorporate it into the state. Behind the scenes, the nations of the world are beginning to stir with their own agendas for the Sorcerer Kingdom...! Ainz's high road, once again!
tags: Thriller, Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Zombies, Adventure, Harem, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Jitaku de Natural ni Josou Suru Danshi
description:
A boy who naturally crossdresses.  

---

* [Twitter](https://twitter.com/i/moments/998225379281141760)
tags: Crossdressing, School Life, Shota, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Make Heroine ga Oosugiru!
description:
***"Huh? Who are you calling losing?"***

As the background of the class, I, Kazuhiko Nukumizu, witnessed a popular girl–Anna Yanami, getting rejected by another guy.

_"Even though he said we'll get married. Don't you think he's pretty mean?"
"When did he say that?"
"When we were 4 or 5 years old."_

That doesn't count, right? With this, the losing heroines like Remon Yakishio from the Track and Field Club, and Chika Komari, from the literature club.

_"Nukumizu-kun. There are two types of girls. Childhood friends or cheating cats."
"I see. Well, that's a bold statement."_

There's a fortune for those who shine only after losing.
___
**Character Designer:** [Imigimuru](https://mangadex.org/author/341a08ca-acbf-49a3-998a-d3451249ec43)

**Additional Links:**  
- [Alternative Official Raw](https://shogakukan-comic.jp/book-series?cd=51545)
- [Official Raw Light Novel](https://www.shogakukan.co.jp/books/09453017)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kago nashi Reijou no Chiisa na Mura ~Saa, Ryouchi Un'ei wo Hajimemashou!~
description:
I reincarnated as the villainess in a game world— I'm not afraid of banishment, I'll manage my territory and live as I like!

I reincarnated as Celistina, the villainess of an otome game. As the fiancée of the crown prince, in this world where everyone is gifted with blessings by the gods and spirits, I'm the "young lady without a blessing." As a result of being a fan of the game, I know that the crown prince will be with the heroine sooner or later, and he will break our engagement. Alternatively, if they don’t end up together, I will be executed...
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Maou ni Natta node, Dungeon Tsukutte Jingai Musume to Honobono suru
description:
Before I realized, I had become the guardian of a dungeon, a Demon Lord. I was suddenly in a dangerous world with giant monsters loitering around, fighting for their existence. So I thought to go about developing the dungeon in order to not die, but for some reason I was having quite the good time…. How did it turn out like this?  
  
The protagonist, Yuki, having to live in that world now, uses his bold and sharp senses and spends time with a supreme dragon girl and a vampire girl, sometimes laughing, sometimes being angry, passing days doing what he likes.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Since When Do Guys Find Divorcees Attractive?
description: "I'm going to enjoy my second time being single!". Ono Kazuha has divorced her husband at 35 over an affair. She stood tall and announced "I'm officially divorced" to the fashion magazine's editorial department where she works. To add insult to injury, a handsome new hire happened to overhear. She expected it to be awkward, but for some reason it made him attracted to her?
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Monster Devourer
description: ‘Meok Gwi-Sa’ is a Monster Hunter who eats monsters to protect the human world. After the release of the Hell demon, he lost his power. He managed to survive and met Goyoung. Goyoung, is a young individual with a petite build, who has endured a lifetime of torment due to his physical stature. His childhood friend, Kang Jong-bo, suddenly transforms into a bully during high school. However, their lives take an unexpected turn when Goyoung acquired a mysterious power which is the ability to devour monsters. Goyoung embarks on a perilous journey to protect humanity from the impending threat of the Gate to Hell. Will he be able to control his new powers and save the world from its impending doom?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Osananajimi ga Mamasugite Tsurai
description: Hina has one-sided feelings for her childhood friend, Yakumo. However, Yakumo is actually like a helicopter parent, an overprotective mama…! "I'm happy about being doted on by the person I like, but being treated like a daughter is the worst!" Wanting to become lovers with Yakumo, Hina tries her hardest to make him look at her as a woman, but…?! The romcom between a determined maiden in love and an overly-protective boy starts now!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Goinkyo Maou-sama no Kaerizaki ~Totsujo Wakagaetta Sensendai Maou-sama wa Choppiri H na Nazo Bujutsu de Josondanpi no Sekai wo Heiteisuru~
description: A sudden bolt of lightning hits an old man...but! The lightning bolt rejuvenated him to the good-looking guy he was in his prime! His name is Gigi Allegarcia. He was called "the strongest who surpassed the strongest" and "a man who was loved by everything but magic"... he was the demon lord of the previous generation.
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Gore, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Joukamachi no Dandelion
description:
In the manga's story, the everyday lives of the nine super-powered siblings of the royal family are monitored by more than 200 surveillance cameras and broadcast nationwide. The people of the nation who are watching the broadcast will have the ability to elect the next monarch. The story focuses on Akane, the third-oldest sister who can manipulate gravity. She is shy and desperately does not want to be caught on camera.

**NOTE:** Initially released as a 4-koma manga, Joukamachi no Dandelion has transitioned back to traditional format as of Vol.5 Chapter 49.
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Fantasy

name: Guard Pass
description:
Lim Sejun, who likes to eat, is fat and has a large physique. He has high self-esteem and a firm personality that doesn't even care about being teased for being fat. He has only one friend, 'Seo Hajin'. She has always been learning Jiujitsu to protect Sejun since childhood. 

One day, Sejun has trouble with a delinquent in the same class, and Hajin sees it and destroys that delinquent. But one night, Hajin is found severely beaten and suffers from a badly injured knee and more serious psychological trauma. Sejun tries to tell the police, but when the investigation doesn't make much progress, he can't control his anger and goes to find the culprit himself, but he's defeated by the delinquent who learned Jiujitsu and finds nothing. Then he learns Jiujitsu from a man named 'Jason' who saved him. 

Three months later, Sejun, who learned Jiujitsu and lost weight, finds out that a veiled group is involved, and wants to destroy it. A school action drama depicting individual revenge.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: A Boyish Girlfriend in High Humidity
description:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/115806876)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Mujaki na Kanojo to Hatsu Ecchi Suru Mae to Ato
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic

name: Tales of Greed Deep
description: "Tales of Greed" is back with an even deeper story! What if the desires that every human can have become a reality? Will the outcome ultimately lead to happiness or bring about destruction?
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Isekai de Tochi o Katte Noujou o Tsukurou
description:
Corporate drone Itonami Norio is summoned to another world and granted a powerful skill, [Supreme Wielder], which is invisible to those who summoned him. They’re dismayed to see he’s useless to them, so he asks only for a little plot of land to work for himself.

His skill allows him to use any tool to its greatest abilities, including fishing poles, cooking utensils, and construction tools. When he fishes up a mermaid who wants him for her bridegroom, charms a young dragon with his cooking, and excites an undead king with his rare skill, how long can his quiet country life last?!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Fuufu de Itonamu Monster Farm ~Mezase, Mattari Slow Life~
description: Haito and Lina, a newlywed couple, purchase the full-dive VR game "Free Frontier Online". Their reason for playing is to be able to pet and fluff as many monsters as they wish! The two, who are unable to keep pets due to animal allergies, come up with the idea that they can interact with fluffy animals as much as they want in the game, so they start the game as tamers. They thought they started with the purpose of relaxing with the monsters, but before they knew it, they ended up obtaining a familiar stronger than the monsters...!? They will tame, they will battle and they will flirt!
tags: Monsters, Animals, Romance, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Kawaikereba Hentai demo Suki ni Natte Kuremasu ka?
description:
After cleaning the Calligraphy Club room one afternoon, Kiryuu Keiki found a love letter addressed to him on the club's desk. Eager at the possibility of finally getting a girlfriend, he opens the envelope only to find the words, "I like you" along with a pair of the sender's panties.   
  
With only these panties as evidence, Keiki narrows down the identity to the four girls who helped him clean the club room that day: Tokihara Sayuki, the lazy third-year president of Calligraphy Club; Koga Yuika, a library committee member of foreign descent; Nanjou Mao, Keiki's slightly tsundere fellow classmate; and most awkwardly, Kiryuu Mizuha, Keiki's clean freak of a younger sister. Among at least three of these girls, Keiki believes is the one who left him the letter and their panties so with determination in his heart, he sets out to uncover which of these seemingly unorthodox ladies will become his girlfriend!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Ore wa Akutou de wa Arimasen
description:
Cain von Euclid, grandson of the First King who unified the First Continent, learns from his respected grandfather that he is destined to become the strongest villain. Being unable to kill his grandson, the grandfather takes Cain on a journey to make him strong enough to overcome his fate. 

For 13 years, they travel across the Second, Third, and the Fourth Continent, where Cain achieved tremendous power. Finally, Cain sets off on a lone adventure where he meets many people who influence him. 

Will he be able to defy destiny and avoid becoming a villain?
tags: Thriller, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Blue Archive - Problem Solver 68 Business Diary
description: From the smash hit smartphone game "Blue Archive" comes the debut of Problem Solver 68 as our protagonist in this spin-off comic!! Please enjoy the comedic story of our four Problem Solvers in Kivotos - The Academic City!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Drama, Adaptation

name: Arashi to Snowdrop
description:
Taikuni was a promising basketball player, but after injuring his leg, he quit the basketball club and entered the spring of his third year feeling somewhat lethargic.

Amidst all this, he is appointed to the class beautification committee along with Haruki, a boy who is a bit of a shadow due to his frail health. Gradually, Taikuni finds himself unable to leave Haruki, who seems somewhat otherworldly and unsafe, alone...

A heart-cleansing story of first love told by two high school boys!
tags: Boys' Love, School Life

name: Itoko no Ko
description:
His more-than-friends, less-than-lovers cousin is so cute that he could die!!!!? 

Nozomu is a boy staying at his uncle's house over summer vacation. In the countryside, where there are no convenience stores, or any busses even, the boy has a problem. That problem is his younger cousin, Sou! He’s being led around by this tanned, energetic girl day after day and can’t show her the dignity befitting his older age! On top of that, whether intentional or not, he’s getting flustered by Sou’s inviting demeanor. Eventually, Nozomu couldn’t take his eyes off Sou and is falling more and more under her spell...!!? With a “cousin” like this, his reason is having a hard time hanging on!
tags: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Incest, Slice of Life

name: Lockdown Zone: Level X
description:
Ryoka is awakened by flurry of text messages from her mother! Panicked and rushed, Mom is clearly concerned for Ryoka's safety, but she is not to keen on letting her daughter know why. Her reasoning being that nothing could really properly describe what is happening!  
  
The world might be ending! And there might be a massive new life-form on the roof of their apartment building!  
  
(Denpa)
tags: Action, Horror, Mystery

name: Kyatapi Land
description: Violence!!!! Shootouts!!!! Zombies!!!! Electricity!!!! An office life comedy with no straight man begins.
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma

name: Ousama no Propose
description:
The boy's strongest first love, a witch who rules over the world with her body and strength! Kuozaki Saika. The most powerful witch who has been saving the world from destruction every 3XX hours, and the director of the magicians' school.

"...I entrust you, my world..."

And then... the first girl the boy ever loved died, entrusting her body and power to Kuga Mushiki. Instructed by the servant of Saika, Kuga Mushiki is tasked with attending school as his now-deceased lover so that no one finds out the truth... He's feared by his classmates and even his teachers. His life becomes even more troublesome as he reunites with his younger sister who asks for counseling about her love for her own brother- him!
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: The End in Common Ruin
description:
A story about two twins…  
  
—-  
Uploader's note: Published in Gothic Lolita Bible which doesn't focus on manga, so it has no target demographics.
tags: Oneshot, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: The Dress
description: A temptation from which you can't escape…
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Le Théâtre de A
description:
1: Oeufs D'ange (Tenshi no Tamago)  
A man is asked by a young painter to be her model.  
  
2: Velvet Going Underground  
A doll becomes a super idol. Hijinks ensue.  
  
3: Childhood's End  
Alastair runs away and meets the Rabbit.  
  
4: Bite Me Something  
Allistaire followed Mr. Rabbit all the way to Wonderland. Will he be able to find him among the crowd?  
  
5: Long Along Alonging  
A girl asks a vampire to be his apprentice. But what is her motive?  
  
6: Till Dawn  
In a dark tower, a caged voice is singing until a hunted man enters the darkness.  
  
7: Leçon Un  
Sequel to Long Along Alonging.  
  
8: My Skin On My Back  
  
9: Highland Walker  
Sequel to Leçon un.  
  
10: Perfect World  
The story of a young wife whose husband is infected with a fatal disease called Flower-Blossomitis.  
  
11: Perfect Lady  
Sequel to Perfect World and drawn especially for this book.  
  
12-13: Looks Like A Teaspoon  
A boy named Allistaire is often teased at his all-boys school. One night he dresses like a girl and stumbles upon the boy who often bullies him, Simon. Allistaire runs off into a tower and as Simon runs after him, we see the sign "Welcome to Wonderland" hanging by the tower's door.  
  
14: The Pearl Blue Story  
Do you believe in mermaids? Coggy, a young boy finds a mysterious lady laying down near the shore of the beach. He brings her home to help her.  
  
15: I Am A Piano  
A piano tells the story of her life and the people she encounters.  
  
16: Parade
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy

name: MookHyang: Dark Lady
description:
The exceptional martial artist and proud hierarch of the Demonic Sect, Mookhyang, winds up in a strange new fantasy realm after falling victim to a curse cast by his enemies, the Blood Sect. But when Mookhyang’s incredible control over qi, or mana, becomes known, it’s only a matter of time before he gets cursed again… and turned into a young lady?! 

In this world of elves, mages, knights, and dragons, will a mastery of Chinese martial arts be enough for one man (or woman) to fight his way back home? Or will this humbled warrior finally concede defeat? 

[Webtoon Trailer](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_aBOSaO6uOk)

---
