tags: Genderswap, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Le Théâtre de B
description:
1: Noel  
On the day before Christmas, Amberley disappears into the forest while searching for Noel's gift. He is cursed and cannot leave without aging faster than normal, but he leaves the forest anyway to deliver gifts to the girl he loves.  
  
2: The Teddy Bear Murder Case  
Four murders have taken place at an all girl school. Lying beside each of the victim was a teddy bear with one missing limb. Now It is up to Detective Hebizuka Amaru and his cute assistant Kohijiri-kun to solve the mystery!  
  
3: The Four Sisters Murder Case  
  
4: A Is For Alice  
Alastair, a grown man, is off to follow the Rabbit once again to return to Wonderland.  
  
5: The Bedroom Girl, The Sculpture Room Girl  
A story about a girl in her death bed finding another chance in life in the body of a doll. But is the girl in the bedroom the same as the girl in the sculpture room? Can the doll master make her dreams come true?  
  
6: B&W ～Black&White～  
A story about a boy waiting for his sister.  
  
7: Le Jardin Du thé  
A mysterious story about a poor young man who orders a kind of tea called Huan Ying – “The Illusion”. He asked for a small quantity - just to have a taste - and was granted one cupful…  
  
8-9: Free Fitting For Her  
A priest and his captured vampire must save a naive and selfish young girl from the murderous desires of a Lolicon. But perhaps this girl isn't all that she seems.  
  
10: Rose Dusk, Pale Moon  
11: Hello, My Sister  
12: The Happy Prince  
  
13: Welcome To Wonderland  
Simon, Alastair's old classmate, is now a grown man who bumps into his childhood Wonderland traveler.
tags: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Slice of Black Chocolate
description:
Generally… a story about really cute guy trying to hook up with this really egotistic girl… although it's not really like that.  
  
—  
Uploader's note: Published in Gothic Lolita Bible which doesn't focus on manga, so it has no target demographics.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Fantasy

name: Cosmos
description: A very short story in full color about the memories of walking along the path with blossoming cosmos.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Slice of Life

name: School Back
description:
Fushimi-san, the janitor at a certain high school, cuts quite a figure. She's tall, cheerful, hard-working, and loves canned coffee. When the students at the school are going through times of trouble, pain, or confusion, she's there to lend a helping hand or a shoulder to cry on. When you feel like the adults in your life don't have your back... Fushimi-san probably will!

This wonderful slice of life by Onodera Kokoro follows various poignant stories of adolescence and the desire of young people to be seen and heard, especially when times are hard.
tags: Psychological, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Isekai Kaeri no Yuusha wa, Dungeon ga Shutsugen shita Genjitsu Sekai de, Influencer natte Kane wo Kasegimasu!
description: One day, an ordinary high school student is transferred to another world. He raises his level in the other world, successfully defeats the Demon King, and saves the world! With his strongest status, he decided to return to his own world; however, in the world to which he returns, a new "dungeon" has appeared.
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Witch and Me
description: A boy receives an apple from a fellow student. 8 pages.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Suteishi Yuusha, Maou no Shita de Restart
description:
Asato Kanami who was summoned as a hero to another world Istalia. 

 To stop the war between the demons and humans, it is said that he was summoned by Anna, the saint of the Kingdom of Elshnon.  

After a year of war, Asato finally challenges the Demon King Lione. Just when he thought the battle was over, his summoner Anna attacked him and the Demon King.  

Asato who survived the attack and was protected by the Demon King. What is the future path for the hero betrayed by humans…!?
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: The Vampire and I
description: A dark european ambient and the story of a vampire … just before dinner time.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural

name: Hitomi kara Destiny
description: Umi used to be a very sickly girl when she was young. One time, she was on the verge of death after contracting a high fever, but then her fever magically disappeared, leaving behind a star-shape mark on her forehead with the color of the ocean. Now a sixteen-year-old girl, Umi dreams of finding love and having a boyfriend like many other girls her age. There’s one guy at school whom she’s really interested in, but things don’t really go the way she wants them to with another guy showing up out of nowhere… Not to mention, that guy isn’t just your average guy…
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Fantasy

name: Kenseijo Adel no Yarinaoshi ~Kako ni Modotta Saikyou Kensei, Hime wo Sukuu Tame ni Seijo to Naru~
description:
Hailed as the hero for leading his country to victory from a great war, the blind Sword Saint Adel is now in despair. Unfortunately, he failed to protect his benefactor, Princess Euphinea, whom he dedicated his entire life to. 

"I want to meet the princess once again," he muttered, wishing deeply that his prayers would be answered. A mysterious being, having heard his plea, granted his prayers, and he was sent back to the past, to a time when the princess is still alive. 

Unexpectedly, the Sword Saint (♂) has been transformed into a super-duper cute Sword Saintess (♀), and her heroic tale of unrivaled power will once again take place.
tags: Time Travel, Genderswap, Action, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Rai Rai Rai
description: Fifty years after the war with the aliens... danger emerges... from within a young girl! Ichigaya Sumire, age 18, works at a "space pest" extermination company to pay off the debts her father left behind. But one day, her life is turned upside down when she's abducted by a UFO!
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Hyperdimension Neptunia: The Animation - (DNA Comic Anthology)
description: An anthology comic of Choujigen Game Neptune (Hyperdimension Neptunia) by various mangaka published by DNA Media Comics Media.
tags: Comedy, Anthology, Video Games, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: A Barbarian Was Admitted to the Academy
description:
I found myself possessed in a game I used to play occasionally.
And to top it off, I'm the female warrior of a barbarian tribe that only has bad endings.

...Alright, let's escape.
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Dear My Rude Darling With Multiple Personality
description: The beautiful port city of La Spezia. After leaving the orphanage, Monica, who served as a nurse on the battlefield for three years, He is hired as a tutor for the Mollet family. On her first day in an unfamiliar city, Monica encounters a familiar face on the street. “… Sol?” “I’m sorry, but I’m not Sol.” I thought it was Sol, a soldier who took care of me on the battlefield I’m mistaken for the attitude of seeing it for the first time, even thinking about it for a while! How come this man… Every time we meet, the name and personality change, too! The only thing is a picture-like appearance and a slight scar around the right eye. liar? identical twins Or maybe it’s a multi-personality?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Aquatope on White Sand
description: Gama Gama Aquarium, a small aquarium in Okinawa, is an hour's bus ride from Naha. Kukuru Misakino is an 18-year-old high school student who works there, and she knows about the "secret" of the aquarium: sometimes you can see mysterious things. One day Kukuru meets Fuuka, standing in front of a water tank with flowing hair and a tear rolling down her cheek. Fuuka has given up on her dream of becoming an idol and she has run away from Tokyo to Okinawa. Wanting to find a place to belong, Fuuka earnestly asks to work at the aquarium. The manga follows Kukuru and Fuuka as they deal with the issues of the secret of the aquarium and a looming crisis of its possible closure.
tags: Animals, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Apocalyptic Survival: I Can See Hidden Clues
description: Upon awakening from slumber, it was discovered that billions of people had been transported to an apocalyptic era! Survival had become a shared goal of everyone, yet Zhang Chen could perceive concealed clues! While all were cautiously venturing into this unknown apocalyptic realm, Zhang Chen was already forging ahead…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Zombies, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Hachi♀ Ichi♂
description:
Shinichirou would rather spend his life playing games on the internet, but sadly he's an heir to a company. His grandfather deems his current life-style unfit for an heir, so he throws him into a house with eight young and beautiful girls. What's more, within one year he'll have to choose one of them as his bride. What will happen to him now?  
Manga Published in a Seinen magazine. Please do not edit Demographic to Shounen.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life

name: Tonari no Kuderella o Amayakashitara, Uchi no Aikagi o Watasu Koto ni Natta
description:
A sweet cross-cultural romantic comedy tale about a beautiful exchange student from a foreign country, and the young man who takes care of her dinner. Katagiri Naomi, a high school student who lived alone for two years, meets a beautiful girl with black hair and blue eyes, who moves into the apartment next door. The girl's name is Yui. It seemed that she really was a noblewoman, and her nickname was “Quderella” because of her nonchalant attitude at school. Naomi knows that Yui doesn't want to depend on others, but she's actually quite naive, so Naomi decides to help her.

"Today what are we having at night... Karaage chicken, huh?"
"That's right because the price of chicken is discounted today"
“I love your fried chicken so I'm really looking forward to it”
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Human Weapon Katsuo!
description: The protagonist Hamada Katsuo, is your everyday pervert/loser character. He's starting a new semester in school, so he wants to escape from his loser days, the only problem is the new change in look/lifestyle he got is that of a gang member. He beats a strong guy that was bullying a friend of his by mistake and now, because of it he's the target for all the gangs in the region, even though he's still only a weakling and a pervert. Will Katsuo escape alive…? Find out.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Undead
description: "I can't get caught… not until I become human again!"
tags: Action, Long Strip, Horror

name: Wagatsuma-san wa Ore no Yome
description: Aoshima is a second year student in high school, who wishes he had a girlfriend. One day he wakes up for an unknown reason 10 years in the future, and he is married to the prettiest girl in school, Wagatsuma Ai! How has their relationship grown from mere acquaintances to husband and wife?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Mushoku no Eiyuu: Betsu ni Skill Nanka Iranakattan daga
description: "Classes" are given at the age of 10, and the presence or absence of "skills" greatly affect life. Arel, the son of "Sword Princess" Fara and "Magic King" Leon, has been branded as "Classless"… But even without a job or skills, Arel believes he can persevere through effort.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ino-Head Gargoyle
description: Known as the gargoyle of Inogashira Park police station because of his scary face, Saejima Toshiyuki was a loser. He's pretty much a virgin for all intent and purposes, aside from the companions that he pays for. He wasn’t always a loser though. During his high school days, he was feared as a badass, but now he is just a person people feel sorry for. He then meets Arimori Shizuka, a beautiful girl that seems comfortable in her sexuality. Toshiyuki learns that she was a high class escort that has been with over 1000 men. She was doing it out of love for her abusive boyfriend but, realizing her mistake, quits. Shizuka is now being harassed and Toshiyuki reverts back to his aggressive personality to protect the love of his life.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama

name: Glass-goshi no Koibito
description:
Shoko, who's searching for a partner, hits it off with Ukai, whom she meets on a dating app.
However, he’s from a parallel world, and the only way they can connect is through her smartphone screen...
As she spends her days with a boyfriend she can neither meet nor touch, Shoko uncovers a certain truth about him...

Source: MangaPlus
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Drama

name: Moko to Pansy
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Animals, Girls' Love, Fantasy

name: Zatch Bell!! - 4Koma Special
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma

name: I Won't Let Mistress Suck My Blood
description: Matilda is looking for a job and a place to stay, and ends up in a large mansion known as the "Haunted House." The owner of the house, August, is a beautiful, soft-spoken woman, and Matilda is attracted to her and decides to work for her as a maid. However, that night, Matilda finds that her master has transformed.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Vampires

name: Ore, Maou dakedo Baretenai yo ne?
description: From a lineage of elite demon lords, the current demon lord Eugene Satania - Vidorick has one secret way of relaxing from the stress he accumulates in the demon world. Which is to go to the human world under the guise as the human named Satano Yuuji, mixing into common everyday folk to enjoy himself! Now a rookie-low-class demon suddenly appeared in front of him, named Mist. With a good-for-nothing low-class demon at his side, Yuuji now has to hide his identity at all costs! Let's start this suspicious rom-com!
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Supernatural

name: Golem Hearts
description:
In the world of Golem Hearts, creatures known as golems have become integrated with society, performing all sorts of tasks. These golems are created by the widely-respected "sorcery scholars," and obey the commands of their human masters without question. Noah is a sorcery scholar who strives to become the second best of his kind.  
  
To that end, he travels far and wide to study unique golems around the world. This journey leads him to a certain island, where he encounters a girl named Mary and her golem Murray. As the two get acquainted, we begin to discover that there may be more to Noah than meets the eye.  

---
  
As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Golem Hearts were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.  
  
Prior to its serialization two "Golem Hearts"-oneshots were published, one of which can be found [here (RAW)](https://shonenjumpplus.com/episode/10833497643049550104).
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

name: Full Drive
description:
9-year-old Tamashiro Dan is teased relentlessly by others for being weak and small until his grandfather teaches him table tennis and gives him an old worn-out racket. Four years, later he's left Germany with his family to Japan, to prove himself on a bigger stage.

**Included Oneshots:**

Volume 2:  
- Koi ni Sake Mikoto (恋に咲けミコト) - Previously unpublished; 52nd Jump Treasure Rookie Award, Honorable Mention (2011)
- Kokoro no Naka no Juusetsuken (心の中の銃切剣) - *Jump Live*

Volume 3:  
- Dov no Kyuuki (ドブの吸鬼) - *Jump Next 2014 Winter*
- Akage no Acho!! (赤毛のアチョー!!) - *Shounen Jump 2015 #16*
___
As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Full Drive were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.
tags: Sports

name: Off-Nature Museum
description: This museum's treasured collection is a slew of strange comics!
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Full Color

name: Top Tier Providence
description:
Being reincarnated in a cultivation world, Han Jue realizes that he can live his life like a video game. He can reroll his cultivation potential and connate providence.

So, he spends 11 years rerolling for a good one…

[Unparalleled: Immortal beauty, top-notch charm]

[Destined Sword fanatic: Top-notch Sword Dao aptitude, top-notch Sword Dao comprehension]

[Unparalleled Movement Technique: Top-notch movement technique aptitude]

[Descendant of the Immortal Emperor: You will receive an unparalleled cultivation technique and 1,000 superior-grade spirit stones]

In pursuit of longevity, Han Jue decides to cultivate in a low-profile manner.
A thousand years later, generations of cultivators have become history.

That is when beings of the fairyland start cleansing the mortal world. Han Jue can no longer hide and has no choice but to take action.

Then he realizes, that deities and gods aren’t that powerful after all!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: White Album
description: Touya now has a new girlfriend, Yuki Morikawa–but before they enter college she is going to debut as an idol. How will this new development affect their relationship? What about the current idol, Rina Ogata, who seems to have set her sights on Touya?
tags: Romance, Harem, Drama

name: Demon's Plan
description:
What is it that you desire? Money? Love? Walk again? Be stronger?  
  
Whatever it is you wish for, you can get by asking the legendary and awe-inspiring "Demon's Plan"; a sacred object capable of granting anything to "the chosen ones."
tags: Action, Adventure, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Cross Account
description:
Say hello to Daichi, a.k.a. Mr. Harmless. Because of his compulsive need to be liked, he never makes waves and maintains an easy going attitude. So easy going, everyone thinks he's a dud. But online he's a stud! His angry otaku online persona has garnered him thousands of followers! But real life and online life are two very different things. A lesson he's going to learn the hard way!  
  
Included one-shots:  
- Volume 2: [Haru yo, Koi!: Fuyu-hen, Haru-hen](https://mangadex.org/manga/20481)  
- Volume 3: [Gachipin.](https://mangadex.org/manga/18897)  
- Volume 4: Gesu no Ongaeshi
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life

name: Demon King's Rules x Witch's Covenant
description: Warning! An association of valiant individuals formed by the villainous demon lord and the rebellious witches has surfaced! Through casual methods of operation, they will turn the definition of justice upside down! By committing crimes across dimensions, they will ultimately snatch the halo of the main characters away from the hands of pesky humans!
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy

name: War Angels
description: Tae, Sir Ross, and Nikki are Archangels who are tasked with rescuing a woman known as The Lady. With extraordinary abilities, these angels battle against the Beastarians and their leader Tyron. In a post-apocalyptic future where humankind slowly grows extinct, hope depends on the War Angels
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Sidekicks
description: Even if people are born with super powers, they must serve as sidekicks of superheroes in order to become superheroes themselves. Lamia a.k.a Dream Girl has the power to make people fall asleep. She is the sidekick of Darkslug, who is not a great hero compared to his reputation. One day, Dream Girl and Theo work together to get rid of villains and save the world.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Supernatural

name: Naatan and her husband Tama
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot

name: Gakuen Dragon Slayer
description: A school is transported into a fantasy world that is at war with dragons, and everyone in the school is given a powerful dragon slaying sword, and told the only way to get home is to help win the war. But there is a catch, to use the swords power you must be…a virgin!
tags: Oneshot, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Fantasy

name: High Spec Lovers
description:
A romance about an unlikely couple.  
  
Asakura Rin and Hasegawa Kengo are a perfect couple that everyone admires. They are attractive, have perfect conduct, and excel both in sports and academics. They are the embodiment of a perfect boyfriend and girlfriend. However, for Hasegawa, things are not what they seem…
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, School Life

name: Kamen Rider SPIRITS
description: After Japanese-American FBI agent Taki Kazuya and Kamen Rider 1 defeat a bat monster, they decide to contact the former riders including Stronger to investigate the appearance of monsters attacking them and civilians. Their investigation reveals the coming of an alien empire out to destroy the Earth, finishing the work that Shocker and other terrorist organizations have failed due to their defeat at the Rider's hands.
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Monster Girls, Police, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Shindou Yuusha to Maid Onee-san
description: After defeating the Demon King and saving the world, Shion was exiled to the border. Here, the strongest Hero enjoyed his slow life with 4 capable onee-san maids.
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Adaptation

name: The Weakest Occupation "Blacksmith," but It's Actually the Strongest
description:
The people of this world are given occupations and weapons called Divine Treasures by God. It was said that the treasure was very strong and couldn’t be compared to the Human-made weapons. That’s why, occupations which were called “Blacksmith”, who can make and modify weapons are called the weakest.  
  
The main protagonist Relius who has acquired such a weakest job. He gave up on becoming an adventurer and worked in an inn, but he realized that he could make “Anything”. While making things he liked, he found himself in relationships with famous aristocrats and beautiful girls.
tags: Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: lya da to Itte Moratorium
description: When Mitsu was in high school, he had a physical relationship with his childhood friend Nana, whom he had a crush on. However, when Nana suddenly asked him, "Do you want to stop doing this kind of thing?" Mitsu was unable to tell him that he didn't like it, and ended up heartbroken. Mitsu has not been in contact with Nana since then, but his feeling for him still remained. When Mitsu became a university student, he runs into him again while working part-time. He is relieved to find that he doesn't seem to notice him, but short after, he is ambushed at the end of his shift and they end up going to Mitsu's house together. There, Nana shows his obsession with Mitsu for some reason. While the memory of his hurt returns to him, Mitsu's feelings for him still remain…
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: My Gently Raised Beast
description:
Blondina is living a real-life Cinderella story. After growing up poor and enduring a difficult childhood, she discovers that she is a princess of the Ates empire. However, her estranged father and half-siblings give her the cold shoulder when she moves into the palace, and Blondina must keep a low profile. That all changes when she befriends Amon, a cat-like creature with mysterious intentions. For years, creatures like Amon and humans have struggled to live in harmony. Can Blondina and Amon’s friendship bring peace, or will it deepen the rift between their people?

---
Blondina, a princess who had commoner’s blood, lived quietly in a separate palace. Due to her mixed blood, she received ill-treatment and was surrounded with contempt. One day, she happened upon a wounded black cat and decided to treat it. But, the lovely cat she assumed it to be was actually…?

“If you run away like that, of course, I’d want to hunt you.”

Amon’s lips gently wandered down her skin.

“You’re the one who picked me up. You’re the one who kept me by your side,” Amon whispered, as his feverish breath made her skin crawl, “So you have to take responsibility for me till the end, Bridey.”

Once the lovely cat was all grown up, she realized… She thought she raised him well, but she's going to be eaten up as well.

---
[Original Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=761104)

tags: Historical, Animals, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: "Koko wa Makasete Sakini Ike!" wo shitai Shinitagari no Nozomanu Uchuu Gekokujou
description:
Nao is suffering. The university student watched as his girlfriend dumped him to run off with another man, and now he has nothing to live for anymore. As he contemplates suicide, he sees an advertisement for the Space Force - a military power dedicated to protecting the planet from all sorts of extraterrestrial enemies. 

An idea hatches in his head - he heard of the cliche where the hero tells his comrades "I'll take it from here. You go on without me." It's a perfect way for him to die while looking like the suave hero he always wanted to be seen as! There's only one issue: he's a little *too* competent to die on his own...
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adaptation

name: Resident Evil: The Marhawa Desire
description: Chris Redfield is sent by the Bioterrorism Security Assessment Alliance (BSAA) to investigate a series of biohazard incidents occurring in Marhawa School, Asia's largest elite school in a certain country in the Far East.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Military, Drama, Horror, Adaptation

name: The Villainous Tyrant Has Returned
description:
"If you wish, I don’t mind dying."

The tyrant Ludwig Magenta has met his end at the hands of Empress Olive Charlotte. The moment he accepted death, he opened his eyes in the garden where he first met her at the age of twelve. 

If he starts again from the beginning, can he change his tragic life? 

Only time will tell if Ludwig’s quest for Olive’s love will succeed.
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Shiro no Keiyaku
description:
From Aerandria:  
  
Shiro is a white crow. Because of his unusual color, he’s often bullied by the other black crows. One day, he’s hurt badly because the others ganged up on him, and he was saved by a girl. Moved by the girl’s gentle heart, Shiro asked a devil to let him turn into a human. However, there’s one condition: Shiro will have to do at least one bad deed a day, otherwise, his body will crumble. Can Shiro really fulfill this contract?
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: ZINGNIZE
description:
The story of the "Three Jinnai from Edo" (Kosaka, Tobisawa, Shoji)  
Eight year of the Keicho era, 3 years after the Battle of Sekigahara (1603 AD) Okubo Nagayasu calls on Kosaka Jinnai, who is known as the best thief in Japan, to eliminate the bandit gang led by Fuma Kotaro.  
A fierce battle between the Jinnais and the Fuma clan opens its curtain !!
tags: Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Martial Arts, Samurai, Gore, Drama, Supernatural

name: Karakida-ke no Kosho Gurashi
description:
The world's largest collection of used bookstores, Kanda-Jinbōchō. There begins the story of the unforgettable days the three Karakida sisters spend surrounded by the scent of used books when they inherit the used bookstore their grandfather left behind.

**Note:** Has been on hiatus since October 2024 due to author Toume Kei's health. ([Announcement](https://x.com/gj_karakida/status/1846204960293507390))
___
**Additional Links:**
- [Official X](https://twitter.com/gj_karakida)
tags: Slice of Life, Mystery

name: High School Family: Kokosei Kazoku
description: Spring is in the air, and Kotaro is about to begin his first year of high school. He's full of hope and anticipation of a wonderful life at his new school, only to have his dreams crushed by…his family?! Isobe Isobee Monogatari ~ Ukiyo wa Tsuraiyo creator Ryo Nakama's latest series combines family and school life gags, making it feel familiar but also fresh and new. This new genre of comedy will be sure to make the grade!
tags: Traditional Games, Animals, Comedy, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Lovesick
description:
Lovesick  
Yue lives alone with her 27 year-old step-father, Kouki. She's dating a boy her age… but she can't stop thinking about Kouki. Could it be more than the feelings of relatives?  
  
——————————–  
Includes the following oneshots:  
  
Koukando Equals (extra story in Volume 1)  
Kouno has always thought that she was the only one who got hurt deeply when she was bullied. She just might be able to see from the bully's eyes.  
  
Diamond (extra story in Volume 2)  
Urara, a poor college student, has always been told she is ugly, but that's all about to change when she meets three unexpectedly diverse people, who work together to 'polish' a person into their full capability.
tags: Romance, Drama

name: The Ugly Wife of the Shady Duke
description: Reincarnated as the neglected wife of a duke who secretly loves the novel's heroine, she plans to divorce him to survive. Yet, he desperately begs her not to leave, confusing her as the story unfolds differently than she remembered.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Hetalia - The Last Rose (Doujinshi)
description:
An AU where the countries each belong to a suit (cards). The delicate peace that existed between them is broken when a new king is crowned.

Pairing: America x England
tags: Boys' Love, Doujinshi, Drama, Mystery

name: Aki/Momo
description: Mutually unrequited love yuri.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic

name: Shugo Chara! Jewel Joker
description:
The long-awaited comeback! A new story of Amu and her guardian characters begins...!

The cool and spicy Amu Hinamori has graduated from Seiyo Academy's elementary school and is finally a junior high school student! She thought she would have carefree days with her precious friends in junior high... until she is asked to take on a mission related to guardian characters and has to transfer to a new school...!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Our Villainess Has Changed
description:
She grew up an orphan, working herself to death in part-time jobs, and eventually died from exhaustion. 

Right before her death, she was reading an R-rated romance fantasy novel and found herself reincarnated as Annette Ethelred, the twisted villainess who was adopted into a duke's family and was bent on killing the novel's heroine. Annette was also the last princess of a fallen kingdom. Her happiness over the lavish lifestyle of the duke’s family didn’t last long, as she was quickly thrown out with nothing to her name, punished for the evil deeds of the original Annette. 

But giving up wasn’t an option. With the survival skills honed from all her part-time jobs, she managed to get hired as a maid at the temple. 

"This time around, I’ll make lots of money and date a handsome man! ...But seriously, are there no normal guys around here?!"
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Empress's Harem
description: Super sweet and super-sand sculptured female statue against the harem! I often hear: "Three princes and three princesses! Your puppets are fighting again!" The overbearing female CEO traversed to the world of female honors and woke up with seven husbands.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Initial D
description: Only the fearless survive in the white-hot world of street racing, as teams take on dangerous roads in the shadow of Mt. Akina. Behind the wheel of the mysterious "Ghost of Akina" is Takumi, on his way to becoming the greatest racer ever.
tags: Action, Sports, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Kid Icarus - Jibun no Kyoku ga Aru ka Tanoshimi Datta Pit-kun 4-Koma Manga (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, 4-Koma, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Jukai: Shounin Yokkyuu no Mori
description:
Freelance writer Shunsuke Koshiji went to the Sea of Trees at the foot of Mount Fuji in response to a video streamer's message for help. Upon arrival, he found dozens of other streamers gathered there, their goal being to find a secret cult known as "Jofuku Divine Teaching," who are said to operate in the forest. But that night, something happens...

The Sea of Trees and a dark cult... both will bring out the streamers' ugly true desire of wanting to go viral...

(Source: Nihon Bungeisha)
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Survival, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Kid Icarus - 13 Shou no Burapi (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Snow in the Dark
description:
Collection of 4 oneshots:  
  
1) MP0   
The oneshot that will lead to Mx0. The names are different but the contents are the same.  
  
2) She Monkey  
A boy has come to a deserted island to meet his scientist father who is working on a top-secret experiment. There he meets a beautiful girl who knows him, but he doesn't know her.  
  
3) Snow in the Dark  
A one-shot fairy tale which shares many elements of the traditional story of Snow White but is certainly unique and complex enough that it is more than just a reinterpretation.  
  
4) Kirino Sako to Nakamatachi (story: Nikohara Daisuke)
tags: Action, Comedy, Anthology, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Empress of Hell's Mission Guide
description: Qin NianNian, the SSSSS-level Queen of Mercenaries, became the ruler of the underworld after her death— The Empress of Hell! She is highly intelligent, callous, and cruel in her methods. With her adorable pet, TangYuan, she transmigrates into thousands upon thousands of worlds and switches on her ‘punishing scums’ mode!
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Sexual Violence, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kid Icarus - Bonus no Kisetsu (Doujinshi)
description:
**Link:**

tags: Oneshot, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Full Color

name: A Harem for My Empress
description: The tyrant Xi Wuji always thought that his pampered queen treated him affectionately, like a delicate little lotus flower. He thought she loved him, but on the day of his death, he opened his eyes. As a result of his death, she took charge of the government and had many lovers, and lived in debauchery. But he became her favourite lover again in this new life‽
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Sexual Violence, Harem, Wuxia, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kid Icarus - Chuu Inu (Doujinshi)
description: Not found

**Link:**

tags: Oneshot, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kuuzoku Huck to Jouki no Hime
description:
1901 - The Mist Industrial Revolution ushered in the "Age of the Air."

As people move their lives from the ground to the skies, "air pirates" appear, forming cliques and roaming the skies. 
Among them there was a pirate who disliked herds and roamed the skies freely, and his name was Huck.

---
**Link:**

* [Mag-Garden](https://www.mag-garden.co.jp/comics/13202/)
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Radiant
description:
Seth is an apprentice sorcerer from the Pompo Hills. Like all sorcerers, he's an "infected", one of the few people having survived an encounter with a Nemesis, those creatures falling from the sky and destroying everything around them. Being immune to them, Seth wants to become a Hunter and fight the Nemesis. But what Seth really wants is to find the source of all Nemesis, the Radiant. Helped by his fellow sorcerers, he will seek the Radiant, under the harsh scrutiny of the Inquisition…


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media (2021)
tags: Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Jimoto no Ijimekko-tachi ni Shikaeshi Shiyou to Shitara, Betsu no Tatakai ga Hajimatta.
description: Local bullies tormented Kotaro when he was a youngster. They were the skilled wrestler Akari, a skilled basketball prodigy Kanae, and Shigure, a prodigy in video games. Every day, Kotaro competed against these three guys in their respective sports with the intention of winning. Unfortunately, he was no match for them. As a senior in high school, Kotaro now has another opportunity to confront them and exact his retribution...! But he will discover a secret that he never would have expected...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Spirit of Fire
description:
The National Agency for Combating Elementals (NACE) achieved a long-awaited victory against the most dangerous and ruthless spirit in history — Inferno. Yet, the spirit proved more cunning than expected: instead of perishing, it abandoned its physical form and escaped, gaining newfound freedom.  
Its next host became Niro Kasai — a gifted teenager with a tragic past and a passion for taekwondo. But the delicate balance of his life is shattered: within him now burns the immense power of Inferno, threatening to consume not just him but the entire world.  
Niro has become a ticking time bomb. Can he tame the flames that crave destruction, or will Inferno take full control, transforming the boy into a vessel of chaos?
tags: Thriller, Comedy, Martial Arts, Self-Published, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: I've Been Cursed by Her, but Since I'm Happy It's OK!
description: Being kind to girls is the most important thing to 17-year-old Iida Harunari. As the kind of guy to carry the bags of all the girls in his class with him to school each morning, those around him sarcastically called him the "ultimate gentleman Iida". One day, he encountered a beautiful girl with a strange aura, Kageura Sari, but he noticed a cursed-looking monster emerging from her body. Iida was going to hurry and flee, but wasn't something amiss…? He was cursed by the heroine?! The new sensation of horror-rom-com!
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Kaiju No. 8: Relax
description:
A spin-off gag manga of "Kaiju No. 8"!

The defense force members risk their lives to protect people from approaching monsters. But even these members have "off-duty" days to relieve their daily fatigue! Don't miss the hilarious vacations the members of the force have to offer!
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Tanikamen
description: The story is of a masked boy, Tani, a strong young man, who has a crush on a girl named Shima Rihoko, the school volleyball star. He gets into trouble trying to get her attention, besides facing the thugs of the school. He’s a very jealous guy, and will not let anyone get close to Shima-san.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: I'm an Evil God
description: Among the various realms, is the manliest and most handsome evil god in history! The peerless and handsome Xie Yan crosses over and falls into the vixen's lair. In order not to be drained of his entire life-force, he travels between various realms, cuts down a son of god, and repels an invading union hailing from across the ocean… This is the story of how he eventually becomes an evil god.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Bu Tian Gang
description: Cute, smart, and introverted disciple X cold, strict, and beautiful master. In order to pursue the cold male god from the train, Dong Zhi worked hard to get admitted into the department of public service — the ministry of exorcism. Not only is he working day in and day out, he constantly puts his life on the line and has to dodge all kinds of dangers, isn’t chasing this male god too strenuous?
tags: Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Hetalia - Ivan's Heart (Doujinshi)
description: Two stories about Ivan’s heart and why he chooses to entrust it to his rival, America.
tags: Doujinshi, Tragedy

name: Banquet With Deer Crying
description: Inside a certain luxurious building, human desire runs wild, and justice is almost nonexistent. Courtesan Su You receives a visitor, who offers a large sum to buy her freedom, and even claims that she knows the future, hoping that Su You will lend her a hand and save the world.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: 100-Year-Old Top Chef
description:
The world’s greatest chef. First, second, third… and sixth life. The combined time I’ve spent on cooking is over 100 years.

“I can’t do this anymore.” There is only one way to stop this endless reincarnation and regression. This time, I will definitely succeed.

<100-Year-Old Top Chef>
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Cooking

name: Blue Archive - Sensei no Techou o Nakushita Hoshino (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Doujinshi, Drama, Web Comic

name: My Dog Becomes a Human
description:
A slapstick comedy that involves a town and its neighbors where “pet dogs” have become “humans”!
Feelings that couldn’t be conveyed as a dog can now be understood directly…!?
tags: Animals, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Hiota no Kanojo ga Ore no Motteru Eroge ni Kyoumi Shinshin Nanda ga......
description: Kazuma, a highschool student who loves eroge, has been confessed to by the honour student and beautiful girl, Misaki Honoka, who's the school's prodigy. What's more, Honoka had declared that she would try her best to become a "heroine" that Kazuma likes?! "Can you… train me?" What kind of eroge is this?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation

name: The Bugle Call: Song of War
description:
In Arboral Year 1294, the world is dominated by nine massive towers known as the Spires, remnants of an ancient civilization. Filled with lost secrets and powerful knowledge, nations struggle to possess them. Luca is a bugler in a mercenary company who wants nothing more than to leave the battlefield behind and become a true musician, a maestro. But marked as one of the enigmatic Branch-hexed, and gifted with the strange ability to see the sound of his instrument, Luca finds himself drawn reluctantly into a war of epic proportions!

Left for dead after a battle, Luca is saved by the mysterious Pontiff and learns he is not the only person with unusual powers. The Pontiff has formed a special team of Branch-hexed individuals he plans to use to help him defeat rival empires, and Luca learns that his powers, rather than being an escape from the battlefield, now force him to be a muse of massacre.
tags: Action, Psychological, Military, Fantasy, Mystery, Music, Tragedy

name: Twisted Heroes
description:
In a world where humanity is struggling to fight off the demon threat due to the difference in magic between them, the humans choose to summon heroes from another world, hoping the heroes' unique magic can save them.
But, both the "heroes", and the world they were summoned to, are more complex than they seem...
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Ailes Grises
description:
The series follows a young girl named Rakka, a newly arrived haibane (an angelic-looking being), and other characters in the city of Glie (guri), a walled city with one entrance where no one is allowed to leave.  
Also contains a side story written after the end of the anime. It shows the relation between Reki and Nemu (and Hyouko) after the departure of Kuramori. The colour illustrations are those supposedly by Reki. One is a scenery in her dream and the other is the portrait of Kuramori.  
  
Artbook: Haibane Renmei - Guri no Machi, Haibane no Niwade.
tags: Doujinshi, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Stay With Me
description: The hottest and most popular model on SNS these days, Choi Bom. Born with a good-looking appearance, he accidentally became a trend, posting a job offer for a housekeeper on his SNS. And after a while, a man comes to visit saying that he will work as a housekeeper... His best friend and first love, who disappeared 7 years ago ...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Jirai Nandesuka? Chihara-san
description: The girl sitting next to me at the start of the new semester is the rumored "landmine" girl... but... is Chihara-san really the "landmine" that everyone says she is?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Darling’s Vanishing Act
description: Darling is a carefree, cheerful, romantic, and flirtatious gentleman. The moment he appears, the fate of the underworld is set into rapid motion...! A fact its residents know, fear, and dread! Get captivated by this brilliant action-drama starring the underworld's top escape artist!
tags: Action, Romance, Crime, Mafia

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: The Nameless Battlefield
description: Master Kazuhisa Kondo comicalizes the world of the popular online game "Gundam Online". Prominent MS fight freely on the ground and in space with Kondo's hands!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Military, Drama, Adaptation

name: Clannad - Shibou Yuugi (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Doujinshi, Slice of Life

name: Clannad - Himetaru Omoi (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Doujinshi, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Fever
description:
'Yeah, well done. Don't let other people touch you.'

"Myungha is a young man abandoned by his family and lives alone in the mountains to protect the tombs of his ancestors. One day, his father tells him that he will recognize him as his legitimate son in exchange for fulfilling a simple errand. However, that errand is to marry Prince Howon and live in his house. Thank goodness the prince treats him kindly, but at night, he behaves like someone else. What will this strange marriage bring him."

---

- [Original Webtoon <R15>](https://ridibooks.com/books/297043635)
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Outaishi-sama, Watashi Kondo Koso Anata ni Korosaretakunain desu!
description: The poverty-stricken noblewoman, Liesel, was murdered by her lover, the crown prince, in an elaborate ruse set up by the evil saintess. However, she receives a second chance to live as she suddenly wakes up as her childhood self. She takes this event as a chance to change her life, and live without ties to both the crown prince and the saintess, but by a strange twist of fate, she becomes entangled with the saintess's childhood friend! A woman with a strong will to live who has been ensnared by fateーLiesel's success story begins here!
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: The Legend of Zelda: Twilight Princess
description:
A manga adaption of the original video game.

Link, a shepherd from Ordon Village, sees village children, including with his childhood friend Ilia, being kidnapped by monsters. He chases after them only to find his world covered in twilight. Thereupon Link suddenly transforms into a wolf and finds a mysterious character named Midna. His journey to bring back light into the world begins.
tags: Action, Adventure, Video Games, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Urareta Henkyou Haku Reijou wa Ringoku no Outaishi ni Dekiai Sareru
description:
"What a boring world this is."

A noble society where it is common sense for women to marry a nobleman from a good family and dote on their husband for the rest of their lives. Anna, the young daughter of the Harmich family, has grown tired of such a world. Rather than having fantasies of marriage, Anna, who is obsessed with the art of war, dreamt of appearing on the battlefield alongside her father. However, after being invaded by their neighbouring country, Albion, Anna's father departed for the battlefield for his last and final time. On top of that, the eldest son was taken as a war prisoner. In dire straits, the Harmich family decides to offer their second daughter, Anna, to the neighbouring country!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: Shinmai Necromancer, Maou wo Sosei suru
description:
"O spirit destined to be mine, rise once more from the realm of the dead!"

In the depths of an extravagant tomb, Alice, a novice necromancer, channeled her mana into an ancient coffin as she cast her spell. Dust scattered through the air, and a wave of overwhelming mana surged, leaving her breathless. But what emerged was not the mindless undead she had expected—it was a handsome young man, casually perched atop the coffin, his piercing gaze meeting hers.

With a bright, disarming smile, he introduced himself—but Alice soon realized the truth: this was no ordinary man. He was the legendary figure who, centuries ago, had plunged the world into chaos and terror... the Demon King himself.
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Long-Awaited Feelings
description:
During the wedding of the famous actress, Jing Xiu, Weibo was flooded instead by the shocking headline "New Hit Actress Ji Youyan Dies of Alcohol Poisoning". The headlines were soon changed when the wedding was called off... for reasons unknown.

Ji Youyan suddenly wakes up three years back in time, two years after she broke up with Jing Xiu. This time, she swears to never lose her again...
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Gate 0: Jieitai Ginzai Nite Kaku Tatakaeri
description: In the summer of 20XX, a "gate to another world"' suddenly appeared in Ginza, Tokyo. What came pouring in from inside was a mysterious army and a group of hideous monsters. They go around slaughtering people, and Ginza in broad daylight quickly turns into a hellscape. While everyone was helplessly thrown into confusion in this state of emergency, there was one man who was brave enough to move around. That man was Yohji Itami, an otaku Self-Defense Force officer who would later be called the "Hero of Nijubashi"!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Adventure, Military, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: INNU - Girl Meets Dog
description:
Violent Action Comedy about a talking stray pug who's waiting for someone to pick him up from the streets. He happens to save a young woman from rape & abduction and the girl agrees to take him in aftwards. As it turns out, she's not a normal girl but a yakuza clan daughter. Luckily, the pug isn't a regular dog either, but a super strong badass fighter.  

(Synopsis by Manga Mogura)
tags: Action, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Mafia, Military, Delinquents

name: Super Ninja Dan
description: The Kyosha and Jinma clans are ninja organizations living in the modern age. They were called "super ninja," or "super shinobi." However, these two clans have been fighting a fierce battle to exterminate each other. Why? The unique tag team of Tetsu Kariya and Kazuhiko Shimamoto unleash a painful work!
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Police, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Creep In
description: They come for three reasons: to say hello, to like you, or to harm you.
tags: Thriller, Ghosts, Long Strip, Horror, Full Color

name: Saint Seiya: Saint Mariya
description: Mariya enters Graad Academy and looks forward to her school life. However, something strange occurs in the auditorium due to a mysterious evil action... A new galactic myth is now born in a girl's manga! The Cosmos burns in flames! The war for the Sacred Cloth begins!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magical Girls, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Tonari no Wakazo
description: Araki is a serious and proper type gay guy. Honest, older men are his type. Even then, the guy who moved in next door is Araki's most hated type, a flashy guy called Higata. That Higata told Araki, "I feel good when I'm with you," and suddenly kissed him. Although he doesn't like him, Araki gets excited--!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life

name: Kuroneko no Ohanashi
description:
This is a story about a black cat who became a cat girl.

---

Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/M_terU116/status/1816775907320955112)
tags: Animals, Comedy, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Digimon Tamers
description:
When three Digimon fans – Rika, Henry, and our lead Takato – suddenly find themselves with "real" Digimon, they discover a living creature under your care is far harder to deal with than a few pixels on your TV screen. The kids try to be Digimon 'Tamers,' aka Digimon caretakers, but they all seem to have different opinions on what that should entail. Rika thinks Digimon should fight, Henry thinks they should never fight, and Takato … seems to be somewhere in the middle.  
  
Being a Tamer isn't just about believing one thing or another. It's about learning and adjusting for the good of everyone else. But they have a long way to go, and their problems are just beginning.

(The English translation is based off the script from the FoxKids version of the anime.)
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Tsuma ga Kanpeki Sugiru node, Chotto Midashite Ii desuka?
description: Rikuto, an illustrator, and his wife Natsuki, a civil servant, have been married for a week. Their newlywed life has only just begun. His wife is too perfect in every way, but Rikuto can't forget the way he once saw her in a disheveled state. He wants to see her again in a disheveled state somehow, but he always ends up being defeated!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: I Became the Demon King's Right Hand so I'm Corrupting the Story
description: Office Lady falls from a building is reincarnated into another world and ends up at the Devil Kings castle. Can she save him from the bad ending?
tags: Demons, Romance, Office Workers, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: GIRLS und PANZER - DARJEELING FIRST FLUSH (Doujinshi)
description: GIRLS und PANZER FAN BOOK DARJEELING FIRST FLUSH
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Girls' Love, Military, Doujinshi

name: Kikaijikake no Marie
description:
Marie gets hired to be a maid. But not just any maid… A robot maid!? How will she get through her new life pretending to be an emotionless mechanical maid? A manga full of comedy and romance!  
  
Starts with a one-shot, and has been officially serialized in LaLa magazine.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kagaku-bu Girl
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic

name: My Bias Gets On The Last Train
description:
“Meeting her on the last train again today, if only I could talk to her!”
College student Lee Yeowoon works late and takes the last train every night.
Each time, he runs into Shin Haein, a woman carrying a guitar. As if by chance, as if by fate,
the two keep meeting and discover that their favorite artist is the indie musician “Long Afternoon.” They gradually grow closer and so the story began.
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Full Color

name: The Great Wizard Transcendent
description:
Mikhail Walpurgis, the world’s only 9th-circle Archmage, fell in battle due to a damned hero, and managed to cast one final advanced magic spell, <TIME REVERSAL>. As time rewound, he regressed to 20 years ago.

“Fine. I’ll just become the hero instead.”

---
**Original Web Novel:** [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56670766), [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=8348905), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/777105040)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%9A%8C%EA%B7%80%EB%A1%9C-%EC%B4%88%EC%9B%94%ED%95%98%EB%8A%94-%EB%8C%80%EB%A7%88%EB%8F%84%EC%82%AC/3039), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/60328750)

tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Nabakari Bitch to Incubus
description: Yumeshi, an introverted incubus, is unexpectedly ordered by his succubus mother to "lose his virginity." In a state of confusion, he decides to approach a girl in his class who has a reputation for being a troublemaker. However, he soon discovers that this girl has a surprisingly troubled and innocent past of her own...!?
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: After-School Secret Club
description: Yuichi Nekota enters the giant school city "Private Eucalyptus Leaf Academy". Excited about his new life, he meets Chitose Arikasaki, a girl who investigates the mysteries of the school! The two form the 'After School Secret Club', and today they continue their search for the truth!
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Deserted Place
description:
The story follows the journey of a mysterious boy who brings peace to deserted places and things…  
  
—-  
Uploader's note: Published in Gothic Lolita Bible which doesn't focus on manga, so it has no target demographics.
tags: Oneshot, Fantasy

name: Natsukashi Machi no Rozione
description: Intent on being an independent young woman, high schooler Himeyuka lives on her own in an unremarkable apartment complex in a corner of the city. But one day, she discovers her ordinary building has turned into something extraordinary! Her beloved castle is covered in childish scribbles - both inside and out! And waiting for her at the end of this rainbow-colored messis the perpetrator of the crime: a little boy named Rozione, who seems to know quite a bit about Himeyuka, though she has no idea who he is. Is he really just someone's lost child, or is there a greater mystery behind his appearance?
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy

name: Not All Girls Are Stupid
description:
Collection of short stories.   
  
"Fun After School" is a two-part one-shot that tells about the relationship between Iwata Megumi, the idol of Chofu High School, and Midorikawa Mayuko, also known as Miss Chofu High School. When another student takes a picture of the two of them in an intimate moment, what lengths will Megumi go to to get the picture and negative?  
  
"School Days" centers around a girl named Misaki who hates the co-ed school she was forced to transfer to and desperately misses her best friend from the girls' school she used to attend.
tags: Anthology, Reverse Harem, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Majo no Hanaya-san
description:
Allie Abel, a girl who came from the countryside wishing to become a witch who can make people happy with magic, meets Yoshino-York, an unusual witch who sells ordinary flowers and believes that "people can be happy without relying on magic". Allie, who has been assigned to work at Yoshino's florist as an apprentice witch, is now making "happiness" that was supposed to come true through magic come true with her own hands...?　

A heroine fantasy of flowers and magic that will bring a little smile to your face!
tags: Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Oresama Teacher
description:
Kurosaki Mafuyu was a juvenile delinquent and head of her gang before her subsequent arrest got her expelled from high school. Now that she's transferred to a new high school, she's determined to become an "ultra-shiny, super feminine high school student." But with a new friend like Hayasaka-kun and a homeroom teacher like Saeki Takaomi (who may be more than he seems), will Mafuyu really be able to live a girly-girl high school life?  
  
**Official Oresama Teacher PV:**  
  
<https://youtu.be/3kzHDkGI_Y8>
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Martial Arts, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life, Delinquents

name: My Long Distance Girlfriend Came to Visit me.
description: A short story by Niichi for Comiket 101.
tags: Romance, Doujinshi, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: I Got a Girlfriend From a Shooting Star
description: What do I do if I like girls? I wished upon a shooting star, not expecting it to be granted straight away… so why did a spirit suddenly appear before me?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Uchuujin no Kakushigoto
description:
The girl I fell in love with is… an alien!? I, the class president, happened to fall in love with my classmate, the eccentric Haru. I confessed my feelings, but her true identity was an alien who came to Earth to survey it.

“I still like you!”

I started going out with Haru, but now I have a further “secret” to keep…
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama, School Life, Aliens, Tragedy

name: Watashi ga Koibito ni Nareru Wake Naijan, Muri Muri! (Muri Janakatta!?)
description:
Longing to be a normie, I, Renako Amaori, am finally making my high school debut after working so hard for it. However due to my communication impairment, I have a gloomy aura. And after being in the normie group day in day out, I got so exhausted and said “I can't do this anymore,” and reached my limit!

During that time, I accidentally met the top student of our school. Perfect in face and figure, unrivaled in sword and pen, our school's best high school girl: Mai Odzuka.
We found in each other someone who we could open to and talk about our own troubles. What a nice friend I made, now I can surely get back on my own feet…is what I thought!

"It seems that you, even as a girl, have made me fall in love with you."
What!? Mai suddenly confessed to me. Wait! What about our friendship?

And so, we now have different feelings we can’t tell each other: friendship or a romantic relationship. We’re now presenting each other its benefits and put them into practice to see what kind of relationship works best for us. Will I succeed with a successful high school life…?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Harem, School Life, Adaptation

name: Pandora's Cube
description:
Story about friendship and truth, with of course, a supernatural box.  
Begins in a middle school where a mysterious box appears before some boys.  
  
Italian/Italiano:  
Kazuya Ooshiba è uno studente delle medie gentile e disponibile. Di questo si approfitta Ryouji, suo "amico" sin dall'infanzia, che da un pò di tempo aveva iniziato a comportarsi in maniera sgarbata nei suoi confronti. A sostenere moralmente il nostro Kazuya, però, c'è un altro suo caro amico d'infanzia:Kou.  
Un giorno Ryouji scopre che nella stanza di arte vi è uno strano cubo e per fare un dispetto a Kazuya, lo rinchiude lì dentro. Quando, però, Kou lo farà uscire di lì nel tardo pomeriggio, il cubo richiamerà Ryouji chiudendolo all'interno e minacciando la sua morte. Inizia così il disperato tentativo di Kazuya di salvare non solo il suo compagno, ma anche il valore dell'amicizia che li legava…
tags: Oneshot, School Life, Fantasy

name: Natsume Arata no Kekkon
description:
Arata Natsume works at a child guidance center, is in his thirties and single with no plans for marriage. But one day, he receives a request from the child he was in charge of, Takuto, to "meet the criminal who killed his father". That serial killer is Shinagawa Shinju, also known as “The Shinagawa Pierrot”.

Won the 70th Shougakukan Manga Award.
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Gore, Drama, Mystery

name: Supicious Convenience Store!?
description:
In a quirky convenience store known for having everything, a weary cashier faces a daily parade of strange customers.

"Damn it, and it's minimum wage too!", the cashier complains while ringing up a di*do.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Philosophical, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: GTO Paradise Lost
description:
The next stage for Great Teacher Onizuka Eikichi is a prison!

Arrested due to an incident caused in his class, one that he was made assistant teacher of only six months ago! A newly established performing arts class at Kissho Academy High School, created for students who work in various media industries! Onizuka, who says he has no regrets whatsoever, quietly begins to tell the truth of the incident in prison.

At last the decades-spanning story of Eikichi Onizuka comes to a dramatic conclusion!

*Due to a change in publishers this series ended at chapter 178.5 and continued on as "GTO: Paradise Lost Kai" (listed under the "Related" tab), picking up where the story left off.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Delinquents

name: The Story of the Gatekeeper
description:
"I am a gatekeeper. I guard a very old castle…"  
  
A lone gatekeeper stands watch outside of the Lost Castle. All who enter the castle he never sees again but he cannot warn them for he is cursed. Then one day a beautiful girl wants to enter! What will the gatekeeper do? What is the secret of the castle?
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Fantasy

name: Terror
description: Every day, without fail, on the stroke of midnight, she comes…
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Dark Gathering
description: Keitarou, who's always had a disposition for attracting spirits, gets hired as a tutor for a little girl named Yayoi who can see spirits and is searching for the spirit that took away her mother.
tags: Action, Ghosts, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Lies of the Sheriff Evans: Dead or Love
description: The story follows lawman Elmore Evans, who despite being one of the most amazing gunslingers in the West can't get rid of his bad luck in his romantic life.
tags: Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Police, Slice of Life

name: TS Siblings
description:
Meet the Suehiro siblings: older brother Kazuki and little sister Mio. One day, their father created a potion that causes them to swap sexes. 

Now they’re big sister Kazuki and little brother Mio. What antics will they get into next?
tags: Genderswap, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, School Life

name: I'm Stuck on the Same Day for a Thousand Years
description:
Wu Chen transmigrated to a new world, Got trapped on the day of July 7, 2020, Constantly reincarnating! He used to indulge himself doing all sorts of evil things while running wild in despair, but every new day, everything would start all over again. In this way, he has been reincarnated for a thousand years, and on a new day, the sun rose as usual.
——The time is: July 8, 2020
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Buttobase! Magical Reading★
description: This is a story about the apprentice witch Koko and her partner the beastman wizard Gracia, both working hard to learn the power of magic.
tags: Magic, Fantasy

name: Love Lab
description:
Love Lab is set in Fujisaki Girls Academy, which is known for their school body being composed of very prim and proper middle school students. The most prominent one of them is Natsuo Maki, the student council president who is admired by her classmates for her calm and polite demeanor, and her profound beauty. On the other hand, Riko Kurahashi is also admired, but due to her having a very forward and boyish personality.   
  
One day, Riko accidentally walks into Maki when she is kissing a body pillow with a picture of a guy for practice, and learns that she is not as collected as everyone thinks she is. Riko is forced into keeping Maki's secret and joins her in practicing romance activities such as holding hands and more, and in the middle of all that mess, somehow smoothly running a student council regardless!
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Hyouka
description:
Oreki Houtarou is an "energy-saver" kind of guy, who expends as little energy as possible to do only things he has to. When he starts high school, his older sister sends him a letter asking him to join the Classics Club. The club meant a lot to her, and its number of members has been reduced to zero.  
  
Houtarou reluctantly signs up for the club, only to find that someone else has joined, too! She's Chitanda Eru, a cute, big-eyed girl with an overwhelming sense of curiosity. A mystery crops up that catches Eru's interest, and also draws in Houtarou's friend, Fukube Satoshi. They continue solving mundane mysteries together, and soon they draw in Satoshi and Houtarou's friend, Ibara Mayaka, as well. Mayaka has had a blatant crush on Satoshi since middle school, but he always fends off her advances. Together, they search for the truth in a mystery that involves the history of the Classics Club.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery, Adaptation

name: 2 Saisa no Osananajimi
description:
Feelings that have remain unchanged from back then...

Please be aware of me soon!

When did he become so cool……! No, no, there's no way!

I thought he was just a normal cute "little brother"-like childhood friend, but
6 years later he……
tags: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Otaku-kun no Seiheki wo Isshou Yugamete Iku Ishuzoku Musume-tachi
description: The main character, Otaku-kun, is awakened to his special sexual proclivities through a series of happening interactions with girls of different races! Can you keep your reason?
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Harem, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Watashi Dake ga Miyaji Miyuki wo Aishiteiru
description:
Miyaji Miyuki (16) moved away when she was little, not long after going on a spree of proposing to several different girls in kindergarten.

Years later, she returns to her hometown and transfers to a new high school, where she is forced to reckon with her past...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Harem, School Life

name: Shokei Sareta Kenja wa Lich ni Tensei Shite Shinryaku Sensou wo Hajimaru
description: The Sage Dwight, he along with the Hero defeated the Demon Lord who sank the world into darkness. However, they were falsely accused of becoming the next Demon Lords because of his power, and were thrown to The Valley of the Dead to die... But though his flesh has rotten away, he lives on as a skeleton because of his grudge against the world. Dwight has vowed to deny that wrong world, and with a power that surpasses even the Demon King of the past, and also leading countless Skeletons he's going to start an all out war...!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Zombies, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Haikyu!! - K-yama-kun's Boyfriend Power (Doujinshi)
description: Kenma and Kuroo help Hinata on a mission of love... A mission to find out just where in the world Kageyama-kun gets his Boyfriend Power from!
tags: Oneshot, Boys' Love, Sports, Doujinshi, School Life

name: Fire Emblem Engage
description: Ryuuru, a divine dragon in human form, wakes up from a long sleep with no memory. People say that Ryuuru is a hero who fought against an evil dragon that threatened the world 1000 years ago, but... He is confused by the people's reverence and expectations, and the shadows of battle and deception once again loom over him.
tags: Video Games, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Scholar's Reincarnation
description:
A martial artist, claiming himself to be a "murderer" is defeated by a suicide attack in battle and is reborn as a first born child to a local lord. Having a fresh start, a warm family and a little sister to protect - he decides to become a better person in his new life.

---
- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EC%9E%AC%EC%83%9D/2121)
---

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/34746)

- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Reinkarnasi-Sang-Pendekar/3329)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: I Want to Kill the Yandere Prince Everyday
description: Trouble brews for a sucker for pretty faces! A dirt-poor commoner and ray of sunshine, Jiang Jiao Jiao(straight guy) falls for Zhong Ming Yu's (male) looks at first sight! After an unexpected accident, the once cold and aloof young lord has transformed into a dainty, fragile ["Little Sister Lin"](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lin_Daiyu), even using his good looks to win the affections of the other party!! However, as their relationship deepens, Jiang Jiao Jiao begins to uncover Ming Yu’s dark, obsessive tendencies and a massive family secret spanning two generations...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Akuyaku Reijou Level 99: Watashi wa UraBoss desu ga Maou de wa Arimasen
description:
I reincarnated as the "Villainess Eumiella" from an RPG Otome game. In the main story, Eumiella is merely a side character, but after the ending, she re-enters the story as the Hidden Boss, a character boasting high stats on par with the heroes! 

Lighting a fire in my gamer's soul, and taking advantage of being left on my own in my parent's territory, I trained, trained, and trained! As a result of my training… by the time I enrolled in the academy, I managed to reach level 99. 

Though I had planned to live out my days as inconspicuously and peacefully as possible, soon after entering the school, I'm suspected by the Heroine and Love Interests of being the "Demon Lord"…?  
  
Based on a popular web novel of seeking a peaceful life, a fantasy story of the strongest villainess!

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/46067)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Gosu
description:
A young man set forth to avenge his master, a once powerful martial artist who was betrayed by his own men and barely escaped with his life. Armed with his master's supreme martial art techniques, he is ready to bring terror and wreak havoc among the murim. But before he even got started, he learns that the ones who had betrayed his master are already dead… Erm, so what happens now?

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000412)

- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/gaoshou/list?title_no=764)

- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/gaoshou/list?title_no=759)
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Window of Orpheus
description:
The story begins in Europe, during the first years of the XX century. On a background of intrigues, machinations and a Europe that is going strait toward World War I, three kids meet at a strict conservatory in Germany. Julius met Isaac at the famous Orpheus' Window and later in another event met Klaus there. The legend told that two lovers met at Orpheus' Window would end in unhappiness. But Julius met two different persons, and they didn't know Julius' secret. In fact, Julius is a woman who's forced to dress up and pretend to be a guy. But she isn't the only one who has secrets. Klaus, for example, is Russian. Is he a communist spy? Then the whirlwind of fate began.

Note: Has a gaiden known as Collage. Additional gaiden were written by Ikeda, but illustrated by her longtime assistant Erika Miyamoto.
tags: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Crossdressing, Drama, Tragedy

name: Itoko no Onee-chan ni Amaechau?
description: Masato Ooizumi just entered high school and he finds himself staying with a relative. Living there is his "big sister cousin" who's being way too close with him!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Incest

name: Choroi Otokonoko no Ohanashi
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, Incest, Crossdressing, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Shinmai Ossan Boukensha, Saikyou Party ni Shinu hodo Kitaerarete Muteki ni Naru.
description:
It is common knowledge that it is best to become an adventurer when you are as young as possible, because the magical power that is the basis of an adventurer's strength will hardly grow if you don't train it while you are young. But this man, Rick Gladiator, who became an adventurer when he was over thirty years old, had the combat power of an S-rank adventurer, the highest rank in the world. In fact, Rick has lived an unimaginable life with the members of the legendary Orihalcon Fist, a party of the continent's strongest adventurers. From dragons to vampires, Rick's fighting prowess, trained by his literally "monster" mentors, allows him to defeat elite adventurers one after another who try to underestimate him.
___
**Character Designer:** [Tea](https://mangadex.org/author/71d4c549-2476-4803-a9c2-c48a15cc0fd4)
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kimidake wo Tabesasete
description: In this world, there are people called "forks" and "cakes". Oga has had a dull sense of taste since childhood. But one day, he notices that his friend Keisuke, whom he met through an online game, gives off a sweet, delicious scent. The juice Keisuke puts in his mouth tastes delicious, and his sweat is sweeter than anything he's ever tasted. And he learns that beings like himself are called "forks"... He just wants to have fun with the friend he's become close with, but he can't suppress the urge to taste that exquisite sweetness again--!?
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life

name: Gokufuri Kyohi Shite Tesaguri Start! Tokka Shinai Healer, Nakama to Wakarete Tabi ni Deru
description:
Many people suddenly find themselves in a white, empty space, where a God-like figure tells them that they are to be reincarnated and sent to an isekai known as Tesla. They are given a limited number of points to spend in various attributes, such as their race and abilities, which will determine their reincarnation into Tesla.

The story follows a young boy sent there along with his clanmates from an MMORPG, and they plan to stick together and specialize into different skills, just like they did in-game. Although his clanmates and everyone else sent there are strangely accepting of the situation, he finds it too suspicious and decides to go his own separate way, balancing his points out to be an all-rounder instead of a healer.

He leisurely goes about life in Tesla as an adventurer, but it slowly starts to seem like there was a reason behind them being sent there…  

---  
  
- [Web Novel](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/1177354054885201112) (Raw)
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: I'm No Heroine!
description:
A girl obsessed with a novel suddenly finds herself transported into the thick of the plot. The problem is, she has taken on the role of the villain in the story. And she knows how this ends… it's off with her head! Maybe she'll just let this play out and wake up back in reality… But after a few too many deaths to no avail, it's finally time to go off-script. She's going to have a little fun with this tale. She's made up her mind… to live!

---
