tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Looking for a New Husband
description:
Riat, caught up in her husband's treason, faces death.

After repeatedly returning to the past at the cost of half her lifespan, she finally breaks the cycle by offering her husband’s head to the emperor.

With only 1 year and 3 months left to live, her one wish is—

"I’m going to fall in love."

At last, an announcement spreads across the entire empire: a competition to find Riat’s new husband, with a grand prize of 1 billion gold.

Candidates begin to flood in, but suspicious figures also start gathering around her…
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Undead Unluck (Official Colored)
description: Fuuko is an UNLUCKY girl that causes bad luck to anyone she touches. As she prepares to face her death, Andy, an UNDEAD who desperately wants to die appears before her! Realizing her potential, he decides to use Fuuko's power to gives himself a permanent death, but then a certain organization goes after them…
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Official Colored, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Zombies, Martial Arts, Drama, Supernatural

name: Bigger Mountain?
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Drama

name: Mousou Shoujo
description: At first sight Jun seems like a hot vamp, however her sexy look is a complete lie. In reality she is a very shy wallflower. But what's even worse: She is still a virgin! In desperation, she seeks refuge in her erotic daydreams which always turn into some odd situations. And if that wasn't enough, she also finds out that the man of her dreams lives nearby.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Toudou-kun Chi no Maid Shota
description:
Rennosuke, a scion of the influential Toudou Group, has a terrible relationship with his family. He spends his days getting told off by his father and older sister, who say things like "Did you get into a fight again?" "Having a delinquent for a son of the Toudou family is an embarrassment". 
One day, Rennosuke chances upon a hungry child. The sight of that child hungrily devouring a piece of bread reminds Rennosuke of the dog he once owned, and he asks half-jokingly "If you don't have anywhere to go, why don't you come to my place?".  The child then comes to the Toudou house and starts working as a maid.
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Shota, Slice of Life

name: How We End
description: Walking aimlessly through the ruins of civilization, life had never been better for Lya and Renard. In their world filled with rubble and rain, a faint streak of sunshine can light the darkest streets. Side by side, in search of food, they embark on an endless journey towards the center of the city. Sharing both the warm and cold, the siblings rediscover the disintegrating remnants of humanity.
tags: Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Post-Apocalyptic, Philosophical, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Ayakashi Triangle
description:
Ever since he was a boy, Matsuri Kazamaki has worked as an exorcist. Because his childhood friend Suzu Kanade attracts malicious spirits called ayakashi like moths to a flame, Matsuri is tasked with slaying any with ill intentions.   
  
One day, an ayakashi named Shirogane notices the budding romance between these two childhood friends. Eager to both devour Suzu and foil Matsuri’s chance at love, he performs a forbidden spell…  
  
The newest series by Kentaro Yabuki, creator of Black Cat and artist behind To Love Ru and Darling in the Franxx.
Visit the official [website](https://www.shonenjump.com/j/rensai/ayakashi.html) for latest news! English Volume release [licensed](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/ayakashi-triangle/) by Seven Seas.
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Martial Arts, Crossdressing, Magic, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Aekanaru
description: Sadai, looking for a place to die, headed deep into the mountains. There he encountered a mysterious and gentle girl who had lived alone in an abandoned village for 150 years, continuing to serve an intangible god. A man that had failed to die and a widow with a graceful aura — from the remains of their wasted lives, the two of them begin a new chapter of their story.
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Toad's Blood
description:
A man is entwined and captured by a glamorous yet bizarre, deep-seated terror.

The gears of a young man with a promising future go a little out of order when he meets a certain woman. The genius Yoko Kondo vividly visualizes the decadent ghost stories recorded in the masterpiece collection of ghost stories "Kurameshu" by Kotaro Tanaka, the master of ghost story literature.
tags: Historical, Horror, Supernatural

name: 1 Retweet Or 1 Like Will Extend This Girl's Short Life By 1 Year
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Study Group
description:
Gamin Yoon, a 17 year old student, goes to a school known to harbor future criminals. Stuck in a carnivorous environment where only the strongest survive, he struggles to get good grades to enter a 4 year university. But, will he be able to study well enough to enter university, or will he get involved in the unending fights around the school?  


---

[Official Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/CAMPUS/pizixueba/list?title_no=1467)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Gakuen Idolm@ster - P ga P Shitemasu (Doujinshi)
description:
It's a story of cute idols and their Producer. Kotone-chan is cute!
A compilation of Gakumas doujin manga.
tags: 4-Koma, Doujinshi, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Houseki no Kuni (Minimalist Color)
description: In the distant future, a new life form called Houseki (gems) are born. The 28 Houseki must fight against the moon dwellers who want to attack them and turn them into decorations, thus each gem is assigned a role such as a fighter or a medic. Though they hope to fight the moon dwellers, Phos is a gem who is given no assignment until the gems' master Adamantine asks them to write an encyclopedia.
tags: Action, Fan Colored, Adventure, Drama, Mystery

name: When The Full Moon Rises
description: We just broke up but we live together? Coming Soon April 27th.
tags: Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Juunenme, Kikan wo Akirameta Tenisha wa Imasara Shujinkou ni naru
description:
Ten years after being transported to another world.

It was more than enough time to awaken from what at first, felt like an exciting fantasy dream world. And on this 10th year Wasa Tooru gives up searching for a way to return to Japan, after being unsuccessful for so long. It was then that a job offer found its way to him — it was to be the bodyguard of twins who have knowledge of Earth.
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Shimatsuya Soji
description: Not found
tags: Sci-Fi, Action

name: Mayoi Neko Overrun!
description: The story revolves around Takumi Tsuzuki, a boy who lives with his older "sister" Otome, although the two have no blood ties between them. Otome manages a run-down confectionery store called Stray Cats. One day, Otome picks up a mysterious beautiful girl off the streets.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Densha ni Nottekita Tondemonai Onna
description:
**Link:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/gggrande/status/1666736118233174016)
tags: Oneshot, Web Comic

name: Sonic the Hedgehog (DS)
description:
A lighthearted adventure series based off then-current Sonic games, changing focus nearly every year. Games covered in story arcs include:  
  
- Sonic Unleashed  
- Sonic & The Black Knight  
- Sonic Chronicles  
- Sonic Colors  
- Sonic Generations
tags: Action, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Adaptation

name: The Demon King's Daughter Is Way Too Easy
description: In the final showdown between the Demon King and the Hero, the latter used all his power to seal away the former. To exact her revenge on her father's nemesis, the Demon King's daughter, Hel, resurrected the Hero and planned to use him as her personal servant. However, the resurrected Hero is unexpectedly dazzling and dashing, and Hel's composure begins to waver. Will she ever be able to torment her new servant?
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Fantasy

name: Net Keijiban Hyaku Monogatari Series
description: Featuring eerie urban legends that became popular on the internet, faithfully adapted into comics by skilled authors. A true horror anthology for urban legends!
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Yume no Shizuku, Kin no Torikago
description:
Beginning of 16th century – Alexandra was captured by slave traders from Ukraine during one of their many raids. When the traders arrived in Greece to sell the female slaves, a young handsome man named Mateus bought her and promised to give her true freedom. He hired countless teachers, scholars, and palace ladies to train her into the most perfect woman of her time. Mateus's kindness has caused Alexandra to deeply fall in love with him, and she secretly wishes to be his concubine. But Mateus has already promised her to his best friend... Suleiman the Great, Emperor of the Ottoman Empire! What does freedom mean when you are in another man's harem and can only look at the one you love from afar?

Not willing to endure agony, Alexandra promises herself that one day she will free both of them from their bird cages... but Mateus is the Grand Vizier, power only second to the Emperor himself. So Alexandra must become the most influential concubine in order to have any hope which also means, bearing Suleiman's son. However, Suleiman already has a son by another concubine, and this woman is determined to keep her son as the only prince.
tags: Historical, Romance, Drama

name: Bakuon Rettou
description: In the 80s, Kaze Takashi's parents moved to a quiet area in Tokyo to protect their son from the bad influence of his friends. In class, Takashi doesn't wait to make new friends. Passionate for motorcycle rallies, they invite Takashi to join the next event. It became a revelation for the young man and he decides to join a biker gang! Now all that's left is to find a motorbike…
tags: Psychological, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Inari no Kekkon
description: Not found
tags: Loli, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Osanajimi Senpai wa Kizukanai
description: Not found
tags: Web Comic

name: Shitennou Sai Jakudatta Ore. Tensei Shitanode Heionna Seikatsu wo Nozomu
description:
Ranga was an ogre. However, he was also a strong ogre. Strong enough that he became one of the four most elite demons in the whole land. And, as with many other stories, his comrades betray him. Upon his death, he reincarnates as a normal human. Now, with all of the knowledge and strength of his former life, what do you think he’ll do with this new opportunity?

a) Live a peaceful life
b) Live a slow life
c) Do whatever he wants


---

**Links:**
- [Original Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9030ey)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Blue Giant
description:
A high school 3rd year student, Miyamoto Dai, whose heart was touched by Jazz, continued to play the Saxophone alone in Kawahara, rain or shine, day or night, for many years. "I want to become the world's best Saxophone player…!!" Effort, talent, faith, environment, luck…which are necessary? A tale of reaching towards his goal recklessly and sincerely begins in Hirosegawa, Sendai.  

[Official Site](https://bluegiant.jp/) 

---
- English release by [Seven Seas Entertainment](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/blue-giant/)  
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics (2018)

---
- **Won the 62nd Shogakukan Manga Award for General Manga**
- **Won the 20th Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize for Manga**
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: Obsessed With Shuelina
description:
Shuelina has only ever wanted to be loved as she grew up in an orphanage.
But after her birth father rejected her in a previous life, she tries to find a family who will accept her in this one.
Luckily, Archduke Bylot and his sons fall for her indomitable spirit, and they shower her with the love she has longed for.
But once they find out she's the long-lost imperial princess, can she be a part of their family?
Or will she have to go back to the people who sent her away in the first place?

(Source: Tapas)

___
Alternative Raw: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/-/4185)
Official JP translation: [Piccoma](https://jp.piccoma.com/web/product/173647)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Funsou deshitara Hatta made
description: When ethnicities, languages and thoughts mingle together, there's no way of avoiding conflicts. Now of course, if you change your place of residence, the nature of conflicts that occur will also change! Therefore, Hatta Yuri a geopolitical risk consultant tries to solve the ethnic problems in Southeast Asia, the terrible incidents that occur in Africa, and the corporate problems that occur in Europe!?
tags: Action, Crime, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: The Chest
description: Think you know how it ends? Think again. Jump into this psychological thriller anthology packed with unexpected twists.
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, Horror, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Lady Devil
description:
"Devil, I don't want to marry him."

In hopes to escape a forced marriage, Giovinetta makes a wish to the devil to save her, but what she doesn't know are the consequences of her actions.

---
The lady trapped in the tower is being forced into a marriage. Her husband has killed or exiled his previous wives several times. The frightened princess eventually wakes up the sarcophagus in the basement and calls out the devil....

"I don't want to marry him, Raven."

---
Notice: This story is ***not*** incest.

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://manta.net/series/1165)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc32223)
* Japanese / 日本語: [Comico](https://www.comico.jp/comic/8141), [Mecha Comics](https://sp.comics.mecha.cc/books/141901)
tags: Historical, Demons, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Mata Korosarete Shimatta no desu ne, Tantei-sama
description: High school student Sakuya Otsuki, whose father is a legendary detective, works as a half-baked detective alongside his beautiful and talented assistant Lilithea. However, due to Sakuya's "special constitution" and a request that comes in one day, they become embroiled in a major incident, and their fates change dramatically.
tags: Thriller, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Trigun Maximum
description:
Vash the Stampede rises again! It's been two years since the mysterious and super-nice gunman went into hiding, and the people of his desert planet are suffering. It takes a friend in peril to bring him out, and when he does, his enemies come chasing… as well as those crazy insurance girls, Millie and Meryl. And Wolfwood the wandering priest? Well, that's who found him in the first place! The gang's all back, and the trouble is coming in Trigun Maximum.

Notes:
 - Nightow changed publishers to Shonen Gahosha and the series continued to be serialized in Young King Ours magazine. Due to the original publisher retaining the name Trigun, Nightow had to change the title to Trigun Maximum, which isn´t a sequel but a new name for the rest of the series. 
- The first 3 volumes were published under the title 'Trigun' and the entire series compiled into 14 books as 'Trigun Maximum' (the numbering was also restarted when the title changed).
 - Won the Seiun Award at the 48th Japan Science Fiction Conventionwere for the best comic of the year.
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural

name: U19
description:
Year 2036, Japan is under the adult party power and make children's life miserable. But for "rebelious-edgy-teenager-with-funny-scar" Kudo Eiji, It doesn't matter because he has his childhood friend Akari to cheer his everyday life. For Eiji, Akari is his emontional mainstay. Someone that can make him calm.  
  
But then, one day adult party decide took Akari and transfer her to another school. It emotionaly stress Eiji out. Little did Eiji know, this awaken some power inside him.
tags: Action, Romance, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Risou no Kanojo
description: Saeki is an ordinary high school boy with a girlfriend, Sara, who is the heiress of the Saionji Group, and whose beauty and intelligence are the envy of everyone. Sara seems like a prim and proper young lady to other people, but the two share a secret! Because of the secret, Saeki can't fully commit, but Sara prepares lunch for him, she hugs him to deepen their relationship, and she acts like she's trying to seduce Saeki to corrupt him!!!? What is the secret of their relationship and what is Sara's true purpose...!!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Head Start at Birth
description:
This is a tale of Lilia with her new game cheat as she becomes known as the marquess' daughter who is a genius at both magic and territorial management. Having been born with memories of her past life intact and after learning that the world that she has been reborn in has magic, Lilia's past life's gamer spirit can't help but go on full blast!

She started leveling up even from when she was only a 0 year old baby who could only babble! Thanks to that, by the time she was 5 years old, not only could she already use high-grade magic, she also had high ranking spirits serving her. She even exhibited great capability in managing the marquess' territory!

No matter if this world were an RPG or a farming game, this cheat is surely unbeatable! And that was what Lilia was thinking until she had suddenly caught the attention of the royal family and was even invited to the royal capital to celebrate her birthday. Who would have thought she would actually raise a political marriage flag with the princes, just like in an otome game?! Just please let me at least not be a villainous noble lady!!!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0024fu/)

[Original Web Publication](http://piccoma.com/web/product/54663)

**Official English Translations:** [Pocket Comics](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7459?languageCode=en), [Renta!](https://www.ebookrenta.com/renta/sc/frm/item/143867)
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The Beastly Count After Dark
description: Violetta, striving to support her sister after losing their parents, encounters Theobald, an enigmatic aristocrat who irrevocably alters her life. Taking on the role as Theobald's maid, Violetta navigates treacherous waters filled with political intrigue and forbidden desires. As Violetta and Theobald's relationship deepens amidst a backdrop of betrayal and manipulation, Violetta grapples with her conflicting loyalties and the moral ambiguity of her role as both confidante and pawn in a dangerous game.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kenkyuu Dai-Meikyuu: Laborinth
description:
When Hitsuji Hitsuji finally gets into her dream art school, she discovers "Laborinth," a bizarre club building on campus.
Legend has it that those who enter this cursed labyrinth never return...
Get ready for an extraordinary tale of the mysterious club building, brought to you by the brilliant mind of Kuurodakosei!

Source: MangaPlus
tags: Oneshot

name: The Superhuman Era
description:
When the xenoterran invasion began, the only ones who stood between us and the monstrous creatures were the superhumans. But while some chose to use this power for good, others had more sinister intentions. Kang Lim is a high school student with a secret -- he’s the vigilante superhero known as the White Cap, fighting back the mysterious monsters whenever he can. But the world he protects isn’t what it seems -- there is more to the emergence of the xenoterran than meets the eye, and strange forces are at play in the shadows...

---

**Links:**
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/chaorendeshidai/list?title_no=1604)
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/theeraofoverman/list?title_no=2877)
- [Official Indonesian Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/id/action/overman/list?title_no=1743)

tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Superhero, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Once again, The Noble Consort Yields Herself to the Enemy
description:
[Airhead x Brooding Ice Queen]. 
“I exchanged bodies with my mortal foe, only to discover that she’s with child?!”
Faced with no choice but to carry the baby on behalf of Noble Lady Ning, Noble Consort Qiao seethes with rage every day. More absurd still, this devious, conniving Noble Lady has the audacity to harbor feelings for me?!
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: A Little Sister with Squishy Cheeks
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Goblin's Night
description:
“The complex of the boy, Choi Si-woo, is being overweight. Choi Si-woo runs and runs around his house until past midnight, and he encounters an old man on a walking trail. In the blink of an eye, the old man covers Choi Si-woo with the straw backpack he is carrying. Where Choi Si-woo had stumbled upon was an enormously wide ruined traditional Korean house (hanok).

At the edge of the spacious courtyard, surrounding him on the courtyard, there were numerous black shadows standing. To the bewildered Choi Si-woo, the old man speaks. Once every 666 years, a ceremony is held to select the king of Yokai and each Yokai in this world possesses one entry ticket for it. And Choi Si-woo is, in fact, a hybrid of a human and a goblin, inheriting the blood of an extinct goblin. Among the goblin folk, only Choi Si-woo possesses the entry ticket. As the sole survivor inheriting the blood of a goblin, the adventure of the half-monster boy, Choi Si-woo, begins.”
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Midareta Futari no Mitasare Gohan
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, School Life, Cooking

name: I Became a C-Level Guide and Crazy People Obsessed Over Me
description: One day, suddenly, gates opened around the world, and monsters appeared. Just when humanity faced the threat of extinction, people began to manifest "abilities" that could not be scientifically explained. There were "Espers" with combat-related abilities and "Guides" who calmed the rampages caused by Espers overusing their powers. Thanks to them, humanity escaped the crisis of extinction. The goal of Miku Hayase, a C-class Guide, is to lead a quiet and stable life without drawing attention, living modestly and comfortably. Suddenly, Miku was informed of a shocking test result indicating an "89% matching rate" with the strongest S-class Esper, Kento Yashiro, who is one of only two in the country, and her appointment as his personal Guide! After becoming Kento's personal Guide, Miku's life changed drastically. Kento Yashiro, a younger boy who is affectionate towards Miku and is kind and cute. The other S-class Esper in the country, a rational and cold superior, Genki Kunito. The mysterious British gentleman Esper, Jerry. For some reason, these three incredibly handsome Espers began to obsess over Miku... "This life is so damn awful!"
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: After School! Iruma-kun
description:
An official *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun* anthology series, featuring stories of Iruma Suzuki and friends's adventures as students of Babyls Demon School.  

*Chapter numbering is in order of release.*

---

**TABLE OF CONTENTS** (VOLUME 1)**:**

**CHAPTER 1** - *Iruma-sama Caught On Camera!*  
**Mangaka:**  *Hachi ([The Witch's Bloody Paintings](https://mangadex.org/title/22705/majo-no-kaigashuu))*  
Eiko and Asmodeus meet in private to share with each other some photos that they've secretly taken of Iruma.   
  
**CHAPTER 2** - *I Just Haven't Given It My Best Yet*  
**Mangaka:** *Saori Muronaga ([All Alone in Hyakki Demon Village](https://mangadex.org/title/41110/all-alone-in-hyakki-demon-village))*  
Opera laments their inability to get a good photo of Iruma, so they decide to train with Iruma in order to do so.  
  
**CHAPTER 3** - *Detective Iruma Case File: The Missing Fluff*  
**Mangaka:** *Nango Kouta ([Kojirase Hyakki Dominor](https://mangadex.org/title/33201/kojirase-hyakki-dominor))*  
After playing a mystery game, Iruma and Lied get bitten by the detective bug. But when Elizabetta discovers that her tail scrunchie is missing, can Iruma Holmes and Lied Watson figure out the culprit?
  
**CHAPTER 4** - *As Expected From Kirio-senpai!*  
**Mangaka:** *Shinobi ([Yandere Kanojo](https://mangadex.org/title/489/yandere-kanojo))*  
A day in the life of Kirio, Iruma’s senpai who secretly has an obsession with seeing people in despair. 
  
**CHAPTER 5** - *I Can't Wake Up! Iruma-kun*  
**Mangaka:** *Rio ([Despair Boy and China Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/19968/zetsubou-danshi-to-chuugoku-musume))*  
Asmodeus and Clara come across Iruma sleeping, and compete against each other to see who will wake him up first. 
  
**CHAPTER 6** - *Clara’s Seduction Challenge*  
**Mangaka:** *Sako Misaki ([Doki Doki Yokai Love Battle! ~ Great Yokai War!](https://mangadex.org/title/56047/doki-doki-yokai-love-battle-great-yokai-war))* 
When Clara’s succubus mentor teaches her about enchanted chocolate that will make the consumer fall in love with its creator, Clara naturally tries to see if she can make chocolate that will make Iruma act lovey-dovey towards her. 
  
**CHAPTER 7** - *Azz-kun's Devilum*  
**Mangaka:** *Shimotsuki Seira*  (*Sewaga Yakemasu Hades-sama*)
Iruma and Clara ask Asmodeus what he normally does during Devilum balls. 
  
**CHAPTER 8** - *Once Again... Please, Opera-san!*  
**Mangaka:** *Nagi Mayuko* ([*My Student Won't Go Back Home*](https://mangadex.org/title/0cad2d89-a02d-455f-a027-74f52f81eb7f/my-student-won-t-go-back-home-one-punch-man-doujinshi))
Amelie asks Opera to help her improve her cooking skills.  
  
**CHAPTER 9** - *That's a Mythical Creature, Iruma-kun!*  
**Mangaka:** *Yoshimatsumetsu*  (*Akuyaku Reijo no Ani ni Tensei Shimashita* artist)
Iruma’s class discusses their efforts as children to find the delicacy known as humans - while the human Iruma tries to change the subject. 
  
**CHAPTER 10** - *Evade Them All! Iruma-kun!*  
**Mangaka:** *Kakemaru Kakeru ([Shonen Racquet](https://mangadex.org/title/52114/shounen-racquet))* 
Clara decides to put Iruma’s danger avoidance skills to the test with a massive gauntlet of traps. 

**CHAPTER 12** - *The Irumi in Our Hearts*  
**Mangaka:** *Fukui Takumi ([Shuumatsu no Valkyrie](https://mangadex.org/title/b5b21ca1-bba5-4b9a-8cd1-6248f731650b/shuumatsu-no-valkyrie) writer)*
Iruma’s classmates discuss the mysterious new idol Irumi who suddenly appeared at a concert beforehand.   

  
**CHAPTER 13** - *Amelie's Heart-Pounding Grand Campaign*  
**Mangaka:** *Sakurai Norio ([Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu](https://mangadex.org/title/3df1a9a3-a1be-47a3-9e90-9b3e55b1d0ac/boku-no-kokoro-no-yabai-yatsu))*
After reading shoujo manga, Amelie seeks to replicate romantic moments from them with Iruma. 

  
**CHAPTER 14** - *Iruma-kun and the Cherry Blossom Viewing Party*  
**Mangaka:** *Itagaki Paru ([BEASTARS](https://mangadex.org/title/f5e3baad-3cd4-427c-a2ec-ad7d776b370d/beastars))*
Iruma, Asmodeus, and Clara set up a cherry blossom viewing party.  

  
**CHAPTER 15** - *???*  
**Mangaka:** *Heriyama ([Governess Nazuna-san](https://mangadex.org/title/8aad25a7-0775-40cd-b531-bd11cec05fa0/governess-nazuna-san))*

---
**TABLE OF CONTENTS** (NO VOLUME)**:**

**CHAPTER 11** - *Break them Bones! Bablys Staff*  
**Mangaka:** *Kawasaki Chuu ([Shuumatsu Busou Pancake](https://mangadex.org/title/e8e52924-178f-4749-8ce7-54b54b7f7476/shuumatsu-busou-pancake) writer)*
The Babyls teachers participate in an arm-breaking (arm-wrestling) contest. 

**CHAPTER 16** - *???*  
**Mangaka:** *Abekawa Kineko* ([*Touken Ranbu Anthology ~ Preparations For Departure!*](https://mangadex.org/title/71640f11-6781-4d71-945e-c120a65a2dd4/touken-ranbu-anthology-preparations-for-departure))

**CHAPTER 17** - *???*  
**Mangaka:** *Kobayashi Moriwo ([Melancholy Melancholic Melancholinist](https://mangadex.org/title/7beff426-75cf-485e-a1d5-f88399cf5223/melancholy-melancholic-melancholinist))*

**CHAPTER 18** - *???*  
**Mangaka:** *Suzuki Iko* (*One Step!*)

**CHAPTER 19** - *???*  
**Mangaka:** *Kuze Mizuki ([Shuumatsu Friends](https://mangadex.org/title/13363574-7ddb-4fc7-9b4e-d319f2e3ae30/shuumatsu-friends))*

**CHAPTER 20** - *???*  
**Mangaka:** *Utagawa Utako ([Jitsuwa: Fukakaidan Kissa](https://mangadex.org/title/27d3c604-7b2b-46ad-a6bc-734d28829496/jitsuwa-fukakaidan-kissa))*

**CHAPTER 21** - *???*  
**Mangaka:** *Tatsubon ([Tadokoro-san](https://mangadex.org/title/8ffbfa2f-23fa-4490-848e-942581a4d873/tadokoro-san-web-comic))*

**Chapter 22** - *???*
**Mangaka:** *Saito Michi ([The Rising Of The Vibrator Hero]( https://mangadex.org/title/759bba63-5505-4df9-a969-53aa4e93c303/isekai-o-denma-dake-de-ikinuku))* 

**Chapter 23** - *???*
**Mangaka:** *Tachibana Mizuki ([Seishun Radio Pinchers]( https://mangadex.org/title/3a957322-f336-4102-a462-897caedc68ea/seishun-radio-pinchers))* 

**Chapter 24** - *???*
**Mangaka:** *FUKASAWA Neji ([He is popular, but he is not good at love](https://mangadex.org/title/13b58559-40f2-4f71-b81d-71df014f2fc6/maki-kun-wa-moteru-kedo-koi-ga-heta))*

**Chapter 25** - *???*
**Mangaka:** *Takewakamaru ([Gurenki - Creo the Crimson Crises](https://mangadex.org/title/971d074a-9d8f-4840-b1a8-ed33b6756026/gurenki-creo-the-crimson-crises))*

**Chapter 26** - *???*
**Mangaka:** *Fujino Pochomukin* (*Kayou Koukyuu no Hanayome*)
tags: Demons, Comedy, Anthology, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Kiss Before Sleep
description: Jiho gains psychic powers from a childhood accident! However, she can't control them! Enduring pain for 18 years with this troublesome ability, Jiho discovers that physical contact with the guy next door, Yechan, can temporarily free her from her psychic woes... To engage in legal physical contact, Jiho must seduce Yechan in this spontaneous and hilarious romantic fantasy hero action with a touch of superpower chaos!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kanojo wa Otou-san
description:
Two miracles are happening in the high-schooler Naoyuki Ono's life.  
The first is him going out with a beauty of his school, Shiori Sakura.  
The second is that she turns into her thick-headed father if Ono touches her.  
  
The cute girlfriend and her terrifying father are stuck in one body. Even if he wants to touch her, he can't.  
  
And so, the curtain rises on this Father-Daughter Fusion Love Comedy!
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Supernatural

name: Amasaya
description: The cool, black-haired Amamiya Aoi and the blonde-haired gyaru Shiina Saya.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: How to Grill Our Love
description: After their fateful encounter through a dating app, Kenta and Chihiro decided to get married with zero days of dating in light of Kenta’s transfer. As a couple who got married without knowing much about each other, they deepen their relationship through their regular weekend BBQs.
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Birthday Presents
description: Kotoko finds a strange wounded boy, collapsed on the ground. She saves him and asks in return that he spend her birthday with her. She lives alone because her father had passed away… How can she still smile? And what is so unnatural in this boy she saved? It appears he can see more than human beings… What will happen to him? Will he be saved? And will he agree to spend the day with her or stay a stray and be lonely as he's been from the day he was born…?
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Ashita mo Kimi ni Ai ni Iku
description:
University student Saku longs to have a fairytale romance, but even though he has no trouble getting with girls, they all break up with him for the same reason: he doesn't make their heart flutter at all!

And then there's Misumi, the university's resident heartthrob who's wildly popular with the girls, and who's taken a sudden interest in Saku. He doesn't laugh at Saku's fantasies and listens to them sincerely, and if Saku is nearby, he'll go to him without fail. Misumi seems to always say or do the right things that make his own heart start to flutter a little, so Saku starts to look to him for tips and techniques on how to make his fairytale romance come true.

But before he knows it, he's suddenly falling in love with Misumi instead...?!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Love Vibes
description: Shouji has a girlfriend but is seeing Mako on the side. Unable to continue pretending she feels less for him than she does, she breaks it off with him. Shortly before that happens, Mako is hit on by Mika, who tells Mako that she's interested in both men and women. Mika wants to pursue a relationship with Mako, but is Mako's relationship with Shouji really over?
tags: Girls' Love, Drama, Tragedy

name: Spice & Wolf: Spring Log
description:
It has been more than ten years since Holo and Lawrence, who became a happily married couple after completing their long journey to send the wise wolf back home, opened the bathhouse Spice and Wolf bathouse in the hot spring resort of Nyohhira. 

This is a story of continued happiness spun in the bathhouse, which is said to bring happiness and laughter.

---

**Note:** This series starts from light novel volume 18. Heavy spoilers ahead!
tags: Monsters, Animals, Romance, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Murciélago Araña
description: A spinoff of the series Murciélago featuring the character Reiko Kuchiba.
tags: Action, Comedy, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: The Plain Girl Sitting Next to Me
description:
Kawase Sonoe ain't much to look at. Plain, serious and uninteresting, sure, but for some reason, her next-seat neighbor Mori Ichika can't stop staring at her.

Mori follows her and discovers that Kawase has an awful lot to show her, and that she'll receive from Kawase an education that she can't admit she needed.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Gyaru to Ojousama
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic

name: Shuumatsu no Hanayome-sama ~sweet home†melty life~
description:
Michiru, born under his extremely religious mother, believes that one day an angel would come down and save him from his suffering and pain. 

After getting severely bruised and beaten up from the kids at his school, his nextdoor neighbor, Hikari, comes to his aide and carries him to her home. While Michiru is asleep, she rampages the world, destroying everything. 

When he awakes, it is revealed to him that Hikari is an angel. Michiru asks Hikari to marry him, which she gladly accepts. 

Will their sudden post-apocalypse and newlywed life give Michiru what he always wanted? Or is there more to it under the surface?
tags: Psychological, Romance, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Fantasy, Shota, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: The Mercenary Bomber Explode All Cheaters.
description:
Jack Aaron is the strongest mercenary known by the nickname “The Bomber.” After completing a heavy mission, what awaited him was a summons to another world!

In this summoning, everyone is granted a special ability. However, the ability Jack was given was quite limited: [Bomb Making]. The people who summoned him from the other world dismissed Jack’s ability as useless, and the other summoned individuals began to mock him as a useless foreigner.

To return to his original world, he forms a partnership with Alice, an alchemist derisively called "The Witch." During this process, Jack learns that the other summoned individuals, who he thought he had killed in an explosion, are still alive.

In order to return to his original world, and to hunt down the surviving summoned individuals, Jack and Alice’s worst journey is about to begin...!
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Isekai de Te ni Ireta Seisan Skill wa Saikyou datta You desu ~Souzou & Kiyou no W Chiuto de Musou Suru~
description: 29 year old Kou Kousaka is an ordinary salaryman working overtime in a black company when he dies and is sent to another world. He is given the option to become a sage, hero, or demon king. However, he chooses none of them and instead acquires a hidden skill: the ability to store items in a limitless inventory, immediately dismantle them into materials, and then use them to create something new.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Akuyaku Ouji no Eiyuutan
description: Alfred, the third prince of the royal family who was born with black hair and black eyes, was hated. One day, he comes across his older brother, the first prince, Leolu, announcing to his fiancée, Charlotte, that she has broken off their engagement. In order to save Charlotte, who was falsely accused, Alfred took her place and thought the situation was settled...!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kamikakushi no Eden
description:
The protagonist, Hinata Kuroto, is searching for his sister, who is supposed to have "once existed" but is now forgotten by everyone around him. He receives a letter from the beautiful transfer student, Shirai Shimotsuki, stating, "If you want to know about the whereabouts of your sister, come to the library after school." When Kuroto goes to the library, he finds Shirai inexplicably half-naked and waiting for him. This is a sex and meta-fantasy manga created by Gensei Sahara, the artist behind 'Sex & Dungeon!!

(Source: niconico Manga, translated)
___
[Alt Official Raw (niconico Manga)](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/65209)
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Takara Shimai
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Updater
description:
The blacksmith NPC ‘Aiden.’

One day, his village gets deleted by the hands of the system moderator and as he and his little sister ‘Elise’ perished, he swore to himself.

I’ll destroy this system with my very hands.

It was then…!

“You have unlocked moderator perms, Moderator Lv. 1”

Aiden wakes up with a new power,

Marking the beginning of his journey as a moderator…!

What will become of Aiden?!

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/69621)
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Moments of Loneliness
description: An eight-page full-color one-shot by Moto Hagio about loving somebody.
tags: Oneshot, Romance

name: My Girlfriend Is a Zombie
description: Faced with doomsday, the special power inside Ling Mo was woken up. He found out that he could control zombies. Therefore he could walk through the zombie crowd safe and sound using his power, and eventually, he met his beloved girlfriend - Ye Lian, but only to find out that she had already been transformed into a zombie. To help Ye retrieve her memories, Ling Mo started his survival in doomsday.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Zombies, Post-Apocalyptic, Harem, Horror, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: My Numbered Days of Happiness
description: In a previous life I was seriously ill and now I also have an ill character. Perhaps it was my destiny to have a limited lifespan. Nevertheless, I am quite happy. ‘Now I have hair, I'm beautiful, I'm healthy, and I'm a princess, and by the way I can eat lots of delicious food! Life is like a gift. I've decided to make the most of the 21 years that have been given to me.... Until.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Toki-sensei wa Kigaetai
description:
Meet Shisoya Toki, a quiet female teacher with a thing for “clothes”. Often seen as cold and unfriendly, her students call her the “unfortunate beautiful teacher”. 

But one day, while organizing supplies in the old school building, she finds a brand new pair of bloomers. Suddenly, her kinky curiosity about “clothes” goes wild!! 

Sometimes SEXY! Sometimes CUTE! Get ready for a wild ride full of seductive cosplay!!
tags: School Life, Slice of Life

name: Little Sweet Delusion
description: A four-page fairytale cross between Red Riding Hood and Snow White, with a surprisingly dark twist.
tags: Oneshot, Gore, Horror, Fantasy

name: Komen Fuufu
description:
In a world where the supernatural blends in with regular life, there is an old Japanese house. Living there is a newlywed couple, a human man and a kitsune woman. What can disturb their happy life together… except for a man-eating sparrow?

The daily life between human and youkai is dangerous by day, but sweet by night!?
tags: Romance, Supernatural

name: Ajin: Demi-Human
description: The story follows a high school student named Kei Nagai, who is caught in a traffic accident, dies, but immediately revives and learns he is not human, but an Ajin, a mysterious creature that cannot die. Scared, he runs away from humans but is helped by his friend Kai, who joins him in his flee from civilization. He then becomes involved in a conflict between human and Ajin and must choose a side.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Military, Drama, Horror, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Hibi Chouchou x Hirunaka no Ryuusei
description:
Hibi Chouchou + Hirunaka no Ryuusei crossover in the May 5th issue of Margaret in 2014.  
  
Hirunaka no Chouchou - a Shocking Day for New Discoveries  
A shopping mall date with Suiren and Kawasumi. But… Suiren gets lost?! She and a small girl find themselves at the Lost Child centre where suddenly Suzume and Mamura come along!  
Released as chapter 75.4 in volume 12 of Hibi Chouchou.  
  
Hibi Ryuusei - Suzume’s Parallel School Diary  
The Suzume who steals everybody’s attention at the high school entrance ceremony. Though she's no great beauty, she does things at her own pace and is a hot topic amongst everyone. In the middle of this, the only person who doesn’t notice her, Kawasumi – will he become interested?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: My Sister Is the Main Character
description: Reincarnated into a novel, she tries to protect her sister from being imprisoned by taking her place. However, the obsessive duke fixates on her instead, flirting and even threatening to confine her. Strangely, she finds herself drawn to him despite her protests.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Hibi Chouchou
description:
Shibazeki Suiren is a stunningly beautiful girl. Her classmates are astonished by her beauty, but after noticing her quiet manners and lack of contact except with her friends, she receives the nickname "Takane no Hana", a beautiful flower but impossible to reach. However, after a fellow freshman called Kawasumi Kouha saves her from a persistent suitor, she finds herself mesmerized by him… as he's the only boy who won't look at her no matter what.  
  
Chapter 75.4 is part of the Hibi Chouchou x Hirunaka no Ryuusei crossovers and is included in that entry.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: You Got Me, Sempai!
description: Two months after entering high school, Serina realizes that the lyrics of a love song have been written in her desk, and the writing seems to be the one of a boy. After writing down an answer, she gets approached by a senior, Mizukawa.
tags: Romance, School Life

name: With Vengeance, Sincerely, Your Broken Saintess
description: Lua, a candidate saint with healing powers. However, her abilities were flawed, and she would be pained and painful to herself in order to transfer the symptoms to herself and heal them. The saintly candidates treated her as a flaw, but only her best friend Ariane was always there. One day, Garrot, the Knight Commander whom Lua cares about, is dying. After completely healing his wounds, Lua wanders between life and death at the limit of her abilities. However, when he awoke, all the credit belonged to Ariane, and Garrot and Arian's engagement had been decided. Seeing Arian's true nature, he is coldly beaten by Garrot. In despair, Lua vowed not to heal anyone anymore. Then the Second Prince Swen asks, "Why don't you take revenge on those who have demeaned you?" She uses another ability she has been hiding – the atrocious ability to inflict healing symptoms on others – and joins forces with Swen to start a new life as an "evil woman" instead of a "saint."
tags: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic

name: Golden Kamuy
description:
In the early twentieth century, Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi “Immortal” Sugimoto scratches out a meager existence during the postwar gold rush in the wilderness of Hokkaido. When he stumbles across a map to a fortune in hidden Ainu gold, he sets off on a treacherous quest to find it. But Sugimoto is not the only interested party, and everyone who knows about the gold will kill to possess it! Faced with the harsh conditions of the northern wilderness, ruthless criminals and rogue Japanese soldiers, Sugimoto will need all his skills and luck—and the help of an Ainu girl named Asirpa - to survive.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Action, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Samurai, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Tragedy

name: The Devil Raises a Lady
description:
The downfall of a noble family. And a girl who risks her life seeking revenge.

“Lady Ayana.”

There was a knight who had been by her side for thirteen years. The person who came to her mind before her own family was going to be annihilated. He risked his life for her, suffered wounds, hunger, and gave her everything. Now, he is looking at her while she’s waiting for her execution with a joyful smile.

“Please show me another enjoyable story this time, my lady.”

The devil smiled and extended his hand, and the girl took it.

“I hope you get the ending you desire in the next story, my lady.”

(Source: Kakao, translated)
tags: Time Travel, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Corrupting the Heroine's First Love
description:
“I am a knight of Latem. We’re not destined to stand under the same sky.”

She had become Karina Apocalita, the personification of evil and a member of the heterogeneous race that ruled the world with malevolence. The plot began to twist and turn when Karina unknowingly saved the life of Reneiger, a justful knight and the heroine’s first love.

Reneiger became doubtful of his faith, eventually losing his glow and radiant platinum blond. Soon the sacred knight fell from grace and aligned himself to Karina’s fate.

“There’s no turning back now. Dear God, please forgive me.”

He knew he would never be able to escape from her hands.

---
"I am a knight of Latem, and that means I cannot coexist under the same sky as you."

After entering the book *A Trapped Bird Cannot Escape*, I realized that I had taken over the body of Karina Apocalypta, a member of a species that reigns as the evil of the world. However, the novel's plot begins to twist after I saved the life of Reneiger, the first love of the female protagonist, who happens to be a holy knight. Reneiger begins to doubt his faith, ultimately losing his brilliant platinum hair. Thus, the once sacred holy knight turns corrupt and eventually sympathizes with Karina's fate...

"Now we have each other's desires," Karina said while caressing his cheek. It was a feeling of being pulled in by each fascinating tendril of thorny vines.

Reneiger couldn't bear it, "It can't be undone."

---
In a land overshadowed by darkness, Karina Apocalita rises as a formidable figure, her being a tapestry of power from a diverse race. Her destiny intertwines with Reneiger, a knight from the virtuous Latem order, known for justice and as the former love of a legendary heroine. Their paths take an unforeseen turn when Karina, unaware of her impact, saves Reneiger's life. This act, challenging his convictions, triggers a crisis within him, tarnishing his once radiant aura and precipitating a fall from grace.

Faced with his altered fate, Reneiger prays for forgiveness, realizing his escape from Karina's shadow is but a dream. This pivotal moment raises a haunting question: will Reneiger rediscover the light, or be consumed by the darkness emanating from Karina?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Uruwashi no Yoi no Tsuki
description:
Yoi is a girl who is called "prince" by those around her and treated like a hero in a girls' manga.
Then she meets Ichimura, who is also called "prince." He calls her "beautiful" and saves her from getting tangled up with a drunk at a convenience store, and the two quickly get close!
Is this encounter fate? Or is it bad luck?!
The story of a man and a woman, both called "princes," begins now!
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Waves, Listen to me!
description:
On a night out drinking to get over being duped and ditched by her last boyfriend,  Minare Koda ends up 
providing a massive drunken rant for Matou, the director of a radio station. 
The next day, she is shocked to hear her own voice being broadcast on the radio! She rushes to the studio,
leaving her job at a curry soup and bread restaurant in jeopardy. However, her drunken rant and the next day's 
impromptu damage-control live broadcast end up earning her an invitation to try working at the radio station!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Music

name: Konyaku Haki made 10-Nikkan
description: Arrogant and selfish, the notorious daughter of an earl, Elena Boulder, lost her memory in a freak accident shortly after her fiancé, Viscount Oscar West, called off their engagement.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Summer You Were There
description:
Shizuku Hoshikawa, a high school girl who lives avoiding contact with people, writes a novel which is accidentally read by her classmate Kaori Asaka.  
She loves it but finds out Hoshikawa wasn't planning to write anymore due to lack of ideas, to which she ends up saying:  
"Let's start going out, you and me… You can write a story about our own love."
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Medical, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Kamen Rider The First
description:
Manga adaptation of the film by Tetsuya Egawa. Controversial due to its poor quality.  

Egawa received a permanent contract dissolution from Toei after the first chapter came out.
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Drama, Adaptation

name: The Pension Life Vampire
description: Vampires and werewolves... One day, Eri, a "revision officer" who hunts down things that are said to resent mankind, wanders into a pension run by a mysterious girl. The encounter between a girl whose existence was denied and a legendary vampire. She won't change the world, but she can become kind. A heartwarming house administration comedy begins now!
tags: Comedy, Vampires, Slice of Life

name: Beloved by the Male Lead's Nephew
description:
One day, my life suddenly come to an end, but I reincarnated as a the villainess of a romantic novel who is obsessed with and stalks the male lead, ultimately getting sentenced to death for trying to kill the female lead. I decided to try to avoid that by leaving the capital and living peacefully in the countryside, however, my dad requested that I come back to the capital because there was a huge mess going: it was reported that the royal heir who was believed to have died 7 years ago is actually alive! The little prince also just so happens to be the nephew of the male lead, who is now looking for him!! I didn’t want to get involved with that but unfortunately on my way to the capital, I rescued a little beggar child who turned out to be the lost royal heir and who is now extremely attached to me. In the original story, the female lead was supposed to find him so she could have the opportunity to meet the male lead, but what will happen to my peaceful life now that the original flow of the story seems to be changing?!!

---
After being reborn as a stalker villainess destined to die for trying to kill Archduke Calix Elluiden's lover, Charlize Lienta fled from the capital to stay away from the archduke at all costs. But her plan goes awry when she returns a year later and rescues a poor boy on the streets... because he turns out to be Sasha, Calix's long-lost nephew! Given her infamous reputation as Calix's stalker, will Charlize succeed in returning Sasha without raising the archduke's suspicions?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/58448925)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%A8%EC%A3%BC%EC%9D%98-%EC%A1%B0%EC%B9%B4%EA%B0%80-%EB%82%98%EB%A5%BC-%EB%84%88%EB%AC%B4-%EC%A2%8B%EC%95%84%ED%95%9C%EB%8B%A4/3548), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/62000958)
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Ushimitsu Gao
description:
"If you encounter a ghost, think of something naughty."
Megumi Sano (33 years old) is a housewife trying to conceive. She also has a fairly strong spiritual sensitivity.
One night, during sex with her husband, a ghost suddenly appears in their bedroom.
However, the humiliation of being seen having boring sex outweighs the fear...
From that day on, the ghost frequently appears in their bedroom, but what is his purpose...?
A sexual horror story drawn by Paru Itagaki, the creator of "BEASTARS" and "SANDA".
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: Kamen Rider - Hybrid Insector (Doujinshi)
description:
An unofficial doujinshi spin-off manga of the Showa Era Kamen Rider Series by Eiichi Shimizu and Tomohiro Shimoguchi (now famous for [Linebarrels of Iron](https://mangadex.org/title/1555) and [ULTRAMAN 2011 Manga](https://mangadex.org/title/7042)).   
  
**Notes:**  
- The doujin's original serialization ran for only nine chapters until Toei ordered a cease-and-desist for copyright violations, nevertheless Shimizu & Shimoguchi later announced in June 2016 that the series will restart that summer, when a new number 0 was published during 90th Comiket.  
- New Edition Doujin chapters released: 5 (#00-04)  


---

**Links:**  
- [Shimoguchi's Twitter](https://twitter.com/nadegata_circus)
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Superhero, Martial Arts, Military, Doujinshi, Gore, Police, Tragedy

name: OSAMU
description:
When Tokyo is attacked by evil monsters, who better to save the day than the Super-Ultra-Mega-Level-Anti-Monster-Specialized-human-Final-Boss-Weapon OSAMU!!! 

Golden Future Cup Oneshot #3 2024
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Military, Aliens

name: My Perfect Maid Robot Is Hard to Deal With
description: Not found
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Enkan no Emotions
description: Arakura Arato is a high school student who is always alert to danger and lives a low-key life. One day, his life changes drastically when he is suddenly attacked by a superpower user named Koki Rara. The power of “EMO”—an ability formed from strong emotions.
tags: Action, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Devil May Cry 5 – Visions of V –
description: The spin-off of the latest title, *Devil May Cry 5,* has begun with a bang! The main character is "V," a mysterious man who uses three demons. In addition to the secret of his birth, his encounter with the demons, and the prequel to the main story leading up to the contract, the tale is told from the perspective of V that is exclusive to the spin-off!
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Batsu Ichi JK
description:
Amane Anzu, a high school student, is actively looking for a boyfriend. However, most candidates tend to quickly lose interest when they find out she's actually a real divorcee. And if that's still not enough to drive guys away, the fact she has a daughter usually does the trick.

Note: each "volume" is much shorter (50-60 pages) than a usual tankoubon.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: I Became the Tutor of the Royal Twins
description:
An elementary school teacher in her past life, and a private tutor in the present.

Sarah Popo uses all her past life experiences in her second life.

She worked as a highly sought out tutor for aristocratic children.

Her goal is to be the owner of her own school!

Then, one day, the Emperor of the Empire sought her out.

“I want Miss Popo to be my siblings’ tutor.”

Water bombs, flour bombs, bug attacks.

What kind of offer did he make? To make her the tutor of a pair of notorious twins with all kinds of vicious pranks!

A very sweet one, of course.

The devil’s temptation shook Sarah’s life.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Gakkyu Hotei: School Judgement
description:
As problems continue to plague the elementary school system, a new solution is enacted in the form of the School Judgment System! Now the young students themselves will be responsible for solving the issues that befall them! But are they up to the task?  
  
**Included one-shots:**  
Volume 3: Gakkyuu Houtei (2 parts)  
  
**Officially published:**  
- In english by VIZ Media as *School Judgment: Gakkyu Hotei*  
- In spanish by [Norma Editorial](https://www.normaeditorial.com/catalogo/S/4411/1/los-juicios-escolares/) as *Los Juicios Escolares*  
- In french by [Kana](https://www.kana.fr/produit/school-judgment/) as *School Judgment*
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Roxana
description:
Kidnapping, murder, and risqué relationships! Within the scandalous pages of *The Abysmal Flower*, the downfall of Roxana Agrece's criminal family is already foretold. So when Cassis Pedelian, the heroine’s older brother, is kidnapped by Roxana's father, she can either wait for the heroine's revenge... or take matters into her own hands, since Cassis is the key to her survival. But with deceitful characters on all sides, can Roxana and Cassis trust each other enough to bring down the brutal Agreces?

---
I accidentally took possession of someone in a 19+ reverse harem novel.

The problem is that I became Roxanna Agriche, the older sister of the sub-villain. My damn father kidnapped the heroine's brother. Now, is the only thing left to meet a terrible end from the vengeance of the heroine?

But what if I can avoid that horrible development?

“I'm also interested in this toy.”

"I'll protect you until you can get out of here safely."

The heroine's brother, Cassis Pedalian, will definitely be able to pay me back later.

---

**Note:** Please be advised. This work contains somewhat sadistic expressions and portrayals of bloodshed due to the nature of the genre. There are images that may make you feel a little uncomfortable, so please take note. Additionally, this is **not** smut; it's just R15.

**Links:**
- [Official Indonesian/Bahasa Indonesia Translation](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Roxana-The-Way-to-Protect-the-Female-lead-Older-Brother/3474)
- [Official Japanese/日本語 Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/60171)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: "Yukue Fumei."
description: Kanade is an honest working janitor and Ryo is a gigolo living a self-indulgent lifestyle. The two are childhood friends and share a secret they can’t tell anyone. They have a dependent relationship where they’ll dirty their hands for the other, but what happens when they both end up as murderers…?
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Philosophical, Drama, Mystery

name: Yumenashi-sensei no Shinroshidou
description: A former career consultant, Takanashi now works for a school as a Guidance Counselor. During career guidance meetings, he gives headstrong students data and tells them the realities of the world around them, hoping that they rethink their dreams. Because of that, students call him "Yumenashi-sensei" ("Dreamless-sensei"/"Dream Crusher–sensei").
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Saekkaman Sunjongniljji
description:
"I'm going to live a normal life!"

Cho-eun, the heir to the underworld organization, Red Arrow Group, has finally entered university. She just wants to make lots of friends, but finds herself surrounded by four suspicious men.

"Are you an enemy? Or a friend? Or... do you like me?"

With a whirlwind of emotions—joy, anger, sorrow, and pleasure—engulfing her twenties as a freshman, will Cho-eun's dream of a normal campus life come true?

---
**Link:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=11903391)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Grappler Baki (Kanzenban Release)
description:
"If someone is born a male, at least once in his life he'll dream of becoming the strongest man alive. Grappler, the martial artist who aims to become the strongest in the world!"

That is the dream held by the Grappler, Baki Hanma.

The mysterious, young, martial artist aspires to follow in his sinister father's footsteps as the world's strongest creature. But to what lengths will Baki go?

We follow the young grappler as he matures in a world full of extremely powerful fighters and how he overcomes all obstacles in order to face his father one day in the fighting ring.

When he arrives at an underground martial arts tournament, Baki is put to the test from fighters all over the world. Will he overcome all odds and become the champion of the underground arena?!

Newly Re-edited, this edition of Grappler Baki features new cover art and color pages.
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Delinquents

name: Grand Blue Dreaming
description:
A new life begins for Kitahara Iori as he begins his college career near the ocean in Izu city, full of excitement for his new life. 
He will be moving into his uncle's diving store "Grand Blue." There he finds the ocean, beautiful women, and men that love diving and alcohol. 
Will Iori be able to live his dream college life?

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10058/episode/318585) (U.S. Only), [INKR](https://comics.inkr.com/title/306-grand-blue-dreaming)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Girl with the Sanpaku Eyes
description:
This is a retelling of how Amane and Katou met, from The Story of a Girl with Sanpaku Eyes.  
  
Trivia: Sanpaku (三白) is a Japanese term meaning "three whites". It is generally referred to in English as "sanpaku eyes" and refers to eyes in which the white space above or below the iris is visible.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Touhou - Koiiro no Kyoukai (Doujinshi)
description: A Touhou Project Doujinshi Series
tags: Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Web Comic

name: Pokémon Special
description:
Pokémon Adventures follows the story of the original Game Boy game, with all the Gym Leaders, places and opponents. There's plenty of action as these trainers explore forests, jungles, cities and caves in search of Pokémon and adventure… sometimes working together, sometimes on their own! But can they foil the schemes of Team Rocket, a mysterious group of villains who want to use Pokémon for evil?  
  
Volume 1 Chapter 1 - Volume 3 Chapter 40 - Red, Green & Blue chapter  
Volume 4 Chapter 41 - Volume 7 Chapter 90 - Yellow chapter  
Volume 8 Chapter 91 - Volume 15 Chapter 180 - Gold, Silver & Crystal chapter

name: Gomi Shuushuuin: Saionji no Ryuugi
description:
The "garbage" that pollutes the town must be disposed of.

Saionji works as a general waste collector - commonly known as a "garbage collector" in Yao'ouji, the town with the least amount of garbage in Japan. But he has a secret side to him. In addition to his work as a collector, Saionji also works hard to purify the town. However, in Yao'ouji, the shadow of an even greater evil is about to begin to move...

A hard-boiled, violent action drama by an up-and-coming artist!!
tags: Thriller, Action, Crime, Mafia, Gore, Drama

name: Classroom of the Elite - 2nd Year Arc
description: The second spring at the Advanced Nurturing High School is welcoming Ayanokoji and Class D. The special exams aren't only what awaits them, but the unique freshmen as well. Kazuomi Hōsen and Ryūen. The two who shared the bad reputation between themselves during Ryuen's middle school days. Takuya Yagami, who proclaims to come from the same middle school as Kushida, is approaching her. And the capricious Ichika Amasawa who is pulling Ayanokoji left and right.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: The Predator's Fiancée
description:
My quivering body and the sturdy arms embracing it. My mind is growing faint. Without realizing, I was burning with desire, then I let out a sweet sigh. 'Right now... This situation... How did this happen...?' In order to avoid the future where she dies a horrible death, Elisha decides to become the possession of a maniac. She offered up her body as guarantee and became a contracted fiancée of his. Where will this contract lead to...?!

---
Orphaned and living in a monastery, Elisha de Lauer was content and happy. That was until the De Cartiers, known for having magical abilities, came to find her. This snake-filled family forces Elisha into a slave contract with their eyes on inheriting her many assets. After years of servitude to the De Cartiers, Elisha meets a gruesome end at the hands of her captors. That would’ve been the end of her tale, but as she closed her eyes to die, she awoke again in her own past as if nothing had ever happened. With this second chance, she vows revenge on the De Cartiers and finds the perfect accomplice in rumored maniac, Lucerne des Kayas. Lucerne, an outcast member of the De Cartier family, has also sworn revenge on them. But, his unwavering distrust of everyone stirs him to form a contract with Elisha only under one condition. She must agree to marry him. Flung into a fake marriage, these two align to uncover the secrets of the De Cartiers and bring each member down. There’s just one secret they each can’t seem to figure out. Why does it seem like they have met before?

---

description:
Summary: What do you do when the person you are entrusted to protect happens to pique your interest as well? Zhen Hao, who was asked by his best friend to take care of his love interest ends up falling in love with him as well. Who will win the affection of this love interest?… An exciting love triangle awaits~

name: Marronnier Oukoku no Shichinin no Kishi
description: The Marronnier Kingdom lies landlocked by seven other nations. General Baribara sends her seven children, from the sleepless Nemukunai to the eternally hungry Harapeko, out to these kingdoms in the interests of diplomacy.  Yet Baribara herself is not from Marronnier, and questions swirl internally and externally about her power and those of her children; and it seems there may be more going on in the other kingdoms linked to her family than is first apparent.  Winner of "Kono Manga ga Sugoi!" in 2018 in the female category (the second year in the row for manga-ka Nao Iwamoto), this josei fantasy series is full of humour, romance, and mystery.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Thiendavis - For the Perfect Salvation
description: Ivy Ariate is a beautiful future saint who one day receives a curse. The curse made him have to answer the truth to any question. Because of the curse, a promising future becomes bleak, and the position of a saint becomes increasingly distant. Even so, Ivy wants to be pure at all costs. To do this, he must find out the secrets of the worlds of Tienda and Bis, where dragons, demons and other fantastic creatures live.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Today's an 〇!
description:
Little Nyano doesn't know what she got wrong about a test question she should've gotten right! Can she figure out the problem and fix it?  𓆟

---
Prize winning debut oneshot from the second round of the Yatagarasuhai Competition published in the Harta magazine.
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Animals, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Tengoku Daimakyou
description: Some children live in a comfortably numb world, surrounded by walls. However, one day, a kid named Tokio receives a message asking "Do you want to go outside of the outside?"    Now, from the Heaven that is starting to crumble, the children begin their adventure!
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Monsters, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Yozakura Quartet
description: The story revolves around four teenagers; Akina, Hime, Ao, and Kotoha; each of them having their own unique abilities. They run an office called Hiizumi Life Counseling Office, where their job is to help and protect the townspeople of Sakurashin, a town where humans and youkai co-exist with one another. The town is protected by a barrier created by the spiritual sakura known as The Seven Pillars. The Seven Pillars exist in both the human world and the youkai world and is the only thing that keeps both worlds connected to each other. However, recent bizarre incidents have occurred in their town and someone has threatened the safety of their town. It is up to the four of them to protect the town they love.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Momoku Kenshi no Goei no Maai
description: Love is blind, or so they say. Enjoy this (literal) slice of life.
tags: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
Just like how everyone adored heroes in their childhood, a certain young man adored those powers hidden in shadows. Ninjas, rogues, shadowy mentor types, that sort of deal.  
After hiding his strength and living the mediocre life of a NPC by day while undergoing frenzied training by night, he finally reincarnates into a different world and gains ultimate power.  
The young man who is only pretending to be a power in the shadows… his subordinates who took him more seriously than he expected… and a giant organization in the shadows that gets accidentally trampled…  
This is the story of a young boy who had adored powers in shadows possibly eventually reigning over the world of shadows in another world.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kirikagohime to Mahoutsukai
description: Deep in the forest, in a tower shrouded in mist, there lives a reclusive wizard by the name of Nebelhaut. When he happens across a beautiful fairy who's being held captive and made a public spectacle, he knows he has to take her with him. He names the creature Sti and orders her to call him his master, but her heart remains closed to him. But as time goes on, she sees a different side of him?a side that's both caring and awkward. The distance between the eccentric wizard and strong-willed fairy grows shorter day by day!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: Belle puppée no Supadari Kon'yaku
description:
【“If I’m going to be abandoned anyway, I’ll allow myself to act freely one last time” – A ‘reverse-overindulgence’ love story presented by Selen!】
Leticia, the duke’s daughter nicknamed “the Beautiful Doll (ベル・プペー),” possesses a delicate appearance. However, her true nature combines courage and compassion, making her an exceptional person. She is arranged to be engaged to the second prince, Gilbert, who is rumored to have a difficult and improper character.
A flawless and perfect duke’s daughter and a lonely, clumsy prince cursed with red eyes. A destined pair who support and love each other in a unique “reverse-overindulgence” love story.
※ This product is a serialized version, dividing the chapters of the original work *The Spudari Engagement of Belle poupée: The Doll Princess Who Was Told ‘I Don’t Like You,’ Stopped Enduring, and Made the Prince Head Over Heels. Truly Adorable!* into individual parts.
tags: Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

description:
A silent manga of a high school girl in Kowloon running on her way to school.

A girl overslept, and is now in a hurry. Will she be able to come to school on time?
