name: Fist of the Blue Sky: Regenesis
description: The legend of Hokuto returns! The year is 193X and the looming WWII  is short of plunging the world into chaos. After completing the initiation ritual, the 62nd Successor of Hokuto Shinken, Kasumi Kenshiro, is called upon by the destiny of Hokuto. He embarks on a new journey to the Dutch East Indies (Indonesia) where a vicious battle unfolds over the valuable "List of Hope". A new tale featuring Hokuto and the List of Hope begins!
tags: Historical, Action, Crime, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore

name: Kon no Ki Konoha
description: Only in autumn when the dead leaves flutter about can Akino meet the mysterious boy who lives inside the deep blue tree.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: The Main Heroines Are Trying to Kill Me
description:
Frey Raon Starlight was the hero who killed his family and comrades and destroyed the world. His goal was to return to the past, unlock a "hidden route" to truly save the world, and achieve peace.

As planned, he successfully returns to the past and gains access to the hidden route. However, his relief is short-lived as he is confronted with an unexpected truth: the five heroines he killed in his previous life have retained their memories and are now trying to kill him...!

Can Frey, under such extreme circumstances, save the world this time?
tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kimagure Orange Road (Official Colored)
description: Secretly-psychic Kyosuke has just settled into a bustling school filled with brand-new faces, but he wastes no time making waves! With both the shy and mysterious Madoka and the high-energy Hikaru spinning in and out of his life, Kyosuke’s dizzy with the first sweet rush of female attention! But will his instincts lead him into the arms (and heart) of the right girl?
tags: Official Colored, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Houkago Guitar
description: Psycho Pandas: A oneshot about two teens hiding who they are from the rest of society, one perceived as a genius and the other perceived as a delinquent, and how their true selves come together.
tags: Oneshot, Boys' Love, School Life, Delinquents

name: Misanthrope Girlfriend
description:
Hanami Matsudai is awkward when it comes to love and she doesn't know the proper distance for human relationships. You might as well call her a misanthrope. Her peaceful life is disturbed when she meets the unpredictable Ran Ojiya who just won't leave her alone!  
  
The slapstick love comedy of an aloof and love-hating loner girl and a love-crazed handsome stalker begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Nanairo Sekai
description:
1: The Glasses Thief  
A cute story about a boy with bad eyesight and the girl who is in love with him.  
  
2: Convenience Store Honey  
A boy worries about his quiet boyfriend.  
  
3: Adult Uniform  
A girl wonders why her childhood friend does not speak to her anymore.  
  
4: Refrigerator Chocolate  
Satoru is going to have heart surgery with a 50/50 chance of survival. One day, he comes across a girl in a refrigerator…
tags: Oneshot, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Octagon Revenge
description:
“Punching and making each other bleed. How can you call that a sport?”

Hayul, who had been living a boring and stagnant life, goes through a turning point in her life through her friend Hongmin and coach Sangjun. Mixed Martial Arts, it is a sport that has the memories of her dad, but also the one that led Hayul’s dad into death. Hayul grabs her gloves once again, with a plan to get revenge on Johns Alves, the very person that killed her dad.

“Talent above talents, will Hayul ever be able to break through that wall?”
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Onna Tomodachi wa Tanomeba Igaito Yarasete Kureru
description: Hisaya Minato, a normal high school student, has a female friend who is a bit peculiar. She is Aoi Hatsuki, the most beautiful girl in the high school. For some reason, they get along very well, and since they happen to live on the same floor, they gradually become good friends, coming and going from each other's houses. One day, Minato suddenly asks her to show him her panties. At first, Hatsuki is reluctant, but then she starts to roll up her skirt?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Here Stands Gokumon Nadeshiko
description:
The Gokumon House, a bloodline originating from hell. Within the mystery-filled ancient city of Kyoto stands their citadel; they are feared not only by the seedy underworld of sorcery, but by monsters too.

Gokumon Nadeshiko, a descendant of this cursed family, is fated to devour monsters. A most beautiful girl, born from the flames of cremation; her very being brings about bad omens.

However... "Nadeshiko. I see. You are as lovely as your name." Ichijiku Amana, a most peculiar, mysterious, yet gorgeous woman. Their encounter changed Nadeshiko as Amana faced her with a fearless smile.

An creature lurks in the painted ceiling. Boxes packed with human sacrifice. A twisted curse upon a school. A beast who deceives humans. Haunted by a formless ghost. As the two are faced with one mystery after another, they are ultimately confronted by what they tried to leave behind.

"If it weren't for you, I would've remained an Oni."

An Oni with the heart of a human, and a human burdened with a corrupt soul. The bond that they form will cut the seal on this blood-soaked tale.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Fanservice Paradox
description: The two members with the worst relationship in the group are now trending all because of a fan-taken video that suddenly dominated the social media! Young and cute husky X Cool and cold Gege who has great self-restraint?! The shippers are going feral over this pairing! They had clearly never gotten along since their debut, yet they were now forced to embark on an endless path of selling their fake ship together~
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Ore no Kurasu ni Wakagaetta Moto Yome ga Iru
description: On the way home after filing for divorce, Kohei Kurose is hit by a car and is transported back in time to his high school days! Determined to enjoy his new life, he heads back to his high school, only to find his ex-wife, Yuzuka, there...?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Inu ppoi Imouto
description: A story about my dog-like little sister who awaits my return every night.
tags: Romance, Incest, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 8: JoJolion (Official Colored)
description: In 2011, childhood friends Yasuho Hirose and Joushuu Higashikata discover a naked man buried in the ground just outside the town of Morioh. The man has no memory of his name or previous life; the only thing he remembers about himself is how to use his Stand, a supernatural ability that takes the form of a humanoid creature. The stranger is quickly given a name, Jousuke, and Joushuu's father Norisuke decides to adopt him into the Higashikata household until he can find his own home.  As Jousuke begins to investigate his past, it becomes apparent that he is no ordinary amnesiac. There is much more to his identity than he first suspected, and, as he is thrust into a series of high-stakes Stand battles, he soon begins unravelling a deadly conspiracy that encompasses the entire town.
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Reincarnation, Official Colored, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: My Alternate Ending
description:
[Let's get rid of this psychopath before that]

Yes, I possessed someone.

But who I was in my previous life.
I can't remember at all.

All I remember is,
just this guy's face that filled my eyes.

The day I woke up for the first time as a wizard's experiment,
we were together.

Strangely enough, about my previous life,
this guy seems to know better about it than I do.

In a dead-end novel,
you are the only one you can trust and rely on...

In order to live,
I have to run away from this guy.

In the future, he will kill the female lead's entire family.
It's because he's a psychopath whose view on the world is final darkness.

After a while...

Finally, out of his grasp,
I thought I could live a peaceful life─

"You cruelly abandoned me."

This guy, he finally found me.

"Did you enjoy playing with me?"

Now, he can't even be compared to his past self.
He went completely mad.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Winter Flower
description: The flower in Itadori will bloom in the summer, taking his life as it took his sister's but giving others longer lives, but how can he leave his childhood friend Rakka behind…?
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, Fantasy

name: Human Clock
description:
MangaZombie:  
  
"When I talk about ‘warped manga from a warped mind’, I always think of this incoherent story.   
  
The Human Clock is a lot simpler to summarize than to understand. The hero is Yubi Chizuo again; he’s a student like before, but this time round he’s also a dropout. He stays in his house, which is a family shop selling watches and clocks. He gazes and gazes at them, and little by little, turns into one himself. That is the entire story. It reminds me of Franz Kafka’s Metamorphosis."  
  
Also contains the story, The Cat's Mourning Suit (Chapter 6).
tags: Oneshot, Thriller, Monsters, Psychological, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: I am the World's Strongest, because I can read MANGA
description:
The other world I reincarnated to, was a world that will enable you to use magic after reading a Grimoire.
And the Grimoire’s contents areーーYou wouldn’t believe it, it’s「Manga」.
This world’s people would take around one year to read one Grimoire(Manga) But for me, it is a「Manga」, that’s why it would not take an hour.
Interpreting and understanding all kinds of Grimoires and the 6 year old me who became the World’s Strongest Master Mage,
Welcomed brides that were also 6 years old, and started living a carefree life……!!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kokoro Kikai
description: "Are we all really alive?" Shinobu, a high school student, questions as he spends each day just passing the time away.
tags: Boys' Love, School Life

name: Alone at the End of the World: My Dark Contract
description: Before the rebirth at the end of the world, relying on foresight, Xiao Ran hoarded a large amount of supplies and unexpectedly awakened a darkening system, starting a different experience of the apocalypse. While others are starving, Xiao Ran enjoys hot pot and ice cola; while others hide and seek, Xiao Ran relies on a safe stronghold to hunt easily; while others complain about their fate, Xiao Ran has already completed his evolution and awakened his abilities. Xiao Ran steps on his former enemies, saying, "I don't want to kill you, I just want to torment you. I advise you not to..."
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy

name: Dorei kara no Kitai to Hyouka no sei de Sakushu dekinai no daga
description:
A reincarnated boy, Allen, gets granted by a goddess the cheat skill, [Restoration]. Even though he can heal all and any injuries and illnesses, there aren't a lot of places where he can use that skill to the fullest, so he planned to "regenerate" the slaves he bought and lead a slow-paced life. But the healed slaves' cheats turned out so out of the ordinary that the crops they tend to and their living conditions turned for the better in a blink of an eye.

The protagonist, Allen, who slowly but surely is robbed of opportunities to shine, tried to counter that with his modern knowledge, and yet, those talented slaves absorbed it all and brought success to any and all businesses. 

The protagonist is becoming irrelevant with each passing day?!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Tensei ni Hakobijin no Isekai Kouryakuhou
description: A man who yearns for freedom is reincarnated and he chooses the undesirable job "Carrier"--The fastest way to conquer both women and other world with wisdom and courage!
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Adaptation

name: The Invincible Summoner Who Crawled up From Level 1
description:
After losing his father in a tragic accident, Shinobu Iijima and his younger sister Megumi are taken in by their father’s old friend, Ayumu.

Shinobu works hard in the hopes of starting a new life for himself. Megumi, and a mobile game called La Vita Online, are the only things keeping him afloat.

One day, Ayumu reveals his true intentions of tearing Shinobu down and getting his hands on Megumi. But just after Shinobu learns that Ayumu deleted all of his game data in La Vita, their high-rise apartment catches on fire and Shinobu falls to his death, Megumi in tow. He wakes up in a strange new world... and realizes he’s been reincarnated into the world of La Vita Online.

An announcement from the devs tells him that Ayumu is already there, and a countdown to Megumi’s arrival is ticking. Shinobu vows to protect Megumi after she arrives at any cost, even if it means he has to crawl his way up from level 1 to fend off all the other reincarnated players.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Travel To The Cats' Territory
description: Yue Cheng is collecting cats for her homework report, and what she did is captured by the cats' "watcher". And after following a cat that she wants to catch, Yue Cheng and her friend found themselves in the cat spirit's territory. What will happen…?
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Houkago wa Kenka Saikyou no Gyaru ni Tsurekomareru Seikatsu Kanojo-tachi ni Sukarete, Boku mo Saikyou ni!?
description:
As a result of a combination of his good-natured personality and bad luck, Shiki Orifushi ends up enrolling in St. Lukeman's Academy, a school renowned for its delinquent students.

Before entering the school, Shiki had lived a life far removed from being a delinquent, but at St. Lukeman's, he was an herbivore thrown into a predator's cage.
Shiki was well aware of his situation, but his sense of justice and good-natured personality make him catch the attention of one of the school's numerous gangs of delinquents.

For the next year, Shiki was bullied by the delinquents and lived through hellish days, but one day, he almost bumped into the school's strongest delinquent gal, Karin Kohinata, in front of a vending machine. As a result of this, Shiki's school life changes completely.

---
**Links:**
- [Web Novel Raw](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16817330648656085875)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Delinquents, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Listener ni Damasarete Dungeon no Sai Kasou kara Dasshutsu RTA suru Koto ni Natta
description:
A dungeon explorer, or dungeon tuber, is a person who explores dungeons while streaming. On his first day of broadcasting, a rookie dungeon tuber, Sekai Kotoba, is accidentally transported to the lowest level of the dungeon, which he has not yet explored. The bottom level is a sea of lava, and he is suddenly doomed!

He is level 2, his skills are non-combat related, and he has no knowledge of dungeons. The only people he can rely on are the listeners on the feed! Aim for the upper levels by relying on the comments!
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: filament ~Works of Yuki Urushibara~
description:
Includes:  
She Got Off the Bus at the Peninsula (chapter 1):  
Mitsuko Kunizaki has inherited a small grocery store from her grandmother. Being a single mother to a little boy, she intends to close it down and move on with life. However, in the solitary store that sits next to the last bus stop at the tip of a peninsula lie some long-buried memories that slowly reemerge as Mitsuko arrives at what used to be her home—memories of a lonesome childhood and of people who came to the peninsula to end their lives.  
  
The Labyrinth Cat (chapter 2):  
Residents who have just moved in are always lost in this complex apartment. However, there is one little feline that will help them get back to their apartment house.
tags: Anthology, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Phalene
description: One day a young woman sees the man of her dreams.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: The Violinist of Hamelin
description:
Pandora's Box led a cursed existence. Through the curiosity of a woman, evil was unleashed and very nearly covered the world in darkness. Miraculously, humanity managed to seal Maou Kestra back into the box, but only with immense sacrifices. Even without their lord, the demons are still a formidable force that has only grown stronger with time, locked in the abandoned capital of the North, Hameln. Fifteen years have passed since that fateful battle…  
  
Enter Hamel, a travelling minstrel who is so self-centered that he'd sooner cook his guardian crow (and family friend), Oboe, than go hungry for even a minute. Welcome to the world of music and hilarious insanity that is the Violinist of Hameln. Watch as Hamel takes cheap shots at his opponents and bashes pigeons with his giant violin and turns them into dinner.  
  
How WILL the world be saved from Maou Kestra (it's a pun for orchestra, if you haven't noticed) with a hero such as this?
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Music, Tragedy

name: Herami Shimai wa Docchi mo Yanderu
description: Sera, (Real Name: Herami Sera) is an approval-seeking girl (26 years old) who works at a maid cafe. Her younger sister, Kira, is an idol (19 years old) who is rapidly gaining popularity with her cool, and mature character. However, the real Kira only ever thinks of her sister and tries to cheer her up in every possible way to help her sister with her mental health and anxiety.
tags: Comedy, Incest, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Shoujo Fujuubun
description:
An aspiring author. A mysterious little girl.  
Two completely unrelated people.  
What will happen when they meet?
tags: Psychological, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Fitness Juushoku
description:
“My shoulder feels heavy, and my body feels like something is weighing me down…? The chief priest at the temple preached about the importance of training and eating habits?! You will see the true form of muscle training…!”

Source: MangaPlus
tags: Oneshot

name: The High School Bento Blues
description: Tachibana seems like your typical high schooler, except for one thing - he's got a serious bento situation. One day, he happens to meet Takahashi, another student with his own bento troubles...
tags: Oneshot, School Life, Cooking

name: Two Cups of Coffee
description: "Beside a view like this, who would you want to share the aroma of coffee with…?"
tags: Oneshot, Romance

name: Shishunki Renaissance David-kun
description:
The statue of David is one of Michelangelo's greatest masterpieces and one of the most recognizable works of art of all time, right up there with the Mona Lisa. It's a celebration of the male form and also served as a warning to Rome to not infringe upon the freedoms of the city-state of Florence. But did you also know he's a panty-obsessed pervert? And a braggart? Dio bono!  
  
[Author’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/megapann?s=20)
tags: Historical, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Secretary to the Managing President, General Time Industries, Seiji Tanaka
description:
The new Tanaka Seiji manga follows the titular character, who is a private secretary. With Tanaka's support, a company can become invincible and can achieve any future it desires.  


---

name: Masu Masu Manga de Wakaru! Fate/Grand Order
description: A manga which helps you learn even more about Fate/Grand Order!
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Supernatural

name: To Love Ru Darkness
description:
Rito Yuuki continues to be caught in over-the-top perverted scenarios, now uncensored. The alien Deviluke sisters - Lala, Momo, and Nana - still use their unique abilities in an attempt to grab Rito's love confession. Momo, in particular, has a vision: a harem of women all in love with Rito, with Momo herself in the center. After all, if everyone has an equal share of Rito, everyone wins - at least, she thinks.  
  
As she enacts this plan, the former alien mercenary Yami, aka Golden Darkness, struggles between her former life as a killer and her current life on Earth. Things get complicated when Mea, a girl with powers similar to Yami's, becomes interested in Rito. Just who is this new enemy?
tags: Loli, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Unparalleled Path - Reincarnated as the AI for a Space Battleship
description: Asagaya Shin, an ordinary high school student who was supposed to be in Mitaka, Tokyo just a few days ago, somehow found himself as an AI of a space battleship. The battleship is surrounded by a large enemy fleet, and with only a few consort ships left, it is in a desperate situation. Moreover, the captain of the battleship is a young girl, a decorated member of the royal family, who was ceremoniously on board. Shin, now an AI, takes advantage of his "human" characteristics and attempts to fight a withdrawal battle using novel tactics to survive...
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Mecha, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Isekai, Drama, Adaptation

name: Suki ni Naru Made Matte
description:
Compilation of short stories.  
  
- Suki ni Naru Made Matte  
Whenever it was break time, Hikami-kun sat at my desk and talked with his friends. I was concerned about it, but since he is a popular guy I couldn’t say anything about it. On that fateful day, I dropped Hikami-kun’s cell in the fish tank, and now I have to be his slave?!  
  
- Uso to Koi no Hajimari  
Akane does a favor for her friend, Tomoko, by agreeing to show her childhood friend, Ken-kun, around Tokyo while pretending to be Tomoko! Will she be found out?   
(Also published in "Koibana" anthology, Ch.4)  
  
- 1/3 no Kareshi  
Kogure Yuuya takes an embarrassing picture of Fukada Rei, but he says he will only delete it if they meet again at the same place later. What will Rei do?  
  
- Deatta Toki ni Boku wa Mou Inai  
High school student Yuu finds herself pursued by a hot guy rather… spiritedly.
tags: Romance, School Life, Supernatural

name: The One Within the Villainess
description:
In order to clear the name of ‘Emi’, a girl who had reincarnated as Remilia, the villainess of an otome game, the real Remilia who had been watching all along inside awakens.

Now it's time for the true villainess's revenge to begin!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Candy Apple

description: Jimmy is a gang member in one of the world's few underground cities, Silent Bay City. One day, he meets a girl and gets embroiled in a fight between the creatures of the night. Brought to you by the author of "Levius", Haruhisa Nakata, Night Light Hounds is a thrilling dark fantasy!

Gundam manga from 1991. Published in Kodansha's Gundam Magazine and set in Universal Century 0094 that exhibits an external mobile suit control system via the psycommu.

name: Caught by the Villain
description:
Although she had been a promising practitioner of kendo in the past, due to an accident she was forced to lead a plain life. After Seo Yuri gets into a car accident during a trip back home, she reincarnates into the novel, *The Song of the Moon*, and becomes the elder twin sister of a side character who meets a destructive ending– Selena. Selena hopes to prevent the destruction of her family, however, she is forced to take the place of her runaway brother, Celestine, in the knights’ squadron! Will she be able to avoid the villainous Crown Prince, Ignis, and survive?!

---
A lifetime as a fencing prodigy prepared Eunha for her new role as Selena Evan, novel side character and daughter of a renowned swordsman. Life isn't actually so bad after being sucked into a fictional world, but she’s doomed to meet an untimely death if she can't escape the clutches of the villainous Prince Ignus. When Selena's twin brother, Celestine, runs away before his military conscription, she has no choice but to enlist under his name to avoid getting her entire family executed. But hiding her identity won’t be so easy once Ignus takes note of her impressive sword skills and sets his sights on turning "Sir Celestine" into his top henchman. With the threat of execution looming over her head, can Selena avoid getting caught by the villain?

---

name: Kimi wo Shinryakuseyo!
description: Hajime Sorajima's got a terrible hairstyle! It's so weird it's downright embarrassing. But his hair's got a secret… it's not hair! It's the horns of an alien body! A cute little alien body! One that can transform into a human. Normally, he has no problem living among humans and his secret is safe. That is until he meets a strange girl named Ria Aiba who's convinced he's an alien! Will she blow his cover?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural

name: Shokei Sareta Saikyou no Gunnyou Majutsushi, Haisenkoku no Elf Hime to Kokka Saikensu ~Sokoku yo Jama Suru no wa Kattedaga, Sono Majutsu Tsukutta no Ore na Node Kikanai ga?~
description: The magical nation of Ingressa came to dominate neighboring countries with the power of groundbreaking military magic. Supporting this dominance from behind the scenes was Hert Eisenheim, who rose to the rank of archmage at a young age. However, due to a scheme by the court magician who was jealous of his talent, Hert was executed as a war criminal – but when he woke up, he found himself summoned before a young girl. The girl’s name was Iris Refrain, and she was the first princess of the elven kingdom that he had destroyed. This is the start of a rebellion fantasy story about a banished man and a destroyed girl rebuilding a nation!
tags: Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy

name: My Sweet Enemy, Thy Name Is Husband
description:
My husband, my nemesis. Till death do us part.

Canach Riadon — a slave who rose to become the emperor and the man I wed in my first life. Yet our ill-fated marriage left my family murdered and my homeland destroyed at his hands. Now given a second chance, I vow to succeed in this political marriage and save all I love... Or will his love save me first?
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yubikiri
description:
From Ivyscan:  
Asako lives her life day-to-day– acutely aware of how lonely she is. That all starts to change when she meets Hongo, a boy who thought she was trying to commit suicide and tried to stop her. They form a bond and find how much fun life really is. Until Asako finds out about Hongo’s past.
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Phantasmagoria Days
description:
Follow the daily life and adventures of Dr. Hoop and his assistant, the robot Lancelot, across the planet Phantasmagoria in these short stories brimming with all sorts of peculiar characters. Experience the unique warmth and creativity Tamura Shigeru has to offer in this nostalgic world of his creation - infused with a touch of both humor and sadness.

---
More exploration of the world of Phantasmagoria, created after Tamura's short animation featuring scenes from the same world: **a piece of PHANTASMAGORIA**.
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Anthology, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life

description: A short story by "Bad Tripper" and "MY LITTLE MARS" author Yu Odoriba, following a young game developer who encounters a strange sword...

name: The Debt Collector Who's an Older Girl Takes Care of Me Little by Little
description:
A collector girl finds a child while collecting a debt: his parents have escaped to avoid paying 
and now she unwillingly finds herself in charge of keeping him safe and taking care of him... 
everything to protect him rewards, everything for that!
tags: Thriller, Action, Comedy, Mafia, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: See You in Eden
description: Oba Tamako tells of her time being at art high school.

name: Otomege Sekai wa Mob ni Kibishii Sekai desu
description: Leon, a former Japanese worker, was reincarnated into an “otome game” world, and despaired at how it was a world where females hold dominance over males. It was as if men were just livestock that served as stepping stones for females in this world. The only exceptions were the game’s romantic targets, a group of handsome men led by the crown prince. In these bizarre circumstances, Leon held one weapon: his knowledge from his previous world, where his brazen sister had forced him to complete this game. This is a story about his adventure to survive and thrive in this world.
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

tags: Comedy, Gore, Fantasy

name: [Rouhou] Ore no Iinazuke ni Natta Jimiko, Ie de wa Kawaii Shika nai.
description:
“Onii-san, congratulations on your marriage. This person is your bride.”

“M-my name is Watanae Yuuka… I’m in the same class as you…”

My name is Sakata Yuuichi. I’m in my 2nd year of high school. Due to my parents’ circumstances, I’m suddenly getting married..? Furthermore, my partner is a plain girl, Watanae-san. During my 3rd year of middle school, I went through a bad experience. Ever since then, I’ve only been interested in 2D heroines. There’s absolutely no way I’d ever be interested in a 3D girl. That was what I thought, but…

“…Well then, who’s your favorite heroine right now?”

Turns out, she was actually an otaku and she becomes very talkative when you get to know her. She’d always happily engage in our conversations. She showed me things I’d never have expected from a girl in my class.

“Err, since we’re going to be living together… Is it okay if I call you Yuu-kun?”

And, the moment I let my guard down, she’d instantly try to shorten the distance between us. What’s more…

“Just between you and me, I’m actually the voice actress for Yuuna Izumi from 『Alice Stage』. Thank you for always supporting me!”

It’s a secret from everyone else, but it turns out she’s actually my favorite heroine’s voice actress?! I am only interested in 2D heroines! But, Yuuka’s true self, which she only shows when she’s alone with me, is nothing but cute! This is the story of me and Yuuka, starting as bethrothed. A heartwarming and chaotic romcom!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Junket Bank
description: "Junket Bank" is a manga of a gambling place operated by a bank. Mitarai, a bank clerk bored with his every day duties. One day, Mitarai went to the basement of the bank while thinking that something was wrong with his new boss Usami, but witnessed gambling there...
tags: Traditional Games, Psychological, Comedy, Drama

name: Iki Okure Seijo no Shiawase
description:
“Huh? You’re already 27 years old”. 

The Saint Marialite’s engagement with the crown prince was called off because of her age! Due to various circumstances, the level-headed Marialite acknowledges this and returns to her hometown. However, she encounters a child raised in secret…? What's more, after growing up in a short amount of time, he falls for Marialite, and wants to take her back to his own country!

A romantic fantasy story about a level-headed saint who gets dumped for being in her late twenties and ends up living with the demon prince instead!

The adored fantasy's long awaited serialization!

---
**Adapted From:**
[Light Novel (Official English)](https://www.crossinfworld.com/The-Saints-Belated-Happiness-Newly-Single-Now-Living-with-the-Demon-Prince.html)

**Promotional Video:**
[行き遅れ聖女の幸せ PV](https://youtu.be/qjDjuDng6j8?si=onbw8A62tvnJ6Bb-)
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Despite Coming From the Abyss, I Will Save Humanity
description:
The Abyssals represent pure destruction. They have unparalleled power and follow their instinct to remove all life from the world. However, one day, a traitor appeared among them. Silvija, a clueless girl, woke up on the battlefield and learned that she is the "Twilight Abyssal" that the humans hate. After escaping numerous pursuits, Silvija was adopted by the Ilia family and gradually formed her conviction.
*She will save mankind using the body of an Abyssal. She will protect the kindness and warmth she received.*
However, it seems the Will of the Abyssals does not intend to succumb to her...

"Miss Silvija, it's time to display your power."
"Eh~ but I hafen't finifed my defferts yet..." Still a Chad as ever.
PS: The protagonist is single. Feel free to tease her~
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Mahoui Rex no Hentai Karte
description: In a world where the Demon King has been defeated and peace reigns, there is Rex, a magical doctois, who attends a clinic. However, the patients who visit them the most are those with something wrong with their heads enough to do perverted things with slime or extremely strange things with man-eaters... Here begins the strange medical comedy in another world!
tags: Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Magic, Medical, Fantasy

name: Doll
description: Muriel takes a chance and hurries over to try out for a casting. On her way there, she is knocked off her bike by the dance prodigy, Alosza. Somehow, she is cast into a musical as his partner!
tags: Romance, Drama

name: The Tale of Samjang
description:
Monk Sanzang from the "Journey to the west" has time slipped to the present-day Korea.   
  
She has lived her lifetime constantly fighting yokai but her most dangerous opponent turns out to be just one guy?!  
  
On the orders of Buddha, Monk Sanzang and her companions pilgramaged the Western regions in search of his teachings.  
Unlike Sun Wukong, Zhu Bajie, and Sha Wujing, who hoped to become gods in recognition of their contribution, rather than being tied down to the life of Buddhism, Sanzang wanted to remain in the human world and enjoy a new life as an ordinary human.  
  
But as she was being dragged to Heaven by orders from the Buddha, she notices a strange tunnel leading to the human world in which she escapes into…  
  
And the place where she fell is the Republic of Korea's Jeju Island!  
And she meets a guy named Lee Hyun?!  
  
The time-slipped Monk Sanzang a.k.a Hyeonjeong and the tsundere Lee Hyun's turbulent romance!
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Koha-Ace EX
description:
A Holy Grail War has broken out in Koha-Ace!

After managing to avoid getting axed again and again, some miracle has allowed for a third volume of Koha-Ace! The mysterious new Servant designed by Takashi Takeuchi, Sakura Saber, is a storm of romance who will play an active role! We'll show you the real power of Koha-Ace. (Third Volume of Koha-Ace, following Koha-Ace+)

description: Side stories for My Clueless First Friend (Jijyou wo Shiranai Tenkousei ga Guigui Kuru) posted on the author's Twitter and Pixiv. Several of these chapters later got added to the regular main manga volume releases as (bonus) chapters.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: The Story of How The Horned Owl I Rescued Turned Into a Girl
description: One day, a kind-hearted young man finds an injured owl and decides to take it in, caring for it until it recovers. However, to his surprise, the owl mysteriously transforms into a young girl overnight. The girl, who has the appearance and behavior of the owl, struggles to adapt to her new human form while the protagonist tries to understand the strange circumstances behind her transformation. As they navigate the challenges of this unexpected change, they form a unique bond, uncovering magical secrets and slowly developing feelings for each other. But with the transformation still unresolved, they must find out what it means and whether the owl-girl can return to her true form—or if she even wants to.
tags: Loli, Animals, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
The protagonist is an ordinary soldier from an empire at war who gets used as a guinea pig for genetic engineering experiments, turned into a monster and put into cryosleep.

200 years later he wakes up in a sword and sorcery world. The empire is gone and he has to survive alone in the body of a monster whom everybody wants to kill on sight. Meanwhile he encounters various pretty ladies (and elves) in need of rescue.

[Original JP Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n6204gb/)
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Magic, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Piccolina
description:
Akira, a young yakitori shop owner, has fallen in love with Houka, a bunny girl who often eats at his restaurant. But how can he get close to her when he has to focus on the grill‽ And there are 4 other bunny girls that look just like her‽

**Note:** “Piccolina” is short for “Picco di Stellina”, which means “Starlet Peak” or “Peak of the Starlet” in Italian.

name: Kuroneko to Majo no Kyoushitsu
description: Spica Virgo is an apprentice witch, but she can't use magic. She needs a tutor to get into the magic academy she's always dreamed of, but she doesn't have the money or the connections... But suddenly, Spica meets a mysterious, talking black cat who can use magic! He agrees to make her his apprentice, but only if she promises to rid him of his curse! But to break it, she has to kiss him on the...!?
tags: Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy

name: Kamitachi ni Hirowareta Otoko
description:
Upon his sudden death, middle-aged otaku businessman Ryoma Takebayashi finds himself in a curious situation. Three gods request his cooperation in their divine plot, which requires him to reincarnate in another world as a young boy! Equipped with magic, young Ryoma undertakes a carefree existence in the forest, leisurely learning more about his new abilities and surroundings. And when he encounters slimes like those in video games from his former life, Ryoma uses his newfound magical powers to get creative with his research! Will the gods get more than they bargained for in Ryoma?!

[MangaUp!](https://global.manga-up.com/manga/273)

description: Universal Century 0121: A battle known as the First Oldsmobile War erupted on Mars. The Earth Federation Forces 13th Experimental Combat Group thought they had quelled the Mars Independent Zeon Forces. But the battle for the Fastest Formula is far from over! A new tale from the F90FF begins on Mars... Where all Formulas converge!

name: Night of Shadows
description: Lee Ahreum, who has precognitive dreams, started to recall the nightmares that she had already forgotten. In her notebook, she found things that she doesn't recall writing. "I never wrote anything like this! But... I'm sure this was my dream..." One by one, the monsters that she saw in her dreams, as well as people with special abilities, began to appear in reality.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Survival, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Show Me the Money
description:
Hilarious manhua (Taiwanese manga) about a girl to whom money means everything.  
  
Dahasu Zuhn's father has just gotten into debt and now his son, Dahasu Zuhn, is in poverty. He meets a girl called Amei Jin who's super strong and has a reason to get money. Dahasu also attends the High School, Freedom High School where he can get in for free. He meets Jin at the school and learns that she needs money for a special reason. Now he is her slave because he owes her 20,000 yen. Whatever shall Zuhn do?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Touhou - Nijiiro Market (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, 4-Koma, Doujinshi

name: Anata no Koisuru Kirai na Watashi
description:
A confession from the boss with a secret longing. The passionate gaze and tender, loving caresses. It's like a dream... but maybe it's not me whom he loves.

Saki was once bullied because of her appearance, but she has improved her makeup skills and is now a glamorous beauty. The men in her offices make advances, and although some of her co-workers gossip about her being fliratious, she is still able to do her best everyday because of her boss, Director Banshou, who approves of her work ethics. One night, when she was out without makeup because she was close to her home, her boss approaches her and confesses his feelings for her! He didn't seem to realize that it was his subordinate, Saki.

What does it mean? Is he mistaking me for someone else? This is a supreme melodrama between two adults who cross paths.
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Drama

name: Shin Kamen Rider Spirits (Special Edition)
description:
(Kamen Rider, the righteous warrior who shouts out "Henshin!" and continues to fight evil. The heroes created by the genius Shotaro Ishinomori are brought back to life by the hard-working Muraeda Kenichi!  In this epic hero battle story, the 10th rider "ZX" fights alongside the previous riders against the mysterious organization "BADAN" that is invading the world!)

“Kamen Rider SPIRITS” is a manga series adapted from the famous Kamen Rider series with content focusing on the first 10 Kamen Riders in Japan's Showa period (Showa) and their battle with the Badan Empire under with the help of a multi-governmental task force called “SPIRITS”. The manga's setting takes place immediately after the Kamen Rider Super-1 series, and is different from the TV Special "Birth of the 10th! Kamen Riders All Together!!" in 1984.

In particular, this manga also contributes to supplementing and correcting missing details in the original series such as why Riderman is still alive after the Pluton warhead explosion in the series "Kamen Rider V3", or why Electronic Wave Humanoid Tackle was never recognized as a Kamen Rider. Initially, the series was published in the manga magazine "Magazine Z" and had to stop for a while because "Magazine Z" decided to cancel publication. Later, the manga was revived by "Monthly Shounen Magazine" under the name "Shin Kamen Rider SPIRITS" and continues to be published to this day.

Since volume 3, Shin Kamen Rider Spirits has been published with a special edition, comes with a rare cover, and a separate volume of colorized version for a specific arc in the manga. The first arc which was fully colored was chapter 1 from the original run ("Skyscraper's Gale"). 

(P/S: Although there are differences in the presence or absence of the booklet and the cover design between the regular and special editions, the main contents of the manga themselves are the same.)
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Official Colored, Monsters, Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Monster Girls, Aliens

name: Itsuka Shinu nara E o Utte kara
description: Kazuki is a janitor who lives in a cafe and his only hobby is drawing. One day, a strange young man asks him to buy a painting from him. An encounter through the window changes the course of his life...!
tags: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Little Lord of Karate
description: Kohinata Minoru is a college student at a college that is popular for its sports rather than academic orientation. He starts out as a gymnast alongside his friend, Nana, but is bullied by his gymnast seniors. One evening, a karate student at the college, Mutou Ryuuji, witnesses Minoru being bullied and comes to his rescue and drags him into the world of karate. Minoru makes new friends and learns some of their dark pasts, including a shocking death that reveals motives for revenge. (from Baka-Updates)
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, School Life

name: Mother Nature's Children
description: It was published in Monthly Magazine Garo (月刊漫画ガロ) on December 1973
tags: Oneshot, Animals

name: To Whom the Deer Falls
description: Lu Nanzhi reincarnated into a stand-in romance novel as vicious female rival, and her task is to make the heroine Chen Xi achive happiness. The industry beauty thought that attacking the heroine was also a way to ‘make the heroine happy’, so she took the initiative to pursue the heroine. But she gradually felt that the attitude towards herself from the surrounding characters seemed to be different from that in the book?

name: I Have the Heart of a Dragon
description: Sharon, is a warrior who defeated a vicious dragon a thousand years ago. One day, an unidentified man appears in front of Aru, who grew up longing for Sharon. "What? Are you that terrifying dragon? Besides, I'm that hero?!" A cute and sad romance fantasy of a dragon and a hero who reunited after a thousand years!
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kanon
description:
Kanon is the story of Yuuichi Aizawa and his return to his always snowy hometown after eight years. The problem is that Yuuichi doesn't remember his time there and all the people he met, so he has to gradually begin to remember everything. Of course this being a love story Yuuichi meets several girls including his cousin Naiyuki, the taiyaki obsessed Ayu, the silent Mai, the cute yet aggressive Makoto, and the terminally ill Shiori.   
  
(Source: Otakuism)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Fuzoroi no Renri - Side Stories
description:
From Newtype site:  
  
Our ages are different, our ways of life are different, everything is different. But… I just want to be with you!  
Because I've never been in a miserable, tragic romance, I can say that unrequited love is fine…  
I don't know why I fell in love with this person…it's a mystery!  
  
They have different personalities, different ages, different ways of thinking, different looks, different everything.  
This is the story of girls who clumsily make up for what's lacking in the other.  
  
T/N:  
These are side stories. Not a rewrite of the original serialized twitter comic. It builds up on what happens in the main series in a longer format. It eventually merges with the main series in the volume edition.
   
The kind of stories these are is all in the title!  
  
不揃 (fuzoroi) means uneven, irregular, but also incomplete. 連理 (renri) is "entwined relationship".  

So, these are stories of intimate relationships between "incomplete" girls that somehow complete each other, against all odds.
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Goddess of Lingerie
description: Inside of Teiou's women's underwear department, there is a goddess full of love for lingerie. Her name is Ebisu Amane—a charismatic clerk and fitter. Amane's determination allows her to help every guest with their troubles choosing underwear, or with the troubles in their hearts!
tags: Drama, Slice of Life

name: Melodramatic
description: Collection of stories published in Garo.
tags: Drama

name: Saikin Haitta Shiro Madoushi ga Party Crusher de, Ore no Isekai Boukensha Seikatsu ga Houkai ni Kiki na Ken ni Tsuite
description: Toma was transported to another world due to an accident caused by a female circle crusher. So, he made friends in the new world and rebuilt his life as an adventurer. However, then, another girl joined his party... Will his life collapse once again because of another circle crusher who also exists in this new world!?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Gabriel DropOut
description: A fallen angel with falling grades! Gabriel White Tenma has descended from heaven to attend high school and guide humanity, but a newly found video game addiction might say otherwise.
tags: Demons, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Otona o Shiritai Onnatomodachi
description:
20-year-old Sawatari Tatsurou is a male college student. While others around him are rejoicing in the springtime of their youth, he's enjoying his solitary life to the fullest. He has a noble hobby. Which is… appreciating lewd vide*s. “I don't need a girlfriend. Because I have AVs”. A fulfilling everyday where he continuously releases his male desires with his exceptional AV love…… However one day, his classmate and gal galpal Kaniko Eimi witnesses him cranking it at his place!

Then, she says something shocking to Tatsurou, who thinks the world is ending.

“I-is it fine if I watch the AV together with you……?”

Watch it together with your innocent galpal with an immoral atmosphere! A vid-life story where male desires are laid bare with a gal!
___
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/watch/mg878860)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Gyaru

name: The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses - Twitter Side Stories
description: Side stories and illustrations from the author's Twitter.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Yeon Lok Heun
description:
Yeon Lokheun is a girl who grows up living as a boy learning martial and spiritual arts. She heads for the palace in order to clear the name of her father, a wanted criminal, where she meets the young Emperor Garyun. He promises to save her father's life in exchange for her lifelong services. After gaining Garyun's trust, she travels the world solving supernatural-like problems that arise in place of the Emperor. But how long can she continue this life without the others finding out that she is actually a woman?

---
Lokheun’s name means "happy morning," but her life takes a tragic turn when her mother is murdered and her father becomes a fugitive after exacting revenge. To save him, Lokheun devotes her life to Garyun, the dashing emperor who’s committed to right the wrongs of his father. Believing Lokheun to be a boy, Garyun is determined to mold her into an unsurpassed martial artist, even if it means sending her to hell. Their strained relationship turns into something more as Lokheun searches for the one thing she’s never had: a life befitting her name.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%B0%EB%A1%9D%ED%9D%94/2621), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=51793959)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/his-majestys-secret-heroine/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/76054)
tags: Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Migawari Otome no Koufuku-na Yomeiri - Meiko to Musubi no Akashi
description:
A story of two people who had a sad fate until they found a new happiness.

The time is the Taisho era.

The orphan Meiko, who suffers from weak eyesight, lives a modest but peaceful life at a temple orphanage. One day, a suspicious person visits the temple and suddenly attacks Meiko.

When she wakes up, she finds that time had rewound several months back. To avoid death, Meiko follows a guide. There she meets her long-lost twin sister, Kanako, the daughter of a marquis... After her parents tell her the story of her birth, Meiko is to marry Matsuwaka Akashi, a military man feared as the "Demon Akashi," as Kanako's substitute-
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Romance, Drama, Mystery

name: Ookami wa Tantei o Tabetai
description: I have no confidence that I can "wait"."Werewolf Syndrome" - The spontaneous onset of a strange disease. Those who are affected present symptoms such as attacking and devouring humans. In this world, this is merely an urban legend, but, 10 years ago, Reito's brother was killed by a werewolf. Since then he has spent his life as a lone detective in order to expose the truth behind werewolves. Under such circumstances, he meets his estranged nephew for the first time in 10 years. Reito was briefly surprised to see that Yoru, who used to be a crybaby, is now a dashing university student who towers over him. Shortly after, Yoru suggests that Reito should hire him in the detective agency...?!
tags: Thriller, Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Duality of a Loving Heart
description: A Romcon With a Girl With a Dual Personality
tags: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Kenshou
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic

name: Atashi o Ijimeta Kanojo no Ko
description:
My name is Haru, and I was a victim of bullying.
The one who inflicted the bullying on me was a girl named Misari.
Our reunion after several years happened in a way that I didn't expect.
And then that "incident" happened.
We— the two of us...

Just how far are the sins you will forgive? When will you forgive my sin? 

This is a "sisterhood road movie" kind of story where hatred and love comes around!
tags: Drama

name: Gorillaman
description:
Ikedo Sadaharu, a transfer student at Shiratake High School, quickly earns the nickname "Gorilla-Man" due to his intimidating appearance. Despite his fearsome looks, Ikedo's true nature is misunderstood by his peers. The story humorously explores his attempts to fit into his new school, deal with bullies, and inadvertently gain respect, blending comedy with school life drama.

Won the 14th Kodansha Manga Award for general manga in 1990 (tied with Chinmoku no Kantai).
tags: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents

name: Wakaba-chan wa Wakarasetai!
description:
Four-eyes who's bad with girls is only able to talk to with his tomboyish childhood friend Wakaba. But one day Wakaba appears before him in an amazingly cute outfit...!? 

This is a battle rom-com between Wakaba who wants to be loved and four-eyes who gets flustered by girls!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Death March kara Hajimaru Isekai Kyousoukyoku
description: 29-year-old programmer Suzuki Ichirou finds himself transported into a fantasy RPG. Within the game, he's a 15-year-old named Satou. At first he thinks he's dreaming, but his experiences seem very real. Due to his use of a 3-time-use special power (meteor shower), he ends up wiping out an army of lizardmen and becoming very high level. He hides his level and plans to live peacefully and meet new people, though developments in the game story (like the return of a demon king) might get in his way.
tags: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: This Villainess Wants a Divorce!
description:
The protagonist has been reincarnated as Canaria, the villain of a popular cliché novel. According to the novel, she is destined to be executed by her husband! Determined to survive, her objective is simple: get a divorce! Will her plans be enough to save her life, or will unexpected circumstances arise to complicate matters even further?  

---
We all hate the greedy villains hell-bent on sabotage. Enter Carnelia Easter, the awful secondary villainess of the romance I’m reading, who trapped the prince in marriage at the behest of the evil empress. 

I didn’t shed a tear when her head was lopped off, but now I'm Carnelia! I gotta play this smart and convince him to divorce me instead! Still, between the prince, the empress, the heroine, the second prince, my terrible health... this story’s getting unpredictable. Will I survive after all?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Berserk of Gluttony
description: In this world, there are two types of people. Those Who have powerful "skills", and those who don't. People born with powerful skills, exterminate monsters to level up and become successful, while people without them, become failures, who are treated harshly by society. Follow the story of Fate, a guy who works as a gatekeeper, and whose only skill is gluttony, a skill that only makes him hungry.
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Yankee JK Kuzuhana-chan: Another Side of the Heroine
description: Male to female ratio 1:359!!! Popular harem school romantic comedy! Official spin-off of ‘Yankee JK Kuzuhana-chan’ depicting unknown episodes of the heroines that were not depicted in the main story!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Delinquents, Gyaru

name: Boku no Kanojo wa Dekkawaii
description:
For as long as he remembers, Komi has been shorter than his fellow classmates. He always felt inferior as a result, until he met Obinata - a girl who is head and shoulders above him. 

Yes, Asumi Obinata is tall. She’s imposing. But she’s also Komi Amane’s girlfriend. And these two are the happiest kids in the world. 

The super-popular oneshot has been expanded to a full series here!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Abnorlove - Fuufu de Abnormal Love Shimasen ka?
description:
No matter how lovey-dovey you start, you'll gradually get stuck in a rut. But if you incorporate abnormal love acts into your daily life, you'll have marital and sexual happiness!? Filming first-person porn, certain hotels, cosplay, and so on... This is a married-couple romantic comedy full of real abnormal information(!!) you can start using tomorrow(?)

(Source: Kodansha, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Choose Your First Partner
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, 4-Koma, Web Comic

name: Mou Zenbu Ore Hitori de Iinja Nai Ka?
description:
In a world where extraordinary powers called *" Beneïsons "* govern everything; only a boy named Kleis was granted the gift of the *" Seint Graal "*, a power whose use he could not even understand.

Despite this, he did not lose heart and formed a party with his childhood friend Hinoka, who possessed the beneïson of the *" Seint de l'Espee "*, to carry out guild missions. However, due to a minor misunderstanding and betrayal, his mind and body were shattered.

At the same time, Kleis' beneïson revealed its true potential. The *" Seint Graal "* was the pinnacle of power, capable of granting any beneïson in existence to himself or others.

Having lost everything, yet now holding the power to gain everything, what will he choose? The end of the world or something else?
tags: Monsters, Action, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: One Step Divine Fist
description:
Born as the son of a wealthy family, 'Jang Geon' was destined for ruin. To turn his fate around, he had to live a simple life under the guidance of a virtuous monk.

Given to the frugal monk 'Gyeongmok' at Shaolin Temple, Jang Geon spent his days in rough cotton robes, barely getting by on plain rice...

While enduring hunger and minimizing movement in his daily life, he stumbled upon martial arts and managed to apply his mindset of thrift to it…?
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy

name: The Regressor Protects Only Me
description: “Let the Survival Game Begin!”Designated as a disruptive species in the universe’s ecology, humanity must now participate in the ‘league’ under the watchful eye of the universal administrators. Jaehui Jin, sent back in time during the final stage of the game, arrives at one conclusion - only Sion Kang has the power to lead humanity to victory.
tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Monster Holic
description:
People become primal beasts, give up rational thought, and celebrate their freedom in anonymity.

This is the "Masked City."

It is a town where anyone can casually transform into a beast by taking a "monster supplement" and do whatever they want. It is the only government-approved "slum" where one can forget the stifling atmosphere of a completely monitored society. In this town, a vampire boy named Zero, who was a real monster, and his werewolf partner Tsuki take on the job of "exterminating vermin" as street cleaners. They search for hit-and-run centaurs, hunt JK bunnies, and fight to the death against an urban legend that has emerged. An encounter with the "Medicine Witch" will change the destiny of Zero and his friends.

(Source: Dengeki Bunko, translated)
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Adaptation

name: Tomodachi tte Konna koto surun da
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love

name: Non Milk-Milk Coffee Webcomic
description: A male office worker falls in love with the owner of a small coffee shop in a corner of the big city.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Office Workers, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Stalker x Stalker
description:
Tsukita and Taiyou are close friends at university. One day, Taiyou is revealed to have been stalking Tsukita. However, it turns out Tsukita is also stalking Taiyou, even collecting his baby teeth...
A suspenseful (?) love comedy about two people stalking each other and having 'unrequited' love!
tags: Psychological, Boys' Love

name: Seiyuu Radio no Ura Omote
description: Yugure Yuhi and Utatane Yasumi, two high schooler voice actresses who just happened to attend the same school and coincidentally got placed into the same class, are the two hosts of a radio weekly program. As fellow classmates and voice actresses, they show all the listeners their great friendship! At least, on the surface. In reality, the quiet girl Chika and the gyaru Yumiko are complete opposites. And they absolutely cannot stand each other. Off air, chaos and insults erupt. On air, they're the best of friends. Just where will this tumultuous relationship lead them?
tags: Award Winning, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Sharty to Renkinjutsu no Machi
description: Coo Hem, a town where alchemists gather. Sharty, a new apprentice of Garo, a first-rate but stubborn alchemist, is training energetically today! However, she is overflowing with motivation and energy, and Garo is always angry with her. This is a fantasy in which one girl struggles to become a full-fledged alchemist!
tags: Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Karina's Last Days
description:
As the middle child who is neither the heir nor the cherished younger twins, Karina has lived her whole life hidden away from others. She, who only had one hobby of painting, found out that she only had one year left to live. So without a plan, she went to visit her fiancé who she barely knew… To annul the engagement as he always wanted.

"I won’t beat around the bush. I want to spend a year here."

"...Milady, have you gone crazy?"

"In return, I'll agree to annul the engagement."

But, she didn't know then. That she would receive the unconditional love that she had never received her whole life from him, and that she would come to have a desire to live her once meaningless life.

---
Though gifted with an ability to bring her drawings to life, Karina Leopold spent her years in the shadow of her famous siblings, forced to be the good daughter her parents wanted. But when she's told that a deadly disease will kill her in a year, she offers a deal to her fiancé, Milian Pastellio, with the goal to live the remainder of her days far from her family's reach. Much to her surprise, their encounter proceeds to change them both in a way she never imagined...

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52783700)

**Official English Translation of the Novel:** [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/29265), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/karinas-last-days-novel/info)
