tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy

name: The Girl with a Kansai Accent and the Pure Boy
description: Kizuki-kun, a serious boy who grew up in Toukyou, moves to Oosaka to attend middle school. He lives for free with a friend of his mother's, a Kansai-dialect-speaking chatty adult older girl!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Shota, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure - Moscow Calling (Doujinshi)
description:
Moscow Calling takes place in Russia in 2000. This story is about Georgiy Lastochkin, an 18-year old Russian student with mysterious stand. Living in Vladivostok, he studies at a local university, and happens to have a crush on one of his classmates. On one end he has to deal with his everyday life as a student - on the other, he needs to deal with the mysteries of his Stand.  
  
One day he begins travelling throughout Russia, all the way from Vladivostok to Moscow! There are sure to be faithful friends and clever enemies, comedy and drama, and of course - Stand battles. Learn what it means to be a Russian Stand user in JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Moscow Calling!  
  
Italian summary:  
||Moscow Calling è ambientato nella Russia del 2000. Il protagonista di questa storia è Georgiy Lastochkin, uno studente diciottenne russo con uno stand misterioso. Visto che vive a Vladivostok, studia all'università locale, e si prende una cotta per una delle sue compagne di corso. Da una parte deve affrontare la sua vita da studente - dall'altra, deve avere a che fare con i misteri del suo stand.  
  
Un giorno inizia a viaggiare per tutta la Russia, da Vladivostok a Mosca! Incontrerà dei fedeli amici e dei nemici intelligenti, una drammatica commedia, e ovviamente - battaglie con stand. Impara cosa significa essere un portatore di stand russo in Le bizzarre avventure di Jojo: la chiamata di Mosca!||
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Plunderer
description: In the world of Alcia' where rank is determined by "counts" a young girl named Hina scours the land for the fabled Ace-the legendary hero of the Waste War. With only the last words of her missing mother to guide her search' she wanders from town to town until she meets Licht' a clownish masked vagrant with a count of –999. Girl-crazy and unpredictable' he's the exact opposite of a hero…or at least' that's how he appears…
tags: Thriller, Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Zombies, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Zaako Zako Zako Zako Sensei
description:
Souichi Kirisaki, who teaches at a private middle school, has a problem. Three of his students, Senka Yuzugami, Yuki Kitsuregawa, and Momoka Watarase, make fun of him. Souichi wants to be well liked, but the girls look down on him and tease him every day. Soichi is troubled, but the truth is that all three of them love Souichi, they just can't be honest with him, plus Momoka is a stalker... A sassy and cute romcom between a teacher and three middle school students!
Note: formerly a two-part Oneshot, it became serialized as of Chapter 3.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Vampire Part-Timer Kirishima-kun
description:
He's a vampire destined to lead the world to ruin… So why is he working part time at a convenience store?! A 4-koma about demi-human working!  
  
The new clerk in the convenience store where Amamiya works at is half-human and half-vampire?! Not to mention, their colleagues are a werewolf and an android… Watching these demi-humans work with the half-vampire Kirishima-kun should be entertaining in this working comedy☆
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Vampires, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Killing Line
description:
Mako, a high school girl who has been abandoned by her father who disappeared, is forced to resort to papa-katsu (dating a sugar-daddy) to survive. On her first night, while she is taking a shower after finishing her business, her sugar-daddy is killed by a hitman, and he is about to kill Mako as well, but the hitman seems to recognize her somehow. 

Caught in a desperate situation, Mako has one last chance! Selling flattery in order to survive! Operation Fake Lover is about to begin!
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life

name: Mahou Shoujo Kakeru
description: A boy has become a magical girl, Kazana Kakeru is going to become more feminine to get stronger…
tags: Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Magical Girls, Shota, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Yo-Jo Life!
description: Akihiko Shimura, 20 years old (male). When I woke up in the morning, I was a little blonde loli.
tags: Genderswap, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Umi ga Hashiru End Roll
description:
After turning 65 and bereaved of her husband, Umiko visits a cinema for the first time in decades. A shocking, life-changing event awaits her. When she meets Kai, an art student majoring in film, Umiko realises that she wants to make a film. She realises that she is on the side of "the people who want to make films"...
Lured by the waves that stir her heart, the 65-year-old dives into the sea of film!
tags: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Karakai Jouzu no (Moto) Takagi-san
description:
Takagi and Nishikata are now married and have a kindergarten-aged daughter named Chi. See how much some things have changed, and others have curiously stayed the same!  
  
*Note: The volumes collect the chapters in a different order than the web version. The chapters here follow the web numbering without any volumes.*
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Sabori nara Hokenshitsu de Douzo?
description:
"Do you want to skip class with Sensei?" 
"I'm fine!"

Miyake Mia has always worn the mask of an exemplary student. Recently, however, there is someone who draws a lot of attention to her. That's Nurse Morikubo, who is rumored to be a "delinquent" within the school....
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Gemned
description: In a world where magic has become a myth, Erthea is racing against time before it succumbs to darkness. A century after the defeat of the Titan, the source of magic and balance, four young heroes - Gem, Nexo, Rubi, and Atoū - embark on a desperate mission. They must deliver the Destiny Gems, created by ancient heroes, before they expire. These gems grant extraordinary powers and contain the souls of the heroes. However, Nickel Krants, a once-revered hero turned powerful antagonist, seeks to steal the gems to resurrect his lost friends. The protagonists will face rival cults, demons, and adversities. Guided by the mysterious cosmic entity Theo, they must overcome their limitations and unite to save Erthea. Can they fulfill their mission before time runs out?
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Supernatural

name: Mapping - The Trash-Tier Skill That Got Me Into a Top-Tier Party
description:
‘Mapping’.  
  
For his 15th birthday, Note is gifted this inferior version of the skills ‘World Map’ and ‘Area Map’. In other words, a trash skill.  
  
Soon after, Note’s childhood friend obtains extremely powerful skills and due to his self-loathing, reluctantly decides to part ways.  
  
Having driven away the childhood friend he secretly had feelings for, he lives his days in misery while trying to earn a daily income through adventuring.  
  
“…We need that skill of yours.”  
  
However, his life changes when a young man named Jin approaches him.  
  
This is a story of a boy named Note, who—with no cheats or skills of his own—joins a party full of the strongest cheat-like skills and sweats, fights, and struggles his way to dungeon domination. A story of that kind of growth.
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Shiretto Sugee Koto Itteru Gal. - Shiritsu Paranomaru Koukou no Nichijou
description:
Youth = friendship, effort, and future prediction! A very ordinary and supernatural daily life led by the strongest and most invincible gyarus with different abilities.

Based on the short animations on Youtube. 
- [Official YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@parako)
- [Official Twitter/X](https://twitter.com/parako_official)
___
[Alt Official Raw (Young Jump)](https://ynjn.jp/title/11987)
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Gyaru

name: Momiji no Kisetsu (2018)
description: Momiji Kuramichi has all the passion in the world for the game of shogi. Unfortunately, he has none of the talent. This is especially frustrating because his brother was a legend in the game. How can he be such a flop? He's developed a unique way of dealing with his frustration—head-butting everything! But you can't headbutt your way to victory in shogi. Is he doomed to wither under the shadow of his brother forever?
tags: Psychological, Sports, Drama

name: ZomGan
description:
In a world where everyone struggles to live, Onmirae, the only boy who wants death.
One day, a death squad appeared in front of him and offered him a proposal. ‘I’ll kill you, let’s rebuild human society together’ To
die, you have to save everyone.
tags: Action, Demons, Psychological, Long Strip, Zombies, Horror, Full Color

name: Tacchan, Docchi Toru?
description:
Let's be close friends together, the three of us ♡.

Tatsuya—nicknamed “Tacchan”—is a college student who ends up freeloading at the home of his twin childhood friends, Ritsuka and Futaba. The three of them were close friends, but the twins grew up to be cute, and their feelings of love for Tacchan seem like they're about to run wild!?

A slightly lewd and heart-pounding cohabitation romantic comedy ♡.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Yashiro no Maou
description: Maou Shaitan Geneha, a demon lord whose powers were sealed away, seeks out the descendant of the one who sealed her; company employee Shishibe Yashiro. Wanting Yashiro to undo the seal, Maou forms a contract with her, aiming to satisfy Yashiro in the hopes that she'll undo the seal.
tags: Demons, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Taiyou no Ijiwaru
description:
A collection of four short stories by Fuyumi Souryou.  
  
The Rainbow Fish is a story about a painter and her problems dealing with a culture that doesn't leave too much space for artistic inspiration. From a little girl to adulthood, Sari struggles to show how she sees life through her eyes. This story is something of an autobiography.  
  
Damned Sun is about a cynical girl who isn't very enthusiastic about most things teenagers like. She meets a man, a funny, interesting gangster. They get along very well from the beginning, understanding each other without too many words… But it only lasts one day, since what shakes Maki from her apathy can't last long…  
  
Strange Trait asks the question: Are human beings are like groceries? Do they really have a certain durability? A writer thinks so, and she bases her novel on the idea.  
  
A Strange Gene is about Ayano Yoshimusa; a superb worker, efficient, accurate, and cold. Saegusa, her colleague, is her opposite: messy, chaotic and warm. He admires his boss, whenever he talks to her he realises what a perfect creature she is. But as always, not everything is what it seems. When a sixteen years old appears and tells him she lives with Ayano, Saegusa seems to perceive that something might be hidden under the perfect appearance of this beautiful woman.
tags: Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Zatsu Tabi: That's Journey
description:
Chika Suzugamori, a rookie manga artist, has been getting rejected every time she submits a new draft.

On the verge of giving up, she suddenly gets the idea of going on a journey-

A journey that heals precisely because it's rough - the ultimate travel comic!
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Slice of Life

name: GIGANT
description: Rei Yokoyamada, a high school boy who has a movie producer father. One day, while out with friends to shoot a film that he plans to enter into a film festival, a poster of Papiko, an adult video actress with big breasts, catches his eye.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Drama, School Life, Aliens, Mystery

name: RaW Hero
description:
The unemployed Chiaki is the eldest of three brothers.  
With no parents, he starts job hunting to support his two younger brothers.  
Chiaki witnesses a young woman being sexually assaulted and tries to help, 
without knowing that this behavior would change his destiny.  


---
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Superhero, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Drama, Police, Supernatural

name: THE iDOLM@STER: Shiny Colors - Coherent Light
description: Serizawa Asahi, Mayuzumi Fuyuko, and Izumi Mei, members of the idol unit *Straylight*, openly declare themselves as rivals. While they occasionally clash, they further polish their talents, shining even brighter. The new manga adaptation of the game *The iDOLM@STER: Shiny Colors*, compatible with the *Enza* platform, is here!
tags: Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music, Gyaru

name: Mobile Suit Gundam MSV-R Legend of the Universal Century Heroes: The Fabulous Shin Matsunaga
description:
Many heroes have fought through the eras. Soldiers play a sonorous melody, their traces shaping the course of history. Even now, their stories shall be read from a corner of the Pantheon. For those with regrets in their hearts, the battle begins. This is a tale of heroes who fell in space.  
  
I. White Wolf of Rainbows: There was once a man called the White Wolf of Solomon. A man who was even said to be the right hand man of Vice Admiral Dozle Zabi, the commander of the Principality of Zeon’s Space Assault Force. The year 0079 of the Universal Century was a year painted with death and destruction, all in the name of Zeon’s war for independence. So how did that man live through those times? This is the story that traces his paths…
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Tragedy

name: Isekai de Slow Life wo (Ganbou)
description: By the will of the goddess, Itsuki Shinomiya was given the privilege of choosing various abilities and being reborn in another world. However, before going to the other world, he didn't want to involve himself in scary, dirty, gross things like battles. Fiercely determined to live a slow life, he chose the unique skill [Pocket Money], giving him an amount of money once per day. "With this, I can hang out with girls without having to work!" Dreaming of avoiding battles and living with cute girls, Itsuki stepped into the other world! But the reality was not that simple. Getting attacked by giant bugs, getting caught up in arguments at the guild, and getting stuck with slaves?! In the end, will Itsuki be able to live his ideal slow life?! Using unique skills and manufacturing skills, an exciting other-world slow life with beautiful girls starts now! (hopefully)
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Dragon Ball - We Are The Heroes - Illust Collection (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Doujinshi, Full Color

name: Orange Flavor
description: Orange Flavor is a comedy comics anthology written and drawn by Micah Rockandroll. A mix of short stories, comedy features, and one-page gags—It’s Cartoon Network meets Dan Clowes’s Eightball.
tags: Comedy, Anthology, Self-Published, Video Games, Delinquents

name: Elf ga Gendai ni Itara
description:
An anthology about Elves living in modern society.

---

**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/55153) (Compiled with [If Elves Existed in the Present Day ~Part Timer~ (Pre-Serialization)](https://mangadex.org/title/e42799d9-4829-4b4c-b898-96f3b0b45566/if-elves-existed-in-the-present-day-part-timer))
- Defunct Official Raw - [Twitter Moment](https://twitter.com/i/events/1430365122187304960)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: There Are No Bad Precious Children
description:
<You have obtained the skill [Precious Child Status Notification]! You can now more accurately assess the condition of the child who needs your help.>

Edith Irene Bruxelles had one secret: she had experienced possession.

One day, out of nowhere, she became Edith. Not only that, she was in a completely different era, in a strange country she had never heard of before!

And, on top of that, she had an unusual ability that others couldn't see.

To return to her original life, Edith chose to enter into a contractual marriage with a genius sorcerer Duke.

"Will you marry me?"
"Yes! I’d love to!"

However...

"What’s going on? Do you really think you’re the Duchess of the Duke’s family?"
"Bruxelles? Has anyone even heard of that family?"

The nobles reject her because she comes from a fallen family.

"Actually, this is great!"

She thinks positively and goes about her life, but she keeps running into children who are struggling behind the social scenes.

<Stress: 130/100 [Danger!!]>
[Appropriate action for the Precious Child is required.]

"Miss, could you please hold the child's hand?"

Unable to watch any longer, she steps in, and before she knows it, she becomes known as the "fixer."

"Duchess, I was hoping we could meet privately next week."
"I’d like that too. Would you be able to come to our residence?"

The story of how I, once an outcast in high society, became the top invitee.

Finally adjusting to the changed atmosphere, now her husband is acting strangely.

"Is that something you normally say you like?"
"Well, I guess so?"
"If that's the case, then what I like is you."

Oh my, who in the world confesses like that!?

(Source: Kakao Page, edited)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Kaze to Ki no Uta
description:
It is 1880 at the all-boys school, Lacombrade Academy in France. Serge Battour is a cheerful and kind new student who is trying to fit in with the rest of the student body, despite the taboo of his gypsy heritage, made obvious by his dark skin. However, his roommate Gilbert Cocteau, known for sleeping with anyone at the school to manipulate them to his advantage, is not helping the situation, especially when he makes it his personal goal to bring about Serge's downfall.   
  
Originally published in the 1970's, Kaze to Ki no Uta is considered by many to be the first true yaoi manga. In 1979, this series was awarded the prestigious Shogakukan Manga Award for shounen/shoujo manga.  
  
A bit of warning: "Kaze…" includes scenes of rape and child abuse (including lots of shota).
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Crime, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Sugarless
description: Shiiba Gaku wants to be the boss of Kushima High, which is popularly known as “Windmill”. In order to become number one, he has to face many challenges because the school is full of tough opponents. Just as he decides to take the fist step, an afro-looking guy interrupts him. What will happen from now on? Will he be able to realize his dream?
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Delinquents

name: Erotic x Anabolic
description: Ageki Kyousuke, a fat guy with a big appetite, has always been interested in Mitsukura Itsuha, a girl who doesn't stand out in his class. He comes across her alone on the rooftop after school, exposing her erotic body in an extreme swimsuit! Kyousuke finds out Itsuha's secret, which is too unexpected to be ……!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: I Became the Mother of the Evil Male Lead
description: The newly reincarnated Sheriel learns she has become the mother of Karthizel Roperam, the male lead of a dark romance fantasy novel. All the neglect Karthizel faces as a child leads him to become a crazy and obsessive man who’s willing to kill anyone to get what he wants, even his own mother! Then the only way for Sheriel to keep herself alive in this timeline is to have him be raised right under loving parents, which means she’ll also need to make amends with her cold, estranged husband. Will Sheriel be able to save herself and this broken family?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: So I Am the Ancestor of the Demonic Path?
description: The almighty Yun-Ye is now reaching the end of his life. As the eight factions that have claimed to be righteous knew about the end of Yun-Ye's life, they launched an attack against him. At the same time, a person with the same name has traversed and took over the body along with a system, and he has now started the path to eliminate evil and spread righteousness. Yun-Ye is able to earn points by completing system missions, then use them to trade for vitality. He will then slowly lead his six disciples and take back the treasure and legacies that belonged to them, and slowly expose the dark side of the eight factions.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Tensura Nikki: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken
description:
This Spinoff Manga has content based starting from Volume 3 of the Light Novel.

"Dear diary… I got reincarnated as a slime."

Even in another world, lives aren't always on the line. There's plenty of work to be done, from feeding the community and forging the items the community needs; as well as plenty of play ...and hijinks throughout! Join Rimuru and friends as they kick back and enjoy their daily lives.
___
**Character Designer:** [Mitz Vah](https://mangadex.org/author/63e87d1a-11f9-4c5f-9a7f-d7687a923366)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Can't Stand This Earth for Just Another Moment!
description: Hannah, once a pious bear angel, was unlucky enough to be sent to Earth by after being tested by God and was to live the life of a middle school student for three years. In this period, what kind of hilarious antics will she come up with in her day-to-day life with her idiotic classmates?
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, School Life, Full Color

name: Kaijuu Iro no Shima
description:
Without a single friend, middle schooler Chigawa Kon lives on a small island and laments that she hasn't "fallen in love" yet, unlike her classmates. She often plays by "the Hole", a cave near the sea where a man-eating monster lives, according to folk tales.  
  
One day, as she meets with another girl who accidentally drops her smartphone in the sea, they fall from a cliff together but miraculously survive. It turns out Furuka is also all alone.  
  
Half chapters (10/12 pages) are published in Young Dragon Age (formerly Bessatsu Dragon Age/Dragon Age Extra), every 2 months, if the series isn't skipped.
tags: Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: King From Hell
description:
"Mix with the devils, rob the devils of their power... With these hands, I will create a new Demon King for their destruction!"

10 years ago — Devils appeared all of a sudden, and the world was destroyed in 7 days.

Humans who have been sexually assaulted by devils will turn into demon beasts. Eiji, who lost his wife and lived alone with his very young daughter Miu, has also finally fallen victim and became the subordinate kin of a female devil, who is a chimera. He will turn into a demon beast after 1 year, and so he despairs over his fate of becoming separated from his daughter; but then he learns the True Name of the chimera, and this allows him to turn the tables on their master-servant relationship!

Eiji gathers his resolve: before he completely turns into a demon beast, he will raise this chimera to become the Demon King; all for the sake of creating a peaceful world for his daughter to live in!

(Source: Kadokawa)

---

Note: this has an "all-ages" version where certain scenes are cut, but the story is the same. Tatesc publishes the full, uncut version.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: The Day The Undefeated Yankee Girl Finally Lost
description:
Before she knew it, his method of attack changed from simple brawling...

(Source : [Danbooru](https://danbooru.donmai.us/posts/5305993))
tags: Romance, Delinquents

name: Crimson Cross ~Till Death Do Us Part~
description: Carl van Hellsing has vowed to hunt down the vampire Elliot for eternity. But, that's exactly what Elliot wants.
tags: Historical, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: Zatsuyo Gakari Ken Shien Jutsu Shi Ha Party Tsuiho Ni Akogareru ~Seken Ha Tsuiho Boomnanoni, Ore Wo Kadai Hyoka Suru Party Member Tachi Ga Kesshite Tebanaso to Shitekurenai~
description: "Stormbreaker," an up-and-coming party of young adventurers, is making waves in the dungeon conquest world with its record-breaking speed. Amidst this, Monog, who works as a handyman and a support mage, begins to doubt whether he will be expelled from "Stormbreaker" due to the recent "Attacker Supremacy" trend. However, the other members have no intention of kicking him out. In fact, they are the complete opposite...? Is the negative handyman actually a genius(?) support mage?
tags: Action, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Touhou - SPELL (Doujinshi)
description: A dramatic story set in the past of Gensokyo, before the creation of the spell card rules, following around a young Reimu. Unofficial and non-canon. Published in the web edition of Strange Creators of Outer World.
tags: Action, Magic, Doujinshi, Drama, Fantasy

name: Yome Gaki ssu
description:
Super serious and uptight high school student Koutaro Suzuki and his obnoxious gyaru kouhai Sorako Mozu get along like cats and dogs. She spends her days tormenting him, while he spends his days getting outraged by her. However, the two of them share a secret...that they're living together as fiancés!! Under the condition that Koutaro marry Sorako, who comes from a wealthy real estate family, they've agreed to buy his father's company and save it from going under!!

Having to deal with Sorako, who uses this and that (and you know what) to torment him, can Koutaro make her yield and successfully marry her?!

---
**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/64744)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Gyaru

name: Rocopon
description: As far as the public is concerned, Rocopon—earth’s only alien—hasn’t done much but loaf around in the 8 years since he crash-landed in Tokyo with no memory of his past. Granted, that is what he likes to do, and he does spend a lot of time playing video games. But as an alien to whom earth laws technically do not apply, he’s been hard at work in a top-secret capacity: government-sanctioned extrajudicial assassin, cleaning up the worst of society that the law is either too slow or too powerless to confront. After years of dispatching hapless crime lords and their goons, things have gotten comfortable. But Rocopon is about to meet his match in more ways than one—fed up with his sloppy ways, headquarters has assigned him a straight-laced partner, and the criminal underground has enlisted the help of those who are a little more than human… (Kodansha USA)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Crime, Gore, Drama, Police, Aliens, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Kemonobito Kishi no Kyuai Jijou
description: Emma, a human race, has the Duke of the Snake, a beast nobleman. He asked her to work as a magician. It was a request to overcome the unicorn beast of the holy beast species, Lyle, the Knight of the Palace Guards,'s sense of badness... They start training, but start by holding hands, and interact like lovers! I'm... Somehow the skinship is too intense? Courtship love fantasy starting with lessons with unicorn beast knights!
tags: Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Yojouhan no Ibara Hime
description:
*By Seishun Scans: WARNING! This series contains scenes that may depict sexual harassment, attempted sexual assault, and/or verbal abuse. Reader discretion is advised!*

---

Shinra has a mother who rarely comes home. Everyday, she pinches her pennies just to survive. Rai, a popular guy from her school keeps bothering her, and she’s getting sexually harassed by the manager at her part-time job. After finally coming home after 2 months, Shinra’s mom promises to stay with her. Rai unexpectedly shows up at Shinra’s part-time job and sees her being sexually harassed. He urges her to quit, but she refuses. Shinra comes home only to find out that her mother has disappeared once again
tags: Psychological, Romance, Reverse Harem, Drama, School Life

name: Oshiete! Kirara Fantasia
description:
Kirara Fantasia is a free-to-play fantasy role-playing game developed by Drecom and Meteorise and published by Houbunsha.   
The game crosses over characters from various manga series published in Houbunsha's Manga Time Kirara family of magazines.  
For the game there is a manga that was published on the original page.
tags: Comedy, Video Games, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Watashitachi, Rikon Shimasu
description: One night just before their third wedding anniversary, Kazuomi was surprised by his wife's proposal for divorce. While he was confused, his wife, Saya only smiled carelessly, saying: "Let's get along with each other for the rest of the time." But in the early morning, he found out her secret. A moving love story about the marriage and divorce of a couple.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Hokuo Kizoku to Moukinzuma no Yukiguni Karigurashi
description:
A touching story about hunting and romance takes place in the vast expanses of Nature. 
Ritzhardt governs a wintry territory far to the north. Sieglinde is a soldier with the nickname "Crimson Eagle." 
Ritzhardt falls in love at first sight with her, and they begin their life together… for a trial marriage of one year?!  
  
Hunting reindeers, snacking on nuts, gathering firewood, making traditional handicrafts… 
Will their peaceful and modest life in the land of winter help the couple truly become husband and wife?  
  
The 3-time Narou-Con award-winner story has been adapted to manga!
tags: Historical, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Kimi wa Meido-sama
description: A girl in a maid uniform came to Hitoyoshi's house looking for a job. Her previous job was an assassin, and she is skilled in all the deadly arts, but she's a complete beginner at housework. Hitoyoshi was confused by the strange request and sent her away. But then she saved Hitoyoshi from a deadly accident, and he thought maybe they can make this work? This is a story about a maid who was a cold-hearted killer learning about new emotions. A maid who lived a lonely life in the underworld finally finding family. The start of an enjoyable daily life.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Mabataki no Oto
description: The young boy “I” becomes swallowed up by the pleasure of drawing and completing a painting, embarking on a long creative journey. Along the way, he must confront “you” who lies in the shadows. What is the true nature of “I,” that weaves between impulse and imagination?
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life

name: My Stepmother Made Me Fall For Her
description: Ruan Tao, who originally wanted to dominate the entertainment world, encounters her malicious stepmother at the very beginning of her career. However, the stepmother is a great actress who dominates the world of entertainment with an iron fist. Ruan Tao can only submit and at the same time think about how to overthrow the evil stepmother's reactionary forces!As a result, she is arranged to participate in a romance reality show with her stepmother, but who is to tell her that it isn't a young love reality show with men and women courting each other? What is the plot when the stepmother holds her hand and asks with concern, fearing that she will hurt herself?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Risou no Himo Seikatsu
description: One day, average salaryman Yamai Zenjirou has an out-of-this-world experience—literally! He's pulled from Earth and dragged to another world where magic thrives and a gorgeous, powerful queen needs a consort. Now he's being pressured to marry that very monarch and help her bear a child. Will Zenjirou accept this life of lazy, luxurious love at the cost of leaving his home behind?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Giganto Maxia
description: 100 million years after the Great Destruction, life hangs on in the wastelands with humans, demi-humans, and massive creatures fighting for survival. With the Empire of Olympus using colossal beasts to crush their adversaries, only gladiator Delos, mystic Prome, and the titan Gohra they become can hope to stem genocide and heal the shattered Earth.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Mecha, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Dreamland
description:
Dreamland is a series based on a dual universe: on one side, you have the real world, and on the other, the world of dreams, imaginary and crazy.  
We follow the life of Terrence and his friends between those two worlds. He's a shy high-schooler who would like to seduce Lydia, a girl he's liked for a long time. But one day, his life changes completely when, during one of his nightmares, he overcomes his greatest fear: Fire. That marks the beginning of his double life as a normal high-school student during the day and the flame controller at night in Dreamland.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, School Life, Fantasy

name: Legends of Strong Men -The Oni's Successor-
description: A biographical manga covering the early lives and careers of Takanohana Kouji and Wakanohana Masaru.
tags: Historical, Action, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Slice of Life

name: Rengokujima: Kyokuchi Renai
description:
Five travelers, 3 women and 2 men, wash ashore a remote island, survivors of ship sinking. 

Finding themselves in this extreme situation, their instinct and conscience intersect and collide! 
Crossing thoughts, feelings of love and hate mixed with trust and betrayal. A story of uncontrollable libido and murderous intent…

Original R18 web novel [here](https://novel18.syosetu.com/n1896br/)
tags: Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, School Life, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Not-Sew-Wicked Stepmom
description:
Fairytale stepmothers are notoriously wicked. But after a children’s clothing designer is reborn as young Princess Blanche’s stepmom, she’s determined to break the mold and shower her daughter with love. Now she just has to convince the girl’s cold-hearted father to do the same. In her quest to make a happier home for Blanche, Abigail begins to uncover secrets and schemes within the palace. Will devious forces tear the Freidkins apart, or can Abigail stitch them back into a family?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B3%84%EB%AA%A8%EC%9D%B8%EB%8D%B0-%EB%94%B8%EC%9D%B4-%EB%84%88%EB%AC%B4-%EA%B7%80%EC%97%AC%EC%9B%8C/2487), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/56714856)

**Official Translations:**

name: Light and Shadow
description:
It’s a rude insult when lowly and headstrong servant Edna comes to marry Duke Eli, instead of the noble daughter he expected. But the ambitious maid hides an even bigger secret behind her obvious ruse – one that could change the kingdom’s very history. Can the two find freedom, redemption – and love – without drawing their swords on each other?

name: Zettai BL ni Naru Sekai vs. Zettai BL ni Naritakunai Otoko
description: One day, the protagonist realizes that he lives inside a BL (Boys' Love) world. As he likes girls, he fights back against any hot guys that might draw near, but this is a BL world... he's still assailed with the sight of people in lovey-dovey situations one after another!
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, Slice of Life

name: Pseudo Love
description: Baek Ga-in is a university student doing multiple jobs, living a double life as a demon worship concept streamer 'Lucia.' She has been carrying past scars of being entangled within a cult but suddenly her stream attracts a real demon, an 'incubus'?! A demon, human and... an angel?! This is not a 'cult' it is that campus fantasy romance!!
tags: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Falling into the Arms of a Mad Villain
description:
Instead of being caught by Prince Charming, I've fallen into a complete nightmare! Not only did I transmigrate into a trashy romance fantasy novel, but I fell from the sky and ended up in the arms of the mad villain, Edwin Crawford. Before I knew it, he called me his wife from the heavens and was raving about some prophecy. I don't even know who I am, so how can I be his wife?! Until I figure out what is happening, will it be safe to stay in the embrace of the Mad Dragon of the West?

Ireland, 1849. After losing everything in the Great Famine, Amelia and Connor immigrated towards the USA 
in order to find happiness and become rich in California during the Gold Rush period.

description: Intellectual and cool, Tsuji Motochika is popular with the girls in class - but really, he's a lolicon with a head full of perverted thoughts. When he meets Tanabe Yuna, he is convinced he has found his ideal loli, until he learns she is actually his senpai.

name: Massacre Happy End - The Blue Chapter
description: Ao Minato, a young man who killed his father-in-law who repeatedly abused his family and entered a juvenile reformatory. However, the sister who should have protected committed suicide at the end of suffering, and her sister Akane is also missing. Ao, who arrived at a certain shrine, wished for the safety of his sister, which is the only hope left, and swears to God that he will do anything for that ... The blockbuster panic suspense "Massacre Happy Ending". The new chapter is finally opening---.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Yuugai Shitei Doukyuusei
description: Yatsuhashi Miyako is a diligent class rep while the girl who sits next to her, Miyakonojou Reika, was discovered to not be wearing panties. Will Miyako be able to reform Reika into a normal high school girl?!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Kaji Daikou no Arubaito wo Hajimetara Gakuen Ichi no Bishoujo no Kazoku ni Kiniirarechaimashita
description:
My Part-Time Job is at the House of the Cutest Girl in School. A Shy and Awkward Housekeeping Rom-Com with the School Idol!

During his second year of high school, Haruto Otsuki starts a part-time job in housekeeping during the summer vacation. His first client turns out to be none other than Ayaka Tojo, the most beautiful girl in school! Despite being bewildered by this unexpected turn of events, Haruto continues doing his housekeeping duties. Over time, he becomes well-liked by Ayaka's family and begins regularly visiting her house.

From making home-cooked meals that delight Ayaka, to going grocery shopping together like a newlywed couple, and even going on shy movie dates like young lovers, they begin to grow closer by spending these special moments outside of school. This charming and awkward housekeeping rom-com featuring the most innocent and beautiful girl in school and a secretly high-spec guy begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: S-Kyuu Boukensha ga Ayumu Michi: Tsuihou Sareta Shounen wa Shin no Nouryoku 'Buki Master' de Sekai Saikyou ni Itaru
description: Haise is a young boy who has been gifted with an unknown ability. He becomes an adventurer together with his childhood friend Sasha, but is kicked out of the team for being unable to use his ability and being a hindrance. Furthermore, while continuing his solo adventure, he is caught in a trap and falls into dire straits. Just as he is on the brink of death, Haise's ability "Weapon Master" awakens! It is a power that shakes the laws of the world, summoning weapons from another world! ? An unrivaled fantasy set in another world that begins with adversity!
tags: Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Isekai de Uwamae Hanete Ikiteiku ~Saisei Mahoutsukai no Yuru Fuwa Jinzai Haken Seikatsu~
description: A company drone who died from overworking was reincarnated as Sawadi, the third son of a merchant in a different world. His cheat skill is restoration magic and support magic. With these cheat skills, he came up with a new business model where he used his restoration magic to cure cheap slaves and made them earn money for him. Although his earnings are steadily increasing, he also has to suffer the consequence of getting his workload also increased... Will Sawadi ever be able to live leisurely without working?
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Wild Cats
description:
From Dragon Voice Project:  
  
If animals could speak, what would they say? This is a story about an abandoned lion that got picked up and raised as a cat.  
  
Note: Wild Cats III (the 3rd chapter) was never compiled into the 2000s tankoubon edition. The book published in 2000 includes Wild Cats I, Wild Cats II and also a prologue for Himitsu - The Top Secret series. The 2006s kanzenban edition includes all three chapters of Wild Cats.
tags: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Houkago, Boku wa Kimi ni Naru
description: Akiba, a high school boy who has become addicted to cross-dressing cosplay, devotes himself to emulating his "oshi." Then one day, while he was dressed up as his favorite character, all alone in the club room, he is found out by Shibuya, a gorgeous gal that he has a crush on...? This is the start of a secret relationship between these two polar opposites! They will apply their youthful enthusiasm to a life of "oshi promotion"!
tags: Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Tamara
description: Tome dreams of becoming a famous fashion designer. She's on the right track, working for some big-shots, and then Tamara gets dumped on her. While Tamara may be a famous beauty on the run-way, in her normal, daily life, the supermodel is self-centered, obnoxious, bossy, and an utter leech. However, when the bearer of a "cursed" necklace dies at a fashion show, is Tamara the only help Tome will get to solve the mystery?
tags: Comedy, Drama, Mystery

name: Uichi no Shima
description: On Christmas Eve night, Meiko, a female college student, planned to spend a peaceful evening alone on the island. However, when she woke up, a corpse was lying in front of her. From that moment, she was faced with a series of grueling trials unlike anything she had ever experienced before. To reunite with her parents, whom she parted with in an unfortunate way, she must survive—even in this twisted world.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Survival, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Gacha wo Mawashite Nakama wo Fuyasu Saikyou no Bishoujo Gundan wo Tsukuriagero
description: For some reason, he was invited to another world after he rolled the gacha like he usually does. The gacha from the social game is available in his trusted smartphone. It was a convenient and cheat tool that can give out equipment and beautiful girl characters. He now aims to create the world's strongest army of beautiful girls in another world.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Vanilla land
description:
In lands far..far away, where scary monsters and horrific creatures live. where hidden treasures and magic exists, where there are still undiscovered kingdoms and empires mankind discovered a new source of energy to empower their mechanical machines & weapons. we discovered vanilla the source of unlimited energy. follow the journey of gen orchid, rosa & altamiras as they seek the djinn chef master to grant their wishes

story & art by me & my wife, together we are couple comics #fantasy_Manga_to_read

The first official comic anthology of the popular smartphone RPG "Blue Archive"!

An all-drawn comic that allows you to enjoy the world of "Blue Archive" even more.

In addition to the Foreclosure Task Force and Problem Solver 68, the Cleaning&Clearing, Justice Task Force, Game Development Department, Gourmet Research Society, and many others, the unique characters of the school city of Kivotos are on the rampage.

This is the beginning of a sparkling and slapstick school life. ♪

name: Not found
description:
Yuka, a university student, and Mahiro, a working man, have been dating for six months. They are so pure that they are nervous to even hug each other. But one day, Yuka's precious secret that she didn't want him to know about is revealed, and their relationship slowly starts to go weird!

A cute, slightly weird, new kind of BDSM romcom!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence

name: Chiisai Boku no Haru
description: Suzuki Souta, a high school boy on the school volleyball team, is interested in his classmate Shinonome Asahi, a member of the girls' volleyball team. She thought of him as a good volleyball player, so she has been seeking him out every day. Souta was a keen volleyball player until junior high. However, because of his height, he could never become the spiker he longed to be. As a result, he got into the habit of giving up on things. Souta's high school life: Will he meekly accept what he cannot have? Or will he try to become a man who can stand with Asahi? Youth is a series of choices. Please, Souta, hang in there and do your best!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, School Life

name: Baikoku Kikan
description:
In the early 20th century, a small republic found itself stuck between a kingdom and an empire - both of whom wanted to manipulate the republic to suit their own needs.

In order to protect itself from both sides of the conflict, the republic created a small group of soldiers whose job it is to suppress revolution and dissent in any way possible. This is the story of the Opera House.
tags: Historical, Action, Military, Police

name: Kono Healer, Mendokusai
description: Fantasy adventuring comedy starring Karla the dark elf cleric who invested too much on her taunting skills and Alvin the swordsman who has to put up with her.
tags: Monsters, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Hellsing
description:
Vampires exist. It is the duty of Hellsing, an organization sponsored by the British government, to hide that frightening fact and protect the blissfully unaware populace. Along with its own personal army, Hellsing also has a few secret weapons. Alucard, an incredibly powerful vampire, has been controlled by Hellsing for years. Although he dislikes being a servant to the Hellsing family, he certainly enjoys his job as Hellsing's vampire exterminator. Seras is a fledgling vampire and a former police woman. Although reluctant to embrace her new self, she is still a valuable member of the organisation. Integra Hellsing, the current leader, is usually fully capable of fulfilling her duty, but lately, vampire activity has been on the rise. Unfortunately, the cause is more alarming than anything she could have imagined. A group long thought dead has been plotting in secret since their apparent destruction over 50 years ago. Plotting to plunge England, and perhaps the entire world, into war.  


---

description: The story follows a girl in the "Threshold" (狭間, Hazama), a world beween Heaven and Earth. "Impure souls" — those that could not ascend to Heaven with the burden of their own weight — have drifted to this world of constant warfare.
tags: Action, Drama, Fantasy

name: Mobile Suit Cross Born Gundam DUST
description:
(from ebookjapan):

The year is 0169 of the Universal Century. The Earth Federation government has lost power, and the struggle for supremacy among the colonies has intensified, making it the "Space Sengoku Era". 

Ash King and other like-minded people stand up to put an end to the endless war!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: I'm a Villainous Daughter, so I'm Going to Keep the Last Boss
description:
Avoid the BAD END! That's the goal of the villainess in this plot-twisting story!!  
She has been reborn into the world of an otome game as the villainess, Aileen. Using her memories of her former life, she recognizes flags indicating she's en-route to the bad end, so she makes a plan to conquer the last boss (the evil king Claude), make him her lover, and see if she can open up a new route!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Oshiegoto
description:
A female art teacher who creates doujinshi meets a high school student gyaru who is a talented artist.

(Source: MangaUpdates)
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Gyaru

name: Osananajimi no Koukousei no Aida ni Nikutai Kankei wa Seiritsu suru ka.
description: The innocent Oota Yuka, the sexually curious Niiyama Kasumi, the elusive Horie Yasuo and the lovesick Onosaka Ryuhei. The four high school boys and girls, who have grown up like a family, are bequeathed a house by an elderly woman, Hasebe Haru, for four million yen and a fixed term. Under one roof, the high school students' eccentric love and friendship unfold.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Baka to Test to Shoukanjuu
description:
The protagonist is a guy who is among the stupidest of the stupidest in the school. In this school your grades can, under the supervision of teachers, take a virtual form to do battle! However, if you leave an examination midway, you get zero marks. A bright and cute girl, Mizuki Himeji, had a high fever during her examination. Despite her potential to be the second highest scorer in the level, she obtained zero marks for having left due to her illness and is thus banished to the worst class, Class F.  
  
Grades mean nearly everything. For Class A: They have a smart-looking teacher, a plasma TV as big as the entire wall as their blackboard, personal laptops, personal air-conditioners, refrigerators, adjustable seats and all kinds of different appliances. Within the refrigerator, there are all kinds of drinks and snacks. Their ceiling is made of glass, the wall lets them put up high-class drawings and plants.  
  
As for Class F (the worst class): They have Japanese desks and seat paddings. Their blackboard is dirty and there's even no chalk! Someone complains the legs of his desk are broken, so the teacher asks, "Didn't we distribute some glue to stick wood together? Glue it back yourself later." Another one complains the wind is blowing in from the broken window. The teacher says, "I got it. I'll apply for plastic bags and super-glue to fix it later." There are spider webs everywhere, not a patch of the wall is clean. A unique moldy smell spreads across the entire room; it must be from the old tatamis used to tile the floor. Welcome to Class F.  
  
The protagonist feels displeased at such an arrangement; he seeks help from his friends to try to make a change through invoking war! And they devise all kinds of plans to try to beat the famous Class A, scheming to get Class A's classroom and equipment if they win!!  
  
Adaptation of the light novel series written by Inoue Kenji with illustrations by Haga Yui  


---
