tags: Romance, Anthology, Boys' Love, Office Workers, School Life, Web Comic, Cooking

name: Crest of the Stars
description:
2012 manga running in Comic Meteor.  
  
Crest of the Stars follow Jinto Lynn, a young count whose world is taken over by the space-dwelling race of the Abh. When Jinto was a young boy, his father, Rock Lynn, under threat of invasion, handed over their world, Martine, to the Abh in exchange for a position within Abh society. Young Jinto is sent off to school to learn the ways of Abh nobility and the story of Crest of the Stars picks up as he meets the young Abh princess, Lafiel as they are about to travel to military school for Jinto's further training.  
  
However, in the midst of their travels, Lafiel and Jinto (along with the Abh ship Gothlauth, a.k.a. Gosroth) find themselves at the very beginnings of a war between the Abh Empire and the Four Nations Alliance of humankind—an anti-Abh alliance of the democratic nations of the United Mankind, the Federation of Hania, the Republic of Greater Alcont, and the People's Sovereign Union of Planets.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Adaptation

name: Goshujin-sama to Yuku Isekai Survival!
description:
Kosuke found himself in a whole different world. Standing there with the wilderness to the east and a forest to his left, he decided to make good use of the occurrence, and tests his knowledge, to where he finds this amazing crafting ability, just like the games from his original world!  

――This is a light for life in a different world.  When I thought, I was suddenly attacked by a beautiful dark elf…?!  
  
Start different world capture with different races and sub-races!  

---

- [Official LN (Eng)](https://sevenseasentertainment.com/series/survival-in-another-world-with-my-mistress-light-novel/)
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: The Isekai Returnee is Too OP for the Modern World
description: Morishita Taiju was transported into another world and became a hero, after wonderfully defeating the Demon Lord, he has returned to Japan. He was satisfied with his peaceful days as he hid his power, but... Hidden yokai and people with powers start to rampage, and the (rare nowadays) academy power battle-ish hidden world unfolds!! And now he trains beautiful warriors using superpowers!?
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Lady Saint, Please Stop Your Weird Tricks!
description:
I, the Saint, will never give myself up to you. I will never give myself up to you, the Demon King. Whether it’s a strange drug, a special treatment, or a hypnosis, use it all on me!
I, Lucius, the Demon King, am determined to change my fate as a villain and be destroyed! This is why you saint, dwarf Princess, Elf, and Valkyrie no longer need to fight against me!
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Full Color

name: My Mom's a Superstar
description: What will happen when an overly-supportive daughter discovers loads of photos of her mom, a famous actress, on the internet posing with her female co-stars in ways that "friends" would not do?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Boku wa Kimitachi wo Shihai suru
description:
Seven women, one man, a suspenseful harem story!

During a class reunion, the school became an enclosed dimension without warning. Yelling and screaming brought no response. 26-year old unemployed Haruka Sato has to survive by cooperating with seven of his former classmates. Soon, the extreme conditions began to eat away at their sanity, and Haruka's hidden desires began to take hold.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Harem, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Ruwei
description:
While getting a nighttime snack, the female artist Xin Xin accidentally saves Yin Yin, a wasted rich girl. She gives her a bath, changes her clothes, and even makes her a bowl of *suantang* noodles after much wheedling...

After multiple attempts at rebuffing her forward advances, Xin Xin ends up letting the "homeless" Yin Yin stay with her as she needs a roommate.

Social and beautiful, Yin Yin breaks the ice bit by bit with the strict and independent Xin Xin... Their yuriful table for two starts becoming available now!

---

**Links:**
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc33027)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Full Color

name: Salad Wizard
description: The story of the traveling magician Salad Wizard. On her travels, she meets a girl who aspires to be a magician... This is the first new work by Imitation Crystal in five years, since 2019!
tags: Oneshot, Adventure, Magic, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Oroka na Tenshi wa Akuma to Odoru
description: Masatora Akutsu has just transferred into class in Japan from a long way away - all the way from Hell, to be exact. Akutsu is a demon who's come to Earth to find someone who can motivate the forces of Hell to fight back against the invading Heavenly army. He immediately sets his sights on one of his classmates, the kind and beautiful Lily Amane, but ends up in way over his head when it turns out Lily has some secrets of her own!
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Supernatural

name: A Yandere-Like Girl
description: A girl who only at first glance resembles yandere.
tags: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: I Suspect He Might Like Me
description: I think he might like me, but is it overthinking or is it actually the truth…?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: This Love is Not For Sale
description: A kind girl, who had her first love… but unfortunately, her parents were in debt to a gang, and was beat up for 5 years… In an alley, a rich handsome man come saves her, yet he is a stranger, but also knows everything about her.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, Web Comic

name: Houkago Teibou Nisshi
description: Hina Tsurugi and her family have just moved to a quaint seaside town. Hoping to savor the sight of the peaceful ocean, Hina stumbles upon a girl named Yuuki Kuroiwa - an upperclassman at her new school - who invites Hina to join her in fishing. Hina reels in an octopus, which falls onto her; being afraid of bugs and big creatures, she panics and begs Yuuki to remove it from her. Yuuki sees this as an opportunity to force Hina to join the school's Breakwater Club - a club where members gather, catch, and eat various types of marine life as their main activity. Although her attempts to refuse to join fail, Hina slowly begins to discover the hidden joy in fishing. Her view on the sport changes, now looking forward to all the delightful experiences she can take part in alongside her fellow club members. Surrounded by eccentric club members, how will Hina’s high school life turn out?
tags: Animals, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Brave Bell
description: Sanada Souji, a senior in high school, is intelligent and athletic. He also has a kind nature and does not hesitate to lend a helping hand to those in need. However, his family is yakuza. Because of this, he was hated by the people around him. Will this loneliness last forever? While anxiety takes over his mind, he receives a phone call and things start to take an unexpected turn. This is the heroic story of a young man who wants to be a hero and faces a mysterious giant organization.
tags: Action, Mafia, Gore, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Transfer Student Storm Bringer
description:
Ju Ingong (which literally translates to *main character*) has been terrifying all his schoolmates in every school he has been so far. He has one extremely scary face type and whoever lays his eyes on him thinks he is a BAMF (bad ass). Although… is he really?  


---
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, School Life, Full Color

name: Takane no Hana wa Midaresaki
description: She is the perfect student, beautiful, clever and with lots of friends… He is an ordinary boy in the class, staring at her from afar but one day he sees her in a very compromising situation! How will she react? The lives of these two will now intermingle with totally unexpected outcomes!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Tomatoypoo no Lycopene
description:
Meet Lycopene. A tomatoy poodle. Wait! Hold up. A... what?! Apparently a tomatoy poodle is a poodle born from a tomato plant. Meet Meh-Meh, a normal schoolgirl, who finds herself lost in Cuteopia, a strange world inhabited by strange creatures like Lycopene.  
(Source: VIZ Media)
tags: Animals, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Jeong-Nyeon
description:
Jeong-Nyeon has no money or education, but she is a Mokpo girl with a talent for singing! Her dream is to join a women's traditional theater company, and make it big. But she has a lot to learn and a long way to go before becoming a lead actor. Will Jeong-Nyeon achieve her dream of becoming a big star and getting rich?  
The story begins in 1956 (post-war Korea) in the southwestern port city of Mokpo.  
  
Winner of the 2019 Our Manhwa of the Year award, and is set to release as as a Drama by the end of 2024.
  
[Artist's Twitter](https://twitter.com/namonnamon14)  
[Artist's Tumblr](https://jinamong.tumblr.com)  
[Artist's Naver Blog](https://blog.naver.com/babomj14)
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Long Strip, Crossdressing, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Kishi Danchou no Musuko wa Akuyaku Reijou wo Dekiai suru
description: When Princess Alice abruptly ends their engagement, Ex, the Knight Commander's son, has a sudden recollection of his past life. Transported from an otome game, he recognizes the unfolding events. Refusing to accept the wrongful blame placed on the innocent villainess, he resolves to protect and claim her. Reincarnated with a mission, Ex cherishes the villainess as his chosen path in this heartwarming tale of love and reincarnation.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Choukadou Girls
description:
Translated from Amazon.com.jp using google translate.

The latest work in the "Super Movable Girl" series, in which a moving beautiful girl figure rushes in and becomes a wife. A romantic comedy in which tiny cute [super movable girls] such as the girl-type planet explorer Nona, the RPG hero Bernoa, and the 2D fighting game character Subaru are involved in the otaku boy Haruto. If there is love, what is the size difference!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Kemono Jihen
description:
When a series of animal bodies that rot away after a single night begin appearing in a remote mountain village, Inugami, a detective from Tokyo who specializes in the occult, is called to investigate.   
  
While working the case, he befriends a strange boy who works in the field every day instead of going to school. Shunned by his peers and nicknamed "Dorotabo" after a yokai that lives in the mud, he helps Inugami uncover the truth behind the killings - but supernatural forces are at work, and while Dorotabo is just a nickname, it might not be the only thing about the boy that isn't human.
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Magic, Gore, Drama, Vampires, Monster Girls, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Uma Musume Pretty Derby - UmaYome Uma X Tore♂ Kekkon Seikatsu Goudou (Doujinshi)
description: An anthology book series containing many different artists and their favorite Umas enjoying their life after marriage.
tags: Romance, Anthology, Doujinshi, Slice of Life

name: Washizu - Enma's Mahjong
description: A spin-off of Akagi that depicts the charismatic exploits of Washizu Iwao, Akagi Shigeru's ultimate enemy, in his younger days. In 1948, under the American occupation of Japan, Washizu is undefeated in high-rate mahjong games against American commissioned officers. Eventually, they hire a cheater as a rep player, who has a grudge against the Special Higher Police, to play in their place to counter Washizu, who has a terrifying brain and used to belong to the Special Higher Police...
tags: Traditional Games, Historical, Psychological, Drama

name: Yakumo-san wa Ezuke ga Shitai
description:
When her husband passed away, Yakumo Shuko lost her appetite for life, and with it, her love of cooking. But her neighbor Yamato Shohei brings an end to Shuko's solitary existence.

A high school baseball player living on his own, Shohei has a seemingly bottomless stomach... and this presents a challenge that Shuko is only too happy to accept!

As her days begin to revolve around her secret hobby of feeding Shohei, will Shuko rediscover the happiness life has to offer?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Sweat and Soap
description:
Asako’s living her dream, working at the toiletry maker Lilia Drop. Little do her coworkers know, the reason she loves the company so much is that she’s ashamed of her body odor, and their soap is the only thing that does the trick. So when the company’s lead product developer, a perfuming genius, approaches her in the lobby and wonders what “that smell” is, she’s terrified … but could it be … that he likes it? And, even more surprising to Yae … does she like him?

TV Dorama adaptation: [MyDramaList](https://mydramalist.com/718871-ase-to-sekken)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Kono Ura Aka, Sensei desho?
description:
Rinko, a high school teacher in her late twenties, is not seen as herself because of her sister, a popular actress, both at work and in her private life, and out of frustration, she starts a "behind-the-scenes account" on social media to post pictures of her body.
One day, while she is fulfilling her need for approval and secretly enjoying herself, a male student, who is a bit of a pain in the ass, comes into her life...

This is the start of a love suspense with a rather distorted age difference.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Mystery

name: Buta Kizoku wa Mirai wo Kiri Hiraku you desu
description:
The glory of the past is long gone. 

Once hailed as a prodigy, now mocked as the "Pig Noble" due to his arrogance and appearance, Herbert, the son of a ducal family, falls into despair upon receiving a letter through temporal magic from his future self, revealing a tragic fate twenty years ahead. However, determined to face the self he had long avoided, the "Pig Noble" resolves to struggle and use temporal magic to carve out a different future for himself!
tags: Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Mone-san no Majime Sugiru Tsukiaikata
description: An alluring and popular honor student who goes by the name of Mone. Steadfast and diligent, she only has one foreseeable flaw; her philosophy on love is utterly trash! But both her mind and her heart might be swayed sooner than she thinks in this school love manga.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Tsuihou Yuusha no Yuugana Slow Life: Jiyuu ni Nattara Ore Dake no Saiai Tenshi no Te ni Haitta!
description:
After suddenly being fired despite serving as a hero for 30 years, Alec was left with nowhere to turn. Orphaned from a young age, he had no parents to rely on, and having been a hero since childhood, he lacked basic common sense. With nowhere else to go, Alec ends up at an unexpected place—a slave market!?

There, he encounters the beautiful and kind-hearted Lyrishia.

This is the story of an unwittingly strongest protagonist and an angelic heroine weaving an excessively naughty second life together.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Fate/Grand Order -Epic of Remnant- Deep Sea Cyber-Paradise, SE.RA.PH
description: To repair the singularity of the future, the main character, Ritsuka Fujimaru, will shift again to lay down a tremendous battle.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Shimei Tehai Kan
description:
A police officer is assigned to a small town.
As she relentlessly pursues criminals and shows zero tolerance for evil, what awaits her - words of gratitude, or something else?
This is a story that explores the nature of justice and evil.

Souce: MangaPlus
tags: Oneshot

name: Tsuihousareru Tabi ni Skill o Te ni Ireta Ore ga, 100 no Isekai de 2-shuume Musou
description:
An adventurer named Ed was exiled from his party because he was considered useless, but instead of being sad and upset he was actually happy!!?

It turns out that it's not without reason that he feels happy when he's exiled from his party, because every time he's been exiled he will receive a skill that makes him even more invincible...

Ed was given the crazy test of having to get expelled from 100 Hero parties in 100 different worlds before he could return to his original world. Finally a mysterious and divine entity said that he had achieved all the conditions to return to his original world.

However, as a final condition he is asked “Look at the fate of one of these exile worlds after you left.” and he is shocked by what he sees.

“Okay, I’ll do it! I’ll go down to these 100 worlds again and be banished with a good feeling!” 

Ed takes on a new challenge to make full use of the super-powerful “Exiled Skills” that were granted each time he was exiled, and this time ensure they all have happy endings.
___
**Character Designer:** [GreeN](https://mangadex.org/author/40916d07-ed66-40d9-919f-3bfff091fe9a)
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: 4 Cut Hero
description:
The Hero has defeated the Demon King! But the Princess he meant to save turned out to be a Prince. NEETdom, here he comes, but a life of relaxation surrounded by animes is a pretty sweet deal.  
  
Unfortunately, he gets caught up in millennia old legends, curses, and a twisted plot involving multiple Kingdoms and many dragons. Through and through, though, he'll follow a path of whimsy, even if that involves him palling it up with "villains".
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Can Unpopular Magical Girls Also Date?
description:
Chae-na plays the unpopular Clover in [Magical Lucky Stars], the guardian of Madeleine Village.

She feels weak and lacking as a hero, so she lives inconspicuously and endures being an unpopular member. She finds the spotlight uncomfortable and awkward.

However, there is someone who accidentally sees her kindness and falls in love at first sight! It is Red, Seung-chan, a popular member of the [Hyper Rangers of Transcendental Expedition] group that protects the neighboring Eunha Village.

"I fell in love at first sight. I think I like you!"

She is thrilled by the appearance of Red, whom she admires, but refuses to confess, saying that she doesn't even know what kind of person she is... After hearing the heart-fluttering words that she doesn't know anything about you and wants to get to know you more, she eventually runs away.

"There's no way such a wonderful person would like someone like me. There must be some kind of mistake!"

A heart-pounding story about an ultra-popular hero and an unpopular magical girl who accepts his confession!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Superhero, Magical Girls, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yakyu Miyo Yo!
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Sports

name: Marumaru na Kanojo ni Dekiaisarete Imasu. (Pre-Serialization)
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Youkai Izakaya Nonbereke
description:
Girls cry! Laugh! And get harassed! Young female college student, Hino Motogane, starts a part-time job at a small late night Izakaya. However the shop’s clientele – were youkai. These youkais do all kinds of things to their favorite Hino, sometimes they strip her, sometimes they cover her in spit, no matter what they work her to death! After all, she wants her paycheck... Come on in under the curtain into an Izakaya comedy where girls are full of laughter, tears, sweat, spit, and who knows what fluids that are flying about.  
  


---
tags: Comedy, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Hikyouiku kara Nigetai Watashi
description:
The Prince, my fiancé, was flirting with a lady who was not me. Does that mean he's breaking it off?! "Finally!"   
  
I can finally escape from the strict princess training. As I head back to the countryside the prince chases after me?! He won't break off the engagement?! Why?!  
  
A highly exciting romantic comedy of a prince who chases after his fiancée who has run away.
tags: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Adaptation

name: Loop 8-shume wa Shiawase na Jinsei wo ~7-Shuubun no Keikenchi to Daisan Oujo no "Kantei" de Kakusei shita Ore wa, Aibo no Behemoth to Tomo ni Musou suru~
description:
This is a story about Remille, an adventurer who died. Specifically, he's died a lot — seven times now, always at the hands of vicious monsters. Every time, though, he's returned to the same day, three years prior. He's tried everything at this point, from sword fighting to magical arts to beast taming, but it always ends the same way. Is there any hope for him in this 8th loop of his life?

Perhaps a chance encounter with Princess Ciel might change things? Her magical eye can see all possible futures—and with Remille's vast stores of XP from seven lives of adventuring, just about anything is possible! Add in the fact that his erstwhile feline friend Catra isn’t exactly what she seems (and how the princess herself wants to party up with him) and this 8th loop might just be the charm!
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Karma
description:
In the world of "Karma," where myths and folklore are timeless echoes of truth, ancient tales gradually unveil their secrets. Each story, once considered mere legend, is now revealed as reality, shaping the world that we live in to this day.
As the story unfolds, we will see these truths that were veiled from humanity's eyes, revealing how these myths have come into existence and why they were hidden away from the modern day.
We follow the narrative through the eyes of Teru and his team, as they delve into the depths of each realm and unravel the mysteries that lie within. From distant lands to mythical beings, every encounter sheds light on the true history of our reality, revealing the path toward understanding our origins.

Co-creator/Illustrator - @artdawgsama
Co-Creator/Writer - @vanillabarss
Writer - @__ willcross __
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Self-Published, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Watari-kun no ×× ga Houkai Sunzen
description:
Ever since his parents died, Watari Nao's life has revolved around his little sister. He forgoes club activities for the sake of spending time with her, leading many of his peers to label him a siscon. But as long as his sister's happy, Nao is willing to shut out any unwelcome comments about himself.  
  
Unbeknownst to Nao, however, a greater danger has resurfaced - one that destroyed his way of life six years ago, and threatens to do so once again.  
  
And that danger, in the form of a girl wielding a garden hoe, will stop at nothing to reclaim what could once have been hers, and hers alone.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Fairy Tail Gaiden - Kengami no Souryuu
description:
The spin-off of the popular fantasy manga "Fairy Tail". Sting, who became the master of Sabertooth, Rogue, Yukino, and Minerva together perform jobs together, but…? What is the danger approaching their guild and the whole continent!? The episode that was not shown in the original story is now being told!!
____________
[Alt Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/fairy-tail-twin-dragons-of-saber-tooth)
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy

name: One for All
description:
"You wanna play rugby together?"

Arashi is a hot-blooded first year high school student enrolled on a rugby scholarship. Calling himself "the man who stirs up a storm", he unites a peculiar group of problem children, leading them towards the peak of high school rugby, Hanazono! A youth rugby club story told by the delinquent manga legend, Yanauchi Daiju!
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, School Life, Delinquents

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 4: Diamond Is Unbreakable (Official Colored)
description: In April 1999, Jotaro Kujo travels to a town in Japan called Morioh to find a young man named Josuke Higashikata, the secret love child of his grandfather, Joseph Joestar. Upon finding him, Jotaro is surprised to learn that Josuke also possesses a Stand. After their strange meeting, the pair team up to investigate the town’s proliferation of unusual Stands!
tags: Official Colored, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Lovers of the Red Sky
description:
On a Winter night, the painter Hong Cheon Gi, clashes with a man who falls from the sky.
She believe this beautiful looking man--who does not seem to be from this world--is her destined man because of this encounter.
Ha Ram is a man who became blind after being caught up in an unknown accident as a child.
Although he can only see red, after meeting Cheon Gi, he learns the secret surrounding his eyes...
tags: Historical, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Kono Bijutsubu ni wa Mondai ga Aru!
description:
A girl with violently too much common sense, a boy whose sole ambition is to draw the perfect 2D bride, an addlebrained ghost member, and their always-sleeping president — what is *wrong* with this art club?!  
  
[Alternative Raw](https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_AM01000007010000_68/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Outo no Hazure no Renkinjutsushi ~Hazure Shokugyou Datta node, Nonbiri Omise Keiei Shimasu~
description:
Daisy von Preslaria, born in a viscount family that produces excellent magicians, was the only one in the family that was granted the failure job, Alchemist. Since this has happened, she's going to try studying hard and becoming independent as a worthy alchemist!

The five-year-old girl so resolved and began to make potions by trial and error. Thanks to the Appraisal skill that she secretly possessed, let alone failures, her finished products were of such high quality never seen anywhere! She cultivated medicinal herbs, indulged herself in research, went harvesting, and opened a store.
tags: Reincarnation, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: How to Hide the Emperor's Child
description:
Astelle, the empire's one-day empress brought with her a secret when she left the palace after the divorce: she was pregnant with Emperor Kaizen's child. Six years later, Astelle is living a peaceful life in the countryside with their son until the imperial guards come knocking. Kaizen requires Astelle's consent to receive the key territory of Meilen. With the empire still in turmoil from a rebellion, will Astelle be able to hide her son's identity from these threatening forces, and more importantly, from his father, the emperor?

---
“You never loved me anyway, right?”

Astelle’s long-awaited marriage life ended in a day.

She worked hard to become Kaizen’s wife since she was ten, 
however, the only thing that was left for her was a disgrace as the banished-empress.

She was abandoned by her family; 
She was kicked out by the man she loved, Kaizen.

“Yes. You’re right. I didn’t love you.”

Astelle lied for the last time. 
For the sake of the man who was her reason to live and it was also for him who was her husband for a day.

She thought there is no point tp contact with him again, but-

“I think… I might be pregnant?”

–

Six years later, Astelle, who reunited with Kaizen, lied again.

“You… who is that child?”

“He’s my nephew.”

For the sake of protecting the child.

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%A9%EC%A0%9C%EC%9D%98-%EC%95%84%EC%9D%B4%EB%A5%BC-%EC%88%A8%EA%B8%B0%EB%8A%94-%EB%B0%A9%EB%B2%95/2881), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58647802)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/how-to-hide-the-emperors-child/info)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/How-To-Hide-The-Emperors-Child/87)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/100859)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%8B%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%97%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%A3%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B4/316)
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Violence & Peace
description:
Violence Becomes Tranquility was published in Heavy Metal Heavy Vol. III #11, March 1980
Heart and Steel was published in Epic Illustrated #10, February 1982
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Back to Spring
description: Because of her personality, highschooler Xu Ting is often picked on by her classmates. Until one day, the school’s young, new maintenance worker saves her.  His attractive looks and mysterious aura enthrall the bullies.  Xu Ting feels indebted, yet in the small forest after school, she accidentally discovers his deepest secret?!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: AISHA
description: The twins who have lost both their mother and father had got their humongous inheritance stolen by their evil stepmother. The three sons of their stepmother have a special relationship towards their non-biological sisters. Thus, a scene of love, love and hate occurred in this old mansion. This is a fairy tale of romance and vengeance.
tags: Thriller, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Horror, Web Comic, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Real no Heroine wa Irimasen!
description: Aramiya Seiichi is an ordinary high school eroge otaku who's given up all hope on girls in the 3D world due to a certain incident. One day, after he's bought a bunch of new material in consequence of experiencing the frustration of a perfect eroge character turning out to be used goods, he encounters a delinquent-like-looking girl being about to get raped by a bunch of guys. By mere chance, he rescues her. Days later, when school starts again, it turns out to have been his classmate, Ayame, a feared delinquent girl who's got all kind of rumors about her, especially that she's used goods. And it appears that she's set on becoming his ideal girl to make him fall for her.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: Video Girl Ai
description: High-school student Yota Moteuchi is so unpopular that his classmates have given him the nickname "Dateless." So it's no surprise when the love of his life, Moemi, is not interested in Yota but instead is in love with Yota's best friend, Takashi. Yota turns to a video rental shop for comfort, but little did he suspect that the shop was magical and that the cute girl on his rented tape would pop out of the television and try to fix his ruined love life!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life

name: Shinigami ni Sodaterareta Shoujo wa Shikkoku no Tsurugi wo Mune ni Idaku
description:
Olivia is just a baby when the mysterious Z finds her at a temple in the depths of the Forest of No Return. From that day on, the temple becomes her home and Z her family. Z, a god of death, educates her in the ways of the world, in combat, and in the long-forgotten arts of magic—right up until the day Z disappears. 

Olivia leaves the forest for the first time in search of Z with its ebony blade in hand. Out in the wider world, all is not well. A bitter war rages between the Asvelt Empire and the Kingdom of Fernest, and Fernest is losing badly. When Olivia shows up on Fernest's doorstep with a sack of imperial heads looking to volunteer, the royal army happily welcomes her into its ranks. Thanks to Z's training, she quickly proves herself as a ferocious warrior. In fact, she might be just what Fernest needs to turn the tide of the war...but will they accept her lack of people skills and disregard for discipline? And will she ever see Z again?
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/death-s-daughter-and-the-ebony-blade)
tags: Action, Romance, Magic, Military, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Fairy Cat
description: A slightly mysterious and heartwarming story about the smallest cat in the world and a high school boy. A fantastic cat named Tenohira Neko, small enough to fit in the palm of your hand, appears to Kanade, a first-year high school student. He is told that if he likes it, it will live with him…?
tags: Animals, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Ano Otome Game wa Oretachi ni Kibishii Sekai desu
description:
Leon was reincarnated in the world of an otome game that he was forced by his sister to conquer just before his death. 

He tried to live a peaceful life as a mob character, but he encountered a scene where a female student ignored the flow of the story and tried to become the main character. Leon ended up seizing Marie, a girl who had a similar atmosphere to his sister from his previous life, and succeeded in thwarting the scheme. 

It should have have been the right choice... but why was he feeling uneasy about it?
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Kubo-san wa Mob wo Yurusanai
description:
First year high schooler Junta Shiraishi is a mob character who goes unnoticed even when he's standing right next to you. But his classmate, "heroine-level beauty" Kubo, always notices him and is there to tease him. Anyone can become special to someone, but it might be a little too early to call these feelings "love."

Perhaps this story is still two-steps from being a romantic comedy! A sweet comedy where a background character becomes visible!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Alice to Taiyou
description:
When Alice, an outgoing up-and-coming singer, meets Taiyo, a shy but talented composer, his life gets turned upside down! 
He's only made songs online and doesn't consider himself a real songwriter, but Alice sees him differently. 
Will they manage to make beautiful music together?
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life, Music

name: Final Fantasy: Lost Stranger
description:
The manga follows a Square Enix's employee who get hit by a truck along with his sister and both of them are transported into the world of Final Fantasy.  
  
Final Fantasy: Lost Stranger was released as part of the Final Fantasy franchise's 30th anniversary project.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Nyako to Hakase
description: Twitter short series by @SORAji34
tags: Animals, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Kentoushi A to Z
description:
With the development of highly-advanced XR technology, which allows users to feel a realistic sense of the sharpness and weight of weapons, new frontiers of entertainment have arisen! KOG (King of Gladiators), an XR gladiatorial extravaganza, has become the greatest show on Earth!

Himemiya Ace, the world's top fighter, vanishes from the public eye after a serious accident. Two years later, her twin sister Zeta - a game streamer known for her toxicity - must take the stage under Ace's name, in order to save Ace's life!
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Virtual Reality, Video Games

name: Something Like a Cat
description:
At first glance, Nanika is a mysterious creature that looks like a black cat.  
Eat melon bread from the wrong place, and even if you want to put on a collar, why does it slip and stick to the ceiling like Spider-Man?  
Nanika should be uncomfortable, but master's elementary school student: Renya-kun accepts this with the attitude "I did't know that cats are such creatures."  
  
New cat manga (?) that cat lovers and non-cat lovers like!
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Cyborg Roggy
description:
Ten years ago, artificial biological implants known as "augmentation parts" were introduced into society. At the time, no one suspected the sinister turn of events that would come about because of body augmentations. And as the politicians and police stood by, the world watched as cyborg criminals, otherwise known as "augs," turned the world on its head…  
(Source: VIZ Media)  
  
**Included one-shot:**  
- Volume 1: Kaizou Ningen Roggy (pilot)  
- Volume 2: Kaizou Ningen Roggy (pilot 2)  
  
As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Cyborg Roggy were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy

name: Dungeon no Aru Sekai de Kashikoku Sukoyaka ni Ikiru Houhou
description: Ten years ago, dungeons suddenly appeared all over the world. Yuma Minashiro fell into a dungeon on his way to a job interview. With no equipment and resigned to his death, Yuma obtained an incredible skill: summoning. It was tough because all the spirits he summoned were beautiful girls, and the only way to become stronger was to flirt with them, but he set up a company, made money, and lived a happy life as a dungeon explorer.
tags: Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Life with a Grandpa Cat
description:
The modest yet adorable life of a cat and his owner.  
  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Author’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/delpilot)  
[![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Author’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/users/5078227)
tags: Animals, Comedy, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Dungeon Elf ~Dungeon ni Takarabako ga Aru no wa Atarimae desu ka~
description:
A question that even the most ardent of RPG lovers struggle to answer: Why are there treasure chests placed so conveniently throughout the dungeons? In the grass fields of the Forest of Beginnings, in deadly realms where even the greatest heroes must be prepared to face total annihilation, and even in people’s homes―there, treasure chests sit, aiding unwitting adventurers and maintaining the world’s balance. This is the story of someone, unbeknownst and unnoticed by anyone, who carries those chests.

(Source: K Manga)
___
Made by GyroKnuckle and Tomozo under the group name [River Slan](https://mangadex.org/author/1e179cfa-adca-4dcd-8247-23fa22e80a9e).
tags: Adventure, Fantasy

name: Fire Emblem - Genealogy of the Holy War - Those Who Inherit the Light
description:
Seventeen years after the Battle of Belhalla, the people on the continent of Jugdral suffer under the oppressive rule of the Grannvale Empire.
On the Isaachian frontier, prince Shannan of Isaach has raised a liberation army to fight back against the empire and among its young soldiers was a boy whom the people revered as the "Scion of Light" and the true prince to Grannvale. His name was... Seliph.

Based on the Super Famicom strategy game, Fire Emblem 4: Genealogy of the Holy War. This book exclusively covers the events of the game's 6th chapter.
tags: Action, Adventure, Video Games, Military, Gore, Drama, Fantasy

name: Kenja no Mago
description:
Thanks to various magic, the human race has been saved from calamity many, many times. Retaining his memories from his previous life, a boy, Shin, was picked up by an old man known to the world as the "Magi." Shin was brought up by the Magi, who had retired to a secular place, as his own grandson. With the memories of his past life, he absorbed the Magi's craft and grew to be able to develop his own magic. Then, the grandfather told him he has to become independent when he reaches the age of 15.

"Ah, I forgot to teach him common sense."

The grandson who has grown beyond the level of normal people, lacked common sense; the common sense of the world. So to learn how to socialize, he goes to Earlshide Kingdom City to be admitted to Earlshide Advanced Magic Academy.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Shore Song
description:
There are many perils in this desert world. Countries war and enslave, goblins prey on humans, monsters and magic run amok, and — most critically — wells run dry. Those desperate for water may undertake an ancient water prayer ritual, a grueling journey to beg the aid of Kahaku, the god of water. These are the various stories of people from all walks of life, each driven by their need to survive in that world and save the ones they love. Sometimes, these desperate souls cross paths with a pair of travelers, En and Jinghua, who help them on their journey.  
  
A series of interconnected oneshots, each volume with a different title.  
  
Volume 1: Kishibe no Uta  
Volume 2: Kumo o Koroshita Otoko  
Volume 3: Touzoku no Mizusashi  
Volume 4: Akumujou no Aruji  
Volume 5: Tabibito no Ki  
Volume 6: Kageboushi-tachi no Shima  
Volume 7: Kita no Ouji to Minami no Sakana  
Volume 8: Kareno no Hanayome  
Volume 9: Tsukikage no Choujou
Volume 10:  Suna no Shita no Shirabe
tags: Historical, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Dakkou Suru Made Ochimasen
description: Yoe (an ecchi Ero-Mangaka) and Mayama (an NTR Ero-Mangaka) are close neighbors. However, their tastes and ages are vastly different.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Isekai Saikyou no Yome desu ga, Yoru no Tatakai wa Ore no Hou ga Tsuyoi You desu: Chiryaku o Ikashite Nariagaru Harem Senki
description:
Albert is reborn in another world and strives for a peaceful life in the Kingdom of Alexa. However, after being "kidnapped" by a Demon Goddess of war, Marida, he becomes a wanted man by the Kingdom!

Unable to return to his original country, Albert decides to live in the Empire of Eranzia. While enjoying intimate moments with the alluring body of Marida (but not just her!), he uses his previous worlds knowledge to achieve great accomplishments in governance, military affairs, strategy and of course..... Night-time battles!

A slightly risqué harem comedy begins!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Conquer the Game With the Best Web Novels
description:
Leaving behind only a single key, my father, a renowned web novel author known for his 'Overpowered MC' stories, passed away. Ten years later, a virtual reality game called 'The Another World,' based on one of his works, becomes a place where people can make a living or even strike it rich.

Kim Woojoo, the author's son, has been living a tough life with no special advantages. By chance, he discovers that the key, a keepsake from his father, is being traded at a high price. He decides to use the key to open a limited edition book in his father's study and receives a special gift from the game.

Accepting the gift, Woojoo encounters the Great Demon King Lucia, a character from his father's web novel. Lucia grants Woojoo incredible abilities, but the power is so overwhelming that Woojoo struggles to complete even simple daily quests.

After much thought, Woojoo decides to eliminate the source of his power, the Demon King, by bringing in another character, Killer Zero. However, his actions draw the attention of Jason, a powerful player in 'The Another World,' who comes to confront him.

Will Woojoo be able to face the strongest characters in the game, the ultimate beings from his father's web novel?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy

name: Please Fall Asleep, Emperor
description:
In order to kill the dictator, an assassin wore female clothing and snuck into the palace. He didn't expect to be caught immediately that night. But the dictator did not kill him. Instead, he asked to sleep with the assassin and treated him like a sleeping pill.   
After staying in the palace for a while, the assassin discovered a deep conspiracy, and the dictator didn't seem that bad after all. Meanwhile, he even started to feel a little sympathetic…
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Martial Arts, Crossdressing, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: ZIGA
description:
Many Shonen Jump characters have big dreams, but this character's big dream is a nightmare! A very realistic reoccurring nightmare where a giant monster destroys a city. And it always ends with Kou, the poor dreamer, getting crushed under the rubble. But when Kou meets an unusual man who somehow knows about the monster in his dream, his nightmare takes on a whole new meaning.  
  
As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Ziga were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Drama, Supernatural

name: The Essence
description: The dominant omega ‘Rael’, who lived in the dark, plans to take the opportunity to take over the house of the Count when his brother gets into an accident. Rael secretly visits a perfumer named ‘Hyde’ to obtain an alpha pheromone perfume in order to mask his true scent. Rael pretends to be an Alpha in public, and all of this is thanks to Hyde’s special perfume. But, Rael doesn’t know the true identity of ‘Hyde’, a perfumer hidden behind a veil, even rumored to be hideous. But every time he comes into close contact with him, Rael feels something different… Then one day, the Count declares that if Rael cannot give birth to an Alpha within two years, the Count will hand over the position to someone else. So, Rael asks Hyde, the only person who knows his identity, for help.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Katainaka no Ossan, Kensei ni Naru ~Tada no Inaka no Kenjutsu Shihan Datta noni, Taisei shita Deshi-tachi ga Ore wo Hottekurenai Ken~
description:
Beryl Gardinant, a self-proclaimed "humble old man," is a sword instructor at his dojo in a rural, backwater village. In his younger years, he dreamed of glory as a master swordsman, but those days are long behind him. 

Out of the blue, he receives a visit from a famous former pupil who brings him world-shattering news - he’s been appointed as a special instructor for the knights of the Liberion Order! With his life now turned upside down, Beryl travels to the capital and reunites with some of his former students: elite knights, an ace wizard, and even an adventurer who’s attained the highest guild rank possible. 

But why do they all want his tutelage?! As far as he’s concerned, they clearly don’t need him anymore. 

Can Beryl live up to his new position? And will he ever get a moment’s peace away from his adoring students?!

---

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/from-old-country-bumpkin-to-master-swordsman-my-hotshot-disciples-are-all-grown-up-now-and-they-won-t-leave-me-alone)
tags: Action, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Iinazuke Kyoutei
description: Kaneda Wataru tries to be less of a burden to his busily working mother and takes on lots of part-time programming jobs. During times like these, on Wataru's first day in his 2nd year of high school, three girls suddenly appear, kiss him and claim that one of them will have to become his future fiancée…
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Noragami: Stray God
description: Yato is a homeless god. He doesn’t even have a shrine, not to mention worshippers! So to achieve his ambitious goals, he’s set up a service to help those in need (for a small fee), hoping he’ll eventually raise enough money to build himself the lavish temple of his dreams. Of course, he can’t afford to be picky, so Yato accepts all kinds of jobs, from finding lost kittens to helping a student overcome bullies at school.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Red Dot
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: From Eroica with Love
description:
What happens when a gay art thief and a conservative NATO officer cross paths? Disaster, of course. 
Dorian is an aristocrat, a thief, and a hedonist; Klaus is a duty-driven espionage agent with no patience for fools.

Follow them as they chase each other across the globe – from Britain to Baghdad, from Alaska to Alexandria or Moscow to Madrid. 
Spectacular locations and non-stop adventures await!
tags: Historical, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Adventure, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Shudan!
description:
Hamanishi FC is your average elementary school soccer team… or is it? While the team's record isn't impressive, it seems to have a bunch of diamonds in the rough. Soushi is super fast, Roku is a great leader, and the newest addition and only girl, Akira, seems to be great at all aspects of the sport. After Akira demonstrates her skills on the field, the team seems to accept her, even the stubborn Soushi. But boys will be boys…  
  
Volume 3 contains the side story "Aru Natsu no Ichinichi" (ある夏の一日).  
Volume 4 contains the series "[Koganeiro](https://mangadex.org/title/7031/)".  
  
As a part of the JUMP START initiative, the first three chapters of Shuudan! were published in English in VIZ Media's digital Weekly Shonen Jump.
tags: Comedy, Sports, School Life

name: Goth Lady and Lolita Boy
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Office Workers, Crossdressing, 4-Koma

name: SAMURAI DEEPER KYO
description:
At the dawn of the 17th century, at the end of the era of civil wars, in a world of chaos, the epic Battle of Sekigahara was joined. One man emerged from the largest battle ever fought on Japanese soil; a terrible warrior of unspeakable power, he was nicknamed 'the unconquerable.'  
  
Kyoshiro is a peaceful medicine peddler who harbors the soul of an assassin. He accompanies a young bounty hunter across Japan in search of a murderer and on a quest to discover the terrible secret of his own identity.
tags: Historical, Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural

name: I'm the Dying Emperor's Doctor
description:
Once again, Serina has failed to prevent the Emperor's death.

"Why? Why does he keep dying every time?!"

Executed for failing to save the Emperor as the palace physician, Serina awakens to find herself in her third regression. Forced to return to the palace, she faces the same deadly dilemma:

Refuse the position as Imperial Physician? Execution. Fail to treat the Emperor? Execution.

Determined to change her fate, Serina resolves to speak her mind this time. To her surprise, Emperor Ajade willingly appoints her as his personal physician.

"Fine. This time, I'll save you no matter what it takes!"

Can Serina finally defy the odds, save the Emperor, and retire peacefully from her treacherous role as palace physician?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Class Ten'i de Ore dake Haburareta no de, Doukyuusei Harem Tsukuru Koto ni shita
description: When Kirishima Ran and his classmates were transported to another world they each received an ability. However the ability he received, [Sexual Lunatic], has caused nothing but trouble for him. His ability allows him to make any girl he comes in contact with his slave. Because of his ability, his classmates have shunned him and forced him to separate from them. With the fires of revenge burning inside his heart, Kirishima decides to overtake the class from the shadows. One by one he turns his classmates into slaves and fill his desires.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Dance in the Vampire Bund A.S.O.
description: Third part of the story of Dance in the Vampire Bund, and direct continuation of Dance in the Vampire Bund - Scarlet Order. We return to the story of Mina Tepes, the princess of the vampires, and Akira Kaburagi Regendorf, her faithful guardian, in her search for the coexistence between vampires and humans.
tags: Action, Romance, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Seiryaku Kekkon Zentei!? Mitsuai no Gishiki
description: To help save her family's failing business, Sawako agrees to undergo a Shinto rite in which she will be symbolically married to the god of her family's shrine, a deity responsible for good harvests and business success. However as soon as the ceremony is complete the god appears in person to claim her as his bride--and as far as he is concerned there is nothing "symbolic" about it!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Kuzu Rouninsei, Jinsei ga Tsurai no de Yoru no Onee-san wo Yondemita
description: Makino failed her college entrance exam. Her only comfort is in her 2D game characters... until she found an ad for a call-girl who looked exactly like her favorite in-game waifu! The yuri love comedy between a gullible young woman and a street-wise call-girl begins now!
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Not found
description:
Orphaned after the his parents were murdered, Uta Rain was ultimately auctioned off as a slave. Certain that he would be treated terribly no matter where he was taken, Uta was in despair. But what awaited him was... a luxurious meal and five pretty sisters. However, they were the daughters of the demon lord who was defeated by the hero 16 years ago?! Uta's fate begins to change drastically!

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)
tags: Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Shota

name: Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shite shimatta...
description: I recovered my past memories when I was hit on the head by a rock. I am Katarina Claes, the eight year old daughter of the duke. In a feverish nightmare, in which the prince’s fiancee was determined, I have realized that this is the otome game from the previous life. Also, I have turned into the villainess that interfered with the romance of the capture targets… If the heroine got a happy end, I would be exiled, while if she got a bad end, I would be killed by the capture target… I have no happy end!? Why is it only bad!? Somehow I have to avoid the destruction end, and reach old age peacefully!!
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: "Shoku" Rondo
description: est em's short stories around the theme of "food." Serialized in Morning between issues 2017/20 and 2018/19 as four chapters, and never compiled in a volume. Presumably on hiatus.
tags: Oneshot, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Terror Train
description:
A collection of six tales by the one and only Hideshi Hino. Everything from a mysterious man in black met on a train, a strange comedic biography of Hino that proves he is an alien, to a poor family who suddenly gets rich when one of the members can create money in a very strange way!

NOTE: The last chapter is a part of the end of The Boy From Hell that is fully translated here...many thanks to Caterpillar!

https://mangadex.org/title/aadfb8fb-7474-4d04-ad68-42b854f5b001/the-boy-from-hell
tags: Ghosts, Comedy, Samurai, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Supernatural

name: Tsuki no Oki ni Mesu mama
description: In middle school, Ayumu kept getting teased and pranked by Runa, even though he's a year below her. Now that she's in her second year of high school, she's ready to be the experienced senpai for the incoming freshman Runa.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Orange
description: The spring she turns sixteen, Takamiya Naho receives a strange, but detailed letter from herself, ten years in the future. At first she thinks the letter is a prank, but then the things written in the letter actually happen, including the arrival of the new transfer student who sits next to her in class, Naruse Kakeru. The letter reads just like her diary entries, down to the same characters. It is not until two weeks later, when Kakeru shows back up at school, that Naho finishes the letter. In the letter, her twenty-seven year old self tells her sixteen-year old self that her biggest regret is that Kakeru is no longer with them in the future, and asks her to watch him closely.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: [GwangGong Industrial Complex] Please, Candy!
description: Hagong, who was ordinarily going to work, and his junior, who had followed suit of him, Woon, had joined the same company. Although they had confirmed their feelings for each other briefly, for some reason, Woon avoids any of Hagong’s skinship. This leads to Hagong visiting his house, and seeing him interacting lovingly with another man. Hagong is filled with a sense of betrayal, after recalling the times his skinship was avoided.
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Anthology, Boys' Love

name: Celebrating Christmas Once My Part-Time Shift Ends...!
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic

name: My Tiny Home
description: Xiao Lin returns to her hometown after many years. and after seeing her former childhood town and friend, she remembers memories like a silent movie...
tags: Oneshot, Slice of Life

name: Tentacle Hole
description: On the way home, Jin and his friend Komachi are suddenly transported to another world full of strange creatures and Jin is killed by them, but somehow manages to come back to life, but as a tentacled creature !?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Mystery

name: Boushitsu no Koibito
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, School Life

name: Boku no Ma na Musume
description: Sami-chan, who lives alone with her dad, has inherited her mom's silver hair and perfectly round eyes, making her an incredibly adorable daughter. However, this daughter has a secret. When she feels lonely, horns sprout from her head. She's a "half-demon" born from a devil...! Would having a daughter like this bring happiness!? Or... A heartwarming comedy filled with the bond between father and daughter?
tags: Demons, Comedy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: There's 49 Left, Master!
description:
When the powerless thirteenth prince became emperor, he gave his tutor, Yo Yohwa, poison. His reason being his death at the hands of his own master in countless previous lives. The poisoned Yo Yohwa then regresses to an earlier time together with the prince and is determined to get on his good side this time in order to escape. However, the prince already discovered the truth…

“This is crazy. You killed me in the previous lives, and you neglected me in another. Now you’re acting all nice. Are you trying to get away?”
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Crossdressing, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Rei - Irotoutoshi-hen
description: Sequel to Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni Hoshiwatashi-hen and Higurashi no Naku Koro Ni Oniokoshi-hen.
tags: Thriller, Drama

name: Heroes of Fury
description: The princess has been captured by the evil demon king and the king offers her hand in marriage in return for her rescue! But things aren't all what they seem…?
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Fantasy

name: How to Be a Family
description: Do-yeon and Eun-ha, who became a family due to their parents' remarriage, become strangers again due to their parents' divorce. The two met again after many years. Eun-ha is obsessed with Do-yeon, and Do-yeon is burdened by his younger brother... What's even worse is that his feelings for Eunha are not 'brotherly love'.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Murim's Possession
description:
Seungwon, who lost his memories in a car accident, possesses the body of Choo Sahyuk, a supporting character in the novel "Jegal Unhwi". 

As soon as he opened his eyes, Seungwon was having an affair with Ha Jikwang, despite being completely oblivious to it and is under the impression that he is dreaming as he's on the verge of death. 

Somehow, he is unable to wake up from his dream and continues to live on as Choo Sahyuk.
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Isekai, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Harenochi Shikibu
description: Haruno witnesses a mysterious guy crying under the sakura trees. He thought it strange, but who would have thought the guy turns out to be his classmate, Hitose?! Hitose declares that he's going to establish the "Four Seasons Club", with details of club activities being very unclear. But swept up in Hitose's vigor, Haruno joins the club by announcing, "I will be with you"!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: 9 Wonder Worlds
description:
Bored of Isekai? Reincarnation? You have come to the right place.

The Great War devours millions of lives. The children lost their parents, orphan are everywhere. Salvage is an institution funded by the government especially for orphans to become their country's heroes in the future. Akira Koshino is 14 years old boy orphan desiring revenge for his parent's death to accomplish his goal. During his journey, he encounters and makes friends, foes, and fantasy creatures.
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Gore, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Kimi to Uchuu wo Aruku Tame ni
description: Kobayashi is a Yankee who can neither study nor hold down a part-time job. One day, the eccentric Uno is transferred into his class. Uno saves Kobayashi from a questionable part-time job offered to him by a senior student, and the two become good friends after this incident. The more he learns about Uno, the more he is attracted to his lifestyle, and Kobayashi tries to change himself...
tags: Award Winning, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Tonari no Figure Genkeishi
description: Ryutaro Hando is a figure prototype maker, a person who creates the basis for mass production of figures. He is a skilled but somewhat socially awkward member of the workshop he has joined. This yonkoma story can be enjoyed by both figure lovers and those who are not interested in figures.
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Naori wa Shinai ga, Mashi ni Naru
description: Not found
tags: Medical

name: The Substitute Bride Is Captured by the Yandere Lord
description: Lala, the daughter of a nobleman, is sent to the castle of Walter the Feudal Lord, in place of her sister who has eloped. Lala is prepared to be treated harshly, but for some reason, Walter grows fiercely attached to Lala as though he was never even remotely engaged to her sister to begin with... It's a story about a love fantasy of a yandere in a fantasy world!
tags: Thriller, Historical, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, Adaptation

name: Gendai Teni no Daini-Ouji
description: Not found
tags: Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Estio
description:
"Are you the one who called me…?"

A black-haired beast looked at him with glowing yellow eyes.

"It’s okay. It won't hurt anymore. You'll be okay."

Estio was born as the youngest son of a farmer, but everyone hated him. He was a child who could read the hearts of people and animals. And…

"A cursed child."

He finally turned 19, and it was now time for his coming-of-age ceremony. Now starts Estio's journey to find happiness.

---
Estio is just an ordinary farmer's son, but with an extraordinary ability-he can read the thoughts and memories of humans and animals. For this, he is shunned by the people in his village, finding happiness only in his animal friends. After years of silently enduring the villagers' hostility, Estio runs away the night he turns 19. His journey brings unexpected friendships and encounters, but will such bonds be able to show him there is more to him and his ability than meets the eye?

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%97%90%EC%8A%A4%ED%8B%B0%EC%98%A4/2761), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58509736)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/estio/info)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/96041)
tags: Animals, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Dakaretai Otoko Ichii ni Odosarete Imasu
description:
Saijou Takato's five year reign as the "Most Huggable No. 1" has been snatched. Stealing his thunder is the newbie actor with a three year debut, Azumaya Junta! Towards the stuffy hostile Takato, Azumaya's sincere sparkling smile starts to become effective. Even as Takato sets his alert level on max, Azumaya catches Takato in his shameful drunken state and uses it to blackmail him! In exchange for Azumaya's silence, Azumaya states, "Please let me hold you!?"  
  


---
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Drama

name: Reaper of the Drifting Moon
description:
He’s in the deepest part of the Jianghu. Keep your eyes wide open if you do not wish to get dragged into the abyss.

Kidnapped children raised 7 years in darkness for a single assassination mission that goes awry.

---
Pyo Wol was an orphan who wandered around the continent until he bumped into a mysterious man and lost consciousness. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a dark, confined space with only one iron door for an exit. Wol survives the next several grueling months, trying to keep a cool head and stay in shape. When the iron door finally opens, he discovers he's not the only one in this miserable situation. A group of masked people has kidnapped 300 children to train them into human weapons. Wol must fight and kill the others, for only a handful of the strongest will be selected. Will Wol be able to become one of the chosen and find a way to free himself from his captors?

---
[Original Web Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55706014)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%82%AC%EC%8B%A0%ED%91%9C%EC%9B%94/2937), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59771249)
