name: The Fable
description:
A fabled genius at killing resides somewhere hidden in Tokyo. Taught since childhood to obey the orders of his boss, he is ordered to live in Osaka as a normal person for one year in order for the boss to lay low.    ---- **Won the 41st Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2017**
___
[Alt Official English (US ONLY)](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10055/episode/323851)
tags: Award Winning, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description: When Sora enters high school, his homeroom teacher is a sexy gal with huge breasts and she’s none other than the changed version of Suzune, the innocent girl next door who was his first love! As the teacher’s “educational guidance” escalates day by day, Sora is awakened to pleasures he’s never known before…!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Gyaru

name: Ellin’s Solhwa
description: The last thing Ellin remembers is having to deal with a belligerent customer at her dead-end job. And when she opened her eyes… she’s “Solhwa,” the beautiful fourth concubine to the king of the Xyaran Empire. Between trying to learn the language and eating steak, Ellin’s trying to figure exactly what’s going on. Where is she? How did this happen? And who can she trust: Solhwa’s handsome charismatic childhood friend or the elegant, raven-haired king’s advisor?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: NARUTO Fanfiction  : Reborn / Rebirth
description: After facing off the last of the Otsutsuki clan members a forbidden seal activates on the last descendant’s body sending Naruto back into the past before his change began. Naruto is back in the academy with a few days remaining before the academy graduation exam. Naruto now has the opportunity to relive either as a loser who became the hero or awaken as a reborn genius that surpassed all his peers and changes the future.
tags: Action, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Doujinshi, Drama, Fantasy

name: The Legend of Dororo and Hyakkimaru
description:
During Japan’s tumultuous Sengoku period, one man sells his son to a pack of devils in exchange for the power to rule. Forty-eight devils take forty-eight pieces of young Hyakkimaru, and the boy is left for dead. But through the assistance of a sage and a series of inventive prosthetics, Hyakkimaru survives. Together with the young thief Dororo, the now-grown Hyakkimaru embarks upon a quest to slay all the demons and retrieve the stolen pieces of his body.   
  
This classic story from Osamu Tezuka, the father of modern manga, is now reimagined in this gorgeous new adaptation by Satoshi Shiki.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Otoko Girai na Bijin Shimai o Namae mo Tsugezu ni Tasuketara Ittai Dounaru?
description:
Arisa and Aina are beautiful sisters who are famous for their dislike of men. Hayato, a classmate who happened to be involved with the two, will receive “special treatment” from the girls who are supposed to hate men―?! 

“I want to be a slave to Hayato-sama…”
“I want to fall in love and conceive his child.”
___
**Character Designer:** [Giuniu](https://mangadex.org/author/657f488c-ba3d-4910-8ec3-539871b99fcc)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: Dragon Ball - Awfully (Doujinshi)
description: Chichi is trying to measure Goku for some new clothes. They then share a (safe for work) intimate moment in the early days of their relationship.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Doujinshi, Slice of Life

name: Картоп Толы Жәшік
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Psychological, Survival, Philosophical, Drama, Web Comic, Tragedy

name: Zaijian no Yoake Made
description: Akio Fujisawa was a quiet loner—obviously the total opposite of the sociable and confident Tingyu, a Chinese exchange student who joined his class. But when Tingyu revealed the insecurities behind that confident exterior, a friendship started to blossom. Fast-forward to years after graduation, and that friendship is still going strong. Tingyu’s frequent visits to Japan keep their connection alive, all while Akio harbours some more-than-friendly feelings...
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Harebare Biyori
description: One day at a funeral, after Chiharu's mother remarried, Chiharu met the child from her new stepfather's previous marriage, Rui. Rui decided to live on her own after the death of the grandfather who raised her, and Chiharu decided to live with her. A tale of togetherness of two stepsisters.
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Noroi no Ningyou
description:
A special one-shot published in Weekly Shounen Magazine No. 9, 2024

Based on the story of the Okiku doll
tags: Oneshot, Horror, Supernatural

name: Fox Love Story
description: Gumiho Yeon, who despises humans, accidentally avoids an accident with the help of human Dong-i. In essence, a nine-tailed fox is a being that has to repay the favor it receives. Yeon visits Dong-i without skipping a day for Bo-eun, and Dong-i is only burdened with such a kite. The two, who seemed never to be able to get closer, know each other's wounds and shortcomings, fill them in, and develop good feelings... The two are different in their environment, race, and way of loving. Can a nine-tailed fox and human love have a happy ending?
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Uzumaki
description:
On her way to the station to pick up Shuichi Saito, a high school student from a neighboring town, she finds Shuichi's father sitting in an alley, staring at a wall. 

He seemed oblivious to Kirie's greeting and continued to stare at the snail shell stuck to the wall... 

An out-of-this-world horror depicted by Junji Ito, the genius of new-sensation horror!
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Hoshizora no Karasu
description: Waka is a 13 year-old Go-lover! Learning from her grandfather, a pro go player, she comes to enjoy connecting with the people around her, regardless of age or gender. One day, she meets the young genius go player, Sagisaka Souji, in a match that tore at both body and soul, and so she decides to become a pro go player herself!
tags: Traditional Games, Romance, Drama, School Life

name: Kamakura Bakeneko Club
description: There exists an old rumor relating to cats within the ancient capital of Kamakura... that if you go to the "Bakeneko Club", located somewhere in Kamakura, you can meet cats that have gone missing. Even today, people wander into "Kamakura Neko Club", where Maya and Gakuto work, relying on this rumor.
tags: Animals, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Legal Scandal
description: "Prince Flynn of Albion is adored for his charm and good looks-but the endless dating rumors? Not so much. Tired of the gossip, he proposes a bold idea to his secretary, Drew: pretend to date him to control the narrative. It’s all for show…until Drew starts seeing Flynn in a different light. Can a staged romance turn into something real?"
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy

name: Mega Man Battle Network
description: The year is 200X, an age where everything is covered with computer networks, and everyone in the world has a "PET" mobile terminal. Hikari Netto, a grade school student at Akihara Elementary, is in perfect harmony with his NetNavi, Rockman, and is obsessed with Net Battles. But then, he gets caught up in an incident involving World Three (WWW), a criminal organization that stages cyber-terrorist attacks. Finally, the Ministry of Science is taken over, and Netto's father is taken hostage. In order to save his father and stop WWW's plan, he confronts the Dream Virus, the most powerful computer virus fused with the "Ultimate Program."
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Josou shite Off-Kai ni Sanka shite mita.
description: “Cocoa" has made three best friends in her monthly meetup group, where girls get together every month by meeting up at the cutest and trendiest new dessert cafes. Cocoa is in it for the sweets—really!—but she's also harboring a few secrets: Not only does Cocoa have a crush on another one of the girls in the group, Opera, but she's actually a guy named Satoshi who's been cross-dressing! During one meetup, things come to a head when Opera discovers that Cocoa is cross-dressing—and to Cocoa's surprise, Opera confesses that she is too! [Kodansha]
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Web Comic

name: Gunjin Shoujo, Seiritsu Mahou Gakuen ni Senyuu Suru Koto ni Narimashita
description:
Razé was a cheat soldier at the age of 15, thanks to the memories of her previous life. One day, she was summoned by her superior – the devil Prime Minister and was ordered to go on a long-term solo mission. She was expecting a harsh mission, but…

“I knew you are the right person for this, Lieutenant Colonel Razé Orphan. I want you to attend the Centrior Imperial Magic Academy starting from this spring.”

“…..what?”

Well, it seems that she has been appointed as the “bodyguard” for the prince and other noble’s kids. And so, she was enrolled to the school where the aristocratic-sama gathered.

Although she was puzzled by the glittering school life, she was trying to live a life so as not to be bullied in the future. But it seems there was a secret that she didn’t know hidden in this world.

“Hey!!!!!! No one told me that this is an otome game!!!!!”

As a bodyguard, her life would be over if any of the noble kids got hurt. But then a young lady who claimed to be the ill-fated villainess came by. If the girl died, won’t she be dead too?

Today, Razé will continue to watch over her school life (with her own life on the line).
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Reverse Harem, Isekai, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Hell Dogs
description:
Can I kill a person as a police officer!? It's been three and a half years since I became a yakuza, and the infiltration never ends.  
  
Kanetaka of the Higashi-Sheath Association is a gangster with a strong arm who has climbed up to assistant young head.  
He landed in Okinawa at the command of the organization and killed his target, Kino.  
That night, Kanetaka vomits violently.  
He was an undercover investigator at the Metropolitan Police Department!  
What is the purpose of Kanetaka's actions!?
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Mafia, Gore, Delinquents, Police, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Mushoku Tensei - Rudeus Future Diary: Eris (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Action, Magic, Isekai, Doujinshi, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Bouken ni wa, Buki ga Hitsuyou da! ~Kodawari Rudy no Kajiya Gurashi~
description: A young girl Rudy may dream of becoming the greatest weaponsmith in the world, but right now she's just an apprentice at a hardware store. She can't help getting scolded by her master for crafting the craziest weapons! In this dungeon-city where heroes dare to delve, experience the everyday life of the regular folk that keep things running smoothly! Welcome to your "Craft Fantasy!"
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Suki x Suki
description:
Touka Aizuki is a girl who can turn invisible, and no one can see her except for one person, Ryoutarou Mimori.  
  
Even though she is physically invisible, her love is completely visible!
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Supernatural

name: Isekai de Seijo ni Natta no de Kokumin-teki Idol wo Mezashimasu
description: Not found
tags: Harem, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Daybreak
description: Marcus has a crush, and Cog is completely unprepared for the hijinks that follow. Hopefully in their efforts to grow closer, they can brighten each other's day.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, School Life

name: The Ice Princess Wants to Be Melted by a Small Patch of Sunlight
description: Aoba is a first-year high school student who takes care of his younger siblings in place of his busy parents, and ends up at a sibling playdate in the home of his classmate Mizudori, a cool beauty known as the "Ice Princess".
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Taisango no Maid-san
description: My maid, Hayaoka-san, She is serious, good at her job and perfect. But it seems like I'm a little relaxed after work... The gap between on and off keeps me excited! ♡
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: The Magic in this Other World is Too Far Behind!
description:
Suimei and two of his best friends find themselves mysteriously summoned to another world. There’s a cute princess, magic galore, a Demon Lord that needs to be defeated, and a world that needs to be saved — the works! Too bad Suimei isn’t interested.

His friends are all too ready to play the parts of heroes, but Suimei just wants to get home. He has an advantage as a magician... but he’s in for a rude awakening when he finds out what actually passes for magic in these parts.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Jigoku Sensei Nuubee
description:
Nueno Meisuke, better known as Nuubee, is an exorcist who also happens to be the teacher for a 5th grade class at Doumori Elementary. While he uses many various exorcism techniques, his main weapon is his left hand, the Demon's Hand, which has the power of a chaotic demon sealed within it.

The series follows Nuubee and Doumori Class 5-3 though the many weird, insane, and downright silly supernatural encounters they face.
___
[Official X Account](https://x.com/nube_off)
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: Baki Gaiden: Gaia to Sikorsky
description: After approaching Gaia for a revenge match, Sikorsky is instead greeted with his new home...?!
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Military, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Armed Girl's Machiavellism
description: The Private Aichi Symbiosis Academy was originally a high school for high-class girls. When it became co-ed, the girls, out of fear, asked to be permitted to bring weapons to school. When that was enforced, a five-member vigilante corps-like organization called the "Supreme Five Swords" was also formed. After many generations, the five swords eventually became a group which corrected problematic students, so the academy started proactively accepting such students in order to correct them. Nomura Fudou was sent to that school after being part of a huge brawl. What will he do when the only options he has after enrolling are being expelled from that school as well, or being corrected the way the rest of the male students there were… by being forced to dress and act like girls!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, School Life

name: Gomi Ika da to Tsuihousareta Shounin, Jitsu wa Zensei Kenja Desu ~Shijou Saikyou no Kenja, Sekai Saikou Hou no Gakuen ni Kayou~
description:
One day, Gard, a servant of a count's family, was framed for a crime he did not commit and was fired from his job.

"You're worse than trash! Get out of this house immediately!"

Expelled from the Count's family and with nowhere to go, Gard saw a flyer recruiting students for Remillion Magic Academy and decided to take the entrance exam in the royal capital. It was said to be the most difficult exam to enter a magic academy, but Gard passed it with ease. How could this happen to Gard, who was just a servant?! Yes, in his previous life, Gard was actually the "strongest sage"! The strongest sage is unrivaled!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ore no Zensei no Chishiki de Teihen Shoku Tamer ga Joukyuu Shoku ni Natte Shimai Sou na Ken
description:
Due to an accident, the protagonist Varius died and was reincarnated. He was shocked to find in this new world, his former job as a Tamer in the previous world was acknowledged as a low class job in this new world.  
  
Utilizing his knowledge from his previous life as a basis, he then applied unique buffs to his beasts, taking back the ultimate power that he once possessed.  
  
With this power in his hands, he sought to start his life as an adventurer. However-  
  

[Webnovel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n7251fq/)
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Villainess and Miss Demon Lord
description:
Two girls, hand-in-hand, cross over to another world, into a magical academy set in a melodramatic Western fantasy novel. They transform into two people completely unrecognizable to each other: One is a rich villainess who is incapable of using any kind of magic, while the other is a young girl extremely talented in the field of magic, who's said to be the reincarnation of the Demon Lord. Originally set to save the world, the two of them unexpectedly fall in love.

"Male lead, female lead, may you two live a long and happy life together, forever. I, the villainess, am going to elope with Miss Demon Lord!"
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Onsaemiro
description:
To prepare for her audition to cast in the upcoming historical drama, “Muyoung Tower,” would-be actress Haeri visits the Buyeo National Museum, where she finds the “gilt bronze incense burner,” an old Baekje artifact. Thanks to her, Onsaemiro, the son of a god who had been lying dormant in the incense burner, awakens, and the cycle of fate starts to move once again…

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5083255), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list.nhn?titleId=745472)

tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Stand User Homura Jojoca
description:
As a group of magical girls fight a witch, a delinquent suddenly appears out of the blue! Afterwards, their stories begin to intersect in a bizarre way...

The plotline of Madoka Magica, with elements of a bizarre adventure!
tags: Action, Magical Girls, Adventure, Doujinshi, Drama, Supernatural

name: Watashi no Kazoku Shiiku Nikki
description:
When he woke up, he was in a room he didn't recognize. A little girl, Lulu, called him "Big Brother."

"We're all here, I'll go get Dad!" Then Lulu left the room with a bright smile. He didn't know where he was. And he didn't have a sister. In an instant, the door opened. Something came with a rattling sound.

Something called "Dad" entered the living room.

A high concentration of mystery and fear is chained together in this crazy situational thriller. If you read this, you will be part of our "family" from today.
tags: Psychological, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Yuuyami Tokkoutai
description: Tsuji, a high school student whose sister was killed by a spirit several years before the beginning of the story, joins his school's Paranormal Research Club after hearing rumours of its president being a brilliant exorcist, hoping to gain the skills necessary to avenge his deceased sister.
tags: Action, Comedy, Horror, Supernatural

name: Mako-san wa Shindemo Jiritsu Shinai
description: It's been one year since Rin moved to Tokyo for high school. He was told by the landlord of his apartment that he didn't have to pay rent if he takes care of the landlord's granddaughter, which he immediately accepted. However, that granddaughter, Mako, ended up being a 20 year old college student who is completely incapable of taking care of herself. Even so, it was love at first sight for Rin, and he's been taking care of her ever since.
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Ennead
description: The once peaceful land of Egypt has been stained with blood under the tyrannical rule of Seth, the god of war. Horus, son of the god Isis but not yet one himself, rises to challenge the throne and put an end to the chaos and destruction. Although the confrontation between Seth and Horus began with hatred, in time it becomes blurred by obsession and desire... The ancient mythology of Egypt comes to life as you've never seen it before in this compelling fantasy BL.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Incest, Sexual Violence, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: The Legendary Assassin Reincarnated as the Beloved Youngest Daughter of a Royal Family
description: Not found
tags: Action, Long Strip, Magical Girls, Magic, Fantasy

name: Life at Standstill
description:
[Submission for Yaoqi Village] [Submission for China Academy of Art]
Have you ever felt like this before? Like you're stuck, frozen in time, not sinking, but still exhausting yourself every day.
An old short story drawn in 2021. It's hard to recreate how I felt then. There's no words because I didn't know what and how to say it. Lacking self-control, I could only draw this to comfort myself the best that I could.
This is for our disjointed, disassociated, average lives. Dedicated to every ordinary person.
tags: Oneshot, Philosophical

name: I'm the Most Beautiful Count
description: Not found
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: X (CLAMP)
description:
From Viz:  
Kamui Shiro is a young man who was born with the power to decide the fate of the Earth itself–a destiny he can barely bring himself to believe. But as other players in the prophecy begin to gather around him–the "Seven Seals," with the power to protect the Earth, and the "Seven Harbingers," who are fated to destroy it–he has no choice but to come to terms with his fate.
tags: Thriller, Action, Demons, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Azelda: Spirit Master's Contract Marriage
description: Not found
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: I'd Rather Be the King
description:
Astarote is a young woman who is transported into a romance game that she loved. She takes on the role of the villain, who is married to Prince Cedric, her favorite character. However, she discovers that the end of the game is tragic for her, as she is accused of being an impostor and is executed by the king.

She tries to change her husband's destiny, making him become the new king, but in every route she ends up dying. Desperate, she decides to take radical action: she will become the queen and change the course of history. But to do so, she will have to face many obstacles, intrigues, enemies and secrets.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yumeiro Patissiere
description:
Amano Ichigo is a clumsy 14-year-old girl whose only "outstanding" trait is an incomparable love of sweets. Constantly overshadowed by her near genius-pianist little sister, Ichigo looked forward to a Sweets Festival to lift her spirits a bit; and lo and behold, a taste takes her by the tongue, leading her to Henri Lucas- a world-famous master patissier. She's not the only one enthralled; Henri is sure she's someone amazing, and gives her a recommendation to St. Marie Academy, a school famous for turning out master patissieres!  
  
No sooner than she transfers, Ichigo finds herself amongst the biggest big-shots of the entire middle school, and faced with more troubles than her klutzy self is quite ready to handle. But with the help of her "Sweets Spirit" Vanilla… who knows what'll be possible?
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Cooking

name: Kotoura-san
description:
Kotoura Haruka is a 15-year-old girl who can read people's minds. She has been suffering from troubles caused by her mind-reading ability, and her parents got divorced as a result. She moves to a new high school but tries to keep away from her classmates. Manabe Yoshihisa, one of her classmates, accepts and appreciates her ability and she begins to interact with her friends with his help. Together, they join their school's ESP Research Club.  
  
Kotoura-san is a 4-koma manga series written by Enogizu. The series began serialization in Micro Magazine's Manga Goccha magazine from October 14, 2010. A television anime adaptation by AIC Classic began airing in January 2013.
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Baoh
description:
From the same creator of JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, teenager Ikuro Hashizawa can transform into the parasitical bio-weapon, Baoh, gaining superhuman strength and other abilities such as firing a corrosive substance. He escapes from the Secret Organization Dress along with a young psychic girl, Sumire, and the two must face various assassins sent by the organization to kill him.  
  
Link:  
[JoJo's Bizarre Encyclopedia](https://jojowiki.com/Baoh_the_Visitor) (Manga)  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=259) (OVA)
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Crime, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Police, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Hello Doc
description:
(from ebookjapan):

This slapstick romantic comedy depicts the commotion caused by Annie, a rich young lady who comes to a country town holdup, and Holiday, a handsome young doctor who lives there. 

Annie, a young lady who came to Holdup under her father's will, calls herself Jane and visits the home of Holiday, the town's doctor. 

There, Jane meets a young doctor, Holiday, and is miffed by Holiday's rude attitude...?
tags: Historical, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Medical, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Daisuki!
description:
After getting drunk in a middle-school class reunion, Ookawa Hiromi wakes up at home finding his former classmate Segawa Maki tucked in his bed. The two found out they actually slept together, though not able to recall any moments of the experience. Acting normally as if nothing happened, the two happened to meet together after a while and again got drunk and slept together.
Hiromi had to move out from his apartment as it was going to be demolished while Maki is looking for a housemate after the previous one decided to move out. Will this be the trigger for them to start living together with a possible new romance?
tags: Romance

name: Mahou Shiba Inu★Hanamaru
description: Magical-girl loving Airi one day wakes up to a talking plushie? But just as she thinks this is her time to become a magical girl, her pet dog Hanamaru(♂) ends up making a contract instead...
tags: Animals, Comedy, Magical Girls, 4-Koma

name: Caution! Love Around the Corner
description:
After her life took a U-turn, she buried her past and became a tough policewoman. However, years into her career in uniform, she reencounters the man from her bitter-sweet memory.   
  
Now a sharp-tongued detective, he meets the girl that he used to share cherished moments with. Together, they will seek justice and rekindle what was once between them.  
  
A story of crime investigation, also about how they become each other’s salvation.  
  
[Official English 2 (Toomics)](https://toomics.com/en/webtoon/episode/toon/7394/)  
[Official English 3 (Webcomics)](http://webcomicsapp.com/comic/5ecb8e438c252b2ea94f5623)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Police, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Academy's Reincarnated Hero
description:
The first-generation hunter and the hero who established all monster subjugation systems and frameworks, Kim Jun-woo, finally defeats Gigantiana in the subjugation of the Black Grave Dungeon. However, he also loses his life in the process.

As his breath fades, he hears the voice of Gigantiana...
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Shop With No Name
description: In a deserted alley travelled by few, is an antique shop. It has no sign, no name. It sells the usual items, but if you believe the rumors, this particular shop also sells undisclosed wish-granting items—for a price, of course. And buyers who fail to follow an item's directions for use will pay an especially high price.
tags: Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Megenai Koshimizu-san wa Shouwaru Otoko wo Horesasetai
description:
Koshimizu Koharu, an 30-something woman with little romantic experience, has always wanted to redo a love that ended in high school when she was too shy and couldn't do anything about it. Upon entering a new company, she unexpectedly meets Date Ritsuka, the man she had a crush on at the time.

This coincidence makes her determined to ask him out to dinner, but she gets drunk from nervousness... and when she wakes up, she's naked in bed! Date makes a proposal to her after she apologizes for the previous night's mistake: "Become my slave."

Koshimizu wants to be promoted from slave to lover, and Date, while nonchalantly brushing it off, acts suggestively. What will become of their love?!
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Shi ni Modori Oujo wa Ikinobiru Tameni Yuri Harem wo Tsukuru Koto ni Shita
description: Marie, a domineering and selfish princess, faced her end under the guillotine's blade after her subjects had enough of her. But instead of staying dead, Marie finds herself back a year in the past, though no matter what she does she can never escape the fate that awaits her in a year. Eventually, after Marie learns that the only way to escape her own execution is to conquer a large swathe of 'romantically troubled' women, she decides to use her own 'royal charisma' to build a yuri harem!
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Harem, Fantasy, Villainess

name: Spider-Man: Octopus-Girl
description: Doctor Octopus falls into a coma; when he awakens, he finds himself inhabiting the body of Japanese middle schooler Otoha Okutamiya.
tags: Genderswap, Action, Superhero, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: Kibishii Onna Joushi ga Koukousei ni Modottara Ore ni Dere Dere suru Riyuu ~Ryou Kataomoi no Yarinaoshi Koukousei Seikatsu~
description: Average company worker Shimono spends his days constantly being helped and scolded by his superior and section chief Kamijou Touka. One day, he finds himself having traveled back in time to his high school years. He sees this as a chance to aggressively approach the section chief a second time around, only to find out that very woman had turned into a girl constantly acting lovey-dovey towards him!
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: ILYA
description:
Fugo, a rookie exorcist, burns with hatred for the demon who destroyed his family.
His master, concerned about Fugo's obsession with revenge, urges him to speak with a certain demon.
This demon is "Ilya."
As Fugo engages in repeated conversations with her, gradually, he has a change of heart...

Source: MangaPlus
tags: Oneshot, Demons

name: Project SEKAI COLORFUL STAGE! feat. Hatsune Miku Comic Anthology
description: Official anthology for the game Project Sekai
tags: Comedy, Anthology, Slice of Life, Music

name: Tsukushitagari na Uchi no Yome ni Tsuite Derete mo Ii ka
description: There's the flower of Takamine High, Hanae Riko, whom every boy admires. Then, there's the plain boy, Niiyama Minato, who got proposed to by that most beautiful girl in school. Without knowing what's happening, the curtain on their newlywed life rises! For some reason, my bride, who's too cute and happily follows me around everywhere, refuses to leave my side...
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Sefure
description:
Leo-chan is a professional radio DJ who talks about sex and listen to the sexual worries of her audience in order to give them proper advice.   


---

**Links:**  
- [Series Official Twitter](https://twitter.com/leo_amazume)  
- [Amazume Ryuta's Twitter](https://twitter.com/ArOgiso)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: The World God Only Knows
description:
Keima Katsuragi is a high school student better known online as the "God of Conquest," the man who can obtain the heart of any dating sim girl. In his opinion, real life is an awful game; three-dimensional girls are annoying and false representations of how a real girl should be.  
  
One afternoon, while taking a break from cleaning duty, he stumbles across a strange message that goads him to conquer a girl. On a whim, he accepts, and his consent summons a girl named Elucia "Elsie" de Lute Ima, a denizen of hell tasked with capturing runaway spirits that have festered in girls' hearts. Keima is shocked and tries to escape, but Elsie tells him that failure in fulfilling the newly-formed contract will result in the termination of his life!   
  
Tasked with capturing the runaway spirits, Keima uses his expertise and knowledge of dating sims to obtain the hearts of girls in real life.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media Komputindo as **The World God Only Knows** (2012)
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Rebuild World
description:
At the risk of his own life, a young man sets foot in the ruins of a devastated old world. His name is Akira, and in order to claw his way out of the hellhole that is his birthplace of Slumtown, the boy became a hunter. In the wastelands he happens upon a strange woman, standing perfectly still, stark naked.   
She is beautiful, but it seems that only he can see her. She exists incorporeal, tantalizingly beyond any touch, and she tells him her name is Alpha.  
Alpha won’t show even a sliver of her real intentions, but with a wide smile, she brings Akira his first commission as a hunter. Akira takes the task, if only to become a stronger hunter, and having entered a contract, their dramatic lives in the hunting profession was set to begin.  
  
From Stories of the Boy Hunter as recorded by the Eastern Hunters’ association.  
Written post-collapse of scientific civilization.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Saitei Chara ni Tensei shita Ore wa Ikinokoritai
description: Jin reincarnates into the most hated and worst character in the game he played before he died. If the same scenario is followed, he will fall into darkness after three years... In an attempt to avoid such a fate, Jin begins a life as an adventurer—?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Harem Ou no Isekai Press Manyuuki ~Saikyou Musou no Ojisan wa Arayuru Shuzoku wo Yome ni suru~
description: The erotic-comedy fantasy begins with a gentleman uncle who brings justice while doing some consensual seeding here and there.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Legend of Zelda: A Link to the Past (HIMEKAWA Akira)
description: At the beginning of A Link to the Past, a young boy named Link is awakened by a telepathic message from Princess Zelda, who says that she is locked in the dungeon of Hyrule Castle. As the message closes, Link finds his uncle ready for battle, telling Link to remain in bed. However, Link ignores his uncle's command, and after his uncle leaves, follows him to Hyrule Castle. When he arrives, he finds his uncle seriously wounded. Link's uncle tells Link to rescue Princess Zelda from her prison, giving him a sword and shield. Link navigates the castle and rescues Zelda from her cell, and the two escape into a secret passage through the sewers that leads to a sanctuary.
tags: Action, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The New Legend of the Strongest Man Kurosawa
description: The man of legend has come back to life! Kurosawa, who led the homeless army in a fierce battle against a group of delinquents in *The Legend of A Strongest Man Kurosawa*, was thought to have gone to his eternal rest. After spending eight whole years in a hospital bed, he makes a miraculous comeback in 2013! The fabled man returns to the present life to create a new legend... in spite of the fact that the present life is not quite so great.
tags: Historical, Psychological, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: The Invincible Man
description: It is said that there is no such thing as an "undefeated" player in mahjong due to the large element of luck. However, an undefeated player suddenly appears on Japan's largest online mahjong site, Jansen! His name is "M," and in order to find out if M is cheating, Sonokawa Junpei, a poor part-time worker, approaches him under the guise of a fake friendship. However, when he discovers the secret of M's strength, he begins to develop a passionate friendship with him... The tale of mahjong friendship that challenges the wall of undefeatedness begins!
tags: Psychological, Sports, Drama

name: The Magical Revolution of the Reincarnated Princess and the Genius Young Lady
description:
Despite her supposed ineptitude with regular magic, Princess Anisphia defies the aristocracy's expectations by developing "magicology," a unique magical theory based on memories from her past commoner life. One day, she witnesses the brilliant noblewoman Euphyllia unjustly stripped of her title as the kingdom's next monarch. Thus Anisphia concocts a plan to help Euphyllia regain her good name  somehow involving them living together and researching magic! Little do these two ladies know, however, that their chance encounter will alter not only their own futures, but those of the kingdom... and the entire world!

---
- [Official Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n8558fh/)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Girls' Love, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Violence Jack
description:
September 11, 197x, In the whole Kanto region a magnitude 8-9 violent earthquake occurred. Scholars called it the great destruction of the Showa Era, but the people called it the earthquake from hell! Volcanoes erupted, buildings crumbled, Tokyo became decimated in a single day. The government, after failing to recover the city, abandons Tokyo and moves the capital. The survivors form a society with no laws. In this harsh lawless world emerges Jack, a 10 foot giant who annihilates anyone and anything in his path. The manga details his journey.  
  
The numbering is from the Complete Edition, with around 20 Chapters per volume.
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Animals, Ninja, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Crossdressing, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Delinquents, Monster Girls, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Koukousei WEB Sakka no Mote Seikatsu "Anta ga Kami Sakka na Wake Nai Deshou" to Boku o Futta Osanajimi ga Koukai Shiteru kedo Mou Osoi
description:
Yuta Uematsu is a aspiring novel writer who has long had feelings for his childhood friend Michiru Okuwa, who had always supported his creative work. He finally decided to confess his love to her, even though he didn't feel like he was a match for Michiru, the most popular girl at school. When Michiru brushed him off with the words, "It's impossible!" and stormed out, Yuta was left stunned in disbelief. Michiru went back to reading "Digital Masters," a very popular web novel. However, "Digital Masters" was actually Yuta's work.......

(Source: Natalie.mu, translated)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Adaptation

name: Gin no Kutsu
description: This is the story of Jun, a (nearly) six-year-old boy. Life from the point of view of a little rascal with two loving dads and a pair of adorable friends.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life

name: Dragon Ball Kakumei (Doujinshi)
description: The story in Dragon Ball Kakumei picks up right after the Tournament of Power and deals with the consequences of Android 17 restoring the erased universes. In addition to the six universes destroyed by Zeno, the wish brought back Universe 19, which has warriors that are powerful enough to take down Zeno and the angels.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Doujinshi, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Aliens

name: My Succubus Girlfriend
description:
Izumo is a scary-looking top student. Everyone is afraid of him, but in reality, he just wants friends and a fun school life. One day he is targeted by a succubus named Anastasia who attempts to steal his virgin soul.

A reboot with improved art but similar story of the old version.
tags: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Self-Published, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Koneko-chan, Kocchi ni Oide
description: After Yuuko graduated from junior college, she ended up managing a clothing shop. Though her career is going well, she hasn’t had time to work on her love life. One day, she’s out drinking with her best friend, Mikan, bemoaning her lack of a boyfriend for a Christmas date. When she trips and hurts her leg, Mikan asks her little brother Leo (an 18-year-old) to see Yuuko home safely. When they arrive at her apartment, though, Yuuko makes a move on him and they end up sleeping together. The next morning, she realizes that she not only slept with her best friend’s little brother, she actually took his virginity! Leo isn’t satisfied with it being a one-night stand, and they start having a completely sexual relationship. Will she be able to keep this from Mikan, and is it possible their relationship may grow to something more?
tags: Romance, Slice of Life

name: The Promise
description: Anno, a lower rank power user, made an escape plan from an underground research institute, but he encountered Jing Ye, a high rank power user who could cancel out his powers. He tried to avoid Jing Ye at all costs but their fates seemed to be intertwined.  Jing Ye destroyed all of his plans, stripped him of all his choices and even corrupted his rationality. With Jing Ye being so secretive and suspicious, will Anno choose to believe in him? Or will Anno choose freedom, and escape from that hellish place instead?
tags: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Hokenshitsu no Kagishimete
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life

name: Debby the Corsifa wa Makezugirai (Fan Colored)
description:
"I know! I'll destroy some humans to kill time!"

The strongest demon ever makes an unexpected appearance! But she's… a total airhead?! A comedy about a clumsy but emulous demon trying to kill time begins!
tags: Traditional Games, Demons, Comedy, Fan Colored, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Issho ni Ken no Shugyou o Shita Osananajimi ga Dorei ni Natteita no de, S-Rank Boukensha no Boku wa Kanojo o Katte Mamoru Koto ni Shita
description: S-Rank adventurer and second-generation sword saint, Ryunoa Styler, is reunited with his childhood friend, Aine, who has been reduced to slavery. Ryunoa purchases Aine in order to save her, however, she's been given a cursed collar that causes the wearer to go into 'heat' once a day...
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: If You're Gonna Dress Up, Do It Like This for ladies
description: Not found
tags: Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
A work packed with stories that make you cry, smile, and heal. A compilation of original short stories, including commercial oneshots and manga previously published on Twitter or Pixiv.

List of Stories (in **bold** = scanlated):

1. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home (Oneshot)** (ようこそ亡霊葬儀屋さん (読切版)): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/72034786), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1394956053461315585).
One-shot version of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

2. **Welcome to the Departed Spirit Funeral Home - After Story** (一描き下ろし後日話)
A newly drawn after story of *[Youkoso Bourei Sougiya-san](https://mangadex.org/title/99f1aa23-d9b5-432f-ba51-591985f76607/)*.

3. **My Childhood Friend Is a Crybaby** (俺の幼馴染みは泣き虫だ): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/79083715), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1374662950787551232).

4. **Four Patterns of Love** (4つの恋模様): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89467880).

5. **The God of Pestilence Picked up by Humans** (人間に拾われた疫病神): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88553623), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1372125964876931075).

06. **To You at 17** (17歳のキミへ。): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/79817585), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1217750845460058112).
A mysterious high school girl appeared and sent letters to Mirai.

7. **Just an Office Lady Eating Ramen** (OLさんがラーメンを食べるだけ): Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1414132353115426816).

8. **Seeing the Sea With an Angel** (天使と一緒に海を見る): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89166096), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1382272880931532804).

9. **WORLD END WANKO**: Original on [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1512347577408053250?cxt=HHwWhICjhfyG-PwpAAAA).

10. **The Tired Office Lady's One Comfort in Life** (佐藤さんと鬼上司天野さん): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/75086414), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1384809850538917895).

11. **The Story of a Cat That Has Lived for 100 Years** (100年生きた猫の話): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89015686), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1464174470495498249).
This is a story of a cat that has become immortal, wandering through the course of its lifetime to find happiness.

12. **Shimono-kun's Quiet Girlfriend** (無口な下野くんの彼女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/88224680), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1367052638500495360).

13. **The Demon Lord Defeated by the Hero and the Slave Girl** (勇者に敗れた魔王と奴隷少女): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/88878648), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1377199075192303618).

14. **The Boy Who Had Grown to Hate Manga** (漫画が嫌いになった少年): Original on [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/en/artworks/89807719), [Twitter](https://twitter.com/kilightit/status/1392419305199788032).
tags: Demons, Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Himitsu no AiPri Full Color Osarai 4-Koma
description: The anime, "Himitsu no AiPri," is now available as a cute full-color 4-Koma! The main characters are Himari Aozara and Mitsuki Hoshikawa, who enroll in the private Paradise Academy. Himari, who longs to be in AiPri, dreams of making 10,000 friends! She unexpectedly makes her AiPri debut?! She has a secret that she can't even tell her close friend, Mitsuki! However, it seems Mitsuki holds a secret of her own as well... (Translated from Ciao website)
tags: Magic, 4-Koma, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation, Music, Full Color

name: Tenmaku no Jaadugar
description: In the 13th century, Fatima, a captive of the Mongol Empire, the most powerful empire on earth, was taken prisoner and assigned to serve in the imperial palace. With knowledge from Iran, the era's foremost experts on medicine and science, Fatima seeks a world in which she can display her talents. She meets Töregene, the sixth wife of the second emperor, Ögedei, who has mixed feelings about the Mongol Empire....
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Military, Drama, Web Comic

name: This Man's a Complete Dog
description: The love story between Song Hao Hao, a woman who sees lying men transform into dogs in her eyes, and a CEO who can transform into a Doberman.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Habatake Majutsu Sekai no Shitei Tachi!
description:
For over a thousand years, humanity has been protected from the relentless invasions of monsters by the strongest grand mage, Ishtar, and her exceptional direct disciples.

However, among these disciples, only Gilberto led a self-indulgent, lazy lifestyle.

One day, Ishtar suddenly announces her retirement, and a young girl named Lapis appears, aspiring to become a disciple.

As one problem after another arises, Gilberto's peaceful days are turned upside down—!

A heartwarming fantasy of mentorship and growth, filled with laughter and tears!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Only My Psycho
description:
This is District A, somewhere in Asia, where skyscrapers and slums coexist in a chaotic mix.

Sakaki Takeru, who grew up in such a place, is scouted by an underworld organization's assassin squad and, under the guise of recruit training, becomes partners with Atonashi Isagi.

Upon their first meeting, Takeru fell for Isagi's looks, gentle personality, and the fact that he's still a virgin.

As a perfect match both professionally and physically, they seemed to be off to a smooth start.

Until "something" happened that provoked Isagi's wrath...
tags: Action, Psychological, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence

name: Quick Transmigration: Top-Notch Villain Must Be Cleansed
description: Once the big boss with a thousand lifetimes is reincarnated, the boss will be the little pitiful Lonely Star? In order to change that fate, Liang Yin transmigrates through time and space, oppresses scums and bitches, and strives to cleanse their reputations and reverse the fate of tragic characters. But cleansing always involves a kiss (no) and the location is always in the bath (no!), on the bed (no!!), and out in the open? (no no no!!!). Several times after, Liang Yin fell into deep contemplation. Could the answer be in the riddle? Cleansing until they're clean?
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Denonbu
description:
This is a story of girls who risk their youth!

Reina is a transfer student who came to Tokyo from Hokkaido.
Her reason coming to Tokyo is... 「EDM Club」, a club based on DJ activities!
But, the EDM Club that Reina dreamt about everyday is somehow not popular in her new school...?

In the near-future Tokyo, the girls' DJ battles are about to unfold!
A story driven by music, will now begin―
tags: Slice of Life, Music

name: Haru wa Megurite
description: Haru is a middle schooler, travelling solo around the world. Join her on her travels, and experience all sorts of surprises and fresh sights.
tags: Adventure, Philosophical, Slice of Life

name: To Quit Being a Demon
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Demons, Office Workers, Web Comic

name: STRAND
description: Four high school classmates, not exactly close friends, share moments that are both fun and irreplaceable, yet tinged with a quiet heartache they don’t even realize. 'It feels like time has stopped.' Youth is both vibrant and muted. These are the daily lives of high schoolers—and the strange twists in between. A story that explores the meaning of a small act of courage in an unconventional coming-of-age drama (Anti-Electric Parade) begins!
tags: Drama

name: A Mark Against Thee
description:
Innocent man framed for murder and sentenced to death. Released 17 years later after his name was cleared. The times have changed. Yeop has changed. His friends and family have changed. Nothing is the same anymore. The harsh reality surrounding him turned Yeop from a grateful young man to a stoic, skeptical person. And now, he wants to exact revenge on everything that worked together to ruin his life.

(Source: Webtoon Entertainment)
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, Mystery, Full Color

name: The Duke's Everything
description: Tired of high society life in the capital, Ellia Green leaves for the port city of Charlestone at the request of her childhood friend, Tobias. There, she must find Tobias' reclusive older brother Dan, the Duke of Winselton, but he is nowhere to be seen. Instead, she finds a curious young boy, Eddy, an elaborate disguise the duke uses with his magic powers. Ellia soon ends up doting on cute little Eddy, but as the duke's feelings for Ellia grow, he wonders if he can ever reveal his true identity.
tags: Historical, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy

name: Watashi no Waltz
description:
One day a girl submissively becomes another's pet dog...
Just so you know it's not the lewd kind!

---

A oneshot submitted for the August 2018 issue of Gangan Joker but didn't make it to serialisation.

*Additional Retail:*
> [Rakuten Books](https://books.rakuten.co.jp/rb/15552828/)
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Isshou Hatarakitakunai Ore ga, Classmate no Daininki Idol ni Natsukaretara
description: Rintaro Shido, a high school student who aspires to become a full-time househusband, is in the class with a very popular idol, Rei Otosaki. The two have no connection other than being classmates, but their relationship changes drastically when Rintaro serves Rei a home-cooked meal after she nearly collapses from hunger! The food was so delicious that Rei said, "Can I come here every day to eat?"...?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: Vampire
description:
I am a hungry Vampire. I longed to suck the blood of my destined one, which is said to be the finest, but somehow I satisfied my hunger on social media as an internet influencer. But one day, I got a hateful comment--.

Based on the song Vampire by DECO*27
tags: Romance, School Life, Vampires, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music, Gyaru

name: Yo nimo Kahogo na Maou-sama
description:
Sena Yamada is a second-year in high school. For various reasons, she lives alone. She manages to get by by holding down a part-time job. One day, when she was about to be cheated out of her money, she was rescued by a demon king! He told her that she is a reincarnation of a saint and even asked her to move in with him...?　

The exciting life together of a hardworking JK and a pushy demon king is about to begin!
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Isekai Hoteru e You Koso ~Mazoku de Yuusha na Saikyou Ane-tachi Kara Dekiai Sarete Komattemasu~
description:
Richii's parents died in an accident when he was in junior high school, leaving him alone with his doting sister Towa. Three years later, his sister also disappears, and even Riichi is summoned to another world where he is reunited with his sister. In the other world, Towa has become the most powerful hero!

This is an erotic love comedy in another world where beautiful women are always pestering our protagonist!
tags: Demons, Romance, Incest, Harem, Isekai

name: Akuma wa Rozario ni Kiss o suru
description:
Since his childhood, Yoshihiro Yoshinaga has faced countless challenges, distancing himself from the company of others and the possibility of forging friendships due to a persistent problem: being harassed by spirits from an early age.

This constant spectral presence has cast shadows over his life, weaving a web of misfortunes. However, the course of his life takes a drastic turn when a giant demon unexpectedly emerges intent on taking his life. In the midst of this crisis, a chance encounter with Alicia Baal, a beautiful nun residing within a church, becomes the catalyst for a radical transformation to his destiny.
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Supernatural

name: CITY
description: A new slapstick comedy series by Arawi Keiichi, author of Nichijou.    The manga centers on Nagumo, a penniless college student who moves to a town filled with bizarre people.  The original run was 13 volumes, ending with chapter 186 in Feb 2021.  Serialization was resumed in Dec 2024 for the upcoming anime..  [Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/city/)
tags: Thriller, Demons, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Office Workers, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Standard Heroes
description: Let the standard adventure story of extremely normal(?) people begin!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Nightmare Maker
description: Uchida is a high school student genius who created a device that is supposed to make people have good dreams but he always had bad dreams when he tried it on himself. One day, he caught the school doctor sleeping at the clinic and decided to try the device on her. It turned out that it works surprisingly well on her and that she wanted to buy the device from him. He then tries it on his classmates and it became quite popular with the rest of the class as people start lining up to borrow it. Meanwhile, there is growing concern that users of the device are starting to have difficulties differentiating dreams from reality…
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Sexual Violence

name: Eroge Tensei: Unmei ni Aragau Kane Buta Kizoku no Funtouki
description:
I went to bed after completing the blockbuster eroge game that had become a trending topic in the past few days. When I woke up, I noticed something was different. Somehow, and for some reason, I got reincarnated in the initial stage of the same game that I was playing before.

The most concerning part was my character. I was playing the role of a character who challenges the hero and gets defeated. In addition, all the routes of this particular character have been confirmed death.

I got reincarnated as an underdog, and the situation is even worse, because someone has already defeated me in a duel. I can’t escape death anymore. But I won’t give up. I have the knowledge of the eroge game that I had cleared in my previous life. I will make full use of it and try to survive.

This is a story about our hero who got reincarnated as an eroge underdog character, and is trying his hardest to survive.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Rikon Yotei no Keiyaku Konna no ni, Reikoku Koushaku-sama ni Shuuchakusareteimasu
description:
I love you, Mira," said Darius, kissing her as usual. Our contractual marriage was supposed to be a loveless relationship that lasted only two years?!

Mira, who grew up in an orphanage, was born with the ability to absorb magical powers and was constantly forced by her adoptive father, Baron Weston, to purify swords and magical tools that were filled with a miasma. As a result, her body was so battered that the doctor told her she would not live more than a year.

One day, Mira collapses in the temple and is saved by a beautiful woman, Anneliese. Her brother, Darius, is the first duke and head of the Order of the Holy Knights, but he is suffering from a disease called hypermagia. Anneliese offers to help her brother in exchange for saving Mira from the baron.

The heroine has the power to suck magic power, and the hero suffers from hypermagic. The only way for the two to survive, with only a few days left to live, is to *kiss*??!!
tags: Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Tirkom
description:
[Reads left-to-right]

 Drithurs are a government-contracted group of individuals with unnatural abilities, tasked with the objective of keeping what is considered 'society' functioning. Karykom is a Drithur, but her true objective is fighting. Follow Karykom and her coworkers as they complete nonsensical tasks and battle strange foes in a wasteland.

Artist's Twitter: [@Hdittus13](https://twitter.com/hdittus13)
Series Patreon: [Patreon.com/Tirkom](https://www.patreon.com/Tirkom)
tags: Action, Animals, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery

name: V-Idol-Live!
description:
Struggling VTuber Aise Kirari (real name Ise Airi, 16 years old) thinks her idol dreams have come to fruition when she's scouted by the talent agency "V-Drive". However, as a member she'll have to transform and fight in a secret war against monsters... and also get shipped with her genmate?! (it's called "business yuri", kid)

She might not have money, education or numbers, but Kirari's got her eyes set on the stars - she WILL get her spotlight, no matter how wacky things get along the way!
tags: Sci-Fi, Virtual Reality, 4-Koma, Slice of Life, Music

name: Nise Seiken Monogatari - Osananajimi no Seijo o Uttara Michizure ni Sareta
description:
My childhood friend, Magary, was chosen to be the saint. From here on out, she'll have to maintain a smile at all times while at the royal capital and take lessons in etiquette and dance. She'll be living in an excruciatingly stifling world. Having been together since birth, there was naturally one thought in my mind.

While feeling a little bit of loneliness... I pushed my childhood friend (who was trying to escape with all her might with her arms still bound) towards the knight that came to pick her up.

"Alistaaaaaaaaaaaaar!!"
  
I feel as if there was some deep resentment in her voice, but that's probably just my imagination. As her last act of futile resistance, she had me see her off to the royal capital… but, that ended without any problems.

"Now that that's over with, I'll be heading home. Good luck ^^"

I turned my back towards my childhood friend who looked me with deep resentment in her eyes. While I was making my way home... I had to turn around as I was chased by goblins.

"Noooooooo!! Someone, helpppppppp!!"
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Sugar Meets Girl!
description:
A Sweet and Juicy Girls' Comedy~

Featuring:

Sato Kanna, daughter of a yakuza boss, she's known for being loyal to her friends and her slightly delinquent appearance.

And Mochizuki Mito, class president and the school's most envied upon young lady.

Just what unexpected secrets did these two girls found out about each other!?
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Kimi Meku Yoru ni Kogarete
description: At Saint Ruri Girl's Academy, there are two opposing factions: the "Ruri Class," consisting of refined, well-bred ladies, and the "Ai Class," made up of delinquents with poor behavior. Nanase Mitsuki, among the students of the Ai Class, is the most feared by the Ruri Class due to her intimidating appearance, though Mitsuki harbors a complex about her looks. One night, she meets Hosho Yuka, a young lady wandering alone at night...
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: Karma Karma
description:
The ten kings of the underworld judge the souls of the dead based on their deeds in life, but due to an incident, the leader of the ten kings, King Enma, accidentally let the souls of 108 violent criminals escape! King Shinkou comes to the human world to recapture the escaped souls, and runs into a young man named Onomura being chased by one...?

A non-stop hell comedy by Tanaka Mai, author and artist of "A Terrified Teacher at Ghoul School!"
tags: Comedy, Supernatural

name: Uragirareta S Rank Boukensha no Ore wa, Aisuru Dorei no Kanojora to Tomoni Dorei dake no Harem Guild o Tsukuru
description:
Egil, an S-rank adventurer who has lived hateful of "slave," falls in love with one slave at a slave auction he was forced to bring. She was Eleanor, the former third princess of the Kingdom of Cornelia. Eleanor, a slave to Egil, begs Egil to "kill my childhood friend who sold me to a slave trader!"  
Keep an eye on the estrus slaves if there is a chance! Can Egil rescue the body and mind of beautiful girl slaves and bring peace to this world…!
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Villain Classroom
description:
Heo Jeong-woo, a high school student who is bullied by a girl in his class for his weakness.
 
Han Bo-ra, a transfer student, comes to Jeong-woo's class, where he was spending his miserable days.

Jeong-woo feels a strong sense of déjà vu when he sees the child with straight black hair and stains on his legs. Sure enough, Han Bo-ra, who has subdued the arguing classmates, asks them.

"'Have you ever seen a child similar to me?

Jeong-woo decides to approach Bo-ra, who might be able to correct what is wrong...

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?originalProductId=522173)
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Gokusen
description:
Fresh out of college, Kumiko "Yankumi" Yamaguchi becomes a math teacher at an all-boys high school. 
Unfortunately for her, she's assigned by the school board as the homeroom teacher for 3-D, a class of delinquent students. 
When the class attempts to make a living hell out of Yankumi's career, they fail as her persistence and aggression gain her respect. 
However, little does anyone in the school know that Yankumi is actually heir to the Kuroda Ikka—one of Tokyo's most powerful yakuza clans.  
  
(Source: ANN)  
  


---
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Mafia, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Have a Great Trip after the Credits Roll
description: There were two heroes who had defeated the demon lord. Aino the swordswoman and Iro the mage. Before the world attainted its peace, the two girls had made a promise to travel the world after the demon lord's subjugation. This is their heartrending but dazzling journey across a fantasy world.
tags: Adventure, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Ukongebbo
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Mystery

name: Zange
description:
Normality can crumble in an instant.
Revisit Inoue Santa's wonderful DID killer No.13 in this beautifully illustrated killing spree.
**SEASON 1**:
Yamada Kiyoshi, a struggling family man with a strong sense of justice oversteps his bounds and attempts to stop a public disturbance. Unfortunately for him, he's caught himself in the crosshairs of a violent personality...
tags: Thriller, Crime, Gore, Horror

name: Soil
description: Something strange is going on in "Soil New Town." The sudden disappearance of a seemingly normal family leads the two detectives Yokoi and Onoda to the idyllic town in the middle of nowhere. What looks like a routine case at first quickly turns into a complex and deadly riddle where nothing is what it seems to be. Will the two desperate investigators manage to solve the mystery before it's too late?
tags: Psychological, Crime, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Character
description:
Cartoonization of topical movies. A parallel ending? What if an unsuccessful cartoonist sees the face of a murderer?
Moreover, what if he turns that face into a “character” and draws a manga that sells?
A beautiful pervert met by an inexperienced manga artist. When two people who shouldn't be able to see each other meet, it develops into a horrifying serial murder case. The topical movie starring Masaki Suda and Fukase (SEKAI NO OWARI) is chemicalized. Be sure to see the original ending of the manga version, which is different from the movie.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Police

name: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight - Imprint (Doujinshi)
description:
Tendou Maya and Saijou Claudine have finally started dating after many years of toeing the line between friendship and romance, but are unsure of how to interact with each other now that they have become lovers. Who will take the first step towards intimacy?

[ Yuri MayaKuro (Maya x Claudine) One-Shot Doujinshi ]

Source Anime: Shoujo Kageki Revue Starlight

Pairing: Tendou Maya and Saijou Claudine
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Slice of Life

name: SCATTER - Wish You Were Here
description:
From the author of [The World is Mine](https://mangadex.org/manga/6002/).  
  
A young, unemployed, seemingly unmotivated young man is moving through his life. As a teenager, he and some of his friends formed a "Boyz 4 Men" club, which was based on a hatred of sex and women. As arguably the most opinionated member, his view of sexuality as an adult is far from normal. After a highly sexual encounter in a park at night, he has decided to attempt to draw perverted fetish manga. This brings him once again to the presence of a woman from the park, Sawada Kazumi. She's a manga editor and single mother with a perverted and intense personality of her own. What will happen when their worlds collide?
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Drama, Supernatural

name: The Little Lady Behind the Villain
description:
I possessed a character in a novel I had never finished writing when I was in high school. And then now I have the body of a supporting character instead of the main character. It was a seven-year-old orphan girl with no name… Having to suffer the abuse of others, until I got really tired and ran away from that place. But I was captured and sold as a slave. I thought my life was over… But the person who saved me was the novel's most prominent villain, Henriette.

He treats the emperor like a puppet. A person who has a reputation for being extremely cruel in the original and has a hobby of cutting the throat of aristocrats. …Is he my biological father? But other than that terrible reputation, living with him wasn’t bad either.

"Okay, my daughter. You can do whatever you want. If you want something, everyone in the family will do what you want."

Wait… I didn't write a novel like that in the first place?

---

description: Note: Won an honorable mention for Shonen Magazine's 111th upcoming mangaka awards.

name: Buta no Fukushuu
description:
After rampant bullying, high school boy Takeshi Hirota kills himself and is transported to another another world, where he is accepted by the orcs due to his appearance.

name: Ice Blade
description: Kyoya Ida is a hard-nosed detective from the Shinjuku Police precinct. He is known in the force as an unreasonable type who would use lethal force to solve cases, making him unpopular with the enlisted and high-ranking officers in the National Police Agency. Despite this fact, there are some in the force that admire Ida for his bravery and cleverness in using lethal force to solve criminal cases whenever legal means are met in a dead end.
tags: Action, Crime, Drama, Police, Mystery

name: HUVAHH
description: Oneshot that appeared in the Shadows of the Damned artbook (which Hayashida contributed designs to), starring George Reed.
tags: Oneshot, Horror

name: Trinity Seven: Liese Chronicle
description: The story centers on Lieselotte Sherlock, an evil mage from the original manga
tags: Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Bad Police
description:
This is a no-holds-barred story about an ex-biker gang leader turned cop, Kenji Date. 
Operating under the nickname Hyena, Date rubs pretty much everybody within the police force 
the wrong way as he goes about his business ridding the city of all its scum.  
  
Bad Police also contains two separate short stories at the end of the volume:  
  
**Bomber**  
The Chinese leader, Deng Xiaoping, had promised to rid Hong Kong of its criminal organizations. One of the places they migrated to was Japan. Kamon Shou is a delinquent who just got released from Youth Detention after spending two years there and is about to feel first-hand the effect the Hong Kong mob has on Japan.  
  
**Artemis**  
Ginko is a detective working for the famed Holmes Detective Agency, an agency that takes on the most dangerous of jobs: ones that even the police wouldn't even think about doing. She gets hired by Ms. Nancy to retrieve her seven year-old son, Tom. Tom was taken away by her father-in-law's mafia organization in hopes of cultivating Tom to become the next leader.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Police, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Kiss Wood
description: After losing his job as a city gardener, the main character only seems to care about one thing, his home garden full of rare plants. But when a mysterious man burns down his garden and home, the protagonist barely manages to escape alive. When he wakes up in the hospital, he learns he has lost his eyesight. With nothing left, the man just lies in the hospital bed with seemingly no hope left, until the sudden regaining of his eyesight causes him to realise he has been transported to a strange new world covered in a mystical forest.
tags: Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

name: Circle
description:
The best way for the diverse human beings who make up society to unite is to find themselves a common enemy. School is a mini-version of society, so why shouldn't the same thing happen in a classroom setting?  
  
This particular class has chosen Xiao Shang to be that common enemy. But one of its more popular students soon finds himself becoming intrigued by Shang's unapologetic, straightforward way of life.  

This comic is posted for free on the author's weibo: <https://weibo.com/u/3567976483>
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Tears on a Withered Flower
description: Na Hae-soo's life unravels when her husband betrays her with an affair, leaving her burdened with debt and losing their child. In a devastating blow, she witnesses him with a younger woman. Broken and despondent, Na Hae-soo feels her life crumbling around her. However, a mysterious young man unexpectedly enters her life, asking to be taught about adult love. His vulnerability and sincerity begin to stir emotions within Na Hae-soo, challenging her to reconsider her path forward.
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Mafia, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Imouto no Tomodachi ga Nani Kangaeteru no ka Wakaranai
description: My sister's friend Tsuyu-chan is a quiet girl who and I can't figure out what she is thinking. However, it doesn't seem that I'm much disliked… Acclaimed as "cute" on SNS! Daily popular short love comedy with a total of 1.1 million likes.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Three Years Apart
description:
Mizuki and Kazuya, childhood friends, are 3 years apart.  
It's not really a so-called "Age Gap" but that makes some distance between them during their youth.  
From their childhood to the present, the story will be told about these two who are 3 years apart.  
  


---

- [![](https://i.imgur.com/oiVINmy.png) Artist’s Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/member.php?id=596062)
