tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Akairo Crossroads
description:
Is being unable to see the red string of fate better?!  
Since the encounter on the day of the high school entrance ceremony, dog-like boy, Makita Keita and cat-like girl, Ohara Tamaki have had the worst relationship.  
The story starts to progress when the both of them are put in the same class.  
A little mysterious heart racing school youth graffiti begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Non Non Biyori Vacation - Nyanpasu Picture Diary
description: A booklet that came with the Non Non Biyori Vacation Movie Bluray showing the picture diary renge was making.
tags: Oneshot, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Non Non Biyori Vacation Special Booklet
description: Special booklet that was given out at the theaters for the release of the Non Non Biyori: Vacation movie
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Robo Maid
description:
The daily life of a man and his robo maid.
___
Last updated in April 2023 with Chapter 11 (what's currently wrongly numbered as Chapter 10).
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Tsurenai Kanojo no Hitorijime
description: A story of youth and sensuality. A thrilling real high school love story! High schooler Nachi Shinohara is a social butterfly. He can get along with anyone. On the other hand, there's the lone wolf, Takizawa Yuuri. A chance exchange of words leads to a relationship that no one knows about.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai
description:
**The Geeks shall Inherit the Earth!**
  
Recent high school transfer student Hasegawa Kodaka is pathetically inept at making friends. When he comes across the brash loner Mikazuki Yozora, who typically chats with her imaginary friend, the two outsiders become the unlikeliest of allies. Realizing that they have no hope of a normal social life, the two outcasts decide to form a group called “The Neighbors Club” in order to make friends and maybe even learn a thing or two about social skills.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Lady in the Bad School
description: A sweet young lady transfers to a highly notorious high school for delinquents!? In pursuit of her ideal delinquent, the young lady, who aims to be at the top, beats up the scums one after the other in this fresh and exhilarating action story!
tags: Action, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents

name: The Yandere with Fading Memory
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Philosophical, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Psycho Party
description:
Welcome to the world of psychics.

A certain incident has led to a world where psychics are considered dangerous. In the midst of this, a girl named Hibana unexpectedly blossoms a powerful psychic ability. Some try to protect her, some try to use her, and others try to get rid of her... Unaware of her true power, right or left, various thoughts and feelings become entangled around her.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Supernatural

name: Tokyo Innocent
description: With the destiny of searching for a bride, the youkai teenage boy came to Tokyo from a small island: Hanzou. A maiden who develops a youkai-atracting constitution at 16: Ichijouji Mei. With the youkai's heaven "Tokyo" as its stage, Girl-Meets-Monster love comedy.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Osoto Gohan wo Goisshoni
description:
Fuuka, a college student who enjoys cooking but is confined by her apartment's small kitchen, meets Yomogi, a wild outdoor girl who isn't particularly good at cooking. Their outdoorsy meal that started by chance is somehow very delicious and heartwarming....

This is the start of a gourmet outdoor manga about two women helping each other out!
tags: Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Toy Doll
description: We are in the States - Michelle is a prostitute with a child picks clients every day on the streets, while Chris, her teenager husband and the father of the baby, babysits. This is the story of their aimless days. A masterpiece about the joys and sorrows of love.
tags: Romance, Drama

name: Love After World Domination
description:
In the eyes of the public, Fudou Aikawa and Desumi Magahara are sworn enemies who have nothing in common. Fudou, also known as “Red Gelato,” is the leader of the hero squadron “Gelato 5,” whose mission is to bring about world peace. On the other hand, Desumi is the minion leader of “Gecko,” a villainous organization seeking world domination. However, despite these differences, their relationship is not quite what it seems. When they are not making a show of being at each other’s throats, Desumi and Fudou continue to pursue a forbidden love.

Going on dates, baking sweets for one another, and meeting up as often as they can despite their hectic schedules, the two inexperienced lovebirds pave the way for their own unique relationship. Though their public lives are worlds apart, Fudou and Desumi will stop at nothing to make their seemingly impossible romance work.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero

name: Kaguhara-san's Fetish Notebook
description: Kaguhara Ririka is a plain, friendless and often overlooked first year girl at Fuetchi Senior High. However, she has one hobby in particular that she can never tell a soul about; that being her dedication to her fetish and recording her observations of how it manifests itself in all sorts of unique ways amongst her classmates.
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Star Tripper: Planetarium Ghost Travel
description:
The vast sky is populated with a great many stars on which most of the inhabitants have fallen into a deep sleep, called simply the “Slumbering Stars”. This is the story of a traveler of the stars, a worker for the Planetarium Ghost Travel Company (aka. PGT) named No. 303, as he spends his time visiting those sleeping stars in an attempt to preserve the memories and culture their peoples have left behind. Would you care to join No. 303 on a journey into the quiet night?

TL;DR - Story? Nah. Atmosphere? Yah.

---
Ranked No. 5 on the 2023 Kono Manga wa Sugoi! for the female readers category.

- Fun Fact: The creator, Sakatsuki Sakana, is a huge fan of Yokohama Kaidashi Kikou! So much so that she even did an [interview](https://natalie.mu/comic/pp/hoshitabi) with the YKK mangaka Hitoshi Ashinano recently.
tags: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Itsuka no Christmas
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Doujinshi

name: Moto Maou-sama no Nangoku Slow Life - Buka ni Uragirareta no de, Mofumofu-tachi to Tanoshiku Slow Life suru no Ja
description: Ragurindo Jenerufu Korasoda, the overworked Demon Queen, had enough. After an assassination attempt and a betrayal by her underlings, she faked her death and escaped to a tropical paradise. There, among palm trees and beaches, she found a herd of adorable, fluffy slime creatures. Life as an ex-Demon Queen had never been so sweet.
tags: Demons, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Isekai Saikouhou no Guild Leader ~Guild Saijaku no Boku da Kedo, Guild Members Zen'in no ai ga Omokute Guild o Yameraremasen~
description: I thought that if I reincarnated, I would be able to build a happy harem and be peerless in another world...! ! The guild that was created on a whim has become the pinnacle guild of strong men. Moreover, except for me, everyone is handsome and beautiful. I'm the weakest in the guild... can I quit the guild now? The opening of the dark fantasy of the lethargic hero and the guild members who adore him at the level of worship――
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Shaman King Flowers
description:
Takes place 10 years after the end of Shaman King Kang Zeng Bang and focuses on the life of Hana in his teenage years.  
Hana's Epoch (Oneshot), was originally released in the Mentalite fanbook. It is not considered canon at this time in the Shaman King universe.
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Shaman King - Remix Track
description: "A collection of short manga (ranging from 3 to 7 pages) found at the end of the Shaman King Remix volumes. They take a much more light-hearted look at the lives of the Shaman King characters after KZB chapter 299." (Mankin-trad)
tags: Comedy, Supernatural

name: Mietemasu yo! Aizawa-san
description:
Michi, plagued forever by her ability to see ghosts, pretends like she can't in order to avoid them at all costs. But recently she found a ghost she just can't ignore: Aizawa Honami, ex-classmate and ex-member of the famous idol group De:LPhinus, hanging around school from some lingering attachment.

Still, no matter what ghost it is, Michi's not getting involved. Though while she steels her heart, her eyes keep coming back to Honami's bizarre antics and passionate fanservice...(?)
tags: Ghosts, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: Delivery Cinderella
description: Yamada Masami is just an ordinary college student; however, she has a secret. At night, just like magic, she transforms into the beautiful Deriheru Miyabi. A modern Cinderella story now begins.
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Shin Tokyo
description: According to urban legend, the guilty are sentenced to fall to the Tokyo Underworld. There, they are given no mercy and are mercilessly judged for their crimes in the cruelest ways imaginable!
tags: Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Onegai, Nugashite.
description:
There is a curse on this school. It prevents the person who commits "impure acts" from taking off his or her panties. Only the right hand of the protagonist can break the curse and remove the panties, his name is Kamite.

Kamite tells the girls that they have been cursed and that he can take off their panties, but... obviously it is almost unacceptable for them to have any man take them off...!

This is how the girls end up in a lot of trouble. But if the panties are not removed, they can get into even more trouble...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Supernatural

name: 17-sai Kara Yarinaosu Propose
description:
*“I wish I had liked you when I was a high school student …”*
Osamu’s girlfriend refused his proposal with these mysterious words. After that, in an accident, he time-leaps back to his high school days. 
He was trying to find her and make her fall in love with him again, but when he met her she had a twin sister…! ??
tags: Time Travel, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life

name: Mainichi Ie ni Kuru Gal ga Kyorikan Zero Demo Yasashiku nai
description: Class queen Manami Fuwa has been gaining weight lately. To make matters worse, a rival girl is taunting her in class, calling her a "kin-nikuman" (golden meat bun). When Taichi Utsuki can't contain his thoughts about her weight, he's forced to accompany Fuwa on her diet!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: The Fallen Saint Dances in Vortex of War
description:
Alicia has been fighting against the demon king's army and protecting the kingdom as a saint.
One day, she is falsely accused of having an affair with her fiancé, the prince, and is publicly executed.
Abused by the people of the kingdom and despairing of the malice of the people, Alicia makes a final wish.


"I'll kill you all"
"And destroy this country"
She wishes for the death of everyone.

Alicia was supposed to have died in this way, but when she realized it, she was brought back to life by the demon king.
"Haha, now I can kill them all."

The curtain rises on the vengeance of the saintly woman who has been revived from execution...!

Web Novel Raw Link - https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1179he/
tags: Action, Demons, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ghost Hunt
description:
The decrepit building was condemned long ago, but every time the owners try to tear it down, "accidents" start to happen-people get hurt, sometimes even killed. Mai Taniyama and her classmates have heard the rumors that the creepy old high school is haunted-possibly by ghosts from the Second World War. So one rainy day they gather at the old school to tell ghost stories, hoping to attract one of the suspected spirits.  
  
No ghosts materialize, but Mai and her friends do meet Kazuya Shibuya, the handsome young owner of Shibuya Psychic Research, who's been hired to investigate paranormal activity at the school. Also at the scene are an exorcist, a Buddhist monk, a woman who can speak with the dead, and an outspoken Shinto priestess. Surely one of them will have the talents to solve this mystery!
tags: Psychological, Ghosts, Comedy, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Gaman Shinaide, Hades-sama. ~Reikoku na Meiou no Jun'ai wa Michishirenai hodo Fukakude, Omoi~
description:
"I … ..can't live without you."

A handsome man slides his moist fingers over the smooth skin of a young girl. His eyes are warm and his delicacy is such that you will believe he’s in love. The world divided between the "World of the Gods", the "Other World", and the "Earthly World", was filled with chaos. In the realm of the gods, the gods enjoyed eternal life. The goddess Persephone works hard every day to care for the plants so that her life will sprout on the earth, but the shoots she raised withered. She will be taken over by Hades, the master of the underworld, who has come to welcome "death".

Persephone laments her grief, but she is moved by Hades' encouragement, and is drawn to his quiet, calm and gentle side... Meanwhile, Persephone decides to offer her own body to save Hades, who has been caught up in the conspiracy of the divine world.
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy

name: Furetai wa Koi no Hajimari
description:
Kaede Minato, the cool literature girl, is admired by her classmates for her elegant appearance. Momoko Hattori, a cute girl with an adorable face, quickly became an idol among her peers shortly after she entered high school.

Despite having little connection, they quickly grow closer after Momoko finds Kaede in a particular situation...

A story of two girls experiencing a love that is not quite love yet.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Akuyaku Reijou no Shitsuji-sama
description:
Regaining the memories of his previous life, Cyril realised he was reincarnated as the butler of Sophia, an otome game villain. At the rate things were going, Sophia would eventually have the prince stolen away from her by the heroine, fall into darkness, and be executed.

Wanting to save the villainous daughter he was so fond of, Cyril moved to eliminate all the factors that would cause her to fall into darkness, raising her up to be a talented and beautiful girl who could win the prince’s love. However...
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Maid wa Koisuru Hachiya-kun
description: After confessing to my beloved Hanazono-san, I was rejected with the reason, 'I already have an engagement arranged by my parents.' That person is the wealthy and handsome Ikegai-kun, who also happens to have a good personality. Thinking that I had no chance in a straightforward competition, I, Hachiya, decided to cross-dress as a maid and work at the Ikegai house. My plan is to make Ikegai-kun fall for me and break their engagement... Thus begins a slightly silly, cross-dressing maid's comedy that leads to a chaotic love triangle (?)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing

name: Chronicle of the Searing Winds of Tianzhu
description: The manga tells a fictional version of the story of historical Tang China diplomat Wang Xuance, centering on his diplomatic journey from Tang Dynasty China to the Empire of Harsha in India in the 7th century CE. When he comes upon a crumbling empire that is now hostile to him he escapes to Tibet and raises a confederation of Tang, Nepalese, and Tibetan soldiers to mount a raid on the Empire of Harsha.
tags: Historical, Action, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama, Adaptation

name: I'm a Villain, but I'm Favored
description:
"Damn this world, let it burn!"

A single exasperated cry while succumbing to overwork. But instead of dying, I woke up inside the game I’d been playing. As compensation for the hellish life I endured, I gained a unique ability to view information about people and objects. Determined to use this skill to lead a peaceful, carefree life, my resolve was interrupted by an unexpected *system message*:

[To a player who has suffered immensely and wishes for the world's downfall,  
the system grants the chance to fulfill that desire.]

<MAIN QUEST>
Destroy the world.

What?! I didn’t mean it literally! Fine. If this is how it’s going to be, I’m not backing down. Let’s see who gives up first!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: I Am in the Same Class as the Crazy Male Leads
description:
"On an Unbelievably Unlucky Day, I Got Hit by a Truck and Woke Up to Find Myself in the Crazy Novel I Wrote Back in High School.

And it’s filled with nothing but utterly unhinged male leads!

There’s Kang Seonwoo, the top student with impeccable manners but secretly a psychopath.  
Cha Ihan, the rough-looking delinquent with puppy-like charm, yet an obsessive clingy maniac—only for the heroine.  
And Kim Chanseung, a promising national swimmer... who also happens to be a stalker!

“What was I even thinking when I wrote this back in high school?!”

I just need to stay far away from these lunatics and live quietly!  

But life never goes the way you want it to, does it...?

"Let me know if there’s something you don’t like. I want to get closer to you."  
A friend request from the psychopath.  
"Aren’t you too close to those boys? Isn’t that a bit much for someone so conservative?"  
Jealousy from the misdirected obsessive.  
"Here, take this."  
And protein-flirting from the national swimmer-stalker.

What is wrong with all of them?! Why are they like this with me?!

Can I... actually survive here...?"
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Sakuraba Rola ga Medetai Tai!
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Doujinshi

name: Only Show Yourself to Me
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Over Rev!
description:
Over Rev! is a manga about a senior graduate named Ryouko. A while back, she injured her ankle in a track meet. Since then, she didn't know what to do with her life, until she finds out about street racing…

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Over Rev** (2008)
tags: Action, Sports

name: Loss of lines
description: Not found
tags: Adventure, Self-Published, Philosophical, Fantasy

name: Love your love enemy
description: “I hate him, but I want this face all to myself!” Yousuke and Daichi, students at the same university, are romantic rivals for Mitsuru. However, as a result of a stratagem of Mitsuru’s, they get locked in a room and can’t leave until they have sex! The two love rivals. Yosuke kisses Daichi in an attempt to tease him, but to his surprise, Daichi has such a sexy reaction…!?
tags: Romance, Boys' Love

name: Koukyuu wo Tsuihousareta Kitai no Akujo wa Rikyuu de Aiken wo Mofumofu shitetai
description: Jelun (Jie Lun) is the emperor of Yauzu (Yang Zi), an abundant country blessed by the protection of a divine beast. As a result of her father's' military achievements, Li Lanlei (Li Lan Ling) is appointed as one of the emperor's consorts. However, owing to her naturally sour countenance that easily gets her misunderstood, she has yet to see the emperor even once in the year that she has been living in the palace. One day, she is falsely accused of poisoning Meihi, another one of the emperor's consorts, and ends up being banished to the cold palace. Though she is banished on false charges, a surprisingly fun lifestyle was waiting before her?!
tags: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Lost Man
description: There lives a man who has lost his memory and can’t remember where he’s from, and who he is, including his name. He just goes by the name Matsumoto and the one and only thing he remembers is how to play soccer. However, the one thing he does remember, he does exceptionally well, even better than the professionals. He sells his ridiculous soccer skills to teams and guarantees them goals and, even more important, wins. As he travels from city to city, country to country playing for money, he hopes that he regains his memory.
tags: Romance, Sports, Drama

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Escape-hen
description: Adaption of Light Novel 24-25.
tags: Action, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Armor Amour
description: Yuji's girlfriend Misaki may seem hard and cold on the outside, but inside she's actually soft and loving. As they prepare for their high school entrance exams, Misaki decides that they should temporarily cut off all their dating activities. Will they be able to study hard enough through this period to get into the same high school?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Maou Tsukai no Saikyou Shihai
description: For incompetence, Lewin, a Demon-Tamer adventurer, was banished from the hero's party. Without being acknowledged for his achievements as a commanding officer... However, the moment he comes into contact with Sasha, the Demon King of Death, one of the sealed Seven Demon Kings, he awakens to become a Demon King with the ability to subjugate Demon Kings! Moreover, by shattering the seal, he tames the Demon King, Sasha—— Lewin, backed by Sasha, succeeds in drawing out the Demon King's power and works to subdue all Demon Kings, the root of the strife between the humans and the demons.
tags: Action, Demons, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: If the Villainess and Villain Met and Fell in Love
description:
Despite being from a prestigious noble family, Bridget, a failed daughter who made a contract with the weakest spirit, one day had her engagement broken off by the third prince, Joseph.

However, no one sympathized with her, who was acting as a proud daughter at the behest of Joseph... At that time, Bridget meets the Duke's son Yuri, who is feared by those around him because of his overwhelming ability and cold personality.

Two people who hate each other and repel each other. However, the encounter gradually changes their destinies. This is the story of a villainess who is despised for being incompetent and a villain who is shunned for being a genius who eventually fall in love.

---
Despite her noble status, Brigitte contracts with the weakest type of spirit—and on that very same day, the prince publicly breaks off their engagement. No one shows much sympathy towards the once haughty young lady—except for the duke's son, Yuri, who attends the same magic academy. Yuri is feared for his incredible abilities and icy personality, but with him on her side, her fortunes might have changed…

---
**Original Web Novel:** [Kakuyomu](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426830814673), [Syosetu](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n9923hb/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Salt and Pepper
description: Min Hu Chu, a guy who lives to eat and So Geum Ji, a girl who eats to live. They’re both childhood friends but with complete different opinions on the purpose of food. Focusing on these two characters, introducing a story that includes recipes to make alone(?) and their campus life(!) The author of ‘Second Lead Complex’, Soi’s beginning of a new series!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Full Color

name: Sekai o Sukutta Saikyou Yuusha ni Stalker Sareru Mura Musume no Hanashi
description: Not found
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Horror, Fantasy

name: Haru no Regista
description:
Once hailed as a soccer prodigy, high school girl Arai Haru transferred to a school far from her hometown, hoping to start a new life away from soccer. However, a new student, Osanai Satsuki, who admired Haru's past glory, appeared before her and declared her intention to join the Soccer Club, which is on the verge of disbandment. This is a girls' soccer story about a girl who gave up her dream and a girl who chases after it!
___
**What is a regista?**
The regista is a creative player who operates in front of the defense, almost always in a central position, and looks to get on the ball as often as possible. They are responsible for providing the link between defense and offense, and controlling the tempo of the game through their passing. The regista is also known as the deep-lying playmaker: they retain their deep position and dictate their team's play with their distribution. ([Coaches' Voice](https://www.coachesvoice.com/cv/what-is-a-regista-explained-jorginho-andrea-pirlo/))
tags: Sports, Girls' Love, School Life

name: The Other Side of My Favorite Voice Actress was Insane
description: This is a one-shot by Komaki Maria about a loner who stumbles upon the hidden side of his favorite voice actress.
tags: Oneshot, Doujinshi, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Choushihazure na Onna Joushi ga Suki na Otoko no Hanashi
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Romance, Office Workers, Doujinshi, Web Comic

name: Bombergirl
description: Sporadically posted comic pages on the official twitter of the Bombergirl arcade game.
tags: Genderswap, Loli, Comedy, Monster Girls, Web Comic

name: My Daddy Hides His Power
description:
Q: Describe your feelings upon discovering your trusted dad isn’t just an extra.
A: W-what the heck... Give me back my ‘Random Imperial Citizen #1’ life...

Living in a world of constant war—365 days of chaos—a simple, extra's existence was a blessing.
At least, that's what I thought.

In a small village, I enjoyed a humble life with my loving, ordinary father, James Brown, 27, the epitome of an unremarkable single dad.

Or so I believed.

“Ladies and gentlemen, presenting my father! The quintessential symbol of extras everywhere! Brown hair, brown eyes, plain and simple!”
“...”
“This man screams ‘background character,’ living a quiet life chopping wood in a mountain village with his adorable daughter. Right? ...RIGHT?”

The knight commander merely stared at me in silence.

And then, the unthinkable happened.

Behind me, my father’s worn staff began to glow with a strange, blue aura.

“...Dad?”

Before I could process what was happening, his unassuming brown hair and eyes shifted. Slowly but surely, they transformed into...

Shimmering silver locks and piercing blue eyes—practically shouting “I’m the protagonist!”

“WHAT?!”

My simple, extra life shattered into a million pieces as my dad—no, this mysterious powerhouse—gripped his weapon and snarled:
“Give me back my daughter, you bastard.”
tags: Reincarnation, Official Colored, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: A Reunion With A Girl I Dated Briefly After 10 Years.
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Kaminagashijima ~Rinne no Miko~
description: Survive, Girls---!! High-school student Amane Miko is a famous miko in her hometown. One day, she gets involved in a strange traffic accident and finds herself waking up in a world filled with grotesque looking monsters roaming around...!! The constant fear of those monsters attacking!! However, to solve the mysteries of this world, Miko advances through this world of despair. Cooperating with the other surviving girls to escape this solitary island in the distant sea in this Panic Horror Action!
tags: Monsters, Action, Survival, Gore, Horror, Mystery

name: 3-Gumi no Osananajimi
description: Depicts the journey of three sets of childhood friends - 'childhood friends with a physical difference,' 'childhood friends who are conscious of height differences,' and 'childhood friends with an age gap' - until they start dating.
tags: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Black Lagoon
description: The story follows a team of mercenaries known as Lagoon Company, who smuggle goods in and around the seas of Southeast Asia. Their base of operations is located in the fictional city of Roanapur in Thailand, and they transport goods in the PT boat Black Lagoon. Lagoon Company does business with various clients, but has a particularly friendly relationship with the Russian crime syndicate Hotel Moscow. The team takes on a variety of missions - which may involve violent firefights, hand-to-hand combat, and nautical battles - in various Southeast Asian locations.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Office Workers, Military, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: Gangsta
description: In the city of Ergastulum, a shady ville filled with made men and petty thieves, whores on the make and cops on the take, there are some deeds too dirty for even its jaded inhabitants to touch. Enter the Handymen, Nic and Worick, who take care of the jobs no one else will handle. Until the day when a cop they know on the force requests their help in taking down a new gang muscling in on the territory of a top Mafia family. It seems like business (and mayhem) as usual, but the Handymen are about to find that this job is a lot more than they bargained for.
tags: Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Mafia, Military, Gore, Drama, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: xxxHOLiC
description: Watanuki Kimihiro is haunted by visions of ghosts and spirits. Seemingly by chance, he encounters a mysterious witch named Yuuko, who claims she can help. In desperation, he accepts, but realizes that he's just been tricked into working for Yuuko in order to pay off the cost of her services. Soon he's employed in her little shop- a job which turns out to be nothing like his previous work experience!
tags: Psychological, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Sketchbook
description: Sketchbook revolves around a group of high school students who are members of the art club at their school. The plot follows a slice of life style via the students' experiences at school through the club. The main character is a young shy, and quiet girl named Sora Kajiwara who goes through life at her own pace. She tends to look at the little things in life, and is often at awe of the more simpler things. Sora knows several stray cats around her town and has given them names.
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Mobile Suit Gundam SEED Destiny - The Edge: Desire
description: The world of *The Edge* that could not be depicted only from Athrun's point of view is presented in this fascinating omnibus work!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Mecha, Drama

name: Kikori no Isekai Tan ~Tensei shita Shounen wa, Ono 1-pon de Nariagaru~
description: Reincarnated into another world, Kikori was shunned in his hometown village as being possessed by a demon. With only an axe he received when leaving his hometown, he makes his way to Neergen, a defensive city at the forefront of adventurers battling monsters. Despite his lack of experience and skill, Kikori decides to live as a harsh adventurer to earn money for survival. While barely escaping death in battles with monsters, he is supported by his first companions and, through sheer effort and determination, rushes towards becoming the strongest (physically) adventurer!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ijimete Aishite
description: What I'm looking for is not stability but "stimulation". "The bite mark you put on me, it's gone, hasn't it?"Hina, who runs a detective agency, meets Seishi, a clerk at a coffee shop near his new office.Hina is intrigued by his rebellious attitude and charming demeanor and frequents the coffee shop.Kiyoshi, who runs the store by himself, gradually begins to open up to Hina, who has become a regular customer.One night, Hina notices this and, as a thank-you, begins to touch Kiyoshi in a lewd manner...
tags: Romance, Boys' Love

name: Shin Kirari
description:
A celebrated masterwork shimmering with vulnerability from one of alt-manga's most important female artists.

"Now that we've woken from the dream, what are we going to do?" Chiharu thinks to herself, rubbing her husband's head affectionately.

Set in an apartment complex on the outskirts of Tokyo, Murasaki Yamada's Talk to My Back (1981-84) explores the fraying of Japan's suburban middle-class dreams through a woman's relationship with her two daughters as they mature and assert their independence, and with her husband, who works late and sees his wife as little more than a domestic servant.

(Source: Drawn & Quarterly)
tags: Drama, Slice of Life

name: Jujutsu Kaisen
description:
For some strange reason, Yuji Itadori, despite his insane athleticism would rather just hang out with the Occult Club. However, he soon finds out that the occult is as real as it gets when his fellow club members are attacked!

Meanwhile, the mysterious Megumi Fushiguro is tracking down a special-grade cursed object, and his search leads him to Itadori...
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Ghosts, Martial Arts, Magic, Gore, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Moto Azadarake no Kanojo ga Shinpai de
description: Continuation of [Azadarake no Classmate ga Shinpai de](https://mangadex.org/title/17447693-cb65-493d-8e21-dafb22d8340f/azadarake-no-classmate-ga-shinpai-de).
tags: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Gokigenyou, Ikkyoku Ikaga?
description: At a prestigious girls' school, Sae, a shy high schooler didn't fit in with her classmates. Her daily routine during lunch break consists of playing her Mahjong game on her phone. Due to her hobby being maybe too old-fashioned, she kept it a secret, until she was found out by her class' charismatic rich lady, Chise! Will they with their diametrically different personalities get along through playing Mahjong...?
tags: Traditional Games, Comedy, Video Games, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: All Purpose Apocalyptic Upgrade System
description:
In a world overrun by zombies, survival is difficult, but I suddenly gained an all-purpose apocalyptic upgrade system.
What is this?!
By killing the zombie and completing tasks, you can earn upgrade points that can be used to upgrade anything. With this, I no longer fear material scarcity, I just have to keep upgrading. From fruit cores to trees that last for millennia, from wild fields to super farms, from broken guns to plasma explosive weapons, from peas to super zombie-killers, and from paper airplanes to F22s. With this system, a single person is equivalent to a whole city!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Survival, Zombies, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Hakoiri Ojou-sama to Shoumin na Ore no Yaritai 100 no Koto
description:
Sanada Yuki, meets Tenkoin Junna, a young lady who ran away from home because she hates her life without freedom. He gives her a notebook and advises her to write down what she wants to do and together they will make it happen, but then she gets picked up by the police. Yuki wants to be by Junna's side even if they live in different worlds!

*"I want a friend" 
"I want to hold your hand" 
"I want to be your lover."*
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Me-Teru no Kimochi
description: Koizumi Shintarou is 30 years old, a virgin, and has isolated himself in his room for 15 years. He has become a burden on his father, Koizumi Yasujirou. One day, Shintarou makes a proposition that if Yasujirou gets a girlfriend, Shintarou will come out of his room. It turns out that Yasujirou has already got a girlfriend, a young beautiful woman, Yoshinaga Haruka, who is with Yasujirou for her own personal reasons. Yasujirou and Haruka decide to get married, but Yasujirou dies on their honeymoon. Now Haruka decides to take care of Shintarou, and so this weird "mother and son" duo are now living together.
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Master of Ancient Divine Weapons
description: Han Zhan traveled through time and space, where the girls could transform into magic weapons and fight under contract. The boy would awaken and become a spiritual contract master, and make a contract with them to resist the insect tide together. As a time traveler, he was shocked when he saw that those who were despised were actually famous ancient magic weapons. [Fuxi Qin], [Demon Refining Pot], [Shennong Ding], [Kunlun Mirror], [Nuwa Stone].
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Long Strip, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Aliens, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Mairimashita! Iruma-kun: Kalego Gaiden
description: A special, two-part side story manga set in the world of *Mairimashita! Iruma-kun*, focusing on Naberius Kalego during his days as a student of Babyls Demon School.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy

name: Pokémon SPECIAL - Sun & Moon
description:
Sun dreams of money. Moon dreams of science. When their paths cross with Team Skull, both their plans go awry.  
  
Moon is on her way to deliver a rare Pokémon to Professor Kukui in the Alola region when she meets his good friend Sun, a courier entrusted with a special Pokédex. Sun offers to safely deliver Moon to the professor’s lab…but then they tangle with a group of grunts from Team Skull and are attacked by a mysterious Pokémon!  
  
What does the mysterious Pokémon leave in its wake…?
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Sports, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Tripeace
description:
Nana, handsome amnesiac youth who has long fair hair and a strong sense of justice, attempts to bring peace to the world. To do so, he attained a Tri-peace operative number (102078) in an organisation of people who stop wars and encourage peace.  
Faced with danger and perpetual doubt in whether or not he can truly get the world to be at peace using his good disguise (crossdressing as Nanako), he strives to stop all wars.
tags: Action, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, Tragedy

name: Kindaichi Case Files
description:
Kindaichi (frequently with best-bud, Miyuki) travels to various places where a murder has taken place, typically involving ghosts, curses, myths and folklore of significant events from the distant past, and solves the mystery using ingenious deductions of curious clues and his cool magic.  
  
Serialized in Kodansha's Weekly Shounen Magazine from 1992-1997.  
  
Case List:   
1. Opera House Murder Case.  
2. Ijinkan Village Murder Case.  
3. Snow Yaksha Legend Murder Case.  
4. School's Seven Mysteries Murder Case.  
5. Isle of Hidden Treasure Murder Case.  
6. Legend of Broken Heart Lake Murder Case.  
7. Ijinkan Hotel Murder Case.  
8. Head Hanging School Murder Case.  
9. Headless Samurai Murder Case.  
10. Kindaichi the Killer.  
11. Tarot Mountain Hut Murder Case.  
12. Castle of Wax Murder Case.  
13. Gentleman Thief the Killer.  
14. Graveyard Island Murder Case.  
15. Magical Express Murder Case.  
16. The Black Butterfly of Death Murder Case.  
17. French Silver Coin Murder Case.  
18. Demon God Site Murder Case.  
19. Reika Hayami Kidnapping Murder Case.  
  
Note: In the newer reprints of the Kindaichi series, the File, Case and Shin cases were merged and printed as full cases instead of the original tankobon. The volumes which correspond to the above cases are 01-19. The raw links below correspond to the first chapter of the first case of the File Series.
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The Big Bees
description: What if bees were big and fluffy? Like, really big and fluffy.
tags: Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: ALIEN STAGE - Ivan x Till Collection
description: This is a collection of Ivan × Till art logs, doujinshis, and illustrations from several talented artists of high quality.
tags: Official Colored, Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Doujinshi, School Life, Slice of Life, Aliens, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Blue Exorcist (Official Colored)
description:
Rin and his exorcist classmates are caught in a secret war against the forces of darkness.

Raised by Father Fujimoto, a famous exorcist, Rin Okumura never knew his real father. One day a fateful argument with Father Fujimoto forces Rin to face a terrible truth—the blood of the demon lord Satan runs in Rin’s veins! Rin swears to defeat Satan, but doing that means entering the mysterious True Cross Academy and becoming an exorcist himself.
tags: Official Colored, Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Careless
description: The hilarious lives of the Underworld's office slaves.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Oversimplified SCP
description:
The SCP Foundation is a fictional organization documented by the web-based collaborative fiction project of the same name. In universe, the SCP Foundation is responsible for locating and containing individuals, entities, locations, and objects that violate natural law (referred to as SCPs).  
  
This manga summarizes the reports of the SCPs currently under the Foundation.  
  
Based on the [SCP Foundation](http://www.scp-wiki.net/)
tags: Sci-Fi, Demons, Psychological, Comedy, Magic, Doujinshi, Horror, Web Comic, Aliens, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: I Was Stuck On The Same Day For 100,000 Years
description: Lin Yue crossed to the Hongmeng Continent, but he was accused of being on the same day for one hundred thousand years. No matter how he struggles, he will return to yesterday after dawn. In one hundred thousand years, Lin Yue learned all the knowledge, understood the secrets of countless sect powerhouses, and gradually admitted that he could not escape the cycle of reincarnation. However, on the last day of one hundred thousand years, Lin Yue took away the Seven Demon King’s Fiancee, cut off the arm of the son of the Supreme Elder. After a catastrophe, he found that a new day had opened for him…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: My Daughter Is a Dragon!
description: Graduate student Kim Jihoon's life is turned upside-down when the long-lost daughter he didn't know he had turns up on his doorstep. After he takes in his daughter Chaerin at her mother's request, Jihoon's life takes a surprising turn for the better. Things start going his way at school, and even his eyesight improves. Although parenting a precocious 7-year-old is a handful, Jihoon loves his little girl, and life is better than ever. It's almost as if there's some magical force at work...
tags: Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Daisuki no Charge
description: A short, cute oneshot about a tennis club manager and her boyfriend, the tennis' ace Eita.
tags: Oneshot, Romance

name: Erotical Wizard to 12-nin no Hanayome
description:
Junpei Ichinose, a student at a magic school in Tokyo, is a dropout who has never discovered his magic aptitude. Suddenly, the beautiful witch Meryl appears before him and tells him, "I need your power, the reincarnation of the Demon King". Junpei finds out that he has the power of the Demon King. He learns that he has the power of the Demon King, and his secret is revealed to Sonia, a beautiful girl who is a descendant of a brave warrior. Junpei, who has no intention of becoming a Demon King, persuades Sonia to teach him how to use his power properly. However, the Demon King's power is the strongest and worst "erotic magic"!

The harem school battle to master H-magic with beautiful girls is about to begin!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Harem, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Apocalypse of Devilman - STRANGE DAYS
description: Some more stuff to add to the Devilman mythos. This is Kinutani Yuu's second story about NAGAI Go's work.
tags: Action, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: RoboPon
description:
Based on the video game of the same name by Hudson Soft & Red Company, this manga follows the story of a boy who finds a robot and uses him to battle against other robots.

Note: Numbering is based on both Greatest and Specialist Editions (combines 1 & 2)
tags: Action, Comedy, Mecha, Adventure, Shota

name: Punishing Gray Raven: Engraved in the Heart       (Doujinshi)
description:
A reader familiar with the lore and legends of Gray Raven is transported into its world as a commandant. 

The corrupted are on the hunt and punishing remains a rising threat. But even where history is hidden or fails to be recorded, the world and its inhabitants live on.

Selena was once a musician and multi-talented artist, famous and full of potential...
She chose to face world's cruelties and enlisted to recover the art and culture of the Golden age lost by "Punishing" before ultimately going MIA on a mission, thus she is presumed missing or dead.

In reality, her journey has quietly continued on.  Her memories and appearance altered by contact with Punishing, she now wanders the planet alone without friends or family. 

Inevitably, she and a certain commandant cross path This is the beginning of their story.
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Survival, Video Games, Post-Apocalyptic, Doujinshi, Philosophical

name: Mobile Suit Gundam: The battle tales of Flanagan Boone
description:
A new tragic tale from the "One Year War" unfolds. Flanagan Boone, a Zeon soldier, trained under his beloved Commander Garma Zabi, but then, the Gundam, the "White Devil of the Federation," appeared... A new One Year War begins from the perspective of Flanagan Boone, who appeared in the famous episode "Across the Atlantic Ocean
" (Episode 28) of the "Mobile Suit Gundam" anime!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Tragedy

name: Hitori Camp shitara Isekai ni Teni shita Hanashi
description: Kaede, an office worker, is on a solo camping trip in the mountains to heal from a broken heart, when she finds herself in another world. At first, she is intimidated by the strange demons she has never seen before, but she gradually grows stronger and tougher. Fenrir and fairies also become her friends. Kaede's camp life in another world, where she has a steel mentality, has just begun!
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: La Ragazza: Living with Francesca (Pre-Serialization)
description:
Yuji is an artist working out of a modest Tokyo apartment, when he suddenly receives a letter from his mother informing—not asking—him about an Italian girl coming to live with him while she attends university. Supposedly the two have a history, but forgotten memories lend little in the way of preparing either party for the inevitable awkwardness to come. Left with little say in the matter, Yuji’s bachelorhood comes to an end, and his life with Francesca begins.

Full color till Chapter 26.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Karasu wa Aruji wo Erabanai
description:
Yamauchi - a fantastic world where the Yatagarasu, a race of three-legged crows with the ability to transform into humans, live. Yukiya, a young Yatagarasu, is appointed as the personal attendant of the eccentric Crown Prince Wakamiya. Soon, he is entangled in a web of conspiracies attempting to overthrow the heir to the Imperial throne. 

An adaptation of the second book of the award-winning <Yatagarasu> novel series by Chisato Abe. The first book has been licensed in English as [A Raven for All Seasons](https://mangadex.org/title/c22db5fc-726a-41ad-8402-5537e7de2277/karasu-ni-hitoe-wa-niawanai) by [K Manga](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10162/episode/336576).
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Portus
description:
17-year-old high school student Asami Kawakami's friend, Chiharu, has stopped answering her phone and never comes to school anymore. She would rather spend her time playing Portus, an old videogame. There is an urban legend that there is a secret level where a boy appears and asks if you want to go to the other side. If you say yes, you die. When Chiharu cuts her own throat, Asami and the art club teacher, Keigo Sawa, set out to find out the truth behind the legend and Chiharu's suicide.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/portus)
tags: Thriller, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy

description: A story about a guy who just wants to sleep and an annoying kouhai who won't let him.
tags: Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Bake Kitsune no Shuushin
description: Mythical kitsune Yuugo Izumo is obsessed with scaring the unscarable Kamogawa using his transformation magic! But what lessons about deception and hiding one's true self will both of them learn when faced with their school's most manipulative bullies...?!
tags: Oneshot, Monsters, School Life, Supernatural

name: Shaman King
description:
Yoh Asakura is a shaman–one of the gifted few who, thanks to training or natural talent, can channel spirits that most people can't even see. With the help of his fiancée, Anna, Yoh is in training for the ultimate shaman sports event: the "Shaman Fight in Tokyo," the once-every-500-years tournament to see who can shape humanity's future and become the Shaman King. But unfortunately for Yoh, every shaman in the world is competing for the same prize…


---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by m&c! Comics (tankoubon) and Elex Media (kanzenban)
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Busaneko ni Kaerareta Kiyowa Reijou desu ga, Saikyou no Gunjin Koushaku ni Hirowarete Kizetsu Sunzen desu
description:
Cursed to be an ugly cat--but maybe you're happy!

"I'll have you turn into a cat, sister." Marie, the viscount's young daughter, lost her fiancé to her younger sister Emilia and has been cursed even more. Her reflection in the mirror - an ugly cat!

Running away from her sister for her life, Marie, who escaped from their house, collapsed from loneliness and hunger, unable to speak. Then, a kind hand reaches out to her, "In the middle of this rain, poor thing...Would you like to come with me?" 
The figure is the "ruthless, merciless, undefeated duke" who is rumored even in social circles.

An unfortunate girl gets her one and only happiness, and a happy cat life begins!
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kasane to Subaru
description: Both of them are straightforward people. Once they meet, they quickly get to know each other better. A heartwarming romantic comedy that begins with a certain incident. Shibata Kasane, a graphics designer at a toy design and development company, is troubled. Her troubles started when she grabbed her colleague Enokida Subaru's ass by accident! Kasane was intrigued by how similar Enokida's ass and her favourite childhood character felt. At the same time, Kasane felt guilty because Enokida might have been uncomfortable. Enokida said "I don't mind" but had a pained and frightened expression. Kasane was overcome by the urge to apologise profusely! On the other hand, it looks like Enokida is hiding something.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Love For Sale
description: "Will this make you happy?" Namwoo wakes up one night to find bills sprawled all over his room - along with the hazy memory of a handsome stranger. Even in his wildest dreams, all Namwoo wants is to have enough money to survive each month. Si-eon, on the other hand, has everything he could ever want except happiness. Intrigued by Namwoo's humble wishes, Si-eon offers him the money he wants - the catch being, he has to date him.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: OddOnes
description: A wasteland infested with giant mutated insects, Dep the Protagonist explores the shell of the former peaceful world he once knew, now wanders alone, facing bandits, cults, military, and people with mental problems, it's not a safe world....
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Post-Apocalyptic, Gore, Slice of Life

name: Boukansha no Koi
description:
"I want to be by my sister's side until the last moment..."

In the fall of her twenties, Rachel married her childhood friend Noah, who had been her longtime crush.
She knows that the person Noah really loves is Alicia, his older sister and Rachel's best friend...
Noah and Rachel live a married life full of deceit while Alicia has only a short time left to live.
Rachel feels as much guilt and heartache as she does happiness, but who is the real 'bystander' in this love?

The long-awaited first volume of the comic adaptation of the pinnacle of "a fake marriage of unrequited love" that wrenches the heart with hidden love, irreplaceable friendship, and the sadness of passing each other!
tags: Historical, Romance, Drama, Tragedy

name: Live Dungeon!
description: An old MMORPG called Live Dungeon. Before the service was terminated, Kyotani Tsutomu made full use of 5 notebook PCs to clear the game and was invited to a different world. And then, Tsutomu was speechless when he saw a live relay of a dungeon capture in the different world. They bulldozed through without any thought of strategy. The misfortune of getting the healer position. Tsutomu reinstated the White Mage that had always been his favorite in games and aimed to conquer the dungeon to find the key to his escape from the different world.
tags: Action, Adventure, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Isekai Teni Shite Kyoushi ni Natta ga, Majo to Osorerareteiru Ken ~Aoi-sensei no Gakuen Funtou Nisshi~
description: Aoi is a new teacher who has been transported to another world. Aoi is picked up by Owen, an elf, and as they live together, Aoi masters more and more of Owen's magic and even surpasses him. In order to refine her magic further, she is assigned to teach at the Fiddich Academy, a school of magic! Aoi starts her teaching career showcasing overwhelming magical abilities, and she is not daunted by the aristocratic troublemakers who dominate the academy. However, her abilities have become the talk of the school...
tags: Action, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Umineko WHEN THEY CRY Episode 7: Requiem of the Golden Witch
description: The time for logical debate and magical feints has come to an end; the revelation of the truth about Beatrice the Golden Witch is at hand. To facilitate this, game master Bernkastel has chosen Will Wright the Mage-Hunter to step onto her board and answer a single question: Who killed Beatrice? Joining him in the game is Lion Ushiromiya, Krauss's firstborn and heir, whose role is a mystery in its own right. Will's line of questioning draws together the stray strands from all the previous games, twisting them into a thread of truth, revisiting Kinzou's first encounter with the young Beatrice and working through the legends that have since sprung up around her... [Yen Press]
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Hirano to Kagiura
description: Basketball players. Bad boys who aren’t really bad boys. Roommates. Senpai-kouhai BL romance. It all started when Kagiura moved into the school dorms with what seemed to be a bad-boy upperclassman. But after he’s left in the tender care of his mother hen of a roommate, Hirano, it’s too much to ask for Kagiura not to fall in love…right?!

name: Seishun Pop!
description: Every day Sakuta Gotou likes to zone out to his favorite band the Incest, because it makes him feel at ease. However, this band is very secretive and has yet to have a live performance. Now, when the chance comes to Gotou to see his idol Iive, the band's singer, on stage, he finds out that she is the new transfer student in the classroom next door… and to make this even better she stops the concert and grabs him saying, "I've wanted to see you." What is he going to do now?
tags: Psychological, Romance, Incest, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music, Tragedy

name: Virgin Knight: I Became the Frontier Lord in a World Ruled by Women
description:
After being reincarnated into another world where the chastity and moral values of men and women are reversed and women rule the land, Faust was raised by his mother as a rare male knight. 

He's quick to become a war hero with many achievements under his belt, but because he inherited his way of thinking from his previous world, there's a certain severe pain in his groin day in and day out when faced with the likes of a scantily clad Queen who may as well be in the nude or the sexual harassment of the well endowed Duchess he calls a friend, among others…
___
**Character Designer:** [Melonnyinyi](https://mangadex.org/author/e26bb514-85e4-4383-bc9e-9178797466f2)

description: Not found
tags: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color, Gyaru

name: Who the Devil Is
description: Jiao Xifan, the leader of an underground organisation was betrayed, prompting him to fake his own death. Assuming the guise of a student, he started to investigate events from over a decade ago to unravel the truth. Jiao Xifan's quest for truth takes an unexpected turn as he fell into a trap unbeknownst to him when he befriended his classmate, Xue Zhi.
tags: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Survival, Mafia, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Soumuka no Hatagami-kun no Obento Hitokuchi Moraemasu ka?
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Koi ni Koi suru Koibito Kankei
description:
Asako Ichijou, the student council president at a prestigious girls' high school, has been racking her brain about the ladykiller Nagi Tenma. That's the sort of person Asako is, but Nagi discovers Asako has broken school rules by bringing a shoujo manga to school...

Asako pleads with Nagi to keep it a secret, and Nagi reveals her condition: "Become my lover."

(Source: Takeshobo, translated)
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: My Girlfriend Always Glares at Me
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic

name: Sleepless Beauty
description:
'I wish I could share my sleepiness with you, Oz-san.'

Designer Kotou, who has trouble sleeping, secretly respects Amemiya, a junior employee in another department. He admires the way he can quickly turn down a drinking session he doesn't feel like attending, and the way he takes a nap in exactly 15 minutes during his lunch break. Kotou, who has a tendency to overthink things and is unable to get along with others in a safe manner, looks at him with envy.

On his way home one day, Amemiya invites him out for a drink, and with the help of alcohol, Kotou spills the beans about his insomnia problems. Afterwards, he decides to let the drunken Amemiya stay at his house. There, Amemiya proposes "sleeping in a sofa" as a solution to his insomnia - and what happens?
tags: Boys' Love, Office Workers, Fantasy

name: March Comes in Like a Lion
description:
A youth named Kiriyama Rei, who lost his family as a child, endures loneliness to become a professional shogi player. Then, through a chance meeting, he develops a relationship with the three Kawamoto sisters (Akari, Hinata, Momo), who hail from a working-class district of the city, and little by little his frozen heart begins to thaw.  
 
--- 
- **Won the 4th Manga Taisho Award in 2011**  
- **Won the Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2011, which it shared with Space Brothers**
-  **Won the 18th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Grand Prize in 2014**
tags: Award Winning, Traditional Games, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Shiota-sensei to Amai-chan
description:
A teacher and student romance.  
  
Amai Yayoi, 16 years old.   
A high school girl who puts her heart into expressing her love for Shiota-sensei.  
  
Shiota Tsuguharu, 29 years old.  
A high school teacher who is steadily beginning to accept Amai-chan.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kotarou wa Hitorigurashi
description: One day, a kid named Satou Kotarou moved in next door to Karino Shin, an unsuccessful manga artist. Kotarou says he has no parents and lives alone. Karino is annoyed by Kotarou, but as he learns Kotarou's reasons for living alone, they gradually grow closer and grow together.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Adventures of an Undead Who Became Paladin
description: Read “Humility! Integrity! Compassion! Valor! Justice! Sacrifice! Honor! Faith!” He’s a lich, however, he’s knightly! He is a lich, but he keeps his faith in the light! “Fearless in the face of the enemy! Loyal and upright, he fights to the death! Why you may ask? Because protecting the weak is not against the law of the world!” This is the story of a cat with a bad mouth and a lich who gave his body and soul to the service of the Light!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy

name: I Created a Harem by Accident!
description: Not found

A comedy about two ordinary high school boys.

name: Kyou mo Hajime-senpai ga Suki Sugiru
description: Kokomi enters into a new school but ends up tearing her clothes. The kind and popular Hajime lends her some clothes and she falls in love with him at first sight, after not being able to speak to him for a long time, she discovers a terrible truth about him but is undeterred into trying to win his heart.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: Sensha Isu - Tank Chair
description:
Protecting his sister Shizuka from a bullet, the strongest assassin Nagi Taira falls into a coma. Against all odds, he regains his consciousness- but only when faced with killing intent! Thus begins a violent journey of recovery, battling the most dangerous foes.

name: Legend of Star General
description: Song Yunxiang, the last Star Soul General of the Human Race, brought the system back to the campus era.  When he was a teenager, he was blinded by the incomplete soul, because he was weak and could only watch his relatives and friends die in front of him.  In this life, he returned with a system rebirth, with 60 years of combat experience and knowledge and technology, and returned to school. From then on, he used to build mechas to fight monsters... The things that have regretted, the people who have missed, this time will not leave regrets.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Mecha, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Dominating the Cultivation Realm with Muscles
description: Astonishing! A top-tier powerhouse defeated by a set of radio calisthenics! In “Today’s Immortal News,” witness a tale where a man punches his way through luck-favored experts, kicks against powerful cultivators, all without spiritual roots or the ability to manipulate spiritual energy. Yet, he defies all odds, using his sheer MUSCLES to ascend the heights of cultivation and reach the pinnacle of immortality.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Battle!! Digital Monsters –Digimon Thunderbolt Tournament–

name: Lunatic Circus
description: "Lunatic Circus" is a story about the circus called "Lunatic Circus", which is said to be the best in post WWII Japan, which has achieved an incredibly rapid economic growth. The star of the circus, Ryunosuke, and all the other trapeze artists, are the protagonists of this manga. This is the story of their dreams, their fears, their struggles and their hopes.
tags: Historical

name: Dekoboko Majo no Oyako Jijou
description: One day, Alyssa, a witch living alone in the forest, finds a human baby. Although she is confused, she names the baby Viola and decides to raise it. 16 years later, Viola has grown far beyond Alyssa's imagination...but she's grown too much! A heartwarming comedy about a mother and daughter whose appearances are reversed is here!
tags: Monsters, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, 4-Koma, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: The Adjutant's House of Crushes
description: This manga is a series of several chapters that may or may not be related to each other. It is the official manga of the gacha game known as Snowbreak: Containment Zone.
tags: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Romance, Harem, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: The Vermilion Mask
description:
The mask causes disaster. The mask prefers slaughter. The mask has a will. A traveling mask merchant Pell who can create a mysterious mask that grants abilities. In a city with a gloomy atmosphere, I meet a mysterious girl, Sona…!? The boy begins to walk at the end of publicity and self-discipline! Masked battle fantasy!
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/the-vermilion-mask)
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: The Duke of Death and His Maid
description:
In a large mansion lives a boy, an aristocrat who was cursed by the witch to "let everything he touches die." With him is his maid Alice, who besides serving him, likes to tease him. The boy who is interested in her doesn't mind the teasing, but not being able to touch her is painful!  
  
If they are unable to hold hands, how will their love ever bloom?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Kitayama-kun to Minamiya-kun
description:
"I want to see Kitayama-san's erotic face!!"

A handsome guy who's too pure × a lewd boy who's often perverted.
A 100% cute and happy love comedy!

Convenience store employee Minamiya can fantasize about "a person's most erotic face" just by looking at them.
But, his work senior Kitayama's erotic face is the only one he can't see.
Why is it just him? He's so curious that he ends up staring at him.
One day, they start talking when they find out they have the same favorite band, and Minamiya goes over to Kitayama's house.
Maybe with this he'll be able to imagine Kitayama's erotic face!?
While thinking about his ulterior motives, he talks about his love for the band...

"I like Minamiya-kun too..."
"...Huh!?"
Minamiya was sure they were talking about the band,
But he freezes when Kitayama gives an unexpected confession!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: Seto no Hanayome
description: A young boy gets saved from drowning by a mermaid but according to mermaid law, if a human sees a mermaid's true form, both are to be executed. The only solution to the problem is for him to marry her and become part of the mermaid family.
