name: A Princess Who Reads Fortune
description:
Top actress Lee Sia has the ability to see ghosts.
After an accident, she wakes up in the body of 'Camilla Sorfelle'.

But here's the problem.

"Oh, Father, help me!"

This woman's fate always ends in death!

I need to extend my life, so might as well talk to the ghosts first.

Ugh, but why do I keep getting involved with people I want to avoid!?
tags: Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Oshibana!
description: A romantic comedy centered around "The School Prince" bringing the tense conflict of young boys and girls to the breaking point!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Souzoushu nano de Motto Yasashikute Kudasai!
description:
Tohru Jin is a middle-management employee who has lost his place in a game company. He died in an unfortunate accident, and when he woke, he found himself in the world of a game he had once designed. Now reincarnated as a little girl in "Rune Fantasia". He should be able to live a cheat-like life in this isekai… right?

---

**Note:** The author announced on May 17, 2021 that the manga will be completed with the 7th chapter [[Twitter](https://twitter.com/boarinoshishi/status/1394146695856869380) ([archive.org](https://web.archive.org/web/20210517042441/https://twitter.com/boarinoshishi/status/1394146695856869380))].
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Monsters, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy

name: Mobile Suit MOON Gundam
description: U.C.0092. A young boy from the Light Tribe named Yutta lives on the forgotten colony Moon Moon. There, he sees with his own eyes the remains of a mobile suit that drifted to his colony! A new Gundam saga penned by Harutoshi Fukui bridges the gap between ZZ and Char’s Counterattack in an explosive new manga!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Tragedy

name: The Reborn Ranker Chronicles
description:
Legendary SSS-rank hunter Kang Tae-ha finally met his end. But just as he prepares to enter eternal sleep, he awakens once more in… imperial China?!

Now, he must live as Liu Xinyun, the delinquent heir to a powerful company. All he wants to do is put his hunting days behind him, but in order to survive his new power-hungry relatives, Xinyun must hone his skills again, starting from level one.

Can his own unique blend of necromancy and martial arts take him from useless bum to ultimate boss?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Watashi ni xx Shinasai!
description:
In class, she's a sort of zoned-out girl, and he's the year one class' most perfect, good-looking guy. But the two of them have a secret, and their extraordinary "love experience" will start now!  
  
Himuro Yukina, known as the "Absolute Zero Snow-woman" is a cold and observant girl. In addition, she is actually a popular cell phone novelist who goes by the name of Yupina. Sadly, with no other human contact than her cousin, Yukina is unable to express more romance in her novels. Kitami Shigure, your so-called "typical bishounen", who is really a womanizer, has fallen into Yukina's trap when she blackmails him, and they end up "love-acting" for the sake of their secrets.
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: My Evil Husband is Obsessed With the Wrong Person
description: Getting reincarnated into the world of a novel is never easy, but possessing a doomed bride on her way down the aisle to marry a murderous emperor is just unfair! Now, the newly reincarnated Angelica has no choice but to learn to survive the whims of her new husband, Emperor Ranielo… Well, at least until he falls for his fated love interest and she can slip away unnoticed. But as the days pass, Ranielo’s interest in her only grows. Can this tyrant be tamed, or will Angelica find that some destinies can’t be unwritten?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Virtual-kun wa Otonari-san kara Nigetai
description: Haru, a university student who stream under a virtual character, has moved into a completely soundproofed flat, which he has longed for. On the day he moves in, he meets his neighbour Tsukasa, a fashionable young man close to his age, which is a relief. However, on the night of the move, he is caught on the balcony during a live broadcast! To avoid being exposed, Haru asks him not to tell anyone about the streaming, but Tsukasa suggests with a sneer, saying "Instead of keeping it a secret, will you go out with me?"
tags: Boys' Love

name: Jimikoi
description:
A compilation volume oneshots:  
  
1. Jimikoi (Plain Love)  
Wakana i.e "bakana" is your typical, flashy, yet not-so bright girl that loves plain boys! Kagano happens to be that boy, and when she confesses, she thought she may rejected, but he told her he'll think about it! Now all Wakana has to do is to not be a "bakana" when trying to win his heart…  
  
2. Columbus no Yuuutsu (The Melancholy of Columbus)  
Shiono is a girl who has "double face," out is quite a refined, intelligent, beautiful and well-mannered young lady while inside is a common, intelligent little girl and instant ramen lover… One day, Shiono discovers that the simple delegate and classmate with lens, Satou-kun, is also someone who is hiding something… this makes her feel a connection with him. The point of being 'the continent," that she discovered… Something will emerge between Satou-kun and Shiono?  
  
3. Mimimoto ni Furu Kimi no Koe  
4. Gojouzaka-san Chi no Kirei na Himitsu
tags: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, School Life

name: Moscow 2160
description:
A future where the cold war between the USA and Russia never ended and has been going on for two centuries. 
"Liquidator" Daniel Kuragin runs through Moscow alleyways for score-settling with a submachine gun in hand!  
The overwhelmingly popular web series from "Goblin Slayer" creator Kumo Kagyu has begun publication.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Romance, Mecha, Survival, Superhero, Martial Arts, Mafia, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Drama

name: Seijo ja nakatta no de, Oukyuu de nonbiri Gohan wo Tsukuru koto ni shimashita
description:
Rina was summoned to another world to be the Saint, but was surprised at how bad the food tasted. It tastes like this even at the royal palace…? I’ll just make it myself, so give me your kitchen! Relieved of her Saint duties, Rina wins the heart and stomachs of the nobles through her food!  
  
[alt. Raw](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/44992)
tags: Monsters, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Hush
description:
Although Gyu Hwa Lee might look like a guy, she has feelings like any other girl. In fact, she's currently in love with Korean pop idol Kang Un Ryu. As luck would have it, Kang Un ends up transferring to Gyu Hwa's high school. The only problem is he has to keep his identity a secret so he's cross-dressing as a girl!  
  
What happens when Gyu Hwa discovers Kang Un's secret? Will she ever be able to win over his heart? Or will she always be nothing more than just a friend?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, School Life

name: Xenosaga Episode I - Der Wille zur Macht
description: An official Japanese manga adaptation for the first game in the Xenosaga series. It was written and illustrated by Atsushi Baba and serialized in Monthly Comic Zero Sum. While making very major omissions and rearrangements, Xenosaga Episode I: Der Wille zur Macht remains mostly faithful to the PlayStation 2 original.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Video Games, Military, Drama, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Seijo Sensei no Mahou wa Susunderu!
description: Despite being the most powerful saint, Tia was accused of being a heretic and banished from the royal capital. She became the teacher for three girls who had failed as candidate saints.
tags: Demons, Magic, Girls' Love, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Beatrice
description:
Having previously been a slave in her youth, Chloe was revealed to be an illegitimate child of the King of Elpasa, and is raised to the level of a Princess and renamed Beatrice, all in order to secure a political marriage to a toady man, as the king was unwilling to marry his legitimate daughters to him. After two years of hellish marriage, the Kingdom of Elpasa falls before the blade of the Empire's Archduke, its greatest hero. In order to survive her new enslavement Princess Beatrice re-assumes the guise of 'Chloe' as a slave of the Empire. But then, she catches the eye of that very same hero…  
  
The Archduke wonders who is this squirrelly short-haired young woman, who is so surprisingly educated for a slave, and who is terrified of him, not knowing that he butchered the Elpasa Royal Family in front of her and enslaved her himself. What will become of them, since she proves to be one of his only sources of levity?  


---
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Military, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Dream Eater Merry
description: Yumeji has the power to forecast a person's dream based on the multicolored auras that surround them when he looks through his fingers. His skills are unpolished, but when he sees a black aura, he knows for certain what that person will see that night, a nightmare. Yumeji has been having nightmares himself recently, where he is chased endlessly by an army of cats until he awakens. But when a strange girl named Merry literally falls into his life, his experience with dreams becomes bizarre and dangerous when he vows to help Merry return to the world of dreams from whence she came.
tags: Action, Comedy, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Gachi Koi Maou-sama
description: A hero undertakes the task of defeating the Demon Lord for the sake of world peace. When he arrives at the Demon Lord's castle, he is greeted by the Demon Lord with a marriage certificate in her hand! The hero is bewildered by the Demon Lord's strong appeal to marry him, but...? A love comedy about a die-hard-fan Demon Lord and an overly prickly hero whose world is in danger of extinction!
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: Hanamonogatari
description:
The manga centers on Hanayo, an elderly woman whose husband of many years has only recently died. 

After finishing a Buddhist service for her husband, she finds herself walking out in town alone for the first time in a long time. She stumbles onto a cosmetics store, and meets a beautiful woman named Yoshiko Doujima, and falls in love at first sight. Hanayo had long given up on makeup after her husband nagged her about it, but putting some on with Yoshiko's help brightens her heart.
tags: Girls' Love, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Cheat Skill “Shihai” Otsukatte Isekai Harem!
description:
One day, the protagonist suddenly transferred to another world.
"It looks like the world of the anime I was watching last night, but when I tried to imitate the hero of the anime, the status screen appeared in front of me! I was surprised by the high specs of my abilities, but I was shocked when I saw the name on the status screen! Surprisingly, I am a small fry character [fake hero] who is defeated by the main character in the early stages!"
Knowing that his role is "a fake hero to be defeated by a hero", the hero abandons the empty life in his original world and lives a short life as a"fake hero" in a harem until the real hero defeats him. Make up your mind!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Hanako to Guuwa no Tera
description:
Folklore detective Asou Daisuke would rather deal with normal, everyday, things like cheating spouses, embezzling partners and the like. (That and his huge collection of ero-manga.) Because whenever he deals with the supernatural, he gets the hiccups.  
  
But no matter, an endless stream of desperate people come to him troubled by what he calls allegories. Those are stories, usually urban legends, that one believes to be true and if one believes strong enough can cause them to become true. His first case involves "The Man Under The Bed." Can he stop this creepy man with an axe before he chops up kawaii Hiranuma Kanae? Why does Asou count his hiccups, and just who is that strange girl in his bathroom?
tags: Action, Romance, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Sakura no Ichiban
description: A young girl named Hinomori Asami starts her studies at the Sakura Hill School for Girls in Tokyo, but the capital is a dangerous place, she got kidnapped on her first day in Tokyo. Her siscon older brother, Ikuro Hinomori began investigating this kidnapping case…
tags: Historical, Action, School Life, Horror, Mystery

name: Devilman - Sidestories
description: the Sidestories included in Deluxe Editions
tags: Action, Demons, Gore, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Hadaka de Koi o Katarunaka
description: One missed shot and this love affair is over. That's why I listen to her sexual experiences while soaking in the bathtub with her today. It's too hard to match body and soul! A new kind of public bathhouse romantic comedy is now open for business.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Te ni Ireta Saimin Appli de Yume no Harem Seikatsu o Okuritai
description:
I've never had a girlfriend. The app installed on my phone was a hypnosis app that could control anyone. After testing it, the app's power was real. With this, a harem life isn't just a dream

"Why do all the girls I target have troubles!?"

A beautiful gal, a plain girl with hidden beauty, a cool ojou-sama junior-by the power of the hypnosis app, their secrets that they couldn't tell anyone are revealed! (I just wanted to do erotic things...!) The self-proclaimed loser, but fundamentally a good guy protagonist, ends up running around helping people!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: A Maid Who Doesn't Hide Her Affection
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: A family that's close enough to share clothes
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Web Comic

name: Mobile Suit Crossbone Gundam Seerauber
description: The 30th anniversary feature diving deep into what it means to be a "space pirate!" The Crossbone saga continues with a new heroine and mecha lineup!
tags: Action, Mecha, Adventure, Military, Mystery

name: Koi no Towarutsu
description: Yuuichi, a poor college student, spends his days studying for a scholarship and working part-time. One day, the world-famous supermodel Reo Ichinose visits the café where he works. As the store goes crazy at the unexpected celebrity appearance, Reo tells the clueless Yuuichi: "I've come to pick you up," and proposes to him...!? Much to Yuuichi's confusion, he finds himself swept up in a fairytale-esque love story that started from a promise he'd long since forgotten.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love

name: Shinohayu - The Dawn of Age
description: A prequel to the Saki series, focusing on Shino Shiratsuki, a young girl with an affinity for the 1-sou who is seeking out her missing mother. Future professional mahjong players like Hayari Mizuhara, Harue Akado and others are also featured.
tags: Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Oblivious Girl and a Maiden Man
description:
"Actually, I... have a fear of men, so I'm not good with them."

Rintaro (30), the owner of a café, has developed feelings for his regular customer, Luna (25). However, Luna, unaware of Rintaro's feelings, starts to confide in him with bizarre concerns. In an effort to help her with her recovery, Rintaro suppresses his feelings and agrees to cooperate, but things get complicated as Luna starts to make moves—holding hands, inviting him out for meals, and more.

With an oblivious Luna and a naïve Rintaro, this heartwarming love comedy unfolds!
tags: Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Made in Abyss - Made from Fortunes (Doujinshi)
description:
The Abyss. A giant pit filled with gigantic cave system that goes down to extreme unknown depths, filled with wonderful and terrifying treasures and creatures never before seen. Only the bravest of the delvers are able to see what horrors truly lie in wait at the bottom. 
People are familiar with the great story of Made in Abyss, following a young orphaned cave raider, a mysterious amnesiac robot, and a tragic narehate. But, what if something went differently? What if one single decision changed these unfortunate childrens' story?

Up on Orth a pair of friends, Fyuo and Kwazan, a newly promoted red and blue whistle start experiencing a few strange things happening to them. Fyuo is having dreams of an unfamiliar figure and Kwazan decides to help him figure out the cause of these nightmares using notes she stole from another delver. But, what they find waiting for them only a few hundred meters down, will change their lives forever.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Haruto-kun to Chiharu-chan ga Jirettai
description: Touko loves shoujo manga, especially the kind that gets her heart pounding... But shoujo isn't real life...or is it? On day Haruto and Chiharu appear in front of her, flirting like in a manga! But these two aren't dating!? And they're just childhood friends!?? No way! Check out Touko's daily observations, which are as exciting as they are frustrating☆
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life

name: Nakimushi na Sadistic
description: Okubo-kun, a serious lawyer, has fallen in love with his boss, lawyer Hanamura-sensei. He chases after him even as he goes independent. However, he's given a "test", an SM play, and on top of that, Hanamura-sensei declares to him that he's a masochist. He can't get his beloved Hanamura-sensei to accept him unless he tortures him.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love

name: Cavalier of the Abyss
description:
Sequel to *Immortal Regis*. Reading the entirety of the prequel is highly recommended, otherwise, this story from chapter 4 on will spoil it and/or be confusing.  
  
Chaos has gotten itself a new Regis, Nex, a seemingly heartless ruler who destory everything and everyone who stand in his way. A small boy named Xix, who's contracted with an Evil is out seeking his revenge on Regis Nex for killing his village and Sister. When he gets his chance to kill Regis Nex, he loses completely and gets taken to the Royal palace. But once there, he see that there is something else going on in the background of the Royal Family, a Secret they don't want to be uncovered…  
  


---
tags: Action, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Haibara-kun no Tsuyokute Seishun New Game
description:
Natsuki Haihara is a young man who failed to make his high school debut and is now in his fourth year of college following a terrible high school life. He was about to enter the workforce when he was unexpectedly whisked back in time seven years to just before he started high school!

Natsuki is given the opportunity to “redo” his regret-filled high school life, and he uses his prior experiences to successfully become a member of a group of six beautiful boys and girls at the top of the class caste!

What’s more, the beautiful girl he once had a crush on, Hikari, was also there…?!

The unconscious high-spec young man starts his second adolescence all over again in real life, a strong, new game school romantic comedy!
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Country Life With the Sexy Majesty
description:
The moment my engagement with my human trash fiancé was annulled, memories from my past life returned. I was formerly a hardworking agriculture researcher and a woman who went to farming college! After getting chased out of my family, I decided to stick to my strengths and live a worry-free and comfortable life while farming, but...

"That's my sword."
"No, it's my hoe?"
"It's my sword!"
"I told you, it's my hoe!"

Suddenly, a beautiful blond man—who looked perfectly fine on the outside—appeared to take the hoe I picked up from the ground away from me! This is the start of a farming romance where we'll meet our loved ones as well as pick mulberries (kill two birds with one stone)~
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Boukensha ni Narenakatta Ore, Skill [Oppai Kyousei] de Nayameru Anoko wo Hitotasuke!?
description:
More than ten years have passed since dungeons suddenly appeared on Earth. In a world where people with excellent skills play an active role as adventurers, the skill that high school student Takeshi Miyamoto has discovered is... [Breast Correction]!? Takeshi is confused by the unique skill he has never seen or heard of. But there seems to be a surprising number of girls who need it...?
___
**Links:**
- Web Novel Raw Link - [https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426616946277](https://kakuyomu.jp/works/16816700426616946277)
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66639)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Adaptation

name: The Otome Heroine's Fight for Survival
description:
Orphaned by a monster attack on her village, young Alicia spends three horrid years in an orphanage before finally running away. When she flees, however, Alicia has a violent encounter with an older woman hell-bent on killing her. During their tussle, she comes into contact with a strange crystal that bestows upon her a wealth of knowledge, transforming her from an innocent child into a cool and calculated planner. Now aware that she was meant to be the protagonist of an otome game and disgusted with her supposed fate, Alicia decides to take matters into her own hands and become strong—by any means necessary. Using her newfound knowledge, and with some help from a stranger she meets in the woods, she learns to survive by herself in a world far too harsh and unforgiving for a girl her age. Ready or not, she’s determined to carve her own path.
___
[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/the-otome-heroine-s-fight-for-survival)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Survival, Adventure, Crossdressing, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: The Dawn to Come
description: She was like a typhoon. One that carelessly disturbed the season he had been quietly living through. "Nothing good will come from associating with me." "Why? Because of the rumours about you? I don't care about them." Should I protect her, or break her? The night I spent agonising over those innumerable impulses repeated itself after 13 years. It was because of her, whose firsts I wanted to remember. "A man who runs away after only taking a kiss?" "The one... who ran away first was you." So you didn't like it? As she looked into my eyes and provoked me with that throat of hers, I would have rather bit and shred it to pieces. "You... You're good at driving people insane." She wasn't something he could avoid in the first place. That was who 'Yun Junyoung' was to him.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Woman Who Messes With My Emotions (2022)
description:
Yuta was your typical introverted loser.

One day, he got invited to an IRL meeting by someone he met online with a shared interest. He wondered what kind of person will be there, and it turned out to be a beautiful lady far beyond his expectation! Yuta felt thrilled but guilty, and he was flustered at every turn.

Seeing his nervousness, she tried to draw him out of his shell...?

---

The serialized version of the original webcomic A Woman Who Will Mess Up Your Emotions.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Slice of Life

name: Gachirin ni Kiri Saku
description: A new transfer student has come into town, a girl with a mysterious air and black clothing who is called Inugami Sakuya. What few know is that by moonlight, she hunts and kills those possessed by "Inugami." A man can become possessed by being bitten, leading to a nighttime transformation into a beast driven to eat women. Sakuya gets no thanks for brutally ending the lives of these unfortunate men with her sword, and she is often too late to save the women they threaten. Sakuya also must deal with her own inner demons, which are all too real…
tags: Action, Psychological, Martial Arts, Sexual Violence, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Koroshi Korosare Sankaku Kankei ni Watashi ga Ima kara Hairun desu ka?
description: Kohaku is a girl who spent her junior high school years as a loner and dreams of living a fulfilling life in high school. However, on her first day of school she falls down the stairs and ends up hospitalized for a month! This means that everyone besides her has already formed a group of friends at school... In order to avoid being a loner, she summons up the courage and calls out to the only odd-numbered group in her class, but it seems that they are high up in the school caste system, and are actually involved in a blood-splattered love triangle with a non-human...!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Vampires, Slice of Life

name: Ainosenbiki ~Mama Katsu Shitara Mama ga Dekita Hanashi~
description: The protagonist ​​is a middle school boy named Hikawa Jun who lost his mother at birth. He glares at his classmates who complain about their own overprotective mothers and wonders what it would be like if he had a mother of his own. The story begins when Jun, who wants the warmth of a mother, lies about his age and matches up with a stranger on a sugar mama dating app.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Shota

name: Touhou Project Doujin - A Lovely Autumn Rendezvous
description:
A short oneshot part of the Mokou x Mystia series by Mitsumoto Jouji
Recommended to read "Sparrow's First Love" and "Night Sparrow In Love - The Complete Volume"  Prior to this oneshot
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Slice of Life

name: Kotodama Kanaete! Tokie-sensei
description:
In a normal, everyday run-of-the-mill school, a new teacher arrives but there's something peculiar about her... She's a teacher with a dark aura but with the power of words she can transform into whatever is asked of her. 

From dressing like a cat to wearing a bikini, she's at the mercy of her students. Enjoy this comedic story filled with very amusing moments between a teacher who thrives on obeying words and some very mischievous students.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adaptation

name: Doumo, Zense de Satsuriku no Madougu wo Tsukutteita Shishaku Reijou desu.
description: The viscount's daughter, Chloe, was the chief magical tools artisan for a country that perished a thousand years ago in her previous life.  On the country's orders, she had created many weapons of slaughter. She laments her previous life and decides to, "live a respectable life this time." One day, at her graduation party, her best friend's engagement is broken off because of a lie. Chloe tries to save her best friend by unraveling the truth.
tags: Reincarnation, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Bad Girl
description:
The daily life of a (self-proclaimed) high school delinquent, fangirling and kohyuuing over the head prefect!?

(to) kohyuu (v. infinitive form) When one is surprised and excited, their breathing begins to kohyuu. (see: hyperventilation)

Summary: High school first-year Yuu is an ardent admirer of Head Prefect Atori, and in order to get her attention, Yuu begins to act like a delinquent. But while her intention is to appeal with her "badness" and "coolness," her simple-minded facade is seen through by Atori, who teases and treats her like a small animal...!?
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Mobile Suits Gundam: Red Giant 03rd MS Team
description:
A “red” comet, a black “three” binary star, and a blue “giant star” -- we are the “red three giant stars”!
Universal Century 0079 - December, the so-called "One Year War" has reached its final stage. After finishing the battle for Jaburo, the Zeon army "Wandering Group" was retreating. Somehow, they made it to space where their friends were... Meanwhile, a unit of the Federation Forces, the Red Three Giants, appeared!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Adventure

name: TS TENSEI shite Masaka no Sub Heroine ni.
description:
A hikikomori boy who died while dreaming of a harem was reborn as one of the heroes who will save the world. The harem he aimed for would surely be there!

Next to the hikikomori was someone reincarnated as the female white mage Fio, centering on the hero Alto. Fio is still crazy about girls even after her reincarnation, but the turning point comes when the party is split up by a surprise attack by the demon king's army and she and Alto take refuge in an abandoned hut.

In order to save Fio, Alto drinks a powerful potion that gives him temporary power but causes him to go into heat as a side effect...

Their relationship takes an unexpected turn!

The gold standard of genderswap romantic comedy novels, featuring two people who were never meant to be in a relationship, has finally been translated into a full-color comic book!
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Comedy, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Gakum@s 4-koma
description: A whole new THE iDOLM@STER branch - Gakuen THE iDOLM@STER. This comic introduces about characters and stuff in Hatsuboshi Academy.
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Music, Full Color

name: Ossan Teihen Chiyu-shi to Manasume no Henkyou Life
description: F-rank healer, Reda Dixon (30), is expelled from his party due to his age. Heartbroken, Reda decides on a change of pace by moving to the rural town of Almus. On his journey there, he encounters a blonde-haired girl named Mina, who is dressed in ragged clothes. With no parents in sight, the kind-hearted Reda decides to become her guardian. In Almus, Reda, who starts a new life with the girl, becomes known as "Teacher" by the townspeople, thanks to his unconsciously cheat-level 『Healing Magic』! Together, they solve various troubles and deepen their family bonds.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Shoukan sareta Kenja wa Isekai wo Yuku ~Saikyou nano wa Fuyou Zaiko no Item deshita~
description:
Touya, the strongest player in the game Pandemic World Online, had won so many items that he decided to create an alternate account to store the extra ones. While playing this very game in his second account, he was summoned to another world as a character he made, where the people were merrily expecting a hero. However, when it is known that he doesn't have the title of a hero, he is discarded and replaced by another person. Now, he must survive in an another world with the account he merely used to store his extra items in.  


---
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Archvillain's Daughter in Law
description:
I've reincarnated as the young daughter-in-law of a villain who was taken in for his deceptive plans. The problem is that I'm terminally ill, so I'm going to die when I become an adult.

"Luckily, I know how to cure it, but..."

If I don't die at the right time, my father-in-law—no, the villain, Duke Ecarde—might kill me just to achieve his goals!

But what kind of kid could actually adjust to this kind of household?

"I want to live happily with Father and Evan for a long time... cough! Cough!"

Me. I'm "that kid."

---
The final villain is being deceived by his young time-limited daughter in law who was possessed. If I die at the right time, I will marry his son. The problem is, I already know the cure! And I don't want to die, but if I don't get killed now, then I won't die quietly.

"Daddy, I love you so much. You are the most handsome man in the world. Cough, cough!"

"Evan, shall we read a fairy tale book together until we fall asleep?"

She will have to act a little better to let his guard down. Then, she would be able to do a great job.

I think I'll have to leave secretly after I get better. I have to make a lot of money and buy land under pseudonyms.

"Call all the council members on the continent. My daughter-in-law has to live."

Father? Shouldn't I be thrown away…?

"If you die, I'll follow you unconditionally. I can't live in a world without you."

Husband? You’re acting strange, too… You don’t love anyone, do you?

Even- "Who is this, Kyle Ravonis? The man who seduced my daughter-in-law deserves to die."

"Even if you cheated on me with another man, I will never break up with you."

You must have misunderstood my other name!

"When did this start, huh? You said you wanted to live as a sweet couple, but you tried to run away by creating a new identity behind our back?"

I want to quietly disappear, not die! I didn't know my husband, who has been like a friend to me ever since we were young, would come to me with such sore eyes.

"You're still my wife on paper. Live as my wife, and die as my wife."

"Evan?"

"You've shown me both heaven and hell…" his reddened eyes locked me up, "You'll never get away from me no matter where you go."

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%8B%9C%ED%95%9C%EB%B6%80%EB%9D%BC%EC%84%9C-%ED%9D%91%EB%A7%89%EC%9D%98-%EB%A9%B0%EB%8A%90%EB%A6%AC%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%98%EC%97%88%EB%8A%94%EB%8D%B0/2762), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=58670925)

Having the knowledge about the modern weapons and his sense of values, he was an existence almost like a cheat, aiming to be the “Harem king”.    Abandoned by his superiors, left in command of the Empire’s rejects consisting of demi-humans such as Minotaurs, Dwarfs, and Elves, and thrust into a position as head of a poor fiefdom, Chrono will do everything he can to rebuild and strengthen his forces and revitalize the land, aided in part by his knowledge of the other world.

The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?

After all, he dated her for more than one week, he remembered the meetup times for the dates, and he remembers her name properly! Hiro-kun is bewildered and can't bring himself to be a complete scumbag to Mii-chan, whose standards for the boyfriend she wants are just way too low! He's scum, but he's kind. He's nice, but he's trash.

This is a trashy romance comedy featuring Mii-chan who loves a guy like him so much!

His strength limited by the magical crest with which he was born, Mathias, the world's most powerful sage, decides reincarnation is necessary to become the strongest of all.

Upon his rebirth as a young boy, Mathias is thrilled to discover he's been born with the optimal crest for magical combat on his first try! Unfortunately, the world he's been born into has abysmally poor standards when it comes to magic, and everyone thinks he's still marked for failure!

Now it's up to Mathias to prove everyone wrong... world's strongest sage-style!

name: Contractual Relationships with Friends Should be Done Carefully (Promo)
description:
"Oh my, from childhood friends to an engaged couple! Isn’t that so romantic?"

"Yeah. No, it’s not."

"You two were always together back in the academy, right?"

"Ah, that’s true."

It all began during our academy days.
I was exhausted from the constant stream of marriage proposals.

‘What about me?’
‘What?’
‘As your marriage partner.’

And so, I ended up signing a contract engagement with my friend, Aivert!

Thus, we began acting like a couple who couldn’t live without each other.
Of course, I can swear that he’s just a friend.

But as time passed,
and when the end of the contract was approaching…

"Soon, I'll be free!"

I thought the embarrassing couple act would soon be over! But…

—Clank.

An unexpected event occurred.
I stared, bewildered, at the handcuffs now on both my wrist and Aivert’s.

What kind of situation is this?

***

I thought we’d just be stuck together, and as long as we did our part, everything would be fine.

After all, acting as a couple would get easier, right?

I kept thinking positively about it, but…

Holding the key to the handcuffs,
Aivert Royden subtly tilted his head.

“If I break this, would you be disappointed?”

Rodella’s eyes went wide.

The shy and cautious childhood friend from her memories was gone, replaced by a stranger, yet someone familiar.
He wore a look that stirred strange feelings in her.

"You said it yourself. A madman should be tied up."

Clank. He shook his bound wrist.

"If I take this off…"

If I drift away from you, if I let this opportunity slip away…

"I think I might go crazy. What should I do?"

Baki is bored. After the conclusion of the epic battle between father and son, he continues to fight in the underground arena and train nonstop, but he always has to suppress his yawn caused by the overbearing boredom. No amount of stimulus or danger can bring excitement to him at this point.  
  
Now, with the inclusion of the Prime Minister of Japan in the loop, a massive cloning project is attempting to clone Miyamoto Musashi, one of the fathers of martial arts in Japan. Another fight of historical proportions awaits Baki!

That is, until the day a girl named Kiiro showed up out of nowhere claiming to be Karin's and Saku's daughter from the future. Convinced she will disappear from existence unless Saku and Karin get married, she makes life a lot more complicated for everyone. Things only get crazier when Hiiro, a girl claiming to be Kuran's and Saku's daughter from a different timeline in the future, appears with the goal of getting Saku together with his cousin Kuran. Saku is suddenly faced with a dilemma: whom does he choose as his wife, and which daughter does he save from disappearing into nothing?

Nina, a wyndian princess, and her guardian Cray are searching everywhere for Nina's missing elder sister, Elina. While traveling to her last known whereabouts they suffer an accident. This meeting triggers a series of events that will involve them with the godly race known as The Endless, immortal dragons with the power to shape the world itself.  
  
Closely follows the storyline of the original PlayStation game.

Not quite appreciating how far apart towns are in the country, he gets off the taxi at the next town over from his destination so he can see the sights around his home, but he is shocked when he learns the "next town" is a 3-hour walk away. However, he also meets a cute Dosanko (born and raised in Hokkaido) gyaru named Fuyuki Minami who is braving 8 degrees celcius below 0 weather in the standard gyaru outfit of short skirts and bare legs!

One day, Sanada Shirou, who works for a black company, is transported to another world. Using his "creation magic", an ability he gained when transported, he opens an inn and is supposed to lead a slow life, but this other world is a little strange?! It is a world where women are overwhelmingly dominant, where women do dangerous work and battle, and men are powerless and are protected! The daily life of entertaining (in many ways) the women of this other world begins...!

name: Stockpiling Ten Thousand Tons of Pork During the Apocalypse
description: “Mr. Chen, the one hundred portions of roasted duck that you ordered is here.” “Mr. Chen, the ten thousand pounds of pork that you ordered is here.” Chen Luo, also known as the Void Sovereign, hid like a coward with his outstanding powers until all the survivors died before him. Having found no meaning in life, he decided to bury himself. It wasn’t that he couldn’t survive, he just didn’t want to live anymore. After waking up, Chen Luo is shocked to find out that he has been reincarnated to one month before the apocalypse, and that the subspace he created in his past life with his powers was also retained.

name: Magician
description:
It all begins in the forest village of Adat, where the tomboy Iremi sees the infamous mage Edermask en route to her hometown. Wanting to find out who is stronger, she sets off to challenge him with her childhood friend Enzu, a novice swordsman who is always being dragged around wherever she goes.  
  
Iremi and Enzu then start a journey along with Edermask, each seeking something different from their journey: Enzu seeks revenge for the murder of his father, Edermask is looking for a lost magic, and Iremi is just there for the ride. Without knowing the dangers their journey might bring them, they set sail to fulfill their heart’s desires and uncloak the mystery behind Edermask's immortality.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Setagaya Ichi Furui Youkan no Yanushi ni Naru

The manga artist who loves "house" as you know fell in serious love with a Western-style house in Setagaya-ku, Tokyo,
A Western-style house in Setagaya-ku, Tokyo, with a stylish light blue exterior.
However, this house is actually on the verge of demolition. ......?
In order to protect her beloved mansion, the manga artist must stand up for herself!

Tang Li, a housing agent who joined the workforce in Hangzhou, unknowingly fell in love with Nian Nian, a part-time female shopkeeper at a late-night restaurant. The two helped each other out, became roommates, and gradually started falling in love.

One morning, he discovers a naked woman in his house. Without being able to assess the situation, he heads off to school. Later that evening, his father comes home to introduce him to the girl he plans to remarry and this girl turns out to be his classmate.

name: Blue Orchestra
description:
Aono Hajime was a prodigy violinist until he grew jaded with playing the violin due to personal reasons. 
Now in his third year of middle school, he struggles to decide his academic path. 
One day in school, he meets Akine Ritsuko, a hotheaded novice violinist who wants to enroll in a high school with a distinguished orchestra club. 
When he finds himself getting closer to Ritsuko and being brought back to the world of violinists, time starts moving again for him.  
  
This is the beginning of a youthful drama where sounds and hearts alike resound in harmony.

Kase always hides his face behind a mask, and rarely makes conversation with anyone, leaving Michishita with no intention of pursuing his unrequited love, content to just admire him from afar. One day, Michishita found himself in a near-fatal accident, only to be saved in the nick of time by Kase. However, Kase is seriously injured while shielding Michishita and is taken to the hospital in critical condition, unconscious. When Kase finally wakes up, to Michishita's surprise, he starts calling him "big brother" and begins acting adorably toward him…?

description: Dorothy, along with her beloved dog Toto, finds herself whisked away by a cyclone to the mysterious land of Oz. Something about the strange place feels oddly familiar, but Dorothy just wants to go home. Following the advice of a kindly Witch, Dorothy must travel to the Emerald City and seek out the Wizard of Oz, who alone has the power to send her back to her world. Captive Hearts of Oz reimagines L. Frank Baum’s original Oz stories in a modern, shoujo style. Each volume in this ongoing series will be released in oversized editions, featuring impressive artwork and several full-color illustrations.

name: Ushiro no Seki no Gyaru ni Sukarete Shimatta -Mou Ore wa Damekamoshirenai-
description:
***My school life has changed drastically just because she likes me that I barely talk with?!***

Yuizaki Shino, one of the most beautiful girls in the school is a classmate of Fujiwara Sandai sitting behind him. It was only on a whim that Sandai helped her out despite spent his days studying and not having a single friend. It was supposed to be―

*"I couldn't wait for after school! ....Hey, hold on a minute?"*

That day and moment led Sandai to start dating Shino. They spend time together after school, they keep up with each other's hobbies, and they stay over frequently.... She's kind-sweet and always clings to him. And somehow, the other classmates started to pay attention to Sandai, they slowly changing his style appearance, and there was a lot of talks around his belt. He's more unsettled than when Sandai alone before. ....Well, this kind of school life isn't so bad, is it?

---

****Note: Earlier release chapter will be on Monthly Comic Dengeki Daioh before Comic Walker release***
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Gyaru

name: Grandmaster of Demonic Cultivation - Mo Dao Zu Shi
description:
As the grandmaster who founded the Demonic Sect, Wei WuXian roamed the world in his wanton ways, hated by millions for the chaos he created. In the end, he was back-stabbed by his dearest junior brother and killed by powerful clans that combined to overpower him. He incarnates into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and is later, unwillingly, taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans—Lan WangJi, his archenemy.  
  
This marks the start of a thrilling yet hilarious journey of attacking monsters, solving mysteries, and raising children. From the mutual flirtation along the way, Wei WuXian slowly realizes that Lan WangJi, a seemingly haughty and indifferent poker-face, holds more feelings for Wei WuXian than he is letting on.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Horror, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color
