name: Hikaru to Hikaru
description:
"Hikaru to Hikaru" is a comedy about Hikaru Katsuragi, a boy who is a descendant of the Iga ninja, sneaking into a girls' school.

In the Katsuragi family, if you don't master the secret "Kunoichi no Jutsu," which turns your body into a female body, by the age of 18, you won't be recognized as an adult, and his mother was worried about Hikaru's immature technique.

In order for such a Hikaru to become a full-fledged woman, he is ordered to attend a prestigious school for young ladies, Kazami Girls' School, in the form of a woman.
tags: Genderswap, Action, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, School Life

name: Watashi no Messiah-sama
description:
Shinya doesn't get good grades. He's weak, a coward, not athletic… he's a general good for nothing. One day; however, he meets Haruna, a girl who could change his life forever. Haruna tells Shinya that he is the Messiah, the lord chosen to save her world, and that she is his shield.  
Can it be true? Is Shinya's life of ineptitude balance for this one grand cause? Is he the Messiah? If he is, can he save himself let alone an entire world?  
  
Originally ran as "Watashi no Messiah-sama" (26 chapters) and "Watashi no Messiah-sama ~lacrima~" (35 chapters)
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Meeting My Ex-Girlfriend
description: What are the chances of running into an ex-lover at the recycling station? A newly written story of two women reunited as apartment neighbors.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Full Color

name: Grim Reapers' Corps
description: Mu-hyun, the captain of the 'Yaksha Corps' —an evil spirit disposal unit within the underworld— has worked tirelessly for the afterlife. However, he lost his precious colleagues in an instant. In order to bring them back, he must establish a union in the underworld.
tags: Action, Ghosts, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Ore ga Kokuhaku Sarete Kara, Ojou no Yousu ga Okashii
description:
The servant of the Tendou family, Eito, serves the perfect young lady, Hoshine. 

One day, Eito informs Hoshine that someone from another class confessed their feelings for him. Hoshine, who has hidden her feelings for Eito since childhood, begins to feel uneasy: 

"I’ve loved Eito for a much longer time!"

 As a result, Hoshine starts to approach Eito even more, making bolder advances than ever before! She gets close to him in crowded trains and begs him to sleep by her side… While Eito tries to maintain his role as a formal servant, Hoshine increasingly pursues him with her advances. 

It’s an adorable romantic comedy between a mistress and her servant, featuring a young lady who strives to win her servant’s love!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: My Ex-Husband Wants to Remarry Again
description: Ye Linghan’s wish to remarry his ex-husband, Ji Ran, turned the latter from an Alpha to an Omega. Despite enduring the physical changes and the pain of rejection, Ji Ran also endured Ye Linghan’s repeated hurtful behavior. When Ye Linghan finally divorced him, Ji Ran was left heartbroken. As for Ye Linghan, he got what he wanted, but upon looking at the empty villa, he suddenly came to his senses.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy

name: Heart of Thomas
description:
As winter draws to a close, German boarding school student Thomas Werner dies one morning. He leaves behind a single letter addressed to his fellow student Juli that reads "Here is my love. Here is the sound of my heart."  
  
With his faith shaken to the core by the words, the scholarly Juli sinks to the depths of despair. His cynical roommate Oscar finds himself watching over Juli's fragile mental state while keeping his own feelings for Juli under wraps. Then new student Eric enters the school - and he has an uncanny resemblance to the deceased Thomas…  
  
Enter the world of a boy's boarding school in Germany where all will be revealed about the suffering and redemption that comes with love. Even today, this early work of Hagio Moto is still regarded as a brilliant masterpiece.  
  
This is volumes 11-12 of Hagio Moto Works  
  
1 Bianka (ビアンカ)  
2 Tou no Aru Ie (塔のある家)  
3 Cake Cake Cake (ケーキケーキケーキ)  
4 Sara Hill no Seiya (セーラ・ヒルの聖夜)  
5 Sangatsu Usagi ga Shuudande (３月ウサギが集団で)  
6 Poe no Ichizoku 1 (ポーの一族　　　１)  
7 Poe no Ichizoku 2 (ポーの一族　　　２)  
8 Poe no Ichizoku 3 (ポーの一族　　　３)  
9 Poe no Ichizoku 4 (ポーの一族　　　４)  
10 Kyobetsu Hata no Isansouzokunin (キャベツ畑の遺産相続人)  
11 Thomas no Shinzou First (トーマの心臓　上)  
12 Thomas no Shinzou Last (トーマの心臓　下)  
13 Juuichinin Iru! (１１人いる！)  
14 Shiiro no Yuukyuu / Kuro no Eien (東の地平・西の永久)  
15 Kono Musume Urimasu! (この娘うります！)  
16 Tottemo Shiawase Moto-chan (とってもしあわせモトちゃん)  
17 American Pie (アメリカンパイ)
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Cool Shock Guy B.T.
description: Nisio Isin and Posuka Demizu return to create another spin-off in the Cool Shock B.T. universe. An adult B.T., working as a magician in Las Vegas, challenges a gunslinging gambler in a high-stakes roulette game.
tags: Oneshot, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Adventure, Adaptation

name: Life Is Money
description: Ten contestants agrees to put their life on the line to have a chance of winning 100,000,000 yen. To win, they must survive 10 days inside the prison…
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
description: The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time manga is based off of the popular Nintendo 64 game of the same name. Young hero Link travels the world of Hyrule in search of the Spiritual Stones and encounters many friendly faces throughout his journey, including Zelda, the princess of Hyrule. The focus of Link's courageous quest is to thwart the evil king Ganondorf's plans to rule Hyrule. But when our hero is absent for seven years, Ganondorf has the opportunity to obtain the power of the gods, the Triforce.
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: To Not Die
description:
Im Dajun is a high school student who gets bullied at school every day. He came across an interview on TV just when he was on the verge of giving up on life. It was with a murderer who killed the classmates that bullied him. Dajun becomes inspired by what he saw and decides to take revenge as well.

His revenge was successful. However, his life steered into an undesired direction. Im Dajun, leaving school, ends up joining a strange Runaway Fam.

The young runaway, Im Dajun, no longer suffers from the bullies at his school. Instead, he now must survive against even more vicious thugs on the streets.

---

**Links:**
- [Official Traditional Chinese Translation](https://www.webtoons.com/zh-hant/action/to-not-die/list?title_no=2978)
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/BOY/jietoushegncunshouce/list?title_no=1720)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001592)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Crime, Martial Arts, Adventure, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Reiketsu Ryuuou Heika no "Unmei no Tsugai" rashii Desu ga, Koukyuu ni Hikikomorou to Omoimasu
description: Upon reaching adulthood, Efinia, the fairy princess, is set to have an audience with the Dragon Emperor. However, as soon as she meets Emperor Glendil, it is revealed that Efinia is his "fated mate." Shocked, Efinia overhears the emperor's heartless words, "It's outrageous that someone who looks like a child is my mate." In that case, fine! I don't desire the love of an arrogant emperor! Undeterred by the harassment from other concubines, Efinia thoroughly enjoys her life in the harem. She eventually befriends a small dragon that wanders into the harem, but it seems this dragon has a secret...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Yugami-kun ni wa Tomodachi ga Inai - Tonari no Anata to (Unofficial Fanbook)
description:
An unofficial addition to Yugami has no friends manga. 

Featuring the web-published interludes of Yugami-kun, as well as secondary works (fan-created stories) of Yuuji Yugami and Chihiro Watanuki set after the final chapter. 

Unofficial Fanbook created by Misumi (mr_ms_maker on X).

Note: Chapters can be read in random order.
tags: Doujinshi, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Yuureitou
description:
In the 1950s, an old woman was brutally murdered on the face of a clock tower by her adopted daughter. Two years later, the clock tower is known as the 'ghost tower' and it is supposedly haunted. Through an unusual series of events, a young NEET man named Amano Taichi is attacked by someone or something in the same clock tower, and finds himself bound to the clock face to be killed in the same way as the old woman. Luckily for Amano, he doesn't meet the same fate. He's rescued by a mysterious person who claims his name is Tetsuo.  
  
Tetsuo is searching for a treasure that is connected with the ghost tower, and he wants Taichi to be his partner. Taichi, whose life has mostly consisted of poverty, loneliness, and pornography, is enticed by the idea of gaining extreme wealth. He's further convinced when a house fire leaves him without a home and depends on Tetsuo's charity. The adventure is going to be very dangerous, since the same 'enemies' who attacked Taichi before seem certain to try something again! Not to mention, Taichi really knows very little about his new partner, especially while regarding his true identity!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Crossdressing, Drama, Horror, Mystery

name: Soredemo Sekai wa Utsukushii
description: Nike is the fourth princess of the Rain Duchy and one who holds the power to call forth the rain. Despite her own reluctance, for the sake of her country she travels to the Sun Kingdom to marry Sun King Livius. She soon discovers that the King, who conquered the world within only three years of ascending to the throne, is actually… a child?! Furthermore, for trivial reasons, he demands that Nike call forth the rain…?!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Drama, Fantasy

name: Rain
description:
The small country Sunkwoll is in a tight spot because it's under attack of the great country Zarmine. But the general, Rain, who's reputed to be an exceptionally gifted swordsman, is against the war and won't enter the battle. But how is one supposed to wage a war like this anyway?  
  
*Note: Author passed away in Feb 2019, leaving the source material for the manga, novel incomplete.*
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Kurozakuro
description: Sakurai Mikito is a wimp who is constantly bullied and never fights back, as he doesn't want to hurt others.This all changes when a mysterious sphere enters him - Zakuro. He soon begins to feel different feeling desires to eat… humans. Is he still human, or will he succumb to his desires and fully become a monster?
tags: Action, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Silver Fang – The Shooting Star Gin –
description:
This is the first and original story in the Ginga, the Silver Fang, series.  
It covers the birth of the silver-coloured brindle bear-dog, Gin, whose father gets killed early in the story by the bloodthirsty bear Akakabuto.  
Gin promises himself, his father and his human friends to swear revenge.  
He trains together with his young human master, Daisuke to kill the bear to vengeance all his victims.  
One day, while hunting bears in the mountains, Gin meets a pack of wild dogs with the very same goal.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 1987**
tags: Award Winning, Action, Animals, Adventure, Gore

name: Darren Shan
description:
Darren Shan's an ordinary schoolboy, until he and his best friend Steve get tickets to the Cirque Du Freak, a bizarre freak show featuring such arcane performers. In the midst of the ghoulish excitement, true terror raises its head when Steve recognises that one of the performers – Mr Crepsley – is in fact a vampire! That's when the hands of fate changes the lives of them forever!  
  
Based on the english novel series Cirque Du Freak by author Darren Shan.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Fate/Grand Order: Qin Shi Huang's Interlude - The Melancholy of a Ruler
description: Manga adaptation of the Interlude of Qin Shi Huang, a Ruler Servant from the mobile game Fate/Grand Order.
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Action, Fantasy

name: Cerberus
description: Kei often gets involved in fights, despite of him being weak and always end up losing. One day, while helping a friend to bring some textbooks to an old building of his school, he and his childhood friend, Tomoe, are attacked by a monster. In order to save his friend, Kei will choose to become a Grave Protector!
tags: Action, Comedy, Harem, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Oretachi ga Osananajimi Janaku Natta Hanashi
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Web Comic

name: Arknights: A1 Operations Preparation Detachment
description: Rookie members of the Columbia garrison, Fang, Beagle and Kroos have been posted to the commercial city of Tkaronto’s Infected district for their internship. Although it’s crowded and has quite a complex situation, the three of them resolve to do their duty to the fullest, quickly integrating with the local Infected. Soon, their six-month internship will be over, and the three of them will become full members of the garrison, but meanwhile a Catastrophe silently descends on Tkaronto…
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Video Games, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Yotsuba Keishou-hen
description:
In December, Miyuki receives an invitation for the Yotsuba's new year's family gathering. However, unlike previous years, they specially added "Everyone must attend" on the invitation. Miyuki understands that "the time has come" — it is time to decide the next head for the Yotsuba Clan.  
— If she is elected, her brother will be free.  
— If she becomes the next head, she will be forced to marry someone else.  
Miyuki's heart is a mess.  
The truth of the Brother and Sister relationship is finally unveiled!? Yotsuba Keishou-hen begins!  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volume 16.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Kounai Renai Shitara Kubi
description: Campus Romance Forbidden—Break it, and you're fired." A new rule is introduced at the high school where 26-year-old Shuuya Imari works. Annoyed by his colleagues' complaints, Shuuya, who believes teachers should focus on their students rather than engage in romance, is taken aback when the new, handsome school nurse, Rio Shikai (22), aggressively pursues him with an unusually high level of affection...!? A Yandere school nurse × a stern glasses-wearing teacher in a thrilling BL chase!
tags: Boys' Love, Delinquents

name: Tenkuu Shinpan Arrive
description: Senya is just an ordinary boy, who wanted to become an astronaut as a kid. One day and suddenly, he's transported into another world after seeing on the rooftop of his school something like a "tower" going across the sky. There, he witnesses a ruined world, where skyscrapers are connected by suspension bridges. Senya, perplexed, manages to see a girl standing on the roof of another building, as well as a masked man holding a bloody weapon in his hands…
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Survival, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Funbari no Uta
description:
Funbari no Uta is a series of short stories written by Hiroyuki Takei relating to his manga series Shaman King. All except one, were reprinted in the original Shaman King manga volume print run.  
  
The chapter numbered Funbari no Uta stories are set seven years later (2007) after the Shaman Tournament, and revolves around Hana Asakura, the son of Yoh and Anna. Hana and Ryunosuke Umemiya are searching for the members of Team Ren and Lyserg for the grand opening of Funbari no Onsen, which is run by Tamao in the story.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Supernatural

name: Joan
description: Guided by visions of "la Pucelle" (the name given to Joan by followers), Emil seeks to unite France under the divine rule of the King. In her quest, Emil goes to the same places Joan had traveled through, and gains her own followers in the process. However, Emil is opposed by the dauphin Louis, a brute enforcer who fears no divine power and wishes to make his own bid to rule the country.
tags: Historical, Demons, Psychological, Survival, Sexual Violence, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Isekai Maou to Shoukan Shoujo no Dorei Majutsu
description:
When it comes to the fantasy MMORPG Cross Reverie, none can match the power of the Demon King Diablo. Possessing the game's rarest artifacts and an unrivaled player level, he overpowers all foolish enough to confront him. But despite his fearsome reputation, Diablo's true identity is Takuma Sakamoto, a shut-in gamer devoid of any social skills.   
  
Defeating hopeless challengers day by day, Takuma cares about nothing else but his virtual life—that is, until a summoning spell suddenly transports him to another world where he has Diablo's appearance!  
  
In this new world resembling his favorite game, Takuma is greeted by the two girls who summoned him: Rem Galeu, a petite Pantherian adventurer, and Shera L. Greenwood, a busty Elf summoner. They perform an Enslavement Ritual in an attempt to subjugate him, but the spell backfires and causes them to become his slaves instead.

With the situation now becoming more awkward than ever, Takuma decides to accompany the girls in finding a way to unbind their contract while learning to adapt to his new existence as the menacing Demon King.
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Watashi no Shounen
description:
Satoko Tawada is an office worker. She's almost 30 years old, but she still hasn't been able to find happiness in her life. Fate brings her with Mashuu Hayami, a beautiful 12-year-old boy whom she finds practicing soccer all by himself in the park. On a whim, she decides to help Mashuu with his practice, with her knowledge of soccer at her disposal. As they practice together on an everyday routine, the two eventually develop an emotional bond. When Satoko's ex-boyfriend deceives her, Mashuu gladly comforts her. And when Satoko learns of Mashuu's mostly absent parents, she starts to concern herself with his personal life. The two lonely souls find common ground and develop an emotional bond that transcends their age difference and circumstances. With this newfound bond, new feelings start to sprout within Satoko. Are these feelings that of maternity? Or is it something else?

**Awards:**
- Ranked #11 in the 2017 Manga Taisho Awards
- Won 3rd place in the Tsugi ni Kuru Manga Awards, Category Print Manga (2017)
- Won 2nd Place in the 2017 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! Awards for male readers
- Won 1st Place in the 2016 Oreman (俺マン) My Best Manga Gran Prix manga rankings.
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Drama, Slice of Life

name: IDOLiSH7 Re:member
description: The novel, "Re:member," from the popular idol rhythm game makes it to comic format! The past of Idolish7's senpai group, Re:vale, is finally revealed! What hurdles have Banri, Yuki and Momo overcome before the formation of the group…?
tags: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Osananajimi wa, Nyaa to Naite Skirt no Naka.
description: Not found
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: More Than Brothers
description:
The younger brother living next door was as cute as a small angel when he was a child, but after reuniting many years later, he drastically changed? In order to properly discipline this “rebellious” younger brother—Bai Yun, the gentle elder brother, Lan Tian, will do his best to take up on that responsibility. What Lan Tian didn’t know was that Bai Yun wanted to tell him: “You’ve been treating me as your younger brother, but I’ve never thought of you as my older brother!” Can a crush lasting many years finally blossom?

---
As a child, a boy who looked like a cute angel lived with him next door. But then he left and came back many years later. But when he returned, he changed a lot. In order to somehow control this rebel Lan Tang, you need to try very hard.

---
[Official Japanese Translation / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/117078)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Shaman King Zero
description:
Shaman King follows the adventures of Yoh Asakura as he attempts to hone his shaman skills to become the Shaman King in the Shaman tournament.  
  
However, this series is before the Shaman Tournament arc.
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, School Life, Supernatural

name: The Most Beautiful Girl in the School is in Love With Me, the xx Artist!?
description:
Amesaka Sora, an ordinary high school boy, usually enjoys drawing erotic pictures as a hobby. Since his failure in junior high school, he had planned to hide his hobby in high school... But one day, the student council president and the most beautiful girl in the school, Kisaragi Uguisu, finds out his secret...!?

A coming-of-age rom-com between a beautiful girl at the top of the caste system and one of those male extras!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Assassins Pride
description: In the world where only the aristocrats have the power to fight the monster – mana. A youth named Kufa is dispatched as a tutor to find Mareida's talent, a nuisance girl born in a duke's family. If she is not talented, assassinate her. That, is the dark side of his task.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Merry on the Rocks
description:
With Christmas around the corner, Noel (top) feels restless and uneasy. He enters a bar where he runs into the man of his dreams and, by happy chance, they spend the night together. However, by morning the man has already disappeared. 
All Noel knows about him is his name, June (bottom), but will they be able to meet again? 
Disappointed, Noel can’t stop thinking about June, so much so that he makes mistakes in his presentation. He’s in the middle of rebuking himself when, in the hallways of his client’s building, he sees a familiar face…
tags: Long Strip, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Drama

name: Devilman Lady
description:
Fudou Jun is a highschool teacher and takes a trip with a group of students. While there, a group of martial artists staying nearby take a strange interest in the girls.  
These men are actually demons and after changing into their true form break into the cabin to rape the girls. One gets Jun and violates her.  
She feels her soul being torn apart and transforms into Devilman Lady. With newfound powers and strength she kills all the demons and protects the girls from any further harm.  
What are these demons and why did she turn into a hybrid of one? What does this mean for her and for the rest of humanity?
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Girls' Love, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Vampires, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Kirby of the Stars: Hearty Pupupu Fantasy
description:
Introducing a new manga for Kirby's 25th anniversary!

This is the peaceful land of Pupupu.
But the pink, round, hungry little guy, Kirby, is always causing a ruckus and making things very lively!

Even Hikawa Hirokazu, the creator of the first Kirby series in CoroCoro, gave his approval!
It's the 25th anniversary of the series, and the start of a new manga series!
tags: Animals, Comedy, Survival, Video Games, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: I Want To Eat You
description: Having received an imperial decree to marry a barbarian, Eunwoo, overwhelmed with mixed emotions, went for a solitary walk. There, she stumbled upon a massive tiger with an injured paw. 'Eat me,' the tiger requested as a reward for her help. Baekhui, the tiger king, was dumbfounded by this unusual request but couldn't help but salivate at the sight of Eunwoo. 'Such a delicious-looking face,' he thought. From that day forward, Baekhui was consumed by thoughts of how to savor her. In his quest to make her his mate, he relentlessly pursues her with seductive charms... A thrilling tale of seduction and conquest, featuring Baekhui, the ever-flirtatious tiger, and Eunwoo, the pure yet resolute Joseon princess!
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Drama, Full Color

name: HONEY CATCH
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Satsukare
description: Yūta Kiryū is an abusive man who raises his hands to women. One day when they're on a date, Yūta shows violence toward his girlfriend as usual, but unexpectedly, life is turned around in an instant. His girlfriend dies and while fleeing the scene, he encounters a group of serial murderers. He finds himself repelled by their "values" but is nonetheless pulled into their world. The manga features an array of criminal types including men who commit domestic violence, a murderer-rapist, a cannibal, and a necrophiliac. Who do you want to be killed?
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Tragedy

name: The Day the Real One Appeared
description:
Mel Slopy, an orphan of common birth, had her hair turn white after a childhood fever. While unconscious from the illness, her parents abandoned her due to their crushing debts, leaving her to be taken in by Noma.  

One day, Duke Heaven, grief-stricken and mentally unwell after losing his youngest daughter, mistakes Mel for his deceased child, Bleria Charlotte Heaven, because of their similar hair color.  

To quell the growing rumors about his father’s instability, Damian Jeremiah Heaven, the duke’s son, visits Mel. He demands that she pretend to be Bleria to protect the family’s reputation.  

Living as Bleria, Mel is soon thrust into preparing for an engagement with Gopher Isaac Allnight, the heir of the powerful Allnight Ducal House. But what challenges await her in this life of deception?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Sub-Dial
description:
From an orphan with no one to rely on to the trusted right-hand man of the boss—Kang Eun did whatever it took to meet the expectations of William, the organization’s leader.

Then one day, William informed him of his son Isaac’s return and entrusted Kang Eun with the task of assisting him.

"What’s so great about that old geezer that makes you follow him so loyally? …Wouldn’t someone younger like me be more appealing?"
tags: Official Colored, Long Strip, Anthology, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Gekiman! - Devilman Chapter
description: A semi-fictional autobiography of the creation of Devilman.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Office Workers, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Gore, Horror, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: The Hachioji Specialty: Tengu's Love
description:
The life of a single-minded tengu bride and a lonely young man living together on the premise of marriage!

Kotaro, a lonely young man who has returned to his hometown for some reason, is reunited with Hime, a tengu girl, at Mt. Hime says that they must get married! A one-sided (?) marriage is assumed. Living together with a tengu is full of surprises!
___
**Note:** The series is authored by Nanao Tomo, which is an alias of Tsukizuki Yoshi.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: H.P. Lovecraft's The Shadow Out Of Time
description: Manga adaption of H. P. Lovecraft's "The Shadow Out of Time"
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Sangokushi
description:
Manga adaptation of Romance of the Three Kingdoms, illustrated by the legendary Mitsuteru Yokoyama. Serialized from 1972~1986, it has since become the most famous manga adaptation of the Romance of the Three Kingdoms.

---- 
**Won the 20th Japanese Cartoonist Association Excellence Award in 1991**
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Historical, Action, Psychological, Survival, Adventure, Military, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Thrilling, Raging Newspaper Reporter
description:
(from ebookjapan):

Fumiya Saotome, a reporter in the Akatsuki Shimbun's sociology department, is an unbelievably violent man. 

He will wield both pen and arm to the fullest for the sake of social justice. He chases after a hit-and-run case, and ends up with the son of a deputy. He was paid 100 million yen to keep his mouth shut.　

He is furious, and his money will not sell him out!
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Mafia, Adventure, Office Workers, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Hana-Uta Memoir
description: Ume Sasaki, a senior in high school, is helping out at her great-grandmother's ryokan during this summer vacation. She goes to the ryokan in hopes of getting some hints about her future...? This is the brightest and most dazzling "memory (memoir)" of the girls.
tags: Time Travel, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: My Bias Appeared?!
description:
Aejoon, a high school teacher who's a die hard fan of Siyeol, a member in the national idol group A1(Aone).  
"I went to work with a heavy heart like always and left behind my love for Siyeol, but for no reason, out of nowhere, My bias came to my school!  
However, My bias's actions are suspicious because it looks like he's trying to seduce me…?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Full Color

name: Historiae Obscura
description: A true story about the creation of the camera.
tags: Historical, Boys' Love, Self-Published, Philosophical, Drama, Web Comic

name: The Soulless Duchess
description:
The naïve Yvona is ready to do anything for her amazing fiancé! Summon magical beasts and let him take the glory? Sure! Wreck her body for a powerful spell and die for him? Yes! Watch him secretly embrace her trusted cousin Tristan with passion and deride her openly? Oka— wait. What? Just then, Yvona dies... and wakes up a year in the past with a burdened heart. Armed with her knowledge, Yvona's ready to fight for herself. And hmm, maybe form an alliance with the coldhearted Duke of Azentine...

---
I died miserably on the day I found out the truth. The truth that my fiancé had a hidden lover, and it was my very own male cousin.

On the second morning, after my 20th birthday, a miracle happened. From that point on, I decided not to believe in love anymore. I want to have a relationship with no strings attached and without any superficial feelings such as love.

"Duke Agentine, will you marry me?"

This proposal was nothing more than a marriage to keep up appearances and without love involved.

---
[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=53939289)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-soulless-duchess/)
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Istri-Palsu-Duke/3280)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/24657)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%8A%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%AA/23)

**Original Novel:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=4386129), [Ridibooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/3170012735)

**Official Novel Translation:** [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/72805)
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Visitor To Earth
description: In order to understand the true power of Earth, the alien Xiguang goes undercover as a student on Earth. He mistakenly believes that the science-fiction themed comics and movies on Earth are a display of Earthlings' ability to simulate interstellar wars, so he resolutely joins the school's anime club. Due to the cultural gap between aliens and Earthlings, a series of hilarious events unfold... Xiguang's seemingly humiliating but actually ridiculous undercover life is about to begin! So, Stay tuned….
tags: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Aliens, Supernatural, Full Color

name: The Lord of Coins
description: Aaron Steelegard's fortune was basically set as he discovered a book that allowed him to trade across dimensions—until his enemies take both his life and his riches away. But Aaron is brought back as his younger self, armed with his past knowledge and a chance at revenge! Now free to amass coins, he's gaining powerful abilities and moving up the ranks of the interdimensional trading markets. Will Aaron gain enough coins to survive this journey of vengeance and reclaim his honor?
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Katarika
description: The story of "Katarika: The Curse of Ghostly Tales" follows a group of girls trapped by a mysterious "curse" linked to Ghostly tales. It combines thrilling suspense and emotional depth, focusing on their friendships as they navigate this eerie phenomenon. The manga blends supernatural horror with the characters' personal struggles, unraveling a chilling tale of how stories can shape and destroy their world.
tags: Psychological, Ghosts, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Act Like You Love Me!
description:
Dealing with three jobs daily.  
  
A mountain of stress and a pigsty to call home are the only things waiting for twenty-five-year old Jiun at the end of her work.  
  
Until one day, a stuffed doll finds her way into her arms — and with this, she's able to spoil herself with the housekeeping of Nam Doyoon, South Korea's top actor…?!

---
•[Alternate raws (Naver Series)](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?productNo=5740892)  

•[Official Indonesian](https://www.webtoons.com/id/romance/do-as-i-say/list?title_no=2489)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Katabutsu-kei Joshi ni Kokuhaku shitemita
description: Although she's pretty, she's widely rumoured to be the school's number one straight-laced girl. So when I gathered up my courage to confess to her…‽
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic

name: Drug Devourer
description:
One day, a gate suddenly opened in the heavens, bringing with it the invasion of monsters and the intervention of monks in the human world.

『Miracle Drug “Coffee” Administration』

『Medicinal Contents: Caffeine and Sugar』
☞ Provides energy
☞ Stimulates the central nervous system
☞ Maximizes senses and reflexes

The whole world appeared to slow down, and Hanyul’s medications began to show their true effects.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Inazuma Eleven
description:
Raimon Middle School 's soccer club captain, Endou Mamoru is in a pinch - his club is about to be destroyed! Literally! To avert the wrecking ball and disbanding of the club, his team must win against the toughest soccer team in the area - Teikoku. Will Endou and his team meet a crushing defeat or will a mysterious transfer student with a fiery kick save them from disaster?!  
  
Won the 34th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for Best Children's Manga.
tags: Award Winning, Action, Comedy, Sports, Fantasy

name: The Friends-Eater Classroom
description: At Sakurazaka High School, students in class 1-A are involved in an unreasonable game called "The Friends-Eater Game", in which one of the conditions of the game is to eat specific parts of the bodies of their friends to survive. Cannibal school begins.
tags: Sexual Violence, Gore, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Caterpillar
description:
Possessing both flexibility and tenacity, Imomushi (Japanese for Caterpillar) is an assassin that does not kill anyone but those who are assigned to her. She seems to have had something happen between her and her older sister in the past, however.  
  
A new spin-off story from the same author of Arachnid, this story looks at the inner workings of a top assassin within The Organization itself.  
  
Note: In early 2014, serialization resumed with a new artist. The series had been on hiatus after the sudden passing of the previous artist in 2013

[Wikipedia](https://ja.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=%E3%82%AD%E3%83%A3%E3%82%BF%E3%83%94%E3%83%A9%E3%83%BC_(%E6%BC%AB%E7%94%BB)&redirect=no)
tags: Action, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Arachnid
description:
Alice is a senior high school student who lives with an uncle that spends his time tormenting her everyday. One day, Alice witnesses the death of her uncle by the hands of an assassin called "Kumo" (Arachnid in Japanese). She then falls unconscious, and upon waking up, she finds out that she's in Kumo's house… Now, this Alice who no longer has any family is being raised by the assassin himself..!  
  


---
tags: Action, Psychological, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Horror, Tragedy

name: Sword Art Online - Mother's Rosario
description: While Asuna, Leafa, Silica and Lisbeth were doing their homework in Kirito and Asuna's Log House on the 22nd Floor of New Aincrad, Lisbeth informed Asuna of a player known as Absolute Sword who was challenging players on the 24th Floor, while offering an 11-hit Original Sword Skill as a reward. Asuna was told that the mysterious player had actually converted from a different game and that over thirty players who had attempted to challenge the player, including Leafa and even Kirito, were defeated. Hearing that Kirito had said something to the player before being defeated and not sharing what he had said with the others and thinking that the mysterious player had come for a reason, Asuna decided to challenge the player as well. To her surprise, the player was actually a girl, named Yuuki.
tags: Action, Adventure, Video Games, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Genkaigoe no Skill wa, Tenseisha ni Shika Atsukaenai - Over Limit Skill Holder
description:
A fantasy adventure about bonds forged with people in a different world. The setting is a world, where everyone has eight skill slots. In these slots people can put skills like “Strengthen arm ★” and “Fire Magic★★” from skill orbs, abilities which prove extremely useful for survival. The total amount of stars your skills have can never exceed your slots. Our protagonist Reiji, worked as a slave that mines skill orbs, until 10 years old. Along with his precious older sister, Lark, they worked gruellingly in the mines until one day, where the chance for rebellion occurred at the mine and Reiji got his hands on a ten-star, a so called “overlimit” skill, called “World Ruler”. Reiji went from a powerless slave to having an ability that surpassed human limits, but in the chaos of the revolt, he was separated from the only person dear to him, his sister Lark.  
  
“To regain his bond with her, to make her his true sister”, earnestly thinking so, Reiji’s adventure to distant places starts!

---

**Note:** The chapter number resets after each arc. 
**Comment:** Just let it like how it originally was…

tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Adaptation

tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Adaptation

name: Warning! Beware of the Dog
description:
By some sort of fate, exorcist Xiao Yu is forced to "cohabitate" with the succubus named Obsidian, who killed her adoptive father. Yet she discovers that the succubus seems to have lost her memories! Unaccepting of this fact, Xiao Yu decides to spy on Obsidian's every move, yet the latter doesn't seem bothered by the least. Instead, she starts to thirst after Xiao Yu openly and often teases her body to satiate her own hunger...

Although they seem to have a love-hate relationship, they both know that something is stirring beneath the depths. Why her adoptive father was killed, why Obsidian's memory was sealed away, and...
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: What the Duke Picked up in the Forest
description:
“I’m going to do this for the last time, so let me go back with my memories.”

Those who died for me 29 times... I wanted to protect you with my own hands at least once. I want to protect those poor and pitiful 'my people.'

Thus, Elysia's 30th and last regression began. Everything began to change as if fate had been twisted into place. A child who was born without a ‘sign’ in a family that received God’s protection and lived a harsh life. I gradually realize that the beginning of the curse disguised as God's blessing all started with one person...
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: LIFE LIAR FROM HELL
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Reincarnation, Time Travel, Romance, Drama

name: BIBLIOMANIA
description:
Alice had woken up in Room 431 of a mysterious manor.  
  
"You must not leave this room," warned the Serpent, but she paid it no heed and her body began to rot…  
  
Will she be able to escape the cursed manor?  
  
*Was nominated for the [2019 Japan Media Arts Festival Awards - Manga Category](http://archive.j-mediaarts.jp/en/festival/2019/manga/).*
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Saezuru Tori wa Habatakanai
description: Yashiro is the young leader of Shinseikai and the president of the Shinseikai Enterprise, but like so many powerful men, he leads a double life as a deviant and a masochist. Chikara Doumeki comes to work as a bodyguard for him and, although Yashiro had decided that he would never lay a hand on his own men, he finds there's something about Doumeki that he can't resist. Yashiro makes advances toward Doumeki, but Doumeki has mysterious reasons for denying. Yashiro, who abuses his power just to abuse himself, and Doumeki, who faithfully obeys his every command, begin the tumultuous affair of two men with songs in their hearts and no wings to fly.
tags: Action, Psychological, Romance, Boys' Love, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Drama, Tragedy

name: Dokuro wo Sakase!！
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Slice of Life

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V
description:
Yu☆Gi☆Oh! Arc-V centers around Yuuya Sakaki, a mysterious Entertainment Duelist known as "The Phantom" along with his three other personalities: Yuuto, Yuugo, and Yuuri. He was chased after by Leo Corporation for hacking into their Solid Vision with mass system and used it for his own purpose.  
  
While on the run, he meets Yuzu Hiiragi, the daughter of the principal of Syu Zo Duel School that was on the verge of bankruptcy and tricked Yuuya into a contract to become a teacher at her school. However, before Yuuya could teach at the school, he first must find a card called Genesis Omega Dragon that said will determine the fate of the world that also connected to his scattered memories.  
  
The story is set in alternate version of Miami City where Leo Corporation, run by its president Reiji Akaba, dominates most of Solid Vision system throughout the city. The spread of the company's Solid Vision with mass not only gave birth to "Action Duels" but also help improving the city in saving lives and repair damage in case of disaster, becoming a vital part of people's life.
tags: Action, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: From Villainess to Healer: I Know the Cheat to Change My Fate
description:
In the world of “Reas Love,” a spinoff otome game, the villainess Charlotte Cocoriara’s engagement to the prince of Farblume Kingdom is suddenly broken off. The reason? The Prince finds her job as Dark Mage ill-suited for his future queen. He’d rather be with a Healer, and there is no such thing as a job change. But Charlotte has a secret...memories of her past life playing “Reas Life Online,” the original MMORPG! Armed with her cheat knowledge, Charlotte immediately takes off to the Sacred Land of Erenzi where she uses information no one else in “Reas Love” knows to change her job—to a Healer! Except she has no intention of going back to the Prince. What she really wants is to see the world and live a life full of adventure!

(Source: J-Novel Club)
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu
description:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
tags: Animals, Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Jupiteria
description:
The year is 2150, and humanity has entered the Space Age of Exploration. The largest planet in the solar system, Jupiter, in particular is a treasure trove of natural resources. Seeking those resources, humanity has built up numerous biospheres in its vicinity.

Those who are born in zero gravity in the Jupiter Zone are known as "Jupiterians". Rico Alberoni is one such person. He lives on Callisto, Jupiter's fourth moon. For him each day was a torment — bullied at school for his peculiar Jupiterian constitution and poked and prodded like a guinea pig at the lab.

Until one day he met a man who makes his living recovering wrecked spaceships, a "salvager" named Reiji...

This is a story about a boy who couldn't seize today cutting his own path into the unknowable tomorrow. This is an outer space frontier tale for a new generation!
tags: Sci-Fi, Adventure, Mystery

name: Jumidoro
description: In the Colosseum, there was a gladiator girl known as the **Unbeaten Sword** — Ramune. Bought as a slave, Ramune unexpectedly found freedom after a carriage accident. The girl, now free, sets off to see the world, learn, and experience the kindness of others as she lives on. However, Ramune doesn't know what "normal" is. She has never been taught not to slay people, or that killing is wrong...
tags: Action, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal
description: The series is set in the near future. Something unexpected happens as Ryoga Kamishiro challenges Yuma Tsukumo to a Duel. When the mysterious entity Astral appears before them, a new legend begins.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural

name: Oh! My Hubby
description:
Dohwa, Hanyang's best gisaeng, abandons the life of a gisaeng and tries to run away at night with her beloved man. But it was betrayal that came back!
'Why did you...?'
Without knowing why, Dohwa, who was murdered by his hand, fell into the cold water...
But when she opened her eyes, she had become a different person?!
"Madam, have I become a madam?"'
Hong Seo-hye, the main character of a romantic story that made a stir a in the whole city!
"Oh, my God. Oh, my God. I can't believe I'm a high-class lady.'
For a moment, I thought, "Let's get rid of the lowly gisaeng bitch and be loved by handsome husband."
What? Is this couple different from the rumors?
Where are all the stories of your romantic relationship that shook the city, and how come it's so cold?
All right, I don't know what happened, but... I, Dohwa, was the best gisaeng in the world. I'll seduce my husband first!
tags: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Dressmaker
description:
What better way to welcome in the new year than with a new dress?

---

Published in December 2024's Aokishi 23B.
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Magic, Fantasy

name: Mr. Clice
description:
Jin Clice is a super dashing spy, special agent for Japan's elite espionage program, whose body was mortally wounded by the KGB. 
Having already invested a lot of money in him, the agency would not allow him to die so easily though. Desperately trying to save his life, 
the government transferred his mind into the body of a recently deceased tennis player which happens to be a young beautiful woman! 
The dashing ladies man has, in essence, gone from being Bond to being the Bond girl!
tags: Genderswap, Action, Comedy, Survival, Mafia, Adventure, Military, Medical

name: Azur Lane The Animation: Vacation
description: Spin-off of "Azur Lane The Animation" that's focused on Zuikaku and Eugen on a deserted island. There, they also encountered some KAN-SEN from the opposite factions, Azur Lane.
tags: Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Military, Adaptation

name: Boku no Risou no Isekai Seikatsu ~Tensei shitara Kemomimi Musume darake no Sekai de Harem ni~
description:
A 40-year-old virgin man working for a black company has never been with a girl, let alone married one. Having nothing to do but love cute girls, one day he loses consciousness during an all-nighter of work――. When he wakes up...he finds himself reborn as "Norun," a male with cat ears, in another world full of animal-eared girls, where there are far more females than males!!!? His cute fiancée, Misha, and other attractive girls with animal-ears who are potential brides appear before him one after the other――!?

Thus begins "Norun's" dream-filled otherworldly life ♪ However, this world has a big secret......!? He can procreate with cute girls as much as he wants!!? The slow sex life in another world, which has become a big hit in the doujinshi scene and has been downloaded more than 300,000 times, is about to begin――!!!!!
tags: Loli, Romance, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota

name: Doryung's Family
description: They argue when they meet, but miss each other when they don't. Family dynamics never seem to end. There is love, but also tears. Every family member has their own story. This is the journey of the youngest, Doryung, along with his family, who have a million stories to tell!
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Tonari no Stella
description: Chiaki and Subaru have been the closest since they were kids. Chiaki has always liked him but as Subaru walks further into the world of entertainment, Chiaki decides the time has come to move past her one-sided feelings and find new love. Does she have enough resolve to meet someone better, or will she find herself shaken by her long-time love? A close, yet distant love story between a normal girl and her actor childhood friend!
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: DOOOOM!
description: “Look and you’ll die.” “Post a message and you’ll be cursed.” Horror begins to spread with the use of smartphones. Introducing a new series filled with mystery about the horrors of social media!
tags: Psychological, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Touhou - Canni-Can (Doujinshi)
description: While Rumia eats her monthly rations, she finds a ring in it that seems to possess a will.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Doujinshi, Drama

name: A Returner's Magic Should Be Special
description:
"Now that I'm back, I won't allow my loved ones to die again!"  
  
The Shadow Labyrinth - the deadliest catastrophe humanity has ever known.  
Desir Arman, one of the six remaining survivors of mankind, is inside the Labyrinth. The six of them attempt to clear the final level of the Labyrinth but ultimately fail, and the world comes to an end.  
However, when Desir thought he would meet his demise, what appears before him is the world… thirteen years ago?!  
  
Desir is returned to the past, back to the time when he enrolled at the nation's finest magic academy, Havrion. He is reunited with his precious friends, and he is determined to change the past to save the world and his loved ones…!  
  
Three years remain before the emergence of the Shadow World!  
Change the past and gather powerful comrades to save mankind!

---

tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Shigatsu Tsuitachi no Ame
description:
The story centers around Yui, a high school boy who often goes with the flow of those around him, which typically ends up with him going along with things he doesn't agree with.  In these situations, he is fed up with his inability to do anything but say no. 

On the other hand, there's his eccentric classmate Haru, who is completely unable to read between the lines. Then, a certain incident leads Yui to lash out at Haru, "Read the room! Do you know what it means to ’play along'? That's how you create good relationships with people," to which Haru responds, "How meaningless."
tags: Drama, School Life, Delinquents

name: Go Forward With the Rebels
description: In a world where energy is exhausted and resources are scarce, most of the world's resources are occupied by a few people. Slowly, an upper-level supernatural world called "Mirage" is established.
tags: Sci-Fi, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Tasogare no Hito
description: One summer day, a boy named Tatsuomi Shiba arrives in the town where Riko, an eighth grader, lives. His family, who are related to the chairman of a major corporation, are welcomed by the townspeople, but Tatsuomi keeps his distance from everyone around him. Riko, who cannot leave him alone, makes memories of their summer together, and on his birthday, she promises Tatsuomi a gift and a promise. However, their happy days come to an end with the end of summer. Who is the person I fell in love with for the first time?
tags: Drama, Mystery

name: Seeking a Beauty in the East Sea
description:
In a past life, the mountain deity took in a quiet child, only to find her care fostering an unexpected twist: the little one didn't want to be a servant but instead aspired to be the deity's most intimate companion! But fate played its cruel hand, turning the once inseparable pair into bitter enemies.

In this life, an adorable, water-fearing mermaid happens upon an aloof beauty with no memories of her past. A chance kiss during their first meeting sets off a chaotic companionship. However, what seemed to be a serendipitous meeting turns out to be a reunion of a relationship already rich with deep-seated emotions...

From lifetimes past to the present, love flourishes...
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: One Day, Suddenly, Seoul Is
description:
"You’re its prey the moment you touch it." 

One day, a terrible virus variant attacks Seoul! 

Yeon-woo is on a school trip to Seoul, and is excited thinking that he can finally get along with his one classmate, So-yeon, whom he has a crush on.

However, during this time, unidentified cells appeared in front of Yeon-woo’s class, who were sightseeing in Seoul. The mutant cells manifestation quickly turns Yeon-woo and his classmates’ school trip into hell as anyone who comes into contact with the cells will become a hideous monster that wants to consume anything with flesh...! 

Will Yeon-woo be able to leave Seoul safely?
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Drama, Horror, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Gakuen Sensuikan-tai: Mermaid Girls
description: In the manga's story, extra-terrestrial life known as Trench Walkers reveal themselves, emerging from the Antarctic, and walking on the sea floor. Their goal is to terraform the Earth to their liking, which involves raising the sea level by 70 meters, thus rendering Tokyo and many other population centers uninhabitable. They have also begun to change Earth's surface water into what they call Nectar, the "divine water." Those who are incompatible with Nectar have a high chance of death when imbibing it. However, there are girls who are found to be compatible with Nectar, and they are recruited to be marines in a fight against the Trench Walkers, boarding ships to do battle in a new deep sea front line. The story centers on Hiro Todoroki, who receives a message from an older sister, a marine supposedly missing in action. The message tells Hiro to find a formidable marine named Kiriri Tsunoba. Though lost and confused, Hiro heads to the Masakado Girls Academy Submarine Unit with the intent to join them.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Military, Gore, Aliens

name: Koe no Katachi
description:
The story revolves around Nishimiya Shouko, a grade school student who has impaired hearing. She transfers into a new school, where she is bullied by her classmates, especially Ishida Shouya. It gets to the point where she transfers to another school and as a result, Shouya is ostracized and bullied himself, with no friends to speak of and no plans for the future. Years later, he sets himself on a path to redemption.  

---

Note: Won the 19th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Award New Artist Prize in 2015 and the Ogaki City Cultural Alliance Award (Lifestyle Culture Division). Nominated for the category "Best U.S. Edition of International Material" in the 2016 Eisner Awards.
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Drama, School Life

name: Shu yo, Omukae no Jikan desu
description:
Is my adorable little nephew the reincarnation of the demon king Lucifer?!"

Chris, a picture book author, takes in his nephew after the loss of his brother and sister-in-law during an accident. Noah is a strange and eccentric child with the ability to communicate with animals. One morning, overwhelmed with his new parental situation, Noah jumps into the road?! However, the person who saved Noah before it was too late was Harvey-sensei, the nursery school teacher, a demon with black wings and horns!! Revealing his true identity, the demon kneels down saying, “I have come to take you back, Lucifer-sama.”, announcing that Noah is the reincarnation of the demon king?!
tags: Boys' Love, Fantasy

name: Whistle!
description: Everybody has a dream, and for Shou Kazamatsuri, that dream is simple: he wants to be the best soccer player he can possibly be. He's the spirited leader of the Josui Junior High team and everyone looks up to him. In turn, he tries to keep the team together at any cost!
tags: Comedy, Sports, School Life

name: Yugetatsuran
description: Top salesman by day, number one host by night. In the world of "eat or be eaten," "win or lose," Udai Sasaki had everything he wanted, including money and love - he was burnt out. Until one day he came across a "hot spring review". A strange master-disciple travelogue of hot spring baths that will warm your heart and body!
tags: Slice of Life

name: Miki no Houkago
description:
A pure-hearted girl(?)'s first love story.  
One day after school, Itsuki sees a beautiful girl coming out of the men's toilet.  
Her true identity is that of Miki, a plain and quiet classmate, crossdressing.  
Since then, Itsuki has been taking care of Miki, but then, another crossdressing girl appears…!
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Haha o Suteru
description: My mother, who raised me and my sister on her own, is diagnosed with terminal cancer. Now I, her son, take time off college to look after her, and when my mother passes away, I must make a decision.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, School Life, Tragedy

name: Until I Become Me
description:
A boy who used to be abusive to girls wakes up one day as one.

"I'll go back being a boy soon," he thought, however that was not the case. 
Follow Akira as he grows and learns little by little to accept the puzzling changings in her surroundings and her heart.
tags: Genderswap, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Touhou - Little Devil (Doujinshi)
description: A Story about Koakuma, Little devil. She pick up a Furball, and try to raise it as a pet. Patchy caught her and apparently this is not the first time. Koakuma already have some pets. Still who would think this furball will cause a problem in the near future. (No Yuri in this doujinshi)
tags: Action, Doujinshi, Fantasy

name: Touhou - Touhou Christmas Eve (Doujinshi)
description: Marisa comes for a Christmas Eve sleepover (with an uninvited stowaway along) and introduces Reimu to the concept, who is pretty quick to get in to the real meaning of the holiday.
tags: Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Drama

name: Super Cub
description:
In early summer, 2nd year of high school, Koguma's mom suddenly abandons her, leaving only a note that says "Bye." She is alone, having no parents, no friends, no hobbies. She silently reflects, "I don't have anything." But a chance encounter results in her buying a Honda Super Cub with a disturbing history, and a new life suddenly blossoms open.  
  
Based on the [light novel series with the same name](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Super_Cub_(novel_series)).
tags: School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Fight Class 3
description:
A world in which Korea is the global capital of combat sports. At Nam-Il High School where the best and most talented students of martial arts reside, Jiu Ji-Tae suddenly finds himself thrust into their midst despite being a total weakling.  
  
By neutralizing his physical shortcomings through jiu-jitsu, can he rise to the top of the fight classes?  


---
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Touhou - Akizakura (Doujinshi)
description: A flower has bloom out of season at Hakugyokuro. Furthermore it is under Saigyou Ayakashi tree. Is it just a simple flower? or there is more to it?

name: Touhou - Love and Peace (Doujinshi)
description: A dark interpretation of Byakuren and the UFO crew.

name: Touhou - Bamboo Shoots (Doujinshi)
description: It all start from Yuyuko wanting to eat some bamboo shoot. Because of this, Youmu went to Eintei to get some. But Youmu and Reisen end up in battle.

description: Lazy mansion-owner Remilia gets punished for her sloth, but eventually comes to an unexpected “partnership”.
tags: Oneshot, Doujinshi, Slice of Life

name: Touhou - Mamange (Doujinshi)
description:
In this beloved Touhou doujin web-comic, combining "Mama" and "Udonge" in the title, we follow the lives and daily struggles of Reisen Udongein Inaba raising her three children Kaguya, Eirin and Tewi.  
  
The series ran from 2010-2014 and concluded after 14 chapters, plus a few spin-offs and standalone doujin books.  
The first chapter of the sequel series "Mamange Eternal" was also released in 2014, but it was put on hold for 5 years until its ultimate reboot in 2019.  
  
English translation by Danbooru : <https://danbooru.donmai.us/pools/1368>
tags: Comedy, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

description: Ongoing Touhou manga from nva222 published in the official Strange Creators of Outer World magazine.

name: Touhou - Utagai (Doujinshi)
description: The events of Symposium of Post-mysticism with a twist.

description: A Flandre x Remilia doujin.

description: A Chinese fantasy story about a princess founding a nation 👸⚔️.

name: Touhou - Ika ni Shite Kanojo wo Sono Heya e Maneku ni Itatta ka (Doujinshi)
description: Sakuya is understandably upset when a black-white mouse starts pilfering stuff from the SDM. What she doesn’t expect is a reflection on loneliness and one’s relationships.
tags: Oneshot, Action, Magic, Doujinshi, Drama

name: Touhou - Jungle Patche-san (Doujinshi)
tags: Oneshot, Action, Comedy, Doujinshi, Fantasy

name: Touhou Shinigami: Meteor Methuselah Gaiden
description:
From Inconnu:  
Zol, a bounty hunter who goes by the name of "Grim Reaper", spends his days chasing criminals under the orders of Fuse, his master and the city's respected major.  
One day, Zol takes up responsibility for burying a man who died in a hit-and-run on the streets. But much to his surprise, the supposedly dead man pops out of the coffin!! Is this the world's most wanted man, Methuselah?!  
This is the adventure-packed miniseries of the fateful encounter between the Methuselah named Rain and Zol the Grim Reaper, who is the grandfather of Immortal Rain's heroine Machika!!
tags: Oneshot, Action, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: Gakuen Babysitters
description: After their parents are killed in a plane crash, Ryuuichi and his younger brother Kotarou are taken in by the chairman, who they never met before, of an elite academy. Ryuuichi becomes the school daycare's new babysitter.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: The Symbiotic Relationship Between a Newbie and an Oldbie
description:
Kwon Jungwoo is a player of the Tamer Class in the MMORPG game 'The Hymn of Karel'. After failing to receive the class buffs he’s been waiting eternally for, Kwon Jungwoo decides to abandon his last remaining hope for the game. And then, he coincidently meets 'ChaRongRong', a newbie player, while offloading his high value items at the auction market. Since he was going to quit the game away,  and with the intention of just helping out a newer player,  he light-heartedly initiated a harmless friendship that… 

[Party] ChaRongRong: Bcuz of how far Ive come
[Party] ChaRongRong: Even if a sick melee asks me to party up
[Party] ChaRongRong: I wont abandon you, Hyung
[Party] Mocha: What an honor lolol
[Party] Mocha: but if a kickass melee asks to you party up, just do it
[Party] Mocha: itll be easier… 

Jungwoo should definitely not let Cha Rong Rong's words go as if they were just coquetry but..
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Video Games, Drama, School Life, Web Comic

name: Given: 10th Mix
description:
I've traveled 3650 dawns to see you again.

The sequel to Kizu Natsuki's mega hit alternative love series begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Soul Fire
description:
The Office of Nuo is the government’s secret department that protects humans from the misfortunes and complications brought on by evil spirits. 
Yoon Taehee is a Naja who happens to be an agent in the Office of Nuo. Wanting to recruit a successor, he seeks out those with the ability to see and hear spirits. One day, while out on an undercover mission, Yoon Taehee ends up meeting a suspicious student at a high school in the outskirts of a small city in the countryside… “So, friend, how old are you?” 

TL/N: Korean equivalent of someone who practices Nuo Folk Religion. Under Korean traditions, the religion revolved around exorcism and banishment of evil spirits.
tags: Action, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Love Letter Lyrics
description:
Novice lyricist Baek Jiseok enters A&R Co. through a recommendation from his college senior and is assigned to compose the lyrics of a new song for renowned singer Cha Doyoon. However, his lyrics are stolen, and he finds himself on the brink of a lawsuit. 
The person who extends a helping hand in this situation to the desperate Jiseok is none other than Cha Doyoon?!
"Why are you helping me?"
Will Jiseok be able to pen his lyrics successfully even as he cohabitates with the unfathomable Doyoon?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama

name: He Hasn't Faded
description:
Luyi, an actor known for his acting prowess, and Gu Jiangyuan, a rising star, are well-known for their rivalry in the entertainment industry. After dying in an accident, Luyi is resurrected into a different body, only to find out that his old archenemy, Gu Jiangyuan, has had a crush on him for many years... 
While having his enemy become his lover is one thing, what's with the baffling ghost exorcism missions, as well as Gu Jiangyuan wanting and trying to get rid of the present-him just to bring back the original "Luyi"?!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Making a Wish to Santa
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Office Workers, Girls' Love, Slice of Life

name: Tezmo Syndrome
description:
A story about Funa Minami, an eccentric girl who loves model railroading, and Mari, an ordinary girl, who together explore the world of modelling through nostalgic products from the early days of the hobby.
(Adapted description from Volume 1)
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Grashros
description:
A story set 30,000 years ago, starring the Cro-Magnon, by the duo behind Kami-sama no Iu Toori.  
  
The story follows Akuu, the Cursed Child, born during the night of a blood moon, said to bring calamity upon all and his attempt to fight destiny.
tags: Historical, Action, Animals, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Tragedy

name: Ninja Chronicles: The Legend of Kagemaru
description:
A historical manga that depicts people who defy fate and live by faith in a world of war.

(from MangaUpdates):

The classic, long ninja saga. Many intertwined themes and many characters. It is a series that is as well a traditional samurai tale as an attempt of Shirato to uncover the role of revolting peasants in feudal Japan. 

It was adapted into a film by Nagisa Oshima in 1966.

Kagemaru is a fictional samurai, the hero of the story, aiding the peasants in their struggle for life. Nobunaga Oda, the historical 16th century warlord is his opponent.
tags: Historical, Action, Ninja, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Military, Drama, Tragedy

name: The Insipid Prince's Furtive Grab for the Throne
description:
The Adresia empire on the Vogel continent. There is a battle over the throne of such an empire that possesses powerful military and vast territory. With the successor undecided, the children of the emperor are vying to expand their power. However, there was one prince that everyone says will definitely not become the emperor. The seventh prince, Arnold Lakes Adler. The young man who was inferior to his younger twin brother in every way, the dull prince.

Incompetent and lethargic, Arnold wastes everyday just playing around. However, behind the scenes, he is one of the only five SS-Class adventurers called 'Silver'. Seeing the intensifying battle for the throne he decided "I don't want to die so let’s have my little brother become the emperor..."
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Imokusa Reijou desu ga Akuyaku Reisoku wo Tasuketara Kiniiraremashita
description:
Agnes, who was ridiculed in the social circles for being an unfashionable noble, happened to help Nazelbert, the duke's son, who had been betrothed to the Princess. However, the Princess saw this and ordered Nazelbert to marry Agnes as punishment. Isn't it terrible to marry me as a punishment? Look, he seems to hate it too. Wait, he doesn't?

This is a story about an unfashionable noble and a duke's son, who grow closer to each other.

---
* [Orignal Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n2047go/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Magic, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon? II
description: Adventurer Bell Cranell's life changed forever when he met the goddess Hestia, becoming the first member of her familia. Since then, he’s gone on many adventures, growing much stronger in the process. But when he steps foot into Orario’s pleasure quarter, where Ishtar Familia reigns supreme, he soon finds himself in way over his head... With enemies all around him, he’ll need the help of a beautiful, fox-eared courtesan if he’s to have any hope of making it back home!
tags: Monsters, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Martial Arts, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: The Villainess Refuses to Flirt With the Male Lead
description:
Transmigrating as the villainess of a cliché imperial manhua isn't scary, what's scary is that the male leads are all children! Not only do I have to take care of children, but I'm also being courted by one of them and being called "wife"! Ms. Hong would like to say: "Fuck you, god!" 凸(｀⌒´メ)凸

Official Translations:
[Korean](https://page.kakao.com/content/59080258)
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Villainess, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Pet (Miyake Ranjyo)
description: The story revolves around people who possess the ability to infiltrate human minds and manipulate memories. Their powers have been used in the underworld for covering up accidents, assassinations, and all manner of crimes. But these powers not only destroy others' spirits, but also corrupt the users' own hearts…
tags: Psychological, Drama, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Shounen no Hatsukoi wa Bishoujo ♂ deshita
description: Tougo Ushiwaka reunites with his childhood friend and first love Ren Ryuugasaki after about 10 years. However, Ushiwaka had been traumatized to discover that Ryuugasaki, who he had thought was a girl, is actually a guy with a fondness for cross-dressing.
tags: Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life, Web Comic

name: A Divorced Evil Lady Bakes Cakes
description: I had been working hard as the Duchess for nine years, supporting my quiet and indifferent husband, but all I was left with was contempt, indifference, and accusal of having a love affair. So when he finally asked for a divorce to marry his long-time lover... “There’s a limit to what I can endure for this marriage. No matter how much you cry or plead to the Emperor, I can’t stand it anymore.” “Can I sign here?” “So if you pretend to be poor like last time, this time… what? I waved divorce papers on an indifferent day. “I’m done. Can I go now?” “Oh, since we both had lovers, of course, I won’t be receiving alimony, but you’ll surely return my dowry, right?” “What are you gonna do with that little money?”, asked my husband, who had not cared what he had done for the past nine years. I laughed confidently and answered: “I’m going to open a dessert cafe.”
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Cooking, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Danzai sareta Dame Ouji, Hiroimashita
description:
Kuruhi, first prince of Gahama Kingdom, is the epitome of a spoiled brat with his arrogant attitude and behavior. After countless misdeeds, he is finally banished from the royal family and reduced to a commoner!

The wandering, mud-covered former prince finds himself at an inn run by Emma, a girl who has a severe obsession with royalty drama. Emma is bewildered by the sudden appearance of her "Oshi", and determined to get him back on his feet, she embarks on a grand project!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Villainess

name: High School Runway
description: Although Haruka admires fashion, she is nicknamed “Ghost Haruka-san” because of her tall stature. She starts practicing makeup with Haru-chan, whom she met online, but it seems like Haru-chan has some kind of secret…!!?
tags: Oneshot, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life, Web Comic

name: Girls und Panzer - The Ribboned Warrior
description: Tankathlon is a new form of tank sport gaining slowly gaining popularity among Senshado enthusiasts. While also involving tank battles, Tankathlon is distinguished by its lack of official oversight allowing any school with tanks to participate in a battle anywhere at any time, and a 10-ton weight restriction on tanks used, limiting battles to light tanks and tankettes.
tags: Action, Survival, Sports, Adventure, Military

name: Koi Hajime wa Ochi Yuku Tsubaki no Shita de
description: Haruichi Azuma lost his parents in an accident and was left on his own. He was treated coldly and betrayed by the relatives who took him in. One day, an old friend of his father's invites him to his house to “take care of his daughter. However, what awaits him is Tsubaki, the second daughter of the Yaotome family, who is selfish and arrogant. He is fed up with this type of person, but like Haruichi, Tsubaki also has loneliness in her eyes.
tags: Historical, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Toaru Tenin to Kyaku no Hanashi
description: Saki, a college student working at an izakaya, has a crush on Shiraishi, an office worker who is a regular customer. Be brave for your first love today! I gave him a love letter and… Shiraishi also has no experience in love?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Save Me
description: Hyeongoh, the first place student at school, is disabled and has a knack for getting ridiculed by the school's bullies. With no help and no way out, he finds himself in a despairing situation…until someone appears to stand by his side!
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Seven Years Later
description: Kala Maharani is an ordinary girl who’s always restrained by her father. One day, she chose to run away from home to celebrate the new year 2014 in Bali. But who would have thought that she drowned in the sea and was saved by her friend who told her seven years have passed. What will happen? What about her family and friends? Can she go back to her original timeline?
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Rosen Blood
description: After the carriage she had embarked upon crashed, Stella is saved by a tall dark and handsome stranger and brought to the mysterious mansion surrounded by poisonous roses in which he lives with three other gorgeous men. However, with no money left, Stella is forced to work as a maid which will prove dangerous for her because she is yet to find out that all four men are actually vampires!
tags: Romance, Reverse Harem, Fantasy, Vampires, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: My Younger Brother's Friend
description:
Ga-eun is a junior in college who lives with her younger brother, a senior in high school. Ever since their parents' death, she has tried to stay strong and confident amidst juggling school and raising her brother. And after getting dumped by her boyfriend, dating is the last thing on her mind... until she gets involved with three of her brother’s friends. Which one will she choose? The cheeky, handsome childhood friend Dowan? The calm, collected, and responsible class president Sangu? Or the quiet and intimidating but kind-hearted Jun?

---
