* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/6561/)
* [French / Français](http://www.verytoon.com/serie/l-armure-et-la-couronne/)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/Kaisar-dan-Kesatria-Wanita/230)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/14567)
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Scarlet Star
description:
In New Pantheon City, monstrous "Voids" have plagued the people for over 500 years. 

However, they are not without their protectors - Immortal Magical guardians are also there to fight back against them.

Living in New Pantheon City is Mars Hino - a troubled outcast. Because of his reputation, vulgar personality, and lack of social finesse, he has found himself entering high school alone.

That is before he meets the hero of the Blunbell district, the magical girl Scarlet Star - who chooses him for a higher duty
tags: Genderswap, Action, Romance, Comedy, Superhero, Magical Girls, Self-Published, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Tokoshie × Bullet - Shin Minato Koubou-sen
description: In this story, unidentified giant weapons will destroy the world's metropolises in 2029. The masterminds of this unprecedented destruction are known as "Tokoshie". They call themselves weapons when they go out on the streets of the cities with their overwhelming powers and disappear as soon as they are done with them. A decade has passed since then. A certain military company is developing a combat drone with the ability to fight the Tokoshie, and a certain millionaire figure goes underground to discover the secret of the Tokoshie's eternal life. Another specific girl goes on a journey to fight the Tokoshie, sworn in as her parents' enemies. In short, this is the chronicle of an endless struggle between humanity and its greatest enemy ever.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Drama

name: My Wife is the Student Council President!
description: The story begins with Izumi Hayato running to be student body president. But when a beautiful girl swings in promising the liberalization of love while flinging condoms into the audience, he ends up losing to her and becoming the vice president. At the student council meeting, the newly-elected president invites herself over to Izumi's house, where she promptly announces she is to become Izumi's wife thanks to an agreement -facilitated by alcohol- made between their parents when they were only three.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: A Dog Lives in the Imperial Palace Garden
description: The Devon family sits on a mountain of debt and they are on the brink of bankruptcy. This is no fault of hers of course, but Courtney Devon has always been the one painted as the villain in her family. However, the family is in dire straits and they have to do something, anything, to raise some money and get out of this situation. But then one day, news arrives from the Imperial Palace that His Royal Highness the crown prince has decided to make Courtney the crown princess. Seemingly a typical prince on the outside, His Royal Highness is actually quite a troublemaker with a dark side. Will this arrangement end up solving Courtney Devon’s problems or just complicating things further? Will a love against all odds bloom or will someone end up in the doghouse...?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Miss Time
description:
Gold Miss* Lee Gaon made a successful career as a personal trainer and is in a rival-like relationship against the famous romance novelist, Jiho, famous for his notorious badmouthing.  
  
Gaon went to her frenemy Sera's wedding ceremony and somehow ended up helping her escape. And her groom? It was Jiho, the man who slung towards her mouthfuls of criticisms and insults one after another.  
  
They realize they were from the same highschool class…  
  
While Jiho was on his way to meet Gaon, the two were transported twelve years into the past…  
  
"That soft boy was that badass delinquent in highschool?! And he liked me as well?!  
  
**Gold Miss in South Korea is an unmarried woman with high socioeconomic status and level of education.*  
  
Raw: [Naver](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.nhn?productNo=5014489), [Kakao](https://page.kakao.com/home/56142110), [Lezhin](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/miss_time), [Yes24](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/93171916), [Bomtoon](https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/Miss_time), [RidiBooks](https://ridibooks.com/books/1515013478), [MrBlue](https://www.mrblue.com/webtoon/wt_misstime_wz), [BookCube](https://www.bookcube.com/toon/detail.asp?webtoon_num=200131)  
Official English:  ["Miss Time" on the Comico App](https://www.comico.io/pocket-comics)
tags: Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Wan Gu Shen WangImmortal God King
description: The past life died because of the imperial concubine, and he was born again in the high school era. It coincides with the recovery of the aura and the great changes in the world. When rejuvenating a teenager, he will follow the path of his journey, and he will protect his own friends. Loved ones. When he does not choose to stay, he will push him all the way.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Hakkenden: Touhou Hakken Ibun
description:
Five years ago, all but one of the inhabitants of Ootsuka village perished due to the plague… but the lone survivor wished only to follow her two dear friends to the grave.   
  
To prevent the death of the people who were like family to him, one of the dying boys used his last remaining breath to agree to a proposal put to him by a mysterious fair-haired man. Miraculously restored to health, the trio have since sought refuge in a church near the adjoining village.   
  
Eventually, the Imperial Church begins to express its interest in possessing "Murasame", the demon blade rumored to contain life… but what connection does this legendary sword have with the three survivors of that devastating epidemic?
tags: Action, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Unhuman
description:
It's divided to three arcs:  
Arc 1: Unhuman (不是人)  
Arc 2: Me Lowly Woman (賤妾)  
Arc 3: The Final Keystone (終礎)
tags: Historical, Action, Drama, Tragedy

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Koritsu-hen
description:
Late April 2097—the use of strategic-class spells doesn’t stop with the Brazilian military, as the Great Asian Alliance deploy Thunderclap Tower in the Gulf of Guinea. Magic fans the flames of war, which soon engulf the entire world. As public opinion inevitably turns against magicians as a whole, Edward Clark, a researcher of the USNA, proposes an expansive space development endeavor called the Dione Project to promote the peaceful use of magic. Taurus Silver’s name appears on the list of chosen candidates, which leads to people uncovering the truth—that this is in fact Tatsuya, throwing him and Miyuki into yet another trial.

Adaption of Light Novel 23.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Strikeout Pitch
description:
The Souha Public High School Baseball Team is one step away from the pinnacle that is the Summer Koushien. They only need a star pitcher to have a chance. Could the Baseball Club Slasher, the powerful pitcher who appears every night and terrorizes other players, be their guy? There's only 1 problem: he can only pitch 3 full-power balls a day!

A baseball story unlike anything you've ever read before!!
tags: Psychological, Comedy, Sports

name: Kimi ga Bokura wo Akuma to Yonda Koro
description: Yusuke Saito is a normal high school kid...well, normal enough, though there's six months missing out of his memory. But when he starts to get confronted by people who insist they're from his past, who allege that he did horrible things to them...suddenly Yusuke realizes that those missing six months may be crucial to remember. Otherwise, the skeletons in his closet may just make him a skeleton, too...
tags: Psychological, Drama, School Life, Mystery

name: Arte
description:
Firenze, early 16th century. The birthplace of the Renaissance era, where art is thriving. 
In one small corner of this vast city, one sheltered girl's journey begins. 
She dreams of becoming an artist, an impossible career for a girl born into a noble family. 
In those days, art was an exclusively male profession, with woman facing strong discrimination. 
In spite of these challenges, Arte perseveres with hard work and a positive attitude!
tags: Historical, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Maou Reijou no Shikkousha
description:
"From now on, you will become the butler of the Demon King’s Castle and live for me!"

Ryuto, a young boy who was summoned to another world, but was abandoned due to his incompetence. The one who took his hand was the Demon King’s only daughter, Lurunoa. 

That encounter turns everything upside down. 

Three demon princesses with great hidden powers and secrets. When the mysteries of the continent are revealed, the boy becomes the world’s trump card!
tags: Demons, Romance, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: Girl Crush
description:
Momose Tenka is a first year high school student who can sing, dance, and has a killer body. She's good at everything… except love. She meets a K-pop obsessed girl named Satou Erian, and is dazzled by her earnest nature.  
  
This is the story of two young girls dreaming of becoming K-pop idols! A heart-throbbing story about pure love!  
  
*Serialized in [LINE Manga](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0000965) (by Line Digital Frontier) and [Comic Nicola](https://ebook.shinchosha.co.jp/book/F914001/) (by Shinchosha),
follow latest news & updates at the [Official Twitter Account](https://twitter.com/girlcrush_comic)*

NB: The LINE link is not broken, but Region Locked.
tags: Romance, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Music

name: Touhou - Gensoukyou no Umi (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Adventure, Doujinshi, Fantasy

name: Pizzicato no Nemuru Mori
description: Emilie has lived a sheltered life. Longing for a life like the protagonist in her beloved novel who shares the same name, Emilie leaves home on her own and travels to the villa inherited from her great-great-grandfather on Hazama Hill. There, she finds a sleeping backpacker named Shura and many mysterious creatures!
tags: Romance, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Hanarenaiyo
description: A oneshot published in the February 2025 issue of Yuri Hime.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Ghosts, Girls' Love, Horror, Supernatural

name: Moto Ansatsusha, Tensei Shite Kizoku no Reijou ni Narimashita
description:
The story is about Serena, a former assassin who was reincarnated as a duke's daughter after failing her mission. She initially thought that pretending to be a noble would be easy, but she struggled with the gap in perception between herself and her mother, who had a flighty personality, and her adoptive sister, who deceived those around her in an attempt to push Serena out of the picture.

Despite skillfully dodging the harassment she faced at the tea parties full of rivalry and navigating the complex social life of a school embroiled in love and hate, Serena's cold demeanor resulted in her being ostracized and isolated. One day, she discovers that her adoptive sister is engaged to the second prince, which leads her to run away from home. However, it is at this point that the first prince, Evan, appears in front of her...

Follow Serena, a former assassin who knows nothing of love, as she charges forward into the aristocratic society of another world in this comedic, occasionally romantic tale.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Salaryman Exorcist - Okumura Yukio no Aishuu
description: A spin-off of Ao no Exorcist, following Okumura Yukio as the main protoganist.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Digimon Universe: Appli Monsters
description:
Everyone in the world uses smartphone apps. But inside them lurks unknown creatures called "Appli Monsters," or "Appmon." The Appmon are AI lifeforms with the ability to think and act, and exist in the boundary between the human world and digital space to allow people and the system to interface and function. But in the vast sea of the internet, the "last boss AI" Leviathan takes control of the Appmon with a virus and begins hacking every system, thus starting to control the human world from the world of the net.  
  
The protagonist, Haru Shinkai, is led to acquire the Appli Drive, and uses it to materialize Gacchimon, a search app monster. What is the secret hidden within the Appli Drive? What is the mysterious field that exists between net world where the Appmon exist, and the real world? What is the "App Combine" that can combine two Appmons? What is Leviathan's true goal?
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Goshujinsama no Shikabane
description: A maid-like spirit, “Step Girl,” who repeats distorted service and puts people at risk. There is only one way to annihilate them: "The master accepts his service." A boy who can not ignore the feelings of a person, Kimomi, is found as a "master" by a strange maid -Ursula.
tags: Action, Romance, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: I Became a Top Actor Just by Reading Books!
description:
Due to his lack of talent, Seonghyeon gave up acting and became a writer. Seonghyeon is a genius author with a natural talent for screenplays, but he still misses acting. Then one day, he got into a truck accident on set.

“If I’m born again, I have to act,” he promised and closed his eyes.

Seonghyeon returns 13 years back into the past to when he was 24 years old. And the method acting ability that goes into his scripts became the character itself! Okay, this life is about being reborn as a genius actor!
tags: Thriller, Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy

name: The Perfect Idol's Guide to Falling in Love
description: The girl group, MYSTERY, which has remained unpopular even after three years together, suddenly announces their separation on their third anniversary. The first team, known for its hot and sexy style, is led by the original captain, Windy. However, the new captain, Wangshu, with her sweet and lively image, has been appointed unexpectedly. Wangshu appears to be obedient and sensible, always clinging to Windy, but it seems she harbors special feelings for this "jiejie"...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Green Box
description: Sena, a high school boy, wakes up in an empty green room. In front of him was a world map and a one-line explanation. "Think of what you want and press the button for the country you want to destroy. You will be released if you win.'' Sena, who is gradually cornered, finally presses the button. Will it be Sena or humanity that will survive in the end?
tags: Thriller, Horror, Mystery

name: Oshi ga Kounin Stalker ni Narimashita
description: Rooting for the super popular idol Moco Nanami is the reason for living for 17-year-old idol otaku Sora Amano. Lately, he's been worried because his belongings have been going missing. In the middle of this, Sora pursued and caught a suspicious person that was running away with his smartphone - but the identity of this person - is his favorite idol Moco Nanami!?!!?
tags: Psychological, Romance, Comedy

name: Daisuki na Tsuma Datta
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Made in Abyss
description:
The enormous cave system, known as the Abyss, is the last unexplored place in the world. Nobody knows how deep down goes this titanic pit, inhabited by strange and wondrous creatures and full of mysterious ancient relics which purpose in unknown to modern man. Generations of bold adventurers have been drawn by the cryptic depths of the Abyss. In course of time those brave enough to explore the dangerous pit came to be known as "Delvers."  
  
In Orth, the town at the edge of the Abyss, there lives a little orphan named Riko, who dreams of becoming as great a delver as her mother was and solving the great mystery of the pit. One day, exploring the murky depths, she stumbles upon a little boy who turns out to be a robot…
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Loli, Monsters, Psychological, Animals, Survival, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Cooking, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Okuremashite Seishun
description: Wakaba (20) is a college debutante who yearns for youth. When she goes out on Halloween dressed in her school uniform, she ends up going on a date with a high school boy named Tachibana!　But in fact, this boy is also a college student whose friend left him out of the date... In order to make Wakaba's dream come true, she is asked to continue going out with him on his Seifuku dates!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Otoko wo Yamete Mita ~Gan ni Natta no de Josou shite Koi wo suru Koto ni Narimashita~
description:
*This story is based on true events.
One day, the main character, Nagisa Hajime, is suddenly diagnosed with cancer. With the little time they have left, they decide to live as themself. To do so, they decide to renounce the gender they were assigned at birth, male, and go out into the city. Nagisa then goes through a series of incidents and events they never experienced before. The author lays bare their soul as they recount their personal experiences in this great LGBT work.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Crossdressing, Drama

name: Akuma No Yuusha
description: Prince of hell is searching for the person who summoned and turned him into a superhero. Prince needs to find that host and return back to his realm.
tags: Action, Superhero, Self-Published, Isekai, Supernatural

name: Gachi Koi Nenchakujuu: Net Haishinsha no Kanojo ni naritakute
description: Kaguya Hinaki is a female college student who is highly regarded by her classmates because of her good looks. She had a secret she couldn't tell anyone, the secret being that she is genuinely in love with Subaru, a member of a certain streamer group.... Hinaki, who really wants to go out with Subaru, receives a DM from a strange account one day, and Hinaki's life changes completely――。
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Mystery, Gyaru

name: Saint Seiya (Kanzenban Edition)
description:
Ages ago, the goddess Athena was served by fighters known as Saints who channeled the power of the cosmos within them. Now a youth named Seiya has trained to earn the mystical cloth of Pegasus and become a Saint himself. He is joined by other Saints with cloths of their own to fight for Athena.  
  
This is the Kanzenban edition of the original Saint Seiya manga. It is a special edition that contains extras such as special diagrams and color pages in some of the chapters. It also has more chapters per volume, so the total volume count is 22 (whereas the original release of the manga was 28 volumes).
tags: Action, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Spoil Me Plzzz, Hinamori-san!
description:
Suou Yaya is admired by the whole school. Perfect grades, beautiful, an exemplary girl overall worthy of the praise she receives. From afar, her childish underclassman Hinamori Ichigo yearns to be like her...

...That is, until she finds her beloved Suou-senpai is a LOT more childish than her, and wants to be spoiled rotten, lest she'll throw a tantrum.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Shoujo Juuki
description:
**DeepL Translation:**
The girl flies. To take her revenge.

The Earth has been consumed by a miasma caused by the appearance of a mysterious monster.
The only thing that could fight it was a bioweapon called the "Mercy".

――This is a sorrowful story of the beautiful girls.
tags: Sci-Fi, Loli, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Military, Gore, Tragedy

name: The Painless Player
description: Lee Lina, resident of the dystopian world Tolka, plays the VR dating sim Raison D’Etre with the pain setting at zero. After her 99th playthrough, she is gifted a new patch for completing all the endings. However, as she begins her 100th game, and her favorite characters start acting oddly affectionate to her in an unfamiliar storyline, Lina wonders if the reward is more of a glitch. Will Lina be able to unlock a new ending before shocking news back in Tolka makes it impossible to ignore reality?
tags: Sci-Fi, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Tropical Rouge! Precure - Laura-hime (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Magical Girls, Girls' Love, Doujinshi

name: Truck Knight Taekbae
description:
After finally finishing a late-night shift and heading home, the only solace in my exhausting reality was the romance fantasy novel I had reread dozens of times.

Just like usual, I was walking while reading the novel when suddenly… I was nearly hit by a truck!

---
A middle-aged truck driver who almost hit a female pedestrian ends up teleported to the world of a romance fantasy (Rofan) novel the pedestrian read and must now help the female main character escape while dealing with a troubled situation involving dukes and princes and return to the real world.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Full Color

name: Half
description: The heartwarming story of two different girls brought together over a cat, as they learn about each other, spend time together, and heal one another.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: PTSD Radio
description: From the mangaka of Seeds of Anxiety comes another collection of short horror stories using introspection that will unhinge you… Best for midnight viewing!
tags: Monsters, Demons, Ghosts, Office Workers, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Soredemo Ningyo wa Koi ni Hanikamu
description:
Aspiring painter Iura Riku meets a mermaid named Sei, who has been secretly kept in the basement of the mansion left behind by his grandfather.

Enchanted by his beauty, Riku asks him to model for his painting without being able to tell him about his grandfather's death. "Would you like to touch me?" Sei innocently teases Riku, but before he knows it, he longs to paint Sei himself, not just the "mermaid". Sei's heart also beats with excitement as he spends his first casual time with Riku...

Meanwhile, his grandfather's assistant, Fukami, comes to visit, with the intention of making Sei public!

A love story set through an aquarium between an unsuccessful painter and a beautiful mermaid!
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Fantasy

name: All for My Dearest Juliet
description:
Enoch Latraki loves his wife, Juliet, even though she doesn’t love him back. But one day, she suddenly changes, becoming gentle and kind. Enoch is determined to find out why his wife has become so affectionate.

---
Due to her terminal illness, Princess Juliet has spent her entire life inside the Rozenta Kingdom's palace without any peers to talk to. So she's delighted to meet a kind young servant named Lete who provides her with much-needed company. However, their pleasant strolls end abruptly when Juliet is suddenly told to marry the archduke of Herventel, Enoch Letrachi. What comes as a greater shock is that Lete is actually Enoch, and that he has refused to see Juliet until she signs the marriage papers! Can Juliet find happiness when her trust in her husband-to-be has already been shattered?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Restarting the Life of the Loser Princess
description:
Her Royal Highness the Princess became the Queen somehow...
Her Royal Highness the Princess was beheaded for no apparent reason...
Her Royal Highness the Princess was inexplicably reborn as a 6-year-old...
Her Royal Highness the Princess Level 999...
This time Her Royal Highness is going to kill everyone!
Who said that only heroes can restart their lives? ! 

Adapted From : 廢柴公主LV999 (Wasteful Princess Level 999)
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: School Days
description:
The story revolves around a love triangle between the male protagonist, Makoto, and two girls in his year, Kotonoha and Sekai.  
  
Makoto develops an interest in Kotonoha, and although they both take the same train to school, she seems to be unaware of his existence. One of his classmates, Sekai, gets the two together despite holding strong feelings towards Makoto.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Harem, Drama, School Life, Horror, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Sekirei
description:
In Tokyo in the year 2020, Minato Sahashi has failed the college entrance exam twice, is awkward around women, and he's unemployed. He could never stand up to his mother or little sister growing up, a trend that continues to this day. In reality, Minato is extremely intelligent, yet his inability to cope under pressure results in his constant failure and he has been branded an idiot and loser by many as a result.  
  
One day, Minato meets a girl named Musubi, who literally falls from the sky. Minato soon learns that she is one of the "Sekirei" and he is her "Ashikabi", a human with special genes that allows them to "wing" (form a contract with) a Sekirei. This binds the Sekirei to him and allows them to use their full power in the elimination battle with other Sekirei. Made up of cute girls, buxom women, and bishounen, the Sekirei fight in a dangerous and sometimes deadly competition known as "The Game" or the "Sekirei Plan" organized by Hiroto Minaka, the chairman and founder of the mysterious and powerful MBI Corporation.  
  
Minato soon learns that being the partner of a beautiful girl is not all fun and games, especially when he discovers that an Ashikabi can have more than one Sekirei partner; and that's where the real trouble starts.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama

name: As Leticia Wishes
description: Stella, the beloved princess of Tyrien, was imprisoned all her life before being used in an eerie sacrifice. After her consciousness fades away, she wakes up to find herself hatching from an egg as a child! Despite her initial bewilderment, Stella quickly adapts to her new life as "Leticia" and becomes attached to Beth, a kind professor who may hold the key to finding out who and what she is. But does Leticia have what it takes to uncover the secrets behind both her lives?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I'm a Japanese but I died and got reincarnated as a Filipino!
description: Have you dreamt of dying and reincarnating in a world full of fantasy and magic? Having an adventure with your companions and raiding dungeons together? That's the ideal Isekai dream, but this story is different. (PINOSAISEI) I'm a Japanese, but I died and got reincarnated as a Filipino. It follows the story of Sakai Shuichi, who died in a truck accident but reincarnated as a Filipino. In the Philippines, his name is Seth Severino. His goal is to go back to Japan as soon as possible. But how can he do that when he became poor in a third-world country?
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Self-Published, Slice of Life

name: The Pale Horse
description:
Set in the France 1835. The pretty Rose Dupre is bullied and called the witch's daughter. People say her mother is a witch who kills and eats humans. However, Marie and Peter don't believe all those rumors and decide to protect Rose… But what if the rumors are true?  

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Kakao Webtoon](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%B0%BD%EB%B0%B1%ED%95%9C-%EB%A7%90/783)
- Defunct Official English - [SpotToon](https://www.spottoon.com/workHome/39/THE%20PALE%20HORSE), [Tappytoon](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/palehorse)

**Note:**
- The author has split the storyline into parts and seasons. Volume 1.1 for example means Part 1, Season 1.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: My childhood friend loves my mother
description: A female middle school student x married woman
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Delinquents

name: The Legend of Luoxiaohei
description: A cat spirit, while stealing the famed Heavenly Bright Pearl, was injured heavily by the spirit Diting and turned back into a cat. While wandering the streets, he was adopted by Luo Xiaobai, and became Luo Xiaohei. Their story begins now.
tags: Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Magic, Wuxia, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Uketsukejou ni Kokuhaku Shitakute Guild ni Kayoitsumetara Eiyuu ni Natteta
description:
**I Became the Strongest Hero by Frequenting the Guild Just to See the Receptionist!**

Jade, who aims to become the strongest adventurer, arrives at the guild and falls in love at first sight with the receptionist! Determined to talk to her, he realizes the only way to do so is to complete as many quests as possible. Thus begins Jade's journey, driven by love, to become the ultimate hero through relentless questing and adventure.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Miyuki
description:
Masato Wakamatsu, 16 years old, is working at the beach one summer. Having made a bad impression on his classmate/crush Miyuki Kashima, he makes a pass at another pretty girl. To Masato's shock, the girl turns out to be his younger stepsister Miyuki (15), who has been living abroad with their father for the past six years.  
As school progresses, Masato starts dating Miyuki Kashima. He and his sister Miyuki are living alone together, and he is troubled by his conflicting emotions: filial and romantic feelings toward a sister who may or may not know she is not related to him by blood.  
  
This manga was very popular in Japan.

---
- **Won the Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen/Shojo in 1982, along with Adachi's very popular, Touch**
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kashimashi Meshi
description: Three friends get together for an unfortunate occasion. Each of them is facing a difficult moment, between finished or complicated loves. But even if it is difficult and it seems to you that your heart is about to dry up, you can always find new light and hope if you reunite with people you love to eat rice together.
tags: Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: All-Rounder Meguru
description: Hiroki Endou's latest series tells the story of two old friends, Meguru Takayanagi and Takashi Yamabuki, who after a long time meet each other again at an amateur Shooto mixed martial arts contest. While Meguru only practices MMA for fun, Takashi is pursuing a serious goal. Even though each of them has their own reason to fight, both are becoming stronger with each match… Universally praised for its realism and accurate depiction of martial arts, All-Rounder Meguru is one of the first manga to provide a glimpse into the energetic and exciting world of modern MMA.
tags: Action, Sports, Martial Arts, Mafia, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Bamboo Blade
description: Kojiro is an impoverished young teacher and the supervisor of his high school’s kendo club. He doesn’t have the leeway to spend time on his students–he can barely feed himself as it is. So when an old friend makes him a bet with an entire year’s worth of deluxe sushi on the line, Kojiro finds a new purpose in life: to beat his friend’s kendo team! But before he can arrange a kendo meet for both schools’ kendo teams, he needs to actually put together a five-woman squad–and the first girl he needs is Tamaki Kawazoe, kendo athlete extraordinaire and daughter of an elite kendo dojo master. The problem is, she isn’t really interested in doing kendo for fun. What can Kojiro do to convince her to join the team?
tags: Comedy, Sports, Martial Arts, School Life

name: Offered
description:
Olympic track star. MIT whiz-kid. Adored by the beautiful co-ed's. Revered by classmates and teammates alike. Yu was sitting on top of the world.  
  
That is, until the evil seductress Payetta, leader of an outlaw gang of boozers and brawlers, kidnaps Yu at knifepoint and steals him away to her hideout. He learns he's actually the son of Gilgamesh, the legendary founder and ruler of the ancient yet highly advanced civilization of Agartha. The history lesson doesn't stop there, though. Payetta claims to be the granddaughter of Adolf Hitler and wants to share her maniacal dreams with Yu and the new dystopia she plans to create.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Survival, Sports, Mafia, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Splash!!
description:
Swimming diving competitions are harsh competitions in which the impact from the water surface can be as much as 1 ton when diving from a height of 10 meters.

Mizuha Shiozaki, a transfer student in Class A of Shirasagi High School, is a girl who has won many classical ballet competitions and is called a ``genius.''
However, she was unable to keep up with the strict guidance of her mother, who was a world-famous prima donna, and quit ballet in her third year of junior high school due to her resentment towards her mother.She thought she would spend her high school life in a relaxed and fun way, but inside she had a complex that she had run away from ballet and her mother.

One day, an argument with Himeko Sawamura, a second-year student who is her childhood friend and unrequited love, causes her to jump off a 10-meter diving board, causing her to lose her temper.

Shirasagi High School is the only high school in Tokyo that has a "diving club,'' and Himeko was an athlete who was nicknamed "Ice Princess'' and was even selected as a candidate for Japan's Olympic team.

Mizuha climbed onto the diving board but balked at the height due to fear. However, this ignites Mizuha's competitive spirit and she becomes obsessed with diving competitions.

A masterpiece sports manga depicting the bright and single-minded appearance of a girl who stakes her youth on diving competitions!
tags: Sports, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life

name: The Greatest Philosopher With Zero Magic Power.
description:
On his deathbed, the Great Philosopher expressed remorse, as he was never able to learn magic.   
  
Five hundred years later, he was reborn as Mazel Loran, the son of a feudal lord. His family believe him to be a late bloomer in terms of his magic, but also think he’s the next incarnation of the Great Philosopher. But Mazel has a secret that nobody else knows: while he does not have any magic, he has experience with “physics”!
tags: Reincarnation, Ninja, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Historié
description:
Historie takes place in ancient Greece and follows the life of Eumenes and his childhood, who would later in his life grow up to be the secretary and general to Alexander the Great.  
  
**IMPORTANT:**   
- Hitoshi Iwaaki frequently redoes the art for volume releases as well as add smaller chapters together.   
- There are no missing chapters on MangaDex, Chapter 108 "Warped" immediately follows Chapter 97 "Disposal of Olympias (2)", this is because chapters were added together in previous volumes, so the chapter count between volume and magazine are out of sync.  
  
---
- **Won the 16th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize's Grand Prize in 2012 for Manga**  
-  **Won the 14th Japan Media Arts Festival Grand Prize for Manga**
tags: Award Winning, Historical, Action, Adventure, Military, Gore, Drama

name: Man! Sea of ​​Japan
description: Kai Nihonkai, a high school student living in a rural town, tries to run away from the town with Yuki, a woman who is about to be forced into a political marriage, but the chase ends in failure. Nihonkai, who has become uncomfortable in his hometown due to the eloping scandal, cuts off the relationship with his father, who is the chief priest of the temple, and leaves his hometown alone to meet various women.
tags: Comedy

name: Touhou - Souki no Michi (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Action, Doujinshi

name: Hitohitogami Nichinichi
description:
This is a story from once upon a time - but not recently. 

In an abandoned village at the foot of Mount Mitsukado, there lived gods in human form. Monokai (specters) come to the village carrying goods to sell to the gods, and mysterious shadows lurk in the forest. 

This is a mysterious tale of everyday life that traces the lives and memories of the gods. Why do the gods take on human form and why do the specters appear one after another?
tags: Monsters, Demons, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Starry Night
description: Chi Xing, who was nicknamed, “star of calamity”, would run into all sorts of bad luck every day. But after he met the arrogant, antisocial, Ling Ye, who had deformed legs, he unexpectedly discovered that his suffering physique improved. Whenever he was with Ling Ye, he could turn danger into safety, and Ling Ye’s gaze always made Chi Xing feel like they had met before, a feeling of familiarness. They both don’t know that their common past of suffering and agony would cause them to be tangled up together……
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Please Become My Sister-in-Law!
description:
So, what do you think about my brother? 

One day, out of nowhere, a charming princess appeared in the life of Claire, the mistreated protagonist of an unknown author’s work.  

Princess Yuri, without any prior connection, unexpectedly proposed that Claire marry her brother—known as the Empire's most eligible bachelor.  

Overwhelmed by the princess's stubbornness, which not even the emperor could sway, Claire found herself in a contract engagement with the second prince.  

“I just want you to play along until Princess Yuri is satisfied. I’ll make sure you’re compensated accordingly.”  

As Claire waited for the contract to end, Prince Raymond began to approach her.  

Why would someone who is only tied to her by a contract…?  

“I don’t want to let you go. I feel like locking you away so you can’t leave.”  

For Claire, who fears both giving and receiving love, the wave of affection from her potential in-laws has only just begun.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Yuria-sensei no Akai Ito
description:
Fifty-year-old Yuria has a quiet life teaching embroidery classes in her home, where she lives with her writer husband and his mother. Then one day her world is turned upside down when husband has a subarachnoid hemorrhage and upon arriving at the hospital, Yuria is met by a tearful young man who announces that he is her husband's lover.

Won the 45th Kodansha Manga Award in General Category in 2021.
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Isekai Cheat Kaitakuki
description: I was living a life of a NEET, and I was supposed to have died suddenly because of my daily indolence - but when I woke up, I had become a baby. It seems that I was reincarnated in another world where magic exists. I was born the son of a lord in a remote village, and began to lead a second life with my beautiful mother Kara, my big-breasted maid and nanny Ruina, and my beautiful sister Amelia, who is not related to me by blood. As a teenager, I've grown up and enjoy my daily life in a different world using my top-level magical ability and modern knowledge…?
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Anzuru Koi Wa Yasashikute
description: It’s been one year since they started living together. These are the gentle and endearing days of worrywart Outan and Megurun. A two-part series‼︎
tags: Romance

name: Beginner Crossdresser ♂ and Valentine's Day
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Web Comic

name: Mr. Zombie
description: 1000 years ago, the MC became a normal zombie in the apocalypse. In order to survive the constant hunting of humans, he continued to train himself until he became immensely powerful. After 1000 years passed, he is now ready to enter human society again.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Zombies, Harem, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: If You Hate Me So
description: Minjae's quiet life turns upside down when he walks in on Hyung-jo masturbating to a T.A. sleeping in the student lounge. Hyung-jo threatens Minjae to keep the incident a secret and to keep his distance from the T.A., whom he has an obsessive crush on. But Minjae can't stop having dreams about the scene he witnessed. Despite Hyung-jo's extreme threats, his body reacts to the T.A.... wait, no. To...Hyung-jo. From the creator of "Love is an Illusion!"
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Isekai Cheat Magician
description: As regular high school students Taichi and Rin disappeared in a beam of light. When they came to, the two of them were already in a world of swords and magic. Finally getting away after experiencing an attack by monsters, following the suggestion of adventurers they headed on the path towards the guild. In the guild, the two of them found out that they possessed unbelievably powerful magic. Thus the regular high school students transformed into the strongest cheats...
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Dark History of the Reincarnated Villainess
description:
Konoha Satou has a dark history, written throughout middle school-a fantasy adventure of love and magic about the Count's daughter Konoha Magnolia and the knights who love her! But when it looks like that dark history is going to be uncovered by her mother, Konoha panics and dies in a traffic accident! Opening her eyes, she finds that she's been reincarnated into the world of her own dark history as Iana Magnolia, the worst villainess of her own creation!  
  
Ghost-seeing School Boys oneshot included in volume 1 as chapter 3.1
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess

name: World Trigger
description:
A gate to another dimension has burst open, and from it emerge gigantic invincible creatures that threaten all of humanity. Earth's only defense is a mysterious group of warriors who have co-opted the alien technology in order to fight back!  
  
**Please Note:** Chapters 111-114 are only available as licensed versions.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Megane-kun o Suki Sugiru Do S no Sawamura-san
description: This is a 4-panel web comic that depicts the sadistic boss Sawamura-san's conduct towards the bespectacled Noguchi-kun, who she's a little too overly fond of.
tags: Office Workers, 4-Koma, Web Comic

name: Monster Soul
description: The tale of Monster Soul takes place in Elfenland, which is inhabited by both humans and monsters. The main characters are a group of monsters called the Black Airs. The Black Airs is recorded as the strongest group of the monster forces in the great war between the humans and monsters.
tags: Action, Comedy, Fantasy

name: Rockman-san
description: Much time has passed since his battle with Dr. Wily, and Rockman has grown up in a peaceful world. Working as a dentist at the dental clinic opened by Dr. Right, Rockman struggles in his daily life with the allies he once fought with!
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Comedy, Video Games, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: GTO: Paradise Lost Kai
description:
The next stage for Great Teacher Onizuka Eikichi is a prison! 

Arrested due to an incident caused in his class, one that he was made assistant teacher of only six months ago! A newly established performing arts class at Kissho Academy High School, created for students who work in various media industries! Onizuka, who says he has no regrets whatsoever, quietly begins to tell the truth of the incident in prison. 

At last the decades-spanning story of Eikichi Onizuka comes to a dramatic conclusion!

*This is the continuation of the GTO: Paradise Lost story under a new name as the author changed publishers. The content is the same as the Young Magazine serialization "GTO Paradise Lost" up until episode 99, but there will be additions and corrections from that point on.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Delinquents

name: Koko wa Kamogawa Game Seisakusho
description:
At his grandmother's vacant house, Yoh happened to find a picture he had drawn as a child.
The moment he saw the drawing, lightning struck his body and he was flooded with game ideas one after another.

Gather your friends and develop a game from scratch!
This is an awkward and endearing drama of adolescent boys and girls set in Kyoto.
tags: Video Games, Slice of Life

name: After The Female Lead Awakens
description: A young woman with a philandering fiancé—she's caught him cheating multiple times, yet her timid nature keeps her from speaking up. But when heartbreak consumes her, she suddenly regains memories of her past life and realizes she’s a transmigrator in a novel, doomed to play the tragic heroine in a melodrama? No thanks! Whoever wants that sob-fest of a role can have it. She’s made up her mind—she’ll be the first to flip the script and take down the scumbag male lead!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I'm the Great Immortal
description:
In his previous life, he was a peerless genius in the Immortal World but was killed by 3 celestial beings.  
  
He exploded to death and accidentally got reborn to his 20s back on Earth.  
  
Determined to return to the Immortal World, he became the strongest man on Earth who can control clouds and rains at his will, and whoever offends him will have no choice but to disappear completely!  
  


---
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: The Island of Giant Insects
description:
**From tethysdust:**  
After an airplane crash during a school trip, Oribe Mutsumi and her classmates were stranded on a seemingly deserted island. Mutsumi found the other survivors, and used her wilderness knowledge to help them. She expects that they will be rescued in about three days, which doesn't seem so long to endure. However, she didn't account for the fact that the island is populated with gigantic killer insects. Her knowledge of butterflies, wasps, and more may be the only thing that will help any of her classmates survive to be rescued!
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Action, Animals, Survival, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Touhou - Mune wo Kitai de Fukuramase!! (Doujinshi)
description: Not found

name: MOMO: The Blood Taker
description:
In Tokyo, suspicious cases are occurring where the victims have all of their blood drained from them.  
Mikogami Keiji, a detective who also wants revenge for his lover, killed 10 years ago, pursues the culprit, the “Man with two faces”.  
What is the identity of the silver-haired girl who observes him…?  
  
A new serialization by the author of [Boku Girl](https://mangadex.org/title/10643/boku-girl)

---

**Assistant:** [Hoshikawa Danpa](https://mangadex.org/author/3814dd6f-c7b9-4ced-a9ee-a393eb4c06a7)

name: Fluffy Punk, Nakamura-kun
description:
Seemingly delinquent high schooler Nakamura-kun is actually shy at heart with dexterous hands and as skilled as any domestic goddess. He falls for fellow student Hayashi-san, a beautiful ojousan and honors student at their school but…  
  
A moe gap love comedy about Nakamura-kun's cute handmade goods and using overflowing feelings for sweets making and plush toy production!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life

name: Shrink ~Psychiatrist Yowai~
description: Panic disorder, depression, developmental disabilities, PTSD… Japan is said to be a country of hidden mental illnesses, where many patients suffer from mental illnesses without being able to talk to anyone. The suicide rate is one of the worst among developed countries. How has Japan fallen into this kind of situation? Psychiatrist Konosuke Yowai confronts the problems facing Japan's psychiatric care and sheds light on the shadows in people's minds.
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Medical, Slice of Life

name: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Oriental Sacred Place.
description:
The third part in the official long-running series about the daily shenanigans of Gensokyo's biggest pranksters, the Three Fairies of Light.  
  
2005: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Eastern and Little Nature Deity.  
2006: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.  
2009: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Oriental Sacred Place.  
2016: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Visionary Fairies in Shrine.  
  
**Português:**  
Continuação do Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.
tags: Comedy, Video Games, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Prince Of Persia Stories And Secrets
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Historical, Monsters, Action, Demons, Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Prince, Don't Do This!
description:
In order to fulfil her mission of bringing peace to her homeland, the Uyghur Princess Amelia travels to Chang'an and marries Emperor Dezong of Tang's ninth prince, Li Qian. While she had been considered very capable in her homeland, the complex and foreign customs of the Tang court are something else entirely; and although she had not expected love in a political marriage, the sheer disinterest and arrogance of her husband is very hard to handle, no matter how capable and handsome he may be. Securing peace between the Uyghur Khaganate and the Tang Empire is not going to be easy, especially with the rebellion taking place in Tang.  

 ---

[Official English Subtitled Donghua](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLBakWosU0sfhqdN5TFbbITb7Bm93T3-PW)
tags: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color

name: Good Morning Ladies
description:
"Good Morning Humans!"
It has been exactly 20 years since the earth was 'almost' destroyed by the abnormal evolution of wild animals. 
This is a story of three women who live poignantly today.

*Collected in Gusty Gritty Girl, an anthology of one-shots by the mangaka*
tags: Oneshot, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Slice of Life

name: The Blue World
description: The Blue Hole is a gateway that takes you back in time to a prehistoric age. In anticipation of the astonishing discovery, the United Kingdom and the United States dispatched a joint team to the Jurassic world 145 million years ago and embarked on a full-scale investigation. Just then, a sudden phenomenon cuts off communications with the modern world. Few people with limited equipment are left behind. Survival in a terrifying world where everything is unknown and dinosaurs roam free has begun!
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Douran no Joshou-hen
description:
March 2097—Brazil deploys the strategic-class spell Synchroliner Fusion in South America, starting a wave of unrest that will reach as far as Japan, where the new school year is just beginning. Tatsuya and Miyuki have entered their third year at First High, but anti-magician sentiment has been steadily rising. As many young scions of the twenty-eight families gather to discuss what to do about the concerning political climate, a much more immediate threat sits just beyond the shores of Sado Island…

Adaption of Light Novel 21-22.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Bloody Monday 2
description: Two years after the end of Bloody Monday, a new threat emerges intent on destroying Japan. But what will happen now that "Falcon" has since disappeared? Who will face the deadly "Shooter of the Magic Bullet?" Tune in to Bloody Monday Second Season and find out!
tags: Action, Psychological, Romance, Drama

name: Inari no Ongaeshi
description: Sorako is getting a bento made by a girl who is good at cooking, Inari. What led to her getting such a delicious-looking lunchbox made for her...?
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Orient
description: The fantasy series takes place during Japan's Sengoku Period, where Japan is ruled by Demons. A 15-year-old boy named Musashi will stand up to the demons with the help of a certain special power.
tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Comedy, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei - Nyuugaku-hen
description:
Shiba Tatsuya is an honors student without magic capability at First High School, a magic high School along with his sister who happens to be the top student among the freshmen. 
What will happen to him, and how will he live his school life where he is one of the many reserves in the school looked down upon by the chosen magical students?  
  
Adaptation of the original novel's volumes 1-2.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Military, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Aru Hi, Totsuzen Gal no Iinazuke ga Dekita
description: Miran Katsuki, a positive gal who reigns in the upper class of the school caste, often asks Shuji Nagasawa, an otaku. I was confused by her suggestive behavior, but she unexpectedly announced that she was his fiancée!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: Isekai Yururi Camp
description: Ueki Hashira worked himself to death and died falling down the stairs. As a child, he had fixed the shrine of the plant deity, so as thanks, the god granted his wish to "live a laid-back life in a natural, rural area like where he used to live". However... he was reincarnated in the middle of a vast natural wilderness surrounded by trees!
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Fuuka
description: Yuu Haruna just moved into town and is addicted to twitter. When he goes out to buy dinner he bumps into a mysterious girl, Fuuka Akitsuki, who breaks his phone thinking he was trying to take a picture of her panties. How will his new life change now?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Music, Tragedy

name: Musou no Kaitaishi
description: Dungeons have suddenly appeared all over the world. People became "explorers" and dived into dungeons to obtain resources that could only be found there! Kurose Sakuto, too, was searching for the elixir that would heal everything in order to save his childhood friend who was suffering from an incurable disease. However, he receives a notice from his friends that he is no longer a member of the team. In the dungeon and in the real world, he faces off against demons and malicious humans.
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Harapeko Succubus wa Ikasetai noni!
description:
Kururi-chan The Succubus is an unprecedented super elite!! She's been in a rut lately because her luscious body is too powerful and she can easily be promiscuous. Kururi then discovers Jien, a young virgin monk in training. 

Lucky☆Happy☆Strongest Kururi-chan is going to charge in with great pleasure!! The greedy and confident Succubus and the serious monk clash in this happy love comedy!♡
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: One Room, Hiatari Futsuu, Tenshi-tsuki
description:
What will happen when you wake up, and find a cute girl lying next to you in bed? Furthermore, she is not an ordinary girl, but an Angel who comes from Heaven???

Shintarou Tokamitsu is a high school boy living alone. One day, he found a beautiful girl sitting on his balcony. Her name is Towa, but what is her true identity? A romantic comedy between two innocent souls.

**NOTE:** The Omake chapters at the end of each volume are usually "prequel", not directly happened after the last chapter of said volume. Please refer to the Table of Content or the chapter number itself for details.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: The Dragon Cubs Arrive! Mommy is a Dragon
description: Five years ago, she left an egg and said, "This is the son I gave birth to you. When he grows up, that will be my return date." A few months later, the son broke out of the shell, with two shiny eggs on his head. Xiao Longjiao, she hadn't returned at te date. She disappeared for five years, and he went crazy for five years, until the little dragon cub brought back a woman... But the little dragon cub said, "Dad, she saved me, and I want to commit myself to her!" Infighting.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Part 7: Steel Ball Run (Official Colored)
description: In the American Old West, the world's greatest race is about to begin. Thousands line up in San Diego to travel over six thousand kilometers for a chance to win the grand prize of fifty million dollars. With the era of the horse reaching its end, contestants are allowed to use any kind of vehicle they wish. Competitors will have to endure grueling conditions, traveling up to a hundred kilometers a day through uncharted wastelands. The Steel Ball Run is truly a one-of-a-kind event.  The youthful Johnny Joestar, a crippled former horse racer, has come to San Diego to watch the start of the race. There he encounters Gyro Zeppeli, a racer with two steel balls at his waist instead of a gun. Johnny witnesses Gyro using one of his steel balls to unleash a fantastical power, compelling a man to fire his gun at himself during a duel. In the midst of the action, Johnny happens to touch the steel ball and feels a power surging through his legs, allowing him to stand up for the first time in two years. Vowing to find the secret of the steel balls, Johnny decides to compete in the race, and so begins his bizarre adventure across America on the Steel Ball Run.
tags: Award Winning, Official Colored, Historical, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Touhou Project - Cirno And Friend's
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Full Color

name: In the Gardens of Gehenna
description:
Mary, a girl who moved from Tokyo to the countryside, meets the mysterious girl Colin in a "secret garden" up in the mountains. With nowhere to go, they share a "secret" in the garden that they can't tell anyone. They didn't realize the consequences of what they did.......

(Source: Yuri-Hime, translated)
tags: Thriller, Loli, Psychological, Romance, Incest, Sexual Violence, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Horror, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy, Gyaru

name: Dragon Emperor Martial God
description:
Ling Yun, a cultivator, fails to cross the tribulation, and his soul wears the body of Ling Yun, a scum who was assassinated in the modern city. Facing the mysterious forces that want to kill him, and the world that he knows nothing about, Ling Yun cultivates immortality and martial arts, draws talisman and formations, refines pills and weapons, and kills demons!
Ling Yun: "suffer a loss? It's not my style to suffer!"
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Harem, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Arch Villain
description: Yin Wudao, a very rich handsome man. Because of the thief Cao, he was tortured and killed by the Dragon King’s son-in-law. However, he accidentally triggered a god-tier Arch Villain System, and his life began again. Since you have chosen to become a Villain, you must become the greatest villain in history. Dragon King, Divine Physician, God of War, Shura, Ancient Martial Master, Immortal… all the geniuses chosen by the heavens I will send them to hell!!! that way the generation of Villain Kings will come out soon…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Harem, Drama, Full Color

name: False Child
description:
What if a child who died at a very young age appeared just as she was? What if it was the work of a supernatural tanuki? This isn't a reunion. She's not real, but still... her parents want to cling to it. The lie is kind, yet saddening.

A heart-wrenching human drama, from Kawamura Taku.
tags: Psychological, Animals, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: A Boy Under Suspicion of Being a Girl
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Crossdressing, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Majo ni Kubiwa wa Tsukerarenai
description: As magic, once monopolized by the nobility, became accessible to the masses, crime rates surged. In response, the Empire established the Magical Crimes Investigation Bureau. Rogue, a detective, is reassigned to the notorious "Sixth Division" due to the schemes of his superior, Veradonna. This division works alongside witches, who once brought disaster to the Empire, to investigate magical incidents. These witches, powerful enough to bring calamity, are imprisoned and have their magic restricted by "collars." However, the witches, led by the "Puppet Demon" Miseria, pay no mind to these restraints and constantly throw Rogue into chaos. "What will you do, Rogue? Shall we consider taking extreme measures?"
tags: Thriller, Action, Magic, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Oniyome wo Metotte Shimatta
description:
Momotarou returned from his quest, having married the demon princess Ura instead of defeating the demons.  
  
The time for coexistence is here.
tags: Historical, Action, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: Soubi Seisakukei Cheat de Isekai wo Jiyuu ni Ikite Ikimasu
description:
Toji, a 29-year-old part-time worker who has been involved in the summoning ceremony of others has come to a different world. When he was driven out of the castle as a nuisance and gave up on everything, he saw the same status screen as an Online Game, what he used to play. What a convenient game system was available only for Toji in this world! Strengthen your weapons, summon cute monsters, etc… A free adventure of Touji begins here, focusing on wisdom and living in a different world!   
  
The amazingly popular fantasy of Alphapolis Web ranking 1st place, long-awaited comicalization!
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Namihara-san wa Buchimaketai!
description:
The company she entered was a black IT company... It's such a pain... I want to quit... "Boss, will you please die soon? (Good morning!)"

With a sudden change (?), her honne (inner thoughts) and tatemae (public behavior) switched!? It's always been what she thinks, but, but... As a worker, she can't say it!?  
  
Her hidden "inevitable" honne, becomes a shield against harsh superiors! A pleasant and thrilling comedy!
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Haikyu! - In The Middle of Your World (Doujinshi)
description: Pairing: Kageyama x Hinata

description: Not found
