tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Drama, School Life, Web Comic

name: Tsuki ni Hoeran nee
description:
"This is the story of modern japan with the poets, created base on the my imaginations of the portrait of the writers, who I took the impression from the works of Hagiwara Sakutarou, Kitahara Hakushuu, … so to speak is a true derivative work"  
  
Shikaku Town - ⟨街 (Shikaku means square, but can be written as 詩歌句 (poetry verse)). A fictional town where poets live. In there, the characters based on works of Hagiwara Sakutarou, Kitahara Hakushuu, Miyoji Tatsuji, Muroo Saisei, Yosano Akiko, Satou Mokichi, Wakayama Bokusui, Takahama Kyoshi, Ishikawa Takuboku, Tachihara michizou, Nakahara Chuuya, Takamura Koutarou, Masaoka Shiki, … while their lives being teared up by the happiness as human and desires as writer, their body shaken between joy and despair, praised, hindered, committed a sin, and struggling in composing poems.
tags: Psychological, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Not found
description: The cute bird he bought from the pet store was actually a distinguished sage who reincarnated from another world. Bestowed the opportunity to cross between worlds and immense magical power, he decides to use it to live a comfortable life, selling things from his world, training his magic, and eating delicious food. However, he discovers beings with special abilities in present-day Japan. A story where a corporate slave, who was at a deadlock in his career, gets wrapped up in a battle of special powers and cuts it close with his magic as he travels to and from the other world and present-day Japan. Magical girl included. (Source: Mangaupdates)
tags: Action, Comedy, Magical Girls, Office Workers, Magic, Military, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Rooftop Sword Master
description:
After being beat up and put into a coma by eight of his classmates at Nun'Gwang Middle school, Se'young woke up after nine long months and found out that his father committed suicide by self-immolation in an attempt to get justice for what happened to him.   
  
As a result, the investigation re-opened and that attackers who tried to sweep it under the rug received a proper sentence for their crimes. But Se'young was unable to assuage the anger and fear he felt for the unjust world.  
Se'young thoroughly hid himself from this sort of world.   
  
The sun would rise and set, the seasons changed, and not once did he step outside of his home. But one day, a sudden and strange sound enticed him to open the door…  
  
Embedded in the center of the rooftop was a gigantic blade emblazoned with the words “War Sword” and with it, came the whispers of a God.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Long Strip, Comedy, Crime, Martial Arts, Adventure, Military, Gore, Fantasy, Delinquents, Police, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Murder Lock: School of the Killing
description:
Kotaro Kudo was known as the "Streets' Strongest". Once, 13 thugs, thirsty for revenge, kidnapped his younger sister Hinami. Kotaro beat everyone, and on the same night, he was arrested on suspicion of murder, as each of them was later found dead. He is then forcefully enrolled to a certain school, in which all students must meet "a special criteria" to enter…  
  


---
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime

name: Existential Unplugged
description: Philosophers, burdened with unexpressed thoughts after lifetimes of reflection, have curiously reemerged in our world! Among them, Kierkegaard finds an unconventional outlet for his philosophy...music?! Watch as he rocks the city of Nakano with a comedic twist on philosophy!
tags: Comedy, Philosophical, Drama, Slice of Life, Music

name: One-Armed Amy
description: Amy is an ordinary girl who lives with her beloved father. However, she is not human, but a doll made up of cloth and cotton. Why was she created, and what does her future hold?
tags: Oneshot, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Saihate ni Madou
description: After his little sister was raped and killed herself, a teenage boy took revenge and killed her rapist in return. Seven years later the boy's released from prison, determined to kill himself due to insufferable guilt but then he's confronted by the rapist's daughter. A dramatic tale of guilt and atonement.
tags: Psychological, Sexual Violence, Drama, Tragedy

name: Nigatsu no Eden
description: An artist picks up a tattooed man off the streets. Though their relationship develops fruitfully, circumstances from the past conspire to tear them apart.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Mafia, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Tying up My Wolf
description:
Werewolf President x Vampire President, who does not know, X City's two largest company's president is a vampire and the other a werewolf, not only that, the two grew up together. In order to be able to catch up with his beloved vampire, the werewolf volunteer to become a vampire assistant and slave, only for the success of the pursuit of his wife, color and taboo urban love began...

---
[Original Webcomic](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/11076/)

**Official Translations:**
* [French / Français](https://www.pocketcomics.com/comic/7871/?languageCode=fr)
* [Japanese](https://www.comico.jp/comic/7871)
tags: Thriller, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Magic, Fantasy, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Mystery, Full Color

name: Kamen Rider 009
description: Short manga promoting a Cyborg 009 and Kamen Rider crossover collaboration for Cyborg 009's 60th anniversary.
tags: Oneshot, Action, Superhero

name: Rainbow City
description:
In the coming future, the Adam Pharmaceutical Co., Ltd., conspiracy, orchestrated the release of the Adam Virus, turning people into zombies as it spread. Only three unified countries in the world remain. 

Following the unexpected death of one of the virus vaccine developers Dr. Oh, a major in the Rainbow City of the United Nations, Kwak Soohwan, is tasked with retrieving Seok Hwa, a Chief researcher living in seclusion on Jeju Island, and is to bring him back to Seoul. Later in Seoul, in the Yeouido Shelter, Soohwan took guard as Seok Hwa took over Dr. Oh’s research to continue developing a vaccine.

 With the Adam Virus mutating a countless number of times slowing down the development of a vaccine, the attacks on Rainbow City from the resistance, a group of rebels rejecting the tyrannical regime, only intensifies. In a time of turmoil, Seok Hwa questions the City’s policy focus on developing a vaccine but not a cure, and as a result, Kwak Soohwan and Seok Hwa develop more and more animosity....
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Full Color

name: Legend of the Sun
description: In the era of hunting with spears made of wood and stone, in some tribes, talented young people were killed by fighting and killing their prey with "monkeys". Respecting the sun god, they waited for the son of the sun god to appear with a crossed star on his forehead, who would one day take him to the "land of the rising sun." One day, as in the prophecy, a boy appears...
tags: Historical, Action, Psychological, Animals, Survival, Adventure, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Nanba MG5
description: Born in a family of delinquents, Nanba Tsuyoshi is expected to succeed his older brother as the strongest delinquent in school. Unbeknownst to his family, however, he decides to enroll in the top high school in town to live as a normal high schooler. Can he maintain his double life as the strongest delinquent in town and as a normal high schooler?
tags: Action, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Delinquents

name: Blood Link
description: Hwa Gok is just a normal university student, until he sees a girl being attacked by the popular Lee Bin, and jumps in her defence. The only problem is that Lee Bin is more than meets the eye…
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Vampires, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: The Sword God Shining Dragon
description:
To martial artists, he was known as the Sword Calamity or the Sword Monster, but to the common folk, he was a savior. About thirty years ago, Junghyun, the strongest and most fearsome monster in the history of the Wudang Sect, suddenly disappeared without a trace after the Heavenly Demon died.

And after some time had passed, Junghyun, who had maintained his youth, reappeared in the martial world, bringing with him a young girl. This girl was Sojin, the granddaughter of the Heavenly Demon, Junghyun only true rival and friend in life.

Junghyun embarks on a journey to Mount Wudang with Sojin.
"Will the two be able to complete their journey safely?"
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Legend of the End-of-Century's Gambling Wolf Saga
description: In the world, there is a gambler here named Saga.
tags: Traditional Games, Drama

name: Blue Archive Dengeki Comic Anthology
description:
Blue Archive anthology published by Dengeki Comics.

---
**Cover**: Azumi Akitake (安曇アキタケ)

**Author list**:
1. Mishima Hiroji
2. Shirou Urayama
3. Matsumoto Yousuke
4. Takano Itsuki
5. Sergei
6. Arito Arayuru
7. Kamichi Ataru
8. Satou Kibi
9. Utsusumi Kio
10. Mishima Hiroji
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Anthology, Video Games, Military, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Heartcatch Pretty Cure!
description:
Tsubomi Hanasaki is a second year middle school student who loves flowers and plants. When she moves to the Myodou academy, she decides to change her personality. But meeting the spirits of the Great Heart Tree and becoming a brave Pretty Cure is so much more than she bargained for!  
Together with her new classmate, Erika Kurumi, she will fight against the Messengers of the Desert, who want to steal the Flowers of the Heart to rule the world.
tags: Action, Comedy, Magical Girls, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: K/DA Harmonies
description:
Since their 2018 debut, pop music supergroup K/DA has been busy. As the group finishes working in the studio, each member reflects back on the last two years of experiences and adventures that fuels the inspiration for their art.  
  
[Official English](https://universe.leagueoflegends.com/en_US/comic/kdacomic)
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 4 - Diamond is Unbreakable
description:
Fourth story arc of the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure series.

In 1999, Jotaro Kujo arrives at the Japanese town of Morioh for two reasons: to meet his illegitimate uncle Josuke Higashikata and investigate a potentially dangerous Stand user. Only minutes after he arrives does he accomplish his first goal; however, Jotaro finds that Josuke is not only a much younger high school student, but he possesses a Stand of his own called Crazy Diamond. Not long after their meeting, the two make a startling discovery: someone is using a supernatural bow and arrow to create Stand users around Morioh.  
  
When Josuke witnesses the threat that this poses, he resolves to protect his town and stop the spread of lethal Stand users. Finding both allies and enemies among these users, Josuke learns just how much one's personal interests and ambitions can be reflected in their Stands, and the resulting harm or virtue it brings. As they continue to investigate, they begin to unearth the shocking history of Morioh, bringing forth hidden dangers and a mystery from years past.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/read/manga/jojo-s-bizarre-adventure-part-4-diamond-is-unbreakable/all)
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Supernatural

name: Fish and Water
description:
The manga takes place during the COVID-19 pandemic, and follows the relationship between company employee Kamoda and his friend Kouji, who is very good at cooking.

MangaNote: Began as a one-shot published on Web Action on May 27, 2022. Serialization began on October 14, 2022. The one-shot is included as the first chapter in the volume release.
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Franken Fran Frantic
description:
The wacky adventures of Fran, Veronica and the other strange creatures continue.  
  
More experiments, more medical miracles and more wondrous surprises.
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Comedy, Zombies, Gore, Drama, Medical, School Life, Horror, Supernatural

name: Douyara Boku no Hanayome wa Onna Kishidan na You de
description: Adventures of a guy who has a harem full of magical knights! Will he able to choose the bride that is perfect for him? Let's find out!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Sensei! Bokutachi ga Sekai wo Horoboshimasu.
description:
A teacher has the sacred job of protecting and guiding students.

In this world where people who can use magic and people who cannot use magic coexist, Solo is a sorcerer who lives alone. He is also known as No. 0, a skilled assassin who always completes any request he receives.

As part of a certain mission, he's assigned to teach Class 2D at a magic school, the teenage students of which are dropouts.

While he is desperately playing the role of a teacher in order to complete his mission, a transfer student arrives and the situation takes an unexpected turn…
tags: Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy

name: Tsuihoreijo wa Ginojissusei ni Narimashita.
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma

name: Miyabichi no Onmyouji
description: A time when the boundary between human and demon was vague. Ten sacred items – “Jingi” had been stolen from Mikado’s Treasury by some demons. An imperial order to recover the Jingi was given to all the Onmyōji in the capital, including “the heretic” – Fuzuki. He sets out to retrieve the first Jingi, but something unthinkable happened…
tags: Action, Demons, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Achilles
description: Not found
tags: Historical, Action, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore

name: Aegis in the Dark
description: A protector, with an arm of steel, able to deflect bullets, swearing never to take a life. That is Tate Karito, the Shield in the Dark.
tags: Thriller, Action, Survival, Martial Arts, Adventure, Office Workers, Military, Drama, Police, Mystery, Tragedy

name: PPPPPP
description: Gakuon Otogami was a genius pianist whose name is among the greatest in the annals of the music world. He had seven children who also all became genius pianists. All seven except for the one named Lucky that is. This is the miraculous story of a regular kid taking on godly talent!
tags: Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Music

name: [DE] SOL.ATE; Children of Gaia
description: The Year is 30XX. A millennia has passed since an event that changed the Earth forever...
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Martial Arts, Adventure, Self-Published, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Military, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: The Results of My Author/Classmate Discovering My Yuri Obsession
description: What happens when a classmate finds out about another girl's secret yuri obsession/feelings? A yuri comedy ensues!
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Ui x Kon
description:
Two people who met for the first time today. Should we have the "world's best wedding" 3 years later…!?  
The Nanami High School that Ui enters is a special school where girls and boys spend their dorm life in a shared room, aiming for the world's best wedding! Kon, the guy chosen as Ui's partner by the super accurate matching system, is an ever so slightly malicious guy…!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Shinmai Renkinjutsushi no Tenpo Keiei
description:
After her parents are killed by bandits, young Sarasa Feed is sent to an orphanage where she learns about the prestigious world of alchemy. Determined to follow in her late parents' footsteps and become an independent business owner, she enrolls at the Royal Alchemist Academy to train and get certified as an official alchemist.

Five years later, Sarasa graduates from the institution and nearly achieves her dream before realizing that she lacks the funds to do so. Left with little choice, she makes do with a low-priced storefront in a town situated far away from the bustling capital. Despite the threat of treacherous terrain and dangerous monsters in the remote countryside, Sarasa begins her exciting new life as an alchemist.
tags: Monsters, Action, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Itonami Itonamezu
description: They haven't done anything yet - A story about a serious, simple, unadorned young man who wears nothing but the purest of clothes, never dreaming that he would fall in love . Until he meets a fragile girl working at a bento shop one day. This is a story about how a man and a woman who have never been in a romantic relationship before , start their newlywed life.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Yano-kun no Futsuu no Hibi
description: Yoshida the class president has a nervous temperament. But recently her worries are caused by one of her classmates, Yano. He somehow always arrives at school covered in all sorts of injuries, she can't get her eyes off him! She can't control herself, she needs to patch him up! A slice of life pure romance comedy of an injured boy and a concerned girl!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Astral Online - Maou no Noroi de Saikyou Bishoujo ni natta Ore, Saijaku Shoku da ga Cheat Skill de Chou Seichou shite Musou suru
description:
A high school boy, Sora Kamijo, who is addicted to VR games, starts playing Astral Online, a VRMMO that has been talked about as a god game, and suddenly finds himself fighting against the Demon King, the last boss. In addition to the sudden battle, the Demon King casts a curse on him and transforms him into a beautiful silver-haired girl...?　

A new VRMMO fantasy involving both the game and reality begins!
tags: Genderswap, Monsters, Action, Demons, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: I Really Don't Want to Learn Forbidden Spells
description:
For Ning Feng, an infamous underachiever, this will be his third time taking the awakening exam.  When he awakens as a one-star -- the lowest possible rating -- everyone laughs.  He can't understand why his new skills talk about "forbidden spells" and "dark power."  
He isn't an evil dark lord, but wow!  Who knew forbidden spells could be so powerful!  These skills are so cool, but they emit tons of dark power. 
There's a new source of dark power in the city and Ning Feng must get stronger before anyone realizes that its him.
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Magic, Fantasy

name: Imouto no Mune ga Suki
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Incest, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Mirukarani Ayashii Futari
description:
A lazy surreal comedy about two men who look like bad guys, but are actually super nice!

Two suspicious-looking men, one long-haired and the other short-haired, appear in the usual park.They look suspicious and unapproachable, but they are good guys themselves, picking up litter and searching for missing cats!

Long-Hair somehow knows a lot about the life span of snakes and the organs of rabbits, while Short-Hair is questioned by the police even though he is just eating a meat bun.The two of them live at their own pace today, involving various people in town.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Hirunaka no Ryuusei
description:
When her father transfers overseas, fifteen-year old country girl Suzume has to move to Tokyo to live with her uncle. Lost and confused in Tokyo, she bumps into a mysterious man. Who is he? And it turns out he's her homeroom teacher…?  
  
Chapter 47.5 (Heroine no Ryuusei) was a Heroine Shikkaku/Hirunaka no Ryuusei crossover for Betsuma/Margaret 50th Anniversary. It's the second chapter of the crossover between the two, the first chapter being Hirunaka Shikkaku. It's included in the Hirunaka Shikkaku & Heroine no Ryuusei entry.  
  
A Love Story in Moist Rainy Days included in volume 6 as chapter 40.5.  
More than Words included in volume 9 as chapter 60.6.  
Purple Love included in volume 12 as chapter 78.4.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Shoujo no Ori
description: Not found
tags: School Life, Horror, Mystery

name: Girls' Frontline
description:
Based on the popular mobile strategy game from MICA Team.  
  
In the year 2030, "The Belian Island Incident" happened where a highly radioactive alien substance was accidentally exposed to the atmosphere, causing half the world's population to be killed or mutated into zombie-like creatures called ELID (Euroky Low-Emission Infectious Disease) and the land becoming contaminated and uninhabitable. 

In response to the world suffering a shortage of Manpower, highly advanced androids with superior strength and advanced AI capable of expressing emotions called A-Dolls (Autonomous Dolls) were created.  

When World War 3 broke out in 2045 to 2051 over uncontaminated land and resources, Private Military Companies used A-Dolls with the ability to fight called T-Dolls (Tactical Dolls) in the war, which made them rich, becoming the de facto police and military of many nations after the war ended. 

However, in 2061, T-Dolls of the world's largest PMC, Sangvis Ferri, suddenly rebelled, killed their human masters and attack nearby human settlements. In response, Grifon & Kryuger PMC and their T-Dolls were hired to stop and contain the Sangvis Ferri Forces.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Video Games, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Adaptation

name: Cuteness hurts, Sometimes.
description: Not found
tags: Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: The Carefree Life of an SSS-Class Knight
description:
Even though strange beings like monsters and constellations appeared, my personal philosophy did not change.
But with the sudden awakening and blessing of an SSS-rank trait, my peaceful life went bye-bye.
I have no choice but to level up if I want to protect myself now!
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: New Testament - Star of the Giants
description: Mitsuru Hanagata, the genius little league pitcher. He injured his shoulder in a little league match and withdrew from baseball. His shoulder should have healed, but in a match against the a baseball club full of hooligans, he realises that his shoulder is permantly injured. He will never be able to pitch again. So he turns to becoming a genius batter instead!
tags: Action, Comedy, Sports, School Life, Adaptation

name: Strongest Player
description: By the time you see this message, the life-or-death game to reclaim our planet has already begun. All players must journey together through alternate worlds to find a chance to redeem their homeland. Those eliminated become spectators. Su Ming’an, who possesses the unique power of death rollback, is hailed as the strongest First Player, the pillar of peak strength, and the torchbearer of humanity in its darkest age. In this life-and-death maze, can he lead humanity toward the best possible future?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Vampire Knight Memories
description: Beginning as four bonus chapters following the end of 'Vampire Knight', 'Vampire Knight Memories' is now an official sequel series written and illustrated by Matsuri Hino. The series follows the events that occurred whilst Kaname slept for a thousand years, as well as his time in the future with Yuuki's daughters, Ai and Ren.
tags: Romance, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural, Mystery

name: I Got The Weakest Class, Dragon Tamer!?
description: Combining reality with a gaming world where ferocious beasts roam freely, filled with numerous mysteries and dungeons. In order to defend against the onslaught of these beasts, everyone undergoes class transfers and crazily levels up. On the day of his transfer, Lu Fan becomes a hidden class – Dragon Tamer. However, due to the immense strength of dragons, it is deemed impossible for anyone to tame them, earning Dragon Tamer the reputation of being the most useless class. Fortunately, he awakens the Super Treasure Map System. As Lu Fan, with his mighty dragon, sweeps through everything, the entire world trembles.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Toshikazu Hazamada's Questionable Adventure
description:
Toshikazu Hazamada is your typical outcast high school boy. He bullies small animals, ogles his female classmates, and also has a sentient mannequin called “Surface” who copies the appearance and personality of anyone that touches it. 

Didn’t want to hear his story? Well, you’re getting it anyway.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy

name: I Like Your Pheromones
description:
As a good-looking Beta with a good family background, Duan Jiayan has lived a smooth sailing life for more than ten years, until he met Lu Xingci in high school.

Lu Xingci’s family situation is better than his, he is taller than him and plays basketball better than him. Needless to say, his grades are a whole tier above Duan Jiayan’s. Even his friends can’t help but occasionally praise Lu Xingci.

Most importantly, every girl that Duan Jiayan has set his sights on, all admitted that they have liked Lu Xingci for a few years already.

Since then, Duan Jiayan has never thought well of Lu Xingci, till the day he received his new medical report. He is a late-blooming Omega, and because he became an Omega this late, it came with dire consequences. Now Alphas will feel the need to beat up other people whenever they come near Duan Jiayan. He himself is now allergic to every Alpha’s pheromone, except Lu Xingci’s.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Ore Dake Superhero
description: In an era of upheaval, humanity is forced to respond with weapons known as “Sacred Relics” that embody their very souls to combat monsters emerging from another world. Asahi Hinata, a young man with a promising future as the son of a hero, is about to attend the entrance ceremony at the National Valkyrie Academy. However, the Sacred Relic he receives is a hero suit that looks like it came straight out of a low-budget children’s hero show…Living day by day as an outcast at the academy, Hinata perseveres despite being disregarded by those around him. But one day, Hinata’s courage and resolve awaken a unique power within his hero suit…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I Get Stronger Just by Lying Down While My Apprentice Cultivates
description: When my apprentice cultivates, I become stronger— my apprentice's cultivation is returned ten thousand times over, and from then on, I dominate, invincible in heaven and on earth!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Get Back
description:
The accident that occurred seven years ago at the orphanage changed the lives of these two girls forever. In a world where talent and ability are everything, what will be their destiny now?  
  
Семь лет назад судьба этих девочек изменилась.  
Каждый день стал адом!
tags: Thriller, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Dekisokonai no Love Song
description: A dramatic rock-band story about a younger, assertive guitarist and a stubborn, beautiful singer! Kazari's the popular singer in a band, but he has a secret he can't tell a single soul. After a concert, Kei, the bassist and Kazari's step-brother, introduces a new member, Kotaro, who's a guitarist. From the moment Kotaro sees Kazari, he tries everything he can to close the gap between them. Kazari, though annoyed, decides to somewhat go along with it. One day, Kotaro sees a wistful expression on the usually aloof singer's face and encourages him to open up. The gap slowly closes, as Kazari pours his heart out...
tags: Boys' Love

name: Oddman 11
description:
There're 11 kids in Setsu's school who have special quirks and characteristics, called Oddman. Setsu wanted to date the only male Oddman, Itami, and so she proceeded to challenge all other Oddman since they were his ex-girlfriends. In the process, she made several Oddman fall for her instead.  
  
Originally published bimonthly in Comic Megastore Alpha, then Comic Hotmilk (both hentai magazines).
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Harem, School Life, Monster Girls, Supernatural

name: The Youngest Disciple of the Martial Arts Leader
description: The strongest in the martial world, leader of the Hojeongdan, Lee Hwan! During a mission, he battles the Heavenly Demon of the Demonic Sect, Deung Gwang-cheon, and loses consciousness… When he opens his eyes, he’s at home? No… This is my childhood home? It’s hard to believe, but if I really have returned to the past, this time I won’t just stand by and do nothing! On the night of August 8th, when he was 17 years old, a sudden, splitting headache strikes, and something comes to mind. “Cheonsu Ilgi Hap (Thousand Hands One Energy Unification), Deukwon Gang (Obtain Original Strength)…” He muttered absentmindedly and then paused. “Wait, this is the Absolute Demonic Art of the Heavenly Demon! How do I know this technique? Am I going crazy?!”
tags: Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Web Comic, Full Color

name: WorldWide
description: Living in this new age of society, certain people are treated with high regard due to past events that occurred, so most crimes they commit are brushed aside without any consequences. Meanwhile, lurking in the shadows, the new founding fathers, known as “The Criminal Justice System,” are slowly taking control of every single country in the world.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Martial Arts, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Police, Web Comic, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Genjitsushugi Yuusha no Oukoku Saikenki
description:
"O, Hero!"

With that cliched line, Kazuya Souma found himself summoned to another world and his adventure - did not begin. 

After he presents his plan to strengthen the country economically and militarily, the king cedes the throne to him and Souma finds himself saddled with ruling the nation! What's more, he's betrothed to the king's daughter now?! 

In order to get the country back on its feet, Souma calls the wise, the talented, and the gifted to his side. Five people gather before the newly crowned Souma. Just what are the many talents and abilities they possess?! 

What path will his outlook as a realist take Souma and the people of his country down?
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Morumotto no Kamieshi
description: The sensation that took social media by storm! The young artist Taro, hailed as the "divine artist," receives an unexpected commission for a self-portrait from the charismatic model Chiharu. However, what awaits him is an unimaginably brutal work environment!? From the brilliant Atsushi Nakayama comes this experimental art story — 82 pages of artistic exploration!
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Horror, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: High Class
description: Wang Dokpil, the boss of Jeolhwa, the largest organization in Chungcheong, and his son, Wang Dam. After his father’s death, Wang Dam has a different dream than inheriting his father’s organization and decides to head to Seoul on a whim. But life isn’t that simple, as he envisioned his uncle, who was a member of the organization, proposes a condition that if Wang Dam becomes No. 1 in his new school, he’ll receive a settlement allowance. However, Wang Dam’s new school, notoriously known as Ppak High, is infamous for school violence. Can Wang Dam become No. 1 in Ppak High School, the one full of the nation’s worst troublemakers?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Have You Seen My Brother?
description: The martial arts master Chu Wenshan has lost his memories, but the only clue to finding out about himself is a threatening letter… Huh? My brother was kidnapped? Wait, who’s my brother? No, even if I don’t know, I have to rescue him. Excuse me my friend, have you seen my brother?
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Mystery, Full Color

name: Kyuuseishu no Ikinokori
description:
In order to stop the invasion of the demons and seal the evil god which has been resurrected after a thousand years, Grey embarks on a journey together with his sister, Fiona, and his comrades. 

At the end of their journey, they were facing the evil god, and all of his comrades including his little sister were killed because of the evil god.

 

Being the only survivor of the journey, Grey was hailed as a hero and was granted the throne as the emperor of the holy empire, gaining glory and authority. 

 

Unfortunately, Grey couldn’t recover from the grief of losing his one and only sister, and decided to use any means necessary to revive her. After countless attempts to try and revive his sister, Grey became hopeless, until he heard a mysterious voice saying,

 

 [Do you want to save the most precious person in your life?]

 

[If you’re willing to sacrifice everything, I will show you the way.]

 

After making a deal with the mysterious voice,

Grey found himself standing in his hometown that was supposed to be destroyed by the invasion of the demons…
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: San Yan Xiao Tian Lu
description:
The heavenly general Yang Jian, also known as god Erlang Shen, was ordered to descend to the mortal realm for the task of get rid of demons and evil spirits.  
After he woke up in the mortal realm, he noticed that Taishang Laojun who was in charge of his transfer absused his power and reincarnated Yang Jian as a woman.  
 Yang Jian is not used to this new body and to make things more worse it seems that he can't use his full power. now he must learn to adapt to modern society and take care of a hidden danger that is going to put the whole world into chaos.
tags: Genderswap, Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: I Became an S-Rank Hunter with the Demon Lord App
description: There was a boy who lived in the present age of dungeons. His hunter aptitude was the lowest grade of “F,” which was a brand and proof that although he was a hunter, his power was not much different from that of ordinary people. One day, he is betrayed by his friends in the dungeon and left behind as a bait to a pack of demons. While hungry demon wolves devour the boy’s throat, he despairs of the unfairness of “talent” and continues his insatiable search for “power” – and he hears the voice of “the world”. -Strong desire of power confirmed- – Starting Demon lord application- As the vessel of the Demon lord power Player: Ijima Hiroto has been selected. The boy breaks through the “Wall of Talent” one after another with his overwhelming ability to grow through the “Demon Lord App” — The action drama of the young hunter oppressed by the world begins!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy

name: Kaiju No. 8: B-Side
description: Front-line stories of the Defense Force not covered in the main series!
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action

name: Peaceful Camping Life in Another World
description: Star chef Ganghyeon Lee, who has lost his sense of taste, retreats to a peaceful countryside to escape the public eye. In his grandfather's rural home, he stumbles upon a portal to another world. Taking advantage of his escape, he decides to enjoy a relaxed camping life in this new world. However, the inhabitants of this world keep showing interest in him. Will Ganghyeon be able to live a peaceful life?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Cooking, Full Color

name: The Divine Surgeon
description:
Because of being just, before even becoming specialist, Jisoo Han, a 3rd year of general surgery, has died.
Was it an angel, demon, or some unknown system of the world? Because of his good deeds, he got a chance to live again.
But he was resurrected as a dead man who was killed by mountain bandits. But this body… Is it the body of a great legendary surgeon?!
A generation of heroes with an endless battle, about in the year 200. As a great legendary surgeon of the 200’s, he tries to stand up to it……
An unexpected and extraordinary journey of a young surgeon, who fell into the world of Romance of the Three Kingdoms, has began!

---

**Links:**
- [Original Webtoon (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%99%94%ED%83%80%EA%B0%80-%EB%90%9C-%EC%99%B8%EA%B3%BC%EC%9D%98%EC%82%AC/2736)
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Warrior Grandpa and Supreme Granddaughter
description: Just when Liu Jinshan thought he could die without regrets, his family was annihilated! As a result, he became determined to live just so that he could see his only surviving granddaughter, Liu Seol, reach adulthood. As he struggled to raise her and train her with his aging body, Liu Seol, who was born with the talent of a supreme martial artist, grew up much faster than he thought she would. "Don't worry, Grandpa, I'll protect you from now on!"
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Infinite Leveling: Murim
description:
Killed on the battlefield without glory to his name, Yuseong Dan receives an opportunity to grow stronger with a strange quest and level system. But each quest he’s forced to fight only seems to be getting harder and harder. Can he level up enough to avoid the same miserable ending and become the powerful hero he wishes to be?

---
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://manga.line.me/product/periodic?id=Z0001443)
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Black Corporation: Joseon
description:
The maniac who was crazy about all kinds of fields such as military and steampunk had been reincarnated. However, his father was King Sejong the Great?
The mania-wise king and his crazy maniac son. Along with the ministers, and countless humans who were getting exploited.
Even today, the night of Joseon was filled with the light of overtime.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Holy Emperor's Grandson Is a Necromancer
description: Our MC dies from an accidental electrocution and ends up inhabiting the body of a young prince in another world, his new profession being the Necromancer he chose in the game he was playing before his untimely demise. However, things are not what they seem – including his own Necromancy skills!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Worker Bee
description: Hart is a death row inmate with self-destructive tendencies who is drafted into a dangerous mining mission in a perilous forest. There, he encounters the highest-ranking leader, who turns out to be his first love from whom he had once parted ways. Hart tries to resist the strings of fate, but he gradually falls into a dangerous love relationship that defies his status.
tags: Official Colored, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Crime, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery

name: Hiding a Warehouse in the Apocalypse
description: Imagine you are stuck inside a warehouse while the world is experiencing an apocalypse. That’s exactly what’s happening to Jeong-gyeom, except he suddenly awakens a very odd but powerful ability to store anything in a parallel dimension, giving him the tools to defeat the creatures wreaking havoc on the world. But as he ventures into the ravaged city of Seoul, he realizes there is more to this apocalypse than meets the eye as he encounters other survivors and mysterious monsters on his quest to find his family.
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Lullaby of Hell
description:
Six horrifying tales from the mad man Hideshi Hino. Everything from a child who loves butterflies, a mad doctor seeking perfection and boy terrorized by his father's tattoo. 

This is the original collection that Dark Horse would later take one story from to title their anthology Lullabies from Hell.
tags: Monsters, Demons, Gore, Horror, Supernatural

name: Sundome!! Milky Way
description: Sakura Yoshitake is a 25-year-old salaryman working for a food production firm. One day he takes the day off to go to his grandma's 88th birthday. While driving home after the party he sees a UFO and crashes. He survives the wreck and finds a terrifying alien standing over him. He passes out and when he comes to, he is in his own bed in his own apartment, covered in bandages. Even more, he finds a beautiful blonde half naked woman sleeping next to him. When she awakes she tells him she has come to earth to be impregnated by him. However when he touches her, her embarrassment causes her to lose control and she turns back into the terrifying alien he saw before. How will he ever impregnate her if she can't control her embarrassment enough to ever let him touch her?
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Drama, Slice of Life, Aliens

name: Seasons of Lovesome
description:
"It may be hazy blue, but that's alright"

Taking place a year after the epilogue of Seasons of Blossom, this story focuses on the new opening of “Cafe Blossom and NEMONE Atelier” as well as Bomi’s new classmate “Pureum” as they explore a new found youth. 

Campus romance, after school romance, office romance, it has it all.  

The heartwarming series is back with another youthful story!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Punishing Gray Raven: Interlude
description: Constructs — The blade of mankind against the Punishing virus, rekindling the spark of hope in the desperate, burning night. They, too, were once the children of humanity. This is their story, before they plunged into a never-ending long struggle.
tags: Action, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Full Color

name: Hazure Skill "Soine" ga Kakuseishi, Boku ga Saikyou Harem wo Kizuku Made ~Micchaku Soine de Ganbou Kaihou!? Yuuwakusare Makutte Komattemasu!!~
description: Regnard defies expectations by enrolling in the esteemed Royal Academy of Lasarzia despite being a dropout. However, during the Blessing Ceremony, he receives a peculiar skill called "Blessing of Sleeping Together," leading to ridicule from classmates. Despite the mockery, Regnard discovers the true potential of this skill when he spends the night with Frost, an honor student. This revelation leads to unexpected adventures and a harem fantasy, as Regnard navigates the challenges of his newfound abilities and hidden desires.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life, Fantasy

name: When You Are Asleep
description: The people you want to meet are only found in dreams. Cen Lin, who was plagued by nightmares, met the mysterious "him" in a dream by chance and started a wonderful journey of dream exploration. However, the person in the dream only exists in the dream, and after waking up, Cen Lin can't help but fall into confusion...
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: You Can’t Kill Me: The Secret Bride of the Black Wolf
description:
"You can never have me. The one who can kill me, is me, not you."

Yeonwoo killed herself in front of her ex-husband who murdered her family. Yet, she found herself back again.

To escape from my ex-husband Hyojo's obsession, to protect my family and to protect myself... I ask another man to take me.

"Hwita, I'll be your woman!"
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Prison Love
description:
Having never done anything bad and lived a dilligent life, Shushu is suddenly framed for murder and imprisoned in a prison for women.
In order to survive amongst harsh and vicious criminals.

“W-Will you be my prison wife?”

She becomes the wife of her very pretty but very scary roommate, who is also the prettiest(?) girl in the prison, Minicat.

But something is weird.

Why is she suddenly having the kind of feelings she would have for a man for this beautiful Minicat instead?

“It’s a rule, cabbage. Close your eyes when we kiss and I’ll treat you nicely.”
tags: Genderswap, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Boku wa Onee-chan no Omocha
description:
Presented by the special tag team of Yoshida Morohe and Yuzuki Ryouta, a gal step-older-sister and a bad-at-communication younger brother make-up comedy!!

Aonuma Aira is a 13-year-old with no romantic or friendly relationships, but one day, due to his parent's remarriage, the high-schooler Misa becomes his step-sister! She's a completely unknown entity to him, and gets way too close way too fast.

Moreover, her hobby is… makeovers? So she starts making him over until he's turned into a pretty girl!

What's in store for him after he's become his step-sister's plaything?
tags: Crossdressing, Shota, Gyaru

name: Living as the Villain's Stepmother
description:
The oven exploded while I was baking bread, and I faced death along with my abusive father, who had come seeking me. Then I woke up in a novel I was reading. “I’m sorry, Mo..ther. I’m not hurt.”

In the body of the villainous stepmother “Leila”, who abused the male protagonist “Hirua” when he was young, but was eventually executed by Hirua when he returned as the emperor! In order to help Hirua leave the stepmother’s wraith and live happily, I encounter the Marquis “Lacias Huppert”, who played a crucial role in the original, and proposed a contractual marriage. “Can we have a real marriage instead of a contractual one?”

“Oh, can I sleep with Mother too?” Contrary to the plan to leave only the two of them after a year, it seems that both the Marquis and Hirua have unexpectedly started to become attached to me.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Doberman
description:
Eden City, the second Las Vegas and a place where all pleasures of this world converge. Sarin comes to Eden City, trying to find the biological father of her niece, Hayan, using the diary of her twin sister, Irin, who died in a car accident. Along the way, Sarin encounters Owen, the king of Eden City.

Though frightened by Owen’s forceful attitude and the strange gaze that seems to desire her, Sarin chooses to stay by his side for the sake of her niece, Hayan. As she gets closer to Owen, she starts to uncover the darkness that looms over Eden City. Despite this, staying by Owen’s side becomes more natural for Sarin.

However, Sarin is also hiding a secret of her own…
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Devil's Wish
description:
"How about a kiss for a wish?"
Seo Do-ya, a demon, had a strange dream one day and on the same day he met Sowon, a new student at school.
Why does my body react even if I just glance slightly at Sowon!?
Meanwhile, Sowon attended the new student's welcome party and met the popular actor Woo-Jae Hyeong.
Between Woo-Jae Hyeong and Seo Do-ya,who will Sowon choose?
A thrilling, dizzying, complicated and messy campus love life begins.
tags: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Dog Act
description:
When CEO Jung Taeon mentioned he would stay for a month at Yeonghwadang, Sahee didn’t think much of it. He was merely a valued guest who would never get involved with someone as insignificant as her. However, the rude and endlessly arrogant man had a different perspective.

“Yeon Sahee, why don’t we sleep together?”

Sahee felt a mix of discomfort and unease, but his unpredictable demeanor continues to unsettle her..
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Koroshiya, Ogamiya ni Naru
description: The best assassin changes his business to exterminating ghosts! But aren't ghosts governed by the same rules as humans...?
tags: Oneshot, Action, Ghosts, Comedy, Mafia, Supernatural

name: Sumi Nigori
description: Summer, 29 years old. I got a long vacation from my job, so I decided to go back to my family's home after a long absence. Living there are my parents, my older sister, and my 35 year old unemployed brother, who doesn't talk to anyone.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Gore, Drama, Horror, Mystery

name: Gambler's Parade
description: Shinonome Karin is a very unlucky girl. Very. After a terrible morning she is late to her first day at a new school but everything ends with a very strange gamble… When all seemed lost she is saved by her history teacher… That also hates gambling!
tags: Traditional Games, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Supernatural

name: Holding Room
description:
Han Jae-hwa is a writer who is attracts attention due to his delicate looks and excellent writings. After a few days of being stalked, he decides to hire a bodyguard, Seong Tae-kyung.  
  
As the stalking continue to escalate, Tae-kyung proposes an idea…!
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Boys' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Jigoku no Sata mo Yokume Shidai
description: At the boys' dormitory at Hadoma High School, Yohei Goshi is a problem child and a constant source of headache for the teachers. Itsuki Ashiba, the new junior captain of the Judo team and dorm leader, is trusted by everyone at school. Yohei tries to break the rules, but Itsuki always outsmarts him and makes things difficult. When Yohei concocts a plan to get dirt on Itsuki to blackmail him into backing off, things don't go quite as planned. Instead, he finds him in an unexpected situation!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, School Life, Delinquents

name: Doomsday Sword God
description:
If mercy and kindness can’t save the world, then this time, I choose to kill—

Eternal Slayer! Heavenly Lightning Slash! Sword of Annihilation! As long as you learn the most common sword skills, they can be upgraded to SSS rank?! Divine talent + forbidden skills! I’m the last spark of hope in this apocalypse!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Conquering Dungeons With Copy Paste!
description: Seo Han-Jun, the protagonist, is cursed by a Transcendent being with a skill called “Copy-Paste” (Ctrl+C, Ctrl+V) and given only 20 years to live. However, this skill only works on himself, and its growth is stunted, leading him to live a disregarded life as a low-level hunter. One day, while fighting in a dungeon, he discovers a way to develop his Copy-Paste skill! With this newfound power, he quickly becomes a world-class hunter. Now, together with his companions, Han-Junmust prevent the impending catastrophe. Will Seo Han-Jununcover the Transcendent’s identity and save the world?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy

name: Ryuujin Kakusei
description: Inside the popular VRMMO where you can fight massive dragons, [Angolmois Field], Sudou Masaki, the world’s best player, defeated the dragon emperor. At the same time the game suddenly ends its service abruptly. But one day, the dragon emperor and its minions appear in the real world. The humans are put to the trial. Masaki knows that the scenario is just like the game [Angolmois Field] itself. If he were to obtain the [Sword Scale], he can manipulate the power of the dragons itself, and be awakened as a [Dragonoid].
tags: Action, Long Strip, Virtual Reality, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: A Beloved Villain
description: A car accident transported Bai Zi'an into the world of "The Ruler of the Empire," an interstellar novel. There, System 66 told him that, in order to return to reality, he would have to play a dumb villain who frequently gets crushed by the novel's main character. Bai Zi'an is supposed to be cannon fodder, but somehow the Prince, the General, and even the main character are all falling over themselves just to woo him. Unbeknownst to him, Bai Zi'an is becoming a beloved character in the novel's world.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Isekai Battle Royale
description: A man in armor with the power of darkness, Ares the Dark Knight, was heading to the Demon King's Castle as a member of the Brave Party. Hoping to defeat the Demon King and make a triumphant return to the hometown of Lulua, the hero's wise younger sister... And in the midst of the final battle, just as Ares delivers a dark blow... with signs of being taken somewhere, out of nowhere something takes you to another world. It feels like you've been caught up in a battle royale, in which strong people from various worlds participate!?  To return to the original world with Lulua, who was separated, the dark knight Ares fights.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Isekai, Drama

name: The Return of the 8th Class Mage
description:
As a powerful 8th class mage, Ian Paige took countless innocent lives under the orders of Emperor Ragnar, a close friend and ruler of the Greenriver Empire. Yet despite their closeness, Ragnar views Ian as a threat and subsequently poisons him. 

Using time magic, Ian saves himself and returns 30 years to the past. Now a young boy, Ian joins an elite order of mages to hone his abilities once again.

 This time, he’ll get revenge on the emperor who betrayed him and reclaim glory as an 8th class mage!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/8%ED%81%B4%EB%9E%98%EC%8A%A4-%EB%A7%88%EB%B2%95%EC%82%AC%EC%9D%98-%ED%9A%8C%EA%B7%80/2514), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57140255)
