name: T・P Bon
description: There exists a secret organization that has members traveling across time to save people from their wrongful deaths. Bon Namihira accidentally learn about the Time Patrol, and is recruited as an apprentice member. Together with Ream, the patroller in charge of mentoring him , Bon goes to various historical periods to rescue innocent people, trying not to alter history in the process.
tags: Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Historical, Adventure

name: Becoming immortal by doing nothing
description: My Grandfather is a Supreme Cultivator, My Second Grandfather is a Top Alchemist, My Father is the Patriarch of an Immortal Clan, My Mother is the Daughter of a Sword Sovereign, My Second Uncle is the Supreme Elder of the Ancient Dao Academy, and My Third Uncle Rules the Western Desert!” Luo Qianfan said to the system, “As the strongest second-generation immortal in history, I’m really not interested in cultivation.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Full Color

name: My New Friend Wasn't What I Expected
description: First impressions are important, but they're not the whole story...
tags: Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Smash Legends
description:
SMASH LEGENDS is a contest held as a way to resolve a sudden conflict that was brought to the fairy tale world, the Library World.
The fight begins now, where fairy tale characters seeking to achieve their personal goals vie for the fabled prize, “Write-O'-Light”, a fragment of light that holds the power to make one’s wishes come true!
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Video Games, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Sousou no Frieren -  Fern ga Ookiku Naru Ohanashi (Doujinshi)
description:
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Twitter](https://twitter.com/armies_soul/status/1755887073775825049)
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: The Primordial World: Starting by Taking the Minghe as My Adopted Stepdaughter
description: Yang Li, a modern man, finds himself crossing into the Primordial World, where destiny takes unexpected turns. What starts as an ordinary journey soon becomes legendary as he outwits celestial beings, subdues sages, and rescues the world from catastrophe. A story of wit, power, and unshakable determination awaits!
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Flaming Ball Girl Dodge Danko
description: A modern version of the legendary manga "Flaming Ball boy Dodge Danpei" a hot blooded dodgeball manga! Danko, who inherited Danpei's soul struggles to create the strongest super dodgeball team in the Reiwa era! Will Danko be able to overcome the common sense of the modern world!? Look forward to all the beautiful girls passionately drawn by Koshita Tatsuhiro.
tags: Comedy, Sports, School Life

name: Ore no Dankon ♡ Sacrifice
description:
In order to lose my family's debt (4 billion), I decided to go to a girls' school by dressing as a woman, as per the order of "a pervert who loves romantic comedy and has too much power". School life is full of confusion, but fortunately, in the midst of misfortune, all the members of the student council are "men" who go to girls' schools in the same circumstances. Can you win a peaceful school life despite the perverted old man who wants romantic comedy troubles?

(source: mangaupdates)
tags: Psychological, Crossdressing, School Life

name: UFO Robo Grendizer (Imamichi Eiji)
description:
TV Land magazine version of UFO Robo Grandizer by Imamichi Eiji.

Only one volume was published so half the chapters were never collected.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Aliens, Adaptation

name: Kita no Toridenite
description:
Paw pads wrapped in white fur. Fluffiness around the neck. A bushy tail. A rounded figure that was the very definition of fur ball!

A certain Japanese girl had been reincarnated into such a fox cub, Milfiria. Milfiria was told to watch the house by her mother, as she left for the capital. However, unable to bear with the loneliness, she decided to follow her mother but lost her way until she reached a fort protected by strong knights.
tags: Reincarnation, Animals, Comedy, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Lunch Zake
description: I am Shoko Inumori. Divorced, in her twenties. Occupation: A caretaker. Her business hours are until 5:00 in the morning. Her only luxury is to have a "lunch drink" after work.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Dark Invasion
description: During a rare total lunar eclipse, as the blood-red moon showed up in the sky, countless black particles erupted from its surface and rained down on Earth. Anyone struck by these particles transformed into monstrous, black creatures. Like ravenous zombies, they attacked the living, spreading the horrifying transformation like wildfire. Caught in the chaos, a college student named Xu Baijin bands together with a group of survivors, fighting for their lives against the relentless onslaught of monsters. As they struggle to survive, they begin to uncover a chilling truth: this apocalyptic event is no mere natural disaster, but a dark secret lurks beneath the surface, waiting to be revealed!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Akuyaku Kizoku to shite Hitsuyou na Sore
description:
A story of a man with evil charisma: A young man who's lived in modern Japan suddenly realized that he had been reborn in his favourite fantasy novel, *The Tale of the Rhinana Kingdom*. Yet he wasn’t reborn as the protagonist, but as the famous villainous marquis in the story. With the fate of being overthrown looming above him, he takes all action to break free of his determined fate by using his future knowledge along with the strongest skill "Absolute Evil".

---
**Links:**
- Alternative Official Raw - [Niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66135)
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: My Dear Lass
description:
"It seems like I'd like someone like you."

"You're really like a little pony." 

This is a slice-of-life of the romance and exploits of an adorkable and ditzy senior "little fox" and her dependable junior "little pony".
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Philosophical, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: MPD Psycho
description: The main character is a detective, Kazuhiko Amamiya, suffering from Multiple Personality Disorder (a.k.a. Dissociative Identity Disorder). Starting out as a violent detective series with a twist (the twist being the variant personalities that take over Detective Amamiya at various intervals), the series evolves into an exceptionally complex and involved sci-fi conspiracy story.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Crime, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Mystery

name: The Great Mage of the Hero's Party Reincarnates
description:
At age 13, the genius wizard Rin embarked on a journey with Lista and the hero party to defeat the great evil known as “the Abyss,” which sought to plunge the world into chaos. But as the battle grew more intense, Rin’s body succumbed to the dark poison of the Abyss, putting his life in grave danger.

With the words “I’ll come back,” Rin’s soul entered a forced dormancy, only to reawaken 300 years later as a noble boy. Starting his second life in a peaceful world, Rin discovers that on one side of the world, the destined forces of darkness are beginning to stir once more.

---
The battle with the arch-nemesis resumes after 300 years. The genius wizard, Lynn, embarks on a grand journey, at the age of 13. Together with the party of heroes, led by Esther, they aim to defeat the great evil “Abyss” that intends to throw the world into chaos. However, the battles becomes increasingly fierce and at the final moment, Lynn succumbs to the dark poison of the “Abyss”. Leaving behind the words “I’ll be back”, Lynn’s soul falls dormant for 300 years, before being resurrected into the body of a boy of noble birth. Thus begins his second life in a peaceful world. But in the meantime, a dark force is brooding once again, threatening to plunge the world into turmoil once again.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Ultimate of All Ages
description: First among the ten martial emperors, Peerless Martial Emperor Gu Fei Yang met his demise in the Tiandang mountains. He was reincarnated fifteen years later, as Li Yun Xiao of the Tianshui Nation, and thus began a heaven-defying battlefront with the countless talents of the current generation. Martial arts of the nine heavens and ten divine realms. From then on, the whole world was set ablaze.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: To Your Moralless
description:
A story of abnormal and crazy love between sociopath Park Chi-gyeong and daring, indifferent woman Kang Tae-ri, based on Hirachell’s original work. At the police station, where Tae-ri goes to report her colleague, she is offered a large settlement by a man she meets for the first time. Unlike her immature peers, this man, Park Chi-gyeong, exudes a dangerous aura. Tae-ri, who rejects the settlement, becomes a bothersome existence to Chi-gyeong, who has lived his life controlling everything. From their first meeting, they become thorns in each other’s sides.

The obsession of Chi-gyeong, who tries to break Tae-ri’s resolve, and Tae-ri, who refuses to lose, only deepens with time…
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Fake Saintess Awaits Her Exit
description:
I possessed the body of Yvelina, a fallen saintess from a romance novel I read before I died.

I’m a fake saintess who’s about to be burned at the stake.
I can’t die like this.
Until the real saintess appears, I must fix my relationships with the male leads and change the future.

But…

“You want to continue living in this body, don’t you? If so, then go f*ck a man.”

Will I… really be able to survive here?
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: A Child Who Looks Like Me
description: A man who has lost his memory before the proposal, Jung Jihun. A woman who believes her heart was broken by the man, Lee Jung-Oh. The two reunite for the first time in 7 years. Jihun does not remember Jung-Oh, but is instinctively attracted to her. Little does he know, She has a beautiful child that resembles each half of them
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Manual for Using Fierce Beast
description:
Secretary Seo Yujin is in charge of self proclaimed truth-finding. Once upon she receives a sudden call to her president and she hears shocking news. She is asked to take full care of the president's younger brother and the third son of an unknown conglomerate, Jin Taeoh. What if you add something like this when you can't shake off an eery feeling? "It's not that difficult. You just need to keep him out of the media."

She should have run away immediately after hearing that, but blinded by the money, Seo Yujin agrees...! The first time she goes to the airport to meet him her first impression was that he's a quite beautiful... beast? Tame the world's just but heartless psychotic beast who doesn't know where to go!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Full Color

name: My Naughty Deity
description:
Hye-sal, a timid ethics teacher who has lived her whole life without desires, finds that a neighbor who exudes desire and pleasure has moved in next door. With a sexy appearance and a fatal scent, his name is Dionysus, shortened to Dio.

When Dio makes divine wine, the essential ingredient required is the deep desires that humans have never fulfilled in their lifetime. The one who possesses that is Hye-sal! All she desires is her repetitive peaceful daily life, without any other dreams or desires.

Dio begins relentlessly pestering her, using even divine abilities to awaken the deep desires within Hye-sal.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: My Beloved Oppressor
description: Annette Rosenberg, a descendant of the Padanian royal family and the only daughter of a military captain. After two years of dating, she married her father’s faithful servant, Heiner Valdemar. Everything was perfect. Until her family fell due to her husband’s betrayal. “You will be unhappy by my side for the rest of your life.” Annette suddenly realized something. This man’s revenge is just beginning.
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Marry in Bed at 19
description: “As a birthday present, i'll give you my boyfriend.” Me Ahyeon and the top actress Seong Si-eun, seem like the closest and best friends in the whole world. While Si-Eun is a bright and famous star, Ahyeon is known as “the girl you can ask any favor". At Ahyeon's birthday party, Si-eun announces that she's bringing her boyfriend. And then, Ahyeon realizes that she was talking about Nam Terry, a guy who has always hated her... Can they share a boyfriend while preserving their friendship? No matter what you do, he says that “I'll never be able to like you.”
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Catastrophic Priest
description: Global changes occur, the game becomes reality, and demonic disasters begin to wreak havoc. In order to resist all this, everyone must pick a class and level-up like crazy. Lin Ye awakens his god-level talent from the beginning, turning things around, and starts speed-running straight from the top dungeon. Priests are weak? If I use the healing technique, you might die!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I Will Not Be the Supporting Character Forever
description:
“Why a supporting character instead of the main character?! And out of all supporting characters, why must I be this girl…”

When she came to, she was in the middle of the novel, *Empress Rosalynne*, as the supporting priest character, Elena. Moreover, the story starts right after Elena messed up a holy ritual and she was treated awfully by everyone around her…

“There’s only one way to get out of this! I have to become the tutor of the Emperor’s little brother, Duke Levi!”

Elena thought she could watch over the protagonist of the story, Rosalynne, as the events of the story unfolded at the imperial court, but something was wrong.

“Equality between commoners and me, a noble? You better watch yourself!”

The protagonist she had admired so much was a villainess who discriminated against others based on their social status.

“I won’t be able to stand it if everything ends up the way she wants!”

And so, Elena resolves to change how the story unfolds. Can she rise from her role as a supporting character and claim the position of protagonist?!

---
Elena wakes up as a disgraced side character in a novel. To survive, she must hide her commoner status. When the protagonist, Rosaline, discovers her secret, she forces Elena to do her work instead. Amidst the male lead's advances, Elena finds herself drawn to an apprentice knight she met by chance.
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Harapeko Oyako to Motokare Yanushi
description:
36-year-old Takaharu lives alone. After graduating from Art College, he has been living a quiet life while painting pictures. 

One day, his ex-girlfriend Kyou, whom he broke up with 17 years ago, comes to him with her daughter Minori and asks him to let them stay at his place. As in their college days, 

Kyou is attracted by the delicious food, and so the three of them begin to live together!
tags: Romance, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Kono Koi wo Hoshi ni wa Negawanai
description:
Eri-chan is my childhood friend whom I've always spent time with since we were little. Somewhere along the way, my affection for her shifted from being just friends to romantic feelings, but I doubt I'll ever confess these feelings to her. Because I want to stay by her side forever.

And so begins a delicate and beautiful love story where each person's 'love' intertwines.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama

name: Ai da nante Iwanai kara
description:
Unexpectedly, he crossed paths with his old high school friend, Yachiyo, during his grandmother's funeral. It had been two long years since they last saw each other, right after Yachiyo's wedding. Their friendship had become distant due to a past incident in high school. 

"At that moment, I failed to comprehend the significance of it all, and by the time I did, it was already too late—a haunting memory. The emotions that I believed I had let go of resurfaced, engulfing me as we crossed paths once more..."
tags: Romance, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Shippai Kazoku
description: A reclusive son, a daughter looking for sugar daddies, and a cheating husband. "This family is a failure." Noriko, a housewife who thinks so, has no dreams or hopes for the future, and her days just pass by. However, her fate changes dramatically when she impulsively kills her husband's boss. "The only way for the whole family to live happily is to hide the body." A strange bond is formed as the broken family cooperates in concealing the body.
tags: Psychological, Crime, Drama

name: The Aquarium Does Not Dance
description:
Suze and her childhood friend, Lulu, visit the renowned Bianca Aquarium.
However, the latter ends up disappearing without a trace.
Determined to find Lulu, Suzu wanders through the fearful aquarium.

Suddenly, she is attacked by a mysterious woman who names herself "Retro"
The aquarium director's wife, "Chris", lends Suze her hand in escaping the facility.
The girl who's been continuously trapped within the aquarium, "Kitty".

The only hint to escaping...
is to become a creature of the aquarium.

Suze must unravel the mysteries behind these women―――
and discover the identity of the traitor...

(From the official site)
tags: Monsters, Animals, Adventure, Gore, Horror, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Isekai Izakaya "Gen"
description:
There's this pub (Izakaya) called " Gen" that was supposed to be in a certain place in the Kanto region of Japan.  After opening the door one day, it was found to be connected to the city of Parisia, the Capital of the Eastern Kingdom Oiria.

Individual residents from a foreign world such as crestfallen monks, warriors, noble female chevaliers, daughters of noisy famous aristocrats, etc. All visited the peculiar izakaya which they've never seen before, and gradually they'll become fans of the dishes.

A foreign world gourmet fantasy has finally started!  
  
***From the same author of Isekai Izakaya "Nobu", which takes place in Kyoto.**
tags: Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation

name: Ochame na Okusan to no Nichijou Chabangoto
description:
**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [X (Formerly Twitter)](https://x.com/gibagibagiba/status/1633031267829817344) (Chapter 2),
[Nico Nico Douga Manga](https://sp.manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/63088) (Different chapter numbering)
- Defunct Official Raw (Chapter 1) - [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/artworks/105860251), [FANBOX](https://gibagibagiba.fanbox.cc/posts/5412957)
tags: Romance, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: A Modern Man Who Transmigrated Into the Murim World
description: I was a public official who worked part-time to survive. I was knocked out by a speeding car while making deliveries in the middle of the night. I have a strong memory of dying prematurely in a hit-and-run. “…I’m Jo Hwi?” At some point, I became the second son of the collapsing Jo Ga-cheol Clan. This family has neither the authority to drop a flying bird nor the power to carry out one’s will. There is only an enormous amount of debt that can annihilate the entire family. There’s only one way out! “Father, please pass the Jo Ga-cheol Clan on to me.” The story of a successful modern man who has to utilize all the knowledge and experience of a public official begins now!!
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Grand Duke of the North
description: Grand Duke of the North with black hair and heterochromia eyes (so you don’t have to choose over red or black eyes). Allegedly, he has 2 personality which switch on full moon rises, got a rabbit-like wife. That’s it. You know the rest.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Reincarnated Murim Lord
description: Regret is the bane of old men. When aging Alliance Lord Hajin Cheon of the Grand Martial Alliance reflects on his immense legacy, he finds that he recalls little of his deeds or even the lives of his closest advisors. Stricken by a mysterious ailment, Hajin suddenly passes away only to wake up in the body of Ridan Byeok, heir to the Byeok Clan of swordsmen. The only problem is, Ridan is a well-known wastrel, the polar opposite of the virtuous and stern Hajin. Righting the wrongs of his predecessor, Hajin begins to uncover the truth behind his death…
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Itsuka, Kazoku ni Naru made
description: The three lived together under a single roof. Takaomi is a single father, raising his only son. For some reason, he is persistently being hit on by his colleague, Nomura, who so happens to be able to do both work and housework. Taking overly good care of them, Nomura repeatedly visits Takaomi’s house uninvited and proposes that Takaomi should go out with him, telling him all about the advantages of doing so. Takaomi was perplexed since he’s never even dated another man before. But as they spent more time together, going out for meals and visiting amusement parks, Takaomi came to realise that he enjoyed the time spent together as a three and that it felt precious to him… A heart-warming BL between a flawless younger salaryman and a single father moved by affection.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Slice of Life

name: World’s Greatest Senior Disciple
description:
A senior disciple from a countryside martial academy returns as the world’s best! Dragged into a brutal political war, senior disciple ‘Hyeok Musang’ didn’t return after the bloody war ended. No one knew whether he was still alive for 5 years.

Upon barely returning to his hometown, he found his Dragon Tiger Martial Academy being persecuted and destroyed by a third-rate gang.

He thought he could live peacefully with his fellow members after winning the war but seeing the miserable state of his master and fellow disciples, he was filled with anger and guilt.

With the return of the senior disciple, everyone thought things would get better but only for a moment. Things were still happening in his hometown of Yangzhou County. Was the war really over? The head disciple raises his sword against the dangers threatening his Dragon Tiger Martial Academy.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Enrolling in the Transcendent Academy
description:
After a hundred years of monsters, it’s become the norm to train at hunter academies if you want to become a professional monster hunter. And that’s just what hard-working orphan Seojun Kim dreams of.

But after a freak accident dashes his hopes, ads for the mysterious Transcendent Academy pop up on his phone, offering him a chance to train virtually with history’s most legendary warriors. As he levels up, he’s soon caught up in the world of hunter academies, dungeon raids, and competitive tournaments.

But the more he learns, the more questions he has about the people surrounding him, his past, and the secrets of the Transcendent Academy.
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Sekai ni Hitori, Zenzokusei Mahou no Tsukaite
description: After a traffic accident, Zenichi Kiyama, a humble office worker, was reincarnated as a baby in a different world called "perfect compatibility". However, the result of his attribute appraisal with crystal was "dark attribute". The worst result is that he is a demon child...! ?
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Supreme Sesame Fox
description: In the shadows of the world-renowned heroic story, Sesame, an adorable and derpy fox spirit, who hoped to serve under a powerful and benevolent lord, instead encounters a chatterbox monk. On his journey to hunt for a job, Sesame meets an Auntie with a Dongbei accent, Old-man Huang who has had a moving love story, and a lumberjack-magically-turned-bear who fell for Auntie at first sight...
tags: Historical, Animals, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: The Archmage's Daughter
description:
Maybelle had lived a life of abuse under her parents. Upon discovery that these 'parents' aren't her true biological parents and that somewhere, her father exists, with a sad heart, Maybelle sets off in search of him.

---
Mabel’s been mocked her whole life for her nonexistent magical ability, but when she finally meets her true father, it’s the all-powerful archmage, Raquiel! Forced by an imperial pact to let her go long ago, he can now welcome her into his home, with his half-wolf butler, three nymph sisters, a fox halfling, and a kind disciple to watch over her. But dark secrets from his past threaten to catch up with them. Will his magic be enough to protect her? Could she even come into a power all her own?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Auto Hunting With My Clones
description:
Sangwoo, an average sophomore in college, always dreamt of having multiple versions of himself - one for study, another for play.

One day, he awakens with a skill called [Cloning], and Sangwoo thinks his dream has come true. But will cloning really steer his life in the direction he had hoped for, or does fate have other plans in store?
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Ziggurat
description: A story of a female "phantom" thief and a hot-blooded high school senior sleuth unfold in this mystery chase-action manga.
tags: Action, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Dear my Doll - Kimi to no Yakusoku
description: Lim and Iota live in a robot country. Lim, who is in love. Iota, whom she loves. The kind robotic maids. Lim has always thought her sunshine-filled days would go on forever, but… what is this promise Iota made with her in the past and the secret that he's keeping from her?
tags: Romance, Fantasy

name: The Top Dungeon Farmer
description: Sejun, your average Seoul underdog, didn’t expect to grow tomatoes full-time when he stumbled into the mysterious dungeon full of monster quests and extravagant rewards. Yet, there he was, as a farmer growing and selling cash crops while clearing numerous quests that came his way. Will Sejun make it out of the dungeon with the plush rewards he hoped for? At least he has what it takes: optimism, resourcefulness, and a group of loyal furry friends.
tags: Monsters, Action, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Cooking, Adaptation, Full Color

name: NEW GAME!
description: Having been inspired by the character designs of a particular video game when she was younger, Suzukaze Aoba, a high school graduate, begins working as a character designer for the game's developer, Eagle Jump. As she works on modelling and designing characters for games in development, she becomes acquainted with her fellow co-workers in the character design department, as well as those from across the company.
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Gentleman of the Night
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Crossdressing, Web Comic

name: Records of the Swordsman Scholar
description:
Scholar Woon Hyun enters the palace after passing the Imperial Examination.
Though he soon comes to lament his poor and miserable life of having to deal with the Crown Prince’s hobbies,
Despite that, he doesn’t give up and tries his best to learn martial arts.
But Woon Hyun suddenly picks up his brush to conquer the Murim?!

The hidden story of the scholar who passed the Imperial Examination at a young age begins. 

---

- [Original Webtoon <Webtoon kakao>](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%ED%95%99%EC%82%AC%EA%B2%80%EC%A0%84/2895)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Mofumofu to Isekai Bouken Meshi
description: Company employee Sano Jyu, who had a frail constitution, always had a sensation of heat inside his body. Then, he collapses due to the combination of a busy season and an outburst of fever. Then the goddess appears and tells him. You have made a mistake in the world in which you should be born. The cause of the fever is magical power, and he was born with magical power in a world without magical power. ...... Itsuki is reborn in another world with a healthy body and more magical power than any other person, just as he wished, thanks to the power of the goddess. And with the legendary magical beast born from the egg he was given as his partner, he begins his second life as an adventurer. ......
tags: Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: I'm a Homebody, but I Ended up Possessing a Character in a Devastating Confinement Novel
description:
I died from overwork, living as a s*ave to a small company.

When I opened my eyes again, I found myself reincarnated as an extra in a dark confinement novel.

And somehow, I ended up being kidnapped instead of the female lead!

But something feels off.

I thought I’d be killed after being kidnapped, but instead, they’re just keeping me locked up?

They’re confining… a homebody like me?

They never let me step outside, but everything I need is provided for me, and no one complains even if I laze around all day.

And on top of that…

“If you liked that pastry chef’s dessert, I’ll hire him for you.”

Do kidnappers usually treat their captives this well?

…Isn’t this amazing?

—

“Princess…”

“Yes?”

“Don’t you have any thoughts of going outside?”

No, of course not.

I plan to never step outside for the rest of my life.
tags: Oneshot, Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Umarekawatte mo mata, Watashi to Kekkon shite kuremasu ka?
description:
Toranosuke fell in love with his servant Kaoru. For twenty years, they slowly developed their love for each other, thus a Showa couple of clumsy husband and muscle brained wife was born. They spend a lot of time together, and they begin to talk in a nostalgic manner in Toranosuke's hospital room.  
  
Gentle memories of a deeply in love husband and wife.
tags: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: BEASTARS
description:
In a world populated by anthropomorphic animals, herbivores and carnivores coexist with each other. For the adolescents of the Cherryton School, school life is filled with hope, romance, distrust, and uneasiness. The main character is Legosi the wolf, a member of the drama club. Despite his menacing appearance, he has a very gentle heart. Throughout most of his life, he has always been an object of fear and hatred by other animals, and he's been quite accustomed to that lifestyle. But soon, he finds himself becoming more involved with his fellow classmates who have their own share of insecurities and finds his life in school changing slowly.  

---  
- **Won the 2018 Manga Taisho Award**
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Animals, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Nano Hazard
description: Enjou Shuuto's dream was always to become a detective and take down the scumbag who killed his father. As practice, he takes on the local bullies at every opportunity… only to get his butt handed to him. But what happens when rogue nanobots descend on his neighborhood, "enhancing" their hosts with deadly results?
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, School Life, Tragedy

name: Girls' Last Tour
description:
Civilization is dead, but Chito and Yuuri are still alive. 
So they hop aboard their Kettenkrad motorbike and aimlessly wander the ruins of the world they once knew. 
Day after hopeless day, they look for their next meal and fuel for their ride. 
But as long as they are together, even an existence as bleak as theirs has a ray or two of sunshine in it, 
whether they're sucking down their fill of soup or hunting for machine parts to tinker with. 
The experiences and feelings these two girls share in a world full of nothing give them something to live for…  
  
---
- **Won the Seiun Award for Best Comic in 2019**
tags: Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Psychological, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Register
description: How young is too young to fall in love? How old is too old to fall in love? Who decides the end of the flowery days of youth and the beginning of the same? In the eastern part of Tokyo, at a supermarket in a town zero meters above sea level. A chance encounter for two people over the cashier's counter. A youth-returning story where something might start!
tags: Romance, Slice of Life

name: Tonari no Wakao-san wa Miesou de Mienai
description: High school student Mizuno has a person that he's not good with. It's his seatmate Wakao-san. Mizuno is the only one who perceives Wakao's face as a blank slate, making it impossible for him to read any of her facial expressions. Furthermore, when Wakao tells him that she's using his expressions as "reference," the mystery surrounding her deepens?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic

name: Love Thy Neighbor
description: Pah Doyeon, a college student living in an old apartment building, gets used to the thugs coming to her neighbor's door every day. One day, when she sees the thugs trying to break into her neighbor's house, she unwittingly hides her next-door neighbor, Jinju, in her apartment... Looking at Jinju, who is much older than her, Doyeon gradually becomes engulfed in an unknown desire. How will their awkward cohabitation end?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Gantz
description: Somewhere in Tokyo, there is a room. In that room is a black sphere. Periodically, people who should otherwise have died are transferred to the room. There, the sphere gives them special suits and weapons, and sends them out on a mission to kill aliens here on Earth. While these missions take place, the rest of the world is largely oblivious to them. These missions are lethal–few participants survive them. The sphere calls the shots, and it's not the slightest bit nice. Its name… Gantz.
tags: Action, Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Tragedy

name: Kimi ga Utau Kusuri Renka
description:
A healer who has the unique ability to cure disease and is said to be the world's last hope. While on an overseas expedition, Laila, a newcomer to the world, meets a beautiful demoness named Lail, who is kept in the royal castle. 

The two live out their predetermined destiny, and what develops between these two is...?
tags: Demons, Romance, Adventure, Medical, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Jinmen
description: After a few years, the main character, Jinguu Masato, returns home. Due to his nature, he loves animals and he also likes to visit them. Because of this, he loved to visit the zoo since he was small and that's how he developed a close relationship with Hanayo. However, Masato gradually starts to notice some strange incidents happening in the zoo and after that, he's thrown into this unexpected world…
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Survival, Military, Gore, Drama, Horror, Police, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Tensei Shitara Slime Datta Ken: SatoruCie (Doujinshi)
description:
**Web Novel Spoilers Warning: The story takes place on Earth after end of the Web Novel.**

---

Rimuru plants a parallel existance inside Satoru Mikami, to live his life with Ciel and finish his missions he was unable to when he first died.
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Magic, Isekai, Doujinshi, Monster Girls, Slice of Life

name: Sen'ya Yuri Ichiya
description: Posting original yuri short stories.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Anthology, Girls' Love, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Vicious Luck
description: Chen Yang was just an ordinary person. One day, he was given an opportunity: he was offered the ability to control his luck! Love, status, and fortune were suddenly all within his grasp. When a person can control his luck at will, how will his life change? Will he run into beauties as soon as he steps outside his door? Will he trade as much stock as he possibly can? Damn… it's too good to be true… Those who are my friends will all live wonderful lives. Those who are my enemies have already paid the price!!
tags: Romance, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: A Yankee Who Actually Enjoys Wearing Women's Clothes
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life, Web Comic

name: Beyond the Sky
description: Han Qingyu lived peacefully for nineteen years, and never thought that one day he would become one of the main characters in an epic. An accident occurred out of the blue. The boy was forced wield a knife and began to face everything he knew nothing about: the invasion of civilization, the Azure Alliance, the mobile energy suit, the unique witness corps; the blade of exile, the sharp streams... He is narrow-minded, he is "The Qing Major" painted on cars and high-rise buildings in the era of full-scale military conscription; he will make the first cut in the Zenith War.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Drama, Full Color

name: The Red Snake
description:
Beware the red snake! Told from the perspective of a young boy, The Red Snake is a story of the above boy, the house he inhabits, and the forest around his house that stretches on and on. The characters in the story are all mad: his grandfather, who sports a massive growth on his jaw; his grandmother, who believes she is a chicken; his father, who is vicious to the chickens he raises (except for his mother, to whom he provides eggs that so that she can claim she laid them herself); and his sister, whose affection for insects borders on the erotic. The story evolves into a classic nightmare.  
  
The Hino Horror series:  
Hino Horror Volume 1: The Red Snake (赤い蛇 Akai Hebi)  
Hino Horror Volume 2: The Bug Boy (毒虫小僧 Dokumushi Kozou)  
Hino Horror Volume 3: Oninbo and the Bugs from Hell (地獄虫を食う! 鬼んぼ Jigoku Mushi Woku! Oninbo)  
Hino Horror Volume 4: Oninbo and the Bugs from Hell 2  
Hino Horror Volume 5: The Living Corpse (死肉の男 Shiniku no Otoko)  
Hino Horror Volume 6: Black Cat (黒猫の眼が闇に Kuroneko no Me ga Yami ni)  
Hino Horror Volume 7: The Collection (M Collection)  
Hino Horror Volume 8: The Collection 2  
Hino Horror Volume 9: Ghost School (Ghost School (HINO Hideshi))  
Hino Horror Volume 10: Death's Reflection  
Hino Horror Volume 11: Gallery of Horrors (Kyoufu Gallery)  
Hino Horror Volume 12: Mystique Mandala of Hell (Kaiki! Jigoku Mandara)  
Hino Horror Volume 13: Zipangu Night  
Hino Horror Volume 14: Skin and Bone  
  
This manga is also volume 4 in the Magical Horror Series.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: ODESSEY 1966-2005: Fumiko Okada Works
description:
A collection of gems that should be read and passed down for many years to come. It has been 12 years since legendary manga artist Fumiko Okada passed away. Republished with an expanded edition on the 13th anniversary!
▼ Product details ◇ Based on the 2 volumes of "Fumiko Okada Works" published in 2004, it has been republished in a new and expanded edition with 4 new works in 2 volumes! ◇We have asked Mr. Hiroshi Aoshima, who was in charge of the supervision of the Asuka Shinsha edition, to supervise the book again, resulting in a more complete compilation.
tags: Psychological, Magic, Philosophical

name: I Don't Want to Be Just an Ω Omega! ~I Was in My Sister's BL Manga When I Reincarnated in Another World~
description: Aspiring manga artist Taisei Kuji is an assistant to his sister, a popular BL mangaka. One day, Taisei was unluckily run over by a truck and found himself reincarnated into the omegaverse world drawn by his sister!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Magic, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy

name: Onna Shogun x Heisotsu
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Military, Web Comic

name: Kirara☆Princess
description: Is a shōjo fantasy, romance, and adventure manga series written by Rika Tanaka and illustrated by Nao Kodaka. The first 15 episodes were serialized by Kōdansha in the monthly manga magazine Nakayoshi, while the last 8 episodes were serialized in the quarterly Nakayoshi Lovely. It was later collected in five bound volumes containing the Nakayoshi episodes and volumes containing the Nakayoshi Lovely episodes). It is about young girl named Kilala and a lost Prince named Rei who join together to find the "7th Princess" and save the kingdom of Paradiso. It has similarities to the Kingdom Hearts series.
tags: Romance, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Yuru Oyako
description:
“Is it the age gap? Or is it because we’re both girls?” “… it’s not that. It’s because you’re…”  
The continuing adventures of Yuuki's attempts at winning over her stubborn mother Sayaka.
tags: Comedy, Incest, Girls' Love, Web Comic

name: My Young Cat and My Old Dog
description: Nang-Nak, an old poodle with blurred eyesight, and an adorable kitten, Soondae, love their owners whom they are loyal to. Here are the episodes of the mature dog and the energetic young kitten that always wait for their owners to give them love and affection.
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Akumade Amai Watashi no Kanojo
description:
Mai Amai --a girl who loves sweets-- got dumped by her girlfriend, and she's still grappling with the heartbreak. One day, the café she works at gets a new employee: The gorgeous Riri Kurosaki. Mai falls head over heels for her before realizing Riri is actually a succubus!

"I want to eat you and your parfaits right up! <3"
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Drama, Cooking

name: Sister and Giant: A Young Lady Is Reborn in Another World
description:
Hinako, a girl who came from another world, made a vow of sisterhood with a giant called Elis, and together they became known as 'The Smallest Giants'. They both have goals that aligned in tracking down people who were significant to them. For Hinako, it is her 'Onee-sama' who was also transported to this world, and for Elis it's the kin she was separated from. However, when collecting their reward after fulfilling a request at the guild, Hinako caught the eye of a knight who serves the church... 

This is the story of a Young Lady and a Giant, two girls who were born to different races and different worlds, and the quest to find their "loved ones" which binds them together.
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Demons, Mecha, Adventure, Girls' Love, Isekai, Gore, Horror, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Elfen Lied
description:
Captured and isolated against their will, the Diclonius species are a threat waiting to break free. When a young Diclonius girl, Nyu, escapes from the research facility she was being held in, she manages to find solace in two allies until danger seeks her out, putting everyone at risk. However, her enemies soon realize they're in over their heads as an attempt to subdue Nyu results in unspeakable tragedy. [Dark Horse]

**Included one-shots:**
Volume 1: MOL
Volume 2: Digitopolis
Volume 3: Memoria
Volume 5: Elfen Lied (Pilot)
tags: Action, Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama, Horror, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Omega Tribe
description: It's the dawn of a new millennium....while all the people of the world are living their lives, something is happening in Africa,  where the first humans were born. Now a new type of human is going to rise, and it''s going to change the world, either we like it or not. Evolve or get extinct, there no other choices in this manga which explores the meaning of life, evolution and what being human really means.
tags: Action, Psychological, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Supernatural

name: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure - Glass Lariats (Doujinshi)
description: The year is 2019 in Puerto Larraín, Chile. Glass Lariats follows the story of Josefina Torres, a 17 year old teenager, on her adventure to find her sister who was kidnapped for unknown reasons. During her adventure, Josefina will fight to learn about her family history and unveil the mystery behind the man who appears in her dreams.
tags: Action, Ghosts, Adventure, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Gore, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Subscribed To The Transcendental Channels
description:
Living by selling information about monsters, Maeng Siwoo is considered completely useless in the hunter industry without any standout qualities. However, he fiercely battles to provide for his sick younger sibling.

One fateful day, he is gifted a mysterious smartphone by a transcendent being within a dungeon, appointing him as the channel manager for such beings. Upon subscribing to the channel, he unlocks the ability to wield the powers of the gods.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: OL Vtuber to Oshi JK-chan
description:
Kumagai Hinano, a regular office worker, relieves her stress with baths, alcohol, and Vtubing! She is a streamer of video games. Her favorite Vtuber is Emori Ato, a character with a seductive and sexy voice that just makes one melt!

As chance would have it, Hinano decided to collaborate with her fave. When she went to meet up with her, the person waiting for her was...?!

The story of a tired office worker Vtuber and a mysterious JK onee-san who collaborate with each other in a very exciting way.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Tenkuu no Shiro o Moratta no de Isekai de Tanoshiku Asobitai
description:
An angel made a mistake, resulting in Shiihara Daiki’s death. In order to hide the mistake, he was then sent to a different world. The angel will grant him one wish as a payment for keeping it a secret. Daiki asked for a Heavenly Castle floating in the sky without hesitation.  
Suddenly a floating castle appeared in the new world, which causes confusion amongst the people. They attempt to contact Daiki in various ways. A country tries to steal it by force, while another seeks to befriend him. What in the world would Daiki do?
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Count’s Youngest Son Is a Gamer
description: Dohyeon is a top-ranking gamer in Connect, an immersive VR game that is overrun by corrupt guilds. After being murdered for discovering a mythical item, he wakes up as Lord Raul Ashton, an NPC in a closed beta version of Connect. Now the sole player in this realm, he decides to use his knowledge from his past life to prevent the downfall of House Ashton and unlock unprecedented powers. For Dohyeon, Connect is no longer just a game—it’s now his reality. Join him as he embarks on a thrilling quest to reshape his fate!
tags: Long Strip, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I Picked a Hammer to Save the World
description:
If the name Tiny brings to mind a diminutive rogue befitting the name, think again: Tiny is a headstrong, muscle-bound warrior who would rather smash his way through obstacles with his trusty warhammer than use his brain. 

When Tiny and the legendary Ten Knights of Asran are defeated by the Demon Beastlord Gluttony, he is given a second chance at life as he is magically sent back to the past. 

Relying on his knowledge of the future, the young Tiny must right the wrongs of the past and prepare for the upcoming battle!
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Return of the War God
description:
The worst talent that no one can compete with. Unstoppable Demon God, Dan Uhyeon.

A thousand years after being sealed for the misdeed. A thousand years was enough to get rid of Dan Uhyeon's sense of superiority. A world that has changed, solitude with no one knows, and the only thing left is despondency and emptiness.

"Time goes like the wind. There's really nothing left."

A little girl who appeared in front of Dan Uhyeon lost her purpose and will to live aimlessly, Hwa Somi. For a girl who seems to have nowhere to lean on, Dan Uhyeon feels the same and gradually begins to open the door of his mind.

"I'm Dan Uhyeon. Come with me."

The story of a warrior with an icy heart and acute and pure girl The story of an unusual family's life in the midfield will warm your heart.

---
The Ultimate Martial Divine Demon, Dan Woohyun, was sealed up because he was too strong for the world to handle.  After a millennium passed by, he was released from his seal and felt like everything was meaningless as he wandered the back alleys… 

Just as he fell down because he was sick of the world, a small hand appeared in front of him.

"What's this?" asked Dan Woohyun. 

"A dumpling!" came a reply. 

This was the first time in his life that someone had been nice to him without any impure intentions, and that changed his fate. This is the chronicle of a martial god who traversed through a thousand years of time and space!

---
**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%AC%B4%EC%8B%A0%EA%B7%80%ED%99%98%EB%A1%9D/2891), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/59492385)

**Official Translations:**
* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/16060)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/112858)
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: There Are No Bad Heroes in This World
description:
Choi Hyun-seok, who was once the mightiest man, begins a new life as a hero in another world after his death. 

"A hero who monopolizes wealth, fame, and beautiful women!" 

Dreaming of a glorious future, he arrives in the other world, only to encounter a monstrous beast with a head one size larger than his own. 

The monster, a high-ranking officer of the Demon King’s army, asked: "Hero? Are you the so-called hero?" 

"Uh… I guess I’m the hero…?"

And so, hell began.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Gourmet Gamer
description:
When he lost his ability to taste and smell, Lee Rim’s life as a chef ended. Just as he’s sinking deeper and deeper into depression, Rim discovers [Real], an incredibly immersive VR game that simulates all five senses. There, he’s able to regain his senses of taste and smell. Not only that, but he can cook, too! Although he does need to hunt his own monster ingredients down… Now, Rim is here to cook up delicious food, hunt some dangerous monsters, and maybe even build a whole new legacy along the way. Welcome to Lee Rim’s new life as “Rice”, the gourmet gamer!

---

tags: Monsters, Action, Animals, Long Strip, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Cooking, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Saenai Riman to Yankee Joshi Kousei
description: Yamada Hiroyuki is 26 years old, has a stable job, is an otaku, but is overwhelmed by the ideas and thoughts of his family, i.e. marriage and criticism over his childish hobbies. He decides to leave the house and go to live in an apartment, alone and happy, but the perfect image he had in mind when he moved in was destroyed when he learned that his neighbor is a yankee schoolgirl. However he soon discovers her real personalty is quite awkward and very tender. Will the story of these two advance for the better?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: My Girlfriend's Child
description:
“I think I might be pregnant.”

Sachi, a high school girl, has a childhood sweetheart, Takara.
One day, feeling something wrong with her health, she buys a pregnancy test.
Using the test at a diner in a town far from home, she sees two lines that indicate a "positive" result…
___
**Won the 47th Annual Kodansha Manga Award for Shoujo in 2023.**
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kumamiko
description: In the deep regions of the Touhouku area, the comedic story of the miko of bears, 14-year-old Machi, and her childhood friend, the talking bear Natsu, takes place as Machi struggles to qualify for city-life with Natsu's assistance.
tags: Animals, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Shinyuu ni Imouto(?) ga Ita Hanashi
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, Web Comic

name: Tsukounin no Hakai Suru Kazoku (Fan Colored)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Fan Colored, Crossdressing, Web Comic

name: Tonari wa Nani o Kuu Hito zo - Horoyoi
description: Suzuna Inaba who graduated from the university and is going to live together with Seto. A manga about tsumami (snacks for drinking) with a bit adult theme?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: The Delivery Man From Martial World
description: Stranded in a new world, Smiley Kang covertly lives the life of a delivery man. Until now, humanity has fended off demonic beasts and their portal “gates.” There are the Awakened, citizens imbued with supernatural abilities, and there are those more scheming, fighting to monopolize and claim demonic resources. But as the number of gates starts to rise, the world is at risk once again. Can humanity survive another onslaught of demonic beasts? The answer lies with the mysterious delivery man…
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Ishuzoku Tsuihou Concafe
description: Yoshio Yoshida, a company employee who enjoys going to concept cafes, hears a rumor from a familiar con café girl about a "con café with a strange atmosphere" that has opened in his neighborhood. Yoshida, intrigued, visits, and finds three unmotivated and peculiar con café girls in a store with a strange concept. They are actually real demons, dwarves and elfs.
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Snake Immortal: The Tale of a Snake's Cultivation to Immortality
description:
In a village, an old snake inadvertently swallowed a cultivator's human-shaped pill, gaining intelligence and setting off on the path of cultivation. With only a brief decade to live, the snake does not fear the passing of time but makes the most of every moment.

This is the tale of an old snake's journey to immortality.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: From the Dust
description: Hajime leads an unremarkable life as an undertaker, but he likes his job and has no reason to complain. Nor can he complain of being always called "onii-san" by one of the top star actresses in the country, Kidō Kotone, a childhood friend. Their relationship has always had a touch of awkwardness due to the parents of both having died violent deaths, but nothing could have prepared Hajime - or Japan - to the deed Kotone decides to perpetrate seemingly out of the blue.
tags: Time Travel, Crime, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Black Lagoon: Eda Initial stage
description: The manga centers on Eda, the original manga's undercover CIA agent based in Roanapur's church, during her early days as a rookie in the CIA.
tags: Thriller, Action, Crime, Military, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Police

name: My Ruined Academy
description:
Amon Drake arrives in the capital with dreams of success. On his first day as a teacher at the prestigious Amonis Academy, he is met with shocking news:

"Haven't you heard? This academy is on the brink of bankruptcy."

On top of that, the only people left at the academy are a gambling-addicted principal and drunken teachers. Amon thought,

"If the academy goes bankrupt, doesn't that mean my contract would become void too?"

They say escape favors the intelligent. If you don’t want to waste your life away, bring the academy to ruin.

The story of a wise man's escape from the academy begins now!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Anan-san wa Deatte 3-byou de Gattai shitai!
description: Anan, an office worker who's only experience with men comes watching porn, tries to win over her boss and love interest, Dept. Chief Kitazono, but fails at every turn. In fact, Kitazono is also a virgin with zero romantic experience...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers

name: Daija ni Totsuida Musume
description: Miyo, a human girl dedicated as an offering to the snake, the lord of the mountain. Miyo was frightened in front of a large snake that had a big body and swallowed a fox, but her feelings gradually changed...
tags: Historical, Animals, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, Supernatural

name: Mikazuki no Carte
description: Touka Myoujouboshi is a girl who has been hospitalized her entire life due to a rare allergy to sunlight, and thus has not been able to experience love. To prevent Touka from ending it all, Doctor Yuki Tsukisu provides her with the ultimate prescription by acting as her girlfriend.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, Medical

name: Namae no nai Kaibutsu - Kumo to Shoujo to Ryoki Satsujin
description:
Midnight. Awakened by the echoing sound in my room, I was met with a frightening pair of "legs." Since then, as if wishing to merely make its presence known, it remained in my room without letting itself be seen. In the same way it was spreading its encircling net, little by little it encroached on my life until at last it appeared before me. Its true form was that of an exceedingly beautiful "nameless monster." Desperate resistance was futile as the monster dropped its hand towards me. I could not escape or resist. Hiding it from my skeptical lover and friends, thus opened the curtain to our strange life together. Quietly, the senses I had as a human were dying as my normal life continued to collapse. The moment I knew what was awaiting me, I was presented with an important decision.  
  
At the same time the monster first appeared before me, the public was disturbed by a string of bizarre murders. It was then that I began to wonder whether they and my beautiful yet eerie roommate were connected.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Animals, Romance, Survival, Gore, Drama, Horror, Monster Girls, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation

name: Senki Zesshou Symphogear - Like a Flower Lined Up to the Future (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Girls' Love, Doujinshi, Slice of Life

name: The Creatures that We Are
description: Gao Yang, an orphan, crosses over to a "parallel world" at the age of six and starts living in a warm family of five. At the age of eighteen, Gao Yang accidentally discovers the true nature of the world: it's not a parallel world at all but a mysterious realm, and the family and friends around him are all terrifying "beasts"!
tags: Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Aliens, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Futahen!! Futago Mangakka to Hiyokko Henshuu
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Volcanic Age
description:
Ju Seo Cheon, a man who survives the age of war through sheer luck and becomes the elder of the Hwasan faction, only to live a life full of regrets and doubts. As he lies on his death bed, waiting for the inevitable, he is returned to the past…  

---

**Links:**
- [Official Simplified Chinese Translation](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/645880)
- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/15055)
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Christmas no Manga
description: A Twitter oneshot for Christmas 2021.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Web Comic

name: Oni
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Watashitachi no Shiawase na Jikan
description:
I have something I don't want to lose. So much so that these terrible feelings have grown. A pianist who attempted suicide 3 times, Juri, is taken to help her aunt at a prison where murderers who killed indiscriminately are sentenced to death. There, she meets a man named Yuu who took the lives of 3 people. A mother's antagonism–a brother's death… Together they embrace the violent rebellion in their hearts caused by the large, deep scars they carry. However, before long, they both embrace an earnest hope in their hearts. "I want to live"…  
  
An adaptation of a novel by South Korea's most popular female novelist, Gong Ji-Young.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Sexual Violence, Drama, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Music, Tragedy

name: Denkigai no Honya-san
description: Umio is a shy kid who just started his part time job at a manga store smack dab in the middle of the city. But his lifestyle isn't as glamorous as the neon lights that illuminate the city. Umio's closest friends are his co-workers who are all unique characters, to say the least, and although they're nice people, they have their quirks. They are a tight knit group of friends, have nicknames for each other and spend their weekends inside, sheltered from the extravagant scene happening on the outside.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: "Hitokiri" Shoujo Koushaku Reijou no Goei ni Naru
description: Shurine, a girl raised for the sole purpose of becoming a bodyguard, is framed by the state and branded a "hitokiri". Following a life on the run, she meets Lutecia, a duke's daughter, aboard a magical train. With Lutecia's life in danger, Shurine offers a solution: "If you need a bodyguard, why not hire me right now?"
tags: Historical, Action, Samurai, Girls' Love, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Call Me Master
description:
If you cannot remember, listen to your body.
If anyone discovers that slave master Ananse has lost her memory, she will be killed. So to save herself, she ropes in Solteo, a slave who hates her beyond compare. Her proposal? "Help me uphold my old image, and you'll be freed." His reply? "I'll make you regret ever requesting that, my master."
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Dokuzu
description:
One day, college student Ryu comes across his classmate Tsuge, who is about to jump off a pedestrian bridge. He stalls her suicide, and the two begin to interact, but Tsuge's smartphone contains countless photos of Ryu...
A story of immature and distorted love.


------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Note: A comic adaptation of a popular Vocaloid song that has become a hot topic on SNS.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Drama, Adaptation

name: Don't Mess With Missy!
description:
Reborn in pursuit of revenge, I am sure I can easily achieve my goal, as I happen to be as rich as Bill Gates, as beautiful as Audrey Hepburn, and as deadly as deadpool. However, none of these above works when it comes to dealing with a sweating and panting CEO, who is poisoned, who is in need of "immediate relief."  
  
I'd love to help, but don't pull an ice-cool face when you're kissing me, sir!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Deisui Kanojo
description: On Christmas Eve, Seto Hozumi is forced by his older sister to take care of Izumi Nanse, a beautiful girl any man would love to be with. However, she stands out not only for her beauty, but also for being carefree, useless and someone who is very fond of alcohol. Now our protagonist will have to deal with unexpected visits from this beauty who does nothing but drink… ᵃⁿᵈ ᵃˡˡ ᵗʰᵃᵗ ᵉⁿᵗᵃⁱˡˢ﹗
tags: Romance, Comedy, Adaptation

name: My Clueless First Friend - Sleeping in the Snow (Doujinshi)
description:
For a while now, Sumire Kasahara has been having a crush on Taiyou Takada, her classmate. Although she knows Taiyou likes another girl, one day Kasahara-san decides to make a move... 

Story based upon "My Clueless First Friend" (created by Kawamura Taku)
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Doujinshi, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: fox star catcher
description:
"What is your wish? I’ll weave a dream of fortune just for you!" 

Chilbok, a genius dream weaver who grants wishes in exchange for dreams. After ten years of rigorous training under his master, his ambition to enter the imperial palace shatters when he fails the crucial exam.

Before despair takes hold, a scarred and enigmatic figure appears before him. A royal-born mad man, scarred by life, Grand Prince Yeonmyeong.

This is the story of those chasing faintly shining dreams and seeking hidden stars amidst the clouds.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy

name: Hinomoto-san no atama wa moete iru
description: A yuri about a girl's head that is on fire.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Tomodachi o Tsukurou.
description: Misuzu can't seem to make friends. Is it because of her personality…? Or is it because of her friend, Shoutaro…?

When it was time to pay the debt off, a mysterious gal appeared and offered to pay off their debt. A big burden was almost off Kanakura's head, but the gal made a condition in return which stated that—

description: Chika, a boy who cannot reveal his hobbies and interests to others, gradually becomes attracted to his friend's older sister, Hanako.

name: Ore wa Shiranai Uchi ni Gakkouichi no Bishoujo o Kudoiteita Rashii: Baito-saki no Soudan Aite ni Ore no Omoibito no Hanashi o Suru to Kanojo wa Naze ka Tere Hajimeru
description:
The protagonist begins to get involved with the most beautiful girl in school, who is famous for her cold attitude, and slowly becomes attracted to her.

That protagonist finds himself in a consulting relationship with a plain girl in glasses at his part-time job.

He doesn’t realize that the girl he is consulting is the same girl he is in love with, and just keeps telling her about his growing feelings while continuing to fall in love with her.

The heroine realizes that the person he is in love with is herself, and although she is embarrassed by the protagonist’ feelings, she gradually becomes attracted to him.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Adaptation

name: Hitori to Hanasu no de Seiippai
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Sore ga Meido no Kanna desu
description:
After entering high school, Rikuto, the future head of the Ayamejou-Kouji family, begins living alone in a penthouse apartment at the top of a luxury tower. However, his new life takes an unexpected turn when Kanna, a maid with a knack for eccentric behavior and conversations, arrives.

With every action and word of Kanna’s being packed with weirdness, Rikuto can’t stop reacting and retorting. He’s torn, does he want her to act normal, or stay just the way she is?

In this comedy about a new life with a maid, Kanna’s uniquely "offbeat" style becomes an irresistible charm that flips Rikuto's ordinary life on its head!
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: After Ten Years of Chopping Wood, Immortals Begged To Become My Disciples
description: After ten years of chopping firewood (so tired ಠ╭╮ಠ), female immortals (one after another ╮(￣⊿￣)╭) knelt down and begged me to take them as my disciples! _(´ཀ`」 ∠)_
