name: Cyborg 009
description:
The World at the Brink of Self-Annihilation  
  
(from ebookjapan):

Joe, a young boy, was kidnapped by mysterious men and turned into a cyborg through surgery at a secret base. He was called 009 (zero zero nine). At the base, there are fellow cyborgs with amazing abilities from 001 to 008. 

They were all created as prototypes for a revolutionary new product of the "Black Ghosts," merchants of death! From the war-mongering gang, the nine cyborgs and their developer, Dr. Gilmore, escape to X Island, but...? 

A milestone in the history of Japanese SF manga begins!

---
- **Won the 7th Kodansha Children's Manga Award in 1966, which it shared with Ishinomori's other work, Mutant Sabu**
tags: Thriller, Award Winning, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Adventure, Office Workers, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Police, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Drugstore in Another World: The Slow Life of a Cheat Pharmacist
description: One day, a corporate slave, Reiji, suddenly got transported to another world. He made the best of his skills to make better potions which earned him lots of money and with that money, made a drugstore! An Elf who has trouble aiming with his bow? Give him some eye-drops! A Dragon who always let breathes out fire unintentionally?
tags: Demons, Ghosts, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Medical, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Konbini Yakin no Akuma-chan
description:
"Working the night shift at a convenience store sure is a pain...!!"

The night shift at a convenience store is full of weirdos, both the employees and the customers!?

The arrogant but energetic demon "Aruru" will do her best in a convenience store in Minami, Osaka!
tags: Demons, Comedy, 4-Koma, Supernatural

name: Inukai-san wa Kakure Dekiai Joushi
description:
Nagisa, a web editor, has a crush on Inukai, her boss. She is often compared to her sister, who is a famous model, and the quiet and kind Inukai is the only one who looks out for her.

One day, Nagisa receives a 'Magic Charm of Love' at a drinking party, and she accidentally presses its button on her way back home in a taxi with Inukai. To her surprise, she hears a song that says "You've been called to fall for the person in front of you" and the very next moment, Inukai kisses her.

Nagisa, who has been keeping a lid on her feelings, is unable to stop them from overflowing at the slightest opportunity. 

The handsome editor-in-chief, and the woman with a courageous crush - it's a sweet love story of two people who are in love with one another.
tags: Romance, Drama

name: 7th Garden
description:
As a gardener served in a rural manor, Avin wished nothing more than peaceful days along with his lord's daughter, Marie. One day, he accidentally woke up a demon sleeping in a nearby mountain. What she wished was to have him as a servant before felling the heaven and turn this world into her garden. Avin of course declined the offer. However, not long after that, the town Avin staying was suddenly raided by Knights Templar who supposed to protect the country. Avin was then presented with choices: Will he perish along with the garden and his dear ones, or become demon's servant and have this world perish instead…

---

Releases of this series stopped with volume #8 chapter #32 on May 2017.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Dofus
description: The people of the Jellies are under the blow of a terrible curse: the overheated libido of king Gélax forced him to copulate all the holy day! Alas, this frenzied reproduction jeopardizes the balance of Amakna which risks collapsing under frozen babies! ! Arty, a young shepherd from the region, is convinced that this curse is linked to the kidnapping of his grandfather, the dreaded and dreaded Crail.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy

name: Gosick
description: Set in a fictional European country in 1924, a Japanese exchange student meets a mysterious, brilliant girl who only leaves the library to sleep. Her brother, a detective, relies on her mind to solve difficult mysteries, several of which draw her away from the library. With a drop of sweet romance, you will immediately become addicted to Gosick!!!
tags: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, School Life, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Yoru no Namae o Yonde
description: Deep in the forest, a curious pair resides: a young girl Mira, whose affliction leads her to call forth darkness whenever she's in distress, and her physician Rei, determined to seek a cure. Each day, she works to remember the light and bring back the person she used to be. But a sudden visit from Rei's friend, who harbors an interest in Mira's illness, may be the end of their peaceful days…
tags: Medical, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: TakuTore!
description:
Taku, a high school student, is depressed after being classified as on the verge of obesity. At an event he attended to heal his heartbreak, his favorite cosplayer, Shiramine Lil, asked him to do something for her. At Lil's request, he starts training at home!?
___
[Alt Official Raw (G's Channel)](https://gs-ch.com/articles/contents/arvDmbrh7s5vuLyhzc7MEpYJ)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kimi ni Todoke: From Me to You
description:
Sawako Kuronuma is the perfect heroine… for a horror movie. With her jet-black hair, sinister smile and silent demeanor, she's often mistaken for the haunting movie character Sadako. But behind her scary facade is a very misunderstood teenager. Too shy to fit in, all she wants to do is make some friends. But when a popular boy in class befriends her, she's sure to make more than just that–she's about to make some enemies too!  
  
---
- **Won the 32nd Kodansha Manga Award for Shojo in 2008**

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Elex Media as **Kimi ni Todoke: From Me To You** (2014)
tags: Award Winning, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Jinrui Kyuusai Game
description: One day, Doppo, the high school protagonist, suddenly heard a voice from his phone saying "The game has begun" and that the "chosen challengers" have been taken to another world. If they complete their mission, they can return to their original world. However, this new world is filled with terrifying monsters... Can they survive and return to their original world?!
tags: Action, Psychological, Adventure, Isekai, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Fantasy, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Another World Dump Truck
description: Yul, the manager of the interdimensional dump truck office, accidentally kills an innocent man named Kwon Yoo-jun. In order to make amends, Yul enters a romance fantasy novel where Yoo-jun is the villainess and tries to send her back to her original world. However, due to various complications, Yul becomes trapped in the novel. With the office staff scattered and no knowledge of the novel's plot, Yul desperately searches for a way out. But, Yoo-jun, who is now pretending to be a noble lady in the new world, causes Yul a headache.
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Otaku ni Otoku na Gal Gurashi
description: Yutaka Kongouji is the son of a wealthy family, but also an introvert and an otaku. He lives only to spend all his allowance supporting his favorite idol. But when his parents' business fails, he has to move into a run-down apartment on his own. There he ran into Rino Hyuga, a popular gal in his class...
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Busted! Darklord
description: In order to leave the countryside, Yǔ Rénjié, the son of the Darklord, was ordered to enter the highly prestigious Good Faith Academy. The goal is to obtain a Good Faith Certificate which would relegitimize his demon heritage. The task is a dangerous one because if he is found out to be part of the demon faith, countless "righteous" knights will kill him on the spot. On the day of registration, Yǔ Rénjié was shocked to find that his personal information had been leaked. In order to hide his identity, he chose to put on women's clothing. His/her dangerous and hilarious school life is about to begin!
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Crossdressing, Harem, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Nightmare Busters
description:
The stage of "Nightmare Busters" is Tokyo in 2034. In the streets, a strange disease of unknown cause, which made me wake up while sleeping, was rampant. One day, Ichijo, a salaryman who spends his days working hard, has a mysterious dream. In a dream, Ichijo meets a coma patient … This is the latest work presented by Akase of "Southern and Comet Girl" as a full analog drawing and all-color work. 

---
**Links**:  
- [![](https://i.imgur.com/dQCXZkU.png) Mangaka’s Twitter](https://twitter.com/akaseyuriko)
tags: Sci-Fi, Psychological, Adventure, Drama, Mystery, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Clamp Gakuen Tanteidan
description: CLAMP School Detectives focuses on the exploits of Akira, Nokoru, and Suoh - 3 pre-teen sleuths - and their quest to make the CLAMP world safe for the girls in their class…
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Mystery

name: Man of Many Faces
description:
Akira Ijyuin lives a double life. By day, he's a top student at the elite CLAMP School, but by night he's the infamous thief 20 Faces. A master of disguise and stealth, the masked thief steals the most unusual objects at the whim of a pair of devious crime-lords…his two mothers! One starlit night, his routine is changed forever when he meets the lovely young Utako while hiding from the police. This time, Akira finds something was stolen from him–his heart.

- [Wikipedia](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Man_of_Many_Faces)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: Soul Diver Saga: Nirvana
description: In 1992, Shintaro Kago began publishing what was supposed to be the first full-length manga of his career. Unfortunately, the magazine that published it, Bandai's Cyber Comix, was discontinued in October of that year and the manga remains unfinished to this day. Only three chapters exist. Kago did recycle the basic concept of a girl able to switch between our reality and a cyberspace-like spiritual realm in a later one-shot (ataraxia) and an even later different full-length work (Six Consciousnesses Thought Changing Ataraxia).
tags: Sci-Fi, Animals, Virtual Reality, Military, Philosophical, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Saikyou no Kurokishi♂, Sentou Maid♀ ni Tenshoku shimashita
description:
Albright, who was famous as "the strongest Black Knight", was reincarnated as a girl, Maria, whose ribbon suited her well for same reason. Maria, 16 years old, is currently a maid in the Marquess of Urband family in attendance to the Daughter of the Marquees, Relena. After Relena became engaged to the 4th Prince, the area around Maria had gotten busier...
___
**Links:**  
- [Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0141ec/) (Raw)
tags: Reincarnation, Genderswap, Action, Romance, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Not found
description:
I met my childhood friend again, and she had become a beautiful and innocent girl.

"It's been a while, Hayato."
"Haruki, is it?"

In the past, I used to play in the mud with my childhood friend in the countryside, and when I saw him again, there was no trace of the bratty young man I thought he was back then. Only in front of Hayato, she threw away the coat she was wearing and reacted in the same crass way she did back then. The distance between you and me has not changed.

The popular fluff webnovel is now in Manga form!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Hazure Zokusei "Hikari Mahou" ga Kakusei Shite Laser ga Demashita
description:
The day of the "Attribute" assessment when you turn 10.
A boy raised in an orphanage, dreaming of becoming an adventurer—Light was granted the rare attribute of Light, which appears once in every 1,000 people.

However, while it was rare, the Light attribute was called a "failure attribute."
...Because the light magic learned from the Light attribute had absolutely no offensive power!

──Eventually, Light, who had become the adventurer he had always dreamed of, was mocked as the "specialist in parasitism" and the "walking torch," but he continued to train his Light magic to the extreme.

Then, when he reached the near-max level of [Light] attribute at Level 9──.
After his training, with an immense amount of magical power, his childhood friend Saya appeared and requested to accompany him to an AAA difficulty dungeon...

Little did he know, this would turn into the worst expedition of his life...
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Mobile Suit Crossbone Gundam X-11
description: The story is set in U.C. 0170, during the events of Mobile Suit Crossbone Gundam: Dust. The story follows Curtis Rothko, and is once again set in the Jupiter Sphere.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Isekai wo Denma dake de Ikinuku!!
description:
Kenji is just an ordinary college student. One day he was ordered by his Senpai, and was asked to retrieve Senpai's personal belongings, which happened to be a bag of sex toys. On the way he met Mana-chan (a girl he liked), who after finding out what he was carrying a bunch of sex toys, and bounced out.  
  
Wanting to explain the misunderstanding, Kenji chased after her, but gets plowed by JAV Truck-Senpai after he stops to bend down and pick up the dildo he dropped. Being the standard Isekai trash we all love to hate, once he died he wakes up on another world in a strange forest with only the clothes on his back, the vibrator wand in his hand, and all virginities intact.   
  
Join Kenji on his journey as the Hero of this new world, one female orgasm at a time.
tags: Reincarnation, Demons, Sexual Violence, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls

name: Curry naru Shokutaku
description: Makito Koenji is a curry chef with a mysterious past who helps Yui Sonezaki keep her father's curry restaurant, Ganesha, open through a lack of customers, a hostile takeover attempt by a huge company, and many other challenges. Get addicted… to Curry.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Tengoku Daimakyou - Drunk Kiruko and Maru (Doujinshi)
description: Not found

name: A Naughty and Carnivorous Childhood Friend

name: Yuujin ni 500 Yen Kashitara Shakkin no Kata ni Imouto wo Yokoshitekita no Dakeredo, Ore wa Ittai Dou Sureba Iin Darou
description:
"Until my brother returns the 500 yen, I will gladly become senpai's property as collateral!"

One summer day, Akari Miyamae, his friend's younger sister, came to the apartment of Motomu Shiragi, a university student. What is the secret behind this debt, and what is Akari's purpose...?

An overly-sweet cohabitation comedy that starts with one coin!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: The Thirty-ish Office Worker Haman-sama
description: A comedy manga about Haman Karn as a modern corporate section chief at an apparel company named Neo Zeon dealing with her insecurities being a 30 year old office lady.
tags: Comedy, Office Workers, Slice of Life

name: Modern MoGal if - Oni's Love Rule
description:
This "if" series is a set of spin-off stories that take place in the Modern Mogal world drawn by Bliss.  
  
Original comic by [Shepherd0821](https://mangadex.org/group/6025/shepherd0821), uploaded to MangaDex with permission.
tags: Demons, Comedy, School Life, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Minori & 100 Ladies
description:
Sakura Minori is just a very average girl.  
Yet despite being the only commoner in her school, could it be that she's actually become popular among the young ladies she so admired…!?  
A girls-only lovey-dovey comedy♪
tags: Comedy, Girls' Love, Harem, 4-Koma, School Life

name: My Perfect Enemy is Finally Broke
description:
When he woke up, Ji Ran, the son of a rich second generation, found himself lying beside his arch-nemesis from his school days. Qin Man! 

Despite reluctantly agreeing to a sponsorship agreement with the green tea black belly enemy, Ji Ran finds his lonely and stubborn heart gradually melting by the occasional tenderness displayed by Qin Man. 

[Scheming and gentle green tea x Sharp tongue but soft-hearted and charming person]

Behing the facade of a sponsorship agreement lies a decade-long unrequited love.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Magical Trans!
description:
Minami-kun spots a poster recruiting new members for the Magical Girl Club. Thinking "Cosplay cuties woohoo!" he decides to join… What the hell!? It's not cosplay, we actually become magical girls??  
  
A slice of life love-comedy revolving around magical girls and slippery slopes.
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Lovely Allergen
description: Yue Zhishi and Song Yu are not blood related brothers, Yue Zhishi, who was fostered by the Song family since childhood, loves to cling to his older brother, Song Yu, who is three years older than him. However, Song Yu always deliberately maintains a distance. Song Yu, the brother who pretends to be indifferent, and Yue Zhishi, the brother who is a clingy little puppy. But what others don't know is that he understands his own heart, he choose to exercise self-control and maintain a distance because… Yue Zhishi is Song-Yu’s only allergen.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Dungeon Meshi
description:
After his sister is devoured by a dragon and losing all their supplies in a failed dungeon raid, Laios and his party are determined to save his sister before she gets digested. Completely broke and having to resort to eating monsters as food, they meet a dwarf who will introduce them to the world of Dungeon Meshi - delicious cuisine made from ingredients such as the flesh of giant bats, walking mushrooms, or even screaming mandrakes.  
  
---
- **Ranked 1st in the 2016 Kono Manga ga Sugoi! for Male Readers (Shonen/Seinen)**

description: An *I'm in Love with the Villainess* official spin-off! A cooking comedy in which two maids, Rei and Rene, are busy making sweets for the villainess Claire!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, Isekai, Fantasy, Villainess, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Hibiki's Magic
description: Some of our most cherished manga characters are blessed with magical powers…others have an extraordinary combination superhuman strength and cunning intellect. But Hibiki? Her only real skill seems to be making a pot of delicious tea… Or is it?!
tags: Adventure, Fantasy

name: Houkai Gakuen 4-Koma
description: 4-koma based on the mobile game Guns Girl Z (Houkai Gakuen / Houkai Gakuen 2).
tags: 4-Koma, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I Awoke as a God After Auto Battling For a Million Years
description: An otherworldly invasion begins as countless monsters pour through rifts, engulfing human cities and plunging humanity into a doomsday crisis! From this point, humanity enters an era of universal job transfers, with nations vying to train powerful professionals and compete for top rankings in the otherworldly conquest! When the number one ruler of the Dragon Kingdom, who has slumbered for millions of years, awakens with millions of years' worth of idle resources, the bosses of the otherworld tremble. Top-tier professionals from countries around the globe kneel in awe...
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Peerless Soldier
description:
"The Peerless Soldiers" is a work based on the issue of a retiring soldiers to solve the problem of love and marriage. The communication soldier Jiang Cheng is forced to retired from the army under family pressure to marry someone. Jiang Feng decides to enter Tian Ai College as a physical education teacher and persue the four marriage targets designated by the family, along with some mishaps. The storyline is based on the retired soldiers Jiang Cheng and his quest to marry within 3 years, but as a Comando of the Elite Communication Officer Branch, things aren't as easy as normal daily life.  
What will this sudden talented Comando do in daily ordinary love in search of marriage?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Harem

name: Ousama Game
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic

name: Oshi no Bishoujo ni Kokuhaku sareru Hanashi
description: A yuri romcom manga where an otaku is confessed to by the pretty girl she declares as her oshi and they start dating.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Girls' Love, School Life

name: Second Home
description:
"My home cannot be like this."  
  
The story of a quiet male student and his next-door neighbor… who is married.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Alkaloid no Hanayome
description: Romelia, a lonely girl, and Kutli, a young high-ranking soldier, are solemnly married in the presence of God. What they share, however, is not "conjugal love," but the "unbearable fate" they have mutually borne.
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy

name: The Princess of Sylph (Twitter Version)
description:
The adventures of a lonesome princess and meddlesome nun.
*(It's recommended you read the serialized manga first, in the related tab.)*

* **Volume 1:** The original self-published story.
* **Volume 2:** Pre-serialization extras.
* **Volume 3:** Post-serialization extras.
*(Extras take place outside the story. The canon's best described as 'under construction', continuity's nonexistent, and the chapter numbers are simply the order I translate them in, not the order they were drawn. If they have serious plot spoilers I'll mark them as such.)*
tags: Action, Romance, Adventure, Magic, Girls' Love, Fantasy

name: S-Class Spirit Master's Taming Diary
description:
In a world where wars were fought with swords and magic, and the only transportation was by horse-drawn carriage…

There, I lived as a spirit master—and died. But then…

I was reborn?!

In this new life, there were hunters and monsters, just like in my previous one. But here, the concept of spirits didn’t exist at all.

"Jackpot!"

Monsters? Dungeons? That’s the hunters’ problem, right? All I want is the simple, ordinary life I’ve always dreamed of!

But, as they say, misfortune strikes when you least expect it.

In a not-so-coincidental coincidence, I touched a mysterious egg in a dungeon, and at that moment…

"Congratulations! You have awakened, Miss Yuina!"

I had awakened as an S-Class Spirit Master?!

With Iz, the mischievous spirit of water!
Rika, the playful spirit of wind!
And me, Yuina, the S-Class Spirit Master who has lost all hope of an ordinary life!

An S-Class Spirit Master's desperate journey to reclaim her peaceful life!
"Just give me back my normal life!"
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Long Strip, Adventure, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: To My Husband's Mistress
description:
I, Leticia Violet, was devoted to my husband, but I lost everything. Just as she is about to lose her life, a man appears in her life. He promises to help me achieve the perfect revenge...

"When you say you'll help me get my revenge... please honor your word."

To those who brought me to my death, I will give back all that I have received.

---
When Letitia Winchester faces death at the hands of her husband’s mistress, fate intervenes. She’s fished out of the river by Prince Sion, the first “Sol” born in a holy empire in 300 years. Using his divine powers, he changes Letitia’s appearance and gives her the new identity of Countess Anarose Victoire. Armed with divine powers and a thirst for revenge, the two form an unlikely alliance. Prince Sion seeks justice for a fallen friend, while Letitia plots retribution against those who wronged her.

Together, they embark on a journey of vengeance and redemption.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Not found
description: The elementary schooler unlike any other, Kugi Kizutaka—who is searching for "useful pawns" in order to achieve his own ambitions—comes to learn of Mizukura Risuka, a magician with the title "The Red Witch of Time." Risuka had left the Kingdom of Magic through the Gate, chasing after her father, a great mage called both "a God" and "a Demon." An unpredictable and unchained magical tale!
tags: Time Travel, Action, Psychological, Magical Girls, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Fall
description:
Seung Ji, who has been through a lot in an illegal organization rife is stabbed in the back by the boss... and joins a new smuggling organization as the youngest in order to hide.

Yeong Won, who grew up alone, meets her aunt by chance and who runs an illegal organization . She comes down from Seoul to Busan to manage a smuggling office full of thugs.

Seung Ji assists Yeong Won, who seems naive and awkward, and only looks for an opportunity to make a killing and run away. Seung Ji does not trust anyone and believes that in order to avoid being deceived, you have to deceive first. Yeong Won swears that she will never betray someone she loves. These two women, who have never been loved, gradually become defenseless against each other.
tags: Long Strip, Girls' Love, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Admission is a Waste of Time
description:
How about a university where you attend classes at the Tower of Babel? 

Ban Yoo-won possesses the extraordinary ability not only to interpret unknown languages but also to see and absorb "concepts" from the things he observes. 

Since childhood, Yoo-won’s grandfather has told him: "Our family descends from the ancestor who led people to build the Tower of Babel with the power to make everyone communicate. With that same inherited power, you will be able to reclaim the lost Tower of Babel." 

At first, Yoo-won thought it was just a far-fetched story. But while waiting for his university acceptance results, he is suddenly summoned to an academy from an unknown dimension. There, he witnesses the legendary Tower of Babel, which he had only heard about in stories. 

Driven by a somewhat materialistic desire to reclaim his family’s lost building and become its owner, along with a sincere wish to fulfill a long-standing family dream, Yoo-won enters the academy. 

Finally, he begins his climb up the Tower of Babel — a dungeon filled with dangers and monsters, where the power of constellations and, at its peak, the power of the gods, awaits him!
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Long Strip, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Reikan Aru Youkya to Kowai Inkya
description: Daily story about a spiritual positive character and a scary negative character

description:
A doujinshi anthology that simulates the feel of 90s shoujo horror magazines. Targeted at women and girls and thus is listed as a shoujo manga. 

Note: Sawhore Uploads scanlated some chapters in their site. Volume 1 is complete while 2 only has a few chapters.
Note 2: DO NOT make a mangaupdates page for this as it is listed as a magazine.

name: Renai Saido
description:
Ayumu attends a high school festival at the school of his former classmate and first love, Tsubame, but Tsubame's friend, Ryuu, sees through his unfulfilled feelings for his first love, and he is harshly criticized by him. Hurt, Ayumu tries to find a new love, but the person he meets almost kidnaps him. Ayumu is saved by Ryuu, who is unexpectedly ......?

A spin-off series of "[Hatsukoi Note](https://mangadex.org/title/6a36c2cb-d2f5-4b2b-9f72-d901a6884b99/hatsukoi-nooto)"!
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Boys' Love, School Life

name: See You Tomorrow At The Food Court.
description: Yamamoto and Wada are two childhood friends attending different high schools who convene every afternoon at the food court at their local mall to engage in blissfully mundane conversations.
tags: Comedy, Philosophical, School Life, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Soushi Souai
description:
In a world where opposites attract, a chance encounter sparks a connection between a serious black-haired girl and a charismatic blond delinquent, painting a cute tale of young love and friendships. As the series unfolds, their seemingly carefree lives take unexpected turns, delving into the shadows that haunt their lives. 

An artful blend of laughter and heartfelt moments, this manga tells about the complexities of youth, friendship, and your past catching up to you.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: Romance wa Banken to
description:
"His worst scandal...is me"
Lay, a former soldier, is the bodyguard of Alex, who is one of the most popular actors praised for his chic style. However, Lay soon finds out that his master, often called as the "perfect prince", is nothing more than a bratty troublemaker.
Lay must save and protect Alex's public image, but that mission includes one thing: to take care of Alex's sexual life as his 'stress reliever'...

The most clingy top-secret love between a younger, super arrogant celebrity and his cool, tanned-skin pretty bodyguard begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama

name: Magical Girl Akirara ☆
description: He became a magical girl, and his magical girl form fell in love with his buddy.
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Magical Girls, Web Comic

name: Aka Ihon to Kuro Ihon
description:
The collection of ghost stories gathered by Masaya Hokazono, author of "Kichikujima," is the "Ihon" series.

The much-anticipated manga adaptations of special works, previously excluded from past comicizations due to their ominous nature, are brought to life by the extraordinary talents of horror masters Noroi Michiru and Taimu, handpicked by Masaya Hokazono.

A dream collaboration! Bold reinterpretations to look out for!

- My House -  Taimu
- Hell Fujoshi - Noroi Michiru
- The Flapping Horror - Noroi Michiru
tags: Ghosts, Anthology, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.
description:
The second part in the official long-running series about the daily mischief and wacky buffoonery of Gensokyo's Three Fairies of Light.  
  
After Eastern and Little Nature Deity ended abruptly because Nemu Matsukura had to leave the project due to health reasons, artist Hirasaka Makoto took over as permanent artist for the series.  
  
2005: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Eastern and Little Nature Deity.  
2006: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Strange and Bright Nature Deity.  
2009: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Oriental Sacred Place.  
2016: Touhou Sangetsusei ~ Visionary Fairies in Shrine.

name: Mabataki yori Hayaku!!
description: The story centers on Himari Kohanai, a 15-year-old student who hates being clumsy. She wants to make her page in high school, but it's a mess, though, and yet Himari will do anything to get close to the person she admires. Even if it's getting into a totally unknown world… A story where little by little our main character will grow to reach her goal.
tags: Sports, Martial Arts

name: Tensei Renkin Shoujo no Slow Life
description:
Melia, a village girl who is on her third life after two overworked lives. She is determined to live a slower life this time, but her enthusiasm is tempered by an alchemy that she did not know was already out of date, however, said alchemy led to her suddenly being taken away...!

The start of an otherworldly workaholic fantasy!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Potion wa 160 km/h de Nageru Mono! ~Item-gakari no Ore ga Bannou Kaifukuyaku o Touteki suru Koto de Saikyou no Boukensha ni Nariagaru!?~
description:
Vino, a member of the A-class adventurer party Assault, is a potion user, the weakest and lowest level job. He meets a beautiful swordsman named Canadia, who is known as the God of Death. He was kicked out of the party and nearly died in a monster attack, but Vino awakened by chance with the single-minded desire to protect her! He discovered his own strong shoulders and a new way to use potions, even throwing potions to blast monsters to pieces.
___
**Character Designer:** [Nitaka](https://mangadex.org/author/80544dac-562c-47ec-abb8-35f07ec2bd12)
**Alt Official Raw:** [niconico Manga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54976)
tags: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Sayonara Diamond
description: Three women around their thirties who spent their youth in the softball club at an all-girls school gather under one roof! And what they started is a detective agency!
tags: Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: My Clueless First Friend
description: Akane Nishimura is a shy and gloomy elementary school girl with an unfounded dire reputation in her class due to her appearance. Taiyou Takada is a transfer student in her class who came from a small countryside school, and who is fascinated by the aspects of Nishimura that her classmates use to pick on her, finding her "darkness" cool beyond compare. Through the unbridled and fundamental joy Takada finds in being her friend, Nishimura starts realizing that being herself is not as bad as she thinks.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Henkyou no Yakushi, Miyako de S Rank Boukensha to naru ~Eiyuu-mura no Shounen ga Cheat Yaku de Mujikaku Musou~
description: Leaf has been enjoying a peaceful life in his village at the farthest end of the country, but everything gets turned upside down when his fiancée betrays him, robbing him of his home, work, and everything he cherishes. Wandering around, lost on what to do next, he encounters a distinguished lady in peril who will change his life forever! Using the cheat-like power of medicine and drugs the world scoffs at, Leaf now begins his journey to become the almighty healer!
tags: Magic, Harem, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Bakushin Ojou-sama Dou!
description: Sakuraba Sakurako is at the entrance ceremony of Neo Mogitori Academy, a school for training young ladies. She tries to enter the school with a dog as her companion, but the teacher stops her and she ends up fighting the dog. Sakurako narrowly wins the battle and meets the boys and girls who will work hard together to become the ultimate ojou-sama.
tags: Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Dead Mount Death Play
description:
A Necromancer called The Corpse God is fighting against the Church, that is trying to subjugate him. Using his last ounce of power against the Calamity Crusher, he gets defeated, but his reincarnation magic activates.  
 Suddenly, he got transported in a world of modern society and in a body of kid Polka Shinoyama. What is gonna happen to him in this world? What will he do?
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Action, Comedy, Crime, Zombies, Mafia, Magic, Isekai, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: Ninja Tensei Shinobi Kill
description: Chigachi Fuuta an ordinary high school student who really admires ninjas is gifted with an extraordinary legacy, namely the soul of Hattori Hanzo, a legendary ninja. But because of that legacy, Chigachi Fuuta is targeted by various shinobi and ninja who still survive in the modern era. Can Chigachi Fuuta overcome these obstacles?
tags: Action, Ninja, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Children, Don't Play with Ghosts!
description:
7 scary stories by Inuki Kanako   (4.1 and 4.2 were adapted into a movie, check Gokiburi no Ie's page for more info)

1- Ushirogami: 
2- Psycho Box: 
3- Children, Don't Play with Ghosts!: The mangaka, Kanako Inuki, tells some of her own scary experiences with ghost stories in childhood.
4- Women of the Dark (Kurayami no Onna-tachi)
4.1- Room 1: Woman that Loves Cooking
4.2- Room 2: Women in the Trash Dumping Area
4.3- Room 3: 117th Woman 
5- The House of Cockroaches: A rich woman has a deathly fear of cockroaches which leads to...
6- Nightmare Door: A girl experiences strange and horrifying nightmares.
7- 100 Ghost Stories
tags: Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Gore, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Gokiburi no Ie
description:
3 Stories (part 1 and 3 of chapter 1 and chapter 3) here were adapted into a movie called Bourei no Sumu Ie ~Kanako Inuki Kyoufu WORLD~  (亡霊の棲む家～犬木加奈子恐怖world～)

1. Kurayami no Onnatachi (*暗闇の女たち* Women of the Darkness) 
3 stories about women living normal lives in their apartments, but eventually everything starts going wrong.

2. Gokiburi no Ie (*ゴキブリの家* The House of Cockroaches)
A rich woman that has a terrible fear of cockroaches faces a bizarre cockroach infestation...

3. Kao no nai Onna (*顔のない女* Faceless Woman)
A woman's neighbor starts trying to take her identity and life...

4. Jukai Kitan (*樹海奇譚* Strange Tale of the Sea of Trees)
A man enters the famous Aokigahara forest, known for its suicides, and he finds the corpse of a beautiful woman, and decides to take photos of it...

5. Rei to Asobu na Kodomotachi!! (*霊と遊ぶな 子供たち!!* Children, Don't Play with Ghosts!!
Kanako Inuki tells her own scary stories from childhood.

6. Akumu no Tobira (*悪夢の扉* Door of Nightmares)
A girl is stuck in twisted fairytale-esque nightmares...
tags: Demons, Ghosts, Animals, Anthology, Gore, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural

name: Hakumei & Mikochi: Tiny Little Life in the Woods
description:
Nine centimeters (3.5 inches) tall, the tiny girls Hakumei and Mikochi live in the forest. Living in a house in a tree, riding insects and birds, and making umbrellas out of leaves, they live a happy and comfortable life. Follow their tiny but lovely lives as they live their day to day in a fantastic world of inchlings, animals, and strange happenings.
___
**#EverydayHeroes Scans Note:**
Chapter 39 is next after 34. No chapters were skipped, as we switched to using Harta magazine raws, and the chapters from the magazine use a different numbering system.
tags: Animals, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Sekai no Hate wa Shinai
description: Fuyuka is a female college student attending an art college in Tokyo, despite her parents' opposition. She feels guilty about leaving her younger brother, who has been supporting her in their strict family home, and running away from home by herself. One day, she is at her wit's end because she can't pay the rent, when her grown-up younger brother, Ameon, appears in front of her...! She is now living together with her brother, whose love is too heavy for her to bear!
tags: Romance, Drama

name: Koroshiteyaro to Omotta Aitei ga Dekiai shitekite Komarimasu
description: Mira lived comfortably as a princess of the kingdom of Axia. But one day, Mira is attacked by a neighboring prince, Leon, and dies vowing revenge against him. The next time Mira wakes up, time has rolled back two months before the incident ......? A reincarnated love story full of miscalculations, starting with revenge!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Reverse Harem, Magic, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Only I Know the World Is Ending and Getting Killed by Rampaging Beasts Only Makes Me Stronger
description: Akira Ichijo is your average, run-of-the-mill businessman. One day, on his way home from work, he is suddenly attacked by a Minotaur and killed on the spot. But in the blink of an eye... he wakes up back at the office! When monsters invade into the real world, a cruel reality sets in as the world as we know it plummets into destruction and death. But with the unique skill [Resurrection], Akira can come back to life every time he dies, all the while inheriting the same levels and skills from his last run at life! With unlimited chances to correct his past mistakes, it's up to Akira to utilize the skill he's given and survive this terrifying world with his childhood friend, Nao Nanase.
tags: Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Survival, Post-Apocalyptic, Magic, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Mizu Mahou Gurai Shika Torie ga Nai Kedo Gendai Chishiki ga Areba Juubun da yo ne?
description:
Frim, a 5-year-old orphan living in the streets of the slums district, was a Japanese person in her past life.

Her everyday life was filled with violence and injustice, and she had no one she could count on for help. What she had is "Magic That Can Produce Water" and "Modern Knowledge", that was it. Even hoping for a roof to sleep under was a luxury under such circumstances.

But the world was lacking in ideas about improving working conditions, and by coming up with new ways to use Water Magic aside from producing drinking water, Frim gradually makes a name for herself!

(Source: Comic-Walker)
tags: Reincarnation, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: The Fake Alchemist
description:
In another world,
there was a person
who made their living
doing alchemy.

Alchemy × Sorcery × Slave × Elf × Reincarnation × God × Cheat × Battle……
A work packed with everything fantasy brought to life with overwhelming brushwork!
tags: Action, Psychological, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Manshu Ahen Squad
description: Circa 1937. A Japanese soldier in Manchuria starts meddling in the opium trade but finds he may have bitten more than he can chew...
tags: Historical, Action, Crime, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Military, Drama, Delinquents, Mystery

name: Omniscient
description:
Deemed intellectually disabled from birth, Huang Ji, a backwoods country kid, somehow achieves complete omniscience. He feels the universe’s malice, sensing humanity’s dire predicament everywhere— Humans were unknowingly being controlled by aliens, secretly trafficked by fellow “human collaborators” worshipping their extraterrestrial overlords, all while the apocalypse looms!

As the one, true all-knowing being, Huang Ji decides to take on the monumental task of saving humanity, vowing to carve a place for mankind within this Cosmic Alliance!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Try Begging
description:
This work contains controversial content such as violence and rape.

 Please be advised. Captain 'Leon Winston' of the National Intelligence Division of the Western Command of the Rippon Kingdom. Unlike his elegant and noble appearance, he was the object of both envy and damnation for both his allies and enemies, known as the "Vampire of Camden" who would torture the rebels cruelly.

"Every time I see you, I just want to thrust my gun in your tight space."

Strangely, the maid of the interrogation room "Sally Briston" became the object of his desires, as strong as the rage he has for the insurgent rebels. She was ordinary and nothing special... Perhaps it was simply the smell of blood on her that excited him.

The interrogation didn't take long.

He realized it as soon as he heard her name come out from the rebel spy's lips. He no longer needed to suppress his violent desires.

"I stopped myself from tormenting her because I thought she was a good girl, but now there's no need for that. Thank you, Sally. No... Grace."

If you want to live, then try begging.

You never know.

I might hear you out.
tags: Historical, Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Crime, Sexual Violence, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: I Can't Get Enough of You
description: Outstanding talent. A look that won't be overlooked no matter where you are. A prosperous family. I lived by walking only on well-paved paths. Everything was so perfect to the point that it was boring. Then one day when I turned 30... Taejun Kim impulsively deviates from the path. To meet ‘Han So-eun’, the daughter of the driver who took his parents’ lives. 'With what kind of face did you come to this company?' The shameless face was disgusting. So he decided to stick around and torment her. Like a person who is impatient because he can't eat... “I think the director likes..."
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Couple Breaker
description:
Scrap the boring, run-of-the-mill dating show! Lovers gather together to test the strength of their love. One lover seeks revenge on their swapped lover, one couple seeks fame and another seeks to test their love.
Spicy lover’s revenge set in an ultra-popular hit dating entertainment show!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Full Color

name: Park Ha Mansion
description: Not found
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: 20,000 Years of Physical Cultivation
description:
Wu Linggen, once the chubby kid who was constantly bullied, suddenly dies from a heart attack brought on by his weight, only to awaken in a completely different world. With a fierce determination to finally build a strong body, he quickly realizes that he’s in a realm of cultivation—where those without spiritual roots are deemed worthless.

At first, he believes his newfound muscles might just help him scrape by in this bizarre land of monsters and demons. But he didn’t expect that his fists could punch through the entire world of immortal cultivation!
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Mr. Baek
description:
Federal Informant ‘Baek Yisu’ and a criminal gang’s boss, ‘Baek Dogyeong’ are twin brothers.

With the same faces the two twin brothers have lived different lives until now. Yisu, who’s been betrayed by the gang, throws away his identity to become his brother. This federal agent is soon to become the gang’s boss…!
tags: Long Strip, Crime, Mafia, Police, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Reborn Rich
description: Having started from the bottom and worked his way to the top, Hyeonwoo finds himself betrayed by the royal family of Soonyang Group, the largest corporation in South Korea, after providing 13 years of dedicated service. Just when he thinks all his efforts have been made in vain and prepares to embrace his death, he suddenly wakes up in the body of Dojun Jin, the youngest grandson to the founder and CEO of Soonyang, having traveled back in time. Having been granted this second chance, Hyeonwoo begins to lay the foundation for his revenge against his evil relatives.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Zenith
description:
"Without victory, survival is impossible."

In pursuit of becoming the supreme being among all living creatures, the mad martial artist, Ma Jinwol, once turned the martial world into a sea of blood. However, after a climactic battle with the Five Masters of the World, he was sealed away. Millennia have passed… and now, he awakens, not on Earth, but on an alien planet. 

Here, at the GSP, a universal combat tournament is held once every 100 years, and he prepares to face the strongest warriors once more.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Ulzzang Generation
description: The story of a generation filled with romance and chaos.
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Climax Necromance
description: On a battlefield where human soldiers and skeleton army soldiers engage in fierce battles. Azraila, a necromancer who kicks away the enemies around her, and Wraith, a black knight who follows her like a shadow, are confronted by their longtime nemesis Paraiso, when Ichika, a shaggy-haired woman in a sailor suit, is summoned to there.
tags: Monsters, Action, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy

name: Houkago no Idol ni wa Himitsu ga aru
description:
_"In my class, there is a true idol."_

A first-year high school student at an ultra-elite school, Hiruno has to be the top student in his class according to his strict mother's order, but when he fails to fill in his first achievement test, he gets a red mark and has to take a remedial class. However, there is another participant in the remedial class...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Kanojo no Imouto to Kiss wo Shita❤️
description: Hiromichi Satou has been single his whole life, but, he recently got a girlfriend named Saikawa Haruka, and they have been dating for a month. His father remarries, and he gets a new step-sister Saikawa Shigure, the identical twin of Haruka. Sato and Shigure agree to keep their step-sibling relationship a secret from everyone, and Haruka. How will the story unfold?
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Karigal
description: Mozuno Nie is a small, timid boy with a weak personality, often targeted by delinquents, or stumbling into open manholes—just a typical "prey type" with a knack for attracting trouble. One day, an obvious extrovert, a dark-skinned gyaru named Kakao, enters his life. With her loose-fitting uniform, a chest that seems ready to burst, and surprisingly well-defined abs, she's the complete opposite of Mozuno. She takes an interest in him, calling him "Prey" and making him the target of her "hunt"... but what could she be after!?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Gyaru

name: A Story About An Office Lady Who Ends Up Looking After A Clingy Delinquent High School Boy She Met at an Arcade
description:
Office lady Haru frequents the arcade daily to distract from her discontent with her company. There she easily crushes a delinquent high school boy in a game and somehow, he becomes attached to her. From acquaintances who just met at the arcade to gaming buddy, and beyond that, their relationship is...!?

A heart-pounding and heart-warming exchange between an office lady and a delinquent high school boy begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Delinquents

name: A Story About Becoming Temporary Lovers With a Classmate Who I Fell In Love With at First Sight
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 3 - Stardust Crusaders
description:
Third story arc of the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure series.

In 1989, Joseph Joestar arrives in Japan to meet his troubled grandson Jotaro Kujo at the request of his daughter Holly. Jotaro has locked himself in a jail cell out of fear that an evil spirit is possessing him and that he may cause harm to others. However, Joseph reveals the truth to Jotaro: this "spirit" is really a "Stand," a physical manifestation of one's fighting spirit. What's more, Joseph and his companion Mohammed Avdol possess Stands of their own and have learned to control them with ease.  
  
Joseph's arrival comes with another piece of news: an old family enemy has returned from the grave, causing the Stands of the Joestar family to awaken. However, when a Stand manifests within Holly, her inability to cope with it leaves her gravely ill, stirring the men into action.  
  
Armed with the power of Stands, a globe-trotting adventure from Japan to Egypt—where their adversary resides—begins. Meeting an array of nefarious Stand users along the way, as well as new allies, the team leads a crusade to save Holly and put an end to their enemy for good.
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 2 - Battle Tendency
description:
Second story arc of the JoJo's Bizarre Adventure series.    Takes place in the 1930s, and follows the misadventures of Joseph Joestar, the grandson of Jonathan Joestar, as he fights vampires and ancient super beings with some help from a cybernetically-enhanced Nazi and an Italian man he has a lot in common with.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/read/manga/jojo-s-bizarre-adventure-part-2-battle-tendency/all)
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural

name: Koisuru Jibaku-chan
description: A girl who "self-destructs" in front of the boy she likes, don't you find it adorable? This unprecedented amour explosion comedy depicts the various situations of girls who get embarrassed when their feelings of "love" slip out!
tags: Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Bakana Shinigami
description:
At the brink of death, a girl seems to have found a loophole in this particularly dumb death god's generosity. Or did she?  
  
Gods do indeed move in mysterious ways.  
  
Oneshot posted on Jump Rookie, a manga website run by Jump that showcases and develops new young mangaka.  
They compete for month awards in various categories and can win money awards.
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Supernatural

name: Oniisan no Hikkoshi no Katazuke ga Susumanai
description:
Takaho was pleasantly surprised when it was announced that her older cousin, Fujitsugu, would be moving in with them.   
He was her first crush and she was hoping to deepen her bond with him as a little sister.   
Little did she know that her seemingly handsome and perfect cousin was actually…
tags: Romance, Comedy, Crossdressing, Slice of Life

name: Yugami-kun ni wa Tomodachi ga Inai
description: The story of the comedy manga revolves around Yugami Yuuji and Watanuki Chihiro, who sit next to each other in class. Unfortunately for the transfer student Chihiro, Yuuji is weird… extremely weird. Even though he's the ace of the baseball club, he hasn't adapted to the club at all. He also stands apart from the rest of the class, but seems completely satisfied with being alone.
tags: Comedy, Sports, School Life, Slice of Life

name: The Transfer Student at the Top of the Class
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Sci-Fi, School Life, Web Comic

name: A Kouhai Trying to Make Me Say I Like Her
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic

name: Bouncer -Tokyo Fist-
description:
Jouichirou Shishido, a 19-year-old man whose frank honesty has cost him 26 part-time jobs. One night, he runs into a group of muscular bodyguards who protect the streets at night, members of a private security firm known as “Tokyo Fist”, which ends up changing his life.
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/bouncer-tokyo-fist)
tags: Action, Crime, Martial Arts, Mafia, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Delinquents

name: Sigrid
description:
She always lived by the rules. She thought her life had been honourable. She was loyal to the emperor, even at the cost of her life. But the only thing she got in return was the blade of the guillotine.

"Why? Why is it like this?" she kept asking before her death.

However, when she opened her eyes, she had returned to five years before she died.

"Was the way I lived wrong?" she kept thinking.

Sigrid decided to change her way of life. What to eat, what to wear, what to buy, everything. The way she changed led her to be the centre of everything. Although, everything eventually started to go back to the way it was. And so, Sigrid came face-to-face with her old rival and enemy, Veramud.

"It begins by making friends."

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/48526879)

[Original Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/content/60907554)

description:
An old man was hit by a truck and found himself reincarnated as a cat.
___

name: Futsuu no Keionbu (Pre-Serialization)
description: Not found

name: Zombieman
description: A mysterious figure holds fifty-two black cards that represent humankind's fears. Knives, clocks, mirrors and even tests! And as his stories end Hino gives us even more terror with Zombie Man, Rotten Rain and Horror at the Wax Museum!
tags: Monsters, Zombies, Gore, Horror, Supernatural

name: Watashitachi wa Moto Joshi desu
description:
Rinko Mino, a first-year high school student, is a female manager of the volleyball club. She fell in love with her senior Yuki in the same club, worked hard at club activities, and she had a normal and enjoyable life. 

When she woke up one morning... She was a boy!? What will happen to the youth of Rinko, a girl who suddenly became the opposite sex!!?
tags: Genderswap, Psychological, Comedy, Crossdressing, Drama, School Life

name: I'll Raise You Well in This Life, Your Majesty!
description:
When Ellisa opens her eyes and sees her young son, Leon, staring at her with eyes full of love and concern, she realizes that, by some miracle, she’s been given a second chance. In her past life, she thought making Leon emperor was the only way to ensure his safety. But if she had known Leon had never wanted the crown, or that laying a crown soaked with the blood of his enemies and beloved ones at his feet would mean he would take his own life before her eyes, she would’ve found another way. In this life, Ellisa is determined to find a way that will ensure both Leon’s survival and happiness. This time, things will be different.

---

**Note:** This work was first published in the order Japanese, English, and the Korean version after. Authors of this work are a Korean-Japanese duo, but this work is based on a Korean Web Novel.

**Links:**
* [Official Chinese (Simp) Translation](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc31390)

name: The Troubles of an Honor Student
description: Inaba Akira, a second year student at Naruyama High School, is a candidate for the next student council president due to his good manners and excellent grades. He was highly trusted by his teachers, and was loved by his classmates for his bright and friendly personality. However, he also had a serious problem...
tags: Oneshot, Award Winning, Psychological, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Laughing Flesh Face
description: "There's nothing in this world that money can't buy!" Denko got the "face" of Sayuri, the most beautiful girl in school, for a lot of money. WIth her beautiful face, she even stole Sayuri's lover...!? Super SHOCKING!! Maruinu's very scary story.
tags: Gore, School Life, Horror, Mystery

name: Romansa & Difabel
description: Adapted from a famous story from an indonesian storyboard website "ffschan" anonymous users, Romansa & Difabel. tells about Awan, a high school student who has to help Difa, a neighbor who is Awan's classmate who has to sit in a wheelchair due to an accident. this story are focusing to their daily lives.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Touhou - Kappa-Squad
description:
This is a German doujinshi based on ZUNs Touhou series. It follows the adventures of four kappa from the Genbu Ravine that deal with living in Nitori Kawashiro’s shadow.

Chapter 2 and upwards are in color.
tags: Comedy, Doujinshi, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: I Don't Know the Original, I'm Too Busy Trying to Make a Living
description:
One month after getting married, the lord and husband went out to hunt monsters and returned as a corpse.  Penelope, still in shock, realizes that she’s reincarnated into a novel.

But before she can even accept the fact she was reincarnated, issues of the estate start flooding in!

“The price of turnips has dropped again.”
“The people of the estate will need at least three months’ worth of emergency supplies to get through the winter.”
“Firewood…”
“Water…”

Wait a minute… I don’t know anything about managing an estate!

“I think we should hire a magician to work in the estate.”
“I’ll only work for 100,000 gold.”

Just when she thought there was no way out, she gets help from the head of the magic tower… but something about this man seems suspicious.

“Want to touch it?”
“Touch what?”
“My hair. You’ve been staring at it since last time, you wanted to touch it, didn’t you?”

The head of the magic tower, the kind-hearted, dog-loving second male lead, seems a bit off this time.

Maybe I should just run away from the estate.
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Okitsune Gal Katabami-san
description: A very ordinary and serious high school student, Kamou-kun. Though his days are filled with diligent study, his concern lies in his childhood friend, Katabami-san, who interferes with his studies every day. And to make matters more complicated, Katabami-san's true identity is... a fox spirit!?---**Alternative Raw:** [Nico Nico Seiga](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/comic/66393)
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Gyaru

name: A Girl with a High Melting Point
description: Not found

name: Sutema!
description:
Homura continues to travel back in time to save Madoka, but this time she arrives at the timeline where she is adopted by Madoka!
Kyoko, who was picked up by Sayaka, and Mami, a member of a group that protects stray Puella Magi, join her, and the story of the abandoned Puella Magi begins!
tags: Animals, Comedy, Magical Girls, Magic, Slice of Life

name: Notpia
description:
Collection of the mangaka's BL works from 1994 to 1996. 3 chapters scanlated.

1 • Kept Youth
A boy, infatuated with his school's doctor, follows him home one day... and finds out that the doctor has been keeping a "pet" in his bed. Who is the boy being kept? But more importantly, why does he look so much like the protagonist?

2 • D-Saka Detective Agency: D-Saka ch.1

3 • Love Bazooka: D-Saka ch.2

4 • Precocious Liaison

5 • Boxed Youth

6 • Dedicated Body
Dr. Shibusawa decides that his young son Keiri should get an early start in the medical field if he's going to inherit his clinic, so he introduces Keiri to the fascinating world of dissection, despite his wife's disapproval. Keiri gains a taste for dissection, Shibusawa suffers his strained marriage, and his wife discovers what's really up with her husband and his constantly snickering assistant in this odd little story.

7 • Handsome Youth In Ice

8 • Dark Honey, Youth
A boy discovers that a biology teacher with some strange habits has been watching him.


Includes guro and non-guro, regular bl.
tags: Romance, Anthology, Boys' Love, Incest, Crime, Sexual Violence, Gore, School Life, Horror, Shota, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Raitei no Kiseki: Ore dake Tsukaeru "Kaminari Majutsu" de Isekai Saikyou ni!
description:
What I have in my hand is "thunder magic" that only I can use...!

The adventure story of a boy who was reborn as the one and only lightning magician to become the strongest in a different world begins now!
tags: Reincarnation, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Adaptation

name: The Exiled Duke Wanted to Take it Easy On the Frontier and Work the Fields.
description: Reincarnated from Earth into a world of magic and tradition, Joshua, the son of a duke, is exiled to a barren frontier after the saintess declares he is not following the oracle’s prophecy. Hoping to live a quiet and uneventful life, his plans are upended when the people from his former dukedom abandon their lands to follow him, insisting he remains their true lord. Reluctantly, Joshua takes on the task of transforming the wasteland into a thriving home for his followers, vowing to complete the work in three years so he can finally enjoy the peaceful life he longs for.
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: So Shine!!
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Self-Published, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Tokubetsu na Chuutohanpa
description:
"What does it mean to be dating exactly...?"

They're not friends.
But they're also not lovers.
It's a story about these two's half-relationship.
tags: Romance, Girls' Love, Drama, School Life, Gyaru

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 1 - Phantom Blood
description:
First story arc of the Jojo's Bizarre Adventure series.  
  
Jonathan Joestar, a young wealthy son living in Victorian England, has his life destroyed by a recently orphaned Dio Brando, who was taken in by Jonathan's father. Dio, who plots to drive Jonathan to insanity and inherit the Joestar fortune, becomes an unstoppable vampire that Jonathan must fight.

[Official English](https://www.viz.com/read/manga/jojo-s-bizarre-adventure-part-1-phantom-blood/all)
tags: Action, Comedy, Martial Arts, Adventure, Gore, Drama, Vampires, Supernatural

name: Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san
description:
*If you blush, you lose!*  Living by this principle, the middle schooler Nishikata gets constantly made fun of by his seat neighbour Takagi-san. With his pride shattered to pieces, he vows to turn the tables and get back at her someday.   And so, he attempts to tease her day after day, only to find himself falling victim to Takagi-san's ridicule again sooner than later. Will he be able to make Takagi-san blush from embarrassment even once in the end? English Chapters have been renumbered to their tank numbers, where applicable.*

---
- **Won the 66th Shogakukan Manga Award for Shonen in 2021**
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Cheese in the Trap
description: Having returned to college after a year long break, Hong Sul, a hard-working over-achiever, inadvertently got on the wrong side of a suspiciously perfect senior named Yoo Jung. From then on, her life took a turn for the worse - and Sul was almost certain it was all Jung's doing. So why is he suddenly acting so friendly a year later?
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Mystery, Full Color

name: Seirei-tachi no Rakuen to Risou no Isekai Seikatsu
description: It's the Golden Week, and Morizono Yuuta can't wait to spend the next 11 days staying home and conquering all of his games and manga. After a trip to the supermarket to stock up on food however, he found himself stranded in a wasteland with no sight of human. Now he's just gonna have to find a way to live in this world aided only by some magic tools and numerous Spirits whom he came into contact with.
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Doom Breaker
description:
"An opportunity's an opportunity, no matter how slimy these gods who grant them may be. If they want a show, I'll give them one!"

Zephyr is the last human fighting evil in a world abandoned by the gods. When he is killed in battle by Tartarus, the god of destruction, all hope for humanity seems lost.

But Zephyr's fate is not sealed - the gods who find his battles entertaining have gifted him a second chance at life, as he is sent ten years into the past, back to when he was a slave instead of the most powerful human alive.

Can Zephyr get his revenge against Tartarus and save the woman he loves, or is he doomed to repeat the past?

---
[Webtoon PV](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=BOqe_XcNCBo)
