name: Seishun Protagonist
description:
"Every person is the protagonist of his or her own life. But how many of us can truly live. How many of us can truly be the hero of our own lives?" Youth Protagonist.

This is a love story about a high school boy who thinks he is incapable of love for one reason or another, and a girl classmate who falls in love with him.
tags: Romance, Drama, School Life

name: Kawaii Joushi wo Komarasetai
description: Ira Megumi is a 31-year-old woman who is currently at the top of her career. She's a beautiful woman who's brimming with pride and totally has no interest in love or marriage. Though the next morning, she wakes up and finds the new employee, Aoki Shun, sleeping next to her. Just what in the world happened?!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, 4-Koma, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Ansatsu Skill de Isekai Saikyou: Renkinjutsu to Ansatsujutsu o Kiwameta Ore wa, Sekai o Kage kara Shihai suru
description:
Late has just accepted an assassination request from a mysterious client. To his surprise, it was actually the goddess Mises, a goddess from another world whose existence was on the brink of destruction after her defeat in war. Mises' quest… is to assassinate Masra Dzur, another god in her world.

Can Late, the killer with a 99.9% success rate, fulfill this otherworldly assassination?
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Isekai, Adaptation

name: Heroine wa xx o Kasegitai
description: Not found
tags: Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Adventure, School Life

name: Tendou-ke Monogatari
description: A girl saves Houjou family's third daughter from drowning herself. The girl takes her place as Houjou Ran who shall become the Tendou family's bride but her deceit is seen through..?
tags: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Drama

name: Amateur E-girl Streaming a Space War
description:
On a day just like any other, a giant spaceship suddenly appeared and invaded Earth, obliterating entire cities in the blink of an eye. In the midst of the attacks, Kanna Fujimiya, amateur content creator, rose to fame overnight with her video coverage of the invasion. With her newfound popularity and charms, Kanna continues to cover the war from the front lines, but…!?  
  
This amateur content creator reveals the truth behind the interstellar war in this science fiction thriller!
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Gore, Aliens

name: Isekai Yurutto Survival Seikatsu ~Gakkou no Minna to Isekai no Mujintou ni Tenishitakedo Ore Dake Rakushou desu~
description:
I’m Shinomiya Hokage, a 3rd-year high-school boy who dreams of a survival life. One day, everyone in my school transferred to a mysterious island in a parallel world. I woke up in an unknown cave and I started moving on my own. Then, I met up with some of my classmates. My knowledge and tools in survival shines through. I was a plain guy in school but I’m the leader in this world.  
  


---
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Sexual Violence, Harem, Isekai, Gore, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Chotto Ippai!
description: 16 year old Miyahara Momiji starts working part-time at an Izakaya called Koharuya.
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: Ouritsu Majutsu Gakuin No Kichiku Koushi
description:
Setsuna is a perverted instructor who is unable to invoke magic. As a part-time Instructor at the Royal Academy of Magic, he continually tells his students to self-study. The new students who entered the academy with high expectations are disappointed in Setsuna, and judging him to be incompetent, they challenge him to a Geas duel.

《Will you resign if I win?》
《“I”? Surely you mean “we”… All of you have been pretty annoying, so I want you all to take me on. But in return, you know what will happen if you lose, right?》

Setsuna plays with the special students, who are the best in a hundred years, with perverse and astonishing magic that is unthinkable in common sense! But behind the demon-like behavior, could there be a true purpose…?
___
**Character Designer:** [zunta](https://mangadex.org/author/844f9d85-2b7f-46fe-a69d-5c3e84cc2142/zunta)
tags: Action, Demons, Samurai, Adventure, Magic, Harem, Fantasy, Vampires, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo! - Modern Konosuba (Doujinshi)
description:
Ever wondered what would happen if the characters from the series Konosuba were put in a Modern setting?

Well here you have the answer!!!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Doujinshi, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Sekai de Yuuitsu no Tenshokushi: Job Hopper na Ore wa, Isekai de Subete no Job o Kiwameru Koto ni Shita
description:
Tsukasa, a company employee who repeatedly changes jobs in search of better conditions, challenges the final interview of a major corporation.  But as soon as he went past the door, he found himself in another world. His past career seems completely irrelevant, leading to a sense of discouragement. But, the "Job Changer" bestowed upon him grants him a unique ability!

With the power to freely switch between jobs like swordsman, mage, spear user, alchemist, appraiser, pharmacist, and more, he begins a leisurely life in this different world. Whether dealing with monsters or making use of abundant knowledge from herbs to items, he adapts effortlessly, engaging in everything from helping people to earning money. 

Unstoppable with his versatile skills, the powerful corporate slave leaps into a fantasy of career advancement!
tags: Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Ie ga Moete Jinsei Dou Demo Yoku Natta kara, Nokotta Nakenashi no Kin de Dark Elf no Dorei o Katta.
description:
He lost his new home and all his property, but found a cute girl!  
   
Harold, a poor laborer who saved for years, finally obtained the house of his dreams, only to lose it to a fire the very same day. Feeling like nothing mattered anymore, Harold finds himself at an auction, where he ends up spending all of his savings on a slave, Atie…  
  
Harold, with his secret technique, and Atie, with her skills as an adventurer, begin their freewheeling journey now!  
Drawn by hentai artist.
  
[Webnovel link](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n0884fk/)
tags: Monsters, Romance, Martial Arts, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Shota, Adaptation

name: The Girl Without Relatives
description: Anyway, I'm gonna dote on her.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Philosophical, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: MELTY BLOOD: TYPE LUMINA Piece in Paradise
description:
The curtain rises on Shiki's feverish Melty Blood battle!

Tohno Shiki and Arima Miyako challenge 'Melty Blood: Type Lumina', the fighting game based on 'Tsukihime -A piece of blue glass moon-'! In addition, Arcueid, Ciel and other characters also get involved... This is an introductory manga to help you enjoy playing 'Melty Blood: Type Lumina'!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Video Games, Vampires, Web Comic

name: Sakusei Byoutou Zen-nennrei-ban
description:
Yamada was hospitalized after breaking both hands, to make things worse, due to a unknown condition he has to ejaculate every three hours. The ward is full of evil nurses. Will Yamada be able to live and be discharged from the hospital?

TLDR: Guy has busted hands, gets sent to hospital for chronic ejaculation, guy gotta get his nuts busted by busty whacko nurses.
tags: Comedy, Harem, Medical

name: Gas-tou Norainu Tanteidan
description: The setting is London at the end of the 19th century. A young vagrant boy, Louie, meets Sherlock Holmes, a consulting detective who has just opened his own practice, after a murder case. Despite his hatred for Holmes, who does not pay attention to cases involving anything but the upper class, Louie decides to become Holmes' "dog" and work for him in order to gain the ability to protect the homeless children.
tags: Historical, Crime, Drama, Mystery

name: Help! I Had Transmigrated and My Snake Husband Pampered Me Too Much
description:
Lu Ling transmigrated into the Beast World novel that he had just read halfway through before going to bed, and became a cannon fodder, deer beast.

The current plot is that after Lu Linggang agreed to Snake Ying's "courtship" request, he would use his fiancé Snake Ying to get the winter resources.

After Lu Ling transmigrated, she couldn't bear Snake Shadow to experience the plot of being "betrayed by herself" and "ruthlessly abandoned" again.

Although Snake Shadow's departure may lead to her failure in the future, Lu Ling still decided to "break off the marriage", but she was helpless every time.

What will happen to Lu Ling?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Regressed Mercenary's Machinations
description:
Ghislain Perdium, the Mercenary King and one of the continent's top seven, started a great war in an attempt to avenge his fallen family.

His plans of revenge were going smoothly until he was slain by Idun, who he had never expected to make an appearance. Ghislain thought he died, but he woke up as a younger version of himself from before the fall of his household.

With this second chance, he decided to fix all the wrong pieces of the puzzle and avoid making the same mistakes he did in his past life!
tags: Time Travel, Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Yurizukushi no Kyoushitsu de
description:
"Everyone is the main character in the story of their own life."

The stories of a 2nd year 1st class attended by 30 unique students, at a certain girls' high school with a decent standard.
Every day the class is so busy and lively that you won't get bored.

If you look closely at the classroom, you can see the thoughts of each of the 30 students.
A school omnibus that watches over unique and a "yuriful'' classroom!

In a Yuriful Classroom
tags: Girls' Love, School Life

name: Kuroko no Basket - Tonari no Akashi-kun (Doujinshi)
description: Pairing: Akashi Seijuurou x Kuroko Tetsuya
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Boys' Love, Doujinshi, Cooking

name: Lout of Count's Family
description:
Kim Roksu has one life motto: “Let’s not get beat up.”

But after dozing off somewhere midway through the novel “Birth of a Hero,” he wakes up as Cale Henituse - one of the minor villains in the novel who gets the beating of a lifetime from soon-to-be hero Choi Han.

Only time will tell how much longer he has before that dreadful encounter. Can Kim Roksu change the course of this story so he can enjoy a long and lavish life free of the soon-to-be hero?
tags: Reincarnation, Monsters, Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Survival, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: This Sweet Online Date Is a Disaster
description: I was helping my sister win the heart of the game's top-ranked player, but it turned out to be a total disaster! I was even ridiculed by that gaming master!!! I guess no one can defy Murphy's Law! Just as the game was loading... Ding! Notice: Your husband is now online!
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Boys' Love, Video Games, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Dragon ni Sando Hikareta Ore no Tensei Shokunin Life ~Isharyou (Skill) de Cheat & Harem~
description: Over 40 and still stuck in a dead-end adventurer's life. Then one day, I got run over by a dragon and died. In the next life, as compensation, I was reincarnated—only to be run over and killed again. The third life? Yep, run over again (you get the idea). So, for my fourth reincarnation, I decided to live as a craftsman instead of an adventurer. After all, the compensation from the dragon has given me cheat-level abilities, and for some reason, beautiful, busty ladies are taking care of me... Things are going surprisingly well!
tags: Reincarnation, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy

name: Kankei Kaizen wo Akiramete Kyori wo Oitara, Shiotaioudatta Konyakusha ga Karande Kuru you ni Narimashita
description:
"I was forced to take Beatrice as my fiancée. I was reluctant from the beginning."

Beatrice, the hated duke's daughter, knew that her fiancé, Prince Ernest, was saying that. She decides to keep her distance from the prince.

"Come to think of it, until now I've been so obsessed with Ernest that I haven't interacted much with other people. What a shame."

For some reason, Ernest, who has been avoiding her until now, is now actively getting involved with her, but she simply wants to enjoy her academy life with her good-looking Margrave son and her good-natured friends. It's coming–?!

---
[Original Web Novel](https://ncode.syosetu.com/n1691gn/)
tags: Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Monstrous Heart
description:
Su Yuan, a poor student, in order to not place any additional burdens on his family, accidentally got himself enrolled into a college named, Ogus University. But soon he discovered that this institution was actually established for the protection of monsters (demons); and the physically weaker humans, in order to protect their lives, had to form partnerships—called PAL—with those monsters. Furthermore, as a result of his unique scent, many are drawn towards him in hopes of becoming his PAL; and at same time, he is also subjected to various attacks. That was, at least, until the day he rescued a fox covered in blood from head to toe, only to then discover…  


---
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Gorin no Megami-sama ~Nadeshiko Ryou no Medal Gohan~
description: The main character, Kominato Ryo, who is only engaged in cooking, was allowed to enter the prestigious Cho Gakuen Private School on the condition that he work as a cook in a student dormitory under the supervision of his father. However, the “dormitory” was the women's dormitory where future gold medal candidates lived. The nutritional requirements of top athletes are naturally high. Fill their stomachs and take on the challenging mission of building your body for the Olympic Games!
tags: Traditional Games, Romance, Comedy, Sports, Harem, School Life, Slice of Life, Cooking

name: The Male Lead Is Trying to Change the Female Lead
description:
I ended up possessing the body of an extra named Luberia, who is barely mentioned in the story. And right in the tragic novel *Emperor Caesar*, full of wars and disasters, where the protagonist sacrifices everything for the love of the hero and everyone ends up dying! I planned to live discreetly and hide my strength... 

But the male lead, Caesar, keeps looking for me and even proposes marriage, saying he wants to keep me around. Luberia doesn't want to meet the same tragic end as the protagonist, so she tries to avoid Caesar at all costs... But due to Caesar's intimidating appearance and assertiveness, before she knows it, she ends up engaged to him. 

Will Luberia manage not to fall in love with Caesar and survive until the end?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Golden Week Owacchatta...
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: My Wife Is the Demon Queen
description:
Listen up folks! I’m living my life with the Demon Queen!  
  
A normal powerless male protagonist is entrusted to look after the fallen Demon Queen Isabella. Depleted of her powers, Isabella is forced to camouflage as a human and suppress her regal status. Evil masterminds plot to dethrone the powerful Demon Queen in a medieval fantasy land.
tags: Demons, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Not found
description:
Suzu, an art student in a creative rut, finds new inspiration when she meets a beautiful girl at the park who introduces her to the colourful world of birdwatching.  
  
Serialised monthly in Manga Time Kirara.
tags: Animals, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life, Slice of Life

name: At the End of the Road
description:
After a car accident, Taemin finds himself in the body of Siwon, who was a victim of bullying at school. No longer a pushover, he starts standing up for himself but then meets Woojin, an old friend from the past. Somehow, Woojin immediately picks up Tamin's 'scent' from Siwon. What happened between these two in the past and how will it affect their future?

---
- [Original Book <Yes24>](http://www.yes24.com/Product/Goods/72104857)

- [Original Book <Aladin>](https://www.aladin.co.kr/shop/wproduct.aspx?ItemId=189230382)

- [Official Japanese Translation](https://www.lezhin.jp/ja/comic/_end)
tags: Psychological, Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Full Color

name: The World Is Mine
description: Meet Mon, a violent killer faithful only to his own eruptive desires, and his timid companion Toshi, a demolition-devil with a fanatical thirst for destruction. Their killing-spree across Japan is destined to intersect the path of the enormous "Higumadon," a mysterious beast on a Godzilla-like rampage from Hokkaido to Tokyo.
tags: Action, Psychological, Gore, Drama, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Katsu!
description: Satoyama Katsuki is a carefree 15 year-old high school kid, and a pretty lazy one at that. However, he secretly has a crush on a girl who happens to share his name: Mizutani Katsuki. Upon finding out that Mizutani's father used to be a pro-boxer, and she herself infatuated with the sport, he reluctantly joins a boxing gym in order to impress Mizutani. Satoyama is quick to find out he may have the blood of a genius boxer running through his veins…
tags: Romance, Comedy, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Ball and Chain
description:
I don't want a "Happiness" determined by someone else.
Distressed by her husband who treats her coldly (Aya)
Feeling "her" gender identity shaken, "she" is stalling the marriage (Keito)
These lives unknowingly intersects....
Be it "woman" or "wife". Be it "normal" or "common sense". This is a story for those who fight against what restricts them.
tags: Drama, Slice of Life

name: Hell Warden Roruv
description:
Hell, The last place in the cycle of birth. 
Where every soul has to pass. 
Filled with judgment and punishment, And "Roruv," the young daughter of the Hell Lord. 
She's in charge of the 4th Hell. 
And today, she acted out her part excellently. 
To give punishment to those hell animals. Until...
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: AREA D
description: The "prison survival action" story is set after the sudden emergence of special powers in certain pockets of humanity. To deal with these so-called "Altered," a mysterious remote island prison named "Area D" was built.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: World Trigger Border Briefing File
description:
Official World Trigger data book consisting of the following sections, which are preceeded by an illustration collection:
1. Border Data Base
2. Border Development Section
3. Neighbors Special Management Office 
4. Reader Rank War
5. Black Box

Additionally, it includes the oneshot [Jitsuryokuha Elite Jin](https://mangadex.org/title/c29fb8fd-f053-4f33-90ee-331b3e112133) alongside a special interview with the author.
tags: Sci-Fi

name: Ane ga Kensei de Imouto ga Kenja de
description: The Ralk Kingdom is a country of extreme meritocracy, but Razel, the son of the stupid king, has no talent for martial arts, and because he is always compared to his older sister who is a sword saint and his younger sister who is a sage, he gets banished from the kingdom. From then on, he tries to live as an adventurer in a different country, but his older and younger sisters, who love him dearly, come after him!?
tags: Comedy, Incest, Adventure, Harem, Fantasy, Adaptation

name: Shimauma
description:
Tatsuo, Hide, Satoshi and Aya worked together to cheat people out of money. They tended to target marriage services, where they con money out of people looking for love. They were good at it, until they crossed the wrong guy. Then they saw the world below the surface of dupes to cheat, when the 'collection agency' came for them with extreme violence.  
  
The person who takes Satoshi and Hide, and then Aya and Tatsuo, is a wild-eyed maniac who seems to get off on the torture. There may be hope for Tatsuo, though, because the man recognizes him. The torturer is "Akasada" a bullied kid that Tatsuo knew from school. Now Tatsuo and Aya have been pulled, against their will, into Aka's world.
___
**Official English:** [emaqi - United States & Canada only!](https://emaqi.com/manga/zebra)
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Survival, Mafia, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Delinquents, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Eternal Sword God
description:
He stood at the pinnacle of the world. Surpassing all since birth in the art of the sword. But fate has left him crippled moments before reaching the apex. But the story continues and the legend will rise again…

---
- **Note:** 2nd Place in 15th Chinese Golden Dragon Manhua Awards
tags: Award Winning, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Osananajimi wo Erabenai! (Shorts)
description:
This is a shorts manga version of the [main work](https://mangadex.org/title/b8fd9d83-40c4-40f9-8525-bfcab3a6c3eb/osananajimi-wo-erabenai) serialized in Gangan Joker.

It's not necessary to read the main story to be able to follow this one.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Web Comic

name: No Guns Life
description: After the war, there are many "Extends" in the city, people whose bodies were modified to make them into dangerous weapons. Inui Juuzou is one of them, and he has no memories of his life and body before his head was transformed into a gun. Strangely enough, his head-gun is designed so that only someone behind him can pull the trigger. Juuzou makes a living by taking on cases involving Extends in the city, and he is assisted by Mary, an intelligent young woman that he has taken under his protection.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Monsters, Action, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Martial Arts, Military, Gore, Drama, Mystery

name: 11-banme no Neko wa Nene
description:
Nene is a tiny waitress in a country where cat people live. She looks like a kitten, but she has a big dream and a secret...?

Let's start a thrilling life as a cat, as nene learns "cat-ness" from her seniors!
tags: Animals, Comedy, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Seeds of Anxiety*
description: Continuing in the same vein as previous installm*e*nts, a new collection of "everyday horror" vignettes, organized around them#$@*es.
tags: Monsters, Demons, Psychological, Ghosts, Anthology, Gore, Drama, Horror, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Oshi ga Yuurei ni Narimashite
description:
We are sad to inform you that our member "Yumemomo" has passed away.
Our idol of choice has died. In front of the wisdom of idol otaku who cannot accept the reality,
Yumemomo, who was supposed to be dead, appears as a ghost.
tags: Oneshot, Ghosts, School Life, Supernatural

name: A Friend Who I Went to the Same Middle School With but Have Never Talked To
description:
Kimura Hajime and Hanasaki Aya went to the same middle school but have never talked to each other. They ended up going to the same high school but will their relationship remain the same?
___
Published in Shounen Sunday 2020 Issue 21.
tags: Oneshot, Romance, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Oyacocco
description:
Oyacocco centers around the relationship between a single dad and his child.

(Source: Anime News Network)
tags: Drama

name: Hinatsugimura
description:
The fate of anyone who wanders into that mountain village is one of two: either they become a resident of the village, or they live on as part of the village itself. In any case, they can never return to the outside world.

A tale of passion and sensuality in a supernatural horror by Aki Shimizu, now finally compiled into a long-awaited book!
tags: Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Isekai ni Teni Shitara Yama no Naka datta. Handou de Tsuyosa yori mo Kaitekisa o Erabimashita
description:
One summer day, Jin Konohana, is forced to carry luggage to a firework festival by his outrageous older sister, and before he knows, he finds himself in an unfamiliar mountain. In the mountains where no one is around, Jin begins a life of survival all by himself.
In order to survive... I want to throw away all the troublesome things and live peacefully and comfortably! 
A slow life in another world that begins in the mountains!
tags: Monsters, Adventure, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Ryota Killed His Brother
description:
When their mother dies, junior high school student Ryota takes care of his toddler brother Chika and their home. 

Overwhelmed by all the work, he begins neglecting himself. Without any time to himself, Ryota comes to resent his little brother and soon the resentment turns into murderous thoughts. Little by little the pressures of childrearing make Ryota lose his mind. 

But is Ryota truly the issue? Or…
tags: Monsters, Psychological, Horror, Supernatural

name: Makina-san no Mama Naranai Hibi
description:
I am a babysitting android named MAK-17.
My plentiful interactions with babies have helped me develop something like a "heart".
No matter how many times I'm sold to a recycling shop, meeting new babies brings light into my life.
Now, I wonder what kind of baby I'll meet next?
N-...no matter how I look at him... he's an "adult", right...?
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: I'm Da Best
description: The story of junior high school student new outlook on life. Its an inspiring tale of the many issues in our modern society. And the undue pressures of society to conform their standards instead of being yourself. For those who dealt with issues such as bullying, weight, and appearance. This series is a must read.
tags: Long Strip, Comedy, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Re-Kan!
description: High school girl Hibiki Amami has a sixth sense of perceiving and interacting with ghosts and supernatural beings as well as talking with cats and other animals. The story follows their everyday antics.
tags: Ghosts, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Supernatural

name: Paper Braver
description:
An RPG-style high school comedy set in present-day Japan, centering around Shiromado Hijiri, a very serious White Mage, and Michibikari Yuuto, a motivationless Hero.

Watch as they futilely struggle to raise the level of the hopeless Hero, day in and day out, in order to one day defeat the Demon Lord.
tags: Comedy, Fantasy

name: A Big Shot Actually
description: Li Nianfan transmigrated to an immortal cultivation world as a mortal. Knowing that he could never become a cultivator, he decided to live an ordinary life. But unbeknownst to him, his dog became a mighty Yaoguai king by watching him draw and write; the tree he planted in the backyard became the tree of the world by listening to tunes he played; a passerby he met, who gained enlightenment from the chitchat with him, became a Taoist sage and started a new era...
tags: Action, Long Strip, Comedy, Martial Arts, Harem, Wuxia, Drama, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Neko no Hi
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Animals, Comedy, Girls' Love

name: Shingeki no Eroko-san ~Hen na Oneesan wa Danshikousei to Nakayoku Naritai~
description:
Shindou Eruko, a glasses, big breasted beauty, found a job as a handyman for the Amaguri Handyman service after her NEET life comes to an end as her savings ran out. She immediately falls for her co-worker Hoshi-kun on their first day working together, but there's a problem: Hoshi-kun is a high school boy, while Eruko is a 27 years old onee-san who has trouble telling reality and delusions apart. She ends up constantly scheming to get close to Hoshi-kun to turn many of her delusions into reality, but after several near-misses, it became apparent to Eruko that Hoshi-kun does, indeed, have feelings toward her.
  
This manga takes place after Vol.14 in  [Henjo - Hen na Joshi Kousei Amaguri Senko](https://mangadex.org/title/15331/henjyo-the-strange-female-high-schooler-amaguri-senko)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: Nanado Nado Nado
description:
After being nicknamed "Yinkyahime/Princess Goth Chick" (陰キャ or Yin character, opposite of Yang) because of her behavior in elementary school, Komachi Tamamura spent three years as a hikikomori. Since she continued to ditch even after in high school, her sister Chacha sent her Nanado Nado Nado, a friendship android to lead Komachi back to real life interactions in school!  
  
Komachi gained some friends when she started playing a game app, and eventually returned to school even though reluctant. She has a negative prejudice to many things in the world due to the knowledge she gained on the Internet in her young age. She's not good at studying or playing sports, but is great at tsukkomi.  
  
Nanado's official name is "Code 7D-O", but she is rarely called that. She is bright and optimistic, and doesn't think too much about things. She can perform general living activities such as talking and eating, just like humans, so that she does not seem to be an android. While she can emit a beam from the eyes and has 100 language modes, she does not have enough arithmetic functions for high school.   
  
*[Based on MTL ofJapanese Wikipedia page.](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/%E3%81%AA%E3%81%AA%E3%81%A9%E3%81%AA%E3%81%A9%E3%81%AA%E3%81%A9)*
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, Mecha, Girls' Love, 4-Koma, School Life

name: Danshi dato Omotteita Osananajimi tono Shinkon Seikatsu ga Umaku Ikisugiru Ken ni Tsuite
description: Shuichi, a high school student, ended up marrying his childhood friend whom he thought was a boy. At their reunion after 10 years, his childhood friend Yuika had transformed into a beautiful girl, which initially made Shuichi quite nervous. However, as time passed, he gradually grew accustomed to the sense of closeness as best friends—and thus, their love story as an ideal couple with a charming touch of innocence begins!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Boku wa Ayashii Kimi no Mono
description: Shou-chan is a member of the public morals committee who wants everyone to have a healthy relationship, and is worried about his childhood friend Sayo. Because she carries the blood of a succubus, she often approaches her beloved her Shou-chan in any way to make him "lovey-dovey sex". As he persists in having a healthy relationship, which is full of lust and surrounded by questionable students, will Shou-chan manage to keep his sanity?
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Kyouiku Mama Saeko: Kono Ko no Tame Nara
description: Saeko is happy. Even if she is poor, even if she has no education, even if she is a single mother. As long as she has her only daughter, Yui. Beautiful Saeko dotes on her ugly daughter, who looks nothing like her, and today as well, she gathers happiness for her daughter by any means necessary.
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Romance, Gore, Drama, School Life, Adaptation

name: Yande Kita Mahou Shoujo no Nichijou
description: The story of a magical girl who is mentally ill.
tags: Psychological, Magical Girls, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Supernatural

name: Mazinger Z (Outa Gozaku)
description:
An alternate Mazinger Z manga by OUTA Gosaku. Not to be confused with the version by NAGAI Go.  
  
It has influence from the anime timeline of events.
tags: Monsters, Action, Comedy, Mecha, Sexual Violence, Military, Gore, Police

name: Unexpected Luck
description:
"Young Master Chi, you're not going to help me unconditionally, are you?"

"You'll find out soon enough what this deal entails. Now, all you need to do is give me an answer. Do you want this opportunity or not?"

"Yes, I do."

Chi Mingyao made a deal with an actor who was brave enough to block him because of a car accident. He only wanted to tease the little actor at first, but eventually, he genuinely wanted to befriend Li Yangxiao and pass on his good luck to him—all so that Yangxiao could chase his dreams without a care in the world.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Boys' Love, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: I Became the Childhood Friend of the Obsessive Second Male Lead
description:
Rieta, staying with a military ducal family, decided to help Noel, the second male lead, by coaching him on winning the female lead’s heart. After years of guidance, Rieta was confident Noel would succeed. However, in a surprising twist, Noel complimented Rieta instead, misapplying her advice. Flustered, Rieta realized her friend had taken her words to heart, but not in the way she intended.

---
Born with memories of the novel *How to Survive as an Ordinary Lady*, Princess Rietta Lise is next in line for the throne of the Kingdom of Lise. But after being sold to the empire by her father, a king who lives in luxury and pleasure, she enters the ducal Mayer estate. Upon realizing that Noel, the duke’s second son, is the sub-male lead of the novel, she’ll try to repay the duchy’s favor by making him the real male protagonist!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Glass Wings
description:
A haunting exploration of regret, loss, and the fragility of the human mind, this short manga delves into the life of a man shattered by tragedy. As his fractured psyche wrestles with the weight of guilt and love, the story unfolds in a non-linear narrative, weaving together moments of despair and fleeting beauty. The mysterious glass butterfly becomes a poignant symbol of a past he can neither escape nor fully remember.

This psychological tale challenges the boundaries of perception, unraveling the protagonist’s duality as he confronts his own truths. In just four gripping pages, this manga delivers an emotional and thought-provoking experience that lingers in the reader’s mind long after the final panel.
tags: Oneshot, Psychological, Self-Published, Medical

name: Meet in the Middle
description:
"I can make it fun for you."
30-year-old Son Yeoreum, who is living a boring life, has a mysterious younger guy appear in front of her one day!
It's just cute to see you go straight, regardless of the back and forth,
Something strong and something obsessive?

What the hell do you want from me?!
Heart pounding two-way scam romance comedy!
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Scales of Justice
description:
The 12 Zodiac Deities (Bangjeongsa), who have transformed into human form, use the divine scale known as 'Cheonpyeong' to measure the weight of the victim's pain, 'Honggo,' and the perpetrator's pain, 'Heukgo,' to administer punishments accordingly.

"The scale must be true and just, and the weight of the sin and the punishment must be equal."

A fantasy human drama about the 'sins and punishments' of humans, as carried out by the 12 Bangjeongsa who punish human sins by the command of the heavens!
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Trapped in a Soap Opera
description:
After a life of hardship as an orphan, Jia Han finally achieves the dream of homeownership... only to have her moment of jubilation cruelly cut short. While indulging in her guilty pleasure--a riveting soap opera--she experiences a sudden, piercing chest pain and meets an untimely demise. But when she wakes up, she finds herself not in the afterlife, but within the very drama she was watching and as none other than its villainess! In a realm where a glance sparks a scandal and a step triggers a landmine of emotions, what fate lies ahead for Jia?

---
The main character, who grew up as an orphan, finally achieves her dream of owning her own home after suffering.
Her joy was short-lived and she suddenly died while watching a drama she enjoyed, feeling pain in her chest. However, when she opened her eyes again, she was in a drama she had watched before she died! And that too, while possessing Shin Sera, a villain who tries to kill the female protagonist, but is destroyed by the male protagonists!

Shin Sera Loving's main character tries to escape from the drama to prevent her destruction, but there is a succession rival who hates her, a fiancé who doesn't even treat her as a human being, and a pervert with a blank face.... With a variety of male protagonists with outbursts of personality, are you getting more and more entangled?
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Drama, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: My Wife Cosplaying for Cat Day, Even With Reservations
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: OCTET
description:
Welcome to "Octet," the one and only host club in Nara Prefecture... but this is no ordinary establishment!
Their clientele? None other than goddesses themselves!
Experience a modern-day host club fantasy like no other!

Source: MangaPlus
tags: Oneshot

name: Ma Dou So Shi
description:
In the era of the Wen clan's tyranny and people's suffering, the masters of the great immortal cultivation clans: the Lan Clan of Gusu, Jiang Clan of Yunmeng, Jin Clan of Lanling, and Nie Clan of Qinghe, joined forces in the "Sunshot Campaign" to defeat the Wen Clan. The Yiling Patriarch, Wei Wuxian, made great contributions to the campaign, but his path of cultivation, labeled as demonic, was so powerful that he was slandered and scorned by the people. In the end, his lair in the Burial Mounds was destroyed by the very clans he fought with.

Thirteen years later, Wei Wuxian is summoned into the body of a lunatic who was abandoned by his clan and family, and is found and taken away by a famous cultivator among the clans-- Lan wangji, who is known for his genius in conventional cultivation, and frequently fought with Wei Wuxian in his past life. Wei Wuxian tries to leave without revealing his true identity, but for reasons undecipherable to Wei Wuxian, Lan Wangji refuses to let him go.

As they pursue the elusive mysteries of the past, the relationship between Wei Wuxian and Lan Wangji changes and grows. The cheerful, unrestrained Wei Wuxian and the calm and disciplined Lan Wangji, the story of the two begins with their childhood encounter...
tags: Historical, Ghosts, Comedy, Boys' Love, Martial Arts, Adventure, Wuxia, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Mystery, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Dog Nigga
description:
Rex is a half man half dog. He was created when a drunk old man forced himself on a stray female dog in the street. 
Because of his father, Rex has to live his life as a freak rejected by society.
So one day he’s gonna find that man, and RAPE him.

---

- Alternative Official English - [MANGA Plus Creators](https://medibang.com/mpc/titles/wt2208302035572710014241408/) | [ART street](https://medibang.com/book/xb2005061537310810014241408/) | [Pixiv](https://www.pixiv.net/user/61917191/series/172665)

tags: Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Animals, Ninja, Comedy, Crime, Superhero, Martial Arts, Samurai, Adventure, Self-Published, Sexual Violence, Military, Delinquents, Police

name: Get Schooled
description:
Na Hwa-Jin’s teaching techniques are pretty violent for someone who works in the Ministry of Education.

That being said, when punishments don't seem to work on even the worst of school bullies, there is no better man for the job.

Sometimes you can’t get a good education until those bullies are taught a lesson.


---

**Links:**
- Alternate Official Raw - [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=5620215)

tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Battery
description:
Meet Harada Takumi—not even in junior high and he's the best pitcher in the region, although he's frustrated and ready to give up, because he can't find a catcher who is good enough to keep up with how he pitches in this backwater town his family has just moved to. Then along comes a kid named Nagakura Gou…  
  
(Source: MU)  
  
Links:  
[AnimeNewsNetwork](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=18153)
tags: Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: I Am the Descendant of the Divine Dragon!
description: In the highly competitive world of the Xuan Realm Continent, where warriors strive to refine their bodies, cultivate their martial abilities, harness the essence of the heavens and earth, and push beyond mortal limitations, our protagonist, Lu Hao, faces unjust persecution from his own clan since childhood. However, fate smiles upon him as he awakens the dormant bloodline of the Divine Dragon within him. With an unyielding resolve, Lu Hao embarks on an extraordinary journey, overcoming countless obstacles to ascend to the zenith of power. Along the way, he unravels the enigmatic secrets of his past life.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Apocalypse Insect Master
description: As the apocalypse descends, all things mutate, and humanity falls from the top of the food chain, becoming nothing more than struggling ants. Plunder and slaughter fill every corner. This is a hell for ordinary people, but a paradise for the evolved. Starting with the Parasite of the Insect Emperor and gaining the power of evolution, I will become the ruler of this wasteland!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: How Could You Repay the Kindness I Raised You With Obsession?
description:
I transmigrated into the body of an evil witch in a fairytale.
While I was drowning in loneliness, hated by everyone, I happened to pick up and raise a pair of siblings who were eating my candy house...

"Hazel the Witch, you're sentenced to execution for kidnapping!"

Who would have known that I'd be falsely accused of kidnapping the Grand Duke's younger siblings!
Thankfully, before she knew it, Hazel became a nanny in the Grand Duchy with the help of the children.

However, her employer once said...
"A Grand Duke doesn't marry witches. Nor nannies, of course."
and gulped down kimchi soup.

I don't have no intention of getting marrying either, you know? Especially not to you, your Grace!
I'll just raise the kids and then quit!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Cooking, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Kami ni Homura wo - Saishuu Teiri no Shoumei Houhou
description: Fermat's Last Theorem, the most difficult problem in mathematics that had fascinated mathematicians around the world for 350 years, was solved by a young mathematician in 1951 in postwar Japan. His name was Andy Homura. His life and the history of mathematics were set in motion by the appearance of a great genius, a girl named Rama.
tags: Drama

name: Kizetsu Yuusha to Ansatsu Hime
description: Toto is a novice hero who has finally put together the team that he'd always wanted. And he's ready to set out on a new adventure. But Toto's new party members' actual target is... his life?!
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Harem, Fantasy

name: When I Was Playing Eroge With VR, I Was Reincarnated In A Different World, I Will Enslave All The Beautiful Demon Girls ~Crossout Saber~
description:
Take off everything and be enslaved [Tame]!! in a different world filled with fantasy!!  
  
I accidentally died while playing a VR compatible game, and now the goddess will reincarnate me into the world of that game with specialized enslavement skill 【TAME】  
Every single female opponent will be stripped with 【TAME】 and given pleasure by my hands while going forward to an adventure! ! !
tags: Reincarnation, Loli, Demons, Romance, Comedy, Adventure, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation

name: My Follower Became my Girlfriend
description:
It is now Reiwa, a new era marked by the spread of the novel corona virus.
Two university freshmen had lost their chance of having romantic encounters because their classes were almost immediately moved online after starting university.
They are Takano Shouhei (SNS ID: Mega Donki), a virgin aiming for ten thousand likes on his SNS posts and Sasakura Nene (SNS ID: nene), a thickheaded convenience store part-timer and they have somehow become each other’s purpose for living.
This is the start of a miracle-like pure love comedy that started on social media.
tags: Romance, Comedy

name: Inagaki Misao Horror M Senshuu
description: A collection of Misao Inagaki's early oneshots from the Horror M magazine, known for extremely high quality horror manga and for its splatter horror series.
tags: Thriller, Monsters, Ghosts, Anthology, Crime, Survival, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery, Tragedy

name: The Name Of My Feelings
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Long Strip, Romance, Incest, Girls' Love, Web Comic, Full Color

name: It Shows on Your Face, Ichijou-San
description:
Mahiro seems to admire Ichijou-san from afar. She's the most popular student in the class and belongs to a very prestigious family. Despite all this, Ichijou-san treats everybody nicely and is equally kind to everyone. But she harbors a secret that Mahiro unexpectedly discovered— she's a vampire! She claims she's not interested in human blood, though there appear to be moments when she's barely able to conceal her innermost desires...
A bloodsucking, heart-throbbing love-comedy about a young lady vampire!
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Vampires

name: Defective Goddess' Genesis of Another World
description:
Artesia Gaia Nagasus,  
The goddess of creation went into a deep slumber in order to bring new life to the fallen planet,  
And to prepare for the inevitable arrival of the Brave, whom she would then provide with guidance.  
However, she woke up too early… Not only was there no Brave waiting for her, she was met with an extremely cold glacial period without intelligent life…?!  
  
She just wants to be worshipped and fall in love!  
This is a tale of creation, starring a defective goddess who can't help but mess with humanity, and her journey to set the world in motion - with a few troubles here, and a little hard work there.
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Supernatural

name: The Initial Archmage
description: Nikolai thought his greatest challenge as a member of Genesis, a group fighting calamity, would be living in the shadow of his best friend, Elras. That is, until Elras breaks the cardinal rule: never use magic to harm another. Years of friendship and magical knowledge are erased from Elras’ memory to keep him from hurting others, and Nikolai is assigned to watch over him. But then, they find out that Elras can cast magic without a wand, and more mysterious clues about his dismissal come to light. Nothing comes easy for this duo!
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: I Will Escape From the Flower of Ordeals
description:
I was exhausted from reading the script all night and fell asleep, but it was about a kimchi fight, a secret birth, and an amnesia.

I suddenly possessed Cha Ye-ryun, the villainous girl from the drama 'Flower of Ordeals', which is full of all kinds of absurd situations.

"I will protect you, Cha Ye-ryun. If I can’t go back to reality even after the drama ends, then I will be you."

Cha Ye-ryun only has one goal - avoiding her unfortunate ending where she has to spend the rest of her life in prison. 

 Will she be able to overcome the unfortunate ending and escape the Flower of Ordeals?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Shinkon Quest: Maou no Musume wa Majime Yuusha o Otoshitai
description: Harold is the descendant of the hero who defeated the evil demon king. In this peaceful era, Harold has become a convenient handyman for the townsfolk. One day, a sacred book predicting the world's destruction is discovered. The condition to avert this catastrophe is... "you must complete the 'Newlyweds Quest' with the demon king's daughter." Thus begins Harold's unexpected married life with Yona, the demon king's daughter. While Harold still feels bewildered by all this, not only can Yona perfectly handle the household chores, she sweetly pampers him when he's tired. However, she harbors a secret...
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Fantasy

name: GUDAGUDA Taikou Legend ZIPANG
description: GUDAGUDA Taikou Legend ZIPANG (ぐだぐだ太閤伝ZIPANG) is a manga written and illustrated by Keikenchi, serialized on the magazine Comptiq and the web magazine TYPE-MOON Comic Ace. It is a side story of Koha-Ace serialized in 2022 featuring a Holy Grail War set during the Sengoku period.
tags: Genderswap, Demons, Samurai, Military, Web Comic

name: My Job is Appraiser, but What is The [God Eye]? Living Freely with The World's Greatest Elementary Level Job
description:
Touri, a High schooler who was Transported to another World, was immediately banished due to his Elementary Level Job, 'Appraiser'.
But there's more to his Job...!? The Curtains of the Other World Fantasy  Survival using Appraiser Skill Opens!
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Isekai, Adaptation

name: High-School DxD: Aashia & Koneko Himitsu no Keiyaku!?
description: Spin-off of [High-School DxD](https://mangadex.org/manga/2191) that deals with the lives of two cute girls in the group, this takes place after Chapter 10 of the main manga series.
tags: Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Chichi to Hige-Gorilla to Watashi
description: After losing her mother to a tragic accident, 6-year old tomboy, Michiru, finds a suspicious person moving into her precious home: her dad's giant younger brother Kouji, the 'Beard Gorilla'. While awkward at first, it doesn't take long for the two to develop a familiar bond that looks more like that of a brother and a sister, than that of niece & uncle.
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Kaijuu Shoujo Hana
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, 4-Koma, School Life, Monster Girls, Web Comic

name: Tozaki-san wa Boku ni Dake Tsumetai
description: Kenjiro, a first year high school student, has had a crush on Tozaki-san, who is in the same class with him since the beginning of school. Tozaki-san is kind to everyone, but for some reason, she only has a cold attitude towards Kenjiro.
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life

name: Boku ni Korosarero
description: Yuu Yakushimaru, a truant junior high school student, spends his days hating his bullying classmates and sarcastic life guidance teachers, and dreaming of one day killing them all. When he gains the "power to kill" and discovers that the people he hates are monsters that he can "kill" - the killing spree will never stop!　Non-stop horror suspense, the curtain rises!
tags: Thriller, Psychological, Gore, Drama, School Life, Horror, Supernatural, Mystery

name: Haikyo no Meshi
description:
In the distant future, battered by a long-forgotten history, humanity is reduced to feeding on commonbread, a kind of prefabricated bread. Far from seeing this as inevitable, young Haruka, an explorer of ruins, has long since discovered traces of other foods that once existed and that she forces herself to find in her research. To do this, she must delve even further into the deserted and abandoned lands, exposed to all dangers, from mutant monsters to merciless looters.

The scenario takes the reader on a journey of anticipation reminiscent of the film Soylent Green , where a subtle and effective drawing evokes Tsutomu Nihei and Moebius.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Adventure, Drama, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Rikujou Jieitai Tokumu Chouhou Kikan - Beppan no Inu
description:
The fate of the nation is in the hands of those who have abandoned both law and name… An unpredictable spy action begins! 

In the Special Operations Group, an elite unit of the Ground Self-Defense Force, there is a female member who is bored with her daily routine of training. 

One day, at the behest of her superior, she heads to a certain garrison and is recruited by a mysterious man to join a black-ops unit known as "Beppan". 

Given the name "Nana", she finds herself on the front lines of a national defense war filled with schemes and violence.
tags: Action, Crime, Adventure, Military, Gore

name: Inaho-kun wa Nise Kanojo no Hazu na no ni
description:
Mori Shintaro, a new first-year student, yearns for the sparkling high school life of having a girlfriend and experiencing youth, but is ridiculed by those around him. His classmate, Inaho Sawatari, entered the school as the top student and is a highly regarded beauty. The two are not supposed to cross paths, but after an incident where they are mistaken for a couple, Inaho makes an unexpected proposal:
"Shall we pretend that we're really dating?"

---
**Notes:**
- The pre-serialization series is [Houkago no Cinderella-kun](https://mangadex.org/title/147b8fd6-5232-45df-993f-35c908cf41a2/houkago-no-cinderella-kun).
tags: Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Crossdressing, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Berserk
description:
Guts, known as the Black Swordsman, seeks sanctuary from the demonic forces attracted to him and his woman because of a demonic mark on their necks, and also vengeance against the man who branded him as an unholy sacrifice.

Aided only by his titanic strength gained from a harsh childhood lived with mercenaries, a gigantic sword, and an iron prosthetic left hand, Guts must struggle against his bleak destiny, all the while fighting with a rage that might strip him of his humanity.  
  
***Won the 6th Osamu Tezuka Cultural Prize Excellence Award in 2002.***

---

Note: Following Miura Kenta's death in 2021, the series has been taken over by Kouji Mori, who supervises the series with art done by Studio Gaga.
tags: Award Winning, Monsters, Action, Demons, Psychological, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Horror, Fantasy, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: Tales of the Stellar Unknown
description:
Qi Xing, your average high schooler, stumbles across a mysterious seven-star disc. But this ain't no ordinary frisbee. Suddenly, the disc drags him into the "Disc World"— a mind-blowing realm where his crazy adventure kicks off.

Through a twist of fate, Qi Xing becomes a cultivator, a master of countless Daoist techniques.

As he unlocks the secrets of the Seven Star Disc, a hidden power within him— the Primordial Celestial Qi—begins to awaken. But with every revelation, he gets sucked deeper into a conspiracy surrounding the legendary "Path of Immortality" through which he uncovers the truth about achieving immortality in the World within the Disc…
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Adventure, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Yuusha Shoukan ni Makikomareta kedo, Isekai wa Heiwa deshita
description:
The other world was… at Peace.  
A kind world where the three races, the Spirit World’s Magical Races, the Celestial World’s Divine Races, the Human World’s Human Races, they are kind neighbours to each other, with everyone living a peaceful and fulfilling life.  
  
But although I wished to peacefully spend a year before my return, for some reason, the heavyweights of this world keeps gathering around me, and…
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Class ga Isekai Shoukan sareta Naka Ore dake Nokotta n desu ga
description:
A god of a different world had abruptly appeared in Kamiya Yato's classroom and forcibly summoned the entire class to his world… except for him, because he was sleeping in a seat in the corner of the class, the round summoning magic circle didn't reach him, and he ended up staying here on Earth, but with brand-new skills.  
  
After he made it through a whole year full of police interviews and journalism reports, he finally became a high school student, but the quiet days he had hoped for were far from over; be it terrorists who decide to occupy his school or even monsters from different world, one by one new incidents take place in the town he lives in…  
  
Will a boy without any motivation be able to save the world?

Note: No raw updates since October 2021; assume hiatus by author. Comic Boost still lists the series as an "irregular serialization" rather than axed, so there remains a slim possibility for future updates.  
  


---
tags: Action, Romance, Magic, Harem, Isekai, Drama, School Life, Fantasy, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Fushi no Kami: Rebuilding Civilization Starts with a Village
description: Ash is a young boy with apparent past-life memories who lives in a remote, deserted village. As he remembers leading a bountiful life, he can’t bear living in a world akin to the Dark Ages, where not even the internal combustion engine exists. Ash envisions the rebirth of a civilization where housing with proper sanitation is the norm and the world is connected via a means of transportation faster than horses. For that reason, he is eager to consult books containing knowledge from a highly-developed ancient culture that is rumored to have existed far in the past. Ash makes use of the church’s resources, learning how to read and obtaining the knowledge that he seeks. In addition, he enlists the help of the people around him, including Maika, the village chief’s daughter. Together, they aim to develop their own village. This is only the beginning of the story about a young boy who sets out to revolutionize the world in order to rebuild civilization and create his ideal life!
tags: Reincarnation, Romance, Comedy, Survival, Drama, Fantasy, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Post-Possession Damage Control
description: Seven years ago, Kanna was thrown into the body of a Korean girl named Joohwa. She had everything in her new life—a loving family, a great boyfriend, a hard-won medical license, even her own clinic! But that all changes when she's suddenly swapped back one day. Just as she's been in Joohwa's body, Joohwa has been in hers... and she's left Kanna's life a mess! First things first, she's going to divorce her cold husband, Duke Silvian Valentino. After that? Revenge on everyone who's wronged her.
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Drama, Medical, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Savage Forest
description: Enya and Tarhan are forever bonded once Enya helps Tarhan's family find peace after a tragic accident. However, their bond is challenged when Tarhan goes from a distrusted outsider to the strong and popular vice chief of Agilea. In a society where a healthy body is considered one's greatest asset, Enya is treated with scorn because of her limp. On top of that, her place as Tarhan's lover is threatened when the princess of an ally tribe offers a marriage alliance in times of impending war. Will Enya and Tarhan's love prevail despite the numerous obstacles in their rocky path?
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Chihayafuru plus Kimigatame
description: Rintsu Nagara is a new first-year member of the Mizusawa High School karuta club. For some reason, Rintsuki is aiming to win the national championship, but after Chihaya and her friends graduate, the Mizusawa Karuta Club has only one A-class player, and she has a difficult time ahead of her.
tags: Traditional Games, Sports, Drama, School Life, Slice of Life

name: Gekikou Kamen
description: A man meets up with his university tokusatsu circle after the passing of their leader.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Introverted Us
description: Do you ever wonder what the most popular boy at school is really like? As it turns out, he might be just as awkward and shy as any of us. That’s what wallflower Jayu Nam begins to discover after a chance encounter with Jahyeok Yeo, a boy in her class who seems to excel at everything in life. Well, almost. Underneath Jahyeok’s persona is a secret super-introvert who would rather just stay home, except his charming good looks keep forcing him into social situations. Together, Jayu and Jahyeok begin to learn a little something about friendship and maybe more…
tags: Long Strip, Romance, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Anatolia Story
description:
Yuri, a modern day teenager who had just received her first kiss, is suddenly whisked away 
to ancient Anatolia, where an evil queen needs her for a blood sacrifice. 
Thankfully the timely intervention of Prince Kail saves Yuri from the queen's grasp. For now. 
Kail promises to send Yuri back to her home, but the queen's persistent schemes to kill them both, 
plus their growing interest in each other, keep those plans delayed.  

  **Winner of 2001 Shogakukan Manga Award for Shōjo** 

Note: Final 28th volume contains a side story called Orontes Renka, set in the same historical period.  
 
The Hittite empire is about to become an Egyptian territory through marriage between the Hittite princess and the Egyptian king. 
A traveler from Egypt, Maripas, visits Anatolia at that time but gets robbed of all his belongings while playing good samaritan. 
He's thankfully offered shelter by an unusually well-educated Hittite woman named Yuri. 
But this seemingly innocent meeting soon turns into a thrilling romantic adventure – 
cases of mistaken identity and runaway royals are about to complicate international relations!
tags: Award Winning, Time Travel, Historical, Action, Romance, Adventure, Sexual Violence, Drama, Supernatural

name: Online - The Comic
description: Mai Yashiro (22) was an average office worker until the day a video game console arrived in her mailbox. The game she is forced to play, "Nightmare," is a dangerous game in which one risks both the lives of the ones they love and their own body!! If you refuse to play, those dear to you die. If you lose battles in the game, parts of your body (your arms or legs, your voice, etc.) cease functioning. The horror of this game spreads throughout society in a flash, and, to fight it, Mai's company creates a "Nightmare" Strategy Team. After being assigned to this team, Mai and her dependable comrades boldly rise up against this hellish game. Adapted from the super-popular novel which has received over 40,000,000 hits online!!
tags: Psychological, Romance, Video Games, Drama, Horror, Supernatural

name: TEKNO: Sci-Fi Shonen Manga!
description:
Futura, the land of Techs. This is the story of a boy named Tek who can't use Techs. But he will persist through many harsh battles to make Futura a better place to live!

(Note: It gets good 200 chapters in.)

♥ Support: patreon.com/teknomanga
♥ Animated Trailer: youtube.com/watch?v=Q7Z2A0Ba03A
♥ Discord: discord.gg/pVZts8fdTf
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Mecha, Self-Published, Philosophical

name: It's Just Business
description: “A love life? Give me a break.” A complete non-believer when it comes to romance, Eunho is focused on climbing the ladder at work. Smart with excellent social skills to boot, both her bosses and clients love her. But when a new hire suddenly appears in front of her and an old first love start to shake things up again, she can’t help but waver.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Full Color

name: Karei ni Rien Shitemisemasu wa!
description:
Roza married Adrion, a man who once had a lover. On their wedding night, Adrion heartlessly said, "I've never seen such an ugly woman like you. What a turn-off." Hearing the words, Roza, who married the man solely out of obedience to her father, has no affection for him at all. Determined to break free from her father's control as soon as possible, Roza resolves to save money, divorce Adrion, and gain her own freedom. Meanwhile, Adrion gradually becomes attracted to Roza, who excels at house cleaning, cooking, childcare, farm work, sword technique and almost everything... With different thoughts on their minds, the fate of the young couple is quitely unfolding...

(Source: Alpha Manga)

The adaptation of "The 14th Annual Romance Novel Award" Winner from Alphapolis.
tags: Romance, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Kagaku Chop
description:
The president of the Science Club, Sai Suzuzono, is a girl with a mad scientist-like temperament who spends her days satisfying her curiosity with weird experiments and inventions, not thinking much about the trouble it causes to the people around her.   
The only one who can keep Sai in check is the class representative, Ren Nagakura. However, despite her Class Rep character, Ren is a bit off (in other words, an idiot) and so the situation always takes an unexpected turn…
tags: Sci-Fi, Comedy, School Life, Slice of Life

name: How Far Are You Okay With?
description: “If it’s okay with you, Noona… Do you want to do that thing I just saw with me?” Eunpyeong finds it difficult to start dating because of painful memories. Nyuk, her underclassman from the same department, approaches her but Eunpyeong finds it hard to accept him. One day, Nyuk walks Eunpyeong home because she is drunk. At her house, he makes an unexpected discovery and a bold suggestion…
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Elegant Desire
description: What’s the chance of running into your first love again after twelve years? This is exactly what happens to Solhui after attending her frenemy’s bridal shower. What’s more? Her first love is having an affair with a married woman. But that’s not all. She meets him and the woman again when she starts a viola lesson with a new student.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Do You Want Me to Lend You a Lighter?
description: In truth, I never wanted to become a teacher. In a moment when I was fulfilling my own responsibilities on the path I chose after giving up my dream, 'Do you want me to lend you a lighter?' A cheeky male student offered. It feels like my life as a teacher is at odds with this cheeky kid, who comes with genius talent, overflowing wealth, and fame as a bonus. A story of school life entwined with dreams, talent, and love.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Iron Don Quixote
description:
"My name is Gen Kurosu, and as long as I stand, the Victory Flag will never fly over the heads of the Red Army!  The machines roar and blood sprays! My name is Gen Kurosu!"

Motocross is a sport in which contestants race for fame on steel horses through rugged, rough terrain. 

The essence of motocross is the struggle against the harsh nature and oneself. This is the story of a lone warrior who, despite being called "Stupid Don Quixote," stands in the way of the "Red Army," the most powerful motocross team in Japan, which has achieved an undefeated record of 150 victories in a single year. 

This is the memorable first serial publication of manga master Tetsuo Hara!
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Romance, Ninja, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Sports, Martial Arts, Mafia, Adventure, Magic, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Fantasy, Police, Slice of Life, Supernatural, Tragedy

name: MuvLuv
description:
Takeru and Sumika have been neighbors and friends since they were little, but when a mysterious girl arrives, and is found in bed with Takeru, their daily lives will be thrown into chaos.

Wikipedia
[Arabic](https://ar.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D9%85%D9%88%D9%81-%D9%84%D9%88%D9%81)
[Arabic (Egyptian)](https://arz.wikipedia.org/wiki/%D9%85%D9%88%DA%A4_%D9%84%D9%88%DA%A4)
