[Spanish](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muv-Luv)
[Turkish](https://tr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Muv-Luv)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, School Life

name: Doukyonin no Sano-kun wa Tada no Yuunou na Tantou Henshuu desu
description:
Shinomiya Teiichiro is a prolific, workaholic novelist who is too consumed with writing to take care of himself. To prevent him from neglecting his well-being, his editor, Sano Satoru, moves in with him. But when the calm and collected Shinomiya finds himself flustered by Sano's constant presence and good looks, he begins to question their relationship. After all, Sano is just his editor, isn't he?!
(Source: MangaUP!)
tags: Comedy, Slice of Life

name: My Mobster Girlfriend
description:
Zhang Nan, the young master of the declining Fu Long Clan just wants to be a normal person, but he is sent to an aristocratic training school by his grandfather. He is accidentally assigned to a female class by the teacher, and is tormented by his peers to the point where he wants to leave school.  
Will his experiences at Blake Academy and the girls he meets change him so he can face his identity as the heir to his clan?
tags: Action, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Mafia, Harem

name: Lychee☆Light Club
description: A group of nine boys (called the Hikari Club) are intent on making the Ultimate AI. The attractive leader of the club, Zera, is a twisted man polluting the minds of the club members to make them do whatever he pleases. Tamiya, the original founder of the club, wants to reclaim the club. Niko, the second in command, is pissed off at Jaibo, the one obsessed with Zera. They kidnap a schoolgirl, but the AI Raichi falls in love with her and she with him, and things get messy.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Psychological, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, Gore, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Tragedy

name: The Proxy of Yama
description:
Don't think that mediocre men have no spring time.   
A little gangster that takes protection fees in front of the school entrance strangely became the highest administrator of hell. Now, things are getting interesting. Being King Yama, fighting the heavens, reforming hell's system, and leading ghosts to resist the oppression by the gods of heaven… Finally, I'm at the highest position within the heavens and hell.  
Mwahaha…
tags: Ghosts, Long Strip, Comedy, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: The Villainess Became a Mother
description:
Reborn into a novel, Lulu Ekray knew that she was destined to become the villainess and that she would fall in love with the male protagonist, her obsession with him eventually leading to her execution. Nonetheless, she falls in love with Grand Duke Carlix Rochester anyway, but now, the obsessive one is him! 

After a night of passion, Lulu gets pregnant, but to avoid becoming the villainess, she decides to leave Carlix. But Lulu has no idea just what lengths Carlix will go to get her back!
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Yuutousei wa Shikararetai
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Romance, Comedy, Web Comic

name: noHEROES!
description: A fighter, a wizard and a misguiding spirit are on Nameless Isle-what happens next is the stuff of heroes - or not! It's up to them.
tags: Reincarnation, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Survival, Adventure, Self-Published, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic

name: Wandering Island
description:
After her grandfather's death, Mikura chose to continue their island express courier service. 
With her seaplane and her adventurous cat, Endeavor, she lives life as she chooses. 
Soon Mikura becomes very interested in a mysterious island that seems to move around, according to a local legend. 
After some extensive effort to determine the island's whereabouts, 
she manages to get a brief glimpse of it from the sky. 
Now that she knows it's real, she's determined to find the island again, no matter what it takes.
  
[Kindle vers (English)](https://smile.amazon.com/gp/product/B07JKKWXTF?ref_=dbs_r_series&storeType=ebooks)
tags: Adventure, Slice of Life, Mystery

name: Takatora-kun to Omegatachi
description:
In the Seirin high school, Takatora reigns supreme even amongst the most elite of alphas. One day, he notices a sudden elevation in body temperature and... Well, you can see where this is going... Or can you?

Asada Nemui's deconstruction of the omegaverse begins now!

This series is currently serialized in Canna magazine.
tags: Boys' Love, Sexual Violence, Drama, School Life

name: Iron Doll
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Military, Drama

name: There Is No Mercy
description: Sierra witnesses her husband's secret meeting with her best friend Belieta. She is stabbed by her husband and closes her eyes. As Sierra, who was tired of life, feels free from her impending death, she hears a mysterious voice... "You can't escape Belieta." In her second life that she unwillingly began, Sierra vows revenge. This time, she will take everything from Belieta.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: The Peach of June
description:
Leah has been dreaming of a happy marriage. She has had two tries at her luck, but both times the engagements ended. When she got engaged for the third time she was determined that this time it was going to last. Even though she is determined, she keeps seeing a man called Julien with whom she got familiar prior to her engagement. Julien's proposal, combined with his kind personality and handsome face, made her swoon and she agreed to marry him.  

After their wedding, she was enjoying her honeymoon in Julien's estate, where she discovers traces of herself that she didn't know he had. She enters Julien's secret room that he had been hiding from her...

[Official Webtoon](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=59481128)
[Official Novel](https://ridibooks.com/account/login?return_url=%2Fbooks%2F809016837%3F_rdt_sid%3Dauthor%26_rdt_idx%3D4)

Note: The webtoon was released as R15, it's not R19 like the novel
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Asadora!
description: In 2020, a large creature rampages through Tokyo, destroying everything in its path. In 1959, Asa Asada, a spunky young girl from a huge family in Nagoya, is kidnapped for ransom—and not a soul notices. When a typhoon hits Nagoya, Asa and her kidnapper must work together to survive. But there’s more to her kidnapper and this storm than meets the eye.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Historical, Monsters, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Crime, Survival, Sports, Martial Arts, Adventure, Office Workers, Military, Philosophical, Drama, School Life, Delinquents, Police, Slice of Life, Mystery, Music, Tragedy

name: Sister-sama no Oose no Mama ni
description: One day, the demon Clod comes to high school student Sister Kris Ibarakawa. He says that he has a contract with Kris's estranged father to make her happy. He is very serious even for a demon, and says, "I will definitely make you happy," and uses various kinds of magic... Will Kris be able to follow the path of a pure and righteous sister?
tags: Demons, Romance, Comedy, Magic, School Life, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Nagi no Oitoma
description:
Ooshima Nagi is an 28 year old office lady always trying to read the mood and fit in. Berated by her boss, taken advantage of by her colleagues, and betrayed by her boyfriend, Nagi quits her job and severs contact with everyone in her social circle in order to restart her life from scratch. Will Nagi be able to change herself, or will she fall back into her old ways?  
  
**Note**: Nominated for the 11th Manga Taishou Awards (2018).  
Nominated for the 12th Manga Taishou Awards (2019).  
Won the 65th Shogakukan Manga Awards (2020).
tags: Award Winning, Romance, Comedy, Slice of Life

name: JJBA: Planck's Creek
description: This is a original story set in the world of Jojo's Bizarre Adventure. In 1992, a small town in Canada called Planck's Creek is faced with the untimely death of a young woman, Patsy Paula. In this town that is a lot stranger than it seems, her childhood friends take on a bizarre adventure to unravel the mystery of her death.
tags: Thriller, Action, Psychological, Crime, Self-Published, Doujinshi, Philosophical, Gore, Horror, Mystery

name: Chira & Chiller
description:
“This is not enough!”

Sweat running down her soft skin, her flushed cheeks, her breath becoming rougher and rougher… Losing track of time in a private room, just the two of you, this evening you and her will have each other to your hearts' content…

A slightly naughty sauna comedy, here we come!
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem

name: Yumene Connect
description: On the day of the entrance ceremony, Yuuhi Takamiya caught a mysteriously high fever and was bedridden for a week. To camouflage the fact that he was a loner, he creates a bookworm persona that becomes firmly established both for himself and others. Hearing his despair over wanting friends, a clumsy alien called Nano arrives from space to push some dubious goods on him... With Nano's outrageous products, Yuuhi's school life spirals into even greater chaos!
tags: Sci-Fi, Romance, Comedy, School Life, Aliens, Supernatural

name: Karekore the Half-Blood
description:
One day, the entirety of the Earth was suddenly reborn into a parallel universe, and everything outside of the planet became known as "the other space". 

In that parallel universe, there is a three-person group that operates a general store called the "This-and-That Shop", where they spendidly solve the requests and cases that people in trouble bring to them!
tags: Monsters, Action, Supernatural, Adaptation

name: Time-Limited Genius Dark Knight
description:
When there is no way out, the way is in.

Doomed to die next month, our terminally ill protagonist Chan is too frail and defeated to try anything at all.

No wonder he chooses to plunge himself into an RPG world he is only too familiar with. Why should this run be any different?

Well, other than the fact that he will wake up inside the game and get struck with an existential epiphany that will make him fight tooth and nail to give Nox, his equally ill-fated RPG persona, a better chance?

Maybe, it’s not over until it’s over.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Demons, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Video Games, Magic, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Blade of Retribution
description: On the day that Kendo Champion Shiho decided to help out his single mother run a Gukbap restaurant, he received news that his sister, Shiyeon, committed suicide. During the funeral, Shiho realizes that something was wrong. It wasn't a suicide, she was murdered. In order to learn the truth and get revenge for his sister's death, Shiho lifts up his sword once more to begin a war of his own.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Delinquents, Web Comic, Full Color, Tragedy

name: Koe Naki Niehime to Kokuryuu no Kekkon
description:
Ayame, born into a family of priestesses blessed by the Black Dragon God, possesses a unique ability to heal people through her voice. However, after the death of her parents, she is taken in by her uncle's family who mistreat her, leading to the loss of her voice. Her cousin Mari even takes over Ayame’s rightful position as priestess, and Ayame is eventually offered as a sacrifice to the Black Dragon.

"Why must I be killed like this?! Someone, please help me!"

Her desperate plea brought forth the Black Dragon from the sky. He descends and transforms into a handsome young man, gently takes Ayame's hand, and flies away with her.

Thus begins Ayame’s new life as the bride of Saku, the Black Dragon, living in his mansion situated between the celestial and human worlds. However, Ayame’s cousin Mari, envious of her new status as the beautiful bride of the Black Dragon schemes to steal him away...

A Japanese-style Cinderella story of a gentle-hearted girl who lost her voice and a proud yet compassionate Black Dragon.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Full Color

name: The Emperor's Dog
description:
After an unexpected accident, I was reborn in another world. 

Could I be the emperor's daughter? Or perhaps a duke's daughter? With a heart full of anticipation, I opened my eyes, and what I saw before me was...

A white, soft puppy's front paw.

Given this situation, I need to find a way to survive. The only thing possible with this small, insignificant puppy body is... 

The path of a lapdog, cozying up to those in power!
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Noshiro-san wa Nonoshirenaii!!
description: Not found
tags: Romance, Comedy, School Life, Web Comic

name: BL Gensaku-sha Saikyō! Waga-ko o Mamoru Tame Ni Tensei-sha o Gekitai Suru!
description:
The author of the love story, “The Odd-eyed Butler,” featuring a sadistic viscount and a devoted butler, is overjoyed by the anime adaption of a work he poured his blood, sweat, and tears into.

But the joy was short-lived. On the internet, there was a person who called themselves the "villainess's fan," who criticized the uke butler and propagated the idea of a pairing between the seme viscount and the villainess of the story. While the author is arguing with them over the interpretation of his characters, his PC short circuits and he is fatally electrocuted. 

When he awakens, he discovers he's the uke of the work, "The Odd-eyed Butler"...Not only that, but the villainess's fan has reincarnated as well and is starting to approach the viscount in order to make him fall in love with her!

To protect the pairing of his own work, the author sets out to repel her...?!
tags: Thriller, Romance, Comedy, Boys' Love, Web Comic

name: Touhou - Until the Water Became Wholly Red (Doujinshi)
description:
Youkai Mountain, Gensokyo. Even within this closed-off world, the tengu have their own closed-off, multilayered society. All Shameimaru Aya wants is to work on the scoop of a lifetime, but all around her, much more complicated schemes are afoot, and it seems they can't help but get in her way.

Long-running doujin series by Ashiyama, author of "The Gensokyo of Humans" and "The Magician Who Loved a Fake". Published in book form and for free on Pixiv.
tags: Historical, Action, Office Workers, Magic, Doujinshi, Philosophical, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: Lost in Translation
description: The up-and-coming K-pop group Mayhem is steadily climbing the charts, but fame doesn't come for free. Bad Boy front man of the group Wyld knows this all too well. Forced to take on a controversial persona behind his fellow members' backs to help keep the momentum going, can Wyld keep sight of himself beneath all the lies and scandals? Or will he become his own false persona?
tags: Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Slice of Life, Full Color

name: Wagamama Oujo ni Tsukaeta Bannoushitsuji, Tonari no Teikoku de Saikyou no Gunjin ni Nariagari Musousuru
description:
Leet isn’t just any butler. His mistress, Princess Kilik, demands the impossible — and he delivers it, seven times before breakfast. 

But one day, Leet decides enough is enough, and he flees for a neighboring land where the talented rise up through the ranks instead of languishing in thankless, dead-end jobs. 

Under a new name, Lilt, he enrolls in a training and job placement program, and rapidly discovers that, easy as “wax on, wax off,” his butlering skills make him a valuable asset!

**Links:**
- [Alternative Official Raw on Nico Nico Seiga](https://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/54400)
tags: Action, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Military, School Life, Fantasy, Villainess, Adaptation

name: Fire Fire Fire
description:
Jiga Kirishima lives in a time where the only sky the people know is the color gray and most of the world is wasteland and ruins, with a few people in power depriving resources from the disorganized weak and poor majority. With his father's sword, Jiga makes friends and enemies and goes on adventures while searching for others who share his bloodline.  
  
Jiga's sword happens to be made of a rare material which a powerful organization known as Lost Eagle Nest claims to want in order to rebuild the world, but is that what they really want it for? They'll stop at nothing to take it from him, and Jiga and his friends now have a price on their heads.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Sexual Violence, Drama

name: The Deposed Empress' Scandal
description:
Lucentia is a woman who was forced to marry the emperor, but was accused of treason and beheaded. She managed to escape death thanks to a precognitive dream and fled to the enemy empire, where she became Rose Von Isaac, a rich and powerful merchant. But Lucentia could not escape her fate, as she was the only one who could save the Duke of Aytan, a legendary swordsman who had a secret that could change everything. She proposed that he be her guardian, but he asked her to be his lover.

Lucentia decided that she would no longer be manipulated by fate and that she would live her life as she wanted.
tags: Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Micchan no Hifu
description: Not found

name: The Beloved New Daughter-in-law Of The Wolf Mansion
description:
The sole heir of the notoriously frail Wolf family, Arsen, has died. The culprits were his father and half-sibling.

They killed the heir with a lie, promising to use the family's healing abilities.

As a result, the family was destroyed, and I was also caught up in it and died.
But then...
"My lady, wake up!"

When I opened my eyes, I had returned to being seven years old, before my death!

"Please let me marry Arsen!"

I can't die unfairly again. I secretly requested a contract marriage with the Wolf family behind my father's back.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Oppa, This Is All a Mistake!
description:
On the day I was planning to confess to my childhood friend of ten years, I ended up stealing his
brother's underwear left out to dry. His brother mistakenly thinks that I have feelings for him and
goes so far as to report it to the police. Oppa, it's a misunderstanding; I like your younger sibling
over there！
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Office Workers, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Crazy Food Truck
description:
Gordon is an unsociable middle-aged man driving his food truck through a world buried in sand. 
One day, he meets a girl named Arisa sleeping stark naked in the middle of the desert. 
While Arisa wolfs down any and all food she can fit in her mouth, 
a mysterious armed group seems to be pursuing her, too.
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Comedy, Survival, Martial Arts, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Drama, Slice of Life, Cooking, Supernatural

name: School Bus Graveyard
description: Ashlyn is a loner in high school with no friends. But when a fateful visit to a haunted house causes her and her classmates to see monsters at night, she'll be forced to forge bonds to survive.
tags: Thriller, Action, Long Strip, Gore, Horror, Supernatural, Full Color

name: I Don't Want to Play Matchmaker!
description:
I’ve been reincarnated into a side character of a novel. On top of that, I am the character who is like a magpie bridge in the mentally-exhausting story, *The Guys Around Hestia*.

There is no romance in store for me, and it absolutely horrifies me to think that my family is destined to drown in debt!

I planned on becoming a civil servant, enjoying a life of wealth and honor that I was unable to attain in my previous life but… why are the guys behaving out of character? Why are you blushing in front of me? Why do you keep giving me food?

“Can you Imagine Shushu being shy when looking at someone?”

“Whoa… It’d be amazing if that happens.”

As Cory absent-mindedly said that to Hiley, Eve frowned and murmured under his breath, “Should I run away with her…”

Swan remained silent while he hid his face with his sleeves. His face and ears turned red.

What’s up with you guys? Why are you guys doing other things instead of being obsessed with the female lead? Get yourself together!

This is the survival story of an academy student, Schulaina West, who wants to pursue a wealthy future in a reverse harem novel. 

TL/N: Magpie Bridge is the bridge made by a flock of magpies that connects the two star-crossed lovers Orihime and Hikoboshi in the legend behind the Tanabata festival.
tags: Reincarnation, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Reverse Harem, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Natsu no Arashi!
description: In an old town coffee shop, a boy met an older high school girl. From there… an unforgettable summer began.
tags: Historical, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Supernatural

name: Touhou - Fluffy Umbrella (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Oneshot, Comedy, Doujinshi

name: Touhou - Chimainu Sakuya (Doujinshi)
description: Not found
tags: Comedy, Doujinshi

name: Umi no Michiru Gohan
description: Not found
tags: 4-Koma, Slice of Life

name: Not found
description:
"Why doesn't anybody remember the true world…!"

The great war between the five races over the world ended when the Hero Sid led humanity to victory. A young soldier named Kai watched as that world was suddenly overwritten before his eyes. In the rewritten world, Sid never existed. Humanity had lost. There, dragons and demons ruled the world. Kai was forgotten by everyone around him.  
However, after encountering the mysterious girl Rinne, Kai decides to break this rewritten destiny. In a world without a hero, he inherits the hero's sword and martial arts and challenges the mighty enemy races in power.
tags: Reincarnation, Sci-Fi, Time Travel, Monsters, Action, Demons, Romance, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Adaptation, Tragedy

name: Hanaukyo Maid Tai
description: After his mother died, a fifteen-year-old boy named Taro is invited by his grandfather to the Hanaukyo mansion. Soon after he arrives, his grandfather disappears, and Taro learns that not only will he inherit the unbelievably huge estate, he will also have access to the countless beautiful young maids working there.
tags: Romance, Comedy, Harem, Slice of Life

name: Nyotaika Yankee Gakuen ☆ Ore no Hajimete, Nerawaretemasu.
description: Delinquent student Torao is tired of losing to the school's top dog, Inuzuka Ryouhei. One day, before his latest challenge, Torao accidentally drinks something from a vending machine that turns him into a girl! Worse yet, Inuzuka has fallen completely head over heels for her! What will Torao, now Torako, do to change back and ward off Inuzuka's advances?
tags: Genderswap, Romance, Comedy, Sexual Violence, School Life, Delinquents

name: Boukensha ni Naritai to Miyako ni Deteitta Musume ga S Rank ni Natteta
description:
Retired adventurer Belgrieve thought he was done with excitement... but his peaceful life is upended when he discovers a baby abandoned in the nearby woods.

As her adoptive father, he teaches his new daughter Angeline everything he knows about the adventuring life—a past he had thought long forgotten after he lost his leg in battle. Angeline idolizes her father and wants to follow in his footsteps, so she leaves home for the big city.

As the years pass, she ascends the ranks, eventually becoming renowned as an S-Rank adventurer: the Black-Haired Valkyrie. But it turns out that being the best comes with its own struggles, and she can barely catch her breath between battling fiends.

With everyone turning to her for rescue, can Ange get out ahead of each new disaster and finally reunite with her beloved dad?
___
**Character Designer:** [toi8](https://mangadex.org/author/eef8ef8e-a7f5-48a0-83cb-608a09790a37/toi8)
tags: Action, Demons, Comedy, Adventure, Magic, Fantasy, Monster Girls, Slice of Life, Adaptation

name: Winning Shot!
description: Ahn Shiyun is a pitcher who doesn’t mind his team losing streak, as long as he can play baseball. After continuing his dream in middle school, his life begins to change when he meets Baek Tae-Oh, a catcher of the opposing team. This is the story of amazing people who can throw powerful winning shots at the top of high school baseball's elite!
tags: Long Strip, Sports, Drama, School Life, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Heresy
description:
A thousand years have passed since the Battle of Primordial Chaos. Shaman bloodlines have become thin and tyrannical demonic beasts mostly hide off in remote mountains. The realm now belongs to Humanity, and it is filled with countless conflicts. We descend from our mountain to join this troubled world. We excel at subduing ghosts and sealing devils; we control spirits and souls alike. We are feared and respected in this world. We are called "Heretics."  
  
Society calls the teachings of the Soul-Controlling Sect, which captures and forms contracts with soul beasts in exchange for power, "Heresy." For Mo Lianjian, a young disciple who lost his parents when he was little, ascending within the sect is difficult, especially when his childhood friend, the prodigy Lian Beibei, is always picking fights. One day, Mo obtains a fragment of a legendary sword rumored to have been owned by the sect's last master swordsman…
tags: Historical, Action, Demons, Ghosts, Martial Arts, Wuxia, Web Comic, Supernatural

name: The Raider
description:
After the appearance of monsters that tear humans apart, society has divided into two parts, “Raiders” and “Non-Raiders.”

24-year-old Lee Semin, unable to become a Raider no matter how hard he tries, confines himself to a small room. One day, he stumbles upon a strange website.

｢ Welcome, new member, to the Transcendental Network - a community connecting transcendent beings across dimensions.｣

They reveal to him the true world of martial prowess. Amidst the chaos where humans and monsters are indistinguishable, the “True Raider” is about to make their entrance!

“Bring it on, you bastards.”
tags: Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Kami-sama ga Mitenai kara
description:
Sakuya, who was raised in a church, was supposed to be living a modest but warm life alongside Sister Lamia, or that's how it should have been…! Though she tries to appear seductive, she's actually pure. Though she can be slightly dimwitted, she's adorable. Even though he tries to resist, Sakuya is continuously being led around her. The forbidden love comedy between a straitlaced boy and the nun who wants to get closer to him!
___
**Individual Chapter Retail Pages:**
- [BOOK☆WALKER](https://bookwalker.jp/series/477085/)
- [Amazon](https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/B0DBBXDCGD)
- [ebookjapan](https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/836755/)
tags: Romance, Comedy, Post-Apocalyptic, Fantasy, Slice of Life

name: Kono Kuni wa Mou Owari da yo:  Nihon Dasshutsu Shite Isekai de Yarinaosu
description:
Hajime, who was reincarnated into another world, catches the attention of a bored god of that world and begins to gain cheat-like skills.

However, this world is stagnant in many ways with unfairness running rampant. Feeling frustrated, one day Hajime mutters the words, “This country is already done for”—the same words he once spoke while in Japan.

Just like in Japan, things in this other world seem to be falling apart. But unlike before, Hajime now has cheat skills, and in this world, it’s allowed to use strength to correct injustices.

This country may be doomed, but he’s determined to make things right through power. With his newfound abilities, Hajime resolves to build a place where he and those around him can live in peace
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Isekai, Fantasy, Full Color

name: Taming Master
description: Jinsung may look like your average college student, but in the harsh VR world of Kaillan, he’s Ian, a mighty level 93 archer! So when he suddenly resets his character, everyone thinks he’s totally nuts! What they don’t realize is that Jinsung has unlocked a powerful, new hidden class. Now, taming monsters is tough, and leveling up is a slog. But when his VR-loving teacher threatens to fail him, Jinsung has just two months to level up and achieve glory as the one and only Taming Master!
tags: Monsters, Action, Animals, Long Strip, Adventure, Virtual Reality, Video Games, Magic, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Tensei Shita Daimaou, Chikyuu ni Shutsugen Shita Dungeon o Tsukuridasu: Maou Jidai no Chishiki to Keiken de Matataku Ma ni Sekai Saikyou ni Natte Musou Shimasu!
description:
This is the story of a former Demon Lord, once the most powerful in another world, who once again reigns supreme on Earth.

Ten years have passed since dungeons first appeared on Earth. Humanity has gained superhuman abilities known as "Levels," "Stats," and "Skills," and those who use these powers to conquer dungeons are called Seekers. The protagonist, Renya Kamikura, suffers from recurring strange dreams and headaches, until one day, he remembers his past life as the mighty Demon Lord of another world. To his shock, all the dungeons appearing on Earth are ones he had created during his time as the Demon Lord!

With his exceptional skills, extensive battle experience, and deep knowledge of magic and dungeons, Renya quickly ascends to become the strongest on Earth, standing unrivaled against all formidable opponents.
tags: Reincarnation, Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Two Moon
description: Prince Jin was eleven when he disappeared into the forest in the middle of the night. There, he met a mysterious being that took over his body and turned him into a hybrid with great strength. Five years later he returned and demanded land and wealth for his family. Thanks to his medallion, Jin proved that he was a prince, and therefore Queen Byuk Ha was forced to leave her post. Some people wanted to get rid of him by sending ninjas to kill him... But it won't be easy to destroy him!
tags: Long Strip, Ninja, Adventure, Fantasy, Tragedy

name: The Tyrant's Loyal Warhorse
description: This is the story of a middle-aged man who is reincarnated as a horse in the world of a novel he once read. Along with that, he’s stuck with a system that forbids him from going OOC (out of character) in his horse form. On top of that, there are characters acting like NPCs, constantly giving him quests to complete.
tags: Reincarnation, Long Strip, Romance, Isekai, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: The Return of the Legendary Archmage
description:
Shin Ha-ryul is the prodigy of modern magical technology and artificial intelligence. However, he's been deemed an outcast for unable to be implanted.

A book appears before him, the magician who has been sentenced to death.

"To the posterity who can hear this voice and has the same constitution as me, I, Rai Bell Vaitener, leave this book."

Along with the book left behind by the legendary great mage, the frozen time of the genius begins to move again.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Adventure, Magic, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Return of the King of Hell
description: The underworld has collapsed. In the barren land where blood should flow, now clear water flows, and the cauldron that used to boil the souls has long since gone cold. The retired King of Underworld, in pursuit of his own happiness, seeks the path of reincarnation. However, due to the chaos in Underworld and the disappearance of his successor, he is unable to walk the path of reincarnation. To become a god in the human world and to track down the missing successor, The King of Underworld descends to the human world. But the human world is in chaos due to the escape of the deceased from Hell, orchestrated by his successor’s masterful plan. The King of Underworld joins forces with the ‘Guardians of the Life’ who protect humans, using the power of the Hell’s ledger, in a struggle to capture his successor and restore the world to its original state. Will King of Underworld be able to safely walk the path of reincarnation?
tags: Action, Demons, Long Strip, Adventure, Drama, Web Comic, Supernatural, Full Color

name: Peerless
description:
A young man with a striking appearance steps in as the acting leader of the strongest Murim Alliance in history!!

[Age: Early twenties]
[Martial Arts: Unmeasurable]
[Background: A disciple of the mysterious sect, Ihwa Palace, ruled by five female masters]
[Notable Feats: A peerless genius who achieved the "Triple Exam Success," passing the Preliminary, Main, and Advanced Imperial Exam consecutively.]

As the new acting leader investigates the mysterious death of the previous Alliance leader, terrifying and monstrous figures from the Demonic Sect appear before him!

Will the new acting leader manage to overcome this overwhelming fate?

Unprecedented, unparalleled martial arts techniques of the Orthodox and Demonic factions emerge in full force! A groundbreaking and unparalleled martial arts epic begins now.

Unprecedented, unparalleled martial arts techniques of both the Orthodox and Demonic factions emerge in full force! A groundbreaking and unparalleled martial art epic begins now.
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama

name: Hanakagari
description:
Student yuri. You can read them separately, but they are somewhat tied together.

(source: Pixiv, translated)

1. Senpai and Kouhai (後輩と先輩)
2. That Girl at Cram School (塾のあの子)
3. A Hopeless Romantic Wants to Give Up on Love (恋をやめたい恋愛体質)
4. A Friend's Love (友人の恋)
5. Cheating and Atonement (浮気と償い)
6. The Day I Realized (気付いてしまった日)
7. 500 Times Over (500回繰り返す)
tags: Romance, Anthology, Girls' Love, School Life, Web Comic

name: Tora to Hachidori
description:
Sporting an exhausted expression and a T-shirt with a large tiger printed on it, Matsuri Kitou’s taste in fashion is like a school delinquent. Unexpectedly, she soon finds herself working at one of the centers of fashion in Shibuya, a clothing store named omne.
Supervised by MB, a fashion blogger who knows the ins-and-outs of the industry, this story all about life working in a clothing store begins!
tags: Comedy, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Childhood Friend Complex
description: Ha-neul and Mincheol have been childhood friends for all of their lives, but their relationship takes on a whole new dynamic when they undergo a series of unexpected events. Although they vowed that they'd never be romantically attracted to each other, they just might be proven wrong... especially when things start to escalate and neither can predict where they'll end up.
tags: Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Hitogui
description: Shimada is a ruthless criminal responsible for indiscriminate mass murder, who later resorts to cannibalism. Nagumo, a police officer, is assigned to escort him, heightening the tension. But what unfolds inside the escort vehicle, packed with criminals, marks the beginning of an unimaginable terror—a new kind of immersive survival horror.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Horror, Full Color

name: Monster General Recorded Legacy
description:
Frozen human? A martial arts supreme leader the world never knew! The slumbering Strange Master awakens!

After falling unconscious due to an unexpected accident, he wakes up to find that thirty years have passed. During that time, his sect, the White Sword Sect, has fallen into decline and was destroyed by the martial world’s forces. He learns the tragic news that Jin yeongrim, his senior and the sect leader, has met a grim end.

The man whose mere presence made the martial arts world tremble—Sword Master Yu Jangryeong.
His legacy has been entirely inherited by a man the world has never known—Ja Un-hyun.

In this unfamiliar world, where his loved ones are now part of the past, Ja Un-hyun transcends conventions and life-and-death struggles. With his unpredictable eccentricity and unparalleled martial arts skills, he embarks on a thrilling, action-packed journey filled with laughter and boldness.
tags: Historical, Action, Long Strip, Martial Arts, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Hadashi De Bara Wo Fume
description:
A rags-to-riches romance from the creator of Tsuki no Shippo!  
Poor Kitamura Sumi…her irresponsible older brother Eisuke keeps bringing home orphans for her to take care of even though they can barely afford their own basic needs! Just when Sumi's financial problems become dire, wealthy Ashida Soichiro enters her life with a bizarre proposition—he'll provide her with the money she so desperately needs if she agrees to marry him. But can Sumi pull off fooling high society into thinking she's a proper lady? Moreover, is it worth it to give everything up for this sham of a marriage?
tags: Historical, Psychological, Romance, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Bakuage Sentai Boonboomger formation lap - Jouhouya no Your Eyes Only
description:
The manga depicts the past of Ishiro Meita, a freelance spy who graduated from a spy training school with top grades. When he's asked to investigate an unknown object that crashed from space, his life takes a drastic turn when he meets Taiya Hando. 

(from RangerWiki)
tags: Sci-Fi, Action, Mecha, Superhero, Adventure, Web Comic

name: Battle Angel Alita Gaiden
description:
Supersonic Fingers is the first Gunnm Gaiden story, it takes place shortly after Gally's fight with Jashugan. Gally is attacked by an unknown sniper, and while she recouperates, her hunter-warrior friends search for the culprit. The culprit is a strong fighter with a death wish that only Gally can fufill.  
  
The Holy Knight is the second Gunnm Gaiden story, Homecoming is the third, but takes places immediately before The Holy Knight. Before he met Gally, Ido worked as a hunter-warrior to make ends meet. Although a skilled doctor, he had no skill in the areas of cybernetics. He saves and befriends a young, mysterious girl, whom he names Carol. During their time together Ido learns the art of cyber-medicine, and starts his cyber-doc practice, but Carol's past catches up with her and Ido learns a painful lesson about medicine

[Official English](https://kodansha.us/series/battle-angel-alita-holy-night/)
tags: Oneshot, Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Comedy, Mecha, Anthology, Survival, Adventure, Post-Apocalyptic, Military, Philosophical, Gore, Drama, Delinquents, Slice of Life, Tragedy

name: Musume no Tomodachi
description: Kosuke has lived to play the ideal self as a father at home and as a manager at work. However, his life changes 180 degrees when he meets his daughter’s friend. In front of her, Kosuke was able to be his real self and his worn-out heart was healed. However, he knows that these are feelings that should never be held. The story of the Middle Aged Man Meets Girl, presented to the modern people who suppress themselves in society, begins.
tags: Psychological, Romance, Office Workers, Sexual Violence, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Jojo's Bizarre Adventure: CULTURE SHOCK (Doujinshi)
description: The year is 2030 in Midnight City, USA. Josiah Jones, an ex-convict, faces the cruel changes that have undergone his home city. While crime, gang violence, and political corruption wreak havoc throughout the city, Josiah must find where he belongs in the world all the while facing strange humans with even stranger powers. This is a fan-creation inspired by the works of Hirohiko Araki in Jojo's Bizarre Adventure (ジョジョの奇妙な冒険)
tags: Action, Crime, Mafia, Self-Published, Sexual Violence, Doujinshi, Gore, Police, Supernatural, Mystery

name: The Man Living Outside the Law
description: A protagonist who can’t break the law vs People who live without caring about the law. It’s a fight between people who live lawlessly. I live outside the law, so I shall kill all of those who make fun of the law.
tags: Action, Long Strip, Drama, Web Comic, Full Color

name: Angel Heart
description:
A young Taiwanese assassin codenamed "Glass Heart" committed suicide by jumping off a building, and her heart was pierced by a metal fence. Miraculously, her life was saved by heart transplantation. During her recovery she began to experience strange dreams, which led her to Japan looking for the donor of her heart, who happens to be Kaori Makimura, former partner of City Hunter.

---
Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics
tags: Action, Romance, Comedy, Crime, Mafia, Drama, Mystery, Tragedy

name: Awana-chan wa Kyou mo Shiawase
description: A convenience store part-timer who can't seem to do anything right: Awana-chan. Today, yet again, she messed up over and over, and she can't even count how many times she was told off... How will Awana-chan find happiness in a situation like this, without anyone else to rely on!? This is a manga about creating your own happiness!!
tags: Comedy, Philosophical, Web Comic, Slice of Life

name: Mobile Suit Crossbone Gundam - Ghost
description: Universal Century 0153. 17 years have passed since the "Steel Seven" defeated the remnants of the Jupiter Empire. As a new conflict brews between a Side 2 faction known as the Zanscare Empire and the League Militaire/Earth Federation. A high schooler on Side 3, Font Baud, is hunted by Zanscare special forces when he discovers their secret Newtype weapon. However, he encounters a little girl, who is accompanied by a blind man and is rescued by the strange return of a mobile suit that defeated the Jovians.
tags: Thriller, Sci-Fi, Action, Psychological, Mecha, Survival, Adventure, Military, Drama, Tragedy

name: Teisou Gyakuten Sekai
description:
In our current society, most porn consumers are males, we are the ones who think with our d**** many times, we worship the female body and our society, products, advertisements and many other things are centered around that. 

But what if it wasn't that way? What if, instead of men being the ones controlled by their sexual urges, women were the ones who bought porn magazines and had the most interest in sex? 

What if the moral standards between men and women were reversed?  

---
  
Note: This is a non-H adaptation of a doujinshi series with the same name.
tags: Comedy, Isekai, School Life, Adaptation

name: Baratrum's Devil
description:
Baratrum’s Devil follows the life of Scott Reaver. He's an extraordinary street fighter with a strong sense of pride, but his reputation crumbles after he is ambushed by a mysterious assailant and left on the verge of death. Now armed with a strong conviction and covered in scars, Scott sets out to become a Vindex- an elite mercenary, and hunt down his assailant.

Follow Scott's journey as he is forced to grapple with powerful opponents, as well as his own inner struggles.
tags: Action, Adventure, Self-Published, Gore, Supernatural

name: Secret Lady
description:
I, Yoon Seol-woo, a young woman with the ability to see ghosts, was reincarnated as Rosantine, the eldest daughter of a noble ducal house in a world were witchcraft is considered dangerous. I managed to fake not being able to see ghosts somehow but then...

"Leave my sister's body this instant!", I cried out to the evil spirit who's possessed my one and only beloved little sister.

Only the death penalty awaits me if my ability were to be discovered. Then, there's only one way...

"You're planning to kill Prince Chartus, right?"

I will save the Empire's second prince, Prince Chartus with this ability!

"I'll bet my life on Your Highness."

---

**Links:**
- [Official Japanese Translation (Piccoma)](https://piccoma.com/web/product/77771)
- [Official Indonesian Translation (Kakao)](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/Secret-Lady/3505)
tags: Historical, Ghosts, Long Strip, Romance, Comedy, Isekai, Drama, Fantasy, Web Comic, Mystery, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Marriage of Convenience
description:
Bianca de Arno was a ruthless countess in the Kingdom of Sevran, infamous for being a wicked and selfish wife. While her husband, Count Zachary de Arno, bravely risked his life out on the battlefield, she sat at home and spent his money. It wasn’t until her final day that Bianca realized the error of her ways. Before she died, Bianca prayed for a second chance, swearing she would do better, and woke up in her 19-year-old body. With her second chance, Bianca starts to see everything in a new light... starting with her husband.

---
Bianca de Blanchefort. The wife of Zachary de Arno, thrown out of Arno family after his death due to her self-indulgent, frivolous, and immoral behavior. She had nowhere to go, the Blanchefort family having already fallen to ruin, and was more or less kicked to a convent out in the border. A woman who ultimately met her end on a cold stone floor. A villainess with no honor: that was Bianca’s life before she went back in time.

===
“Is this truly reality? Did I really travel back to the past?”

This was neither a dream nor a hallucination. This feeling of hunger, fatigue, the vivid sense of everything around her… This was all real. If this was indeed reality… If God truly gave her one more precious chance…!

‘I’m going to carry out a business. A marriage is a business in the end. Zachary’s child will be the perfect source of financial support. I’m sure my dowry will remain safe too. I won’t have to lose the Blanchefort or Arno territories to that damned viscount either.’

Then whether it be through seduction or persuasion, she needed to give birth to her husband, Zachary’s child.

“How much was my dowry exactly?”

“400 calves, 900 pigs, 100 units of silverware, 300 rolls of silk, 2 crates of jewels, and a portion of a territory… Equivalent to a two-year budget for the Arno county.”

“Don’t you think you should compensate for that?”

---

tags: Time Travel, Historical, Long Strip, Romance, Fantasy, Web Comic, Adaptation, Full Color

name: Urekko Mangaka X Utsu Yamai Mangaka
description:
A story about the twisted entanglement between a depressed, shut-in, have-been mangaka, and another best-seller, Super Darling mangaka.
This is an independent manga done by Eno Sumi (After God) under the alias of Hanae Deki (英恵 溺).
tags: Psychological, Boys' Love, Doujinshi, Gore, Drama, Slice of Life

name: Kawaisou na Kimi wa Boku Dake no Amayaka na Kizu
description: A world of humans with two special traits: "Fork" and "Cake". One day, Aoi is lured into the school's Home Ec Room by a sweet scent, which seems to come from a senpai of his, Mitsuri: a "Cake". While Aoi tries his best to restrain himself, Mitsuri ends up inviting him to join his Cooking Appreciation Club!? A nipping cakeverse story about a kind Fork and a lonely Cake.
tags: Boys' Love, School Life

name: Into the Light, Once Again
description:
I was falsely accused of attempting to kill my younger sister, who was worshipped as a holy maiden. There was not a single person who believed in me, nor was there a person who stood up for me. Not even my blood-related family. I was fourteen years old, and it was winter. I, who was Edenbell's Fourth Princess, was miserably beheaded in front of the masses. After the end of my death, I awoke and what came was...

"My baby, my precious younger sister."

With a delightful smile, he held my small fingers. That warm gesture, warmth, and touch. He sang me a lullaby as he held me gently and swayed.

---
When Princess Alisa is framed for a terrible crime, she is shocked to learn that her own family wants her executed. After losing her will to live, she finds herself reborn as the princess of a rival empire. And though her new family acts sweet and kind on the surface, she's not sure they can be truly trusted. Luckily, with this new life comes new power. But what exactly is this mysterious magic that awakens in her? And more importantly, can she use it to get vengeance against those who once betrayed her?

---
[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/52524734)

**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EC%8B%9C-%ED%95%9C%EB%B2%88-%EB%B9%9B-%EC%86%8D%EC%9C%BC%EB%A1%9C/2586), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/content/57770713)
